eng_prompt: In response to rising unemployment rates and economic challenges, the government has implemented several initiatives. These programs aim to stimulate job growth and support the workforce in various sectors.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'emirimu eryeyongera n'okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo. Pulogulaamu zino zigenderera okutumbula emirimu n'okuyamba abakozi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa can tic ki peko me biacara, gamente oketo yub mapol itic. Yub magi tye ki miti me medo rwom me tic ki konyo lutic I tenge mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amamus na aswamisinei keda atiokisio nuka ikapun, etolomu apugan iboro luipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitopolor aswamisinei ka aigang eswamak luka iriongeta luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako ni tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi pie, gamete 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'diyi lezu azi ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu 'ba azi ngapi esele ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho emirimo mingi ahabw'eibura ry'emirimo erikweyongyera hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okutunguura emirimo n'okuhwera abakozi omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: To ensure a smooth implementation of the new initiative, a comprehensive plan has been developed. This plan outlines the roles and responsibilities of various stakeholders involved in the project.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba nti enteekateeka empya eteekebwa mu nkola bulungi, enteekateeka enzijuvu ekoleddwa. Enteekateeka eno eraga emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo abeenyigira mu pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub manyen eni ki keto itic labongo ayela mo, kiyubu yub maber tutwal. Yub man nyutu tic ki tic pa dano ma padi padi matye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorio aitodolikin ekisil loitetet, etolomun ainapeta nuipu. Itodunit ainapeta ngun aswamisinei keda aswamisinei nuka itunga luegelegela luejaas opurojekt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru, 'ba e'do otita azi kililiru ni. Otita 'di ece azi 'ba ndundu e'yo otita 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu enteekateeka ensya etwarwa omu nkora kurungi, enteekateeka y'omutaano ekozirwe. Enteekateeka egi neeyoreka emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa bw'abaine akakwate omu purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about youth unemployment and mental health, community leaders have come together to address these pressing issues. They believe that targeted initiatives can create a positive impact on the younger generation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bbula ly'emirimu mu bavubuka n'obulwadde bw'obwongo, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakwataganye okukola ku nsonga zino ez'amangu. Balowooza nti enteekateeka eziteekeddwateekeddwa zisobola okuleetawo enkola ennungi ku mulembe omuto.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom bedo peke pa tic ikin bulu ki two wic, lutela me tedero guribe kacel me cobo peko magi mapigi tego tutwal. Gitye ki niyee ni yub mapat-pat matye ki miti twero kelo adwogi maber I kom joo matino.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka amamus na aswamisinei kanejaas atumunak keda angaleu naka adam, apotu engarenok luka atutubet imorikikinos aitemokin atiokisio nu. Iyuunitos kesi ebe epedorete ainapeta ngun aitolomun ajokis nejaas atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako 'ba ode eyini tualu azo omi ni 'diyi pie, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi emu tualu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Yi a'i ra kini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi eco orodri eji 'ba oderu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'emirimo omu minyeeto hamwe n'oburwaire bw'emitwe, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakwatanisa kukora aha nshonga ezi. Nibiikiriza ngu enteekateeka ezirikuteekwateekwaho, nizibaasa kuhwera abantu bato.

eng_prompt: Many refugees face significant barriers to employment and entrepreneurship in their host countries. As a result, they often struggle to establish a stable livelihood.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi basanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu kufuna emirimu n'okutandikawo bizinensi mu nsi ezibakyaza. N'ekivuddemu, batera okulwana okuteekawo obulamu obunywevu.
ach_prompt: Luring ayela mapol ginongo peko madit tutwal me nongo tic ki biacara I lobo ma gitye iye. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gi nongo peko me nongo yoo me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Ikerai luipu itereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok nuka adumun aswamisinei keda agwelanar kotoma akwapin nu ijaunitos kesi. Kanuka ngun, etiono kesi adumun aijar na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Emunyale karakara eyi e'yo eyi esu eyini ani ecozu azi esuzu azini tujari 'yezu kari eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci geri eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Empungi enyingi nizitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu mirimo n'okutandika bizinesi omu mahanga agabarikwakiira. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kurwana kutaho entuura nungi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals enter the workforce with varying levels of expertise and training. As a result, their performance in different business environments often fluctuates significantly.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bayingira emirimu nga balina obukugu n'okutendekebwa okw'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, enkola yaabwe mu bizinensi ez'enjawulo ekyukakyuka nnyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol donyo I tic ki ngec ki pwony ma pat pat. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me timo biacaragi ipol kare lokke tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu elomanarete toma aswam keda adoketait naka acoa keda aitutuoro na egelegela. Kanuka ngun, eswamae kec kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka agwelanar ijulanakinete noi.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'do azi nga ondua azini imbata ndundu eyi pie. E'yo 'disi, e'yo yini 'ye tujari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi oja eyi sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibataha omu mirimo n'emyoga etarikushushana hamwe n'obwegyese butarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora yaabo omu by'obushubuzi eby'emiringo etari emwe nekira kuhinduka munonga.

eng_prompt: To ensure fairness and maximize collaboration, it's essential to consider how we allocate tasks and responsibilities. By doing so, we can foster a more inclusive environment where everyone's skills are utilized effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obwenkanya n'okutumbula enkolagana, kya mugaso okulowooza ku ngeri gye tugabanyizaamu emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Mu kukola ekyo, tusobola okuleetawo embeera erimu abantu bonna nga buli muntu akozesa bulungi obukugu bwe.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami weng tye marom dok weko winye bedo tye, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma wapoko kwede tic ki twero. I timo man, watwero kelo kabedo ma dano weng tye iye kama diro pa dano weng kitiyo kwede maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna keda aimorikikina naepol, ejokuna aomoom eipone lo ijanakini oni aswamisinei keda aswamisinei. Kowai lo aswam ngun, ipedori oni aitopolor ejautene lo itunga kere itwasamaete acoa kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu kililiru azini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru ama ma ega geri amani azi awazu azini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di 'yerisi, ama eco angu 'ba dria ni ecozu ondua 'ba dria ni 'diyi ayuzu kililiru ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho oburingaaniza n'okukwatanisa, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oku turikugabana emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa. Omu kukora ekyo, nitubaasa kureetaho embeera erimu abantu boona ahu emyoga ya buri omwe erikukoresibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a world where resources are limited, it's essential to prioritize those who demonstrate genuine enthusiasm and commitment. By focusing on individuals who actively seek out opportunities, we can foster a more engaged and motivated community.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli ebikozesebwa ebitono, kya mugaso okukulembeza abo abooleka obwagazi n'obumalirivu obwa nnamaddala. Bwe tussa essira ku bantu abanyiikivu mu kunoonya emikisa, tusobola okutumbula ekitundu ekyesigamye n'okukubirizibwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma lonyo tye manok, pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny dano ma tye ki miti ki miti. Ka waketo cwiny I kom dano ma gitye ka yenyo gum me tic, watwero dongo lwak matye ki miti dok ma cwinygi yom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ikidioko iboro, ejokuna noi aisingarenit ngul lu itodunitos aiyalama keda ainakina. Kowai lo aibwaikin agogongu mama ejaasi itunga luekotosi aimo arerengesio, ipedori oni aitopolor itunga luejaasi keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni ovuzu wereruri ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba ava be azini asi 'baza be 'diyi 'duzu okporu. Asi 'bazu 'ba drileba ndapi 'diyi ma dria, ama eco ongulumu azi ngapi ra azini ava esupi ra 'diyi ezo ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu eby'obugaiga bikye, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza abo abarikworeka okushemererwa n'okwehayo. Twaguma nitufayo aha bantu abarikuronda emigisha, nitubaasa kureetaho abantu abarikwenda kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: The organization is committed to fostering inclusivity and support for all displaced individuals. As part of this initiative, refugees will also get an opportunity to participate in the project.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyewaddeyo okutumbula abantu bonna n'obuyambi eri abantu bonna ababundabunda. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, abanoonyiboobubudamu nabo bajja kufuna omukisa okwetaba mu pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Dul eni oketo cwinygi me miyo kony ki dano weng ma orwenyo gangi gi. Macalo but yub man, luring ayela bene gubi nongo gum me bedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Ekapakina erionget aitopolor itunga kere ka aigang itunga kere lu aponi itobwounai kotoma aiboisio kec. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote ikerai da adumun arereng naka ajaikin toma opurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da owi i e'yo 'ba dria 'diyi ma tambazu azini atita fezu 'ba dria angu kokoru 'diyi dri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, emunyale eyi nga vini drileba esu fizu otita 'di ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kyehaireyo kureetaho obumwe n'obuhwezi aha bantu boona ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, empungi nazo niziija kutunga omugisha kwejumba omu purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement agencies have been actively monitoring illegal activities in the area. As a result of their efforts, several individuals have been taken into custody.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe bibadde birondoola n'obunyiikivu ebikolwa ebimenya amateeka mu kitundu. Olw'okufuba kwabwe, abantu bangi bakwatiddwa.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik gubedo ka ngiyo tic ma turu cik ikabedo eni. Macalo adwogi me tute gi, kimako dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Atukona nu ikisila eutasi aimaniman aswamisinei numam ekisil ecamakinit kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka aswam kec, aponi ikamarai itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ebi e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi ma pamvu one angu 'da ma alea. Okpo yini 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba 'du 'ba karakara eyi arujoa.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro bitwire nibicondooza ebikorwa ebitahikire omu kyanga. Ahabw'amaani gaabo, abantu baingi bakwasirwe.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about environmental degradation, the military has implemented new policies aimed at sustainability. These initiatives reflect a commitment to balancing national security with ecological responsibility.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kwonoona kw'obutonde bw'ensi, amagye gatadde mu nkola enkola empya ezigendereddwamu okuyimirizaawo. Enteekateeka zino ziraga obumalirivu bw'okutebenkeza eby'okwerinda by'eggwanga n'obuvunaanyizibwa ku butonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom balo cwec ma orumuwa, mony okatti ki cik manyen ma tye ki miti me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Yub magi nyutu miti me neno ni gwoko kuc ki ber bedo tye ikin lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naepol noi kanu amunar alupok, etolomu ajore ainapeta nuitetiak nuitemokinitai kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap. Itodunitos aswamisio nu ainakina aitirian ayuwara naka akwap keda ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu ama agei ri ma ezaza ma dria tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, asikari eyi e'do azita o'diru eyini lezu angu ama agei ri ma ta mbazu. Otita 'diyi e'da ava 'bani lezu e'yo ageyitema kari ni 'diyi ma tambazu azini e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha nshonga y'okushiisha eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi,amahe gatandikireho ebiragiro ebisya ebirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obuhangwa. Enteekateeka ezi nizooreka okwehayo kw'eihanga omu by'okwerinda hamwe n'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: As the effects of climate change become increasingly evident, reliance on fossil fuels is proving to be unsustainable. To combat environmental degradation and ensure energy security, people need to get alternative sources of fuel.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde byeyongera okweyoleka, okwesigama ku mafuta agava mu bintu eby'edda kyeyoleka nga ekitali kyangu. Okusobola okulwanyisa okwonoona obutonde bw'ensi n'okukuuma amasannyalaze, abantu beetaaga okufuna ensibuko endala ez'amafuta.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me alokaloka piny tye ka nen atyer kamaleng, jenge I kom mac ma aa ki I kom jami macon tye ka nyutu ni pe twere. Me lweny i kom bale pa cwec ma orumuwa ki neno ni mac tye maber, dano omyero gunong yoo mukene me tic ki moo.
teo_prompt: Kwape etiono noi aanyun atiokisio nuka ekuse ka etepe, mam epatana aitosom akinyeta nuka ekwam. Kanu aitikitik amunario naka isuban keda akwap ka awanyun ebe eyuwara akinyet, ekot itunga adumun iponesio ice luka aitosom akinyet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu mile ma ojata ni 'diyi ni ecazu e'dazaru tutu, asi 'bazu afa edele nyakua 'diyi ma dria ri e'da kini eri econi aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ku. E'yo angu ama agei 'diyi ma ezaza atrizu azini e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma tambazu, le 'ba eyi ma esu geri odu ayuza ni 'diyi ma azi eyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'empinduka y'obwire kweyongyera kureebeka, okwegamira ebirikukoresibwa omu by'obuhangwa tikirikubaasika. Okuzibira okushiisha eby'obuhangwa n'okurinda amashanyarazi, abantu bashemereire kutunga oburugo bw'amajuta obundi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, authorities finally apprehended the suspects involved in the recent string of robberies. Following their capture, the lawbreakers are under police custody.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza baasobola okukwata abateeberezebwa okwenyigira mu bubbi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa, abamenyi b'amateeka bali mu kaduukulu ka poliisi.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lutela gumako jo ma byek tye I komgi I kom tim me yak ma otime cokcok-ki. Inge makogi, lutim bal ne gitye I buc pa abili.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol noi, apotu apedorosio kikamasi itunga luetepesenitai kanu akoko. Akaulo na aikamanario kec, ejaasi itunga luebilibilete ikisila toma awenis naka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi obi 'ba 'bani ega eyi 'ye e'yo ogu ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ra. Bani yi bizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azita onyopi 'diyi polisi eyi ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera bakwata abarikuteekateekwaho kuba bejumbire omu bushuma obwabaireho. Ahanyima y'okukwatwa, abakozi b'ebihagaro bari omu kaduukuru ka poriisi.

eng_prompt: Authorities have launched a crackdown on illegal logging and land encroachment in protected forest areas. As a result, law enforcement has apprehended several individuals involved in these activities.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza batandise okufufuggaza okutema emiti mu bumenyi bw'amateeka n'okusenga mu bifo ebikuumibwa ebibira. N'ekyavaamu, abakuumaddembe bakutte abantu abawerako abeenyigira mu bikolwa bino.
ach_prompt: Lutela gucako lweny i kom tongo yadi iwi alii ki donyo I ngom I bunga ma ki gwoko maber. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma gwoko cik gumako dano mapol ma gubedo ka timo jami magi.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio kitegeasi ainapeta nuka aitub ikito komam ekisil ecamakinit ka alomar toma alupok nuka amagoron. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipolisin orocutu itunga luipu luiswamaete ngun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi e'do e'yo 'bani pati ogazu azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria azini 'ba fipi angu jere ta mbazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi obi 'ba karakara e'yo 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi batandikireho omurimo gw'okucwekyereza okutema emiti omu buryo butahikire hamwe n'okutaahirira eitaka omu myanya y'ebibira. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukwasa ebiragiro bakwasire abantu baingi abaabaire bejumbire omumirimo egi.

eng_prompt: Authorities conducted an investigation into illegal logging activities in the region. As a result, several individuals were apprehended for their involvement.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baakola okunoonyereza ku kutema emiti mu bumenyi bw'amateeka mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abantu bangi baakwatibwa olw'okwenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: Lutela gutimo kwed I kom tim me tongo yadi iwi alii I but piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne kimako dano mapol pi tic gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio ongicata nuikamunitos aibok ikito kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, aponi ikamarai itunga luipu kanu ajaut toma.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi 'diyi 'ye vuti ondaza e'yo 'bani pati ogazu azita palaa ku angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba obi 'ba karakara eyi eyini e'yo 'da 'yezu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bakakora okucondooza aha kutema emiti omu buryo butahikire omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi bakakwatwa ahabw'okwejumba omuri byo.

eng_prompt: After receiving reports of illegal logging activities in the area, authorities launched an investigation into the operation. During the raid, they discovered several pieces of heavy equipment involved in the deforestation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna alipoota z'okutema emiti mu ngeri emenya amateeka mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza ku kikolwa ekyo. Mu kikwekweto kyabwe, baazuula ebyuma ebizito bingi ebyenyigira mu kutema ebibira.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo ripot me tongo yadi iwi alii I kabedo eni, lutela gucako kwed I kom tim ne. Ikare me mony, gunongo jami tic mapol ma obedo I tim me tongo yadi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun iripotan luka aibok ikito koipone kalo mam ebeitor, apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic nuikamunitos aswamisioit ngin. Kotoma apak naka asurokinio, apotu kesi odumutu iboro luipu luelangir noi luejaasi toma atubutubio naka ikito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani egazu e'yo 'bani pati ogazu azita palaa ku angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi e'do e'yo vuti ondaza 'yeta 'da ma dria. Sawa 'bani e'yo 'yezu angu 'da ma alea risi, eyi esu afa ayuzaru nzizaru 'diyi karakara eyi e'yo pati ogazu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga ripoota z'okutema emiti omu buryo butahikire omukyanga, ab'obushoborozi batandikire kucondooza aha kikorwa ekyo. Omu kikwekweto, bakashanga ebyoma by'amaani bingi omu kutema emiti.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about environmental sustainability and deforestation, officials convened to discuss the impact of current forestry practices. As a result of these discussions, the government issued guidelines on how forestry activities should be carried out.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku butonde bw'ensi n'okutema ebibira, abakungu baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikosa enkola y'okutema ebibira eriwo. Olw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno, gavumenti yafulumya ebiragiro ku ngeri emirimu gy'ebibira gye girina okukolebwamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki tongo yadi, lutic gubedo ka lok I kom adwoki pa tim me bunga matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi me nywako lok magi, gamente omiyo cik i kom kit ma tic me bunga omyero otime kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo na akwap keda atubutubio na ikito, apotu eswamak iriamunos kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuikamunitos akoru na ikito. Kanuka ineresinei lu, abu apugan kitolomu aicoreta nuikamunitos epone loibusakinitor aitolot aswamisinei nuka amagoron.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi angu ama agei ri ma tambaza ma dria tualu pati ogaza be, azi'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani pati eyi ma ta mbazu sa'wa 'disi ri ma dria. E'yo onzeza 'diyi ma vutia, gamete ofu azita e'yo jere ma ta mbazani 'diyi ma 'yeta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha buhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'okutema emiti, abakuru bakashutama kuhanuura aha bikwatiraine n'emitwarize y'okutema emiti eriho hati. Ahabw'okuhanuura oku,gavumenti ekataho engyenderwaho y'okukora emirimo y'ebibira.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming rate of deforestation and the loss of biodiversity, environmentalists have been advocating for stronger conservation measures. Recognizing the urgent need for action, the government has taken the initiative to protect the different tree species.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'okusaanyaawo ebibira n'okusaanawo kw'ebiramu eby'enjawulo, abakuuma obutonde bw'ensi babadde basaba wabeewo enkola ey'amaanyi ey'okukuuma obutonde. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola, gavumenti etutte enteekateeka okukuuma ebika by'emiti eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki rwom me tongo yadi ki rweny pa jami makwo mapat-pat, joo ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa gubedo ka lego ni omyero kimed yoo me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Kit ma gamente oniang ni mitte ni myero kitim gin mo pi gwoko kwai yadi mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka atubutubio naka ikito keda aibiror naka iboro luegelegela, ekotosi itunga luka ekwam aitolomun iwaitin lu idarere. Kanu ajenun ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet, epuga apugan ayuarite iponesio lu ikito luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani pati eyi ogazu omgbo angirisi azini afa nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu omgbo angirisi risi, 'ba angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ebi a'di 'di e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'yezu mbeleru ri ma dria, gamete 'du e'yo ori ndu ndu 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu okutema emiti kweyongyeire hamwe n'okufeerwa eby'obuhangwa, abarikurwanirira eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi batwire nibarwanirira enkora y'amaani y'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa juba, gavumenti etandikire kurinda emiringo y'emiti etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing deforestation and environmental concerns, local authorities in Adjumani district held a meeting to discuss measures for sustainable resource management. Following the discussions, officials decided to take immediate action against illegal charcoal production and trade.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusaanyawo kw'ebibira okweyongera n'okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi, ab'obuyinza mu disitulikiti y'e Adjumani baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuddukanyaamu eby'obugagga. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abakungu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okulwanyisa okufulumya amanda mu bumenyi bw'amateeka n'okutunda amanda mu bumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me tongo yadi ki peko me cwec ma orumuwa, lutela me Adjumani gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit me gwoko jami ma orumuwa. Ingee nywako lok, lutic gumoko tamgi me lweny i kom yubu ki cato maka ma turu cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka atubutubio na ikito keda akwap, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kodisitrikta loko Adjumani kitolototo airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itwasamaere iboro. Akaulo naka aitemitem akiro ngun, apotu eswamak kiswamata katipet kanu aitikitik aitolomio keda agwelanar naka atotol namam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo pati eyi ogazu tualu angu ama agei ri pie, drice'ba distrikiti Adjumani niri ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu geri ecozu lonyi eyi ma tambazu sa'wa driasi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza 'da ma vutia, azi'ba eyi 'du e'yo mbeleru e'yo 'duzu maka edeza azini tujari 'yezu azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okutema emiti hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi, ab'obushoborozi omu disiturikiti ya Adjumani, bakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha mihanda y'okukoresa kurungi eby'obugaiga. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura, abakuru bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho kurwanisa okukora amakara n'okuguza amakara omu buryo butahikire.

eng_prompt: Access to clean water has become increasingly challenging for the residents of Adjumani. As the population grows and resources dwindle, the urgency for a reliable water source has never been more critical.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo kweyongedde okuba okusoomooza eri abatuuze b'e Adjumani. Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera n'ebikozesebwa ne bikendeera, obwetaavu bw'ensibuko y'amazzi eyeesigika bubadde bwa maanyi nnyo.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng odoko peko madit tutwal ki lutedero me Adjumani. Kit ma wel dano tye ka medde ki jami me kom bene tye kadok piny, miti me nongo pii ma ki genne obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete erai na etiono noi kanejaas itunga luko Adjumani. Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga keda aitidisiario naka iboro, ejai eipuda loka adumun akipi.
lgg_prompt: Yi ala esuzu ri eca curu'do ewaru 'ba aa'pi Adjumani 'diyi dri. O'bi ma kalafe ni tuzu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni esizu, le 'ba ma esu geri yi esuzu kililiru 'diyi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi kigumire abatuuragye b'omuri Adjumani. Ahabw'okugira ngu abantu beyongyeire kandi n'eby'obugaiga nibikyendeera, ekyetengo ky'okutunga amaizi agarikuguma nikyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to clean water is a daily struggle. As a result, residents often find themselves spending a significant portion of their day collecting water for their households.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo lutalo lwa buli lunaku. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze batera okwesanga nga bamala ekitundu ekinene eky'olunaku nga bakung'aanya amazzi g'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: I caro mapol, nongo pii maleng obedo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero ipol kare nongo gitye ka tic ki cawa malac me gamo pii pi gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, adumunun akipi nu elaete erai ationis na nginiparan. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga aitosom apakikec naepol noi aimo akipi kanuka ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, yi ala esuzu ri eri e'yo ewaru o'du driasi ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi eyi o'du karakara eyi ma alea yi tra aku eyivile 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi, okutunga amaizi marungi n'oburemeezi burizooba. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye nibamara obwire bwingi barikurundaana amaizi g'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Access to clean and reliable water sources is essential for maintaining public health and supporting community development. However, many areas still lack adequate infrastructure to meet these needs.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo era agesigika kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu bw'abantu n'okuwagira enkulaakulana y'ekitundu. Kyokka, ebitundu bingi bikyalina ebikozesebwa ebimala okutuukiriza ebyetaago bino.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng dok ma genne pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak ki dongo lobo pa lwak. Kadi bed kumeno, kabedo mapol pwod peke ki jami ma mite me cobo miti magi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ka nu eyuara ejok kanu aidar angaleu naka itunga ka aigangit apol naka itunga. Konye, eringa aiboisio nuipu emamiatatar keda iboro lu epedorete aitodolikin ipudesia lu.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani ecozu yi esuzu alaru azini asi'baza be 'diyi ma esuta eri orodriru alata o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu azini atita fezu angu ezoma ongulumu eyini ri ni. Kani si, angu karakara eyi vu nga po'di afa ayuzaru ecozu e'yo 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga oburugo bw'amaizi marungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'okutunguura ebyanga. Kwonka, emyanya mingi ekyakyeine ebyombeko ebirikumara kuhikiiriza ebyetengo ebi.

eng_prompt: As the dry season continues, communities are struggling to access clean water. Long lines form at the few available water points, creating a sense of urgency among those waiting.
lug_prompt: Ekyeya bwe kigenda mu maaso, ebitundu birwana okufuna amazzi amayonjo. Ennyiriri empanvu zikolebwa mu bifo ebitono ebirimu amazzi, ekireetawo enneewulira y'obwangu mu abo abalinda.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng tye ka medde, lwak tye ka nongo peko me nongo pii maleng. Dul maboco tye I kabedo matye ki pii manok tutwal, ma weko joo matye kakuru pii giwinyo calo gitye ka kuro pii oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini akamu, eutasi itunga ationis adumun akipi nu elaete. Isinia luewojak iswamaunun kotoma aiboisio nu ikidioko nu akipi nu ejaas, ijaikini ngul lu idarak ejenete ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa eli vurisi ri ni mu drile, ongulumu eyi dri ci yi ala esuzu. Layini ezuru 'diyi e'do pari yi ni kalafe werea 'diyi ma alia, e'yo 'ba te'baa 'diyi ma e'yo egazu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'ekyanda ku burikugumizamu, abantu nibarwana kutunga amaizi marungi. Enyiriri ndaingwa nizikorwa aha myanya mikye y'amaizi eriho, ekirikureetera abo abarikutegyereza okureebeka nk'ab'amaani.

eng_prompt: Residents have been expressing concerns about the lack of access to clean water. To address this pressing issue, the district should establish new boreholes in the area.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde balaga obweraliikirivu olw'obutafuna mazzi mayonjo. Okusobola okukola ku kizibu kino eky'amangu, disitulikiti erina okuteekawo nnayikondo empya mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ka nyutu lworo gi pi peko me nongo pii maleng. Me tyeko peko man matek tutwal, district omyero oyub tangi manyen I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus adumunun akipi nu elaete. Kanu aitemokin ationis na naepol noi, ekot edisitrikt adukun agilon nuitetiak katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi asi otiza e'da e'yo yi ala esuzu kuri ma dria. E'yo okporu 'diri ma aza kozu, le distrikiti ma si bowaholu o'diru 'diyi angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibereka okwerarikirira ahabw'obutabona amaizi marungi. Okukora aha nshonga egi, disiturikiti eshemereire kutaho za naikondo nsya omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Recent tests revealed high levels of contaminants in the local water supply. As a result, officials have issued a warning to residents.
lug_prompt: Okukeberebwa okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwazudde omuwendo gw'ebintu eby'obutwa mu mazzi g'omu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu baalabudde abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Pimo ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni pii tye ki jami maraco mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic guciko lwak.
teo_prompt: Ainwakio napac itodunit ebe ejaasi iboro luipu luepedorete amunar akipi kotoma atutubet. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamak ikwenyasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'bita o'diru 'diyi e'da afa ondiru 'diyi ma omgbo angu yi awazu angu 'da ma alea ri ma alea angiri. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi fe bile ndu liza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka obukooko bwingi omu maizi g'omukyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abakungu barabwire abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Many families have been displaced from their homes due to the ongoing conflict. As a result, they are struggling to meet their basic needs.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi gasenguddwa mu maka gaabwe olw'obukuubagano obugenda mu maaso. N'ekivuddemu, bafuba okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol gurwenyo gangi gi pi lweny matye kawot anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Aponi itobwounai ikalia luipu koreriakec kanuka ingungeta lu elosi akonye. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi ofu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi gasindwirwe kuruga omu maka gaago ahabw'entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho. N'ekyarugiremu, nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: In many regions around the world, access to clean water is limited, forcing communities to adapt their lifestyles. As a result, individuals have learned to conserve and utilize minimal resources to meet their basic needs.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi okwetooloola ensi, okufuna amazzi amayonjo kutono, ekiwaliriza abantu okukyusa obulamu bwabwe. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bayiga okukekkereza n'okukozesa ebintu ebitono okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol I wilobo lung, nongo pii maleng tye magoro, ma weko lwak loko kit me kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano gupwonye me gwoko ki tic ki jami matino tino me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu kotoma akwap kere, edumune loka akipi nu elaete ikidioko, einakinit itunga aijulakin aijar kec. Kanuka ngun, esisiautu itunga aimono ka aitwasam iboro lu ikidioko kanu aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma kala karakara eyi ma alea, geri eyini ecozu yi ala esuzu ri ma omgbo esi, e'yo 'di fe ongulumu eyini geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi ojazu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi oni geri eyini ecozu afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma tambazu ra.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing drought and increasing demand for water, local officials have been exploring various options to secure sustainable resources. Community meetings have highlighted the urgent need for reliable water supply solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekyeya ekigenda mu maaso n'obwetaavu bw'amazzi obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okufuna eby'obugagga eby'olubeerera. Enkiiko z'ekitundu ziraga obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okufuna amazzi ageesigika.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me ceng matye kawot anyim ki mede pa miti me pii, lutic me tedero gubedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Kacokke pa lwak onyuto miti matek tutwal me nongo yoo me nongo pii maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akamu na elosi akonye keda eipuda lo akipi, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aingic iwaitin luegelegela luka adumun iboro lu iswamaete ejok. Apotu airiamununeta nuka itunga itodutu eipuda lo atipet lo akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni muzu drile azini lezu yi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi geri ndundu eyi onda geri ecozu lonyi eyi ma tambazu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ma dria. Mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ece e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo yi awazu kililiru 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyanda ekirikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'amaizi obweyongyeire, abakungu b'ebyaro batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okutunga eby'obugaiga. Enkiiko z'abantu omu byaro, zikooreka ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunga amaizi ag'oburungi.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing water crisis affecting our community, it is crucial for us to secure additional resources. To address this pressing issue, we must take proactive steps to gather financial support.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kizibu ky'amazzi ekigenda mu maaso ekikosa ekitundu kyaffe, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okufuna eby'obugagga ebirala. Okusobola okukola ku kizibu kino eky'amangu, tulina okubaako kye tukolawo okusobola okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me pii matye kawot anyim ma tye ka yelo kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal ni omyero wanong jami mukene. Me tyeko peko man, omyero wayub yoo me nongo kony me lim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na akipi naenyikokinit aimusung itunga wok, ejokuna noi adumun iboro luipu. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ekot oni aswam kagogongu kanu adumun agangat na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yi ma e'yo ni mupi drile ongulumu amavileri bi ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru amani afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu drile. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, le ama ma 'ye e'yo okporu atita robia niri trazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amaizi oburikugyenda omu maisho oburikuteganisa ekyanga kyaitu, n'eky'omugasho kutunga eby'okukoresa ebindi. Okukora aha nshonga egi erikwetengwa munonga, twine kukora n'amaani okurundaana obuhwezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose in the community following the recent incident, concerns about public safety became a top priority. In response to the growing unrest, the district officials are doing everything to control the situation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kitundu oluvannyuma lw'ebyaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo, okweraliikirira ku bukuumi bw'abantu kwafuuka ekintu ekikulu. Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera, abakungu ba disitulikiti bakola kyonna ekisoboka okukkakkanya embeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I kin lwak I ngee peko ma otimme cokcok-ki, lworo I kom ber bedo pa lwak odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi me lweny matye kamede, lutic me district tye katimo jami weng ma twere me gengo tim ne.
teo_prompt: Neapolor aiyalongong kotoma atutubet kangin akaulo naka akangas kangin, apotu aiyalongongo naka ayuwara naka itunga korai ibore yenepol noi. Kanuka amumu na iyata, eutasi eswamak luko disitrikt aswam nu epedorete kere kanu aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma eselea e'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma vutia, asi otiza e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria ri eca e'yo okporu ni ru. E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi e'yo dria eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi 'ye e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obu obunkenke bwayeyongyera omu bantu ahanyima y'ebyabaireho obwahati, okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kw'abantu kweyongyeire. Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, abakuru aha disiturikiti bariyo nibakora kyona ekirikubaasika okuzibira embeera.

eng_prompt: Residents have been expressing their concerns about the ongoing water shortages in the area. In response to these complaints, the district officials have to simplify water accessibility for the people.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'ebbula ly'amazzi erigenda mu maaso mu kitundu. Mu kwanukula okwemulugunya kuno, abakungu ba disitulikiti balina okwanguyiza abantu okufuna amazzi.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ka nyutu lworo gi I kom peko me nok pa pii matye I kabedo eni. Macalo adwogi me koko magi, lutic me district omyero guwek nongo pii obed yot pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aikidiokus na akipi katutubet. Kanu aitemokin angurian nu, ekot eswamak luko disitrikt aitapatan itunga adumunun akipi.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi asi otiza e'da e'yo yi ako ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Erita ako 'diyi ma aza kozu, le azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo yi esuzu 'diyi ewakokoru o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibereka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'eibura ry'amaizi omu kyanga. Omu kugarukamu okwetomboitwa oku, abakuru aha disiturikiti, bashemereire kworobya abantu okutunga amaizi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing water crisis affecting rural communities, government officials convened to discuss potential solutions. After extensive deliberation, the Prime Minister took decisive action to address the urgent need for clean water access.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'amazzi ekigenda mu maaso mu byalo, abakungu ba gavumenti baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukigonjoolamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, Ssaabaminisita yasalawo okukola ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okufuna amazzi amayonjo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me pii matye ka time I caro, lutic pa gamente gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Ingee tam matut, lawii coko pa gamente omoko tamme me tyeko peko me nongo pii maleng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis na akipi na elosi akonye kotoma ocaloi, apotu eswamak luka apugan iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, abu Eminisita lokapolon kiswama kanu aitemokin eipud loka adumun akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yi ni mupi drile angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo egaza angiri ma vutia, drile minista yiniri 'du e'yo okporu e'yo lepi yi ala esuzu mbeleru ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amaizi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu byaro, abakuru omu gavumenti bakabugana kuhanuura aha nshonga. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, enganzi y'eihanga ekakora eky'amaani kukora aha kyetengo ky'amaizi marungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing humanitarian crisis, local officials have been assessing the needs of displaced populations. After careful consideration, the district has developed a plan to ensure the well-being of these individuals.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'obuntubulamu ekigenda mu maaso, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde beetegereza ebyetaago by'abantu ababundabunda. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, disitulikiti ekoze enteekateeka okulaba nti abantu bano babeera bulungi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, lutic me tedero gubedo ka neno miti pa dano ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi. Ingee tam matut, district okati ki yub me neno ni dano magi tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet airereor ipudesia luka itunga lu aponi itobwounai. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, etolomu edisitrikt ainapeta nuka awanyun ebe ejokuka itunga lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, distrikiti e'do otita azi nezu ra kini 'ba 'diyi ma aa muke.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibashwijuma ebyetengo by'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Ahanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, disiturikiti ekozire enteekateeka y'okureeba ngu abantu aba boona batunga amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, various training programs and workshops have been introduced in the community. As a result, residents have become more empowered to pursue entrepreneurial opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, pulogulaamu z'okutendekebwa n'emisomo egy'enjawulo gitandikiddwawo mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bafunye amaanyi okuluubirira emikisa gy'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub me pwonye mapat-pat ki kacoke mapat-pat kicako I kabedo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero dong gunongo kero me cako biacara.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etolomun ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro keda airiamunun kotoma atutubet. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luka atutubet opedoritos aitolot aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'do otita imbatani azini otita imbatani ndundu eyi ongulumu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eca okpo be drileba tujari 'yezu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, enteekateeka z'okutendeka hamwe n'emishomo etandikirweho omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye batungire amaani g'okutandikaho emirimo y'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: With the new economic policies in place, local entrepreneurs are eager to explore new opportunities. This shift in the market will empower individuals to take initiative and drive innovation.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkola empya mu by'enfuna eriwo, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu beetegefu okunoonyereza ku mikisa emipya. Enkyukakyuka eno mu katale ejja kuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi okutwala enteekateeka n'okutumbula obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: Ki cik manyen me timo biacara matye, lutim biacara me tedero tye ki miti me yenyo gum manyen. Aloka-loka man obi weko dano acel-acel bedo ki kero me timo jami manyen.
teo_prompt: Keda ainapeta nuitetiak nuka ikapun, ekotosi agwelanarak luka atutubet aingic arerengesio nuitetiak. Aijulanakineta nu nuka esokoni kes epote aitigogong itunga aswam iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Azita o'diru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyisi, 'ba tujari 'ye'ba angu ma alia 'diyi avasi drileba o'diru 'diyi ondazu. Ojata cuu ma alia 'diri nga 'ba yi dri okpo fe e'yo yi 'yezu azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma ti ojizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiragiro ebisya ebirikukwata ahaby'entatsya, abashubuzi b'omubyaro baine ekihika ky'okusherura emigisha misya. Empindahinduka omu katare neija kuheereza abantu amaani g'okutandikaho ebintu ebisya.

eng_prompt: By participating in this training program, individuals will learn valuable techniques and strategies. These competencies are essential for enhancing their employability and financial stability.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetaba mu kutendekebwa kuno, abantu bajja kuyiga obukodyo n'obukodyo obw'omugaso. Obukugu buno bwa mugaso mu kwongera ku busobozi bwabwe obw'okufuna emirimu n'obutebenkevu mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: I kare me bedo tye I yub me pwonye man, dano gubi pwonyo diro ki diro ma pigi tego. Ngec magi pigi tego tutwal pi medo kero gi me nongo tic ki bedo ki lim.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo ajaikina toma ainapeta nu aituutoonor, epote itunga aisisia acoasinei nu epol ajokis. Erai acoa na naepol noi kanu aitogogong aswamisinei kec ka ainapakina kec kotoma ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Erini fizu otita embatani 'di ma alia risi, 'ba alu alu 'diyi nga ondua orodriru azini otuta orodriru 'diyi oni. Ondua 'diyi orodriru eyini ani ecozu azi esuzu tualu geri robia esuzu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu nibaija kwega emyoga n'obukodyo bw'omugasho ahabw'okwejumba omu puroguraamu y'okutendeka. Obumanyi obu n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okwongyera aha mirimo yaabo hamwe n'okutereera omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive economy, individuals are increasingly seeking ways to invest in their entrepreneurial ventures. As a result, access to financial resources has become essential for success.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino eby'okuvuganya, abantu beeyongera okunoonya engeri z'okusiga ensimbi mu bizineesi zaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna eby'ensimbi kifuuse kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem me lim ma ite kare ni, dano tye ka yenyo yoo me keto lim I biacara gi. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo lim odoko gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ejai abolobol naka ikapun, eutasi itunga aimo iponesio luka aipikakin ikapun toma aswamisinei kec. Kanuka ngun, adumunun ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni ewu andruri ma alea baka seza ma alea, 'ba yi curu'do geri nda lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi nda e'yo yini tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, geri robia esuzu 'diyi eca curu'do orodriru drile suza ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entaasya by'erizooba ebirimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, abantu nibongyera kuronda oburyo bw'okutamu sente omu bizinesi zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga obuhwezi bw'esente kihindukire eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: With the implementation of new policies aimed at economic stability, workers can expect a more favorable job market. This shift will ensure that individuals can thrive in their careers and support their loved ones effectively.
lug_prompt: N'okussa mu nkola enkola empya ezigendereddwamu okutebenkeza ebyenfuna, abakozi basobola okusuubira akatale k'emirimu akalungi. Enkyukakyuka eno ejja kukakasa nti abantu basobola okukulaakulana mu mirimu gyabwe n'okuyamba abaagalwa baabwe obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ki keto itic cik manyen ma tye ki miti me kelo ber bedo I tenge me lim, lutic twero bedo ki gen me nongo tic maber. Aloka-loka man bineno ni dano acel-acel twero timo maber i tic gi ki konyo jo gi me amara maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Keda aitegeario naka ainapeta nuitetiak nuikamunitos ainapakina naka ikapun, epedorete eswamak ajenun ebe ejai esokoni loejok noi loka aswamisinei. Ebuni aijulanakineta ngun awanyun ebe epedorete itunga aswam ejok kotoma aswamukec ka aigang itunga kec.
lgg_prompt: Azita o'diru 'bani lezu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma vuti obiza si, azi'ba eyi eco asi 'ba cu azi ni muke ndeni ri ma dria ra. Ojata 'di ni nga ne ra kini 'ba alu alu eco drile su e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea dika eyi ma 'ba eyi ati kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutaho ebiragiro ebisya ebirikugyenderera okugarura busya eby'entaasya, abakozi nibabaasa kugira amatsiko g'okutunga emirimo. Empindahinduka egi neija kureeba ngu abantu babaase kutunguuka omu mirimo yaabo n'okushagika abakundwa baabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: Implementing a universal basic income program could provide financial stability for many individuals. As a result, people will get the income and improve their standards of living.
lug_prompt: Okuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka y'enfuna ey'awamu kisobola okuteekawo obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna eri abantu bangi. N'ekinaavaamu, abantu bajja kufuna ensimbi n'okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Keto yub me nongo cente ma mite pi dano weng I tic twero weko dano mapol bedo ki kuc I lok kom lim. Macalo adwogi ne, dano gubi nongo cente ki yubu rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Aitegeario naka ainapeta nuka edumune loka ikapun kotoma akwap epedori ayangaun ainapakina naka ikapun mama ejaasi itunga luipu. Kanuka ngun, epote itunga adumun ikapun kosodete aitojokar adoketait na aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Afa omvele universal basic income program ruri ma e'dota eco fe 'ba karakara eyini geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma tambazu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi nga robia esu dika eyi ma edri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okuta omunkora enteekateeka y'okutunguura entaasya y'abantu boona, nikibaasa kureetaho obutebeekana omu by'entaasya aha bantu baingi. Ekyarugiremu, abantu nibaija kutunga entaasya kandi bongyere aha mutindo gw'entuura yaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's needs, the local government has outlined a series of initiatives aimed at enhancing residents' quality of life. These efforts are part of a broader strategy to foster a healthier and more engaged population.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'ekitundu, gavumenti y'ebitundu etaddewo enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bw'abatuuze. Kaweefube ono kitundu ku nteekateeka ennene ey'okutumbula obulamu obulungi n'abantu abeenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti pa lwak, gamente me tedero okatti ki yoo mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak. Yub eni tye ikin yub mapat-pat me kelo yot-kom ki dano matye ki miti.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar aijar naka itunga. Aswam na erai ediopet koboro luepedorete aitojokar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi e'do e'yo ndundu eyini lezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri otuzu. Okpo 'dayi otita azi amboru 'ba eyini aa'zu rua ala be azini aa'zu e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi pie ri ma azi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro, ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu, eteireho enteekateeka y'okwongyera aha mutindo gw'entuura y'abantu. Enteekateeka egi n'emwe aha nteekateeka y'okutunguura abantu abaine amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the economic challenges they faced, the community came together to develop a series of workshops and training programs. These initiatives aimed to empower individuals with the skills and knowledge necessary for success in their entrepreneurial endeavors.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna kwe baasanga, ekitundu kyajja wamu okukola emisomo n'enteekateeka z'okutendeka. Enteekateeka zino zaali zigendereddwamu kuwa bantu ssekinnoomu bukugu n'amagezi bye beetaaga okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu mirimu gyabwe egy'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can lim ma gunongo, lwak guribe kacel me yubu kacoke me pwonye mapol. Yub magi obedo ki miti me miyo kero ki dano ki diro ki ngec ma mite pi cobo miti gi me timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda kesi, apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu aitolomun airiamunun keda ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitigogong itunga keda acoa na ekotoi kanu akerianar kotoma aswamisinei kec nuka agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani yini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, ongulumu 'da eyi emu tualu otita imbatani azini imbata ni karakara 'diyi e'dozu. Otita 'diyi ma asisile lezu 'ba yi dri okpo fezu ondua azini ondua lele drile suza yini e'yo tujarani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obubatungire, abantu bakahurira hamwe batandikaho emishomo n'enteekateeka z'okutendeka abantu. Enteekateeka ezi zikaba zigyendereire kuheereza abantu emyoga n'obwengye obubarikwetenga kugira obusinguzi omu mirimo yaabo y'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: Many residents in the area have expressed their frustration with the lack of medical facilities. As a result, access to essential health care has become increasingly difficult for the community.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi mu kitundu balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi. N'ekivuddemu, okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa kyeyongedde okuba ekizibu eri abantu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol i kabedo eni gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi bedo peke pa odi yadi. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo kony me yot kom mapigi tego dong odoko tek tutwal ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu luka atutubet itodutu amamut na amukian. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi itunga adumunun amukian.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da ayikosi e'yo arojo eyini aa'zu yo risi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua ala esuzu ri eca curu'do ewaru o'bi eyini.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi omu kyanga boorekire obusaasi bwabo ahabw'eibura ry'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga obujanjabi bw'omugasho kweyongyeire kugumira abantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent public health crisis, the efforts made by local authorities have been crucial. Their proactive measures and community outreach programs have significantly reduced the spread of infectious diseases.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu bw'abantu gye buvuddeko, kaweefube akoleddwa abakulembeze b'ebyalo abadde wa mugaso nnyo. Enteekateeka zaabwe ez'obwegendereza n'okubunyisa amawulire mu bitundu bikendeezezza nnyo okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, tute pa lutela me tedero obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yubgi me tic ki diro kacel ki yub me rweyo lwak I kabedo gi ojuko nya pa two ma kobo ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu naka itunga, ajokuna noi aswam naka apedorosio nuka atutubena. Aitemonokineta kec keda ainapeta nuka aitodolikin itunga aitidisiar awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, okpo 'ba okpo e'ipi angu ma alia 'diyi ni 'diyi 'ye ri ovu orodriru tu. Yeta eyini 'diyi tualu otita eyini imbata fezu ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie ri esi e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obwahwireho, amaani agakozirwe ab'obushoborozi omu byaro nigasingayo. Enteekateeka zaabo n'okuhutuura abantu omu byaro, bikyendeezeire munonga okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira.

eng_prompt: After months of preparation and hard work, the event finally took place without a hitch. Everyone in attendance was impressed by the seamless organization and attention to detail.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okwetegekera n'okukola ennyo, omukolo gwatuula awatali buzibu bwonna. Buli omu eyaliwo yakwatibwako nnyo olw'enteekateeka ennungi n'okufaayo ku buli kantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe ki tic matek, yub eni otum labongo peko mo keken. Dano weng ma gubedo tye gubedo ki yomcwiny pi yub maber tutwal ki keto cwiny I kom jami weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin keda aswam kagogong, abu epucit ngol kojaikin komam ationis. Itunga kere lu ajaas apotu isiyalamikisi noi kanu aitemonokin ejok ka apodokinit akiro kere.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza ma vutia azini azi ngaza okporu ma vutia, omu 'da 'ye i asizu e'yo kokoru. Ba dria emu'ba 'diyi ndra ayikosi e'yo 'bani otule kililiru azini asi 'bazu e'yo dria ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera hamwe n'okukora n'amaani, omukoro gukahwaho. Buri omwe owabiire ariho akashemererwa ahabw'entebekanisa nungi hamwe n'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: Through a combination of effective public health measures and community engagement, the district implemented a comprehensive strategy to combat the outbreak. As a result, they achieved remarkable success in managing the situation.
lug_prompt: Disitulikiti yakozesa enkola ey'awamu okulwanyisa okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kino ng'eyita mu nkola ennungi ey'ebyobulamu n'okwenyigira kw'abantu. N'ekyavaamu, baatuuka ku buwanguzi obw'ekitalo mu kukwasaganya embeera.
ach_prompt: Distrik oketo yub me lweny i kom two eni itic kun gitiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me gwoko yot-kom pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, gunongo adwogi maber tutwal I tic I kom peko ne.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aimorikikin ewai lo angaleu lo itunga keda aiswamanara keda itunga, abu edisitrikt itodolik ainapeta nuka aitikitik adeka naka ekorona. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi opedosi aitikitik ejautene ngol.
lgg_prompt: Geri e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie risi, distrikiti 'ba otita azi dria eyini ecozu a'di 'dizu azo korona niri be ri 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eyi esu drile suza okporu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Disiturikiti ekakora enteekateeka y'okurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara kurabira omu kukoresa oburyo burungi bw'eby'amagara g'abantu hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatunga obusinguzi bw'amaani omu kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In recent evaluations of regional health services, it has become evident that certain areas excel in the quality of their medical staff. Among these, Adjumani stands out for its well-trained and experienced healthcare professionals.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obuweereza bw'ebyobulamu mu bitundu gye buvuddeko, kyeyolekedde nti ebitundu ebimu bisukkulumye ku mutindo gw'abasawo baabyo. Mu bino, Adjumani yeeyolekera olw'abasawo baayo abatendekeddwa obulungi era abalina obumanyirivu.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma otime cokcok-ki I kom kony me yot kom I but lobo mapat-pat, nen atyer kamaleng ni lutic yoto kom me kabedo mukene giber tutwal. I kin magi, Adjumani nen pat tutwal pi lutic yoto kom ma gunongo pwony maber dok gitye ki ngec matut.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic napac naka ejanakine loka angaleu kotoma aiboisio, esubit bala ejaasi aiboisio ace keda eswamak luka angaleu luajokak noi. Kotoma ngul, erai Adjumani loitegelikina kanu eswamak lu adekis lu itutuoritai ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma alea ri ece ra kini angu azi eyi ma alea azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi muke ndeni. Diyi ma eselea, Adjumani ni pa so e'yo azi'ba arojo ni onita be azini nita be angiri 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma obuheereza bw'ebyamagara omu byanga, nikyoreka butunu ngu emyanya emwe neekora kurungi munonga. Omuri ebi, Adjumani neshangwa ahabw'abakugu omu by'amagara abatendekirwe kurungi kandi abaine obukugu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the rise in tuberculosis cases has become a pressing concern for local health authorities. To effectively address this public health challenge, it is essential to strengthen the healthcare workforce.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, okweyongera kw'abalwadde b'akafuba kifuuse eky'okweraliikirira ennyo eri ab'ebyobulamu mu byalo. Okusobola okukola obulungi ku kusoomoozebwa kuno okw'ebyobulamu, kyetaagisa okunyweza abakozi b'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, medde pa wel dano matye ki two aona opio obedo peko madit tutwal bot lutic yoto kom. Me tyeko peko me yotkom eni maber, pire tek tutwal me jingo lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka atapong erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas apedorosio nuka angaleu. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu nuka angaleu, ibusakinit aitogogong eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, kalafe tupi 'ba azo tibi niri be 'diyi ma kalafe ni eca asi otiza okporu ni ru drice'ba alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma okpo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, okweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'akakooko ka muzibwe kihindukire okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha bakuru b'ebyamagara omu byaro. Okukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara g'abantu omu muringo murungi, n'eky'omugasho okwongyera amaani omu bakozi b'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In many healthcare facilities, budget constraints and supply chain issues have led to a critical shortage of essential resources. As a result, health workers are often left unprepared to safely care for their patients.
lug_prompt: Mu malwaliro mangi ag'ebyobulamu, obuzibu bw'embalirira n'ensonga z'okutambuza ebintu biviiriddeko ebbula ly'ebintu ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, abasawo batera okulekebwa nga tebeetegese bulungi kulabirira balwadde baabwe.
ach_prompt: I odi yadi mapol, peko me byek me lim ki peko me jami ma mite ikwo okelo peko me nok pa jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom ipol kare pe giyube me gwoko lutwo gi maber.
teo_prompt: Keda aiboisio nuipu nu amukian, amamus na ebajet keda iboro lu itwasamao eyangaunit ekadakada loka iboro lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, mam duc eswamak luka angaleu ekapakina aidar adekak kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Arojo karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo bajeti ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu tualu e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu 'diyi pie ri fe afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ku eyi ngonde eyi ma 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu marwariro maingi, oburemeezi bw'embaririra hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'okugaba, bireesireho eibura ry'ebintu by'omugasho. Ekyarugiremu, abashaho tibarikweteekateekyera kureeberera gye abarwaire baabo.

eng_prompt: Despite ongoing training programs, many health workers still struggle to grasp the complexities of infectious diseases. This gap in understanding is particularly concerning when it comes to managing and treating tuberculosis.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde enteekateeka z'okutendekebwa zigenda mu maaso, abasawo bangi bakyalwana okutegeera obuzibu bw'endwadde ezisiigibwa. Ekituli kino mu kutegeera kikosa nnyo bwe kituuka ku kukwasaganya n'okujjanjaba akafuba.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me pwonye tye kawot anyim, lutic yoto kom mapol pwod gitye ka tute matek me niang peko me two ma kobo. Apoka-poka matye I niang pa dano I kom two aona opio obedo gin ma pire tek tutwalle ka odok ilok me gengo ki cango two aona opio.
teo_prompt: Karaida itolosio ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro, eringa eswamak luka angaleu etionikinit amisiikin atiokisio nuka adekasinei nu ikopas. Amamus na amisiikin erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik keda aimuke adeka na atapong.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani mupi drile 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba arojo ni karakara eyi nga po'di dri ci e'yo ewaru azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi vazu. Esele coza e'yo vata ma alia 'diri asi otiza fe tuni ka eca e'yo azo tibi niri ma aza kozu azini aro fezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka, abashaho baingi nibarwana kwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'endwara ezirikuturira. Omwanya oguri omu kwetegyereza, nigureetaho okwerarikirira, okukira munonga, ku kirikuhika aha kukora aha ndwara y'akakonko n'okuragurira.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent health crisis and the disparities in access to medical care, it has become increasingly clear that a comprehensive approach is necessary. Ensuring that all citizens receive adequate support is a fundamental responsibility of the government.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obutafaanagana mu kufuna obujjanjabi, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola ey'awamu yeetaagisa. Okukakasa nti bannansi bonna bafuna obuyambi obumala buvunaanyizibwa bwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki ki apoka-poka matye I yoo me nongo kony me yot-kom, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me tic weng mite. Neno ni anywali weng gunongo kony ma oromo obedo tic ma pire tek pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu keda amamus na adumunun amukian, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aitodolikin ngun kere. Aanyun ebe edumunenete itunga kere agangat na edolit erai aswam na apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo esele coza e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri eca curu'do e'da kililiru kini geri 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu dria ri eri orodriru. E'yo nezu ra kini kari anzi dria eyi atita kililiru esu ri eri azi gamete ni okporu ni i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiho obwahati hamwe n'obutabanguko omu kuheereza obujanjabi, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu engyenderwaho y'abantu boona neeyetengwa. Okureeba ngu abatuuragye boona batunga obuhwezi oburikumara, n'obujunaanizibwa bwa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: Recent health surveys have shown a concerning trend of low participation in preventive healthcare services among residents. To address this issue, the district needs to encourage more medical check-ups in the area.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kw'ebyobulamu okwakakolebwa kulaga nti abatuuze tebeenyigira nnyo mu bujjanjabi obuziyiza obulwadde. Okukola ku nsonga eno, disitulikiti yeetaaga okukubiriza okukeberebwa kw'ebyobulamu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kwed me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni lutedero pe tye ka nongo kony ma mite pi gengo two. Me tyeko peko man, district omyero ocuk cwiny lwak me mede ki pime i kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Angicak nuka angaleu lu atuboros itodunit ebe ikidioko itunga luejaasi toma aiboisio nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekasinei nuitikokinos keda adekas Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ekot edisitrikt aisinyikokit ainwakio na adekis kaiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza ni 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini fizu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alea were. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, le distrikiti ma ai 'ba eyi arojo eyi ma alea eyi ma ari o'bizu angu 'da ma alea drile.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza ahaby'amagara okwabaireho juba kworeka ngu abatuuragye tibarikwejumba omu buheereza bw'eby'amagara. Okukora aha nshonga egi, disiturikiti eshemereire kwongyera amaani omu kukyebera abantu omu byaro.

eng_prompt: Amidst growing concerns about transparency and accuracy, many individuals have begun to question the credibility of the information provided by health authorities. This skepticism has led to widespread doubt regarding the coronavirus results from the task force.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kweraliikirira okweyongera ku bwerufu n'obutuufu, abantu bangi batandise okubuusabuusa obwesige mu mawulire agaweebwa ab'ebyobulamu. Okubuusabuusa kuno kuleetedde abantu bangi okubuusabuusa ebyava mu kunoonyereza ku kawuka ka kolona okuva mu kakiiko akadduukirize.
ach_prompt: I kare me lworo matye kamede I kom ada ki ada, dano mapol gucako keto akala-kala I kom gen pa ngec ma lutela me yot-kom miyo. Bedo ki akala-kala eni okelo akala-kala mapol I kom adwoki me kwed pa dul ma doro lok kom two corona.
teo_prompt: Keda aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit aica ka abeit, mam itunga luipu eyuunitos abeit naka akiro nuinera apedorosio nuka angaleu. Amuno na ayau abuonokin nuikamunitos akiro nuka adeka naka ekorona kama ejaasi atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza tupi e'yo ada ma dria azini e'yo ada ma dria 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo a'ita ni 'ba drice'ba alata ni 'diyi ni fele 'diyi ma dria ri si. E'yo 'di fe 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu agata azo coronavirusniri ma dria engazu amuti azo korona niri ma e'yo ondrepiri vu.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the accuracy of the recent academic performance reports. Many parents and educators are questioning the integrity of the data presented by the district.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku butuufu bw'amawulire agakwata ku by'ensoma agaakaggwa. Abazadde n'abasomesa bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'ebiwandiiko ebyayanjuddwa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I kom lok ada pa adwoki me kwed ma okato cokcok-ki. Lunyodo ki lupwonye mapol gitye ki akala-kala I kom lok ada pa ngec ma district omiyo.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanu abeit naka iripotan luka eswamae loka esisiak. Auriak keda esisianakinak luipu epodokitos abeit naka akiro nu itodiaritai ko disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza efu e'yo o'duko agata sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma dria. Tipika karakara eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie eyi e'yo ada e'yo distrikiti ni 'diyi ma dria ku.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, there has been a noticeable increase in COVID-19 cases within the community. As a precaution, local health authorities conducted testing among district officials.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu balwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe mu kitundu. Ng'obwegendereza, ab'ebyobulamu mu byalo baakola okukebera mu bakungu ba disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, wel dano matye ki two korona omede tutwal I kabedo wa. Me gwoke, lutic me yot kom me tedero gutimo pim ikin lutic me district.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, apolor noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19. Kwape ayuwara, apotu apedorosio nuka angaleu kiswamautu ainwakio kanejaas eswamak luko disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu ongulumu eyi ma alea ra. Ekile ageitema ru, drice'ba alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye o'bita azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu sande ezihweire, habaireho okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 omu bantu. Nk'eky'okwerinda, ab'eby'amagara omu byaro bakakora okukyebera abakuru ba disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's assurances of a robust testing strategy, concerns began to mount over the accuracy of the results. As discrepancies emerged, public trust in the ministry's handling of the situation started to wane.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde gavumenti yakakasa enkola y'okukebera ey'amaanyi, okweraliikirira kwatandika okulinnya olw'obutuufu bw'ebyava mu kukebera. Obukuubagano bwe bwajjawo, obwesige bw'abantu mu ngeri minisitule gy'ekwatamu embeera bwatandika okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente ocikke me bedo ki yoo me pimo matek tutwal, lworo omede I kom ada pa adwoki me pim. Ikare ma apoka-poka obino, gen pa lwak I kom kit ma jang gamente otimo kwede I kom lok ne ocako dok piny.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu apugan kitogogong ebe ejai ainapeta nuajokak nuka ainwakio, apotu aiyalongongo kogeutu aiyatakin kanu abeit naka akiro nuelomunitos. Kwape apotu ingungeta kolomutu, abu amunokina naka itunga mama ejai erionget aitemokin ejautene kangol kogeu aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro asi'baza fezu geri 'bani azo eyi o'bizu kililiru ri ma dria ra ti, asi otiza e'do tu e'yo 'bani azo eyi o'bizu kililiru ri ma dria. Erita ako yini efuzu 'boria, o'bi yi ma asi'baza geri okalamvu ni e'yo nde ma aza kozu ri ma dria ri e'do esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuhamya kwa gavumenti ngu hariho enkora nungi y'okukyebera, okwerarikirira kukatandika kweyongyera ahabw'obuhikire bw'ebyarugire omu kukyebera. Obu obutaikirizana bwarugireho, obwesigye bw'abantu omu minisiture omu kukora aha nshonga bukatandika kukyendeera.

eng_prompt: In a world where perceptions can shift rapidly, individuals often find themselves caught in a cycle of judgment. This duality can lead to surprising outcomes, where initial impressions may not reflect true character.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga endowooza zisobola okukyuka amangu, abantu batera okwesanga nga bakwatiddwa mu mulamwa gw'okusala emisango. Enjawulo eno esobola okuleeta ebivaamu ebyewuunyisa, nga ebisookerwako biyinza obutalaga mpisa ntuufu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma tam twero loke oyot-oyot tutwal, dano ipol kare nongo gitye ka ngolo kop i komgi. Apoka-poka man twero kelo adwogi me ur, kama tam me acel pe twero nyutu kit ma ngat moni tye kwede kikome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ijulanakinete aomisio atipet, etapit itunga ajenun ebe ejaasi kesi toma aomisio nuepedorete kesi aswam. Atiakatiaka na epedori ayangaun iboro lu itegelikina, mam aomisio nusodit itodunitos iponesio luka itunganan luka abeit.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani egata eyi ojazu mbeleru ri ma alea, 'ba alu alu 'diyi eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi e'yo liza ma alea ci. E'yo esele coza 'diri eco fe e'yo osuta ma dria, e'yo 'bani ega oko 'diyi econi adriza a'da ri e'da ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ei emiteekateekyere erikubaasa kuhinduka ahonaaho, abantu nibashangwa bakwatsirwe omu muringo gw'okucwa orubanja. Enkora y'emiringo ebiri neebaasa kurugwamu ebitarikutangaaza, ahu ebiteekateeko by'okubanza bitarikubaasa kworeka emitwarize eyaabuzima.

eng_prompt: As the votes were being tallied, tensions rose among the candidates and their supporters. Many observers noted irregularities during the polling process, leading to widespread speculation about the outcome.
lug_prompt: Obululu bwe bwali bubalibwa, obunkenke bwajjawo wakati w'abeesimbyewo n'abawagizi baabwe. Abatunuulizi bangi baalaba obutali bwenkanya mu kulonda, ekyaviirako okuteebereza kungi ku byava mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kitye ka kwano kwir, telle omede ikin lucungu ki lucwakgi. Lunyut kwir mapol guneno bal ma otimme I kare me bolo kwir, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki byek I kom adwogi yer ne.
teo_prompt: Neautar aimar abootin, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kiding abwoak keda egangitokokec. Apotu asesenak luipu kowanyutu aibucaret kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo, ido abu koyangau aomisio nuikamunitos akiro nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni voti laria, asi otiza tu 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba atita fepi eyidri 'diyi pie. Ba karakara angu ndre'baa 'diyi ndre e'yo onzi 'diyi sa'wa opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo fepi 'ba karakara eyi ma ega e'yo agata ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku bwabaire nibubarwa, obunkenke bukarugaho ahagati y'abeesimbireho n'abashagiki baabo. Abareebi baingi bakareeba ebitahikire omu bwire bw'okuteera akaruuru, ekyareteire abantu baingi kuteebereza ebirugyire omu kuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Despite the rising number of COVID-19 infections reported in recent weeks, the district has maintained a hands-off approach to managing the situation. Many parents are concerned about the lack of communication regarding health protocols and case tracking.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omuwendo gw'abantu abakwatibwa ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongedde mu wiiki eziyise, disitulikiti ekuumye enkola y'okukwasaganya embeera. Abazadde bangi beeraliikirivu olw'obutaba na mpuliziganya ku byobulamu n'okulondoola abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel dano matye ka nongo two korona tye ka medde i cabit ma okato angec, distrik pud tye ki yoo me tic me lweny i kom two eni. Lunyodo mapol tye ki lworo I kom lok me pe lok I kom cik me yot kom ki lubu kor lutwo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma isabitin lu atuboros, eyuarit edisitrikt epone loka aitikitik ejautene ngol. Iyalongongosi auriak luipu kanu amamus na einer nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka angaleu keda aingic adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu ra ti sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea ra ti, distrikiti 'da 'ba e'yo nde ma aza ko. Tipika karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo 'bani e'yo nzezu azita e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'ba azo be 'diyi ma eti ondazu 'diyi ma dria ku ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the accuracy of the testing methods used in the recent assessments. As a result, many community members are questioning the validity of the reported outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku butuufu bw'enkola z'okukebera ezaakozesebwa mu kunoonyereza okwakakolebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi mu kitundu babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'ebyavudde mu kunoonyereza.

nyn_prompt: Hariho okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'emitwarize y'okukyebera eyakozesibwa omu kukyebera okuhweireho. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi omu byaro nibabangaanisa oburingaaniza bw'ebirugiremu.

eng_prompt: Despite the rising number of COVID-19 cases among students and staff, many families feel abandoned by the school administration. Concerns have been raised about the lack of support and resources for those affected by the virus.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongedde mu bayizi n'abakozi, amaka mangi gawulira nga gasuuliddwa abakulembeze b'essomero. Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa olw'ebbula ly'obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa eri abo abakoseddwa akawuka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel lutino kwan ki lutic tye kamede ki nongo two korona, gangi mapol giwinyo calo ludito me gang kwan guwekogi. Lworo tye pi peko me nok pa kony ki jami ma mite pi jo ma two eni omakogi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kanejaas esisiak keda eswamak, epupete ikalia luipu ebe apotu eyaitene lo esomero kojalakisi kes. Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu amamus na agangat keda iboro lu itunga lu etereikina keda ekorona.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the tallies from the recent election, it became clear that there were discrepancies in the reported numbers. Voters and officials alike were shocked to discover that some of the election results at the district are wrong.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebibalo okuva mu kulonda okwakaggwa, kyalabika bulungi nti waaliwo obutakwatagana mu miwendo egyaloopebwa. Abalonzi n'abakungu beewuunyizza okukizuula nti ebimu ku bivudde mu kulonda ku disitulikiti si bituufu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo wel ma aa ki I yer ma okato cokcok-ki, onen atyer kamaleng ni wel ma kimiyo kwede pe obedo marom. Lubol kwir kacel ki lutic gubedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma gunongo ni adwoki me yer mukene I district pe obedo ada.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor inaabai luka aseo napac, aponi kojenunai ebe ajai amamus acamanar kotoma inaabai luka aseo. Apotu aseak keda eswamak kisumikinos noi ajenun ebe icie kotoma akiro nuka aseo kodisitrikt mam eraas nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: Bani kalafe engazu opeta ebipi 'bo 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'dazaru kini kalafe 'bani olu 'diyi ma esele coza ci. O'bi voti 'bepi 'diyi tualu azi'ba eyi pie eca osutasi eyini esuzu kini agata opetaa ni distrikiti 'da ma alea 'diyi ma azi eyi onzi.
