lug_prompt: Ng'akulira mu kitundu ekirimu enkolagana ey'oku lusegere, yalabanga entalo n'obuwanguzi bwa baliraanwa be. Olw'okubudaabudibwa emboozi zaabwe, yawulira omulanga ogw'amaanyi okuwulira amaloboozi gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Pien odongo I kabedo matye ki wat macok, en obedo kaneno lweny ki loc pa jirani ne. Lok meggi okonye me winyo lwongo matek tutwal me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu apoloun kotoma atutubet naejaasi keda aimorikikina, abu ngesi kosesen atiokisio keda akerianut naka idunyetake. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi akiro kec, abu ngesi kopup aiwororio naepol noi naka aitodiar iporotookec.
lgg_prompt: Erini zozu ongulumu ti ecita be tu 'diyi ma alea, eri ndre e'yo a'di 'diza azini drile suza jo ejele erivile 'diyiniri ra. E'yo yini olu 'diyisi ava esuzu, eri etumu omveta okporuni yi ma o'duko erizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukurira omu kyanga ekirikukwatanisa, akakira kureeba entaro n'obusinguzi bwa bataahi be. Ahabw'okuhuumurizibwa emboozi zaabo, akahurira okwetwa kw'amaani kureetera eiraka ryabo kuhurirwa.

eng_prompt: After years of advocating for community issues and raising awareness about local concerns, she felt compelled to take her passion to the next level. Inspired by the need for change, she decided to run for office and make a difference from within the system.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'alwanirira ensonga z'ekitundu n'okumanyisa abantu ku nsonga ezikwata ku kitundu, yawulira ng'alina okutwala obwagazi bwe ku ddaala eddala. Ng'akubirizibwa obwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka, yasalawo okwesimbawo mu woofiisi aleetewo enjawulo mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny pi peko me kabedo gi ki rweyo lwak i kom peko me kabedo gi, en owinyo ni omyero oter mitine I rwom ma lamal. Pi miti me aloka-loka ma obedo I cwinye, en omoko tamme me cung I yer wek okel aloka-loka I dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aigang akiro nuka atutubet keda aisisianakin itunga nuka atiokisio nuka atutubet, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi ayangar amina ke toma adoketait naetupakini. Aponi kisinyikokinai ngesi aijulakin ejautene, abu ngesi koseu aibwo kanu aitolomun aijulanakineta kotoma apugan.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani a'di 'dizu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria azini imbata fezu e'yo angu eyini 'diyi ma dria 'bo ri ma vutia, eri ega kini le i ma leta 'du pari azini ma alea. Erini ava esuzu e'yo lezu ojata ma dria risi, eri 'du e'yo pa tuzu ofisi ma alia ojata ejizu engazu amuti 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikurwanirira enshonga z'ekyanga hamwe n'okumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'ebyaro bye, akahurira naagyemeserezibwa kutwara ekyetengo kye aha rurengo orundi. Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba naayenda empindahinduka, akasharamu kwesimbaho kukora empindahinduka omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After a competitive election campaign filled with passionate debates and community engagement, the results were finally announced. With overwhelming support from her constituents, she was ready to take on her new role.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukuba kampeyini z'okulonda ezaabaddemu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, ebyavaamu byalangirirwa. Olw'obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva mu balonzi be, yali mwetegefu okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa bwe obupya.
ach_prompt: Ingee pyem me bito kwir ma opong ki laro lok ki lwak, adwogi yer ne dong kicwalo woko. Ki cwak madit tutwal ma aa ki bot lubol kwir mege, en onongo tye atera me timo ticce manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolobol naka ikampeins keda epeget loepol noi keda aimorikikin itunga, aponi kolimorai akiro nuelomunitos. Keda agangat naepol noi kama ejaasi itungake, akapakina ngesi aswam aswamuke naitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara opetaa ni okporu 'diyi ma vutia, e'yo agbatara ni okporu 'diyi pie tualu e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi pie, 'ba azi asizu e'yo agata ni 'diyi ra. Atita angiri engazu 'ba erini opi nyapi 'diyi vu risi, eri de ngonde azi erini o'diruri 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ehururu y'okuhayahayana erimu okuhanuura kw'amaani hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, ebyarugiremu bikarangirirwa. Ahabw'obuhwezi bwingi kuruga omu bantu be, akaba ayeteekateekire kutwara omurimo gwe omusya.

eng_prompt: Her reputation for outsmarting opponents had spread far and wide, instilling fear in anyone who dared to challenge her. Many had witnessed her victories and knew that going up against her was a daunting task.
lug_prompt: Erinnya lye ery'okuwangula abaali bamuvuganya lyali lisaasaanidde buli wamu, era ekyo kyaleetawo okutya mu abo bonna abaali baagala okumusomooza. Bangi baali balabye obuwanguzi bwe era baali bakimanyi nti okuvuganya naye si kyangu.
ach_prompt: Nying mege me ryeko me loyo jo ma obedo ka pyem kwedgi onongo dong okato kama bor tutwal, ma oweko lworo omako ngat mo keken ma obedo ki tekcwiny me pyem kwede. Dano mapol guneno loc ma en oloyo dok guniang ni pyem kwede obedo tic matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejenara ngesi noi kanu aitelekaar ngul lueboloboloete keda ngesi, ido abu kitukurian itunganan yenepedori aitepeg ngesi. Apotu itunga luipu kowanyutu aitelekaareke ido ejenete ebe etiono noi aitepeg ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma ru e'yo 'ba ageti otipi eri be 'diyi agazu onduarisi ri ere i ra, erini 'ba ci asi 'bapi eri ma ageti otipi 'diyi ma alia ori fezu. Ba karakara eyi ndre ndra e'yo erini agazu 'diyi ra dika eyi nii ra kini e'yo pa tuzu eri be ri azi okporu ni i.
nyn_prompt: Eiziina rye ry'okusinga abaabaire bamuhakanisa, rikajanjaara omu myanya mingi, ekyaretsireho okutiina omu muntu weena owaabaire aine obumanzi bw'okumuhakanisa. Baingi bakaba bareebire obusinguzi bwe kandi bakamanya ngu okumuhakanisa kikaba kigumire munonga.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated community service and grassroots campaigning, she was widely recognized as a strong candidate. When the election came, her popularity ensured that no one dared to challenge her.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza abantu era ng'anoonya akalulu, bangi baali bamutwala ng'omuntu ow'amaanyi. Okulonda bwe kwajja, obuganzi bwe bwakakasa nti tewali amuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek pi lwak ki bito kwi, dano mapol gunene macalo lacungu matek tutwal. Ikare ma yer obino, yweka ma en tye kwede oweko ngat mo pe obedo ki tekcwiny me pyem kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin itunga keda aisup aseeta, aponi kojenunai ngesi kwape abwoan loegogong noi. Neadolunia aseo, abu ngesi kojen ebe emamei idiotunganan yenepedori aitepeg ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu o'bi eyidri azini ti odaza 'yezu o'bi eyidri 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ndra eri 'ba okporu ni ru. Opeta eyini emuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri ma ru ku e'yo 'ba azini ni asi 'bazu ageti otizu eri be ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuheereza abantu n'okuronda akaruuru, abantu baingi bakamureeba nk'omuntu w'amaani. Oburuuru ku bwaizire, okumanywa kwe kukareetera ngu tihaine owabaire naabaasa kumuhakanisa.

eng_prompt: As a leader deeply committed to her community, she has witnessed the struggles and hardships they face daily. Driven by a vision for a brighter future, she is determined to implement meaningful changes.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze eyeewaddeyo ennyo eri ekitundu kye, alabye entalo n'ebizibu bye basanga buli lunaku. Olw'okuba alina ekiruubirirwa eky'okuba n'ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebirungi, mumalirivu okukola enkyukakyuka ez'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela ma oketo cwinye tutwal I kom lwak mege, en oneno lweny ki peko magitye ka kato ki iye nino ki nino. Ki miti me neno anyim maber, en omoko tamme me kelo alokaloka matye ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon lo ekapakina noi mama ejaasi itunga luka atutubeteke, ewanyunit ngesi atiokisio keda atiokisio nu ejaas kesi nginiparan. Keda aomisioit naka aijar naejok koingaren, ekapakina ngesi aitodolikin aijulanakineta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba azi asi fepi ongulumu erivileri ni ru, eri ndre e'yo a'di 'diza azini e'yo ewaru yini dri fuzu yi be o'du driasi 'diyi ra. Egata ewu drialeri ni muke risi, eri asi 'ba e'yo ojata orodriruni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi orikukunda munonga abantu be, akareeba entaro n'oburemeezi obubarikurabamu buriizooba. Ahabw'okwenda kureeba ebiro bya nyensya birungi, amaririire kukora empindahinduka ez'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Her empathy is unmatched, allowing her to connect with others on a deeper level. Friends often turn to her for advice, knowing she truly listens and cares.
lug_prompt: Obusaasizi bwe tebuliiko gwe bugeraageranya, ekimusobozesa okukwatagana n'abalala ku ddaala ery'omunda. Mikwano gye gitera okudda gy'ali okumuwa amagezi, nga bakimanyi nti ddala awuliriza era afaayo.
ach_prompt: Kica ma en tye kwede pe rom ki pa ngat mukene, man weko en bedo ki kubbe ki jo mukene I rwom ma lamal tutwal. Lureme ipol kare gidok bote pi nongo tam, kun gingeyo ni en winyo lokgi dok paro pigi.
teo_prompt: Emina ngesi itunga noi, ijaikini ngesi arucokina keda luce kotoma adoketait naepol noi. Etapit ipapero alosit nejai ngesi kanu aicoreta, ejenete ebe epupokinit ngesi ka apodokinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ndeni, eri fe erini ti ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie angu aliru 'diyi ma alea. Agyipi eyi aci eri vu imbata esuzu, eyini nii ra kini eri e'yo eri azini asi 'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Okusaasibwa kwe tikurikubaasa kugyeragyeranisibwa, ekirikumwikiriza kukwatanisa n'abandi aha rurengo rw'amaani. Banywani be nibakira kumushaba obuhabuzi, barikumanya ngu naahurikiza kandi naabafaho.

eng_prompt: Her extensive experience in customer service has equipped her with valuable skills. Whether it's resolving conflicts or providing support, she excels in understanding others' needs.
lug_prompt: Obumanyirivu bwe obw'amaanyi mu kuweereza bakasitoma bumuwadde obukugu obw'omuwendo. Ka kibeere kugonjoola butakkaanya oba okuwa obuyambi, asinga mu kutegeera ebyetaago by'abalala.
ach_prompt: Ngec madit ma en tye kwede I tic ki luwil omiye diro ma pire tek tutwal. Kadi bed ni tye ka cobo peko onyo miyo kony, en tye ki kero me niang miti pa jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Amisiarit ke naepol noi kotoma aijanakin agwelak einakinit ngesi acoa naejok noi. Arai itemonokinete ingungeta arai bo aijanakin agangat, iswamai ngesi kagogong noi kotoma amisiikin ipudesia luka luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini esu tu aje'ba eyi ma aza kozu ri fe erini ondua orodriru 'diyi. Ka tro ovu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kani ku atita fezu, eri aga e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obumanyi bwe bwingi omu kuheereza abaguzi bumuhereize emyoga y'omugasho. Yaaba n'okugonjoora entongane nainga okuheereza obuhwezi, nayetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo by'abandi.

eng_prompt: In a world where inequality persists, she believes that fostering connections is key to driving meaningful change. Her mission is to empower individuals by broadening their access to resources and networks.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli obutali bwenkanya, alowooza nti okukulaakulanya enkolagana kye kisumuluzo ky'okutambuza enkyukakyuka ey'amakulu. Ekigendererwa kye kwe kuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi nga bagaziya enkola yaabwe ey'okukozesa ebintu n'emikutu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma rwate peke iye, en tye ki niyee ni kelo kubbe obedo gin ma pire tek me kelo aloka loka maber. Miti mege tye me tyelo kor dano kun medo kero gi me nongo kony ki kubbe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naemamei airiamara, iyuunit ngesi ebe aitopolor aiswamanara nes elacet loka aitodolikin aijulakinet naejok. Alosikineteke erai aitigogong itunga kopone lo aitanyanyar eipone lo adumunun iboro keda iponesio luka elago.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru esele coza ni mu drile ri ma alea, eri a'ira kini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu ri eri fungua ojata orodriru ni ejizu ri'I. Eri ma asisile lezu 'ba yi dri okpo fezu geri eyini geri eyini ecozu afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi etarimu buringaniza, naateekateeka ngu okureetaho empurizagana n'eky'omugasho omu kureetaho empinduka. Ekigyendererwa kye n'okwongyera abantu amaani obwo arikwongyera aha buheereza bwabo n'emikutu yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a world where inequality persists, she believes that everyone deserves the fundamental resources necessary for a dignified life. Her passion for social justice drives her to advocate for policies that ensure no one is left behind.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omuli obutali bwenkanya, alowooza nti buli omu agwanidde okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obw'ekitiibwa. Okwagala kwe eri obwenkanya bw'embeera z'abantu kumuleetera okulwanirira enkola ezikakasa nti tewali muntu yenna alekebwa mabega.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma rwate peke iye, en tye ki niyee ni dano weng omyero gunong jami ma mite pi kwo maber. Mar ma en tye kwede pi ngolo kop matir i kom lwak oweko en tye ka lweny pi cik ma neno ni pe kiweko ngat mo keken angec.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejai amamus airiamara, iyuunit ngesi ebe ibusakinit nginitunganan adumun iboro lu itwasamao kanu aijar najokan. Amina ke kanuka etube loajokan nes isinyikokini ngesi aigang ainapeta nuepedorete awanyun ebe emamei idiotunganan yenejalakinio kau.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru esele coza ni mu drile, eri a'ira kini le 'ba dria ma esu afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru inzizaru 'diyi ra. Leta erini e'yo liza kililiru o'bi yi ma eselea ri ma dria ri ni eri dri a'di 'dizu azita 'bani nezu ra kini 'ba azi ku vutia ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi etarimu buringaniza, naateekateeka ngu buri omwe ashemereire kutunga ebyetengo by'amagara g'ekitiinisa. Okukunda kwe eby'oburingaaniza nikimureetera kurwanirira ebiragiro ebirikureeba ngu tihaine orikusigara enyima.

eng_prompt: As a dedicated public servant, the parliamentarian balances the demands of political life with personal responsibilities. Despite a busy schedule, they prioritize spending quality time with their loved ones.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukozi wa gavumenti eyeewaddeyo, omubaka wa paalamenti atereeza ebyetaago by'obulamu bw'ebyobufuzi n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe obw'obuntu. Wadde nga balina eby'okukola bingi, bakulembeza okumala ebiseera n'abaagalwa baabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo latic pa gamente ma odyere, lamemba me parliament tye ki kero me timo tic mapat-pat me cungu iwi-bye kacel ki tic ma mege. Kadi bed ni gitye ki jami mapol me atima, gimaro bedo ki jo ma gimaro.
teo_prompt: Kwape eswaman lo ekapakina, epedori emeeba loka airabet aitirian aijar naka epolitikis keda aswamisinei ke. Karaida ipu aswamisio, isingarenitos kesi aitosom apak naejok keda luminan kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba gameteni asi fepiri ru, azi'ba koloseni ni 'da ni e'yo politiki ni 'diyi 'ye tualu azi i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi pie. Sa'wa yini aa'zu ri ma talasi, eyi sa'wa eyini aa'zu 'ba eyini leletu 'diyi pie ri 'du okporu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omukozi wa gavumenti, omukiiki omwishengyero naabaasa kutereeza ebyetaago by'eby'obutegyeki hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa bwe. N'obu baakuba baine bingi by'okukora, nibakulembeza kumara obwire burungi n'abakundwa baabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the community has focused on revitalizing its local economy. As a result, many residents have turned to farming and other agricultural practices.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kitadde essira ku kuzzaawo ebyenfuna byakyo. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi baddukidde mu kulima n'ennima endala.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ilo malo rwom me lim I kabedo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol gucako pur ki pur mukene.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apodokinit itunga aisiteteun edumune loka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, alomasi itunga luipu akoru keda icie iponesio luka akor.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'da 'ba asi e'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do amvu 'ya 'yeta amvu 'yaza ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho,ekyanga kiteire amaani omu kugarura busya eby'entaasya yaakyo. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi batandikire kuhinga n'okuriisa n'okukoresa emiringo endiijo y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Despite their hard work and dedication, the local farmers struggle to maintain their crops. One of the main challenges they face is the lack of access to high-quality seed options.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bakola nnyo era nga beewaddeyo, abalimi b'omu kitundu balwana okukuuma ebirime byabwe. Ekimu ku bisinga okubasomooza kwe butafuna nsigo za mutindo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lupur me tedero gitiyo matek me gwoko cam gi. Peko acel madit ma ginongo obedo peko me nongo kodi ma rwom gi malo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu, eutasi akoriok luka atutubet ainingosit aidar iraanakec. Adiopet kotoma atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi ngesi amamus na adumunun ikinyom lu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini okporu azini asi feza yiniri ma talasi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri ci ori yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo ewaru alu eyini esu ri eri geri eyini ecozu ori wura muke 'diyi esuzu ku ri i.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okukora munonga n'okwehayo kwabo, abahingi b'omubyaro nibarwana kurinda ebihingirwe byabo. Kimwe ahaburemeezi bw'amaani obu barikutunga, n'obutabaasa kutunga embibo nungi.

eng_prompt: The agricultural sector in Uganda has been facing significant challenges due to the prevalence of low-quality products. Recent studies have revealed alarming statistics regarding the authenticity of seeds available to farmers.
lug_prompt: Ekisaawe ky'ebyobulimi mu Uganda kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi olw'ebintu ebiri ku mutindo ogwa wansi. Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwalaga ebibalo ebitiisa ebikwata ku butuufu bw'ensigo eziriwo eri abalimi.
ach_prompt: Tenge me pur I lobo Uganda obedo kanongo peko madit tutwal pi jami ma rwom gi lapiny. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto lok mapol ma kelo lworo I kom kodi ma lupur tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ewai lo akoru ko Uganda etereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok kanuka iboro luikidioko adoketait. Aingic napac itodunitos akiro nuarokok nuikamunitos abeit naka ikinyom lu ejaas akoriok.
lgg_prompt: Esele agrikica ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ebi e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo afa edeza wura muke ku 'diyiniri ma e'yosi. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da kalafe ori 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri 'diyi ma e'yo adaru.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa omu Uganda kitwire nikitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani ahabw'ebintu by'omutindo gw'ahansi. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ebihandiiko ebirikutangaaza ebirikukwata aha mbuto ezi abahingi barikubaasa kutunga.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to increase their crop yields, farmers were lured by the promise of high-quality seeds at a fraction of the usual price. Unfortunately, they didn't realize that these seeds were counterfeit and would ultimately lead to disastrous results.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku makungula gaabwe, abalimi baasendebwasendebwa ekisuubizo ky'ensigo ez'omutindo ogwa waggulu ku bbeeyi eya bulijjo. Eky'omukisa omubi, tebaakitegedde nti ensigo zino zaali za kicupuli era ku nkomerero zandivuddemu akabi.
ach_prompt: I temo matek tutwal me medo kac gi, lupur gubedo ki miti me nongo kodi ma rwom gi malo I wel matidi loyo weng. Ki gum marac, pe guniang ni kodi magi pe obedo ada dok man bikelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam naepol noi aiyatakin esakec, apotu akoriok kisinyikokisi keda aisumuneta nuka ikinyom luejokuka noi keda itiaisinei luikidioko. Nukaiturur, mam kesi apotu ojenutu ebe mam ikinyom lu eraasi lukabeit ido epedorete ayangaun atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni lezu ori efiza yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, 'ba 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi obe e'yo 'bani lezu ori wura onyiru 'diyi isuzu aje were si ri si. Drile onziru, eyi awini ega kini ori 'diyi enzoru dika eyi nga mu e'yo onzi eyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugyezaho kw'amaani kw'okwongyera amasharuura g'ebihingirwe byabo, abahingi bakasindikibwa okuraganisa kw'embibo y'omutindo gw'ahaiguru ahamuhendo mukye. Eky'obusaasi, tibaramanyire ngu embibo ezi zikaba ziri ez'ebishobobo kandi zikaba niziija kurugwamu akabi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, reports of counterfeit seeds flooding the market have raised concerns among local agricultural communities. To address this pressing issue, experts decided to hold an informative event for farmers.

eng_prompt: The concept of human rights has evolved over centuries, reflecting the fundamental principles of dignity and equality. These rights serve as a universal standard for justice and protection against oppression.

teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nuka aitopol akoru, aponi itemokinai airiamun kanu aisisianakin akoriok luka atutubet. Apotu airiamununeta ngun kisingarenata nuka ikisila keda iboro lu ejaas kanu aigang aijar kec.

eng_prompt: In recent months, reports of counterfeit agricultural products have surged, raising concerns among the farming community. To address this issue, local agricultural organizations organized workshops to inform farmers about the dangers of fake seeds and how to identify them.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, alipoota z'ebintu by'obulimi ebijingirire zeeyongedde, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu balimi. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, ebitongole by'ebyobulimi eby'omu kitundu byategeka emisomo okutegeeza abalimi ku kabi akali mu nsigo ez'ebicupuli n'engeri y'okuzitegeeramu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lok I kom jami apura ma pe obedo ada omede tutwal, man okelo lworo ikin lupur. Me tyeko lok man, dul ma doro lok kom pur guyubu kacoke me pwonyo lupur i kom rac pa kodi ma pe obedo ada ki kit me ngeyo kodi magi.

Okukora aha nshonga egi,ebitongore by'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa eby'omubyaro bikatebekanisa emishomo y'okumanyisa abahingi akabi k'embibo egingiriire n'oku bashemereire kuzimanya.

eng_prompt: For years, the farmers toiled under harsh conditions, believing they had no power to change their circumstances. Little did they realize that there were laws in place to protect their interests and ensure their voices were heard.

eng_prompt: The local farmers attended a workshop on sustainable agriculture practices. During the session, experts shared valuable resources for improving crop yields.
lug_prompt: Abalimi b'omu kitundu beetabye mu musomo ogukwata ku nnima ey'obuwangaazi. Mu lutuula, abakugu baagabana ebintu eby'omugaso okutumbula amakungula g'ebirime.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower the local agricultural community, the district leaders organized a workshop aimed at educating farmers about legal protections and resources available to them. lug_prompt: Olw'okussa mu nkola enteekateeka empya n'okwongera ku nkolagana ya ttiimu, baasobola okulongoosa enkola zaabwe. Enkyukakyuka eno yabaleetera okulongoosa mu nkola yaabwe okutwalira awamu.

eng_prompt: As the agricultural sector faces increasing challenges, the prevalence of counterfeit seeds has become a significant concern for farmers. In response, various organizations have mobilized to raise awareness and provide education on this pressing issue.

eng_prompt: Farmers rely heavily on high-quality seeds to ensure a successful harvest. Unfortunately, the market is increasingly flooded with counterfeit products that undermine agricultural yields.
lug_prompt: Abalimi beesigama nnyo ku nsigo ez'omutindo okusobola okukungula obulungi. Eky'ennaku, akatale keeyongedde okujjula ebintu ebijingirire ebityoboola amakungula g'ebyobulimi.

eng_prompt: In a desperate attempt to boost their profits, the company developed a new line of seeds marketed as revolutionary. However, the reality behind their flashy advertisements was far from the truth.

ach_prompt: I tute matek tutwal me medo magoba gi, dul ne oyubu kodi manyen ma kicato calo gin manyen tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, lok ada ma obedo I nge cato wilgi obedo mabor ki lok ada.

eng_prompt: Many farmers rely on high-quality seeds to ensure a successful harvest and improve their livelihoods. Unfortunately, the market is flooded with counterfeit seeds that promise better yields but ultimately fail to deliver.

teo_prompt: Apotu akoriok luipu ogiroto ikinyom lu ejokuka kanu awanyun ebe ekoriete ejok ka aitojokar aijar kec. Nukaiturur, eleleba esokoni keda ikinyom lumam eraasi luka abeit lu isumunenete isakan luajokak konye mam itodolikinete.

eng_prompt: During the community meeting, the pastor emphasized the importance of engaging the youth in meaningful activities. Inspired by his words, the pastor's wife decided to launch a new initiative to foster creativity and teamwork among the young members.

lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku byobulamu by'abavubuka, ekitongole kitongozza enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okusomesa amaka g'omu kitundu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kuwa abawala abato amagezi n'ebikozesebwa okusobola okusalawo obulungi ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.

eng_prompt: Many young people engage in risky behaviors without fully understanding the consequences. As a result, they often lack the necessary education and resources to protect themselves.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bangi beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obulabe nga tebategedde bulungi bivaamu. N'ekivuddemu, tebatera kuba na buyigirize obwetaagisa n'ebikozesebwa okwekuuma.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health concerns and safety guidelines, it is crucial for young people to prioritize their well-being. Taking precautions can help prevent the spread of illness and protect vulnerable members of the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu n'ebiragiro by'obukuumi ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo abavubuka okukulembeza obulungi bwabwe. Okwegendereza kisobola okuyamba okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde n'okukuuma abantu abateesobola mu kitundu.

teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda aicoreta nuka ayuwara, ejokuna noi atumunak aisingarenit aijar kec. Aingada ikisila ingarakini aitikitik awea na adekasinei ka ayuarite itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi azini azita ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru 'ba ode eyini eyi ma aa'ta muke ri 'duzu okporu. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu ri eco azakoma fe azo eyi ma ereta atrizu dika eco 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra.

eng_prompt: Adolescent pregnancy remains a significant public health issue in many regions, particularly in Africa. Various factors contribute to this alarming trend, including limited access to education and healthcare.
lug_prompt: Embuto z'abavubuka zikyali kizibu kya maanyi mu by'obulamu mu bitundu bingi naddala mu Afirika. Ensonga ez'enjawulo zireetawo embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza, omuli n'obutafuna buyigirize na bujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Yacu ikin anyira pud tye peko madit tutwal I but lobo mapol tutwalle I lobo Afrika. Tye jami mapol ma okelo peko man, ma I kingi obedo peko me nongo pwony ki kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Alingakin apotu na atumunak eringa erai ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu, kacut koAfrica. Ipu iboro lu eyangaunitos ationis na, aimoriarit amamus na adumunun asioman keda amukian.
lgg_prompt: Mva esuza mva eli capiku 'diyi ma alea ri eri nga po'di e'yo ewaru e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria angu kala karakara eyi ma alea, tutuni Africaa. E'yo ndundu eyi fe e'yo 'di ni aa'zu asi otiza ru, eyi ma eselea geri 'bani ecozu onita esuzu azini aro esuzu ri ma omgbo esizu.

teo_prompt: Atumunak luipu mam ekapakina kanu atiokisio nu auriak kacut nuikamunitos angaleukec keda aijarakec. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kesi adumunun atiokisio nuipu kapak naka apotu ka aidoun.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode karakara eyi awini eyi otu e'yo ewaru eyini aa'zu tipika eyi ru 'diyi ma dria ku, tutuni ka eca eyi ma rua ala azini aa'ta muke ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi eco e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini aa'ria okporovu ru azini eyini mva osiria ra.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by the next generation, she dedicated her time to mentoring and sharing her experiences. Her passion for education inspired her to create a safe space for learning and growth.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming initiatives aimed at fostering business growth, it is crucial for organizations to take proactive steps. Failure to comply with the registration requirements could result in missing out on valuable resources and support.

ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yub mapat-pat matye kabino macalo adwogi me dongo biacara, pire tek tutwal ni dul mapat-pat omyero gutim gin mo. Kwero lubu jami ma mite me coone twero weko pe inongo kony ki kony ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nu ebeit aswam kanu aitopolor apol naka ebiasara, ejokuna noi kanu iriongeta aswam nu ekotosi kesi aswam. Aipiko aitup nu ekotoi kanu aiwadikaun epedori ayangaun atwaniar iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu tujari eyi ma zota ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria, eri orodriru amuti eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu okporu. ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌbani lele ru sizu ꞌdiyi ma vuti obizu kuri eco fe ꞌba ma avi afa orodriru ꞌdiyi azini atita yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enteekateeka ezirikugyenda omu maisho ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obushubuzi, niky'omugasho ebitongore okukora ekirikwetengyesa. Okuremwa kukuratira ebirikwetengwa omu kwehandikisa, nikibaasa kurugwamu okufeerwa obuhwezi n'obuhwezi bw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local entrepreneurs, the chamber of commerce is hosting a series of workshops. These sessions aim to provide essential resources and guidance for aspiring business owners.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu, ekitongole ky'ebyobusuubuzi kitegese emisomo egy'enjawulo. Entuula zino zigendereddwamu okuwa ebintu ebikulu n'obulagirizi eri abo abaagala okuba bannannyini bizinensi.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo lutim biacara me tedero, dul makilwongo Chamber of Commerce tye ka yubu kacoke me pwonye mapol. Yub eni tye me miyo kony ki tam ki joo ma mito bedo ki biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigangit agwelanarak luka atutubet, euta atukot naka agwelanar aitolot airiamunun nuipu. Alosikinet naka airiamuneta nu erai aijaikin iboro ka aicoreta nejaas lu ekotosi agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu atita fezu 'ba tujari 'ye'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri, amuti e'yo tujari ni 'diyi ondrepi chamber of Commerce ni otita imbatani karakara eyi 'ye. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi afa orodriru azini imbata fezu 'ba lepi tujari 'ye'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abashubuzi b'omubyaro, ekitongore ky'eby'obushubuzi kiriyo nikikora emishomo mingi. Enteerane ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza eby'okukoresa n'obuhabuzi abarikwenda kugira bizinesi.

eng_prompt: In order to build trust within the community, it is essential for leaders to communicate openly about their decision-making processes. This includes providing clear information regarding how land compensation is determined and distributed.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuzimba obwesige mu kitundu, kyetaagisa abakulembeze okwogera mu lwatu ku nkola zaabwe ez'okusalawo. Kino kizingiramu okuwa obubaka obutegeerekeka obulungi ku ngeri okuliyirira ettaka gye kusalawo n'okugabanyizibwamu.
ach_prompt: Me dongo gen ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal ni lutela gulok I adaa I kom yoo me moko tam gi. Man kwako miyo ngec matye atir I kom kit ma ki ngolo ki poko kwede cul me ngom.
teo_prompt: Kanu adukun amunokina kotunga, ejokuka engarenok einer nuikamunitos ainapeta kec nuka aitolomun aseununeta. Imoriaritos ngun aijaikin akiro nuecaete nuikamunitos epone loitemokinet keda aikor ikapun luka alupok.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu asi'baza sizu ongulumu eyi ma eselea, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini e'yo nzezu o'bi eyidri geri eyini peta pezu 'diyi ma dria. Di ma alia o'dukoti feza kililiru geri 'bani 'ba ofezu nyaku ma dria azini awazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kwombeka obwesigye omu bantu, niky'omugasho abebembezi kugamba butunu aha nkora yaabo y'okusharamu. Eki nikitwariramu okuheereza amakuru marungi agarikukwata aha ku abantu barikushashurirwa eitaka n'oku barikugabira abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat unemployment and foster community development, local organizations are launching new initiatives. These programs aim to provide job opportunities and skills training for residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa ebbula ly'emirimu n'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ekitundu, ebitongole by'ebitundu bitongoza enteekateeka empya. Pulogulaamu zino zigenderera okuwa abatuuze emirimu n'okutendekebwa mu bukugu.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom can tic ki ilo malo rwom me dongo lobo, dul mapat-pat me tedero tye ka kati ki yub manyen mapat-pat. Yub magi tye ki miti me miyo gum me tic ki pwonyo lutedero ki diro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik amamus na aswamisinei ka aitopolor apol, eutasi iriongeta luka atutubet aitegear iponesio luitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai ainakin itunga aswamisinei ka aitutuonoro.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azi ako be azini ongulumu eyi ma ezota otuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita o'diru eyi. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi drileba azi fezu azini imbata ondua ma dria 'diyi fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa eibura ry'emirimo n'okutunguura ebyanga, ebitongore by'omubyaro biriyo nibitandikaho emirimo misya. Puroguraamu ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abatuuragye emirimo n'emyoga.

eng_prompt: Effective management practices are essential for fostering a positive workplace environment. To achieve this, organizations must prioritize the development of comprehensive guidelines and procedures.
lug_prompt: Enkola z'obukulembeze ennungi za mugaso mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ku mirimu. Okutuukiriza kino, ebitongole birina okukulembeza okufulumya ebiragiro n'enkola enzijuvu.
ach_prompt: Tic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo ber bedo I gang tic. Me cobo man, dul mapat-pat omyero guket cwiny gi i kom yubu cik ki yoo me tic.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu eyaitene lo ejok eraas lu epolok noi kanu aitopoloria aiboisio nu iswamaere. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekot iriongeta aisingarenit aitolomun ainapeta keda ainapeta.
lgg_prompt: Geri azi ocezu kililiru 'diyi orodriru angu azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ezozu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le amuti eyi ma 'ba okpo e'yo driceza fezu azini geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okwebembera emirimo n'ey'omugasho omukureetaho embeera nungi aha mirimo. Okuhikiiriza eki,ebitongore bishemereire kwebembeza okukora engyenderwaho n'emitendera.

eng_prompt: The hiring process has been finalized, and we are now ready to move forward with recruitment. We encourage all qualified candidates to apply for the available positions.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okuwandiika abantu emaliriziddwa, era kati tuli beetegefu okugenda mu maaso n'okuwandiika abantu. Tukubiriza abo bonna abalina ebisaanyizo okusaba ebifo ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Yub me coyo dano dong otum, dong watye atera me mede anyim ki coyo dano. Wacuku cwiny dano weng ma gukwano me penyo pi dog tic matye.
teo_prompt: Aponi kongetakinai ainapeta nuka aipagisa itunga, ido kwana ikapakina sio ainyikokin aitolom itunga. Isinyikokini sio itunga kere luejaasi keda apapulai ailelebikin aiboisio nu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Ba de e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi sizu ri 'bo, dika ama ngonde muzu drile e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi sizu ri be. Ama eka 'ba dria agapi ra 'diyi waraga eyi sizu pari azi ngazu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'okupangisa abantu eherize kukorwa, kandi hati tweteekateekire kugyenda omu maisho n'okutandika emirimo. Nituhiga abantu boona abamazire emishomo okushaba emyanya eriho.

eng_prompt: Recently, several businesses have been exploring opportunities in emerging markets across Uganda. Among them, a company has expressed a particular interest in establishing operations in Masaka.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko, bizinensi ez'enjawulo zibadde zinoonyereza ku mikisa mu butale obujja mu Uganda. Mu byo, kkampuni emu eraga nti eyagala nnyo okutandikawo emirimu mu Masaka.
ach_prompt: Cokcok-ki, biacara mapol gubedo ka yenyo gum me donyo I cuk matye ka dongo I lobo Uganda. I kingi, dul mo onyuto miti matek tutwal me cako ticgi I Masaka.
teo_prompt: Apakio nu, eutasi ibiasaran luipu aingic arerengesio nuka agwelanar kotoma osokonin luegelegela ko Uganda kere. Kanejaas kesi, abu ekampuni kitodu eipud loka ageun aswam ko Masaka.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'diyi ma alea, tujari karakara eyi e'bi drileba eyi onda cu efupi o'diru 'diyi ma alea kari Uganda niri ma alea ndulu. Yi ma eselea, amuti azi ece ava e'dozu azi ngazu Masaka'a.
nyn_prompt: Obwahati, bizinesi nyingi zitandikire kuronda emigisha omu butare oburiyo nibutunguka okwetoroora Uganda. Omuri byo, hariho ekitongore ekyorekire ngu nikyenda kutandika kukorera omuri Masaka.

eng_prompt: In order to foster better communication and understanding with the communities they operate in, companies must prioritize transparency. This includes ensuring that all stakeholders can access information in a language they comprehend.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula empuliziganya ennungi n'okutegeeragana n'ebitundu mwe bakolera, kampuni zirina okukulembeza obwerufu. Kino kizingiramu okukakasa nti abakwatibwako bonna basobola okufuna amawulire mu nnimi ze bategeera.
ach_prompt: Me kelo kubbe ki niang maber ikin lwak, dul mapat-pat omyero guket lok ada obed gin ma pire tek. Man kwako neno ni joo weng matye ki twero me nongo ngec i leb ma gi niang.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor einer loajokan ka apuponoro keda itunga lu iswamaete kesi, ekot ikampunin aisingarenit nuka aica. Imoriaritos nu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun akiro kotoma angajep naepedori kesi amisikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu yini azi ngazu yi ma alia 'diyi pie, le amuti yi ma 'ba e'yo ada okporu. Di ma azi lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria e'yo 'yepi 'diyi eco o'duko esu ti yini va 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho empurizagana nungi n'okwetegyerezana n'abantu abu barikukoreramu, kampuni zishemereire kwebembeza amazima. Eki nikitwariramu okureeba ngu boona abu kirikukwataho babaasa kutunga amakuru omu ndimi ezibarikwetegyereza.

eng_prompt: When discussing sensitive topics, it's important for leaders to consider the impact of their words. Effective communication can foster understanding and unity among community members.
lug_prompt: Bwe baba bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ezitali nnungi, kikulu abakulembeze okulowooza ku biyinza okuva mu bigambo byabwe. Empuliziganya ennungi esobola okutumbula okutegeera n'obumu mu bantu b'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Kace gitye ka lok i kom lok mapigi tego, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me tamo I kom adwoki pa lokgi. Lok maber twero kelo winye ki ribe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitemitem akiro nuepolok, ibusakinit engarenok aomoom nuepedorete akiro kec aitodolikin. Einer loajokan epedori aitopolor acamanara keda aimorikikina kanejaas itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini e'yo eyini nze 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eco 'ba ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea vata azini ti ecita eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubarikuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani, n'eky'omugasho abebembezi kuteekateeka aha bikwatiraine n'ebigambo byabo. Okugamba kurungi nikubaasa kureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa omu bantu b'omubyanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote community engagement and education, the organizers have decided to incorporate various initiatives into the upcoming event. One of the key components will be a program focused on raising awareness among attendees.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okukwatagana kw'abantu n'okusomesebwa, abategesi basazeewo okuteekamu enteekateeka ez'enjawulo mu mukolo ogujja. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu kijja kuba pulogulaamu etunuulidde okumanyisa abantu abajja.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor tic ki pwony pa lwak, luyub ne gumoko tamgi me keto yub mapat-pat I yub matye kabino ni. Acel me kin jami ma pigi tego bibedo yub me rweyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopoloritor aisisianakino keda aisisianakino naka itunga, aseutu luitemonokinak aitolomun iponesio luegelegela toma opucit lo ebunit. Adiopet kotoma atutubena nuapolok eraun ainapeta nu isisianakinete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma eselea azini onita ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba otupi 'diyi 'du e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu omu emupi 'diyi ma alea indi. Afa okporu 'diyi ma azi alu ni nga ovu otita azi 'bani asi 'bazu mile oziza ma dria 'ba emupi 'diyi ma eselea ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho obwegyese n'okushomesa abantu, abatebekanisa basharamu kuta ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe omu mukoro ogurikwija. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru nibiija kuba puroguraamu y'okumanyisa abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support girls' education and promote menstrual health, the organization launched a community initiative. As part of this initiative, they focused on providing essential supplies to young students in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira okusoma kw'abawala n'okutumbula obulamu bw'abakyala mu nsonga z'ekikyala, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka y'ekitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, essira baalitadde ku kuwa abayizi abato abali mu bwetaavu ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwan pa lutino anyira ki medo rwom me yot kom gi ikare me two dwee, dul enoni ocako yub me konyo lwak. Macalo but yub man, guketo cwiny gi i kom miyo jami ma mite pi lutino kwan matino ma lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang asioman naka apesur ka aitopoloria angaleu naka elap, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuka itunga. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apodokinit kesi aikor iboro luepolok noi mama ejaasi esisiak lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ezoanzi eyini atita fezu onita ma alea azini e'yo rua ala ni eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da e'do otuta ongulumu eyini 'diyi. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eyi 'ba asi afa orodriru 'diyi fezu sukulu anzi nyiri afa koko 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika eby'obwegyese bw'abaishiki n'okutunguura amagara g'abaishiki, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'ekyanga. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, bakata amaani omu kuheereza abeegi abakiri bato ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the struggles faced by their peers during menstruation, the student council organized a campaign to raise awareness about menstrual hygiene. They were determined to ensure that no girl would have to miss school due to a lack of sanitary products.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebizibu bannaabwe bye basanga mu nsonga z'ekikyala, akakiiko k'abayizi kaategeka kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ku buyonjo mu nsonga z'ekikyala. Baali bamalirivu okulaba nga tewali muwala asubwa kusoma olw'ebbula ly'ebintu ebikozesebwa mu buyonjo.
ach_prompt: Inge neno peko ma lutino luwote gi nongo ikare me two dwe, lutela pa lutino guyubu yub me rweyo lwak i kom lengo me two dwe. Gumoko tamgi me neno ni anyaka mo keken pe okeng kwan pi nok pa jami me gwoko lengo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun atiokisio nuetereikina keda ipaupakec kapakio nu elap, abu ekansulo lo esisiak kitemok aisisianakin nuka aila kapakio nu elap. Apotu kesi okapakina aanyun ebe emamei apese naepedori atwaniar esomero kanu amamus na iboro lu aila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eyi ma agyipika eyini esu sa'wa eyini eyi ma mbazurisi 'diyi ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi otu e'yo 'ba eyini imbata fezu alata eyi ma dria sa'wa eyini eyi ma mbazurisi. Eyi ndra asi'baza be nezu ra kini ezoanzi azi econi sukulu avi afa ayuzaru alata ma dria 'diyi ma ako si ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba oburemeezi oburikushangwa ab'emyaka yaabo baaba bari omu kwezi, akakiiko k'abeegi kakatebekanisa ehururu y'okumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'obwegyendesereza omu kwezi. Bakaba bamaririire kureeba ngu tihaine omwishiki orikufeerwa eishomero ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu by'okweyonja.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by families in the community, the organization launched a program aimed at enhancing educational opportunities. Their efforts focused on ensuring that every child had access to essential resources for learning.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa amaka kwe gasanga mu kitundu, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka egendereddwamu okutumbula emikisa gy'okusoma. Kaweefube waabwe yabadde ku kukakasa nti buli mwana afuna ebikozesebwa mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko ma gangi tye ka kato ki iye, dul ne ocako yub me medo rwom me kwan. Tute gi obedo me neno ni lutino weng gunongo jami ma mite pi kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas ikalia kotoma atutubet, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nu ekotosi aitojokar asioman. Apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe epedori ngin ikoku adumunun iboro lu itwasamao kanu aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru familia ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyisi, amuti 'da e'do otita azi eyini ani ecozu drileba onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo yini 'diyi 'ba asi ndrezu kini mva dria isu afa orodriru onita ni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi oburikushangwa amaka omu kyanga,ekitongore kikataho enteekateeka y'okutunguura emigisha y'eby'obwegyese. Amaani gaabo gakaba gari aha kureeba ngu buri mwana yaatunga eby'okukozesa omu kwega.

eng_prompt: In an effort to encourage good behavior and academic excellence, the principal announced a new initiative. As part of this program, he will pay school fees for the best well-behaved pupils.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukubiriza empisa ennungi n'okusoma obulungi, omukulu w'essomero yalangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, ajja kusasulira abayizi abasinga okweyisa obulungi ebisale by'essomero.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me cuku cwiny lutino me bedo ki kit mabeco ki timo maber i gang kwan, ladit gang kwan ocwalo lok angeya manyen. Macalo but yub man, en obi culu kwan pa lutino kwan ma kitgi beco loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit itunga ajaut keda iponesio luajokak keda asioman najokan, abu apolon esomero kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, ebuni ngesi aitac isirigin lu esomero kanuka idwe lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba eyi ma adriza otuzu azini onita ma omgbo otuzu, dricere azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eri nga sukulu fizi ofe sukulu anzi adriza be muke ndeni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho emicwe mirungi n'obwegyese burungi, mukuru w'eishomero akarangirira enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, naija kushashurira abeegi abarungi ebishare by'eishomero.

eng_prompt: In response to the challenges posed by the pandemic, the government implemented various support measures for essential workers. One of the key initiatives focused on improving the welfare of teachers, who faced significant hardships during this time.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi, gavumenti yassaawo enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okuyamba abakozi abakulu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyakolebwa kwe kutumbula embeera y'abasomesa, abaayolekagana n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: Me cobo peko ma two korona okelo, gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me konyo lutic mapigi tego. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lupwonye, ma gunongo peko madit tutwal I kare eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuelomunitos kanuka adeka naka ekorona, abu apugan itolomu iponesio luegelegela luka aigang eswamak. Adiopet koboro luapolok luiswamaunitai apodokinit aitojokar ejautene loka isisianakinak luetereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kapakio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni ejile 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba geri ndundu atita fezu azi'ba orodriru 'diyi dri. Otita azi okporu 'diyi ma azi ri asi 'ba e'yo imba'ba eyini aa'pi e'yo ewaru 'diyi be sa'wa 'di ma alea 'diyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obureesirweho endwara ruranda nsi,gavumenti ekakora emiringo mingi y'okuhwera abakozi b'omugasho. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebyateirweho n'okutunguura emituurire y'abegyesa, abaabaire baine oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bwire obu.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that supportive work environments significantly enhance job satisfaction among educators. As a result, fostering a sense of community and collaboration within schools is essential.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti embeera y'emirimu ey'obuwagizi eyongera ku bumativu bw'abasomesa mu mirimu. N'ekivuddemu, okutumbula enneewulira y'ekyalo n'okukolagana mu masomero kya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni kabedo me tic maber medo yomcwiny ikin lupwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, dongo rwom me ribbe ikin gangi kwan pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe aiboisio nu igangitos isisianakinak iswamaete ejok. Kanuka ngun, ejok aitopolor aimorikikina keda aiswamanara kiding isomeroi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini angu azi ngazu atita fepi 'diyi fe imba'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi azi si. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu sukulu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu embeera y'emirimo erikushagika, neeyongyera aha kumarwa kw'abegyesa aha mirimo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okureetaho okukwatanisa omu mashomero n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: The school is implementing a new initiative aimed at enhancing student engagement and academic performance. As a key leader in the institution, the headteacher will also benefit from this project.
lug_prompt: Essomero liri mu kuteeka mu nkola enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okutumbula okwenyigira kw'abayizi n'okukola obulungi mu byensoma. Ng'omukulembeze omukulu mu ssetendekero, omukulu w'essomero naye ajja kuganyulwa mu pulojekiti eno.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan ne tye katic ki yub manyen ma tye ki miti me medo miti pa lutino kwan ki rwom me kwan gi. Macalo latela ma pire tek I gang kwan eni, ladit gang kwan bene obi nongo ber pa yub man.
teo_prompt: Ejai esomero aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotore aitojokar eswamae loka esisiak. Kwape engarenon loepol noi kosomero, ebuni apolon esomero aimedaun kotoma opurojekt lo.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ni e'yo azi o'diru 'ye sukulu anzi eyi ma ava otuzu azini agata eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ekile drice'ba okporu sukulu 'da ma alea ri le, dricere eyi vini mu orodri esu otita 'di vu indi.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero ririyo nirita omunkora enteekateeka nsya erikugyenderera okwongyera aha kwejumba kw'abeegi n'okukora gye omu mishomo yaabo. Nk'omwebembezi mukuru omu eishomero, mukuru w'eishomero nawe naija kugasirwa omu purogyekiti egi.

eng_prompt: Many prominent figures in the community have ties to the local school. One such individual is the village chairperson, who has fond memories of their time there.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abamanyifu mu kitundu balina akakwate ku ssomero ly'omu kitundu. Omu ku bantu ng'abo ye ssentebe w'ekyalo, alina ebintu bingi ebirungi by'ajjukira mu kiseera kye yabeerayo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma oywek i kabedo gi tye ki wat ki gang kwan me tedero. Ngat acel ma kit meno obedo won kom me caro, ma wiye po I kom kare ma gubedo kunu.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luejenara noi kotoma atutubet ejaasi keda arucokina keda esomero loka atutubet. Idiopetunganan ngol ngesi apolon eicolong lo ocaalo, lo iitunit aiitunet naejok noi naka apakikec ngina.
lgg_prompt: Ba inzile inzi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi eci i sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Ba alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi ogua e'i caluniri, e'yo yini aa'zu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egapi saaru 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In recognition of the hard work and dedication of our educators, we have established a new incentive program. This initiative aims to motivate both teachers and students to strive for academic excellence.
lug_prompt: Mu kusiima omulimu n'obumalirivu bw'abasomesa baffe, tutaddewo enteekateeka empya ey'okusikiriza. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukubiriza abasomesa n'abayizi okulwanirira obulungi mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Macalo pwoc pi tic matek ki keto cwiny pa lupwonye wa, wakelo yub manyen me miyo kony bot lupwonye. Yub man tye ki miti me cuku cwiny lupwonye ki lutino kwan me tute matek me timo peny maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiyalamikin aswam na aswam ka ainakina naka esisianakinak wok, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet na erai aisinyikokit isisianakinak keda esisiak aswam agogongu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ama vile emba'ba 'diyiniri ma e'yo egazu, ama e'do otuta azi o'diruni. E'yo 'di le imba'ba eyi tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie okpo fe eyini ani azi ngazu muke ndeni sukulu'a.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okusiima okukora n'okwehayo kw'abeegyesa baitu, tutandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okushemeza abantu. Ekigyendererwa ky'enteekateeka egi n'okureetera abegyesa n'abeegi amaani g'okukora kurungi omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, her efforts finally caught the attention of the school administration. The committee recognized her commitment to improving student outcomes and decided to honor her achievements.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, abakulembeze b'essomero baasobola okumulaba. Akakiiko kaasiima obumalirivu bwe mu kutumbula ensoma y'abayizi ne basalawo okumuwa ekitiibwa olw'ebituukiddwaako.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic matek pi mwaki mapol, ludito me gang kwan guneno tute mege. Dul ne guneno miti ne me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan dok gumoko tamgi me miyo pwoc pi jami ma en otimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu lukapolok luka esomero kowanyutu aswamuke. Abu ekomiti koany ainakina ke kanu aitojokar eswamae lo esisiak kosodete aiyalama kanu aitodolikineta ke.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi anzuru ma vutia, okpo erini 'ba ri asizu driceza sukulu niri vu ra. Komiti 'da esu asi 'baza erini sukulu anzi eyi ma agata otuzu ri ra dika eyi ai e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi inzi.

eng_prompt: Achieving success in your studies requires dedication and effort. Remember, the foundation you build now will shape your future opportunities.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu kusoma kwo kyetaagisa okwewaayo n'okufuba. Jjukira nti omusingi gw'ozimba kati gujja kukyusa emikisa gyo egy'omu maaso.

teo_prompt: Aitodolikin akerianut kotoma asioman kon ekot ainakina keda agogongu. Kiituni ebe, atukot na idukuni ijo kwana nes ebuni aitolomun arerengesiokon nu oingaren.

eng_prompt: The foundation of a strong educational system lies in the quality of its educators. Investing in teacher training and support is essential for fostering student success.
lug_prompt: Omusingi gw'ebyenjigiriza ebinywevu guli mu mutindo gw'abasomesa baayo. Okusiga ensimbi mu kutendeka abasomesa n'okubawagira kyetaagisa nnyo mu kutumbula obuwanguzi bw'abayizi.

eng_prompt: Many factors contribute to the challenges faced by young women in pursuing their education. Among these, one of the most significant is the rise in teenage pregnancy rates.
lug_prompt: Ensonga nnyingi eziviirako okusoomoozebwa abakyala abato kwe basanga mu kusoma kwabwe. Mu bino, ekimu ku bisinga obukulu kwe kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abawala abafuna embuto mu myaka egy'obutiini.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma weko lutino anyira nongo peko me kwan. I kin jami magi, acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye mede pa wel lutino anyira ma oyac.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro lueyangaununete atiokisio nuetereikina keda angor nudidika kotoma asioman kec. Kotoma ngun, idiopet koboro luepolok noi ngesi apol naka apotu na apesur nudidika.

eng_prompt: As social distancing measures were implemented, traditional gatherings and activities were restricted, leading to a shift in social dynamics. With schools closed and extracurricular events canceled, many found themselves in smaller, more intimate settings.
lug_prompt: Nga enkola z'okwewa amabanga ziteekebwa mu nkola, enkungaana z'ennono n'emirimu byawerebwa, ekyaleterawo enkyukakyuka mu nkola y'embeera z'abantu. Nga amasomero gaggaddwa n'emikolo egy'ebweru ne gisaziddwamu, bangi beesanga mu bifo ebitonotono, eby'omukwano.

Ki loro gangi kwan ki ngolo yub mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat
teo_prompt: Kwape aponi kitolomunai ikisila luka alaikina, aponi kimikai atukonokin keda aswamisinei nuka einono, ido abu koyangau aijulanakineta kotoma ojautene loka itunga. Keda agolokinio na isomeroi ka aikisario naka ainapeta, apotu itunga luipu odumutu aiboisio nu ikidioko.

Sukulu eyi ma ti opizu azini e'yo sukulu eyini 'diyi atrizu risi, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi pari werea, aa'pi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obu enkora y'okwerinda eyatandikire, enteerane n'emirimo y'obuhangwa ekazibirwa, ekyarugiremu empindahinduka omu mitwarize y'abantu. Ahabw'okugira ngu amashomero gakakingwa hamwe n'emikoro y'aheeru y'eishomero ekashazibwamu, baingi bakeeshangira omu myanya mikye kandi ey'ekihama.

eng_prompt: Research has shown that when parents actively engage in their children's education, it fosters a positive learning environment. This collaboration between home and school can lead to significant improvements in student outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti abazadde bwe beenyigira mu kusoma kw'abaana baabwe, kitumbula embeera ennungi ey'okuyiga. Enkolagana eno wakati w'amaka n'essomero esobola okuviirako okulongoosa mu nsoma y'abayizi.

teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe arai iswamaete auriak kagogong kotoma asioman naka idwekec, itojokari aisisia ejok. Aimorikikina na kiding ore keda esomero epedori ayangaun aitojokar eswamae lo idwe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini tipika eyi ka fi e'yo anzi eyivile 'diyini onita ma alea okporu, eri angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otu. Ti ecita 'di aku eyi ma eselea sukulu eyi pie ri eco fe sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu abazaire ku barikwejumba omu kwegyesa abaana baabo, nikureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Enkoragana egi ahagati y'eishomero n'amaka neebaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu bigyezo by'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In a heartwarming gesture of gratitude, the alumni gathered to discuss ways to give back to their alma mater. They decided that providing resources for current students would be the most meaningful contribution.
lug_prompt: Mu kulaga okusiima okubuguumiriza, abayizi abaasomerako mu yunivasite baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuddizaamu essomero lyabwe. Baasazeewo nti okuwa abayizi abaliwo ebyetaago kye kintu ekisinga okuba eky'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo lanyut me pwoc ma yomo cwiny tutwal, lutino kwan macon gugure me nywako tam i kom kit me miyo kony bot gang kwan gi. Gumoko tamgi ni miyo kony bot lutino kwan matye kombedi obedo gin maber loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aanyunet naka aiyalama, apotu esisiak luakolo kotukokinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorete kesi ainyakakin mama ejaasi atukotokec. Apotu kesi ocamutu ebe aijaikin iboro lu isisianakinete esisiak lukwana erai aswam naejok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo awa'difo fezaniri ma alia, 'ba sukulu depi 'bo 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu afa fezu sukulu eyivile 'diyi dri ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu sukulu anzi curu'do 'diyi dri ri nga adri feta orodriru ndeni ri i.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by our community, we reached out for support. Thankfully, a generous donor has stepped forward to help us during this critical period.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa ekitundu kyaffe kwe kisanga gyebuvuddeko, twafuna obuyambi. Ekirungi, omugabi w'obuyambi ow'omutima omugabi ayimiriddewo okutuyamba mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak wa tye kanongo cokcok-ki, wacwalo kony botgi. Ki gum maber, lami kony ma cwinye yot okatti anyim me konyowa I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga wok, apotu sio adolokisi agangat. Arereng najokan, apotu lukojokotau kopotu aingarakin sio kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu amavileri ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, ama esu atita ra. Awa'difo be, 'ba afa fe'baa asi driasi ni efu ama aza kozu sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu baitu batungire, tukashaba obuhwezi. Eky'omugisha murungi, omuhweezi w'obuhwezi arugireyo kutuyamba omu bwire obu obw'akabi.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance the learning experience, it is essential to equip students with the necessary resources. By ensuring access to these materials, we can significantly improve educational outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwongera ku bumanyirivu bw'okusoma, kya mugaso okuwa abayizi ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa. Bwe tukakasa nti ebintu bino bifunibwa, tusobola okulongoosa ennyo ebikolebwa mu by'enjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me kwan, pire tek tutwal me miyo jami ma mite ki lutino kwan. I yoo me nongo jami magi, watwero ilo malo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae lo aisisia, ejokuna noi aijaikin esisiak iboro lu ekotoi. Kowai lo aitodolikin adumunun iboro lu, ipedori oni aitojokar eswamae lo asioman.
lgg_prompt: Onita ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini afa lele 'diyi fezu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma esuta si, ama eco agata onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'okwega, n'eky'omugasho okuheereza abeegi eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa. Twakora kyona ekirikubaasika okutunga ebintu ebi, nitubaasa kutunguura eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: We are incredibly grateful for your support and guidance throughout this journey. Your encouragement has made all the difference in our lives.
lug_prompt: Twebaza nnyo obuwagizi bwo n'obulagirizi mu lugendo luno lwonna. Okuzzibwamu amaanyi kwo kuleetedde enjawulo mu bulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Watye ki pwoc madit tutwal pi kony ki tira ni I kare weng me wot man. Cuku cwiny ni okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Isiyalamikit sio noi kanu agangat ka aingarenikinio kon kotoma alosit na. Abu aisinyikokinit kon ijaik aijulanakineta kotoma aijar wok.

nyn_prompt: Nitusiima munonga obuhwezi n'obwegyendesereza bwawe omu rugyendo oru rwona. Okuhuumuriza kwawe kukozire empindahinduka omu magara gaitu.

eng_prompt: Despite the school's efforts to improve student outcomes, the latest test scores revealed a significant decline. This decline raised concerns among administrators about the factors affecting classroom instruction.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde essomero lyafuba okutumbula ensoma y'abayizi, obubonero bw'ebigezo obwasembyeyo bulaga okukendeera okw'amaanyi. Okukendeera kuno kwaleetawo okweraliikirira mu bakulembeze ku nsonga ezikosa okusomesa mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gang kwan ne otute matek me yubu rwom me timo peny pa lutino, adwoki me peny manyen onyuto ni lutino tye ka dok piny tutwal. Rweny pa rwom eni okelo lworo ikin ludito gang kwan i kom ngo matye ka balo pwony me ot kwan.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat esomero kagogongu kanu aitojokar eswamae lo idwe, apotu ainwakio naka esomero kitodutu aibiror naka eswamae. Abu aibiror ngin koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas engarenok kanuikamunitos iboro luetiroritos aisisianakino naka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ni tro okpo 'ba sukulu anzi eyi ma agata otuzu ra ti, agata o'diru obeta eyi ma alea 'diyi e'da e'yo eyi ma omgbo esizu ra. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza drice'ba eyi ma eselea e'yo onzi 'yepi onita kilasia ri be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'eishomero okutunguura ebyarugire omu bigyezo by'abeegi, ebyarugire omu bigyezo nibyoreka okukyendeera kw'amaani. Okukyerererwa oku kukareetaho okwerarikirira omu bakuru aha nshonga ezirikuteganisa eby'okwegyesa omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: As agricultural practices evolve, farmers are constantly seeking new ways to diversify their income streams. One promising avenue that has gained attention in recent years is the art of beekeeping.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkola z'obulimi n'obulunzi zikulaakulana, abalimi buli kaseera banoonya engeri empya ez'okwongera ku nnyingiza yaabwe. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ennyo mu myaka egiyise kwe kulunda enjuki.
ach_prompt: Ka yub me pur tye ka dongo, lupur tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo cente gi. Yoo acel matye ki gen madit tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni obedo gwoko kic.
teo_prompt: Kwape itolomunono iponesio luka akor, eutasi akoriok aimo iponesio luitetiak luka aiyatakin edumune kec loka ikapun. Epone ediopebon loepedori aswam noi kotoma okaru lu atuboros ngesi aipit awo.
lgg_prompt: Geri agirikica ni 'diyi ni zoria, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi nda eyini ani geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi ecopi drileba fepi tu eli agapi 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo anyu tambazu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Emikorere y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ku erikweyongyera, abahingi n'abariisa nibaronda emiringo misya y'okwongyera aha ntatsya yaabo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikutangaaza ogureesireho amaani omu myaka egi, n'okuriisa enjoki.

eng_prompt: Despite their enthusiasm for starting a beekeeping business, they quickly realized they were lacking in essential skills. Many of the new beekeepers in the community are eager to learn but are struggling to find proper resources.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baali baagala nnyo okutandikawo bizineesi y'okulunda enjuki, baakiraba mangu nti baali tebalina bukugu bumala. Abalunzi b'enjuki abapya bangi mu kitundu baagala nnyo okuyiga naye bazibuwalirwa okufuna ebikozesebwa ebituufu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cwinygi obedo yom me cako biacara me gwoko kic, gunongo ni gipeke ki diro ma mite. Pol pa lugwok kic manyen I kabedo eni tye ki miti me pwonyo ento gitye ka canne me nongo jami ma mite me tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekotosi kesi aitegear ebiasara loka aipit awo, apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe emamiatatar kesi keda aitutuoro. Itunga luipu luitetiak lu ekoriete awo ekotosi noi aisisia konye etiono adumun iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma ava tujara anyu ta mbazaniri e'dozu ra ti, eyi esu mbeleru eyi vu ondua orodriru 'diyi yo. Ba anyu ta mbapi o'diru ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi le saaru e'yo onizu te eyi dri ci afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu baakubaire baine ekihika ky'okutandikaho bizinesi y'okuriisa enjoki, bakareeba ngu tibaine myoga y'omugasho. Abariisa b'enjoki abasya omu kyanga baine ekihika ky'okwega kwonka nibarwana kuronda eby'okukoresa ebihikire.

eng_prompt: After reading several articles about the importance of pollinators, he became fascinated with the idea of keeping bees. Inspired by a local beekeeper's success, he decided to explore the world of apiculture further.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusoma ebitundu ebiwerako ebikwata ku bukulu bw'ebisolo ebikuŋŋaanya envumbo, yakwatibwako nnyo olw'ekirowoozo ky'okulunda enjuki. Ng'akubirizibwa obuwanguzi bw'omulunzi w'enjuki mu kitundu, yasalawo okwongera okunoonyereza ku nsi y'okulunda enjuki.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwano pwony mapol I kom ber pa jami ma balo kic, en obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom gwoko kic. En omoko tamme me mede ki kwedo lok me gwoko kic pien en onongo adwogi maber ki bot lagwok kic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aisiom akiro nuipu nuikamunitos ajokis naka aituk awo, abu ngesi komina aipit awo. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi kanu akerianut naka epitak awo, abu ngesi koseu aingic akoru na awo.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo karakara eyi lazu orodri 'ba anyu ofupi 'diyiniri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri eca ava be e'yo anyu tambazu ri ma dria. Erini ava esuzu drile suza 'ba anyu ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea ri si, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo anyu ta mbaza ma dria dika.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushoma ebihandiiko bingi ebirikukwata aha mugasho gw'okufuuhirira enjoki, akatandika kukunda enteekateeka y'okuriisa enjoki. Ahabw'okushagikwa obusinguzi bw'omutungi w'enjoki omu kicweka ekyo, akasharamu kwongyera kushwijuma ensi y'oburiisa bw'enjoki.

eng_prompt: Participants were encouraged to explore sustainable practices and their impact on the environment. Through hands-on activities, they learned the importance of ecological balance.
lug_prompt: Abeetabamu baakubiriziddwa okunoonyereza ku nkola eziwangaala n'engeri gye zikosaamu obutonde bw'ensi. Okuyita mu bikolwa eby'emikono, baayiga obukulu bw'okutebenkeza obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Kicuku cwiny joo ma obedo tye me yenyo yoo me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki adwogi ne I kom cwec ma orumuwa. I kare ma gutimo ticgi, gupwonyo ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Aponi isinyikokinai itunga airereonor iponesio luajokak keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol isuban luka akwap. Kotoma aswamisio nuka akanin, apotu kesi kisisiautu ajokis naka aidar isuban keda itiang.
lgg_prompt: Ba ai 'ba emu'ba 'diyi e'yo angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma eti ondazu tualu geri eyini ecozu angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi pie. Geri 'yeta drisi 'diyisi, eyi oni orodri angu ama agei 'diyi ma tambazu tro tro ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeejumbiremu bakahigwa okushwijuma emiringo y'okutereeza eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Barikurabira omu mirimo y'emikono, bakeega omugasho gw'okureeberera kurungi eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After struggling with traditional beekeeping methods for years, my brother decided to explore new technologies. He was eager to find a solution that would improve his honey production and overall efficiency.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana n'enkola ez'edda ez'okulunda enjuki okumala emyaka, muganda wange yasalawo okunoonyereza ku tekinologiya omupya. Yali ayagala nnyo okufuna eky'okuddamu ekyandimusobozesezza okwongera ku bungi bw'omubisi gw'enjuki gw'akola.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny ki diro me gwoko kic macon pi mwaki mapol, omera omoko tamme me tic ki diro manyen. En onongo tye ki miti matek me nongo yoo me cobo peko ma twero medo rwom me moo kic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainingosit keda iwaitin luka aipit awo kanu ikar luipu, abu onaceka koseu aingic iwaitin luitetiak. Akoto ngesi noi adumun epone loepedoria ngesi aitojokar esike keda aswam ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'di 'dizu geri anyu tambazu oku 'diyi be eli karakara 'bori ma vutia, ma adrini asi 'du e'yo afa ndundu eyi edezu o'diru 'diyi ondazu. Eri ndra ava be geri azi ecozu anyu ma ofuta ma omgbo otuzu ri esuzu.

lug_prompt: Olw'okukimanya nti ekizibu kya kasasiro kyeyongedde mu kitundu kyabwe, ekibinja ky'emikwano baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Nga bakubirizibwa okwagala kwabwe eri obutonde bw'ensi, baanoonya engeri z'okukyusaamu.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko me balo yugi matye kamede I kabedo gi, lurem mogo gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Pi mar ma gitye kwede pi cwec ma orumuwa, guyenyo yoo me timo jami mabeco.

eng_prompt: In recent months, various community programs have been established to engage young people in meaningful ways. These initiatives have attracted a diverse group of participants, particularly those from refugee camps.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, pulogulaamu z'ekitundu ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okusikiriza abavubuka mu ngeri ez'amakulu. Enteekateeka zino zisikiriza abantu ab'enjawulo naddala abo abava mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, kicako yub mapat-pat me konyo bulu me timo jami mabeco. Yub eni okelo dano mapol tutwalle jo ma aa ki I kem pa luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, etolomun ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aisisianakin atumunak iponesio luajokak. Apotu iboro lu ingalaunitos itunga luegelegela, kacut ngul luejaasi okabin lu ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'do otita ongulumu eyini ndundu 'diyi 'ba ode eyi ejizu geri orodriru 'diyi ma alea. Otita 'diyi eji 'ba karakara eyi tuni enga'ba angu emunyale eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: Many people are turning to natural remedies for their health needs. One such remedy that has gained popularity is honey, particularly the kind produced by bees.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baddukira mu bujjanjabi obw'obutonde olw'ebyetaago byabwe eby'obulamu. Ekimu ku ddagala ng'eryo erimanyiddwa ennyo lye mubisi gw'enjuki naddala ogufulumizibwa enjuki.

eng_prompt: Many people are looking for sustainable hobbies that can also benefit the environment. One such activity that has gained popularity is beekeeping.

eng_prompt: Effective management of a farm requires careful attention to various details. One of the most important aspects of this management is maintaining accurate and organized records.
lug_prompt: Okuddukanya obulungi ffaamu kyetaagisa okufaayo ennyo ku bintu eby'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nzirukanya y'emirimu kwe kukuuma ebiwandiiko ebituufu era ebitegeke obulungi.

eng_prompt: By fostering open dialogue and encouraging collaboration, we can bridge the gap between the two groups. This initiative aims to address their differences and promote a sense of unity.
lug_prompt: Nga tukuza okuteesa okw'olwatu n'okukubiriza enkolagana, tusobola okuziba ekituli wakati w'ebibinja ebibiri. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okugonjoola enjawukana zaabwe n'okutumbula obumu.
ach_prompt: Ka wacuku cwiny lwak me lok kacel ki cuku cwiny dano me ribe, watwero juko apoka-poka matye ikin dul aryo egoni. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko apoka-poka meggi ki kelo ribe ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aisinyikokit aineranara ka aisinyikokit aiswamanara, ipedori oni aitikitik atiakatiaka kiding igurupun iarei. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin atiakatiaka kec ka aitopolor aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza ngmboru azini ti icita ma ava engazu ri si, ama eco esele coza ongulumu iri 'diyi ma eselea ri atri ra. E'yo 'di lezu e'yo esele coza yini 'diyi ma aza kozu azini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: Many refugees face significant challenges in rebuilding their lives after displacement. One viable option for them is engaging in agricultural activities.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe oluvannyuma lw'okusengulwa. Engeri emu gye bayinza okukikolamu kwe kwenyigira mu byobulimi.

lgg_prompt: Emunyale karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini eyi ma edri sizu dika eyini eyi ofuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia. Geri azi alu eyini eco 'ye ra ri 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Empungi nyingi nizitunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwombeka amagara gaabo bwanyima y'okubingwa. Ekintu kimwe ekibarikubaasa kukora n'okwejumba omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, equipping young people with essential tools is more important than ever. By focusing on personal development and practical knowledge, we can empower them to navigate life's challenges effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, okuwa abavubuka ebikozesebwa ebikulu kya mugaso okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Bwe tussa essira ku nkulaakulana y'omuntu n'amagezi ag'omugaso, tusobola okubawa amaanyi okutambuza obulungi okusoomoozebwa kw'obulamu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma aloka-loka tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, miyo jami tic mapigi tego bot bulu pire tek tutwal. Ka waketo cwiny I kom dongo pa dano ki ngec ma gitiyo kwede, watwero minigi kero me kato ki I peko ma kwo kelo maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, epolok noi aijaikin atumunak iboro lu itwasamao. Kowai lo aisingarenit apol naka itunga keda acoa na itwasamao, ipedori oni aitigogong kes aitodolikin atiokisio nu aijar ejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, 'ba ode eyini afa ayuzaru orodriru 'diyi fezu ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. Asi 'bazu zota ma dria azini ondua azi ngazuri ma dria, ama eco yi dri okpo fe e'yo ewaru idri ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, okuheereza eminyeeto eby'okukoresa n'eky'omugasho munonga. Twata amaani aha ntunguuka y'omuntu weena hamwe n'obwengye bw'omugasho, nitubaasa kubaha amaani g'okumaraho oburemeezi bw'amagara gaabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and promote environmental awareness, local organizations have launched a campaign focused on sustainability. As part of this initiative, they are sensitizing the youth to plant more trees.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okutumbula okumanyisibwa kw'obutonde bw'ensi, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bitandise kaweefube w'okutumbula embeera y'obudde. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, basomesa abavubuka okusimba emiti emirala.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki medo rwom me rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa, dul mapat-pat me tedero gucako yub me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo but yub man, gitye ka pwonyo bulu me pito yadi mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aisisianakin itunga nuka ejautene lo akwap, etolomutu iriongeta luka atutubet ikampein lo isingarenit nuka aidar ejautene lo akwap. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, isisianakinete kesi atumunak aira ikito luipu.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be azini mile oziza angu ama agei ri ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita azi e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, yi imbata fe 'ba ode yi dri pati sazu drile.

eng_prompt: In response to the overwhelming support from the community, local officials have decided to expand their environmental initiatives. The success of the initial tree planting efforts has inspired a broader outreach program.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva mu bantu, abakungu b'ebyalo basazeewo okugaziya enteekateeka zaabwe ez'obutonde bw'ensi. Obuwanguzi mu kaweefube w'okusimba emiti asoose buviiriddeko enteekateeka y'okubunyisa amawulire.
ach_prompt: Pi kony madit tutwal ma aa ki bot lwak, lutic me tedero gumoko tam gi me medo yub gi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Adwogi maber pa yub me pito yadi ma okwongo okelo yub madit me cwalo ngec bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu agangat naepol noi kama ejaasi itunga, aseutu eswamak aiyatakin ainapeta kec nuka ekwam. Akerianut naka aira ikito ageun aitolomun ainapeta nuipu.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obuhwezi bwingi kuruga omu bantu, abakuru b'ebyaro bashaziremu kushanjuura enteekateeka zaabo ez'obuhangwa bw'ensi. Obusinguzi bw'omurimo gw'okubyara emiti ogw'okubanza, gureesireho enteekateeka y'okubuurira abantu baingi.
