teo_prompt: Ko United States, epate iarei luapolok kesi epolok noi kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu ekotosi araun lukapolok akwap etapit aiswamanar keda iriongeta lu.
lgg_prompt: Kari United States niri ma alea, amuti politiki ni okporu 'diyi ma okpo amuti politiki ni okporu 'diyi ma eselea iri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba pa tupi purezidenti ru 'diyi yi eci yi amuti 'dile 'diyi ma azi be.
nyn_prompt: Omuri United States, eby'obutegyeki nibisingurwa ebibiina bibiri ebikuru. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abarikwenda kwesimba aha ntebe y'omwebembezi w'eihanga, nibakira kukwatanisa n'emwe aha bitongore ebi.

eng_prompt: As political parties seek to determine their candidates for upcoming elections, they must consider the most effective methods for selecting representatives. One approach that has gained prominence is the use of party primary elections.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bigezaako okulonda abesimbyewo mu kulonda okujja, birina okulowooza ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okulondamu abakiise. Enkola emu ebadde emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kukozesa okulonda okw'okusunsulamu kw'ebibiina.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka yenyo lucungu gi pi yer matye kabino ni, omyero guniang yoo maber loyo me yero lucungu pigi. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal obedo tic ki yer pa dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi ipatei aseun abwoikinitokokec kanu aseo naebunit, ekot kes aomoom iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aseun abwoikinitok. Adiopet ewai lo ejenara noi ngesi aitwasam aseo naka ipatei.
lgg_prompt: Amuti politiki ni 'diyini lezu 'ba yini pa tuzu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi opezu, le yi ma ega geri onyiru ndeni 'ba pa tupi yi ma paria 'diyi opezu 'diyi ma dria. Geri azi alu 'bani esu ewu driorisi ri opeta amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ayuzuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Obu ebibiina by'obutegyeki birikugyezaho kuronda abesimbireho omu karuuru akarikwija, bishemereire kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okuronda abajwekyerwa. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga n'okukoresa akaruuru k'ebibiina by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and challenge, many seek guidance and strength from a higher power. It is essential to recognize the divine influence that shapes our leaders and their decisions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okusoomoozebwa, bangi banoonya obulagirizi n'amaanyi okuva eri amaanyi aga waggulu. Kya mugaso nnyo okutegeera obuyinza bwa katonda obubumba abakulembeze baffe n'okusalawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, dano mapol giyenyo kony ki teko ki bot lubanga. Pire tek tutwal me niang teko pa lubanga ma yubo lutela wa ki tam ma gimoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko ka atiokisio, emoete itunga luipu aicoreta keda agogongu kama ejai apedorosio nuapolok. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun agogong naka Edeke naetolomununei engarenok wok keda aseununeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, 'ba karakara eyi imbata azini okpo nda engazu okpo uru 'diyi vu. Eri orodriru e'yo Mungu ni drice'ba ama vile 'diyi ma dri cepi azini e'yo yini 'dule 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'oburemeezi, baingi nibaronda obuhabuzi n'amaani kuruga ahari Ruhanga. N'eky'omugasho kumanya obushoborozi bwa Ruhanga oburikubumba abebembezi baitu n'encwamu zaabo.

eng_prompt: In any society, the evolution of its political landscape often raises questions about the level of maturity achieved. Understanding the characteristics that define mature politics can provide valuable insights into the health of a democracy.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, enkulaakulana y'embeera y'ebyobufuzi etera okuleetawo ebibuuzo ku mutindo gw'okukula ogutuukiddwaako. Okutegeera engeri z'ebyobufuzi ebikula bisobola okuwa amagezi ag'omugaso ku bulamu bwa demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, aloka-loka me cungu iwi-bye ipol kare kelo lapeny I kom rwom me dongo pa dano. Niang jami ma nyutu ni lok me cungu iwi bye ma otii twero miyo ngec ma pire tek tutwal I kom kit ma loc alwak tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, aijulanakineta nuka epolitikisikec eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos adoketait naka apol. Amisiikin iponesio lu itodunitos nuka epolitikis lo apol epedori aijaikin oni acoa naepol noi kanuikamunitos angaleu naka aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni ojazu ri ni e'yo eyi eji e'yo 'ba eyini zozu ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo e'dapi kini e'yo politiki ni 'diyi zopi 'bo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma vata eco fe ondua orodriru e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona, entunguuka y'embeera y'eby'obutegyeki buriijo nereetaho ebibuuzo aha rurengo rw'okukura kw'abantu. Okwetegyereza ebintu ebirikworeka eby'obutegyeki ebikuru, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya ebirikukwata ahamagara ga demokurasiya.

eng_prompt: Every choice we make, big or small, reflects our values and beliefs. It's important to be mindful of how we present ourselves in our daily interactions.
lug_prompt: Buli kusalawo kwe tukola, ka kube kunene oba kutono, kwoleka empisa zaffe n'enzikiriza zaffe. Kikulu okufaayo ku ngeri gye tweyolekamu mu nkolagana yaffe eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Tam weng ma wamoko, madongo onyo matino, nyutu jami ma pigi tego ma watye kwede. Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom kit ma wawinye kwede ikare ma watye I kwowa me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kangol aseunet na iswamai oni, epol arai edit, itodunit iponesio ka aiyuunetekosi. Erai ibore yenepol noi apodokinit epone loitodunitotor oni iponesio wok luka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria amani pe 'diyi, amburu kani werea 'diyi, e'da ama ma egata azini a'ita yi. Eri orodriru aa'zu mile be geri amani ama ma ngulupi e'dazu ama ma eselea o'du driasi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri kusharamu oku turikukora, okukuru nainga kukye, nikyoreka emitwarize yaitu n'ebi turikwikiriza. N'eky'omugasho okwetegyereza oku turikweyoreka omu mirimo yaitu eya burizooba.

eng_prompt: The rising rates of unemployment have become a pressing issue, particularly affecting the younger generation. As we look for solutions, it's crucial to address the root causes and explore effective strategies.
lug_prompt: Okugenda mu maaso kw'ebbula ly'emirimu kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi naddala eri abavubuka. Nga bwe tunoonya eby'okugonjoola, kya mugaso nnyo okukola ku biviiriddeko n'okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Rwom me can tic matye kamede tye peko madit tutwalle bot jo matino. Ka watye ka yenyo yoo me cobo peko, pire tek tutwal me neno tyen lok ma okelo peko ki nongo yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Apol naka amamus na aswamisinei erai ationis naepol noi, kacut itunga ludidika. Kwape iuta sio aimo aitemokineta, ejokuna noi aitemokin atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun ka aingic iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako ni tupi tutu ri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru, tutuni 'ba oderu 'diyi bi. Amani e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu ri ndaria, eri orodriru e'yo e'yo ndundu eyi fepi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini geri azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'eibura ry'emirimo, kihindukire enshonga y'amaani, okukira munonga erikuteganisa eminyeeto. Twaba nitusherura oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga, n'eky'omugasho munonga okukora aha nshonga ezirikubireetaho n'okusherura oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, having the right qualifications is essential for success. Developing a diverse set of skills can open up numerous opportunities for individuals seeking to advance their careers.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, okubeera n'ebisaanyizo ebituufu kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okukulaakulanya obukugu obw'enjawulo kusobola okuggulawo emikisa mingi eri abantu abanoonya okutumbula emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek me nongo tic, bedo ki kwan ma oporre pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc. Dongo diro ma padi padi twero yabo gum mapol tutwal ki dano ma mito medo rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei lolo, ejokuna noi ajaut keda apapulai nuka aswam kanu akerianut. Aitopoloun acoasinei nuegelegela epedori apukor arerengesio nuipu nejaas itunga lu ekotosi aitopolor aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, ovuzu kokobi kililiru 'diyi be ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Ondua ndundu eyi ma ezota ni eco drileba karakara eyi ma ti zi 'ba eyi ma ngulupi eyi lepi eyi ma azi eyi otupi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana aha mirimo, okuba n'ebirikwetengwa n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Okutunguura emyoga etari emwe neebaasa kwiguraho emigisha mingi ahabantu abarikwenda kutunguura emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite significant economic growth in recent years, many communities in Uganda continue to struggle with basic needs. Addressing the root causes of inequality is essential for improving the living conditions of the most vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde eby'enfuna byakulaakulana mu myaka egiyise, ebitundu bingi mu Uganda bikyalwanagana n'ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo. Okukola ku nsibuko y'obutafaanagana kya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera y'obulamu bw'abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me lim omede tutwal I mwaka ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo mapol I lobo Uganda pud tye ka canne ki jami ma mite pi kwo. Cobo peko ma kelo apoka-poka ikin dano pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Karaida apolor noi ikapun kokaru lu atuboros, eringa itunga luipu luko Uganda eutasi ainingosit keda iboro lu itwasamao. Aitemokin iboro lu eyangaununete amamus airiamara ejok kanu aitojokar aijar naka itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota angiri e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, ongulumu karakara Ugandaa 'diyi nga kiri dri ciria afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi pie. E'yo e'yo esele coza ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru geri 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'amaani omu by'entaasya omu myaka egi, abantu baingi omu Uganda nibagumizamu kurwana n'ebyetaago by'omubiri. Okukora aha nshonga ezirikureeta obutaingana n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura emituurire y'abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Economic hardship can drive individuals to desperate measures. In times of financial crisis, some may resort to theft as a means of survival.
lug_prompt: Obuzibu bw'ebyenfuna busobola okuleetera abantu okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Mu biseera by'obuzibu bw'ensimbi, abamu baddukira mu bubbi ng'engeri y'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Peko me can lim twero weko ngat moni timo jami ma pe twere. Ikare me can lim, jo mukene gi cako kwo macalo yoo me kwo.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuka ikapun epedorete ayangaun itunga toma aswamisio nuepedorete kesi aswam. Kapak naka atiokisio nuka ikapun, epedorete icetunga aibiror kwape epone loka aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi eco fe 'ba yi dri e'yo onzi 'yezu ra. Sa'wa e'yo ewaru robia ma alia 'diyisi, 'ba azi 'diyi eco e'do ogu 'ye geri yini ecozu yi ma idri ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya nibubaasa kureetera abantu kukora ebitarikwetengyesa. Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'esente, abamwe nibatandika kwiba nk'omuringo gw'okwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a more engaged and active citizenry, it is essential for political organizations to prioritize the needs and voices of their constituents. By doing so, they can create a more inclusive and representative political landscape.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukulaakulanya bannansi abeenyigidde era abanyiikivu, kya mugaso eri ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okukulembeza ebyetaago n'amaloboozi g'abakiise baabwe. Mu kukola ekyo, basobola okutondawo embeera y'ebyobufuzi erimu abantu bonna era erimu abakiise.
ach_prompt: Me kelo anywali matye ki miti dok ma tiyo matek, pire tek tutwal ki dul me cungu iwi bye me keto miti ki dwon pa lubol kwir gi obed mukwongo. I timo meno, gitwero kelo yub me cungu iwi bye matye ki dano weng dok ma cung pigi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor itunga lu iswamaete ejok, ejokuka noi kanu iriongeta luka politikis aisingarenit ipudesia keda iporotoi luka itunga luka atutubenakec. Kowai kalo aswam ngun, epedorete kesi aitolomun ewai lo abwoikinit itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Lezu kari anzi eyi ma aa'ta kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru amuti politiki ni 'diyini e'yo eyini le azini o'duko 'ba eyini opi nyapi 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria ri 'bazu okporu. Eyi ka 'di 'ye, eyi eco e'yo politiki ni 'ba dria ma eselea azini 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho abantu abarikukora n'amaani omu by'obutegyeki, ni kikuru ebibiina by'obutegyeki kwebembeza ebyetengo n'amaraka g'abantu abu birikujwekyera. Omu kukora ekyo, nibabaasa kureetaho enkora y'eby'obutegyeki erimu abantu boona kandi erikujwekyera abantu boona.

eng_prompt: In order to achieve effective governance and maintain public trust, leaders must adhere to a set of principles and standards. Without a strong sense of discipline, political decisions can become erratic and self-serving.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okufuna obukulembeze obulungi n'okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu, abakulembeze balina okugoberera emisingi n'emitindo. Awatali mpisa ya maanyi, okusalawo kw'ebyobufuzi kuyinza okufuuka okw'obutabanguko n'okweyagaliza.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti me tela maber ki gwoko gen pa lwak, lutela omyero gulub cik ma igi lac. Labongo woro cik matek tutwal, moko tam me cungu iwi bye twero bedo tek tutwal dok konyo dano keken.
teo_prompt: Kanu adumun epugae loajokan ka aidar amuno naka itunga, ekot engarenok aitup ainapeta keda adoketait. Arai emamei aicoreta nuegogong, epedorete aseununeta nuka politikis araun nuepolok noi ido epedorete aimedaun bon.
lgg_prompt: Driceza muke ri esuzu azini asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ma ta mbazu, le drice'ba eyi ma obi e'yo azini wura eyi ma dria. Adriza kililiru kokoru, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi eco eca e'yo kokoru dika eyi ma ngulupi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutunga obwebembezi burungi n'okurinda obwesigye bw'abantu, abebembezi bashemereire kukuratira emisingye n'emitindo. Hatariho emicwe mirungi, ebiteiso by'eby'obutegyeki nibibaasa kuba ebitaine mugasho kandi ebirikweyendeza.

eng_prompt: Health officials are expressing concern over the recent surge in respiratory illnesses. As a result, hospitals are preparing for a potential influx of patients.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balaze obweraliikirivu olw'okweyongera kw'endwadde z'okussa gye buvuddeko. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro geetegekera okuyingira kw'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka nyutu lworo gi pi two ma mako yweyo ma omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi tye ka yubbe pi wel lutwo matye kabino.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos eswamak lu adekis aiyalongong kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nu eyengane. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adekisia aitemonokin kanuka adekak luipu.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza e'da e'yo azo oli seza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, arojo eyi eyi otuta 'ye 'ba azoru 'diyi ma emuta eyini.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'endwara z'okwisya ezabeire nizeyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro gariyo nigeteekateekyera abarwaire abarikwija.

eng_prompt: In recent years, many hospitals have faced increasing patient demand due to a rise in population and health issues. As a result, the infrastructure of these facilities has struggled to keep pace with the growing needs of the community.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise amalwaliro mangi gafunye obwetaavu bw'abalwadde obweyongera olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'ensonga z'ebyobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, ebizimbe bino biremereddwa okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera buli lukya.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, odi yadi mapol tye ki miti madit tutwal I kom lutwo pi wel dano matye kamede ki peko me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, gedo me odi magi tye ka tute matek me lubu miti pa lwak matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina adekisia nuipu keda eipuda lo adekak kanu enaaba lo itunga keda atiokisio nuka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit aduketa nu aiboisio nu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, arojo karakara eyi esu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi tualu e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, afa ayuzaru pari 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri ci aa'zu e'yo ongulumu eyini lele tu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, amarwariro maingi gatungire omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyombeko by'ebyombeko ebi bigumire kukuratira ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: When a patient requires specialized care that is not available at their current facility, it may be necessary for the hospital to consider transferring them. Additionally, factors such as capacity, resources, and the patient's medical condition can influence the decision to refer a patient to another hospital.
lug_prompt: Omulwadde bw'aba yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo obutasangibwa mu ddwaliro ly'alimu, kiyinza okwetaagisa eddwaliro okulowooza ku ky'okumukyusa. Okwongerako, ebintu nga obusobozi, eby'obugagga, n'embeera y'omulwadde bisobola okusinziirwako okusalawo okusindika omulwadde mu ddwaliro eddala.
ach_prompt: Ka latwo mito kony me diro ma pe nonge I ot yat ma en tye iye kombedi, twero bedo gin ma pire tek pi ot yat me tamo I kom kobo ne. Medo i kom meno, jami macalo kero, lim, ki kit ma latwo tye kwede twero weko kimoko tam me cwalo latwo I ot yat mukene.
teo_prompt: Arai ekoto adekan amukian na itegelikina na mam ejaas adekis, aticepak ibusakinit adekis aijulakin kes. Kilema, iboro kwape nat apedor, iboro, keda ejautene lo adekak epedorete aitodolikin aseunet naka aijukar adekak adekis acie.
lgg_prompt: Ba azoru 'diyi ka le azakoma wura ndusi 'bani esu arojo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ku ria, arojo eyi eco e'yo 'du eyi ojazu arojo azi ma alea ra. Azi dika, e'yo ekile 'ba azoru 'diyi ma okpo, lonyi, azini geri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi eco e'yo 'du 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ti pezu arojo nduni ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omurwaire ku arikwetenga okuragurirwa okw'omutaano okutarikubaasika omu eirwariro eri arikuragurwamu, eirwariro niribaasa kwetenga kumuhindura. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, enshonga nk'obushoboorozi, eby'obugaiga hamwe n'embeera y'omurwaire, nibibaasa kureetaho okusharamu kutwara omurwaire omwirwariro erindi.

eng_prompt: Advancements in telemedicine and remote monitoring have made it possible for healthcare providers to manage certain conditions outside of traditional clinical settings. As a result, many patients now have the option to receive care in the comfort of their own homes.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu by'obujjanjabi ku ssimu n'okulondoola okuva ewala kisobozesezza abasawo okukwasaganya embeera ezimu wabweru w'ebifo by'obujjanjabi eby'edda. N'ekivuddemu, abalwadde bangi kati balina enkola y'okufuna obujjanjabi mu mirembe gy'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme I tele-medicine ki bedo ki wang mabor okonyo lutic me yot kom me tic i kom peko mogo mapat ki odi yadi macon. Macalo adwogi ne, lutwo mapol kombedi gitye ki gum me nongo kony me yot kom ki I gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka amukian kosimu keda aanyanar kotelebision abu ijaik eswamak luka angaleu apedor aitikitik adekasinei ace kokinga naka adekisia nukolosek. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi kwana adekak luipu keda aseunet naka adumun amukian koreriakec.
lgg_prompt: Eꞌyo ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌyele ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi fe ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi dri ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma ta mbapi ꞌdiyi dri geri ꞌbani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazu ꞌdiyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azoru karakara 'diyi vu curu'do geri azakoma esuzu eyi ma aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguuka omu by'emibazi kuruga aha simu hamwe n'okukyebera kuruga hare, kireesireho oburyo bw'abashaho kukora aha ndwara ezimwe okwihaho obujanjabi obwa ira. N'ekyarugiremu, abarwaire baingi hati baine oburyo bw'okutunga obujanjabi omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's healthcare landscape, ensuring that patients receive timely and effective treatment is more important than ever. Healthcare providers are constantly exploring innovative methods to improve access to care.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulamu eya leero, okukakasa nti abalwadde bafuna obujjanjabi mu budde era obulungi kya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Abagaba obujjanjabi buli kaseera banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'obuyiiya okutumbula okufuna obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom me kare-ni, neno ni lutwo gunongo kony me yot kom i kare ki kome pire tek tutwal. Lutic yoto kom tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me nongo kony.
teo_prompt: Kotoma amukian naka lolo, ejokuna noi aanyun ebe edumunenete adekak amukian kotoma apak. Eutasi duc angaleu aimo iwaitin luitetiak lu itojokarere adumunun amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata ni ewu andruri ma alea, le 'ba ma ne ra kini 'ba azoru 'diyi aro esu sa'wa dria azini kililiru ri eri orodriru aga oku driorisi. Ba arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi geri o'diru 'diyi onda eyini ani aro eyi esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu marwariro g'erizooba, okureeba ngu abarwaire batunga obujanjabi omu bwire, n'eky'omugasho munonga. Abashaho bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura omutindo gw'obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing pandemic, it is crucial for all employees to adhere to health guidelines. Implementing strict protocols will help ensure a safe working environment for everyone.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo abakozi bonna okugoberera ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu. Okussa mu nkola amateeka amakakali kijja kuyamba okukakasa embeera y'emirimu ennungi eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal pi lutic weng me lubu cik me yot kom. Keto cik matek itic bikonyo me neno ni tic tye maber pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Katupitos adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, epolok noi eswamak kere atupakinit aicoreta nuka angaleu. Aitodolikin ainapeta nuegogong ingarakini awanyun ebe eyuwara aiboisit naka aswam kanuka nginitunganan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru azi'ba dria yini azita alata ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Azita okporu 'diyi ma vuti obiza ni nga fe angu azi ngazu kililiru 'ba dria driri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho hati, abakozi boona bashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'eby'amagara. Okuta ebiragiro by'okukuratira omu nkora nikiija kuhwera omu kureeba ngu buri omwe yaakora gye.

eng_prompt: In the high-pressure environment of healthcare, attention to detail is crucial for preventing the spread of infections. Unfortunately, some workers neglect basic safety protocols, putting themselves and their patients at risk.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'obunkenke bw'ebyobulamu, okufaayo ku buli kantu kikulu nnyo mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde. Eky'omukisa omubi, abakozi abamu basuulirira enkola z'obukuumi ezisookerwako, ne bateeka obulamu bwabwe n'obw'abalwadde baabwe mu katyabaga.
ach_prompt: I kare me lyeto madit tutwal I tenge me yot kom, keto cwiny I kom jami weng pire tek tutwal me gengo nya pa two. Ki gum marac, lutic mukene pe gi lubu cik me gwoko ber bedo, ma weko gin ki lutwo gi bedo kama rac.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka amukian, epolok noi apodokinit akiro nukajokak kanu aitikitik awea naka adekasinei. Nukaiturur, epalunitos eswamak ice ainapeta nuka ayuwara, ibwaikitete kesi keda adekak kec ationis.
lgg_prompt: Angu e'yo rua alanisi okporu 'diyi ma alea, asi 'baza e'yo dria ma dria ri eri orodriru azo eyi ma ereta atrizu. Drile onziru, azi'ba azi 'diyi azita e'yo agei tema ni 'diyi adi eyi ma ngulupi azini 'ba eyini azoru 'diyi pie e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bwingi omu by'amagara, okufayo aha bintu byona n'eky'omugasho omu kuzibira okujanjaara kw'oburwaire. Eky'obusaasi, abakozi abamwe nibarekyerera ebiragiro by'okwerinda, ekirikubareetera oburemeezi n'abarwaire baabo.

eng_prompt: As the healthcare system faces unprecedented challenges, the rise in infectious diseases has become a pressing concern. We must urgently address the factors contributing to this alarming trend.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebyobulamu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo, okweyongera kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa kwe kweraliikiriza okw'amangu. Tulina okukola mu bwangu ku nsonga eziviirako embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yub me yot kom tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal, medde pa two ma kobo oyot-oyot tutwal. Omyero walweny oyot-oyot pi tyen lok ma okelo tim man ma kelo lworo.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejaas erionget loka angaleu keda atiokisio nuegelegela, apol naka adekasinei nu ikopas erai ibore yenepol noi. Ibusakinit oni aitemokin atipet akiro nu eyangaunitos ationis na.
lgg_prompt: Ekile geri alata ni 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru 'diyi be drile, e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri eca asi otiza okporu ni ru. Le ama ma ko e'yo e'yo fepi e'yo onzi 'di 'yepi 'diyi ma aza mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku eby'amagara birikurabamu oburemeezi, okweyongyera kw'endwara ezirikuturira nikwe kwerarikirira munonga. Twine kukora ahonaaho aha nshonga ezirikureetaho enkora egi.

eng_prompt: As healthcare facilities face overwhelming demand, innovative solutions are needed to accommodate more patients. One potential approach is to utilize temporary structures for additional treatment space.
lug_prompt: Ng'amalwaliro gafuna obwetaavu bungi, eby'obuyiiya byetaagibwa okusobola okusuza abalwadde bangi. Engeri emu eyinza okukozesebwa kwe kukozesa ebizimbe eby'ekiseera okufuna ebifo ebirala eby'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma odi yadi tye ka nongo miti madit tutwal, yoo manyen tye kamitte me konyo lutwo mapol. Yoo acel matwero tic kwede en aye me tic ki odi ma giyubu pi tutunu me medo kabedo me ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina amukian keda eipuda loepol noi, ekotoi aitolomunun iwaitin luitetiak kanu aidar adekak luipu. Epone ediope loibusakinit aitwasam ngesi aitwasam adukena nuka apak naedit kanu aiboisio nuipu nuka amukian.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojo eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tu risi, le 'ba ma esu geri ndundu eyi 'bazu arojo eyi ma alea 'ba azoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu. Geri azi ecopi ra 'diyi ma azi eri jo ewule were si 'diyi ayuzu angu aro esuzu 'diyi ma tambazu dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu amarwariro gaine ekyetengo ky'amaani, hariho ekyetengo ky'okutunga oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera abarwaire baingi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukorwa n'okukoresa ebyombeko by'obwire bukye, okubaasa kwongyera aha myanya y'okuraguriramu.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the hard work and dedication of your team is essential for maintaining morale. It's important to take a moment to express gratitude for their contributions.
lug_prompt: Okusiima omulimu n'obumalirivu bwa ttiimu yo kya mugaso mu kukuuma empisa. Kikulu okutwala akaseera okulaga okusiima olw'obuyambi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki pwoc pi tic matek ki keto cwiny pa lutic megi pire tek tutwal pi gwoko cwiny dano. Pire tek tutwal me kwanyo kare me nyuto pwoc pi jami ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Ajenun aswam naepol ka ainakina naka etimukon erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar eswamae loajokan. Erai ibore yenepol noi ayangar apak kanu aisiyalamikin kes kanu agangat kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza amuti mivileri niri ma e'yo egazu ri eri orodriru adriza onyiru 'diyi ma tambazu. Eri orodriru sawa 'duzu awa'difo e'dazu afa eyini fe 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza okukora n'okwehayo kwa tiimu yaawe n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda emicwe. N'eky'omugasho okutwara akaire okworeka okusiima ahabw'obuhwezi bwabo.

eng_prompt: It's important to consider all possible factors when evaluating patient outcomes during a pandemic. While coronavirus has been a significant concern, other underlying health issues may also play a critical role in mortality rates.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okulowooza ku nsonga zonna ezisoboka nga twekenneenya ebinaava mu balwadde mu kaseera k'ekirwadde bbunansi. Newankubadde akawuka ka kolona kabadde kanyiiza nnyo, ensonga z'ebyobulamu endala ziyinza okuba nga nazo zikola kinene mu bungi bw'abantu abafa.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom jami weng ma twero timme kace itye ka neno kit ma lutwo tye ka kato kwede I kare me poto pa gemo. Kadi bed ni two korona obedo peko madit tutwal, peko me yot kom mukene bene twero kelo too pa dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom akiro kere nuepedorete aingic epone loebeitor adekan aswam kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona. Karaida epodokinit ekorona noi, aticepak ejaasi akiro ace nuka angaleu nuepedorete ayangaun atwakisia nuka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo dria ecopi ra 'diyi 'duzu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria sawa azo 'dezanirisi. Ka tro azo coronavirusniri ovu asi otiza angiri be ra ti, e'yo azi 'diyi eco vini azi okporu 'ye ongmbo 'ba odrazu ri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okureeba enshonga zoona ezirikubaasa kubaho waaba nooshwijuma entunguuka y'omurwaire omu bwire bw'ekigwereerezi. N'obu akakooko ka korona kabaire karikwerarikiriza munonga, enshonga z'ebyamagara ezindi nizibaasa kuba nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kufa kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant increase in claims for damages and losses from various sectors. As a result, the government spends quite a lot of money on compensations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu kusaba kw'okuliyirira ebyonoonese n'okufiirwa okuva mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti esaasaanya ssente nnyingi nnyo mu kuliyirira.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel dano ma gipenyo pi cul pi jami ma oballe ki jami ma gurwenyo I tenge mapat-pat omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tiyo ki cente madit tutwal me culu dano.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi ailip naka ikapun lu amunaros keda ikapun lu atwaniar kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, itosomai apugan ikapun luipu noi kanu atacakinio.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma ofe afa ezale 'diyi ma dria azini afa avile 'diyi ma dria engazu esele ndu ndu yi vu ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni robia ayu omgbo angirisi 'ba eyi ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'okushaba kw'okurihirirwa n'okufeerwa kuruga omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti neshohoza esente nyingi munonga omu kurihirira abantu.

eng_prompt: Conflict and instability in a region can disrupt supply chains and hinder economic growth. As a result, companies often struggle to maintain productivity and profitability during times of war.
lug_prompt: Obukuubagano n'obutali butebenkevu mu kitundu bisobola okutaataaganya enkola y'okutunda n'okukendeeza ku nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. N'ekivuddemu, amakampuni gatera okulwana okukuuma ebivaamu n'amagoba mu biseera by'entalo.
ach_prompt: Lweny ki kuku kuku I but lobo moni twero balo yub me cato jamigi ki weko dongo lobo bedo tek. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat ipol kare gi nongo peko me tic ki nongo magoba ikare me lweny.
teo_prompt: Ingungeta keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma aiboisit epedorete aitolitol akorio naka iboro kosodete aitikitik apol naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etiono ikampunin aidar eswamae kec keda ameda kapakio nuka ejie.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi eco e'yo 'bani afa eyi awazu 'diyi eza ra dika eyi eco zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri atri ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci afa eyini 'ye 'diyi ma ta mbazu tualu orodri eyini esu 'diyi pie sa'wa a'di nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Entongane n'obutabanguko omu kyanga nibibaasa kutabangura eby'obushubuzi n'entunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nizirwana kurinda emirimo yaazo n'amagoba gaazo omu bwire bw'entaro.

eng_prompt: In Uganda's legal framework, various key positions play crucial roles in ensuring the rule of law and governance. Among these, the attorney general holds a significant responsibility in providing legal guidance to the government.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya Uganda ey'amateeka, ebifo eby'enjawulo ebikulu bikola emirimu emikulu mu kukakasa enfuga y'amateeka n'obukulembeze. Mu bino, ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti alina obuvunaanyizibwa obw'amaanyi mu kuwa gavumenti obulagirizi mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: I cik me lobo Uganda, kabedo mapigi tego mapat-pat timo tic mapire tek tutwal me neno ni cik ki tela tye maber. I kin magi, lapilida madit tye ki tic madit tutwal me miyo tira bot gamente malube ki cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila luko Uganda, ejaasi aiboisio nuipu nuepolok nuepedorete aingarakin itunga aitup ikisila keda apugan. Kotoma ngul, ejaasi epulida lokapolon keda aswam naepol noi naka aijaikin apugan aicoreta nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Azita kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, pari okporu ndundu eyi azi okporu nga e'yo azita ni azini driceza ni 'diyi ma tambazu. Diyi ma eselea, 'ba attorney general ru 'diyi ma azi okporu gamete dri driceza fezu e'yo azita palaa 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu biragiro bya Uganda, emyanya mingi neekora omurimo gw'amaani, okureeba ngu hariho obutegyeki burungi n'oburingaaniza. Omuri ebi, ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti aine obujunanizibwa bw'amaani omu kuhabura gavumenti omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: When seeking approval for a project, it's important to follow proper protocols. One effective way to ensure clarity and formality is to document your request.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba oyagala pulojekiti ekkirizibwe, kikulu okugoberera emitendera emituufu. Engeri emu ey'okukakasa obwerufu n'obutebenkevu kwe kuwandiika okusaba kwo.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka yenyo twero pi yub moni, pire tek me lubu cik. Yo acel maber me neno ni jami weng tye kakare en aye me coyo kwac mamegi.
teo_prompt: Arai ikoto ijo aitigogongio kanu epurojekt, ibusakinit jo atupakin ainapeta nuajokak. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aanyun ebe ecai ka ecai erai aiwadik akirokon.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka otita azi ma drile ngaria, eri orodriru azita kililiru 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Geri azi orodriru mini ecozu nezu ra kini e'yo mini a'izu 'diyi e'da kililiru azini kililiru ri eri mini e'yo mini a'izu 'diyi osizu va ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooyenda kwikirizibwa kukora purogyekiti, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira engyenderwaho nungi. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureeba ngu okushaba kwawe kukahikiirira n'okuhandiika ebi orikushaba.

eng_prompt: In legal terminology, understanding the roles of the parties involved in a lawsuit is crucial. One key participant in this process is the individual who initiates the legal action.
lug_prompt: Mu njogera y'amateeka, okutegeera emirimu gy'abantu abakwatibwako mu musango kikulu nnyo. Omu ku bakwatibwako abakulu mu nkola eno ye muntu yennyini atandikawo okutwala omusango mu mbuga z'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I lok makwako cik, niang tic pa joo matye I adot obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Ngat acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man en aye ngat ma ocako tic I kot.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo ikisila, amisiikin aswam naka itunga lu emusago erai ibore yenepol noi. Ediopetunganan loepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi itunganan yenebeit ageun aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni 'diyi ma alia, azi 'ba e'yo liza ma alia 'diyi ni 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru. Ba azi okporu fipi e'yo 'di ma alia ni 'ba e'yo azita palaa ri e'dopi ni'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bigambo by'ebiragiro, okwetegyereza emirimo y'abantu abarikwejumba omushango n'eky'omugasho munonga. Omuntu mukuru orikwejumba omu nkora egi, niwe muntu weena orikutandikaho omurimo gw'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is not just about making decisions; it's about fostering an environment where team members feel valued and supported. By prioritizing the needs of their subordinates, leaders can inspire loyalty and enhance overall productivity.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi tebukoma ku kukola kusalawo; bukola ku kukuza embeera nga bammemba ba ttiimu bawulira nga ba muwendo era nga bawagirwa. Abakulembeze bwe bakulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu baabwe, basobola okusikiriza obwesigwa n'okutumbula emirimu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pe obedo me moko tam keken; obedo me kelo kabedo kama lumemba me dul tic giwinyo ni pigi tek dok kicwako gi. Ka lutela guketo miti pa luticgi obed gin ma pire tek, ci gi weko dano bedo ki gen dok bene gi ilo malo rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan mam erai kanu aitolomun aseununeta bon; erai kanu aitolomun ejautene lo ejenete itunga luka etimu ebe ejokuka ido igangitai. Kowai lo aisingarenit ipudesia luka itungakec, epedorete engarenok aisinyikokin itunga amunokina kosodete aitojokar aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri ovuni lu e'yo 'duza ma dria ku; eri e'yo angu 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi ni egazu orodriru azini atita be. Drice'ba eyini e'yo 'ba eyini dricezu 'diyi ma dria ri 'bazu okporu risi, eyi eco asi'baza eji eyi ma eselea dika eyi ma azi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi, tiburikukwata aha kusharamu kwonka, kureka n'okureetaho embeera erikworeka ngu ba memba b'akakiiko nibaheebwa ekitiinisa n'obuhwezi. Abeebembezi ku barikutwara ebyetaago by'abantu baabo nka bikuru, nibabaasa kureetaho obwesigwa n'okwongyera aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become a pervasive issue within the political system, undermining public trust and accountability. As investigations reveal alarming patterns, it becomes clear that financial misconduct is rampant among officials.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi bufuuse ensonga ejjudde mu nkola y'ebyobufuzi, ekityoboola obwesige bw'abantu n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okunoonyereza bwe kulaga enkola eyeeraliikiriza, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obutali bwenkanya mu by'ensimbi buyitiridde mu bakungu.
ach_prompt: Camucana dong odoko peko madit tutwal I tenge me cungu iwi bye, ma balo gen ki kor tic pa lwak. Kit ma kwed tye ka nyutu kwede kit ma jami tye ka time kwede, nen atyer kamaleng ni tim me camucana tye ka nyaa ikin lutic.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka apiyai erai ationis naepol noi kotoma politikis, ido itolitoli amunokina naka itunga keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kwape itodunitos aingic iboro luitukurianete, ecai cut ebe ejai abilibilio na ikapun noi kanejaas eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo niri eca curu'do e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea tre, e'yo 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria ku azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo eti ondaza ni e'dazu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo robia ayuza onzi 'diyi ma omgbo azi'ba eyi ma eselea tutu.
nyn_prompt: Obushomankuzi buhindukire enshonga erikujanjaara omu by'obutegyeki, erikushiisha obwesigye n'embaririra y'abantu. Nk'oku okucondooza kurikworeka enkora erikwerarikiriza, nikyoreka butunu ngu okushomankuza omu by'empiiha kweyongyeire omu bakungu.

eng_prompt: Navigating the complexities of public administration can be quite challenging. Many citizens often feel frustrated by the slow pace of decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Okutambulira mu buzibu bw'enzirukanya y'emirimu esobola okuba okusoomooza. Bannansi bangi batera okuwulira nga baweddemu amaanyi olw'okukendeera kw'enkola z'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Lweny i kom peko me tela pa lwak twero bedo tek tutwal. Anywali mapol cwinygi cwer pi kit ma tic me moko tam woto kwede mot.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin ationis na eyaitene lo apugan erai na etiono noi. Itunga luipu epupete aiyalongong kanu aiyap naka aitolomunun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru driceza o'bi eyini ri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eco adri ewaru. Kari anzi karakara eyi sa'wa driasi eyi ma asi eza e'yo 'bani e'yo 'duzu e'yere 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyendesereza oburemeezi bw'obwebembezi bw'eihanga nikibaasa kugumira kimwe. Abatuuragye abaingi nibamara amaani ahabw'okukyerererwa kw'okukora okusharamu.

eng_prompt: In a world where trust is often taken for granted, many people find themselves disillusioned by the empty words of others. As time goes on, it becomes clear that some promises are never fulfilled.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obwesige gye butwalibwa ng'ekintu ekikulu, abantu bangi baggwamu amaanyi olw'ebigambo by'abalala ebitaliimu nsa. Ekiseera bwe kigenda kiyitawo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebisuubizo ebimu tebituukirizibwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano pe giparo pi bedo ki gen, dano mapol nongo cwinygi otur pi lok ma pe atir pa jo mukene. Ka kare woto anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni cikke mukene pe ki cobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na mam eyangaritai amuno kwape ibore yenitegelikina, itunga luipu itakadikinete kanuka akiro nuemamei itunga. Kwape elosi apak, ecai cut ebe mam isumunenete ice itodolikino.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani asi 'bazu 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria ku ri ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi ma asi eza e'yo 'ba azi 'diyiniri si. Sa'wa ni muzu drile, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo 'bani owizu 'diyi ma azi eyi 'yeni i ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ei abantu barikukira kutwara obwesigye nk'ekintu kikye, abantu baingi nibashemererwa ahabw'ebigambo by'abandi ebitaine mugasho. Obwire ku burikugyenda omu maisho, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu ebiraganiso ebimwe tibirikuhikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: In the midst of a brutal conflict, the insurgents showed no mercy to their enemies. Their tactics were calculated and unforgiving, leaving a trail of devastation in their wake.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu lutalo olw'obukambwe, abayeekera tebaasaasira balabe baabwe. Obukodyo bwabwe bwali bubalirirwa era nga tebasonyiwa, ne balekawo omutindo gw'okusaanyaawo ebintu mu bigere byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny marac tutwal, adwii ne pe gubedo ki kica i kom lumone gi. Diro gi obedo tic ma kiyubu maber tutwal ma oweko bal mapol tutwal I nge gi.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka ejie loaronon, mam abenyak apotu itodutu amumu mama ejaasi lukasurup kec. Arai acoasineikec naepol noi ido mam itironikinete, ido abu kojalak epone loka amunar kotoma aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: A'di onzi 'di ma talasi, gburundua eyi awini asi ndriza e'da ari'bo eyivile 'diyi vu ku. Otita yini 'diyi ndra otizaru azini truta kokoru, e'yo onzi yi ku yi ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'orutaro rw'amaani, abahekyera tibaragirire embabazi abazigu baabo. Engyegyesa zaabo zikaba ziteekateekirwe kurungi kandi zitarikusaasira, ekyarekireho okucwekyereza omu maisho gaabo.

eng_prompt: Effective delegation is crucial for maximizing team productivity and ensuring that tasks are completed efficiently. By understanding the strengths and weaknesses of their team members, leaders can make informed decisions about task assignments.
lug_prompt: Okugaba emirimu mu ngeri ennungi kwa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkola ya ttiimu n'okulaba ng'emirimu gikolebwa bulungi. Mu kutegeera amaanyi n'obunafu bwa bannakibiina kyabwe, abakulembeze basobola okusalawo obulungi ku mirimu.
ach_prompt: Miyo tic ki lutic maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi medo rwom me tic pa lutic ki neno ni tic otum maber. Ka lutela oniang kero ki goro pa lumemba me dul tic gi, gitwero moko tam maber i kom tic ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Ainanakin itunga aswam ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin eswamae loka etimu ka awanyun ebe itodolikinio aswamisinei ejok. Kowai lo amisiikin agogong keda agogong naka itunga luka etimu kec, epedorete engarenok aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos aswam.
lgg_prompt: Azi feza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo amuti eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini nezu ra kini 'ba azi eyi de kililiru. Drice'ba eyini okpo azini okpo ako amuti eyivile 'diyini 'diyi vazu risi, eyi eco e'yo 'du kililiru azi eyini 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Obujunaanizibwa burungi n'obw'omugasho omu kukora emirimo n'okureeba ngu emirimo ekorwa kurungi. Ahabw'okwetegyereza amaani n'obunafu bwa ba memba ba tiimu yaabo, abebembezi nibabaasa kucwamu kurungi aha mirimo ei bashemereire kukora.

eng_prompt: As the number of displaced individuals continues to rise globally, tensions between refugees and local populations have become increasingly evident. Understanding the underlying factors that contribute to these conflicts is essential for fostering harmony and integration.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu abasengulwa gweyongera okulinnya mu nsi yonna, okusika omuguwa wakati w'abanoonyiboobubudamu n'abantu b'omu kitundu kweyongedde. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako obukuubagano buno kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obumu n'obumu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel luring ayela tye ka medde I wilobo lung, telle ikin luring ayela ki lutedero tye ka medde. Niang tyen lok ma oweko lweny obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo winye ki ribbe.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaba lo ikerai kotoma akwap kere, apol noi ingungeta kiding ikerai keda itunga luka atutubet. Ajenun iboro lu eyangaununete ingungeta lu epolok noi kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda aimorikikina.

eng_prompt: Every choice you face can shape your future in unexpected ways. Take a moment to reflect on the potential consequences before acting.

teo_prompt: Kangin aseunet na itereikina keda ijo epedori aitolomun ingaren kon koipone kalo mam iwomit jo. Koinak apak aomoom nuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete alomun eringa iswama.
lgg_prompt: Opeta dria mini esu 'diyi eco mi vile ewu drialeri oja geri mini egarisi ku 'diyi ma alia ra. Le mi ma 'du sa'wa azi egazu e'yo ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria rakaka de nga po'di mi 'yeni e'yo ku.

eng_prompt: Fostering a sense of harmony and understanding is essential for a thriving neighborhood. By embracing kindness and respect, we can create a welcoming environment for all.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enkolagana n'okutegeeragana kyetaagisa nnyo mu kitundu okukulaakulana. Bwe tukwatiriza ekisa n'ekitiibwa, tusobola okutondawo embeera ey'okwaniriza abantu bonna.

teo_prompt: Aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aiboisit naejok. Kowai lo aijaun asianut keda ayongit, ipedori oni aitolomun ejautene lo ijaunet itunga kere.

eng_prompt: In times of division and uncertainty, effective leadership becomes crucial. By fostering a sense of community and shared purpose, leaders can inspire collaboration and understanding among diverse groups.

teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiakatiaka keda amamus acamanar, erai engarenone loajokan ibore yenepol noi. Kowai lo aitopolor aimorikikina keda alosikinet, epedorete engarenok aisinyikokin aiswamanara keda apuponoro kiding igurupun luegelegela.

eng_prompt: In the criminal justice system, various types of sentences can be imposed based on the severity of the crime. Among these, the most severe is the death penalty, which carries significant moral and legal implications.

ach_prompt: I yub me ngolo kop i kom lutim bal, kitwero ngolo pwod mapat-pat malubbe ki kit ma bal tye kwede. I kin magi, ma rac loyo weng obedo pwod me too, ma kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom kwo pa dano ki cik.

lgg_prompt: E'yo liza e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ma alea, 'ba panga ndundu eyi fe e'yo onzi 'da ma omgbo vusi. Diyi ma eselea, e'yo okporu ndeni ri panga drazuri, e'yo onzi azini azita palaa 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: It is essential to promote inclusivity and understanding in our society. Discrimination against individuals based on their appearance or genetic conditions must be addressed and eliminated.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana mu kitundu kyaffe. Okusosola abantu okusinziira ku ndabika yaabwe oba embeera zaabwe ez'obuzaale kulina okukolebwako era kuggyibwewo.

Le 'ba ma ko e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu geri eyini e'dazuri ma dria azini geri eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okureetaho obumwe n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu baitu. Okushoroora abantu kurugirira aha mireebekyere yaabo n'embeera yaabo y'obuhangwa, kushemereire kukorwaho kandi kuhwaho.

eng_prompt: In any criminal case, it is crucial to ensure that all leads are followed up diligently. This includes gathering evidence and identifying individuals who may have been involved.

teo_prompt: Kowai kalo emusago, ejokuna noi awanyun ebe atupakinitai akiro kere. Imoriarit ngin aituk ajenanut ka ajenun itunga lu aticepak ajaas toma.

eng_prompt: Understanding the structure of the Ugandan government is essential for grasping how economic policies are formulated. One key component of this structure is the ministry responsible for managing the country's financial resources.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enkola ya gavumenti ya Uganda kya mugaso okutegeera engeri enkola z'ebyenfuna gye zikolebwamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno ye minisitule evunaanyizibwa ku kuddukanya eby'ensimbi by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma gamente me Uganda tye kwede pire tek tutwal pi niang kit ma kiyubu kwede cik me lim. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo jang gamente ma doro tic ki lim me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin epone loka apugan nako Uganda ejok kanu amisiikin epone loiswamaere ikisila luka ikapun. Idiopebore yenepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi erionget lo ikamunitos nuka ikapun luka akwap.

eng_prompt: In society, the sanctity of life is upheld through various laws and regulations. Among these, the act of taking another person's life is considered one of the most serious violations.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu, obutukuvu bw'obulamu bukuumibwa okuyita mu mateeka n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo. Mu bino, ekikolwa ky'okutta omuntu omulala kitwalibwa ng'ekimu ku bikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, woro kwo ki gwoko ki cik ma padi padi. I kin bal magi, tim me kwanyo kwo pa ngat mukene kitero macalo bal madit loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet, eyuwaritai aijar kotoma okisila luegelegela. Kotoma ngul, eyangaritai aiyar aijar naka itunganan kwape adiopet kotoma abilibilio naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo idri ni aa'zu alatararu ri ma ta mba azita ndundu eyi vusi. Diyi ma eselea, e'yo 'bani 'ba azi ma idri 'duzu ri 'ba 'du e'yo onzi okporu ndeni 'diyi ma azi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu, oburungi bw'amagara nibuhamibwa kurabira omu mateeka n'ebiragiro bitari bimwe na bimwe. Omuri ebi, okutwara amagara g'omuntu ondiijo nikitwarwa nk'ekikorwa kikuru munonga.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societies have grappled with the issue of violence and the need for order. To maintain peace and protect individuals, governments have enacted regulations that prohibit acts of murder.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebitundu bibadde birwanagana n'ensonga y'obutabanguko n'obwetaavu bw'obutebenkevu. Okukuuma emirembe n'okukuuma abantu, gavumenti ziteekawo amateeka agawera ebikolwa by'ettemu.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, lwak gubedo ka lweny ki peko me tim gero ki miti me bedo ki kuc. Me gwoko kuc ki gwoko dano, gamente oketo cik ma kwero tim me nek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etereikina itunga keda ationis naka amumu keda eipuda lo ainapakina. Kanu aidar ainapakin ka ayuarite itunga, etolomutu apuganisinei ikisila lu imikitos aiyar itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driorisi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi e'bi dri ci e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie azini e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru ri pie. Asianzu ma ta mbazu azini 'ba yi ma ta mbazu, gamete 'ba azita eyi e'yo 'bani 'ba o'dizu 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'eshonga y'obutabanguko hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'obutebekana. Okugumyaho obusingye n'okurinda abantu,gavumenti ziteireho ebiragiro ebirikuzibira ebikorwa by'obwisi.

eng_prompt: As rumors spread about the rise in unexplained disappearances, many began to speculate on the motives driving such dark actions. Some believe that powerful figures may be orchestrating these events for their own gain.
lug_prompt: Olugambo bwe lwasaasaana ku kweyongera kw'okubula kw'abantu mu ngeri etategeerekeka, bangi baatandika okuteebereza ku bigendererwa ebiviirako ebikolwa ebyo eby'ekizikiza. Abamu balowooza nti abantu ab'amaanyi bayinza okuba nga bategeka ebintu bino olw'ebigendererwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angeya omede I kom rweny pa dano, dano mapol gucako byeko tyen lok matye I kom tim maraco enoni. Jo mukene gitye ki niyee ni joo matye ki twero tye ka yubu yub eni pi miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekorasi akiro nuikamunitos aibiror naka itunga, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aomoom nuikamunitos alosikineta nuka aswamisio nuarokok. Iyuunitos ice ebe epedorete itunga luapolok aitemokin nu kanu ameda kec bon.

nyn_prompt: Engambo ku zaabaire nizijanjaara aha kweyongyera kw'abantu abaabaire nibaburukaho, abantu baingi bakatandika kuteebereza aha bigyendererwa ebyabaire nibireetaho ebikorwa by'omwirima nk'ebyo. Abamwe nibateekateeka ngu abantu b'amaani nibabaasa kuba nibatebekanisa emikoro egi ahabw'okweyendeza.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many cultures have viewed practices associated with witchcraft as dangerous and malevolent. This belief has often been fueled by fear and misunderstanding of the unknown.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebyobuwangwa bingi bitunuulidde ebikolwa ebikwatagana n'obulogo nga eby'obulabe. Enzikiriza eno ebadde ejjudde okutya n'obutategeera bikwata ku bitamanyiddwa.

teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, esesenete inonosio luipu aswamisio nu ikamanara keda ecudet kwape nuarokok ido nuarokok. Erai duc aiyuun na eyangaunit akuriau ka amamus amisikin nu mam ejena.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, e'yo suruni karakara 'diyi ndre e'yo yi ecipi ojo be 'diyi ekile onzi azini onzi ru. A'ita 'diri ebi ovu sawa driasi okpo fezu ori azini vata ako e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa bingi bitwire nibitwara ebikorwa by'oburogo nk'eby'akabi n'obwinazi. Enzikiriza egi etwire neeyongyerwamu amaani ahabw'okutiina n'okwetegyereza kubi ebitarikumanywa.

eng_prompt: Change is possible for everyone, regardless of their past choices. With determination and support, individuals can seek a path toward righteousness.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka esoboka eri buli muntu, awatali kufaayo ku bye yasalawo emabega. N'obumalirivu n'obuwagizi, abantu basobola okunoonya ekkubo eribatuusa mu butuukirivu.

lgg_prompt: Ojata eco i 'ye 'ba dria dria eyini aa'zu e'yo eyini pe drio 'diyi ma alea ra ti. Asi 'baza azini atita be, 'ba alu alu eco geri e'yo ada vu ri nda ra.

eng_prompt: In life, we often encounter various responsibilities that require our attention and commitment. Understanding the nature of these responsibilities is essential for managing our time and priorities effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu, tutera okusanga obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo obwetaaga okufaayo kwaffe n'okwewaayo. Okutegeera engeri y'obuvunaanyizibwa buno kya nkizo mu kuddukanya obulungi ebiseera byaffe n'ebyo bye tukulembeza.

teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar, itereikina oni keda aswamisinei nuipu nu ekotosi oni apodokinit ka ainakina. Amisiikin epone loka aswamisinei nu ejok kanu aitwasam apak wok ejok.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, societies have often resorted to extreme measures in their quest for power and control. In many cultures, the belief in appeasing deities through ritualistic acts has led to the dark practice of human sacrifices.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu babaddenga baddukira mu bikolwa eby'amaanyi nga banoonya obuyinza n'obuyinza. Mu buwangwa bungi, enzikiriza mu kusanyusa bakatonda nga bayita mu bikolwa eby'ekinnansi eviiriddeko enkola embi ey'okusaddaaka abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, lwak gubedo ka tic ki yoo mapat-pat me yenyo twero ki twero. I tekwaro mapol, niyee me kweyo cwiny lubanga kun gitiyo ki yub mapat-pat okelo tim marac me tyero dano macalo gitum.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etapit itunga aitwasam iponesio luitegelikina kanu adumun apugan keda apedor. Kotoma inonosio luipu, aomisioit naka aitapatan iponesio luka iponesio luka ajokis ayangau aswamisio nuarokok nuka ainanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu eyi e'bi e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye eyini lezu okpo esuzu. E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, a'ita mungu eyi ma asi omiza ma dria geri e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyisi ri fe 'yeta onzi 'bani 'ba eyi o'dizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibakoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe kuronda obushoborozi n'obutegyeki. Omu by'obuhangwa bingi,okwikiriza omukuhuumuriza bakatonda kurabira omu migyenzo, kireesireho enkora mbi y'okusherekyerera abantu.

eng_prompt: Many cultures throughout history have engaged in various forms of ritualistic practices. However, some of these practices, particularly those involving sacrifices, have been labeled as dark or malevolent in nature.
lug_prompt: Eby'obuwangwa bingi mu byafaayo byonna byeenyigidde mu mikolo egy'enjawulo. Newankubadde, ebimu ku bikolwa bino, okusingira ddala ebyo ebirimu okusaddaaka, biwandiikiddwa nga eby'ekizikiza oba eby'obulabe mu butonde.
ach_prompt: Tekwaro mapol I kare macon gubedo ka timo kwer mapat-pat. Kadi bed kumeno, tim magi mukene, tutwalle ma kwako tyero lee, kilwongo gi macalo tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Inonosio luipu kotoma akiro nukakolo ejaas toma aswamisio nuegelegela. Konye, icie kotoma aswamisio nu, kacut ngul luejaasi keda ainanakineta, aponi kolimorai kwape nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara ewu driori ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo 'yeta wura ndundu 'diyi ma alea. Kani si, e'yo 'diyi ma azi, tutuni e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi o'dizu 'diyi, 'ba 'du eyi ekile 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi le.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa bingi omu byafaayo byoona byejumbire omu migyenzo etari emwe. Kwonka, bimwe aha bikorwa ebi, okukira munonga ebyo ebirikukwata aha kuhayo ebitambo, bigambirweho nk'ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: In many jurisdictions, the legal age of adulthood is set at eighteen. As a result, individuals who have not yet reached this age are subject to specific laws and regulations.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'amateeka bingi, emyaka gy'obukulu mu mateeka giteekebwa ku kkumi na munaana. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abatannatuuka ku myaka gino bagobererwa amateeka n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I twok piny mapol, mwaka me doko dano madit I te cik tye apar wiye aboro. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma pwod pe oo I mwaka man tye ite cik mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, erai ikar itomonakanyauni luka itunga luapolok. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu mam itodolikisi ekaru kalo ejai ikisila lu itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, eli 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu 'ba mbapi 'bo 'diyi niri 'ba eli mudrini aro. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eli 'di ma vutia 'diyi azita azini azita ndu 'diyi ma palaa.
nyn_prompt: Omu matware maingi, emyaka y'obukuru omu biragiro neeteebwaho ahari ikumi na munaana. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abatakahikize emyaka egi, nibagyendera aha mateeka n'ebiragiro ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In many cultures around the world, traditional practices play a significant role in marriage customs. One such practice is the payment of dowry, which is particularly prominent in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi okwetooloola ensi, enkola z'obuwangwa zikola omulimu munene mu nnono z'obufumbo. Ekimu ku bikolwa ng'ebyo kwe kusasula ebirabo, ekimanyiddwa ennyo mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol I wilobo lung, tekwaro konyo totwal I tekwaro me nyom. Tim acel ma kit meno obedo culu cente me nyom, ma oywek tutwalle I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu kotoma akwap kere, iswamaete inonosio lu atekerin epelu loepol noi. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio ngun ngesi aitac ikapun luka idwe, ido ejenara noi ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ma alia, e'yo a'bini 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo aje akuniri ma alia. Yeta 'dile 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ofezu, e'yo 'di tuni kari Uganda niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nganda nyingi okwetorora ensi yoona, emigyenzo y'obuhangwa neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu migyenzo y'obushwere. Ekikorwa kimwe nk'ekyo, n'okushashura obuhereeza, ekirikumanywa munonga omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: In today's society, it is crucial to recognize the value and contributions of all individuals, regardless of gender. Achieving true equality requires a commitment to dismantling outdated stereotypes and biases.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, kya mugaso nnyo okutegeera omugaso n'obuyambi bw'abantu bonna, awatali kufaayo ku kikula kyabwe. Okutuuka ku kwenkanankana okwa nnamaddala kyetaagisa okwewaayo okumalawo endowooza n'obusosoze ebikadde.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa dano weng labongo paro pi coo onyo mon. Cobo miti me bedo ki rwom ma rom ki dano mito keto cwiny me lweny i kom tam macon ma dano tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, ejokuna noi ajenun ajokis naka itunga kere, araida eraasi ikiliok arai angor. Aitodolikin eirian abeit ekoto ainakina kanu alemar aomisio nu emojongitos keda atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba dria ma orodri azini azi eyini nga 'diyi ma e'yo egazu agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma dria. E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma esele trotro ri esuzu le 'ba ma owi eyi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea ku 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, n'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho n'obuhwezi bw'abantu boona, oihiremu abashaija n'abakazi. Okutunga oburingaaniza obwabuzima nikyetenga okwehayo kumaraho ebiteekateeko ebitahikire n'okushoroora.

eng_prompt: Raising awareness about the social and health implications of early marriages is crucial for the well-being of our youth. It is essential to engage in open discussions that highlight the risks associated with such practices.
lug_prompt: Okumanyisa abantu ku buzibu obuva mu kufumbirwa amangu mu mbeera z'abantu n'ebyobulamu kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu bw'abavubuka baffe. Kya mugaso okwenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'olwatu okulaga akabi akali mu bikolwa ng'ebyo.
ach_prompt: Rweyo lwak i kom adwoki marac ma nyome con kelo i kom kwo pa bulu obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa bulu wa. Pire tek tutwal me nywako lok I adaa ma nyutu rac pa tim enoni.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various cultures have practiced different forms of marriage, leading to diverse family structures. One such arrangement is polygamy, which involves a man having multiple wives simultaneously.
