eng_prompt: In a democratic society, it is essential for all organizations to operate within the framework of established regulations. This ensures fairness and accountability in the political process.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, kyetaagisa ebitongole byonna okukolera mu mateeka agaateekebwawo. Kino kikakasa obwenkanya n'embalirira mu nkola y'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, pire tek tutwal pi dule weng me tic malube ki cik ma kiketo. Man weko yub me cungu iwi-bye bedo ber dok dano weng gimiyo kor tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ejokuna noi kanu iriongeta kere aswam kotupitete ikisila luipikakinitai. Einakini ngin ewai loajokan ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma politikis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, eri orodriru amuti dria eyini azi ngazu azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'di ni fe e'yo ada ni azini geri 'bani e'yo politiki ni 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi ma ovu e'yo ada be.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, n'eky'omugasho ebitongore kukorera omu biragiro ebiteirweho. Eki nikireetaho oburinganiza n'embaririra omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In any functioning society, the presence of authority is essential for ensuring safety and security. One of the primary roles of law enforcement agencies is to uphold the rules and regulations that govern our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna ekikola obulungi, okubeerawo kw'ab'obuyinza kya mugaso mu kukuuma n'okukuuma. Ogumu ku mirimu emikulu egy'ebitongole ebikuumaddembe kwe kunyweza amateeka n'ebiragiro ebifuga ebitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken ma kwo tye maber, bedo tye pa lutela pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Tic acel madit pa dul ma gwoko cik en aye me gwoko cik ma doro kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na iswamai ejok, epolok noi ajaut naka apedorosio kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara keda ayuwara. Adiopet kotoma aswam naepol noi naka atukona nuka ikisila ngesi aitogogong ikisila keda ainapeta nu eyaitos itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ci azi ngapi ra 'diyi ma alea, ovuzu 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi be ri eri orodriru ageitema fezu. Azi okporu amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma azi alu ri lezu azita o'bale ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma dri cepi 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu boona abarikukora gye, okubaho kw'obushoborozi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okureeba ngu hariho obusingye n'eby'okwerinda. Omwe aha mirimo mikuru y'ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro n'okurinda amateeka n'ebiragiro ebirikutegyeka ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: It is important to understand the legal regulations surrounding alcohol consumption. Many countries have established age limits to protect the health and safety of young individuals.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okutegeera amateeka agakwata ku kunywa omwenge. Amawanga mangi gataddewo ekkomo ku myaka okukuuma obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu abato.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang cik makwako mato kongo. Lobe mapol guketo lageng me mwaka me gwoko yotkom ki ber bedo pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin ikisila lu ikamunitos aimat ajon. Apotu akwapin nuipu itolomutu ikisila lu ikaru kanu ayuarite angaleu keda ayuwara naka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru azita ewa mvuza ma dria 'diyi vazu. Kari karakara eyi o'ba eli 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo ma omgbo ra 'ba ode eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebiragiro ebirikukwata aha kunywa amaarwa. Amahanga maingi gateireho ekikomo ky'emyaka okurinda amagara n'oburinzi bw'abantu bato.

eng_prompt: In order to participate in the democratic process, individuals must meet certain age requirements. One key criterion is that only those who are eighteen years old or older can cast their votes.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwetaba mu nkola ya demokulasiya, abantu balina okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by'emyaka egimu. Ekimu ku bisaanyizo ebikulu kiri nti abo bokka abalina emyaka kkumi na munaana n'okudda waggulu be basobola okukuba akalulu.
ach_prompt: Me bedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak, dano omyero gubed ki mwaka moni. Gin acel ma pire tek en aye ni joo ma tye ki mwaka apar wiye aboro onyo makato keken aye twero bolo kwir.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajaikin toma ainapeta nuka aseo, ekot itunga aitodolikin ikaru ice. Adiopebore naepol noi ngesi ebe ngul lueraasi ikar itomonakanyauni luapolok bon kesi epedorete aicak abootin.
lgg_prompt: Lezu fizu e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, le 'ba ma ca eli azi 'diyi ma alea ra. E'yo azi okporu 'diyi ma azi eri kini lu 'ba eli be mudrini aro agapi 'bo 'diyi eco voti 'be ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuntu kubaasa kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki, aine kuhikiiriza emyaka emwe. Ekikuru n'okugira ngu abo bonka abaine emyaka ikumi na munaana n'okukiraho nibo barikubaasa kuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement agencies play a crucial role in maintaining public safety. Their primary mission is to ensure the well-being of the community.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe bikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma obukuumi bw'abantu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe ekikulu kwe kufaayo ku mbeera y'abantu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Ticgi madit tye me neno ni lwak tye maber.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta lu ikisila iswamaete aswam naepol noi kowai lo aidar ayuwara na itunga. Alosikinetekec naepol ngesi awanyun ebe ejai aijar najokan naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi okporu nga o'bi yi ma tambazu. Asisile yiniri okori lezu nezu ra kini ongulumu eyi ma aa muke.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda ebyokwerinda omu bantu. Ekigyendererwa kyabo ekikuru n'okureeba ngu abantu baba gye.

eng_prompt: After a successful campaign and strong support from her constituents, she is determined to build on her achievements. With the upcoming election approaching, her focus is on maintaining her position.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya akalulu okulungi n'obuwagizi obw'amaanyi okuva mu balonzi be, mumalirivu okuzimba ku by'atuuseeko. Ng'okulonda okujja kusembera, ebirowoozo bye biri ku kukuuma ekifo kye.
ach_prompt: Ingee bito kwi maber ki cwak matek ma aa ki bot lubol kwir mege, en omoko tamme me mede ki jami ma en otimo. Ki cok pa yer matye kabino ni, en oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom gwoko dog ticce.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ekampein loekerianara noi keda agangat naepol kanejaas itungake, ekapakina ngesi aitogogong aswamisioitike. Kwape eyapie aseo, epodokinit ngesi aitogogong adoketaitike.
lgg_prompt: Ti odaza drile suzaru azini atita okporu engazu 'ba erini opi nyapi 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi 'ba e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Opeta emupi 'diyi ma o'diru, eri asi 'ba pari erini ovuzuri ma ta mbazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ehururu nungi hamwe n'obuhwezi bw'amaani kuruga omu bantu abu arikujwekyera, amaririire kugumizamu n'ebi yaakozire. Ahabw'oburuuru oburikwija kuhika haihi, omutima gwe niguguma aha ntebe ye.

eng_prompt: Numerous reports emerged highlighting irregularities and discrepancies in voter registration and polling practices. As citizens voiced their concerns, it became increasingly clear that the integrity of the election was at stake.
lug_prompt: Alipoota nnyingi zaavaayo nga ziraga obutali butebenkevu n'obutakwatagana mu kuwandiisa abalonzi n'enkola z'okulonda. Nga bannansi balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obwesimbu bw'okulonda bwali mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic mapol okatti ma onyuto bal ki apoka-poka ma obedo tye ikare me coyo lubol kwir ki yub me bolo kwir. I kare ma anywali me Uganda obedo ka nyutu lworo gi, nen atyer kamaleng ni ber bedo pa yer ne tye kama rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripootan luipu kitodutu aibucanaro keda atiokisio nuka aiwadikao naka aseak keda ainapeta nuka aicak abootin. Neautar itunga alimor aiyalongongokec, apotu kojenutu ebe ejai ationis na aseo.
lgg_prompt: O'duko karakara efu ecepi e'yo onzi azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani 'ba voti 'bezu 'diyi ma ru osizu azini e'yo 'bani 'ba voti 'bezu 'diyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Kari anzi eyini e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi 'yoria, eri eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo ada opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo onzi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota nyingi zikooreka oburemeezi n'obutaikirizana omu kuhandikisa abateezi b'akaruuru hamwe n'enkora y'okuteera akaruuru. Abatuuragye ku baayorekire okwerarikirira kwabo, kikarebeka butunu ngu oburingaaniza bw'akaruuru bukaba buri omu kabi.

eng_prompt: In some communities, traditional beliefs and economic pressures can lead to difficult choices for families. As a result, many parents in rural areas feel compelled to prioritize marriage for their daughters at a young age.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebimu, enzikiriza z'obuwangwa n'okunyigirizibwa mu byenfuna bisobola okuviirako amaka okusalawo okukaluba. N'ekivuddemu, abazadde bangi mu byalo bawalirizibwa okukulembeza okufumbirwa kwa bawala baabwe ku myaka emito.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mukene, niyee me tekwaro ki peko me lim twero weko moko tam tek tutwal pi gangi. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo mapol I caro giwinyo ni omyero gunyom lutino anyira gi con.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena ace, iyuunito lu atekerin keda atiokisio nuka ikapun eyangaununete aseununeta nuetioko mama ejaasi ikalia. Kanuka ngun, auriak luipu kocaaloi epupete ebe ibusakinit kesi aisingarenit adukonokin apesur kec eringa edisiak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo a'ita a'di ni 'diyi azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi eco fe familia eyini e'yo 'duzu ewaru ra. E'yo 'disi, tipika karakara angu calu ru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ega kini eyi ma ezoanzi eyi 'du agupia de eyi ma eli nga were.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebimwe, enyikiriza y'obuhangwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya, nibibaasa kureetera amaka okusharamu kubi. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire baingi omu byaro nibahurira nibagyemeserezibwa kushwera abaishiki baabo bakiri bato.

eng_prompt: When children are neglected and left to fend for themselves, it creates a dangerous environment for their development. In cases where parental irresponsibility leads to harm, accountability is essential.
lug_prompt: Abaana bwe balagajjalirwa ne balekerwa okwerabirira, kitondawo embeera embi eri okukula kwabwe. Mu mbeera ng'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'abazadde buviirako obulabe, embalirira ya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Ka ki cayo lutino dok kiwekogi me gwokke kengi, man kelo peko madit tutwal I dongo gi. I kare ma bedo lanyodo ma pe ki twero kelo peko, nyutu kor tic pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Arai epalunit idwe kosodete alakakin aijar bon, einakini ngin kesi aiboisit naronon kanu apol kec. Karai mam auriak iswamaete ejok eyangauni aimusungeta, ibusakinit aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka anzi nyiri eyi adi dika eyi ku eyi ma ta mbazu eyi ma ngulupi si, eri angu onzi eji eyi ma zota ni. E'yo tipika eyini aa'zu e'yo kokoru ri ni fezu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Abaana kubarikurekyerwa kwebaisaho, nikireetaho embeera y'akabi aha ntunguuka yaabo. Omu bwire obu obujunanizibwa bw'abazaire burikureeta akabi, okuha embaririra n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: The ongoing health crisis has disrupted education systems worldwide, leading to significant challenges for students. As a result, many families are facing difficult decisions regarding their children's schooling.
lug_prompt: Obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso butaataaganyizza enkola y'ebyenjigiriza mu nsi yonna, ekiviiriddeko okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri abayizi. N'ekivuddemu, amaka mangi goolekaganye n'okusalawo okukaluba ku bikwata ku kusoma kw'abaana baago.
ach_prompt: Peko me yot kom matye ni obalo yub me kwan I wilobo lung, ma okelo peko madit tutwal bot lutino kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi mapol tye ka nongo peko me moko tam malube ki kwan pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye abu itolitol nuka asioman kotoma akwap kere, ido ayangau atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi esisiak. Kanuka ngun, ejaas ikalia luipu keda aomisio nuetioko nuikamunitos asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi eza e'yo onita ni 'diyi wudrikurusi ndulu, e'yo ewaru sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ejipi. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi 'ye sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire oburikugyenda omu maisho, butaganiise eby'obwegyese omunsi yoona, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha beegi. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okucwamu ahaby'obwegyese bw'abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: The escalating issue has reached a critical point, affecting communities far and wide. To effectively address this challenge, we must unite our resources and strategies.
lug_prompt: Ensonga egenda yeeyongera etuuse ku ddaala ery'amaanyi, ekosa ebitundu ewala n'ewala. Okusobola okukola obulungi ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, tulina okukwataganya ebyetaago byaffe n'obukodyo.
ach_prompt: Peko matye kamede ni dong oo I rwom ma lamal tutwal dok tye ka yelo kabedo mapatpat. Me tyeko peko man maber, omyero warib jami ma watye kwede kacel ki yoo me tic.
teo_prompt: Adolu ationis ngin adoketait naepol noi, ido emunarit aiboisio nuelwaka noi. Kanu aitemokin ainingosit na ejok, ekot oni aimorikikin iboro wok keda iwaitin wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di ca curu'do e'yo okporu ni ma alia, erini ongulumu eyi 'yezu angu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, le ama ma eci afa amani 'diyi tualu geri amani ecozu e'yo nde 'yezu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Enshonga erikweyongyera, ehikire aha rurengo rw'amaani, erikuteganisa ebyanga bya hare na hare. Okukora kurungi aha buremeezi obu, twine kukorera hamwe n'amaani gaitu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing acceptance of diverse forms of relationships. As societal norms evolve, many people are beginning to embrace unconventional marriages.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okukkiriza engeri ez'enjawulo ez'omukwano. Ng'empisa z'ekitundu zikyuka, abantu bangi batandise okwaniriza obufumbo obutali bwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye kaketo cwinygi I kom yub mapat-pat me bedo ki lurem. Kit ma cik me kabedo tye ka loke kwede, dano mapol tye ka cako jolo nyom ma pat ki macon.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor acamanara naka iponesio luegelegela luka eidicane. Kwape ijulakinor iponesio luka itunga, eutasi itunga luipu ageun aijaun edukone lo mam erai loka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ai e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu ri ni i ojazu risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do aku eyi 'du geri ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beyongyeire kwikiriza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'omukago. Nk'oku emicwe y'abantu erikweyongyera, abantu baingi batandikire kwikiriza obushwere obutari bwa buriijo.

eng_prompt: In many communities, the upbringing of children is often influenced by cultural and spiritual beliefs. As a result, families frequently turn to their faith for direction on parenting methods.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okukuza abaana kwesigamiziddwa ku nzikiriza z'obuwangwa n'ez'eby'omwoyo. N'ekivuddemu, amaka gatera okudda mu nzikiriza zaago okufuna okulambikibwa ku ngeri y'okukuzaamu abaana.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, dongo pa lutino ipol kare jenge I kom tekwaro ki dini. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi ipol kare gilokke bot dini gi me nongo tira i kom kit me gwoko lutino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, epoloete idwe kotupitete inonosio keda aiyuunikec. Kanuka ngun, etapit ikalia aijulakin aiyuunikec kanu aicoreta nuka aitopoloun idwe.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, anzi eyi ma ezota ni tutuni e'yo a'bi ni azini e'yo aita ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, familia eyi sa'wa driasi eyi oja eyi ma dini eyi vu imbata esuzu geri eyini anzi eyi ezozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bingi,okukuza abaana nikwegamira eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'enyikiriza y'eby'omwoyo. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka nigahindukirira amadiini gaago kutunga obuhabuzi ahaburyo bw'okukuza abaana.

eng_prompt: Despite the progress made in gender equality, the harsh reality remains that many still suffer in silence. Countless stories of abuse and violence against females continue to emerge, highlighting a pervasive issue in society.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu, abantu bangi bakyabonaabona mu kasirise. Emboozi nnyingi ez'okutulugunya n'okutulugunya abakyala zeeyongera okuvaayo, ekiraga ensonga ejjudde mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni alokaloka mapol otime I lok me bedo marom ikin mon ki coo, lok ada ma rac pud tye ni dano mapol pud tye ka deno can ling ling. Ododo mapol tutwal me nywaro ki tim gero i kom mon tye kawot anyim, ma nyutu peko ma onya tutwal I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas apol toma airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor, eringa itunga luipu icanasi kotoma aililing. Akiro nuipu nuikamunitos aitisiliario keda amumu naka angor kes inyikokinitos alomun, itodunit ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni tro ovuzu trotro e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria ra ti, e'yo ewaru 'ba karakara eyi ni nga po'di dri ci e'yere. O'duko e'yo candi fezani azini ngiringiri oku yi ma rua 'diyiniri ma kalafe karakara yi e'da e'yo ongulumu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho entunguuka omu by'oburinganiza bw'abashaija n'abakazi, ekikuru n'okugira ngu baingi nibabonabona omu kasirise. Ebitebyo bingi ebirikukwata aha kubonabonesibwa n'okunyangarazibwa kw'abakazi, nibigyenda omu maisho, ebirikworeka oburemeezi oburi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In many societies around the world, traditional gender roles continue to influence various aspects of life. In Uganda, these roles are particularly evident in the institution of marriage, where cultural norms often prioritize male authority.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi okwetooloola ensi, emirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu gikyakosa ebintu eby'enjawulo mu bulamu. Mu Uganda, obuvunaanyizibwa buno bweyolekera nnyo mu nteekateeka y'obufumbo, ng'ennono zitera okukulembeza obuyinza bw'abasajja.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol I wilobo lung, tic tekwaro pa mon ki coo tye ka mede ki kelo alokaloka I kwo pa dano. I Uganda, tic magi nen tutwalle I yub me nyom, kama tekwaro ipol kare keto cungu iwi twero pa coo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu kotoma akwap kere, iswamaete ikiliok keda angor iboro luegelegela kotoma aijar. Ko Uganda, itodunitos aswamisio nu noi kotoma odukonekec, ne ipolokitotor inonosio nuka inonosio apedorosio nuka ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma alea, azi oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie 'diyi mu drile e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu. Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo 'diyi e'da kililiru tutuni aku siza ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi ni tutuni okpo fezu agupi eyini ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi okwetorora ensi yoona, emirimo y'abashaija n'abakazi erikugumizamu neekora aha mitwarize y'abantu. Omu Uganda, obujunaanizibwa obu nibweyoreka munonga omu kitongore ky'obushwere, ahu emicwe y'obuhangwa erikukira kwebembeza obushoborozi bw'abashaija.

eng_prompt: As societal norms evolve and technology reshapes communication, couples are navigating new dynamics in their relationships. Many young people today approach marriage with different expectations and values than previous generations.
lug_prompt: Nga empisa z'abantu zikyuka ne tekinologiya akyusa empuliziganya, abaagalana batambuza entambula empya mu nkolagana yaabwe. Abavubuka bangi leero boolekedde obufumbo n'ebisuubirwa n'emitindo egy'enjawulo okusinga emirembe egyayita.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kit me kwo pa dano tye ka loke kwede ki diro me tet manyen tye ka loko kit me lok, joo ma onyome gitye ka nongo yoo manyen me winye ikin gi. Bulu mapol I kare-ni gicito I nyom ki miti mapat-pat ka iporo ki kare macon.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejulakinor iponesio luka itunga keda etatai loakwana, eutasi itunga luedukokina aitodolikin iponesio luitetiak luka eidicanekec. Atumunak luipu lolo elosete toma odukonekec keda aomisio nu egelegela adepar lu apakio nukokau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ni i ojazu azini e'yo tekenologiani e'yo nzezu 'diyi ojazu o'diru, 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi e'yo o'diru eyi 'ye eyi ma eselea. Ba ode karakara ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi e'yo aje ma alia 'diyi ma egata azini orodri eyini 'diyi ndundu aga ewu agapi 'bo 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku emicwe y'abantu erikweyongyera n'ebya tekinorogye nibihindura empurizagana, abashwereine bariyo nibagyendera aha nshonga nsya omubikwatireine n'omukago gwabo. Eminyeeto erizooba neeza omu bushwere n'ebigyendererwa n'emitwarize etarikushushana n'eya ira.

eng_prompt: It is essential to recognize the inherent dignity and worth of every individual. We must challenge any notion that dehumanizes or objectifies women in society.

eng_prompt: After the polls closed, the election officials gathered the volunteers to discuss the day's events. The atmosphere was tense as they prepared to share their observations and experiences.

eng_prompt: During the chaotic demonstration, tensions escalated quickly as protesters clashed with law enforcement. As a result of the confrontations, some people were injured during the process.

eng_prompt: As the polls opened, a large crowd gathered, creating an atmosphere of tension and anticipation. The officials braced themselves for the challenges that lay ahead, knowing that the voting process would test their skills and patience.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwaggulawo, abantu bangi baakuŋŋaana, ne kireetawo obunkenke n'okusuubira. Abakungu beetegekera okusoomoozebwa okwali mu maaso, nga bakimanyi nti okulonda kujja kugezesa obukugu bwabwe n'obugumiikiriza.

eng_prompt: As the election approached, the local officials began to review the voter registration lists. They discovered that a significant number of individuals had registered to vote despite not living in the area.
lug_prompt: Okulonda bwe kwasembera, abakungu b'ebyalo baatandika okwekenneenya enkalala z'abalonzi. Baakizuula nti abantu bangi beewandiisa okulonda wadde nga tebabeera mu kitundu.

eng_prompt: As the crowd gathered around the game, whispers of suspicion filled the air. Everyone could see the players exchanging furtive glances and secret signals.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaana okwetooloola omuzannyo, waabaddewo okuwuubaala okw'okwekengera. Buli omu yali asobola okulaba abazannyi nga bawanyisiganya amaaso n'obubonero obw'ekyama.

eng_prompt: As the clock struck noon, voters began to line up outside the polling station, eager to cast their ballots. Suddenly, an unexpected commotion erupted, drawing everyone's attention away from the booths.
lug_prompt: Essaawa bwe yakubye ssaawa mukaaga ez'emisana, abalonzi baatandika okusimba ennyiriri wabweru w'ekifo awalonderwa, nga beesunga okukuba akalulu. Amangu ago, akajagalalo akaali tekasuubirwa kabalukawo, ne kaggya buli omu ku kizimbe.

teo_prompt: Neadolio esawa loaparan, apotu aseak kogeutu aibwo kokinga naka aiboisit naeseere, ekotosi aicak abootin. Apotu itunga lu mam eomitai ebe ebuni aswam ngun, koinakisi itunga kere aibwo kotogokec.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ni tuzu etu agandua, 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi e'do yi oti pari voti 'bezuri ma alia amve, ava be voti 'bezu. Sawa 'disi, o'duko azi 'bani ega kokoru ni e'do, 'ba dria ma mile engazu pari 'duzu 'diyi vurisi ra.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, local authorities decided to allow younger citizens to express their opinions on community issues. This unprecedented move aimed to engage the youth and encourage civic participation.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, ab'obuyinza ku byalo baasalawo okukkiriza abavubuka okwogera endowooza zaabwe ku nsonga z'ekitundu. Enkola eno etali ya bulijjo egendereddwamu okwenyigiramu abavubuka n'okukubiriza abantu okwenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me yee ki anywali matino me miyo tamgi I kom lok ma kwako kabedo gi. Yub man ma peya otimme obedo ki miti me weko bulu bedo tye i yub eni ki bene me cuku cwiny lwak me bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, apotu apedorosio ocalo ocamutu acamakinit itunga lu edisiak alimun aomisiokec nuikamunitos akiro nuka atutubet. Alosikinet naka aswamisioit ngin erai kanu aimorikikin atumunak ka aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo lezu kari anzi oderu 'diyi dri egata yini 'diyi ecezu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'di lezu 'ba ode eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu 'ba aa'pi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma ava engazu.
