eng_prompt: Amidst growing tensions and allegations of misconduct, the election officials faced increasing scrutiny over the integrity of the ballot counting process. As the final tally was announced, whispers of manipulation began to circulate.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke obweyongera n'ebigambibwa nti waliwo emize emibi, abakungu b'ebyokulonda baayolekaganye n'okukeberebwa okw'amaanyi ku bwesimbu bw'enkola y'okubala obululu. Omuwendo ogwasembayo bwe gwalangirirwa, ebigambo eby'obukuusa byatandika okusaasaana.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle tye ka mede ki adot me tim maraco, lutic me bolo kwir gubedo ka neno kit ma ki kwano kwede kwir. Ikare ma kicwalo lok angeya me agiki I kom wel ma obedo tye, lok me byeko ni dano gubedo ka tic kwedgi I yoo ma pe atir ocako kobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiyalongongo keda aitoroneta nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok, apotu eswamak luka aseo odumutu aingic naepol noi kanu aimar abootin. Nealimorere enaaba lokawasia, apotu akiro nuikamunitos aibucaret kogeutu alosit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma talasi azini e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ba 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba opetaa ni 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani voti lazu kililiru ri ma ale andrizu ra. Bani kalafe asizuri azizu 'boria, e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini 'ba 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi e'do aci ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'emicwe mibi, abakuru omu by'oburuuru bakabonabonesibwa ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'okubara oburuuru. Nk'oku omuhendo gw'ahamuheru gwarangirwe, okuhuumuriza kw'okubuzabuza kukatandika kujanjaara.

eng_prompt: Amidst the chaos and numerous scandals that plagued their campaign, the candidates remained resilient and focused on their message. As the votes were counted, it became clear that their determination had paid off.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kavuyo n'emivuyo egy'enjawulo egyabadde mu kampeyini zaabwe, abeesimbyewo baasigala banywevu era nga beemalira ku bubaka bwabwe. Obululu bwe bwabadde bubalibwa, kyalabika bulungi nti obumalirivu bwabwe bwavaamu ebibala.
ach_prompt: I kare me kuku-kuku ki tim maraco mapol ma obedo tye I kare me bito kwirgi, lucungu ne gubedo ki tek cwiny dok guketo cwinygi I kom kwena gi. Ikare ma kitye ka kwano kwir, nen atyer kamaleng ni miti gi ocobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajai amumu keda abilibilio naka ikapun kotoma okampeinikec, apotu abwoak iswamata kagogong ido apodokinit akirokec. Neautar aimar abootin, apotu kojenutu ebe apotu kesi kopedosi aitodolikin aomisioitikec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini e'yo onzi karakara yini ti odaza yini ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi awi okporu azini asi 'ba e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria. Voti 'bani lazu 'boria, eri eca e'dazaru kini asi 'baza yiniri fe drileba ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'akavuyo n'emishango mingi eyabaire eriho omu kampiini zaabo, abesimbireho bakaguma baine amaani kandi bakata omutima aha butumwa bwabo. Oburuuru ku bwabaire nibubarwa, kikarebeka butunu ngu okwehayo kwabo kukashashurwa.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of the chaotic election, tensions ran high as accusations flew from all sides. Frustrated by the outcome, he sought a scapegoat to deflect responsibility.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akalulu akaabaddemu akavuyo, obunkenke bwavaayo ng'okulumiriza kugenda mu maaso okuva ku buli ludda. Olw'okunyiiga olw'ebyavaamu, yanoonya engeri y'okwewala obuvunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: I ngee lweny ma obedo tye ikare me yer, lworo omede ki koko ma aa ki bot dano weng. Pi cwer cwiny I kom adwogi ne, en oyenyo yoo me gengo timo bal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu naka aseo, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos noi naarai apotu itunga luka aiboisio kere kitoronata. Apotu itakadikisi ngesi kanu akiro nuelomunitos, abu ngesi kodum itunganan yenepedori aisac aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni opetaa ma vutia 'diyi ma vutia, asi otiza tu uru e'yo 'bani tozu engazu kala dria 'diyi vurisi. E'yo efupi 'bori ma e'yosi, eri nda 'ba azi ecozu e'yo 'da ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obutabanguko omu karuuru, obunkenke bukaruga ahaiguru ahabw'okubeeherera kuruga omumatemba goona. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'ebyarugiremu, akasherura omuringo gw'okwetantara obujunanizibwa.

eng_prompt: Determined to make a difference, he tirelessly campaigned for support from the community. His passion for the cause fueled his relentless efforts to secure victory.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yali mumalirivu okuleetawo enjawulo, yakola kakuyege n'obutaweera okufuna obuwagizi okuva mu bantu. Obwagazi bwe yalina eri ensonga eyo bwe bwamuleetera okufuba ennyo okufuna obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Macalo ngat ma omoko tamme me kelo aloka-loka, en olwenyo matek me nongo kony ki bot lwak. Mar madit ma en tye kwede pi tic man okelo tute matek tutwal me nongo loc.
teo_prompt: Keda ekapakina aitolomun aijulanakineta, abu ngesi kiswama agogongu naepol noi kanu adumun agangat kama ejaasi itunga. Amina ke naka akiro ngun abu isinyikok ngesi aswam kagogong kanu aitelekaar.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza be ojata ejizu, eri 'ye ti odaza okpo kokoru atita esuzu engazu ongulumu eyivu. Leta erini e'yo 'da ma dria ri fe okpo okpo erini okpo fezu e'yo ndezuri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumariirira kukora empindahinduka, akakoresa amaani omu kuronda obushagiki kuruga omu bantu. Rukundo ye ahabw'ekigyendererwa, ekamureetera okukora n'amaani kutunga obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: After noticing suspicious activity in the neighborhood, the concerned resident decided to take action. They gathered all the relevant information and contacted the authorities for assistance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebikolwa ebiteeberezebwa mu kitundu, abatuuze abeeraliikirivu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baakungaanya amawulire gonna agakwatagana ne batuukirira ab'obuyinza okufuna obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Inge neno jami ma pe tye kakare ma tye katimme I kabedo ne, dano ma onongo gitye ki lworo ni gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Gu gamo ngec weng ma mite dok gu lok ki lutela pi kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun aswamisio nu eomitai ebe ejai aiboisit kangin, abu etunganan lo epodokinit ngun koseu aswam nuikamunitos ngun. Apotu kesi otukutu akiro kere nuikamunitos ngun kosodete adolokin apedorosio kanu aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi tra o'dukoti dria orodriru 'diyi eyi ma dria eyini ani eyi ecizu drice'ba eyi pie azakoma esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okureeba ebikorwa ebitarikwetegyerezibwa omu kicweka ekyo,omutuuragye owabaire akwerarikiriire akasharamu kugira eki yaakora. Bakarundaana amakuru goona agarikwetengwa reero bahika aha b'obushoborozi kutunga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Recent scandals and controversies surrounding key members have raised concerns among supporters. As a result, many began to question the integrity and values upheld by the party.
lug_prompt: Emivuyo n'obukuubagano obwaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo mu bammemba abakulu bireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bawagizi. N'ekyavaamu, bangi baatandika okubuusabuusa obwesimbu n'empisa z'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Koko ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ikin lumemba madongo okelo lworo ikin lucwak. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo ki woro ma dul me cungu iwi-bye ne tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuarokok keda ingungeta nuikamunitos imeban luapolok eyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas egangitok. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu abuonokin nuikamunitos ajokis naka epate.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi azini ngiringiri 'ba okporu memba ru 'diyi ma ageia 'diyi eji asi otiza 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo adasi azini e'yo orodriru amuti politiki ni 'da ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi n'obutaikirizana obwakyerereirwe abanyakibiina kikareetaho okwerarikirira omu bashagiki. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi bakatandika kubanganisa obwesigwa n'emitwarize y'ekibiina.

eng_prompt: Throughout the years, he has consistently volunteered for various campaigns and events. His unwavering support for the party's ideals is evident in everything he does.
lug_prompt: Emyaka gyonna, abadde akola nga nnakyewa mu kampeyini n'emikolo egy'enjawulo. Obuwagizi bwe obutakyukakyuka eri ebigendererwa by'ekibiina bweyolekera mu buli kimu ky'akola.
ach_prompt: Pi mwaki mapol, en obedo ka tic macalo latic me nono I yub mapat-pat me bito kwir ki yub mapat-pat. Cwake matek tutwal I kom miti pa dul me cungu iwi bye ne nen I jami weng ma en timo.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru kere, iswamat ngesi kwape aijaanakinan kanuka ikampeins keda iboro luegelegela. Agangat ke naepol noi mama ejaasi ipudesia luka epate ewanyunitai kotoma akiro kere nuiswamai ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'diyi ma alea dria, eri ebi ovu 'ba owi'ba e'yo ti odaza ni azini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea. Eri ma atita okporu e'yo amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma dria ri e'da e'yo dria erini 'ye 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Kumara emyaka yoona, atwire naahayo obuhwezi aha kampeyini n'emikoro etari emwe. Obushagiki bwe aha bigyendererwa by'ekibiina, nibweyoreka omuri buri kimwe eki arikukora.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising within the party as disagreements over policy direction have surfaced. As a result, the party leader is not happy with some members.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kibiina olw'obutakkaanya ku ngeri y'okutambuzaamu emirimu. N'ekyavaamu, omukulembeze w'ekibiina si musanyufu ne bammemba abamu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I dul me cungu iwi bye ne pien telle I kom cik mapat-pat tye ka time. Macalo adwogi ne, latela me dul me cungu iwi bye ne cwinye pe yom ki lumemba mukene.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma opate kanu amamut acamanar kanu ainapeta. Kanuka ngun, mam engarenon lo epate iyalama keda imeban ice.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni ri ebi tu amuti politiki ni 'da ma alea tu e'yo erita ako ni e'dozu 'bori ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba amuti politiki ni 'da niri aa'ni ayikosi 'ba amuti nde ma alea 'diyi ma azi eyisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kibiina, ahabw'obutakwatanisa aha nkora y'eby'obutegyeki. N'ekyarugiremu, omwebembezi w'ekibiina tashemerereirwe ba memba bamwe.

eng_prompt: The COVID-19 pandemic has disrupted education systems worldwide, leading to unprecedented challenges for educators. Many teachers have struggled to adapt to remote learning while managing their own health and safety concerns.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe kitaataaganyizza ebyenjigiriza mu nsi yonna, ekireetedde abasomesa okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Abasomesa bangi bafubye okumanyiira okusomera ewala ate nga bakwasaganya ebyobulamu n'obukuumi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two korona obalo yub me kwan I wilobo lung, ma okelo peko mapol tutwal bot lupwonye. Lupwonye mapol gunongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki kwan ma aa ki kama bor kun nongo gitye ka gwoko yot komgi ki ber bedo gi.
teo_prompt: Abu adeka naka COVID-19 itolitol nuka asioman kotoma akwap kere, ido ayangau ainingosia nuipu noi nejaas isisianakinak. Apotu isisianakinak luipu iswamata kagogong kanu aijulakin asioman nako kinga konye epodokinitos nuka angaleu kec keda ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Azo COVID-19 niri eza e'yo onita ni 'diyi wudrikurusi ndulu, erini fezu e'yo ewaru 'ba imba'ba eyini 'diyi dri. Imba'ba karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyini ani muzu onita onizu angu zozu 'diyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ya COVID-19 etabukire eby'obwegyese omunsi yoona, ekireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha beegyesa. Abeegyesa baingi bagumire okumanyiira okwegyera hare, obwo barikureeberera eby'amagara gaabo n'eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: After facing numerous challenges in their community, the residents gathered to discuss their options. Many expressed a need for support to address the pressing issues they were encountering.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusanga okusoomoozebwa okungi mu kitundu kyabwe, abatuuze baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu. Bangi baalaga obwetaavu bw'obuyambi okusobola okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu ze baali basanga.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo peko mapol I kabedo gi, lutedero gucokke me nywako tam gi. Dano mapol guwaco ni gimito kony me tyeko peko ma gitye ka nongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumunun atiokisio nuipu kotoma atutubetekec, apotu itunga lu atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nu epedorete kesi aswam. Apotu luipu itodutu ebe ekotosi kesi agangat kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetioko nuetereikina keda kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyivileri ma alea karakara 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi e'da ra kini eyi le atita e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga oburemeezi bwingi omu kyanga kyabo, abatuuragye baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo. Baingi bakoreka ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi kukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezibaire nibatunga.

eng_prompt: Many educational institutions in Uganda are expanding their reach to provide personalized learning experiences. As a result, private teachers' organizations have emerged to cater to the growing demand for tailored education services.
lug_prompt: Amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi mu Uganda gagaziye obuwanvu bwago okusobola okusomesa buli omu ku bubwe. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'abasomesa eby'obwannannyini bivuddeyo okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusomesa ku mutindo.
ach_prompt: Gangi kwan mapol I lobo Uganda tye ka medo rwom me kwan gi me miyo pwony ma lubbe ki miti pa lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa lupwonye ma pe jenge I kom gamente gucako tic me cobo miti me kwan matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Isomeroi luipu luko Uganda eutasi aiyatakin aiboisio kec kanu aisisianakin itunga akiro nuiswamaete kesi bon. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta luka isisianakinak luka itunga kitolomutu kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo itunga lu isisianakinete kes.
lgg_prompt: Pari onita ni karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi angu eyini esu ri ma omgbo otu eyini ani e'yo onita ni 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi fezu. E'yo 'disi, amuti imba'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi efu e'yo lezu azakoma fele onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amatendekyero maingi omuri Yuganda, gariyo nigongyera aha buheereza bwago, kugira ngu gashome kurugiirira aha muntu weena. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'abegyesa eby'abantu buntu bitandikire kukora aha byetaago by'obwegyese obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: After much discussion about the group's future direction, it became clear that a more structured approach was needed. To address this, the members decided to establish a committee.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ekibiina gye kiddukanyizibwamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti enkola entegeke obulungi yeetaagibwa. Okukola ku nsonga eno, bammemba baasalawo okutondawo akakiiko.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom yoo me tic pa dul ne I kare me anyim, onen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me tic ma kiyubu maber obedo kamitte. Me tyeko lok eni, lumemba gumoko tam gi me cako committee.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi nuikamunitos epone loebeitor egurupu aswam koingaren, aponi kojenunai ebe ibusakinit aitodolikin epone loitemokinitai. Kanu aitemokin ngun, apotu imeban itolomutu ekomiti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia geri amuti 'da ni ngazu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria, eca e'da kililiru kini le 'ba ma e'do e'yo 'ye kililiru. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, memba 'da eyi 'du e'yo komiti ni e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga aha nkora y'ekibiina omu biro by'omumaisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okukora ebintu omu muringo oguhikire. Okukora aha nshonga egi, ba memba bakasharamu kutaho akakiiko.

eng_prompt: Many families have struggled to adapt to the sudden changes brought on by the global crisis. As businesses closed and schools shifted to online learning, the challenges began to mount.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwanye okumanyiira enkyukakyuka ez'amangu ezireeteddwa ekizibu ky'ensi yonna. Bizineesi bwe zaggalwawo n'amasomero ne gatandika okusoma ku mutimbagano, okusoomoozebwa kweyongera.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol gunongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki aloka-loka ma obino macalo adwogi me peko me two korona. I kare ma biyacara oloro dok gangi kwan ocako kwan kun gitiyo ki intanet, peko ne omede.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ikalia luipu ajenun aijulanakineta nu eyaunit adeka naka ekorona. Neagolokinere ibiasaran kosodete isomeroi aijulakin aisisia kolago, apotu atiokisio kogeutu aiyatakin.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru ojata mbeleru e'yo ewaru wudrikuru ma alea 'diyiniri 'yezu. Tujura yini opizu azini sukulu yini ojazu onita geri oli aliasiri vu, e'yo ewaru 'diyi e'do tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi gatungire oburemeezi bw'okumanya empindahinduka ezareesirweho oburemeezi bw'ensi yoona. Eby'obushubuzi ku byakingire kandi amashomero gakahindukira aha kwegyera aha mikutu, oburemeezi bukatandika kweyongyera.

eng_prompt: The recent changes in educational standards have prompted a reevaluation of teaching methods. As a result, many educators are now recognizing the importance of strategic lesson planning.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka ezaakabaawo mu mutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza ziviiriddeko okuddamu okwekenneenya enkola z'okusomesa. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa bangi kati bakitegedde obukulu bw'okuteekateeka obulungi eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Aloka-loka ma otime I rwom me kwan I kare-ni okelo aloka-loka I yoo me pwonye. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye mapol dong gitye ka niang ber pa yub maber me pwonyo lutino.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka adoketait naka asioman nes eyangaunit airereonor iwaitin lu isisianakino. Kanuka ngun, ejenete kwana isisianakinak luipu ajokis naka aitemonokin aisisiaeta.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru geri onitaniri ma alia 'diyi fe 'bani geri 'bani imbazu 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo 'disi, imba'ba karakara eyi curu'do e'yo orodriru otita kililiru 'bani 'ba eyi imbazu 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka y'omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese, ereesireho okugaruka kushwijuma emiringo y'okwegyesamu. N'ekyarugiremu, abegyesa baingi hati nibamanya omugasho gw'okukora enteekateeka nungi y'okwegyesa.

eng_prompt: Many educators are struggling to make ends meet due to low salaries and rising living costs. As a result, they often find themselves relying on financial assistance to cover their basic expenses.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi bazibuwalirwa okweyimirizaawo olw'emisaala emitono n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesanga nga beesigama ku buyambi bw'ensimbi okusobola okukola ku byetaago byabwe ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol gitye ka canne me nongo jami ma mite pi mucara gi matidi ki wel cente ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi nongo gi jenge I kom kony me lim me culu pi jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu eutasi aijar naarai ikidioko iropito keda aijar naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi ajaut keda agangat na ikapun kanu aitac ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo esu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu e'yo musara eyini aa'zu were risi azini aje 'bani aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu ri si. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni eyi esu eyini aa'zu atita robia niri ma dria eyini ani ecozu afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho ahabw'emishaara y'ahansi hamwe n'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwesigama aha buyambi bw'esente kukora ahabyetaago byabo.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges of managing a diverse classroom, the educators remained committed to fostering a positive learning environment. Their dedication to each student's growth was evident in their interactions.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okusoomoozebwa kw'okuddukanya ebibiina eby'enjawulo, abasomesa baasigala beewaddeyo okutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusomeramu. Okwewaayo kwabwe eri okukula kwa buli muyizi kweyolekera mu nkolagana yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni peko obedo tye me doro lutino kwan ma padi padi, lupwonye gumede ki keto cwiny gi me neno ni lutino tye ka pwonyo maber. Keto cwinygi I dongo pa lutino kwan nen I kit ma gubedo ka lok kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas atiokisio nuka aidar atukot na egelegela, apotu isisianakinak iswamata kagogongu kanu aitopolor adoketait najokan naka aisisia. Apotu kesi itodutu apodokinit kec kanu apol naka esisiak kere kotoma aineranarakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kilasi ndundu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma talasi, imba'ba eyi awi asi 'baza be angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otuzu. Eyi ma ava sukulu mva alu alu ma zota ma dria ri e'da eyi ma agbatara eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho oburemeezi bw'okureeberera ebibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe, abegyesa bakaguma beehayo okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega. Okwehayo kwabo aha ntunguuka ya buri mwegi, kikarebeka omu nkoragana yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a recent conference addressing educational challenges, the minister emphasized the importance of collaboration among educators. He highlighted that a cohesive approach would significantly enhance their effectiveness in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana olwaliwo gye buvuddeko ng'ayogera ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenjigiriza, minisita yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukolagana mu basomesa. Yakikkaatirizza nti enkola ey'awamu ejja kwongera nnyo ku busobozi bwabwe mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki ma oloko I kom peko me kwan, minista oloko I kom ber pa winye ikin lupwonye. En owaco ni yoo me tic ma ribe twero medo rwom me kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atukonokin napac kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuka asioman, abu eminista kitogogong ajokis naka aiswamanara kiding isisianakinak. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe epone ediope loepedori aitojokar eswamae kec kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani e'yo nzezu e'yo ewaru onita ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, minisita 'da 'ba asi orodri ti icita imba'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Eri ece e'yo kini geri 'bani eyi 'yezu tualu ri nga eyi ma agata kilasia ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane orwabaireho juba, orwabaire nirugamba aha buremeezi bw'eby'obwegyese, minisita akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu beegyesa. Akashoboorora ngu engyenderwaho erikukwatanisa neija kwongyera aha bukugu bwabo omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: Every individual contributes to the success of a company, regardless of their role or background. It is essential to recognize the value of all employees and ensure they are treated with respect and dignity.
lug_prompt: Buli muntu ssekinnoomu ayambako mu buwanguzi bwa kkampuni, awatali kufaayo ku kifo kye oba gye yava. Kya mugaso okutegeera omugaso gw'abakozi bonna n'okukakasa nti bayisibwa n'ekitiibwa n'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Dano weng tye ki gin ma giyubu pi cobo miti pa dul enoni, labongo paro pi ticgi onyo kama gi aa ki iye. Pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa lutic weng ki neno ni kitero gi ki woro ki woro.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan iswamai nuipu kanu akerianut naka ekampuni, araida ejaasi keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ajokis naka eswamak kere ka awanyun ebe eponio ayait kes keda ayongit ka angosibib.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria yi azi nga amuti ma drile suza ma alia, yini ovuzu pari azini engazu ngua ri ma talasi. Eri orodriru 'bani azi'ba dria ma orodri esuzu azini nezu ra kini 'ba yi 'ye inzita azini inzita si.
nyn_prompt: Buri muntu aine eki arikukora aha businguzi bwa kampuni, oihiremu obujunaanizibwa bwe n'oburugo bwe. N'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gw'abakozi boona n'okureeba ngu nibaheebwa ekitiinisa n'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: As communities face unprecedented challenges, many individuals are realizing the importance of collaboration and support. In the midst of uncertainty, they are beginning to recognize the potential for growth and unity.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo, abantu bangi bakitegedde obukulu bw'okukolagana n'okuwagira. Wakati mu butali bukakafu, batandise okulaba obusobozi bw'okukulaakulana n'obumu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lwak tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal, dano mapol tye ka niang ber pa ribe kacel ki kony. I kare me lworo, gitye ka cako neno kero me dongo ki ribe.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuegelegela, ejenete itunga luipu ajokis naka aimorikikina keda agangat. Kokiding na amamus ajenanut, eutasi kesi ageun ajenun apedor naka apol keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo orodri ti icita ni azini atita ni 'diyi esu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, eyi e'do e'yo angu ezoma ni azini ti ecita ni 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikutunga oburemeezi, abantu baingi nibamanya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'obuhwezi. Ahagati y'obutetegyerezibwa, batandikire kureeba obushoboorozi bw'entunguuka n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a strong sense of community and collaboration, it is essential that everyone contributes their time and effort. To achieve our goals and enhance our collective experience, participation is crucial.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkolagana ey'amaanyi mu kitundu n'okukolagana, kya mugaso buli omu okuwaayo obudde n'amaanyi ge. Okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe n'okutumbula obumanyirivu bwaffe obw'awamu, okwenyigiramu kikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Pi medo rwom me ribbe ikin lwak, pire tek ni dano weng omyero gumi cawa gi ki kero gi. Me cobo miti wa ki medo rwom me ngec ma watye kwede, bedo tye pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda aimorikikina, ejok itunga kere aijaikin apak kec keda agogongu. Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi ka aitojokar amisiarit wok, epolok noi aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu tualu tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba dria ma fe sa'wa eyini ri tualu okpo eyini 'diyi pie. Asisile amani 'diyi esuzu azini e'yo amani 'ye tualu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, e'yo 'yezu ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho enkoragana n'okukwatanisa omu bantu, buri omwe ashemereire kutaho obwire bwe n'amaani. Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu n'okutunguura ebyetegyereirwe byaitu,okwejumbamu n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: As they gathered for the meeting, the group expressed their concerns about the obstacles hindering their progress. Recognizing their struggles, the educational officer offered words of encouragement and guidance.
lug_prompt: Nga bakungaana mu lukiiko, ekibinja kyalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe olw'ebibalemesa okugenda mu maaso. Ng'ategeera ebizibu byabwe, omukungu w'ebyenjigiriza yawa ebigambo ebizzaamu amaanyi n'obulagirizi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gucokke pi kacokke, gurup ne gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko matye ka gengo wot gi anyim. I nge niang peko gi, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan owaco lok me cuku cwiny ki tira.
teo_prompt: Neautar kesi atukonokin kanuka airiamunet, apotu egurupu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aitikitik apolokec. Kanu ajenun atiokisio kec, abu eswaman loka asioman ijaik akiro nu isinyikokit keda aicoreta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini okuzu mitingi 'da ma alea, amuti 'da eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo eyi atripi eyini muzu drile ri ma dria. Erini e'yo ewaru yini esuzu 'bori ma e'yosi, azi'ba onita ni 'da fe e'yo asi omiza ni azini imbata ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Kubarikuteeranira omu rukiiko, guruupu ekoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'oburemeezi oburikuzibira entunguuka yaabo. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bwabo, ofiisa w'eby'obwegyese akabahereza ebigambo by'okubagaruramu amaani n'okubahabura.

eng_prompt: Many individuals seek careers that allow them to make a meaningful impact on society. Among these professions, teaching stands out as a vital role that shapes the future of our nation.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya emirimu egibasobozesa okukola enkyukakyuka ey'omugaso mu kitundu. Mu mirimu gino, okusomesa kweyoleka ng'omulimu omukulu oguteekawo ebiseera by'eggwanga lyaffe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol giyenyo tic ma weko gi timo jami mabeco I kabedo gi. I kin tic magi, pwony obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi anyim pa lobo wa.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo aswamisinei nuepedorete aingarakin kes aswam nuejokuka kotoma atutubet. Kotoma aswamisio nu, erai aisisianakin aswam naepol noi naepedori aitolomun ingaren naka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi azi eyini 'diyi nda eyini ani ecozu e'yo orodriru 'yezu ongulumu eyi ma alea ra. Azi 'diyi ma eselea, imba'ba eyi azi okporu kari amavile 'di ma ewu drialeri 'bapi ra ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaronda emirimo erikubabaasisa kukora omugasho omu bantu. Omu mirimo egi, okwegyesa nikweyongyera nk'omurimo gw'omugasho ogurikukora aha biro by'eihanga ryaitu eby'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Many educators are seeking additional ways to enhance their financial stability. One popular option is to explore entrepreneurial ventures outside of the classroom.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi banoonya engeri endala ey'okutumbula ensimbi zaabwe. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kunoonyereza ku mirimu gy'obusuubuzi ebweru w'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me medo cente gi. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye me nongo yoo me timo biacara I ngee gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Eutasi isisianakinak luipu aimo iponesio lu iyatakina kanu aitojokar ejautene kec loka ikapun. Adiopet aseunet naejenara noi ngesi aingic aswamisinei nuka agwelanar kokinga naka atukot.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi geri azi eyi nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma robia ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi 'bani lele 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo tujari 'yezu 'diyi ondazu kilasia amve.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibasherura oburyo obundi bw'okwongyera aha ntatsya yaabo. Ekintu kimwe ekirikumanywa munonga n'okushwijuma eby'obushubuzi aheeru y'eishomero.

eng_prompt: In today's economy, the cost of living has skyrocketed, making it increasingly difficult for families to make ends meet. Many households find themselves struggling to cover essential expenses with just one source of income.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino, ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnye nnyo, ekizibuwaza amaka okweyimirizaawo. Amaka mangi geesanga nga galwana okusobola okukola ku byetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo nga galina ensibuko y'ensimbi emu yokka.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim me kare-ni, wel cente me kwo omede malo tutwal, ma oweko odoko tek tutwal ki gangi me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Gangi mapol nongo tek tutwal me culu pi jami ma gimito ki yoo acel keken me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, apolor etiai loka aijar, ido etionikinit ikalia aijar. Ipu ikalia lu ewanyunitos ebe etiono aitodolikin iboro lu itwasamao keda epone ediope loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do 'diyi ma alea, aje idri nyazaniri tu uru, erini fezu familia eyini aa'zu ewaru. Aku karakara eyi eyi esu eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ofezu geri robia esuzu alu si.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entatsya y'erizooba, ebbeeyi y'ebintu eyeyongyeire munonga, ekirikugumira amaka okureeberera ebyetaago byago. Amaka maingi nigashanga gaine oburemeezi bw'okushashurira ebintu ebikuru n'oburugo bumwe bw'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Many teachers face financial challenges that can impact their families' well-being. By participating in agriculture, they can secure essential resources for their households.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi basanga ebizibu by'ensimbi ebiyinza okukosa embeera y'amaka gaabwe. Nga beenyigira mu bulimi n'obulunzi, basobola okufuna ebyetaago by'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol ginongo peko me lim ma twero balo kwo pa gangi gi. Ka gubedo lupur, gitwero nongo jami ma mite pi gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu ejaas keda atiokisio nu ikapun nu epedorete aitolitol aijar naka ikalia kec. Kowai lo akoru, epedorete kesi adumun iboro lu itwasamaete ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini ani familia eyivile 'diyini aa'zu muke ku. E'yo agirikica niri 'yerisi, eyi eco afa orodriru familia eyivile 'diyini 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abegyesa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente oburikubaasa kuteganisa amaka gaabo. Barikwejumba omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, nibabaasa kutunga ebintu by'omugasho omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite his attempts to assert authority, the team remained skeptical of his leadership. Trust had eroded over time, leaving them hesitant to comply with his directives.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde yagezaako okulaga obuyinza, ttiimu yasigala ebuusabuusa obukulembeze bwe. Obwesige bwali bukendedde ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, ekyabaleetera okubuusabuusa okugoberera ebiragiro bye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en oteme me bedo ki twero, lutela ne pud gubedo ki akala-kala I kom telane. Gen orweny ikare ma kare okato, ma oweko gubedo ki lworo me lubu cik mege.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu ngesi kotam aitigogong apedorosioke, apotu etimu kongeroto engarenoneke. Apotu amunokina kibiroros kotoma apak naepol noi, ido abu kojalak kesi epalunit aitup aicoreta ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro o'bizu okpo e'dazu ra ti, amuti 'da awi asi otiza be driceza eriniri ma dria. Asi'baza 'ba eyi ma eselea ri esi ra sa'wa driasi, eyini ani ava ako fe eyini azita eyivile 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwe kworeka obushoborozi, tiimu ekaba etarikwikiriza obwebembezi bwe. Obwesigye bukaba bwahwaireho bwanyima y'obwire, ekyabarekire barikutiina kukuratira ebiragiro bye.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents have highlighted the increasing tensions between local communities and forest officials. As a result, forest officers need to be guarded against people's attacks.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko biraga obunkenke obweyongera wakati w'abantu b'omu kitundu n'abakungu b'ebibira. N'ekyavaamu, abakuumi b'ebibira beetaaga okukuumibwa okuva ku bulumbaganyi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki onyuto telle matye I kin lutedero ki lutic me bunga. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me bunga omyero ki gwok gi i kom mony pa dano.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuiswamasi pac itodunitos engunget lo iyata kiding itunga keda eswamak lu amagoron. Kanuka ngun, ekot ayuarite ipolisin luka amagoron kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo erita ako ni tupi 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea azi'ba jere ni 'diyi pie ri ra. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma mba azi'ba jere ni 'diyi ma ta e'yo 'ba eyini ecozu eyi amvuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ebyabaireho obwahati, nibyoreka obunkenke obweyongyeire ahagati y'abantu b'omubyaro hamwe n'abakungu b'ebibira. N'ekyarugiremu,abakuumi b'ebibira bashemereire kurindwa okurumbwa abantu.

eng_prompt: The community has deep roots in this region, with generations of families calling it home. Their connection to the land is woven into their traditions and way of life.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kirina emirandira egy'amaanyi mu kitundu kino, era ab'omu maka mangi bakiyita amaka gaabwe. Enkolagana yaabwe ku ttaka eryo yeesigamiziddwa ku nnono zaabwe n'engeri gye beeyisaamu.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ki tyen mapol tutwal I but lobo man, ma pol pa gangi gi lwongo ni gang gi. Ribbe meggi ki ngom tye I tekwaro gi ki kit me kwogi.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi atutubet ngin keda iraan luepolok noi kotoma aiboisit kana. Ejai arucokina kec keda alupok ngun kotoma inonosio kec keda iponesiokec luka aijar.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ma ola eyi angu 'di ma alea sa'wa driasi, familia eyi ma eselea 'diyi angu 'di omve aku. E'yo yini yi ecipi nyaku be 'diyi e'bi yi ma a'bi yi ma alia azini geri yini aa'zu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kiine emizi y'amaani omu kicweka eki, kandi amaka maingi nigakiyita eka yaabo. Enkoragana yaabo n'eitaka eri omu migyenzo yaabo hamwe n'emitwarize yaabo.

eng_prompt: After much discussion and deliberation, the community leaders gathered to address the ongoing issues with the newcomer. They agreed that any support they offered would come with certain expectations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okuteesa ennyo, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukola ku nsonga ezigenda mu maaso n'omuggya. Bakkiriziganya nti obuyambi bwonna bwe bawa bujja kubaamu ebisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki tam mapol, lutela me kabedo gucokke me lok I kom peko matye I kom ngat manyen ni. Guwinye ni kony mo keken ma gimiyo bino ki gen mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda aomisio nuipu, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos aitemokin atiokisio nuejaas keda itunganan yenitetet. Apotu kesi kocamanaros ebe adio agangat na ijaikinio kes ebuni keda iboro lu eomitai ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini egata ma vutia, drice'ba ongulumu ni 'diyi tra eyi e'yo mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi pie. Eyi ai ra kini atita ci eyini fe ri nga emu e'yo azi eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuteesa munonga, abebembezi b'ekyanga bakateerana kukora aha nshonga ezirikugyenda omu maisho n'omutuura gye. Bakaikirizana ngu obuhwezi bwona obubarikuha nibuza kwija n'ebiteekateeko ebimwe.

eng_prompt: Before finalizing the sale, the buyers requested documentation to verify the property's history. To proceed with the transaction, the sellers were informed that they must provide necessary legal documents.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannamaliriza kutunda, abaguzi baasabye ebiwandiiko okukakasa ebyafaayo by'ettaka. Okusobola okugenda mu maaso n'okutunda, abatunzi baategeezebwa nti balina okuwaayo ebiwandiiko by'amateeka ebyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gutyeko wilo jami ne, luwil ne gupenyo pi karatac me niang kit ma jami ne gubedo kwede con. Pi mede ki biacara enoni, kiwaco ki lucat ni omyero gukel waraga ma mite malube ki cik.
teo_prompt: Erongo engetakina agwelanar, apotu agwelak kilipata apapula kanu ajenun akiro nukolo nuka iboro. Kanu ainyikokin agwelanar, aponi olimokinai agwelanarak ebe ibusakinit kesi aijaikin apapulai nu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eyi awini e'yo afa oziza niri de ku, 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi a'i kokobi eyi e'dazu e'yo angu 'da ni 'diyi ma dria ra. Muzu tujari 'yezu drile, 'ba lu 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi dri kini le eyi ma eji kokobi azita palaa 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatakatandikire kuguza ebintu, abaguzi bakashaba ebihandiiko by'okureeba ebyafaayo by'eitaka. Okugyenda omu maisho n'okuguza ebintu, abashubuzi bakamanyisibwa ngu bashemereire kureeta ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: Recent developments in local governance have sparked intense debates among community leaders. As a result, the upcoming election is drawing significant attention from both residents and political analysts.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana eyaakabaawo mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu ereeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bakulembeze b'ebitundu. N'ekivuddemu, okulonda okujja kusikiriza nnyo abatuuze n'abakugu mu byobufuzi.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme cokcok-ki I tela me tedero okelo laro lok I kin lutela me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, yer matye kabino ni tye ka kelo miti madit tutwal ki bot lwak kacel ki lutela me cungu iwi bye.
teo_prompt: Apol naka apugan naka atutubena nes eyaunit epeget loepol noi kiding engarenok luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, eutasi aseo na ebunit aitelekaar itunga keda lu engicete akiro nuka politikis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru local governance ma alia 'diyi eji agbatara okporu 'diyi drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, opeta emupi ri ni asi feza angiri eji engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu tualu 'ba e'yo politiki ni ma eti ondapi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'obwebembezi bw'ebyaro, ereesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu beebembezi b'ebyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, akaruuru akarikwiija nikareetaho okwetegyereza kw'amaani kuruga omu batuuragye hamwe n'abacencuzi b'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: As the news spread about the impending crisis, many people were left in a state of confusion and fear. Questions began to arise about the government's communication and transparency regarding the situation.
lug_prompt: Amawulire bwe gaasaasaana ku buzibu obwali bujja, abantu bangi baalekebwa mu kusoberwa n'okutya. Ebibuuzo byatandika okuvaayo ku mpuliziganya ya gavumenti n'obwerufu ku bikwata ku mbeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea ne okato I kom peko matye kabino ni, dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng ki lworo. Lapeny ocake I kom kit ma gamente tye ka lok kwede ki ada I kom ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Neakwarata iyemuto nuikamunitos ationis na ebunit, apotu itunga luipu kojalakinos kotoma ationis keda akuriau. Apotu aingiseta kogeutu aibwo kanuikamunitos aineranara keda aica naka apugan kanuikamunitos ejautene.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo ewaru emupi 'diyi ma dria ri ni i erezurisi, 'ba karakara eyi awi asi otiza azini orisi. E'yo eyi e'do efu e'yo gamete ni e'yo nzezu e'yo 'da ma dria kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amakuru g'oburemeezi oburikwija kujanjaara, abantu baingi bakasigara nibabuzabuzibwa n'okutiina. Ebibuuzo bikatandika kubaho aha nshonga y'empurizagana ya gavumenti hamwe n'oburingaaniza aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Despite our repeated questions, he remained unusually secretive about the project details. We couldn't shake the feeling that he was concealing something important.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twamubuuza ebibuuzo enfunda n'enfunda, yasigala mu kyama ku bikwata ku pulojekiti. Twali tetusobola kwewala ndowooza nti alina ekintu ekikulu ky'atukweka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wapenye lapeny mapol, en omede ki bedo ki mung I kom lok matut I kom yub ne. Onongo pe watwero weko tam ni en tye ka kano gin mo ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu sio aingitingit, abu ngesi kosalak aiyeyea nuikamunitos akiro nuka epurojekt. Mam sio apedori alemar aomisioit ebe euta ngesi aingop ibore yen epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile zita 'diyi ma talasi, eri awi siri e'yo otita 'da ma dria 'diyi ma dria. Ama econi ndra e'yo egazu kini eri afa azi orodriru ozi ni ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebibuuzo ebyabaire bigumizemu, akaguma aine ebihama ebirikukwata aha purogyekiti. Tukaba tutarikubasa kwihaho ekiteekateeko ngu akaba ayesherekire ekintu ky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: The investigation revealed no evidence to support the claims made by the witnesses. It's clear that the allegations are unfounded and misleading.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kwalaga nti tewali bujulizi bukakasa ebyo abajulizi bye baayogera. Kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebigambibwa tebirina musingi era bya kubuzaabuza.
ach_prompt: Kwed ne pe onyuto caden mo keken ma cwako lok pa lucaden. Nen atyer kamaleng ni adot ne peke ki tyen lok matir dok tye ka bwolo dano.
teo_prompt: Mam aingic abu odum nuitogogongitos akiro nuka ajenak. Ecai cut ebe mam aitoroneta ngun itogogongoritai ido itoroniarete itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'da esu e'yo azi ecopi e'dapi kini 'ba sadini ru 'diyi 'yo e'yo 'da ra ni yo. Eri e'da kililiru kini e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma vuti yo dika eyi 'ba eyi ma aza ko.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza tikuretsire bujurizi bwona oburikworeka ebyabaire nibigambwa abajurizi. Nikyoreka butunu ngu ebirikugambwa tibiine musingye kandi nibihabya abantu.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated between the two factions, many began to question the motives driving the discord. In the midst of growing unrest, community leaders called for an investigation into the underlying issues.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera wakati w'ebiwayi ebibiri, bangi baatandika okubuusabuusa ebigendererwa ebiviirako obutakkaanya. Wakati mu butabanguko obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baasabye wabeewo okunoonyereza ku nsonga eziri emabega.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I kin dul aryo egoni, dano mapol gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom tyen lok ma oweko apoka-poka obedo tye. Ikare me lweny matye kamede, lutela me kabedo gulego ni myero kikwed lok matye.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor ingungeta kiding atukona ngun iarei, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aingit alosikineta nuepedorete ayangaun ingungeta. Kotoma apol naka amumu, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kilipata aingic akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu esele iri 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Ngiringiri ma talasi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai 'bani e'yo nde ma eti ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Obutaikirizana ku bwayeyongyeire ahagati y'ebibiina bibiri, baingi bakatandika kubuza ebigyendererwa ebirikureetaho obutaikirizana. Ahagati y'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ekyanga bakashaba okucondooza aha nshonga ezirikubureetaho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions and proposals, the concerns raised by the team have not garnered the attention they deserve. Frustration has grown as attempts to escalate the matter have repeatedly fallen on deaf ears.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi n'ebiteeso, okweraliikirira okwaleetebwa ttiimu tekufunye kufaayo kwe kusaana. Obwennyamivu bweyongedde olw'okugezaako okwongera ku nsonga eno okulemererwa enfunda n'enfunda.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kinywako lok ki tam mapol, peko ma dul enoni okelo pe gunongo tam ma mite pigi. Cwer cwiny tye ka medde pien tute me medo peko ne obedo ka poto atura.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu ineresinei keda aomisio nuipu, mam ationis na abu etimu kitodu apodokinit kwape ibusakinit. Apolor aiyalongong naarai atamakinitai aiyatakin akiro ngun konye mam aponi kopupokinai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini egata karakara 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo asi otiza amuti 'da ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esuni nga e'yo eyini le 'diyi ku. E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'di ma omgbo otuzu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra a'disiku 'ba e'de e'yo 'di ma dria te.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okuhanuura kwingi n'ebiteiso, ebirikuteganisa tiimu tibiratungire okurebererwa oku bishemereire. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'okugira ngu okuteeraho kwongyera amaani omu nshonga egyo kigumire.

eng_prompt: Many people believe they have a right to claim ownership over this territory. However, the legal documents clearly state otherwise.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti balina eddembe okwewozaako ku ttaka lino. Kyokka, ebiwandiiko by'amateeka biraga bulungi ekirala.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni gitye ki twero me waco ni ngom man meg gi. Kadi bed kumeno, karatac me cik waco lok mapat.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe ejaasi kesi keda apedor na alimun ebe eraasi kesi ikulepek aiboisit kana. Konye, itodunitos aiwadikaeta nuka ikisila akiro nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini eyi ma drilemgbo angu 'di ma dria ci. Kani si, kokobi azita palaa 'diyi ece e'yo nduni ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu baine obugabe bw'okugamba ngu eitaka eri n'eryaabo. Kwonka ebihandiiko by'ebiragiro nibyoreka butunu ekindi.

eng_prompt: In any group dynamic, it's often the most self-serving individuals who manipulate situations to their advantage. Their actions can escalate tensions and create an environment ripe for discord.
lug_prompt: Mu kibiina kyonna, abantu abeeyagaliza bokka be bakozesa embeera mu ngeri ebaganyula. Ebikolwa byabwe bisobola okwongera okusika omuguwa n'okutondawo embeera ejjudde obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, pol kare dano ma paro pigi kengi aye tiyo ki jami me nongo ber pa gi. Timgi twero medo telle ki kelo apoka-poka.
teo_prompt: Kowai kalo egurupu, eraasi duc itunga lu ekotos ikulepek bon lu itwasamaete ejautene kanu ajokis kec. Epedorete aswamisio kec aiyatakin aiyalongong kosodete aitolomun ejautene loepedori aitolomun ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, eri tutuni 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi e'yo eyi 'yepi eyi ma orodri esuzu 'diyi. Yeta yini 'diyi eco e'yo ewaru ma omgbo otu dika eyi eco e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu guruupu yoona, abantu abarikweyendeza nibo barikukoresa embeera kukoresa ebyetengo byabo. Ebikorwa byabo nibibaasa kwongyera obwimukiriro n'obutaikirizana.

eng_prompt: Local authorities conducted an inspection of the area and discovered several safety hazards. As a result, they decided to inform the community about the urgent need for improvements.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo baakola okwekebejja mu kitundu ne bazuula ebintu eby'enjawulo eby'obulabe eri eby'okwerinda. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okutegeeza abantu ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ennongoosereza.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gu ngiyo kabedo eni dok gunongo jami mapol ma twero balo kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tam gi me miyo ngec bot lwak I kom miti me yubu jami I kabedo gi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet ongicata aiboisit ngin kosodete adumun atiokisio nuipu nuka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi ocamutu aitijenikin itunga nuikamunitos eipud loka aitojokaario.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi andri angu 'da ma alea azini eyi esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi angu 'da ma agei tema ni. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai 'ba ongulumu eyi ma dria e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo eyi otuzu mbeleru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakakyebera ekyanga kandi bashanga ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kurabanisamu eby'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu kumanyisa abantu ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In the face of adversity, only the brave remained to defend their home. Those who lacked the courage to stand their ground chose to abandon their hopes and dreams.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekaganye n'ebizibu, abazira bokka be baasigalawo okulwanirira amaka gaabwe. Abo abataalina buvumu kuyimirirawo baasalawo okusuulawo essuubi lyabwe n'ebirooto byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko, oteka keken aye odong me gwoko gang gi. Jo ma pe gubedo ki tekcwiny me cung I kom lokgi guweko gen ki lekgi.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loetiono noi, lu agogong bon kesi apotu kosalakisi aigang ore kec. Ngul lu amamete keda atiting naka aibwo kotupitete akiro kec apotu kojalakisi amuno kec keda airujasia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ma drilea, lu 'ba asi okporu 'diyi awi yi vile aku agei tezu. Ba asi mbapi pa sozu yi ma paria ku 'diyi pe asi 'baza yini azini orobi yini 'diyi kuzu ja.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abazira bonka nibo bagumire kurinda amaka gaabo. Abo abaabaire batiine bumanzi bw'okuhamira aha nshonga zaabo, bakasharamu kureka amatsiko n'ebirooto byabo.

eng_prompt: Research has shown a strong correlation between forest cover and local climate patterns. By enhancing the green cover in the area, we can potentially influence weather conditions positively.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'ebibira n'embeera y'obudde. Mu kwongera omutindo gw'obutonde mu kitundu, tusobola okukyusa embeera y'obudde mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto kubbe matek ikin bunga ki kit ma piny tye kwede. Ka wamedo rwom me lum I kabedo enuni, ci watwero loko kit ma piny tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe ejai arucokina naepol noi kiding amagoron keda ekuse keda ekuse loka ikwamin. Kowai lo aiyatakin ekwam lo ekwam katutubet, ipedori oni aitojokar ejautene loka ikwamin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece ti ecita okporu oce ma ta mbaza ma eselea angu mile angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri. Angu ori eyi ma ta mbazu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu risi, ama eco e'yo angu mile ni 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka okukwatanisa ahagati y'ebibira n'embeera y'obwire. Okutunguura eby'obuhangwa omu kyanga, nitubaasa kuhindura embeera y'obwire omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, it is crucial to consider the long-term consequences of our actions. Finding a way to address our differences through dialogue can lead to more sustainable solutions.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano, kikulu okulowooza ku biyinza okuva mu bikolwa byaffe. Okufuna engeri y'okugonjoolamu enjawukana zaffe nga tuyita mu kuteesa kisobola okuleetawo eby'okugonjoola eby'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki me jami ma watimo I kare me anyim. Nongo yoo me tyeko tele matye I kinwa I yoo me laro lok twero kelo yoo me cobo peko matye pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka ingungeta, ejokuna noi aomoom nuepedorete atakanun kotoma aswamisiowok. Aimo epone loka aitemokin atiokisio kosi kopone loka aineranara epedori ayangaun aitemokineta nuka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru e'yo ama 'yeta eyini 'diyi ma e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa ezu ri ma dria. Geri azi esuzu e'yo ama esele cozu 'diyi ma aza kozu geri e'yo onzeza vurisi ri eco fe e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ewu drile ri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutaikirizana, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha birikubaasa kuruga omu bikorwa byaitu. Okushanga omuringo gw'okutereeza obutaikirizana bwaitu kurabira omu kugaaniira, nikibaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, wood has been a fundamental resource for construction and crafting. Its versatility and abundance make it an essential material in various industries.
lug_prompt: Ebyafaayo byonna biraga nti enku zibadde za mugaso nnyo mu kuzimba n'okukola ebintu eby'emikono. Enkola yaayo ey'enjawulo n'obungi bwaayo bigifuula ekintu ekikulu mu makolero ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro pa dano, bao obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic me gedo ki yubu jami. Tye ki jami mapol tutwal ma weko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, erai abawoi ibore yenepol noi kanu adukio keda aitolom iboro. Apedorit ngesi aswam iboro luipu ido epatana aswam kotoma acuman nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, mbawu ebi ovu afa orodriru jo sizu azini afa edele drisi 'diyi edezu. E'yo erini aa'zu afa ndundu eyi be tre ri fe erini aa'zu afa orodriru tu okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, embaho zitwire nizikoresibwa munonga omu kwombeka n'okukora eby'emikono. Okuba erikukoresibwa munonga n'okuba erikukoresibwa munonga nikikureetera kuba eky'omugasho omu makorero gatari gamwe na gamwe.

eng_prompt: After years of conflict and negotiation, the government has finally decided to reclaim the territory for development. The once-thriving community now faces the harsh reality of displacement.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'obukuubagano n'enteeseganya, gavumenti emalirizza okuzzaawo ettaka ly'enkulaakulana. Ekitundu ekyali kikulaakulana kati kyolekedde embeera enzibu ey'okusengulwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki winye, gamente dong omoko tamme me gamo ngom eni pi dongo lobo. Kabedo macon ma onongo tye ka dongo dong kombedi tye ka nongo peko me kobo dano ki I kabedogi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ingungeta keda ipegeta, adaun apugan aseun ainyakar alupok kanu apol. Itunga luka atutubet kangin luapol noi kwana etereikina keda ationis naka aibwot.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ngiringiri ni azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma vutia, gamete asizu asi 'du e'yo angu 'da 'duzu angu ezoma ni. Ongulumu andra oku drile 'diyi curu'do e'yo ewaru 'bani yi ofuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri esu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutabanguko n'okuteesa, gavumenti eshaziremu kugaruraho eitaka ry'entunguuka. Abantu abaabaire nibatunguuka obwahati nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okuruga omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of meticulous planning and preparation, the team set out to explore the vast terrain. Their goal was to gather data and assess the resources available in the region.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bategese n'okwetegeka, ttiimu yasitula okunoonyereza ku ttaka eddene. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kukungaanya bubaka n'okwekenneenya eby'obugagga ebiri mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki yubbe maber tutwal, dul pa dano ne gucako tic me ngiyo kabedo man madit tutwal-li. Mitigi obedo me coko ngec ki niang jami ma tye ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, apotu etimu kogeutu airereor aiboisit naepol noi. Alosikinetekec arai aituk akiro ka airereor iboro lu ejaas atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi 'yezu kililiru azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da e'do angu 'da ma ale andrizu. Asisile yiniri ndra e'yo yi trazu azini lonyi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera n'okweteekateekyera kurungi, tiimu ekatandika kurambura eitaka rihango. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikaba kiri okurundaana ebihandiiko n'okushwijuma eby'obugaiga ebiri omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: After years of negotiations and legal disputes, the local authorities finally reached a decision. In a surprising turn of events, the government granted him the rights he had long sought.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa okumala emyaka n'obukuubagano mu mateeka, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baatuuka ku kusalawo. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, gavumenti yamuwa eddembe lye yali amaze ebbanga ng'anoonya.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye pi mwaki mapol ki laro lok me cik, lutela me tedero dong gumoko tamgi. I aloka-loka ma obedo me ngeng tutwal, gamente omiye twero ma en obedo ka yenyo pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ipegeta keda ingungeta luka ikisila, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kodolokisi aseunet. Koipone kalo itegelikina abu apugan koinak ngesi apedorosio nu ekoto ngesi adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza eli karakara eyi ma vutia azini ngiringiri azita palaa 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asizu e'yo 'du ra. E'yo yi ojazu osutasi, gamete fe eri dri drilemgbo erini le sawa ezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteisa hamwe n'obutaikirizana omu biragiro, ab'obushoborozi aha kyaro bakahika aha kusharamu. Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza,gavumenti ekamuha obugabe obuyabaire atwire naasherura.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and community concerns, church leaders decided it was essential to discuss the future of their services. They arranged a meeting with the minister to address the reopening plans.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira kw'abantu, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa baasazeewo nti kikulu nnyo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'okusinza kwabwe eby'omu maaso. Baategese olukungaana ne minisita okwogera ku nteekateeka z'okuggulawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki peko ma lwak tye kwede, lutela me kanica gumoko ni pire tek tutwal me nywako lok I kom anyim pa lega gi. Guyubu kacoke ki minista me lok I kom yub me yabo tic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongongo naka itunga, apotu engarenok lu ekanisa kitutuboto ebe ejokuna aitemitem nuikamunitos ingaren naka aijaanakinio kec. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamunet keda eminisita kanu aitemitem nuka apukor bobo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu asi otiza ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi 'du e'yo kini eri orodriru agbatara gbazu e'yo ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi otu mitingi minisita eyi pie agbatara gbazu otita eyi ma ti zizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, abeebembezi b'ekanisa bakasharamu ngu n'eky'omugasho kuhanuura aha biro by'omumaisho by'okushaba kwabo. Bakatebekanisa orukiiko na minisita kugamba aha nteekateeka y'okwiguraho.

eng_prompt: Many religious organizations seek diverse ways to support their community and mission. As a result, they often explore various avenues for financial sustainability.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'enzikiriza bingi byenoonya engeri ez'enjawulo okuyambako ebitundu byabwe n'emirimu gyabwe. N'ekivuddemu, batera okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okuyimirizaawo eby'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Dule me dini mapol giyenyo yoo mapat-pat me konyo kabedo gi ki tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare giyenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta lu ediini luipu emoete iponesio lu egangitos itunga kec keda aswam kec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aimo iponesio luegelegela luka aidar ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma karakara eyi geri ndundu eyi nda atita fezu ongulumu eyivile 'diyini azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ma robia esuzu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'amadiini ebingi nibisherura emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okuhwera abantu baayo n'emirimo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, buriijo nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguuka omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In the face of unprecedented adversity, many communities have rallied together to support one another. Their unwavering faith has inspired them to find new ways to share their beliefs and connect with others.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu ebitabangawo, ebitundu bingi bikungaanidde wamu okuyambagana. Okukkiriza kwabwe okunywevu kubawa amaanyi okunoonya engeri empya ez'okugabana enzikiriza zaabwe n'okukwatagana n'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko mapol tutwal, lwak mapol guribbe kacel me konyo luwotgi. Niye gi ma pe lokke okonyogi me nongo yoo manyen me nywako niye gi ki kubbe ki joo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loetiono noi loka atiokisio, apotu itunga luipu kimorikikinos aigangakin yenice. Eyuunikec loepol nes isinyikokit kesi adumun iwaitin luitetiak lu inera keda iyuunikec keda luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'dileri ma drilea, ongulumu karakara eyi tra eyi tualu atita fezu eyi ma eselea. Yi ma a'ita okporu ri fe eyini ava geri o'diru 'diyi esuzu eyi ma a'ita eyi awazu azini eyi ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi obw'omutaano, abantu baingi bakwatanisize kuhwerana. Okwikiriza kwabo okutahinduka, kubaremesereize kuronda emiringo misya y'okugabana eby'okwikiriza kwabo n'okukwatanisa n'abandi.

eng_prompt: In an age dominated by technology and connectivity, traditional forms of worship are evolving. Many individuals are seeking spiritual solace and community online, turning to various platforms for guidance and support.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe ogufugibwa tekinologiya n'okukwatagana, engeri z'okusinza ez'ennono zikyuka. Abantu bangi banoonya okubudaabudibwa mu by'omwoyo n'abantu ku mutimbagano, okudda ku mikutu egy'enjawulo okufuna okulambikibwa n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tet manyen ki kubbe, yoo me woro me tekwaro tye ka dongo. Dano mapol gitye ka yenyo kwe cwiny ki kabedo me kubbe I intanet, kun gidok I kabedo mapat-pat me nongo tira ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naepol noi naka etatai loakwana keda arucokina, eutasi iponesio luka einono luka ailip aijulakin. Eutasi itunga luipu aimo aisinyikokinio ka atutubet kolago, alosit aiboisio nuegelegela kanu aicoreta ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea e'yo tekenologia ni azini e'yo oyuza ni 'diyisi, e'yo inzita ni a'di ni 'diyi e'do curu'do e'do. Ba karakara eyi asi omiza geri e'yo aitanisi azini ongulumu eyini 'diyi nda geri oli aliasi, eyini muzu pari ndundu eyi ma alea imbata esuzu azini atita esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu oburikukuratirwa tekinorogye hamwe n'empurizagana, emiringo y'okuramya ey'obuhangwa eriyo neetunguuka. Abantu baingi nibaronda okuhuumurizibwa omu by'omwoyo hamwe n'abantu aha mitimbagano, barikuza aha mikutu etari emwe n'emwe kutunga obuhwezi n'obuhabuzi.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and struggle, communities have turned to their faith for solace and guidance. Recognizing the challenges faced by their congregations, church leaders have stepped forward to offer support.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okulwanagana, abantu baddukidde mu nzikiriza zaabwe okufuna okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi. Olw'okumanya ebisoomooza ebibiina byabwe bye bisanga, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa bavuddeyo okuwa obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, lwak olokke bot dini gi me nongo kwe cwiny ki tira. Pien guniang peko ma kanica gi tye kanongo, lutela me kanica gukati anyim me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus aijen ka atiokisio, apotu itunga olototo aiyuunikec kanu agangat keda aingarenikinio. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas ikuristayon kec, apotu engarenok lu ekanisa kitolomutu agangat.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, ongulumu eyi oja eyi ma aita eyi vu asi omiza esuzu azini imbata esuzu. E'yo ewaru kanisa eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi efu drile atita fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa hamwe n'oburemeezi, abantu bahindukire aha nyikiriza yaabo kutunga okuhuumurizibwa n'obuhabuzi. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu amakanisa gaabo garikurabamu, abeebembezi b'ekanisa baizireyo okugabira obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: As we assess the healthcare infrastructure in Uganda, it's important to understand the distribution of medical facilities across the country. Specifically, we need to identify the number of regional referral hospitals available to serve the population.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to spread across the globe, health officials are urging the public to remain vigilant. Recent studies indicate a significant rise in cases, highlighting the ongoing threat of the virus.

eng_prompt: In light of recent public feedback and changing societal needs, it has become increasingly clear that current service delivery methods may not be meeting the expectations of citizens. A comprehensive evaluation of existing systems is essential to ensure effectiveness and accessibility.

lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyobufuzi yeeyongera okukyuka, bannansi bangi beetegefu okuwa endowooza zaabwe. Olw'ebibiina eby'enjawulo okwetegekera kakuyege, okweraliikirira kweyongedde mu ggwanga lyonna.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aidar ka aitemonokin, apotu sio ijautu ikokutuwok toma akwap. Konye, apakio nuapotu sio asesenata ngesi, apotu sio awanyutu ebe ebuni ngesi adumun atiokisio nuegelegela.

eng_prompt: I've always been amazed by the way he thinks outside the box. Whether it's drawing, building, or coming up with stories, he never fails to impress me.
lug_prompt: Nneewuunya nnyo engeri gy'alowoozaamu. Ka kibeere okukuba ebifaananyi, okuzimba, oba okujja n'emboozi, talemererwa kunkwasa kitiibwa.

nyn_prompt: Ntwire nintangazibwa omuringo ogu arikuteekamu ebiteekateeko ebitari bya buriijo. Yaaba n'okuteera ebishushani, okwombeka, nainga okureetaho emboozi, tarikubaasa kuremwa kunshemeza.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and preparation, the team is finally ready to move forward. All the necessary materials and strategies have been finalized, and we are excited to share our message with the public.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okwetegekera, ttiimu kati yeetegefu okugenda mu maaso. Ebintu byonna ebyetaagibwa n'obukodyo biwedde, era tuli basanyufu okugabana obubaka bwaffe n'abantu.

lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da ngonde muzu drile. Afa dria lele 'diyi azini otuta dria 'diyi de 'bo, dika ama ayikosi o'duko amani 'diyi awazu o'bi yi be.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address the growing budget deficit, officials have been discussing various fiscal measures. As part of this strategy, the government is introducing new taxes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola ebbula ly'embalirira eryeyongera, abakungu babadde bateesa ku nkola z'ebyensimbi ez'enjawulo. Ng'emu ku nteekateeka eno, gavumenti ereeta emisolo emipya.

eng_prompt: I've been curious about your background and where you grew up. Can you tell me more about your hometown?
lug_prompt: Njagala nnyo okumanya ebikwata ku bulamu bwo ne gye wakulira.

teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos aijarakon keda aiboisit naepolounit jo.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to spread and impact our communities, it is crucial that we take decisive action. The health and safety of our population depend on our collective response to this crisis.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okusaasaana n'okukosa ebitundu byaffe, kikulu nnyo okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu. Obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu baffe bisinziira ku ngeri gye tukwatamu ekizibu kino.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye kamede ki nya I kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal ni omyero watim gin mo. Yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak wa jenge I kom kit ma wabitero kwede peko man.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka naka ekorona aisiarakin kosodi aitolitol aiboisio wok, ejokuna noi aswam nuepedorete oni. Angaleu keda ayuara naka itunga wok ejai kotupitete epone loebeitor oni aitemokin ationis na.

eng_prompt: In recent months, numerous reports have surfaced detailing excessive force used by law enforcement during protests. As a result, several human rights organizations have decided to take legal action against the police.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, alipoota nnyingi zifulumye nga ziraga amaanyi agasukkiridde agakozesebwa abakuumaddembe mu kwekalakaasa. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'eddembe ly'obuntu ebiwerako bisazeewo okutwala poliisi mu mbuga z'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, adwoki me kwed mapol okatti ma nyutu kit ma abili otiyo kwede ki teko ma lamal tutwal I kare me jemo. Macalo adwogi ne, dule mapol ma neno lok kom twero pa dano gumoko tamgi me cako tic i kom abili.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, apotu iripotan luipu kitodiasi nuikamunitos agogong naepol noi na itwasamaete ipolisin kapak naka aidiya. Kanuka ngun, aseutu iriongeta luipu luka apedorosio nuka itunga aitepesen ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, o'duko karakara efu e'yo okpo 'bani 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ayu sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara driwala o'biyini 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'duzu polisi yi ma rua.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, ripoota nyingi zikozirwe ezirikworeka amaani maingi agakozesibwa ab'eby'obutegyeki omu bwire bw'okwesharinga. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore ebirikurwanirira obugabe bw'abantu bikasharamu kutwarira poriisi omu kooti.

eng_prompt: After a long and contentious campaign season, the votes were finally tallied and verified. The community eagerly awaited the announcement from the district returning office.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya akalulu okumala ebbanga eddene era nga waliwo enkaayana, obululu bwamala ne bubalibwa era ne bukakasibwa. Ekitundu kyalindirira n'obwagazi ekirangiriro okuva mu woofiisi y'omubaka wa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac me bito kwir ma opong ki apoka-poka, ki kwano wel kwir dok kimoko. Lwak gubedo kakuru kwena ma aa ki bot lador dul me district.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aisup aseeta, aponi kowai lo aimar aseeta kosodete aanyun. Apotu itunga idarakisi alimoret naka eyapiesi loka edisitrikt.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani ti odaza 'yezu ezu azini a'di 'dizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba la asizu voti yi azini 'ba andri ra. Ongulumu 'da te e'yo aziza engazu ofisi distrikiti ma drilea ri vu avasi.

eng_prompt: To ensure we have a robust defense strategy, we have assembled a skilled group of professionals. Each member brings a wealth of experience and expertise to our legal operations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti tulina enkola ennungi ey'ebyokwerinda, tukuŋŋaanyizza ekibinja ky'abakugu abakugu. Buli mmemba aleeta obumanyirivu bungi mu mirimu gyaffe egy'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni watye ki yub maber me gwoko kuc, wa coko dul pa ludiro ma ludiro. Lamemba acel acel kelo ngec ki diro mapol tutwal I tic megwa me cik.

lgg_prompt: Aa'zu kililiru kini ama vu otita ageyitema ni okporu ni ci, ama tra ongulumu 'ba nita be 'diyi ni. Memba alu alu ni e'yo nita be angiri 'diyi eji azi ngaza amani e'yo azita ma dria 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu twine enkora nungi y'eby'okwerinda, tutungire guruupu y'abakugu. Buri memba naareeta obumanyi n'obwegyendesereza omu mirimo yaitu y'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: I received an invitation to the event, but it didn't specify the location. Can you tell me where the venue is?
lug_prompt: Nafuna ebbaluwa ennyita ku mukolo, naye teyalaga kifo.
ach_prompt: Anongo waraga ma lwonga me bino I yub meno, ento pe onyuto kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Abu eong adum aijukario toma opucit, konye mam abu kolim aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Ma esu waraga 'ba omvezuri muzu omu 'da ma alea ra te 'ba awini angu 'da ece ku.

eng_prompt: To ensure a fair and transparent voting process, it is crucial that we adhere to established protocols. Compliance with these regulations will help maintain public trust in our electoral system.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba nti okulonda kuba kwa mazima na bwenkanya, kikulu nnyo okugoberera emitendera egiteekeddwawo. Okukolera ku mateeka gano kijja kuyamba okukuuma obwesige bw'abantu mu nkola yaffe ey'okulonda.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub me bolo kwir obedo ber dok tye atir, pire tek tutwal me lubu cik ma kiketo. Lubu cik magi bikonyo dano me bedo ki gen I kom yub me bolo kwir megwa.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aseo na abeit, ibusakinit oni aitup ainapeta nu itolomunitai. Atupitos ikisila lu ingarakini aidar amunokina naka itunga mama ejaasi aseowok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo voti 'beza kililiru azini e'yo ada be ri nezu, eri orodriru amani azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Azita 'diyi ma vuti obiza ni nga o'bi yi ma asi 'bazu geri ama vile e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria.

lug_prompt: Njagala okumanya ebikwata ku buyigirize bwo n'okutendekebwa okulala kwonna kw'ofunye.

eng_prompt: As the election date approaches, the electoral commission is facing significant financial challenges. Without adequate resources, they will struggle to ensure a smooth and fair electoral process.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kasanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi. Awatali bikozesebwa bimala, bajja kulwana okulaba ng'okulonda kugenda bulungi era mu bwenkanya.

lgg_prompt: O'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo, amuti e'yo opetaa ni ondrepi Electoral Commission ni e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyi esu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi kokoru, eyi nga dri ci e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu kililiru azini kililiru ri nezu.
nyn_prompt: Obu eizooba ry'okuteera akaruuru riri haihi, ekitongore ky'eby'oburuuru kiriyo nikitunga oburemeezi bw'esente. Hatariho eby'okukoresa ebirikumara, nibaija kurwana kureeba ngu akaruuru kakorwa kurungi kandi omu buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: Despite our best efforts to arrive on time, traffic was unbearable. We had been looking forward to it all week.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twafuba okutuuka mu budde, akalippagano k'ebidduka kaali tekagumiikiriza. Tubadde tukyesunga wiiki yonna.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watute matek me oo I cawa kikome, mutoka obedo mapol tutwal. Wabedo ka kurone pi cabit kulu.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu sio eswamata kagogongu kanu adolere kotoma apak, mam apolor amotokan noi. Iuta sio aidar ngun osabiti kere.
lgg_prompt: Ama ka tro ama ma okpo 'ba cazu sa'wa dria ra ti, mutukari eyi ma omgbo tu ra. Ama ebi ndra eri ma ta mba sabiti 'disi dria.

lug_prompt: Mpulidde emboozi ezikwata ku bantu abasobola okukyusa ensi nga bakwata ku kintu.

eng_prompt: After gathering evidence of misconduct, we decided to speak out against the corruption in our community. However, our actions have drawn unwanted attention, and now we have been threatened by the police.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi ku mpisa embi, twasalawo okwogera ku buli bw'enguzi mu kitundu kyaffe. Kyokka, ebikolwa byaffe bisikiriza abantu bangi, era kati poliisi etutiisatiisa.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo caden me tim maraco, wamoko tamwa me lok I kom camcana matye I kabedo wa. Kadi bed kumeno, tim megwa okelo tam ma pe mite, dok kombedi abili oburu kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atukun aitogogongoret naka iponesio luarokok, apotu sio aseutu aitepeg amidicio naka apiyai kotoma atutubetekosi. Konye, apotu aswamisiowok odumutu itunga lumam ekotos, ido kwana ipolisin ekuriaka iso.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ecetaru e'yo adriza onzi ma dria 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, ama asi e'yo nze e'yo anyamgbolo ma dria ongulumu amavileri ma alea ri ma dria. Kani si, e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi fe 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria ku, dika polisi eyi fe amani ori gbaza ra.
