eng_prompt: In light of recent events and widespread protests, it's crucial to examine our stance on law enforcement practices. How do we respond to the growing concerns about the treatment of civilians by those sworn to protect them?
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okwekalakaasa okwabaddewo, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya ennyiriri zaffe ku nkola z'okukwasisa amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki jemo ma onyaa tutwal, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma watye ka tic kwede me gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aidiya naepol noi, erai ibore yenepol noi airereor eipone lo itwasamatere ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini ngiringiri ongmbo angiri si 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru amani e'yo amani 'yele azita ma ta mbaza ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwesharinga kw'abantu baingi, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma emiteekateekyere yaitu aha kukuratira ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Uganda has a diverse political landscape that has evolved over the years. Many citizens are curious about the number of political parties that operate within the country today.
lug_prompt: Uganda erina ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo ebikyuse okumala emyaka. Bannansi bangi baagala okumanya omuwendo gw'ebibiina by'obufuzi ebikola mu ggwanga leero.
ach_prompt: Uganda tye ki lok me cungu iwi bye ma padi padi ma olokke tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Anywali mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo wel dul me cungu iwi-bye matye katic I lobo Uganda I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi Uganda keda iponesio luegelegela luka politikis luapotu ijulakinos kokaru lu atuboros. Ekotosi itunga luipu aijen enaaba loka ipatei lu iswamaete kotoma akwapuwok ilolo.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma e'yo politiki ni 'diyi karakara dika eyi oja eyi sa'wa agapi 'bo 'diyisi. Kari anzi karakara eyi le saaru kalafe amuti politiki ni azi ngapi kari 'di ma alea andru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eine eby'obutegyeki bitari bimwe na bimwe ebihindukire okumara emyaka mingi. Abatuuragye baingi nibenda kumanya omuhendo gw'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebirikukorera omu ihanga erizooba.

eng_prompt: As we plan for the upcoming event, it's important to know everyone's involvement. Can you share what activities you are participating in?
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tuteekateeka omukolo ogujja, kikulu okumanya buli omu ky'akola.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yubbe pi yub matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma dano weng tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aitemonokin kanuka epucit lo ebunit, ejokuna noi ajenun ebe ejaas itunga kere toma.
lgg_prompt: Amani otuta 'yeria omu emupi ri ni, eri orodriru nizu 'ba dria ma 'yeta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Twaba nitutebekanisa omukoro ogurikwija, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu buri omwe ayetabemu.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, many voters are eager to know when they can cast their ballots. It's crucial for the electoral commission to provide clarity on the polling date to ensure everyone is prepared.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiseera by'okulonda bisembera, abalonzi bangi baagala nnyo okumanya ddi lwe bayinza okukuba akalulu. Kya mugaso nnyo akakiiko k'ebyokulonda okuwa obutangaavu ku nnaku z'omwezi abantu we balondera okukakasa nti buli omu yeetegese.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye cok, lubol kwir mapol tye ki miti me ngeyo awene ma gitwero bolo kwir. Pire tek tutwal ki dul ma doro yer me tito nino me bolo kwir wek dano weng oyubbe.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, ekotosi aseak luipu ajenun apak na ebeitor kesi aicak abootin. Erai ibore yenepol noi erionget lo aseo aitetem aparan na aseo kanu awanyun ebe ekapakina itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo, 'ba karakara voti 'bepi 'diyi ava be sa'wa eyini ecozu voti 'bezu ri nizu. Eri orodriru amuti e'yo opetaa ni ondrepiri ni o'duko ecezu o'du voti 'bezuri ma dria ra lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria otu i ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, abateezi b'akaruuru baingi baine ekihika ky'okumanya obu barikubaasa kuteera akaruuru. Nikikuru akakiiko akarikukurira eby'oburuuru kushoboorora ebiro by'okuteera akaruuru kureeba ngu buri omwe ayeteekateekire.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and criticisms, the political landscape in Uganda has evolved over the years. Citizens actively participate in elections and engage in civic activities, reflecting a commitment to democratic principles.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi n'okunenya, embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu Uganda ekyuse okumala emyaka. Bannansi beenyigira nnyo mu kulonda era beenyigira mu mirimu gy'obwannakyewa, ekiraga okwewaayo eri emisingi gya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watye ka nongo peko mapol, lok me cungu iwi bye I lobo Uganda olokke tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Anywali bedo tye ikare me bolo kwir ki timo jami mapat-pat ma nyutu ni gimito loc alwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio keda aitoroneta nuipu, ejulakinos akiro nuka epolitikis koUganda kokaru lu atuboros. Apotu itunga kojaikinos toma aseo ka aswam aswamisinei nu itunga, itodunitos ainakina kec mama ejaasi ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu ra ti, e'yo politiki ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri oja i eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra. Kari anzi eyi pa tu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea azini eyi 'ye e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea eyini e'dazu kini eyi owi eyi e'yo democracia ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi n'okujumirirwa, eby'obutegyeki bya Uganda bihindukire kumara emyaka mingi. Abatuuragye nibeejumba munonga omu karuuru n'okukora emirimo y'obuhangwa, ekirikworeka okwehayo kwabo aha misingye ya demokurasiya.

eng_prompt: After witnessing the incident unfold, he felt it was his duty to report what he had seen. The officers arrived at the scene and asked him to accompany them for further questioning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba ebyaliwo, yawulira ng'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe okuwa alipoota ku ebyo bye yali alabye. Abasirikale baatuuka mu kifo we baatuukira ne bamusaba okubeegattako okwongera okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo.
ach_prompt: Inge neno ngo ma otimme, en owinyo ni obedo ticce me tito ngo ma en oneno. Abili gu oo I kabedo enoni ka gupenye me wot kwedgi pi medo lapeny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka awanyun nuapotu kotakanutu, abu ngesi koany ebe erai akeswam alimor nuaseseni ngesi. Apotu ipolisin kodolokisi aiboisit kosodete alimokin ngesi alosit keda kes kanu aingisingisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'da ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, eri ega kini eri azi erini e'yo erini ndre 'diyi oluzu. Azi'ba polisi ni 'diyi eca pari 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'da ma alea ra azini eyi ai eri eyi ma ti ojizu e'yo eyi ozizu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba ekyabaireho, akahurira ngu n'omurimo gwe kugamba ekiyabaire areebire. Ba ofiisa bakahika aha mwanya kandi bamushaba kugyenda nabo bababuuze ebibuuzo ebindi.

eng_prompt: I need to find some information quickly. Can you help me check if you can connect online?
lug_prompt: Nneetaaga okufuna obubaka mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Amito nongo ngec mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong adumun akiro atipet.
lgg_prompt: Le ma ma esu o'duko azi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Nyine kuronda amakuru ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the data and considering all the evidence presented, we need to determine the implications of our findings. Based on our discussion, it's time to summarize our thoughts.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obubaka n'okulowooza ku bujulizi bwonna obwanjuddwa, twetaaga okuzuula ebigobererwa mu bizuuliddwa byaffe. Okusinziira ku bye twogeddeko, kye kiseera okufunza ebirowoozo byaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok angeya ki neno caden weng ma kikelo, omyero waniang adwoki me gin ma wanongo. Ma lubbe ki lok ma waloko, kare dong oromo me coyo tamwa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro keda aomisio nuka ajenanut, ekot oni ajenun nuepedorete aitodolikin. Katupitos nu inerit sio, erai kwana apak naka aimorikikin aomisiowok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama isu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo ecetaru 'diyi ma egazu 'bori ma vutia, le ama ma esu e'yo amani isu 'diyi ma efi ra. E'yo amani onze 'bori ma vutia, eri sa'wa amani ama ma egata eyi omvizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko n'okureeba obujurizi bwona oburikworekwa, twine kumanya ebirikubaasa kurugwamu. Kurugirira aha kugaaniira kwaitu,n'obwire bw'okushoroora ebiteekateeko byaitu.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, various political parties are finalizing their strategies. In a crucial step towards the upcoming elections, the electoral commission is nominating presidential candidates.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiseera by'okulonda bisembera, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo bimaliriza enteekateeka zaabyo. Mu kaweefube ow'amaanyi mu kulonda okujja, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kalonda abesimbyewo ku bukulembeze bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me yer tye cok, dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka tyeko yubgi. I yoo acel ma pire tek tutwal me oo I yer matye kabino anyim, dul ma doro yer tye ka coyo lucungu I yer pa ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, eutasi ipatei luipu aitemonokin iwaitin kec. Kotoma ainapeta nuepolok nuka aseo naebunit, euta ekomision loka aseo aipikakin abwoak kwape lukapolok akwap.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecaria, amuti politiki ni ndundu eyi otita eyini 'diyi de asi. E'yo okporu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alia, amuti legico niri ni 'ba pa tupi purezidenti ru 'diyi ope.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi,ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana biriyo nibihendera kukora enteekateeka zaabyo. Ekitongore ky'eby'oburuuru kiriyo nikyoreka abesimbireho ahabwa purezidenti omu karuuru akarikwija.

eng_prompt: As people were forced to spend more time together at home, underlying tensions began to surface. Many families struggled to adapt to the new normal, leading to heightened stress and disagreements.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe bawalirizibwa okumala ebiseera bingi nga bali bombi awaka, obunkenke obwaliwo bwatandika okulabika. Amaka mangi gaalwana okumanyiira embeera empya eyaleetawo okweraliikirira n'obutakkaanya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kidiyo dano me bedo kacel I gang, lworo madit ocako nen. Gangi mapol onongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki kwo manyen ma okelo lworo ki telle.
teo_prompt: Kwape aponi kobuikinai itunga ajaut nepepe ore, apotu ingungeta kogeutu apolor. Apotu ikalia luipu iswamata kagogong kanu acamanar keda ejautene loitetet, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong keda amamut acamanar.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka 'ba eyi omi sa'wa angiri eyini aa'zu tualu akuasi, e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi e'do efu. Familia karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru aa'zu e'yo eyi ma alea o'diru 'diyi be eyini ani e'yo asi omiza ni azini erita ako ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku baagyemesereziibwe kumara obwire bwingi hamwe omuka, obunkenke bukatandika kureebeka. Amaka maingi gakatunga oburemeezi bw'okumanyiira embeera nsya, ekyarugiremu okwerarikirira n'obutakwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In times of hardship, it is essential for individuals to recognize their privilege. By sharing their resources, they can make a significant difference in the lives of others.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu okutegeera enkizo zaabwe. Nga bagabana ebintu byabwe, basobola okukola enjawulo mu bulamu bw'abalala.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi dano me niang mot gi. Ka gupoko jami ma gitye kwede, gitwero kelo alokaloka madit I kwo pa jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu etioko, ejokuna itunga aijen arerengusio kec. Kowai lo aimor iborokec, epedorete kesi aijulakin aijar naka luce.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu 'diyini drileba yini 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Afa yini 'diyi awazurisi, eyi eco ojata okporu eji 'ba azi 'diyi ma edri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, nikikuru abantu kumanya emigisha yaabo. Kubarikugabana eby'obugaiga byabo, nibabaasa kukora empindahinduka y'amaani omu magara g'abandi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health crisis, community leaders have been working diligently to find ways to safely resume gatherings. As a result, churches have been opened on strict guidelines.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, abakulembeze b'ekitundu babadde bakola n'obunyiikivu okunoonya engeri y'okuddamu okukuŋŋaana obulungi. N'ekivuddemu, amakanisa gagguddwawo mu mateeka amakakali.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, lutela me tedero gubedo katic matek me nongo yoo me cako gure. Macalo adwogi ne, kiyabo odi lega ki cik matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aswam kagogong kanu adumun iwaitin lu epedoriata itunga aimorikikin. Kanuka ngun, apukor ikanisan keda ainapeta nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu geri 'bani 'ba eyi trazu kililiru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba zi kanisa eyi azita okporu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, abeebembezi b'ebyanga batwire nibakora n'amaani okuronda oburyo bw'okugarukamu enteerane zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, amakanisa gakingwirweho n'ebiragiro by'amaani.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing health concerns, the venue has implemented strict capacity limits. As a result, they have allowed only seventy people per service.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, ekifo kitaddewo ekkomo ku bungi bw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, bakkirizza abantu nsanvu bokka mu buli kusaba.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, kabedo ne oketo kigeng matek tutwal I kom wel dano matwero bedo ie. Macalo adwogi ne, guyee dano pyerabiro keken I lega acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka angaleu na elosi akonye, abu aiboisit ipikak itunga luipu. Kanuka ngun, acamutu kesi itunga akaisakanyarei bon kotoma ailip.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, pari avita ni 'diyi 'ba ongmbo 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai lu 'ba kali aziri eyi inzita alu alu ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho,omwanya gukataho obukwakurizo. N'ekyarugiremu, baikiriza abantu makumi mushanju bonka buri kushaba.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by the community, the cultural leader has been gathering feedback from residents. With a vision for a more efficient and inclusive approach, they are determined to implement meaningful changes.
lug_prompt: Ng'amanyi okusoomoozebwa abantu kwe basanga, omukulembeze w'ebyobuwangwa abadde akuŋŋaanya endowooza okuva mu batuuze. Olw'okuba balina ekiruubirirwa eky'okukola ebintu mu ngeri esingayo obulungi, bamalirivu okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ez'omuganyulo.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye, latela me tekwaro obedo ka gamo tam pa lwak. Gitye ki miti me kelo aloka-loka matye ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas itunga, etukunit engarenon lo atekerin akiro kanejaas itunga. Keda aomisioit naka ewai lo iswamai ejok ido lo imoriarit itunga kere, ekapakina kesi aitodolikin aijulanakineta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma dria risi, drice'ba suruni 'da ebi e'yo eyi tra engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu. E'yo ndreza geri azi ngazu kililiru azini 'ba dria ma eselea 'diyisi, eyi asi 'ba ojata orodriru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu abantu barikurabamu, omwebembezi w'eby'obuhangwa atwire nashorooza ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye. Ahabw'ekigyendererwa ky'okutunga enkora nungi kandi erikutwariramu abantu boona, bamazireyo kuta empindahinduka ez'omugasho omu nkora.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and feedback from residents, we have identified key areas for improvement. As a result, we are excited to introduce a new leadership strategy for the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'ebiteeso okuva mu batuuze, tuzudde ebitundu ebikulu eby'okulongoosaamu. N'ekyavaamu, tuli basanyufu okutongoza enkola empya ey'obukulembeze eri ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol ki tam ma aa ki bot lwak, wanongo kabedo mapigi tego ma omyero wayub. Macalo adwogi ne, cwiny wa yom me kelo yoo manyen me tela pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi keda aomisio nuka itunga, apotu sio ajenutu aiboisio nuibusakinit oni aitojokar. Kanuka ngun, iyalama sio aitolomun epone loitetet loka aingarenikin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri azini egata engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu angu okporu 'bani ecozu otuzu ra 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, ama ayikosi geri o'diru driceza ni 'diyi e'dazu o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga hamwe n'okugarukwamu kuruga omu batuuragye, tutungire emyanya mikuru y'okutereera. N'ekyarugiremu, nitushemererwa kureetaho enkora nsya y'obwebembezi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After much discussion about the community's future, he finally gathered the courage to present his ideas. The atmosphere in the room was tense, as everyone awaited the elders' reaction.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'omu maaso eby'ekitundu, yasobola okufuna obuvumu n'awa endowooza ye. Embeera mu kisenge yali ya bunkenke, nga buli omu alindirira eky'okuddamu ky'abakadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom anyim pa lwak, I agiki ne en onongo tekcwiny me miyo tamme. Lweny obedo tye I ot ne pien dano weng obedo kakuru ngo ma ludito omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi nuikamunitos ingaren naka itunga, abu ngesi kodum atitingikinit aitodiar aomisioke. Arai ejautene loejai agola ngin loetiono noi, naarai itunga kere autasi aidar epone loebeitor itunga luapolok aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri ongulumu 'di ma ewu drialeri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asi mba egata ivile 'diyi e'dazu. Angu jo ale aliza 'da ma alea ri ndra e'yere, 'ba dria ni te e'yo 'ba 'wara eyini 'ye ri te.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga aha biro by'omumaisho by'ekyanga, akahendera yaatunga obumanzi bw'okureeta ebiteekateeko bye. Embeera omu kishengye ekaba eri ey'obunkenke, buri omwe arikutegyereza oku abakuru barikwija kutwaza.

eng_prompt: Implementing inclusive policies is essential for ensuring that every voice is heard and valued. By actively seeking diverse perspectives, we can create a more equitable environment.
lug_prompt: Okuteeka mu nkola enkola ezikwata ku bantu bonna kya mugaso okulaba nti buli ddoboozi liwulirwa era ne liweebwa ekitiibwa. Bwe tunoonya endowooza ez'enjawulo, tusobola okutondawo embeera ey'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Keto cik makwako dano weng itic pire tek tutwal me neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo dok ki woro gi. Ka watye ka yenyo tam mapat-pat, watwero yubu kabedo ma opore pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun ainapeta nuepedorete aimorikikin itunga kere ejok kanu awanyun ebe epupio ka ayongite iporotoi. Kowai lo aimo aomisio nuegelegela, ipedori oni aitolomun ejautene loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Azita 'bani 'ba dria trazu 'diyi ma vuti obiza eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri azini eri orodriru. Geri 'bani e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ndazu okporu risi, ama eco angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma esele cozu kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta ebiragiro by'okushorooza abantu omu nkora n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu buri jwi ryahurirwa kandi rikatwarwa nk'ery'omugasho. Twaronda emiteekateekyere etarikushushana, nitubaasa kureetaho oburinganiza.

eng_prompt: As the challenges facing our neighborhood continue to grow, it has become increasingly clear that fresh perspectives are essential for progress. Many residents feel that the current leadership is out of touch with the community's evolving needs.
lug_prompt: Ng'okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo mu kitundu kyaffe kweyongera okukula, kyeyoleka bulungi nti endowooza empya za mugaso mu nkulaakulana. Abatuuze bangi bawulira nti obukulembeze obuliwo kati tebukwatagana na byetaago by'ekitundu ebikyuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko matye I kabedo wa tye kamede ki dongo, nen atyer kamede ni tam manyen pire tek pi dongo lobo. Lutedero mapol gitye ki tam ni tela matye kombedi pe tye ka timo jami ma mite pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape ainingosia nuetereikina keda idunyet wok iyatakinos, ecai cut ebe aomisio nuitetiak ejokuka kanu apol. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam engarenone loejai kwana ejenete ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amavile angu ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu drile, e'bi eca e'dazaru kini egata o'diru 'diyi orodriru angu ezoma ni. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ega kini driceza curu'do ri econi e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza ko ku.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi oburi omu kicweka kyaitu ku burikuguma nibweyongyera, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu enteekateeka nsya n'ey'omugasho aha ntunguuka. Abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu obwebembezi oburiho hati tiburikuhikaana n'ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: As organizations evolve, the need for fresh perspectives becomes increasingly important. Embracing change often means welcoming individuals who can challenge the status quo.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bwe bikulaakulana, obwetaavu bw'endowooza empya bweyongera okuba obw'omugaso. Okwaniriza enkyukakyuka kitera okutegeeza okwaniriza abantu ssekinnoomu abasobola okusomooza embeera eriwo.
ach_prompt: Ka dul mapat-pat tye ka dongo, miti me neno jami manyen doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Jolo aloka-loka ipol kare te lokke ni jolo dano ma twero pyem ki jami matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kwape itopoloorete iriongeta, epol eipud loka aomisio nuitetiak. Aicam aijulanakineta apolouke aijaun itunga lu epedorete ainingosit ejautene loejai.
lgg_prompt: Amuti yini zoria, lezu egata o'diru 'diyi ma ovu orodriru tu. E'yo ojaza a'izu ri ma efi e'yo 'ba azi ecopi e'yo 'dupi curu'do 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi a'izu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ku birikugyenda nibikura, ekyetengo ky'ebiteekateeko ebisya nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho. Okwakiira empinduka nikimanyisa okutangirira abantu abarikubaasa kuhakanisa embeera eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges faced by many sectors, officials have recognized the importance of preserving cultural heritage. As a result, they have announced a series of initiatives aimed at bolstering the arts and cultural organizations.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko mu bitongole bingi, abakungu bakitegedde obukulu bw'okukuuma eby'obuwangwa. N'ekivuddemu, balangiridde enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebitongole by'ebyemikono n'ebyobuwangwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma dul mapat-pat tye kanongo cokcok-ki, lutic guniang ber pa gwoko jami me tekwaro. Macalo adwogi ne, gunyuto yub mapol ma tye ki miti me tyelo kor dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok me tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun nuetereikina keda iriongeta luipu, apotu eswamak kojenutu ajokis naka aidar inonosio. Kanuka ngun, alimoritos kesi ainapeta nuipu nu ekotore aitogogong iriongeta luka inonosio keda inonosio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi esu orodri e'yo suruni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi azi e'yo ndundu eyini lezu amuti e'yo suruni 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma okpo engazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya oburiho ebiro ebi omu bitongore bingi, abakungu bamanyire omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu,barangirire enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'emikono n'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and debates, the members of the committee reviewed various proposals for leadership selection. They recognized the importance of establishing a fair and effective process to ensure the best candidates were chosen.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, bammemba b'akakiiko beetegereza ebiteeso eby'enjawulo eby'okulonda abakulembeze. Baakitegeera obukulu bw'okuteekawo enkola ey'obwenkanya era ennungi okulaba ng'abeesimbyewo abasinga balondebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki laro lok mapol, lumemba me dul ne guneno tam mapat-pat makwako yer pa lutela. Gu niang ber pa yub maber me neno ni kiyero lutino kwan mabeco loyo weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda ipegeta luipu, apotu imeeban luka ekomiti airereonorata aomisio nuegelegela nuka aseun engarenok. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka aitolomun ainapeta nuejokuka kanu awanyun ebe eseunono lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini agbatara angiri ma vutia, memba committee ni 'diyi andri egata ndundu drice'ba eyi opezu 'diyi ma ale ra. Eyi esu orodri 'bani geri kililiru azini kililiru 'diyi e'dozu nezu ra kini 'ba ope 'ba pa tupi muke ndeni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura munonga, ba memba b'akakiiko bakashwijuma ebiteiso bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikukwata aha kutoorana abebembezi. Bakareeba omugasho gw'okutaho enkora nungi n'oburingaaniza okureeba ngu abesimbireho abarikukirayo oburungi batooranwa.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure the smooth operation of the organization, it is essential to establish a clear support structure. This will enable the leaders to focus on their strategic responsibilities without being overwhelmed by administrative tasks.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti ekitongole kitambula bulungi, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola etegeerekeka obulungi ey'obuyambi. Kino kijja kusobozesa abakulembeze okussa essira ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'amaanyi awatali kuzitoowererwa mirimu gy'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni dul ne tye ka tic maber, pire tek tutwal me keto yub me miyo kony matye atir. Man bikonyo lutela me keto cwinygi I kom tic gi labongo bedo ki tic mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iswamai erionget ejok, ejokuna aitolomun egangitok lu ecaete. Ebuni ngin aingarakin engarenok apodokinit aswamisinei kec nuepolok komam epol aswamisinei nu eyaitene.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ma azi ngazu kililiru, eri orodriru geri atita fezu 'diyi e'dozu kililiru. Diri nga fe drice'ba eyini asi 'bazu azi eyini 'diyi ma dria e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma omgbo esi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu ekitongore nikikora kurungi, nikikuru kutaho enkora y'obuhwezi erikwetegyerezibwa gye. Eki nikiija kuhwera abebembezi kuta amaani aha bujunanizibwa bwabo oburikwetengwa batarikuremeerwa emirimo y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is crucial in guiding teams and organizations toward success. It requires a deep understanding of the needs and aspirations of those being led.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo mu kulambika ttiimu n'ebitongole okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Kyetaagisa okutegeera ebyetaago n'ebiruubirirwa by'abo abakulemberwa.
ach_prompt: Tela maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me konyo dul mapat-pat me cobo miti gi. Mito niang matut tutwal I kom miti ki miti pa joo ma kitelo gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aingarenikin itimun keda iriongeta aitodolikin akerianut. Ekoto amisiikin jokan ipudesia keda apeleikinata luka ngul luingarenikinitai.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru amuti azini amuti yi ma dri cezu drile suza vu. Eri le vata kililiru e'yo 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma e'yo lepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho munonga omu kwebembera tiimu n'ebitongore kuhika aha businguzi. Nikyetenga okwetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo n'ebigyendererwa by'abo abarikutegyekwa.

eng_prompt: By fostering collaboration and open communication, the team has built a strong foundation. This collective strength will empower them to tackle obstacles effectively.
lug_prompt: Nga batumbula enkolagana n'empuliziganya ennungi, ttiimu ezimbye omusingi omunywevu. Amaanyi gano ag'awamu gajja kubawa amaanyi okulwanyisa ebizibu mu ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I dongo ribe ki lok maber, dul ne guyubu guti matek tutwal. Tek cwiny man bi minigi kero me lweny i kom peko ma tye.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitopolor aiswamanara keda einer, aduku etimu atukot naegogong noi. Agogong na nepepe ijaikini kesi apedor aitikitik atiokisio ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti icita ni azini e'yo nzeza ngmboru ri ma omgbo otuza si, amuti 'da si e'yo okporu ni. Okpo tualu 'diri nga yi dri okpo fe e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'empurizagana, tiimu eyombekire omusingi gw'amaani. Amaani aga, nigeija kubongyera amaani g'okusingura oburemeezi omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership requires not only vision and strategy but also the ability to navigate interpersonal dynamics. In any organization, conflicts are inevitable, making it crucial for leaders to possess strong conflict resolution skills.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi tebwetaagisa kwolesebwa n'obukodyo byokka wabula n'obusobozi bw'okutambuza entambula y'abantu. Mu kitongole kyonna, obukuubagano tebuyinza kwewalibwa, ekireetera abakulu okubeera n'obukugu obw'amaanyi mu kugonjoola obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: Lutela mabeco pe omyero gubed ki neno ki diro keken ento bene omyero gubed ki kero me tic maber ikin dano. I dul mo keken, kuku-kuku bedo tye, ma weko pire tek tutwal ki lutela me bedo ki diro me tyeko kuku-kuku.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan mam ekoto aomisio keda acoasinei bon konye ekoto apedorit aitodolikin eipone lo itunga. Kotoma oriongeta kere, mam epedorio aisac ingungeta, ido erai ibore yenepol noi kanu engarenok ajaut keda acoa naepol noi naka aitemokin ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri le lu egata azini otita eyi ku te vini okpo e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Amuti dria ma alea, ngiringiri eyi e'yo eyi 'yepi ku 'diyi, e'yoni fezu drice'ba eyini aa'zu ondua okporu ngiringiri eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi, tiburikwetengyesa enteekateeka n'oburyo byonka, kureka n'obushoboorozi bw'okukoragana n'abantu. Omu kitongore kyona, entaro tizirikwetengwa, ekirikureetera abebembezi kugira emyoga y'amaani y'okushoborora entaro.

eng_prompt: In today's society, the intersection of politics and culture often leads to divisive debates. It's essential to recognize the distinct roles each plays in shaping our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, okukwatagana kw'ebyobufuzi n'ebyobuwangwa kitera okuvaako okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwawukana. Kya mugaso okutegeera emirimu egy'enjawulo buli omu gy'akola mu kubumba ebitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, ribbe pa lok me cungu iwi-bye ki tekwaro ipol kare kelo apoka-poka. Pire tek tutwal me niang tic mapat-pat ma ngat acel acel timo I dongo kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, aimorikikin naka epolitikis keda inonosio eyangaununei ipegeta luetiakatiaka. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun aswamisio nuegelegela nu iswamaete kanginitunganan kotoma aitolomun aiboisio wok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie ri ni tutuni e'yo agbatara awazu 'diyi eji. Eri orodriru azi ndu ndu 'ba alu alu ni nga ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma edeta ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, eby'obutegyeki hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa nibitera kureetaho okwahukaana. N'eky'omugasho kumanya emirimo y'omutaano ei buri omwe aine omu kutunguura ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: To inspire and guide others effectively, a leader must embody the values and principles they wish to instill. Living a life of integrity and purpose sets the foundation for impactful leadership.
lug_prompt: Okukubiriza n'okulungamya abalala obulungi, omukulembeze alina okubeera n'empisa n'emisingi gy'ayagala okuyigiriza. Okubeera n'obulamu obw'obwesimbu n'ekigendererwa kiteekawo omusingi gw'obukulembeze obulungi.
ach_prompt: Me cuku cwiny ki doro luwotgi maber, lutela omyero gubed ki cik ma igi lac ma gimito pwonyo. Kwo kwo maber dok ki tyen lok tye guti me tela maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit ka aingarenikin luce ejok, ekot engarenon ajaut keda iponesio ka ainapeta nu ekoto ngesi aisisianakin. Aijar na abeit keda alosikinet erai atukot naka eingarenone loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Lezu ava fezu azini imbata fezu 'ba azi 'diyi dri kililiru, le 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo orodriru azini e'yo onyiru eyini le imbata fe 'diyi ma dria. Idri aa'zu e'yo ada be azini asi 'baza be ri ni e'yo driceza muke ni 'diyi 'ba.
nyn_prompt: Omwebembezi kubaasa kuhabura abandi kurungi, ashemereire kugira emitwarize n'emitwarize ei arikwenda kubashomesa. Okutuura n'amagara marungi n'ekigyendererwa, nikyo musingye gw'obwebembezi burungi.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the integrity of our democracy is paramount. To achieve this, we must establish guidelines that protect the rights of every citizen.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulungi bwa demokulasiya waffe kye kisinga obukulu. Okutuukiriza kino, tulina okuteekawo ebiragiro ebikuuma eddembe lya buli munnansi.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa loc alwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me cobo man, omyero waket cik ma gwoko twero pa anywali acel-acel.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe ejokuna aseo naka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekot oni aitolomun ikisila lu eyuwarete apedorosio nuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amani lezu e'yo ama vile 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri eri orodriru tu. Di isuzu, le ama ma o'ba azita kari anzi dria eyi ma drilemgbo ma ta mbapi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obutegyeki bwaitu bigumire n'eky'omugasho munonga. Okuhikiiriza eki, twine kutaho ebiragiro ebirikurinda obugabe bwa buri mutuuragye.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the choice of leadership plays a crucial role in shaping the future. It is essential for citizens to actively participate in the electoral process to ensure their voices are heard.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okulonda obukulembeze kukola kinene nnyo mu kukola ebiseera by'omu maaso. Kya mugaso nnyo bannansi okwenyigira ennyo mu nkola y'okulonda okukakasa nti amaloboozi gaabwe gawulirwa.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, yer pa lutela obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I yubu kwo me anyim. Pire tek tutwal pi anywali me bedo tye ikare me yer wek dwon gi owinyre.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, aseun engarenone erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomun ingaren. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aseo kanu awanyun ebe epupio iporoto kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba eyi ma peta ni azi okporu 'ye ewu drialeri ma edeta ma alea. Eri orodriru kari anzi eyini fizu e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma alea eyini ani eyi ma o'duko erizu beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki,okutoorana omwebembezi nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutebeekanisa ebiro bya nyensya. N'eky'omugasho munonga, abatuuragye kwejumba omu by'oburuuru, okureeba ngu eiraka ryabo rihurirwa.

eng_prompt: True leadership is rooted in empathy and integrity, prioritizing the well-being of others above personal gain. It requires a commitment to fostering an environment where everyone can thrive.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obutuufu businziira ku kusaasira n'obwesimbu, okukulembeza obulungi bw'abalala okusinga okwefunira. Kyetaagisa okwewaayo okukulaakulanya embeera buli omu mw'asobola okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Tela me ada jenge I kom kica ki ada, keto miti pa dano mukene bedo mukwongo me kaka nongo magoba pa ngat acel acel. Mite ni dano ducu guket cwinygi me bedo ki kabedo ma dano weng twero dongo iye.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai lo iswamao kotoma asianut keda abeit, aisingarenit aijar naka luce adepar ameda naka itunganan. Ekoto ainakina kanu aitopolor aiboisit na epedoriata itunga kere apol.
lgg_prompt: Driceza e'yo adani 'diyi enga asi ndriza azini e'yo ada ma alia, e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ma ta mbazuri 'bazu okporu aga orodri ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria. Eri le asi 'baza angu 'ba dria ni ecozu zozu ra ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi obwabuzima nibureetwa okusaasira n'obwesigwa, okwebembeza eby'abandi kukira ebyawe. Nikyetengyesa okwehayo kureetaho obusingye ahu buri omwe arikubaasa kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote transparency and open dialogue, the candidate organized a press conference. He aimed to ensure that the media had a platform to voice their concerns and questions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obwerufu n'okuteesa mu lwatu, eyeesimbyewo yategeka olukungaana lwa bannamawulire. Yaluubirira okukakasa nti bannamawulire bafuna omukutu okwogera ebibaluma n'ebibuuzo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me kelo lok ada ki laro lok, lacungu ne oyubu kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya. En obedo ki miti me neno ni lucoo lok angea gubedo ki kabedo me lok I kom peko gi ki lapeny gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor aica ka aineranara, abu abwoan kitemok einer keda lu iyemuto. Alosikinet ke arai awanyun ebe ejaasi arotak iyemuto keda aiboisit na alimun akiro kec keda aingiseta kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo nzezu e'yo ada be azini e'yo nzezu e'yo ada be, 'ba pa sopi 'da otu e'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie. Eri le ndra ne ra kini 'ba e'yo oyuzani 'diyi ma pari ci e'yo asi otiza yini azini zita yini 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburingaaniza n'empurizagana, oyesimbireho akatebekanisa orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru. Akagyezaho kureeba ngu abanyamakuru baine omwanya gw'okugamba ebirikubateganisa n'ebibuuzo byabo.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the bustling streets, I couldn't help but wonder about the unique characteristics that define urban life today. The blend of technology, culture, and architecture sparked my curiosity about contemporary urban environments.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe ntambula mu nguudo ezirimu abantu abangi, nnali sisobola kwebuuza ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebiraga obulamu bw'omu bibuga leero. Okutwalira awamu tekinologiya, obuwangwa, n'ebizimbe byandeetera okwagala okumanya ebibuga ebiriwo mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I teng gudu ma dano dwong iye, pe atwero weko tamo I kom jami mapat-pat matye ka nyutu kwo me boma madongo I kare-ni. Ribbe pa tet manyen, tekwaro ki gedo okelo miti madit tutwal I kom kabedo me boma madongo me kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu, mam eong apedori aingitun nuikamunitos iponesio luitegelikina luitodunitos aijar naka itaunin ilolo. Aimorikikina naka etatai loakwana, inonosio keda aduketait abu koyangau eong eipud loka aingic aiboisio nuka itaunin luka apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria nzila ocuzaru 'diyi ma aliarisi, ma econi ndra e'yo ega e'yo wura ndu ndu o'bi eyini aa'zu aku amboru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo tekenologia ni, e'yo suruni 'diyi, tualu afa jo sizu 'diyi pie ri fe ma dri ava angu tawuni eyini aa'zu ewu curu'do ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto ezirimu abantu baingi, nkaba ntarikubaasa kureka kwebuuza aha bintu by'omutaano ebirikworeka amagara g'omu ndembo obwahati. Okutwarira hamwe tekinorogye, eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'ebyombeko, kikampa amatsiko g'okumanya ebirikukwata aha ndembo eziriho hati.

eng_prompt: Urban development strategies play a crucial role in shaping the economic landscape of a region. When cities are designed with foresight and organization, they become more appealing to potential investors.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya ebibuga zikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukola embeera y'ebyenfuna mu kitundu. Ebibuga bwe bikolebwa n'obwegendereza era nga bitegekeddwa bulungi, bisikiriza abasigansimbi.
ach_prompt: Yub me dongo boma madongo konyo tutwal I dongo lobo. Ka kiyubu citi maber dok ma oyubbe maber, man kelo miti I kom lutim biacara.
teo_prompt: Iwaitin lu apol naka itaunin iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun edumune loka ikapun kotoma aiboisit. Arai kitemokitai isitei keda acoa naepol noi, eminasi itunga aipikakin ikapun toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Otita angu ezoma ni 'diyi azi okporu nga angu ezoma angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ba ka aku ambo eyi ede e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria, eyi eca e'yo ndrizaru 'ba lonyi vuti ale'baa 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka z'okutunguura endembo, nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'entaasya y'ekyanga. Endembo ku zirikukorwa n'obwegyendesereza n'entebekanisa nungi, nizikunda abashubuzi.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, many regions are exploring innovative ways to develop and manage new communities. This raises an important question about the unique challenges and strategies involved in establishing a city from the ground up.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula, ebitundu bingi byanoonya engeri z'okukulaakulanya n'okuddukanya ebitundu ebipya. Kino kireetawo ekibuuzo ekikulu ku kusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo n'obukodyo obuli mu kutandikawo ekibuga okuva wansi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano me boma tye ka medde ameda, but lobo mapol tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me dongo ki doro kabedo manyen. Man kelo lapeny mapire tek tutwal I kom peko mapat-pat ki yoo mapat-pat matye I yubu city.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luka itaunin, eutasi aiboisio nuipu aingic iwaitin lu itopoloere ka aidar aiboisio nuitetiak. Eyangauni ngin aingiset naepol noi naikamunit atiokisio keda iwaitin lu itolomunono kanu adukun esite ageun kwap.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu, angu karakara eyi geri o'diru eyini ecozu angu eyi ezozu azini eyi ma tambazu 'diyi onda. E'yo 'di eji zita azi orodriru e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria azini geri ndundu 'bani lezu aku ambori e'dozu engazu nyaku dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, ebitongore bingi biriyo nibisherura oburyo bw'okutunguura n'okureeberera ebyanga ebitsya. Eki nikireetaho ekibuuzo ky'omugasho ekirikukwata ahaburemeezi obw'omutaano n'emitendera y'okutandikaho orurembo kuruga ahansi.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is crucial for the progress and stability of any country. With the right vision and policies, those in office can significantly influence the direction of their nation.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana n'obutebenkevu bw'eggwanga lyonna. N'endowooza n'enkola entuufu, abo abali mu woofiisi basobola okukyusa ennyo obukulembeze bw'eggwanga lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki kuc. Ki neno ki cik matir, joo matye I gangi tic gi twero kelo alokaloka I lobo gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda ainapakina naka akwap kere. Keda aomisio ka ainapeta nuajokak, epedorete ngul lu ejaas oyapesi aitodolikin eipone lo ebeitor akwap kec alosit.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru tu angu ezoma ni azini asianzu ni kari ciri ni. E'yo ndreza kililiru azini azita kililiru 'diyisi, 'ba opi dria 'diyi eco e'yo 'ye kari yini ma driceza ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'obutebekana bw'eihanga ryona. N'ekigyendererwa n'ebiragiro ebihikire, abo abari omu ofiisi nibabaasa kukora kihango aha ntwaza y'eihanga ryabo.

eng_prompt: When evaluating the potential for a region to elevate its administrative designation, various factors come into play. Understanding the criteria that define a city can help clarify the requirements for such a transformation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya obusobozi bw'ekitundu okutumbula enkola yaakyo ey'obukulembeze, ensonga ez'enjawulo ziyingira mu nsonga. Okutegeera emitendera egitegeeza ekibuga kisobola okuyamba okulambika ebyetaago by'enkyukakyuka ng'eyo.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka niang kero pa twok piny moni me ilo rwom me tela ne, jami mapol tye. Niang kit ma city moni tye kwede twero konyo me niang jami ma mite pi aloka loka enoni.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aanyanar apedor na aiboisit aikeun adoketait na eyaitene ke, ipu akiro nuepedorete aingarakin. Amisikin iwaitin lu itetemete esite ingarakini ajenun iboro lu ekotoi kanu aijulakin kwape kangin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndundu eyi e'do e'yo angu azi ni ecozu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma ale andrizu. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba aku ambo ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo vazu ꞌdiyi eco ꞌba ma aza ko eꞌyo ꞌbani lezu ojata ꞌdile ꞌdiyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma obushoboorozi bw'ekyanga kutunguura obwebembezi bwakyo, enshonga nyingi niziija omu nkora. Okwetegyereza engyenderwaho erikworeka orurembo nikibaasa kuhwera omu kumanya ebirikwetengwa omu kuhinduka nk'okwo.

eng_prompt: In the competitive landscape of politics, the ultimate goal is to secure the support of the electorate. When the results come in, the numbers reveal the stark reality of the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu byobufuzi ebirimu okuvuganya, ekigendererwa ekikulu kwe kufuna obuwagizi bw'abalonzi. Ebyava mu kunoonyereza bwe bifuluma, omuwendo gulaga obutuufu bw'embeera.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me pyem I lok me cungu iwi bye, miti madit en aye me nongo cwak pa lubol kwir. Ka adwogi ne obino, wel ne nyutu ada pa ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka epolitikis, alosikinet erai adumun agangat naka aseak. Karai elomunete akiro, itodunitos inaabai abeit naka ejautene.

eng_prompt: As discussions about educational policies and teacher rights continue to evolve, many are questioning the influence of organized labor in schools. Understanding the function and impact of these organizations is crucial for educators and policymakers alike.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing educational landscape, many educators are feeling undervalued and overworked. It is crucial for teachers to unite and advocate for their rights and the future of their profession.

eng_prompt: The management and conservation of Uganda's natural resources are crucial for sustainable development. Understanding the various organizations involved in this effort is essential, particularly the National Forest Authority.

eng_prompt: In discussions about the role of security in society, some argue that its primary function is to protect citizens. However, others question whether this protection sometimes crosses the line into intimidation.

lug_prompt: Okulima n'okulunda kibadde kintu kikulu mu nkulaakulana y'omuntu okumala enkumi n'enkumi z'emyaka. Kyesigama nnyo ku kulima ebirime n'okulunda ebisolo mu mbeera ez'enjawulo.

nyn_prompt: Obuhingi n'oburiisa butwire nibukora nk'omuringo gw'obuhangwa bw'abantu kumara enkumi n'enkumi z'emyaka. Neyesigama munonga ahakuhinga ebihingirwe hamwe n'okuriisa amatungo omu myanya etari emwe.

eng_prompt: Instilling a love for learning in young minds is crucial for their development. One effective way to achieve this is by actively involving them in their educational journey.
lug_prompt: Okussa okwagala okusoma mu birowoozo by'abaana abato kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana yaabwe. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kubayingiza mu by'enjigiriza byabwe.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo lutino me maro kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo gi. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man en aye me bedo tye ikwan gi.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun amin na aisisia kanejaas idwe erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol kec. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aibwaikin kes toma asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo leta onitaniri 'bazu 'ba oderu 'diyi ma omi ma alia ri eri orodriru eyini zozu. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri eyini eyi suzu e'yo onita ni eyini 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa abaana okukunda okwega n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka yaabo. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okubetaba omu kwega kwabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, humans have relied on various sources to sustain themselves. Meeting nutritional requirements is essential for survival and overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu beesigamye ku bintu eby'enjawulo okweyimirizaawo. Okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'endya kya mugaso mu kuwangaala n'obulamu obulungi okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, dano gubedo ka jenge I kom jami ma pat pat me gwoko kwo gi. Cobo miti me cam ma mite pire tek pi kwo ki kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, ejarete itunga keda iboro luegelegela kanu aijar. Aitodolikin ipudesia luka enyamete ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar keda aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driorisi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ebi aa geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ma edri ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria. Nyaka nyazaru 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru aa'zu edriru azini aa'zu muke.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batwire nibegamira aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe kugira ngu babaase kwebaisaho. Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'eby'okurya n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okugumaho n'okugira amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various governments have implemented policies that prioritize development and infrastructure over individual property rights. This often leads to controversial actions that impact the lives of many citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, gavumenti ez'enjawulo zitadde mu nkola enkola ezikulembeza enkulaakulana n'ebizimbe okusinga eddembe ly'obwannannyini. Kino kitera okuvaako ebikolwa ebirimu enkaayana ebikosa obulamu bwa bannansi bangi.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, gamente mapat-pat oketo cik mapat-pat maketo dongo lobo ki gedo bedo gin ma pire tek loyo twero pa dano me bedo ki jami gi. Man ipol kare kelo tim ma kelo apoka-poka ma balo kwo pa anywali mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, apuganisinei nuegelegela etolomutu ainapeta nu isingarenitos apol keda adukena adepar apedorosio nuka itunga. Eyangauni na duc aswamisio nu engunget nu itolitolete aijar naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, gamete ndundu eyi e'do azita eyi e'yo angu ezoma ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria okporu ndeni aga drilemgbo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe e'yo ngiringiri ru kari anzi karakara eyi ma edri eyi 'yepi ra 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona,gavumenti ezitarikushushana ziteire omu nkora engyenderwaho erikwebembeza entunguuka n'ebyombeko kukira obugabe bw'ebintu. Eki nikikira kureetaho ebikorwa ebirikuteganisa amagara g'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the involvement of citizens in governance is essential for ensuring accountability and representation. This principle is enshrined in various laws and regulations that promote civic engagement.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okwetaba kwa bannansi mu bukulembeze kwa mugaso nnyo mu kukakasa embalirira n'okukiikirirwa. Omusingi guno guli mu mateeka n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo ebitumbula okwenyigira kw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo tye pa anywali I tela obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng tye ki kor gi. Cik man tye I cik mapat-pat ma cuku cwiny lwak me timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ibusakinit itunga ajaut toma opugae loajokan kanu aanyun ebe ejaasi kesi keda abwoikinitokokec. Ejaasi ainapeta ngun toma okisila luegelegela lu isinyikokitos itunga aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, kari anzi eyi ma pa tuzu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ma dria. Ba e'yo 'di 'ba azita ndundu azini azita o'bale o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, okwejumba kw'abantu omu bwebembezi n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu hariho embaririra n'okujwekyerwa. Omusingye ogu guri omu mateeka gatari gamwe na gamwe agarikuhwera abantu kwejumba omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and promote sustainable practices, local authorities have announced new initiatives. As part of these efforts, they have decided to allocate specific areas for reforestation projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okutumbula enkola eziwangaala, ab'obuyinza mu byalo balangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, basazeewo okuwaayo ebifo eby'enjawulo ku pulojekiti z'okuzzaawo ebibira.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki medo rwom me tic maber, lutela me tedero gucwalo lok angeya manyen. Macalo but yub eni, gumoko tamgi me poko kabedo mogo pi yub me roco bunga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aitopolor iponesio luajokak, alimor apedorosio nuka atutubena nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, aseutu kesi aijaikin aiboisio ace kanu aitikitik ikito.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika lezu 'yeta ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Okpo 'diyi ma azi ru, eyi 'du e'yo angu azi 'diyi 'bazu otita pati saza ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okureetaho enkora nungi, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro batongoize enteekateeka nsya. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, bacwiremu kutaho emyanya y'okutamu emiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect biodiversity and promote sustainable land use, the government has implemented various conservation strategies. One key initiative involves the establishment of protected areas to safeguard natural resources.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obutonde obw'enjawulo n'okutumbula enkola ennungi ey'okukozesa ettaka, gavumenti etaddewo enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okukuuma obutonde. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa kwe kuteekawo ebifo ebikuumibwa okukuuma eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki medo rwom me tic ki ngom, gamente okatti ki yoo mapat-pat me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo yubu kabedo ma ki gwoko pi gwoko jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na ayuarite iboro luegelegela ka aitopolor aitwasam alupok ejok, etolomu apugan iponesio luegelegela luka aidar alupok. Alosikinet adiope naepol noi imoriarit aitolomun aiboisio nu eyuaritai kanu aidar isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini e'yo nyaku ayuza kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'ba geri karakara eyi e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'ye ri ma azi angu ta mbazani 'diyi sizu afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okureetaho enkora nungi y'eitaka, gavumenti eteire omu nkora oburyo bwingi bw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. Ekigyendererwa kimwe ekikuru n'okutandikaho emyanya y'okurinda eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with climate change and urban expansion, the importance of maintaining our natural ecosystems has never been clearer. However, the task of safeguarding these vital resources is fraught with difficulties.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi erwanagana n'enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okugaziwa kw'ebibuga, omugaso gw'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi yaffe tegubangako nga kati. Newankubadde, omulimu gw'okukuuma ebintu bino ebikulu gujjudde obuzibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki alokaloka me piny ki dongo pa boma madongo, ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa tye ka nen maber tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, tic me gwoko jami ma pigi tego magi tye ki peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda apol naka itaunin, mam ajokis naka aidar isuban luka Edeke ejenuna noi. Konye, aswam naka aidar iboro lu epol ajokis ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be tualu angu tawuni eyini tuzu ri be, orodri afa amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria ri e'bi ovu ewakokoru ndeni. Kani si, azi afa orodriru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia e'yo ewaru yi tre.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwanagana n'empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'okutunguuka kw'endembo, omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa byaitu tigurabaireho. Kwonka, omurimo gw'okurinda ebintu ebi ebikuru, gurimu oburemeezi bwingi.

eng_prompt: When community members feel threatened by aggressive behavior, it can lead to a breakdown of trust and safety. This atmosphere of fear can have lasting effects on the overall well-being of the neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu bwe bawulira nga batiisibwatiisibwa olw'enneeyisa ey'obukambwe, kiyinza okuviirako okuvunda kw'obwesige n'obukuumi. Embeera eno ey'okutya esobola okuba n'ebizibu eby'olubeerera ku mbeera y'abantu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kace lwak me kabedo giwinyo lworo pi tim gero, man twero balo gen ki ber bedo. Lworo man twero bedo ki adwoki marac i kom kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Arai epupete itunga luka atutubet aitukurian kanu iponesio lu amumu, epedori ngin ayangaun aibiror naka amunokina keda ayuwara. Ejautene lo loka akuriau epedori aitolitol aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ka aa orisi adriza e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyisi, eri eco fe 'ba eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma eselea ku. Angu uri ni 'diri eco e'yo onzi 'ye ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omukyanga ku barikwehurira batiinisiibwe engyesho mbi, nikibaasa kurugwamu okuhenda obwesigye n'oburinzi. Omwanya gw'okutiina ogu nigubaasa kukora kihango ahamagara g'abantu omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Many people recognize the importance of trees in maintaining ecological balance. In addition to their environmental benefits, the cultivation of trees has become a profitable industry.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bakimanyi nti emiti gya mugaso mu kukuuma obutonde. Ng'oggyeko emigaso gyayo eri obutonde bw'ensi, okulima emiti kufuuse mulimu oguleeta amagoba.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gingeyo ber pa yadi me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Medo i kom ber pa yadi i kom cwec ma orumuwa, puru yadi dong odoko biacara ma kelo magoba madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejenete itunga luipu ajokis naka ikito kanu aidar aiboisio nu akwap. Kilema ajokis naka ejautene lo akwap, akoru na ikito erai na ejai ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ni orodri pati eyini aa'zu angu eyi ma eselea ri ma tambazu ri ra. Orodri yini angu ama agei ri ma alia 'diyi ma drilea, pati ezoza eca curu'do okalamvu orodriruni ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibamanya omugasho gw'emiti omukureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Okwongyera aha migasho yaabo aha buhangwa bw'ensi, okuhinga emiti kihindukire ekitongore ekirikureeta amagoba.

eng_prompt: As urban areas continue to expand and more people migrate to cities in search of better opportunities, the strain on essential resources becomes increasingly evident. This demographic shift creates a pressing need to address the sustainability of food, water, and energy supplies.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okugaziwa era abantu bangi nebasengukira mu bibuga okunoonya emikisa emirungi, okunyigirizibwa ku bintu ebikulu kweyongera okweyoleka. Enkyukakyuka eno mu bungi bw'abantu ereetawo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ku byetaago by'emmere, amazzi n'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kabedo me boma tye kamede ki dongo dok dano mapol tye ka kobo me cito I citi ka yenyo gum maber, peko me jami ma mite ikwo tye ka nen tutwal. Alokaloka me wel dano eni kelo miti matek tutwal me neno ni cam, pii ki mac tye ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aisiekikin ido itunga luipu elosete aiboisio nuka itaunin aimo arerengesio nuajokak, apolor noi ationis naka iboro lu itwasamao. Aijulanakineta nuka itunga einakinitos eipud loka aitemokin nuka inyamat, akipi keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu drile dika 'ba karakara eyi mu tawuni eyi ma alea drileba muke ndeni 'diyi ndazu, e'yo afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ojata 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni 'diri le 'ba ma ko e'yo ewaru nyaka, yi, azini okpo eyini ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Emyanya y'endembo ku erikugumizamu neegura kandi abantu baingi nibaza omu ndembo kuronda emigisha mirungi, oburemeezi aha bintu ebikuru nibweyongyera kureebeka. Okuhinduka kw'omuhendo gw'abantu nikureetaho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okukora ahaby'okurya, amaizi hamwe n'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and preserve biodiversity, many countries are implementing policies to protect their natural resources. One such country is Uganda, which has recognized the importance of its forest ecosystems.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okukuuma obutonde, ensi nnyingi zissa mu nkola enkola okukuuma eby'obugagga byayo eby'obutonde. Erimu ku mawanga ng'ago ye Uganda, ekitegedde obukulu bw'obutonde bw'ensi bwayo obw'ebibira.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki gwoko jami makwo, lobe mapol tye ka keto cik me gwoko jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo. Lobo acel ma kit meno obedo Uganda, ma oniang ber pa bunga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aidar iboro luegelegela, eutasi akwapin nuipu aitegear ainapeta nu ayuarite iborokec luka Edeke. Adiopet akwap kwape kangin ngesi Uganda, lo ejenunit ajokis naka aiboisio nuka amagoron.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be dika afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu, kari karakara eyi azita eyi 'ba e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu. Kari alu 'dile 'diyi ma azi kari Uganda niri'I. Kari 'di esu orodri afa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okurinda eby'obuhangwa, amahanga maingi gariyo nigakora ebiragiro by'okurinda eby'obuhangwa bwago. Eihanga rimwe nk'eryo ni Uganda, erikwetegyereza omugasho gw'obuhangwa bw'amahamba gaayo.

eng_prompt: Protecting our natural resources is essential for maintaining biodiversity and ensuring sustainable ecosystems. One crucial aspect of this protection involves understanding the significance of designated forest reserve areas.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma eby'obugagga byaffe eby'omu ttaka kya nkizo mu kukuuma obutonde bw'ensi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikwata ku kukuuma ebibira kwe kutegeera obulungi bw'ebifo ebirimu ebibira.
ach_prompt: Gwoko cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I gwoko bunga enoni obedo niang ber pa kabedo ma kiyubu pi gwoko bunga.
teo_prompt: Aidar iboro lu isuban luka Edeke erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iboro lu isuban luka Edeke. Adiopebore naepol noi naka ayuarite ikito ngun imoriarit amisiikin ajokis naka aiboisio nuebeit aidar amagoron.
lgg_prompt: Afa amavile nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo azi okporu ageitema 'di ma ta mbazuri ma alia ri ma efi orodri angu 'bani ope jere ma ta mbazu 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda ebintu byaitu eby'obuhangwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. Ekikuru munonga omu kurinda ebibira n'okumanya omugasho gwabyo.

eng_prompt: It is important for the community to respect designated areas for public use. Encroaching on these spaces can lead to legal issues and disrupt local governance.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso abantu mu kitundu okussa ekitiibwa mu bifo ebyateekebwawo okukozesebwa abantu bonna. Okuyingirira ebifo bino kiyinza okuvaako ensonga z'amateeka n'okutaataaganya enfuga y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lwak me woro kabedo ma kiyubu pi tic pa lwak. Donyo I kabedo magi twero kelo peko me cik ki balo tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga ayongite aiboisio nu itwasamao itunga. Aibiror aiboisio nu epedori ayangaun akiro nu ikisila ka aitolitol epugae lo okwap.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru ongulumu eyini inzita fezu angu 'bani ope o'bi eyini 'diyi dri. E'yo fizu angu 'diyi ma alea ri eco e'yo azita palaa 'diyi eji dika eco driceza angu 'da ma alea ri eza ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho abantu kuheereza ekitiinisa emyanya y'okukorerwamu abantu boona. Okutaahirira emyanya egi nikibaasa kureetaho enshonga z'ebiragiro n'okutabangura obwebembezi bw'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and careful cultivation, the crops have reached their peak growth. The farmers eagerly monitor the fields, anticipating the moment when they can begin the harvest.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okulima n'obwegendereza, ebirime bituuse ku ntikko yaabyo. Abalimi beetegereza ennimiro n'obwagazi, nga basuubira ekiseera we banaatandikira okukungula.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki poto maber, cam dong odongo maber tutwal. Lupur tye ka ngiyo poto gi ki miti madit tutwal kun gibedo ka kuro kare me cako kac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda akoru ejok, apolor iraan noi. Etapit akoriok airereonor amisirin kec, aomit apak na ebeitor kesi ageun aisak.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini ori ezoza kililiru 'diyi ma vutia, ori eyi zo eyi ma omgbo ururi ma alea 'bo. Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi angu ori ezozu 'diyi ma pamvu one avasi, yini e'yo egazu sa'wa yini ecozu e'dozu ori okuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okuhinga n'obwegyendesereza, ebihingirwe byeyongyeire kukura. Abahingi n'abariisa nibareebuuza omusiri, barikuteekateeka obwire obu bashemereire kutandika kusharuura.

eng_prompt: Trees play a crucial role in the ecosystem by absorbing carbon dioxide and releasing oxygen. Additionally, they contribute to the water cycle through processes like transpiration.
lug_prompt: Emiti gikola omulimu munene mu butonde bw'ensi nga giggyamu omukka gwa kaboni dayokisayidi n'okufulumya omukka gwa oxygen. Okugatta ku ekyo, ziyamba mu kutambula kw'amazzi okuyita mu nkola nga okufuumuuka.
ach_prompt: Yadi timo tic mapire tek tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa kun gamo yamo carbon dioxide ki cwalo yamo ayweya. Medo i kom meno, gikonyo I wot pa pii kun gitiyo ki yoo mapat-pat macalo yweyo.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete ikito aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar na akwap kowai lo ailem ekwam lo ekwam ka alacakin ekwam lo ekwam. Kilema, ingarakinete kesi kotoma aijulanakineta nuka akipi kopone loka aitwasam akipi.
lgg_prompt: Pati eyi azi okporu ni nga angu ama agei 'diyi ma alea eyini oli omvele carbon dioxide omvizu azini oli omvele oxygen ofuzu risi. E'yo azi dika, yi yi ma ti oja geri 'bani yi ma ti ojizuri vusi.
nyn_prompt: Emiti neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'obuhangwa ahabw'okwihaho omwika gw'okwisya n'okwihaho omwika gw'okwisya. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, nibyongyera aha nkora y'amaizi kurabira omu kukoresa amaizi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent global events, governments are reevaluating their security measures. As a result, they are implementing new strategies to address the growing threat of terrorism.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo mu nsi gye buvuddeko, gavumenti zikyekenneenya enkola zaayo ez'ebyokwerinda. N'ekivuddemu, bateeka mu nkola obukodyo obupya okukola ku bulabe bw'abatujju obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I wilobo, gamente tye ka ngiyo kit ma gwoko kuc tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye katic ki yoo manyen me lweny i kom peko me lweny alibu matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac kotoma akwap kere, eutasi apuganisinei airereor iwaitin kec luka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aitegear iwaitin luitetiak kanu aitikitik lukodwaratau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi 'yepi o'diru wudrikuru ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete yi geri yini ageyitema ni 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. E'yo 'disi, eyi geri o'diru 'diyi ayu e'yo ori gbaza e'yo uri gbaza ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: Forests play a crucial role in maintaining ecological balance and supporting biodiversity. They provide essential resources and services that benefit both the environment and human populations.
lug_prompt: Ebibira bikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma obutonde bw'ensi n'okubudaabuda ebiramu eby'enjawulo. Ziwa ebintu ebikulu n'obuweereza ebigasa obutonde bw'ensi n'abantu.
ach_prompt: Bunga timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki jami ma orumuwa. Gimiyo jami ki kony ma pigi tego ma konyo cwec ma orumuwa ki dano.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete ikibiran aswam naepol noi kanu aidar isuban keda itiang luegelegela. Einanakinete kesi iboro ka aijanakino naejok noi na ingarakinete akwap keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Oce eyi azi okporu ni nga angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbazu tro tro azini afa nyakuni ndundu 'diyi atizu. Yi afa orodriru azini azakoma orodriru angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi azini o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi fe.
nyn_prompt: Ebibira nibikora omurimo gw'amaani, okureeberera eby'obuhangwa n'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Niziheereza ebintu ebikuru n'obuheereza oburikugasira eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In order to protect the environment and preserve natural habitats, strict regulations have been put in place. One of the key measures is the prohibition of human habitation in designated zones.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi n'ebifo ebirimu, amateeka amakakali gateekeddwawo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa kwe kuwera abantu okubeera mu bifo ebiragiddwa.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki kabedo wa, kiketo cik matek tutwal. Acel me kin jami ma pire tek ma myero kitim en aye juku bedo pa dano I kabedo ma kicimo.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive market, businesses must find effective ways to reach their target audience. One of the most powerful tools at their disposal is advertising.
lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akalimu okuvuganya, bizinensi zirina okunoonya engeri ennungi okutuuka ku bantu be zigenderera. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okuba eby'amaanyi bye balina kwe kulangirira.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I cuk, biacara omyero gunong yoo maber me oo bot dano ma gimito. Jami acel ma pire tek ma gitye kwede en aye cato wil.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni ilolo, ekot ibiasaran adumun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu adolokin itunga lu ekotos kesi. Adiopet kotoma iboro luegogong lu ejaas kesi ngesi alimonoreta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo baka seza ni ewu andruri ma alea, le tujari eyi ma esu geri kililiru eyini ecozu cazu 'ba eyini lele 'diyi vu. Afa azi okporu eyini ayu 'diyi ma azi eyi e'yo oyuza ni.

eng_prompt: In today's unpredictable economy, relying solely on a single source of income can be risky. Exploring various avenues for financial growth can provide greater stability and security.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino ebitategeerekeka, okwesigama ku nsibuko emu yokka ey'ensimbi kiyinza okuba eky'akabi. Okunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukulaakulana mu byenfuna kisobola okuleetawo obutebenkevu n'obutebenkevu obusingako.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim me kare-ni, jenge I kom yoo acel keken me nongo cente twero bedo gin marac tutwal. Yenyo yoo mapat-pat me dongo lobo I tenge me lim twero kelo kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loepol noi loka ikapun, aitosom epone ediope loka adumun ikapun erai ibore yenetiono noi. Aingic iponesio luegelegela luka apol naka ikapun epedori ayangaun ainapakina keda ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu ewu andruri ma alea ri ma alea, aa'ta geri alu robia esuzu ri ma dria ri eco ovu e'yo ewaru ni i. Geri ndundu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'diyi eco asianzu azini agei tema eji ra.

eng_prompt: In many religious communities, spiritual leaders play a crucial role in guiding their congregations. One of their primary responsibilities is to impart knowledge about faith and divine principles.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'enzikiriza bingi, abakulembeze b'eby'omwoyo bakola omulimu omukulu mu kulambika ebibiina byabwe. Obumu ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obukulu kwe kubunyisa okumanya ku nzikiriza n'emisingi gya Katonda.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me dini, lutela me dini gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal me doro lulega gi. Ticgi ma pire tek aye obedo poko ngec i kom dini ki cik pa lubanga.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuka idiinin luipu, iswamaete engarenok luka edini aswam naepol noi kanu aingarenikin ikuristayon kec. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei kec nuapolok ngesi aisianakin acoa naikamunit aiyuun keda ainapeta nuka Edeke.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continued to reshape how communities gather, many religious leaders sought new ways to connect with their congregations. In response to these challenges, digital outreach became a vital tool for sharing messages of hope and faith.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyagenda mu maaso n'okukyusa engeri abantu gye bakungaanamu, abakulembeze b'enzikiriza bangi baanoonya engeri empya ez'okukwatagana n'abantu baabwe. ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omede ki loko kit ma lwak gure kwede, lutela dini mapol guyenyo yoo manyen me kube ki lukricitayo. Macalo adwogi me peko magi, kubbe iwi yamo (internet) odoko yoo ma pire tek me poko kwena me gen ki niye.
teo_prompt: Neinyikokinit adeka aijulakin epone loimoriaritotor itunga, apotu engarenok lu ediini komooto iponesio luitetiak luka arucokina keda ikuristayon kec. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, araun ainapeta nuepolok noi nuka aimor akiro nuka amuno keda aiyuun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile geri ongulumu eyini okuzu 'diyi ojazu, drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi nda geri o'diru eyi ecizu kanisa eyivile 'diyi pie. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, e'yo o'dukoti edrizu geri oli aliasi 'diyi eca afa orodriru e'yo asi 'baza ni azini aita ni 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikuguma nibuhindura omuringo ogu abantu barikuteeraniramu, abeebembezi b'amadiini baingi bakasherura emiringo misya y'okukwatanisa n'abakurisitaayo. Omu kugarukamu oburemeezi obu, okuhikaana n'abantu kurabira aha mikutu ya yintaneeti, kikahinduka eky'omugasho munonga omu kugabana obutumwa bw'amatsiko n'okwikiriza.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, the challenges faced by individuals often extend beyond the walls of the church. It is essential for church leaders to recognize the importance of community and provide guidance and support in all aspects of their congregants' lives.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, ebisoomooza abantu bye basanga bisukka ku bisenge by'ekkanisa. Kya mugaso nnyo abakulembeze b'ekkanisa okutegeera omugaso gw'ekitundu n'okuwa obulagirizi n'obuyambi mu mbeera zonna ez'obulamu bw'abakkiriza baabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, peko ma dano acel-acel nongo pol kare kato kor ot lega. Pire tek tutwal ki lutela me kanica me niang ber pa kabedo gi ki miyo kony ki kony i jami weng ma kwako kwo pa lucristayo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, ainingosia nuetereikina keda itunga mam ejaasi toma okanisa. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka engarenok lu ekanisa ajenun ajokis naka itunga ka aijaikin aingarenikinio keda agangat kotoma aijar naka ikuristayon.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo ewaru 'ba alu alu yini dri fuzu yi be 'diyi aga kanisa ma abi yi ra. Eri orodriru drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ni orodri ongulumu eyini ri ma e'yo egazu azini atita fezu eyi ma kanisa ni 'diyi dri e'yo dria eyi ma edri ni 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: The world has faced unprecedented challenges over the past year, impacting daily life and well-being. As communities grappled with isolation and uncertainty, the effects of the pandemic became increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Ensi eyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo mu mwaka oguwedde, okukosa obulamu obwa bulijjo n'obulamu obulungi. Nga ebitundu birwanagana n'okweyawula n'obutali bukakafu, ebikosa ekirwadde bbunansi byeyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Lobo okato ki peko mapol tutwal I mwaka ma okato, ma obedo ki adwoki marac I kom kwo me nino ducu ki kwo maber. I kare ma lwak gubedo ki peko me bedo kengi, adwogi marac pa two korona omede ki nen.
teo_prompt: Etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kokaru lo atubor, nuetirorit aijar naka nginiparan keda aijar najokan. Kwape etereikina itunga keda atiakatiaka keda amamus ajenanut, apotu atiokisio nuka adeka ngin kojenutu.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru fu dri e'yo ewaru 'diyi be eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eyi 'yepi 'ba eyi ma edri o'du driasi azini aa'ta muke si 'diyi pie. Ongulumu eyini aa'ria a'di 'dizu e'yo eyi ma esele cozu tualu e'yo eyi ma dria ku 'diyisi, e'yo azo 'deza 'di ni fe 'diyi eca e'da sa'wa driasi.

eng_prompt: In many religious teachings, compassion and generosity are fundamental principles that guide believers in their daily lives. Among these principles, one of the most important is the call to support those who are less fortunate.
lug_prompt: Mu njigiriza z'enzikiriza nnyingi, okusaasira n'obugabi bye bintu ebikulu ebirambika abakkiriza mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Mu misingi gino, ekimu ku bikyasinze obukulu kwe kuyita okuyamba abo abatalina mukisa.
ach_prompt: I pwony me dini mapol, kica ki bedo ngat ma cinge yot obedo cik ma doro luyee I kwo gi me nino ducu. I kin cik magi, acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye lega me konyo jo matye ki gum manok.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aicoreta nuka idiinin luipu, asianut keda ainanakinete eraasi nutupitono nuingarenikinitos lu eyuunak kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan. Kotoma okisila lu, ediopet koboro lu epol ajokis ngesi aicoretait naka aigang ngul lumam ejaasi keda arerengu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dini ni karakara 'diyi ma alea, asi ndriza azini afa feza eri e'yo okporu 'ba a'ita ni 'diyi ma dri cepi eyi ma edri eyi ma alea o'du driasi 'diyi. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo azi orodriru ndeni ri lezu 'ba drilebaru ku 'diyi atizu.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating health crisis, government officials implemented strict measures to curb the transmission of the virus. As part of these measures, places of worship were ordered to shut their doors temporarily.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, abakungu ba gavumenti baateekawo enkola enkakali okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Ng'ekimu ku bisaanyizo bino, amasinzizo gaalagirwa okuggalawo enzigi zaago okumala akaseera.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede, lutic pa gamente guketo cik matek me gengo nya pa two eni. Macalo yoo acel me timo man, kiciko odi lega me loro dogola gi pi tutunu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu, apotu eswamak luka apugan itolomutu ikisila luitikitikete awea naka ekorona. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi kolimokinai aiboisio nu ilipere agolokin ikekia kec kanu apak naedit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi o'ba geri okporu eyi azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba fe azita angu inzita inzizu 'diyini yi ma jotile opizu sawa were si.
