eng_prompt: In today's digital age, communication has transformed dramatically, allowing messages to reach vast audiences in an instant. As a result, many religious organizations have embraced these tools to share their teachings and connect with followers.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, empuliziganya ekyuse nnyo, ekisobozesezza obubaka okutuuka ku bantu abangi mu kaseera katono. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'enzikiriza bingi byettanira ebikozesebwa bino okugabana enjigiriza zabyo n'okukwatagana n'abagoberezi.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kareni, kubbe olokke tutwal, weko kwena oo bot dano mapol tutwal I cawa acel keken. Macalo adwogi ne, dule me dini mapol guyee jami tic magi me nywako pwony gi ki kube ki lulub kor gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejulakinos noi arucokina, ijaikit akiro adolokin itunga luipu katipet. Kanuka ngun, apotu iriongeta luipu luka idiinin itwasamata iboro lu kanu aimor aisisianakin kec ka arucokina keda atupitokokec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, e'yo nzeza oja i saaru, fezu o'duko eyini cazu 'ba karakara eyivu sa'wa were si. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo aitanisi karakara 'diyi a'i afa 'diyi imbata yini 'diyi awazu azini yi ecizu 'ba yi ma vuti obi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka ya digito ey'erizooba,empurizagana ehindukire munonga, ekirikwikiriza obutumwa kuhika aha bantu baingi omu bwire bukye. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'ediini bingi bikwasire ebikwato ebi okugabana engyesa zaabyo n'okukwatanisa n'abakuratsi.

eng_prompt: In many communities, local governance is structured around various leadership roles that help maintain order and address the needs of residents. One key position within this framework is that of a chief, who often serves as a vital link between the government and the people.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obukulembeze bw'ebitundu butegekeddwa okwetoloola emirimu gy'obukulembeze egy'enjawulo egiyamba okukuuma emirembe n'okukola ku byetaago by'abatuuze. Ekifo ekimu ekikulu mu nkola eno ky'eky'omukulu, akola ng'omukwanaganya omukulu wakati wa gavumenti n'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tela me tedero ki yubu malube ki tic pa lutela ma konyo me gwoko kuc ki cobo miti pa lwak. Kabedo acel ma pire tek I yub man obedo pa rwot, ma pol kare tiyo macalo kubbe ikin gamente ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, itemonokino apugan naka atutubena nuegelegela kanu aingarakin aidar ainapakina ka aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga. Adiopet adoketait naepol noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi lokapolon, loiswamai kwape arucokinitok kiding apugan keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo driceza ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba azi ndundu eyi ma dria eyini ani azakoma fezu e'yo otuzu azini e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. Pari azi okporu 'di ma alea ri eri 'ba opi ru, azi ngapi gamete ma eselea o'bi eyi pie ri'I.

Omwanya gumwe ogw'omugasho omu nkora egi, n'ogw'omukuru, orikukira kukora nk'omukago gw'amaani ahagati ya gavumenti n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In a rapidly changing world, many individuals seek stability and connection to their heritage. Cultural institutions play a vital role in preserving traditions and fostering a sense of community.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekyuka mangu, abantu bangi banoonya obutebenkevu n'okukwatagana n'obusika bwabwe. Ebitongole by'ebyobuwangwa bikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma eby'obuwangwa n'okutumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma tye ka loke oyot-oyot, dano mapol tye ka yenyo kuc ki kubbe ki tekwaro gi. Gangi kwan me tekwaro timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko tekwaro ki dongo rwom me ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ijulakina katipet, ekotosi itunga luipu ainapakina keda arucokina keda inonosio kec. Iswamaete iriongeta luka inonosio aswam naepol noi kanu aidar inonosio keda aitopoloria itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru i ojapi mbeleru 'di ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi asianzu nda dika eyi eci eyi ma e'yo eyini 'diyi pie. Pari e'yo suruni 'diyi ni 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo suruni 'diyi ma ta mbazu tualu ongulumu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikuhinduka juba, abantu nibaronda obusingye n'okukwatanisa n'obuhangwa bwabo. Amatendekyero g'eby'obuhangwa nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okureetaho enkoragana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: To ensure effective communication and collaboration, it's essential to establish a suitable location for discussions. Choosing the right space can significantly impact the productivity of the gathering.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa empuliziganya ennungi n'okukwatagana, kya mugaso okuteekawo ekifo ekituufu eky'okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Okulonda ekifo ekituufu kisobola okukyusa ennyo ebivaamu mu lukungaana.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lok ki winye tye maber, pire tek tutwal me yubu kabedo maber me nywako lok. Yero kabedo maber twero weko kacoke bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun einer loajokan keda aiswamanara, ejokuna aitolomun aiboisit naejok kanu aitemitem akiro. Aseun aiboisit na abeit epedori aitodolikin aswam naka atukonokin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru azini ti icita kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru angu kililiru 'bani e'yo onzezu ri sizu. Pari kililiru ri pezu ri eco e'yo otuta okuta ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu habaho empurizagana n'okukwatanisa kurungi, n'eky'omugasho okutaho omwanya murungi gw'okuhanuura. Okutoorana omwanya oguhikire, nikibaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu nteerane.

eng_prompt: In many indigenous and local communities, leadership roles often extend beyond mere governance to encompass cultural stewardship. These leaders play a vital role in preserving traditions and fostering a sense of identity among their people.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi eby'obuzaale n'ebitundu, emirimu gy'obukulembeze gitera okusukka ku nfuga yokka okuzingiramu n'obukulembeze bw'ebyobuwangwa. Abakulembeze bano bakola omulimu gwa mugaso mu kukuuma eby'obuwangwa n'okutumbula enneewulira y'endagamuntu mu bantu baabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol pa anywali ki lutedero, tic pa lutela ipol kare pe kwako tela keken ento bene kwako gwoko tekwaro. Lutela magi gitiyo tic ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko tekwaro gi ki medo rwom me ngec ikin dano gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atekerin keda atekerin nuipu, epol aswam naka engarenok adepar aipuga bon kitoni aimoriarit aidar inonosio. Iswamaete engarenok lu aswam naepol noi kanu aidar inonosio ka aitopolor ajenanut kanejaas itunga kec.

eng_prompt: In a tightly-knit community, the role of clan leaders is crucial for maintaining harmony and order. They are entrusted with the responsibility of guiding their clans through challenges and opportunities.

teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ekoto engarenone loajokan iponesio luitegelikina. Kotoma ngun, apedorit aisinyikokit luce ka aitopolor apol erai ibore yenepol noi.

nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, obwebembezi burungi nibwetaaga emitwarize y'omutaano. Omuri ebi, okubaasa kuhiga abandi n'okureetaho entunguuka n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As urban landscapes continue to evolve, many people are left wondering about the defining characteristics of contemporary cities. Is it the architecture, technology, or perhaps the lifestyle of its inhabitants that sets a modern city apart?
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okukyuka, abantu bangi basigadde beebuuza ku ngeri z'ebibuga eby'omulembe guno.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kabedo me boma tye kamede ki dongo, dano mapol pud tye ki ngeng I kom kit ma city mapat-pat tye kwede I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aijulakin, ejaasi itunga luipu aomoom nuikamunitos iponesio luka itaunin luka apakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini aa'zu 'diyi ni mu drile e'doria, 'ba karakara eyi asi e'yo ega e'yo tawuni ewu curu'do 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa bw'endembo ku birikugumizamu nibihinduka, abantu baingi nibasigara nibeebuuza aha bintu ebirikushoboorora endembo eziriho hati.

eng_prompt: Rapid urbanization often leads to inadequate infrastructure and housing. As a result, many residents find themselves living in overcrowded and underdeveloped areas.
lug_prompt: Okukula amangu mu bibuga kitera okuvaako ebbula ly'ebizimbe n'ebizimbe ebimala. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi beesanga nga babeera mu bifo ebijjudde abantu ate nga tebikulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo oyot oyot I boma ipol kare kelo peko me tic ki odi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol nongo gibedo I kabedo ma dano dwong iye tutwal dok bene pe dongo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol na katipet na itaunin eyangauni amamus na iboro ka itogoi lu edolitos. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi itunga luipu aiboi aiboisio nuejaasi keda itunga luipu noi ido komamei apol.
lgg_prompt: Angu eyi ma zota mbeleru ri ni tutuni fe afa ayuzaru azini jo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ako ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eyi esu eyi aa angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea tre dika angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu omu ndembo nikureetaho eibura ry'amaju n'ebyombeko ebirikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi nibeshanga nibatuura omu myanya erimu abantu baingi kandi etatunguukire.

eng_prompt: Can you tell me more about your qualifications and experiences? I'm curious to understand how you see yourself fitting into this role.
lug_prompt: Osobola okumbuulira ebisingawo ku bisaanyizo byo n'obumanyirivu bwo? Njagala okumanya engeri gy'okwatamu ekifo kino.
ach_prompt: Itwero titta jami mapol I kom rwom me kwan mamegi ki ngec ma itye kwede? Atye ki miti me niang kit ma ineno kwede ni ipore pi tic man.
teo_prompt: Ipedori ijo alimokin eong nuipu nuikamunitos apapulaikon keda amisiarit kon? Akoto eong ajenun epone loiwomit jo ebe ibusakinitor jo aswam aswam na.
lgg_prompt: Mi eco ma dri e'yo nze e'yo drile kokobi mini esu 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo mini esu 'diyi ma dria ra? Le ma ma ma ega e'yo mini mi 'bazu azi 'di ma alia ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Noobaasa kungambira ebirikukiraho ebirikukukwataho n'ebirikukukwataho? Nyine ekihika ky'okumanya oku orikwetwara nk'orikuhikaana n'omurimo ogu.

eng_prompt: Effective leaders understand that their primary responsibility is to foster growth within their teams. By prioritizing development, they can inspire individuals to reach their full potential.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze abalungi bakimanyi nti obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obukulu kwe kutumbula enkulaakulana mu ttiimu zaabwe. Nga bakulembeza enkulaakulana, basobola okusikiriza abantu okutuuka ku busobozi bwabwe obujjuvu.
ach_prompt: Lutela mabeco niang ni tic gi madit tye me dongo dul tic gi. Kace gimiyo dongo lobo bedo gin ma pire tek, ci gi twero cuku cwiny dano me tic ki kero gi weng.
teo_prompt: Engarenok lu iswamaete ejok ejenete ebe aswam kec naepol ngesi aitopolor apol kotoma otimunikec. Kowai lo aisingarenit apol, epedorete kesi aisinyikokin itunga aitodolikin apedorosiokec kere.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba azi ngapi muke 'diyi nii ra kini eyi ma azi okporu ri zota otuzu amuti eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri i. E'yo angu ezoma niri 'bazu okporu risi, eyi eco 'ba eyi ma ava enga eyini ani ecozu eyi ma okpo esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi barungi nibamanya ngu obujunanizibwa bwabo obukuru n'okutunguura tiimu zaabo. Kubarikuza omu maisho entunguuka, nibabaasa kuheereza abantu amaani g'okukora ekirikubaasika.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, many regions are considering the transition to city status. However, there are significant challenges that some districts face in meeting the necessary requirements for this change.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula, ebitundu bingi birowooza ku ky'okufuuka ebibuga. Kyokka waliwo okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi disitulikiti ezimu kwe zisanga mu kutuukiriza ebyetaago by'enkyukakyuka eno.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde i boma madongo, but lobo mapol tye ka mito doko city. Kadi bed kumeno, tye peko mapol ma districts mukene nongo ikare me timo jami ma mite pi aloka loka man.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luka itaunin, eutasi aiboisio nuipu aomoom nu aijulakin araun isitei. Konye, ejaas atiokisio nuepolok nuetereikina keda idisitriktan ice kanu aitodolikin iboro lu ekotoi kanu aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu, angu karakara eyi e'yo 'du e'yo ecazu aku ambo eyi ru ri ma dria. Kani si, e'yo ewaru distrikiti azi 'diyi ni esu e'yo 'bani le ojata 'di 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, ebicweka bingi nibiteekateeka ahakuhinduka endembo. Kwonka, hariho oburemeezi bw'amaani obu disiturikiti ezimwe zirikushanga omu kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'empinduka egi.

eng_prompt: Urban development requires careful consideration of various factors. Effective city planning involves anticipating the needs of the population and infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeetaaga okufaayo ennyo ku nsonga ez'enjawulo. Okuteekateeka ekibuga obulungi kizingiramu okulowooza ku byetaago by'abantu n'ebizimbe.
ach_prompt: Dongo boma mito ni ki tam matut I kom jami mapol. Yub maber me city kwako tam I kom jami ma mite pi dano kacel ki jami mukene.
teo_prompt: Apol naka itaunin ekot airereonor iboro luegelegela. Aitemonokin eibuga ejok imoriarit aomisio nuka ipudesia luka itunga keda iboro luingarakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba ma ega e'yo ndundu eyi angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma dria. Aku ambo eyi ma otita kililiru ri ma alea, le 'ba ma ega e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma dria tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka y'endembo neeyetenga okwetegyereza n'obwegyendesereza enshonga nyingi. Okuteekateekyera kurungi orurembo, nikitwariramu okuteekateeka ahabyetaago by'abantu n'ebyombeko.

eng_prompt: Efficient infrastructure is essential for facilitating trade and mobility. As nations strive for growth, the importance of a robust transport network becomes increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Emizimbo emirungi gya mugaso mu kwanguyiza eby'obusuubuzi n'entambula. Ng'amawanga galwanirira enkulaakulana, omugaso gw'entambula ennungi gweyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Odi tic mabeco obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me weko biacara ki wot bedo yot. I kare ma lobe tye ka yele me dongo lobo, ber pa yub maber me wot bene tye ka nen.
teo_prompt: Iboro lu iswamao ejok ejok ejok kanu aitapatan agwelanar keda alosit. Kwape ekotosi akwapin apol, epol ajokis naka elose loajokan noi.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi orodriru tujari azini acita ma aza kozu. Kari eyini dri ciria zota esuzu, orodri geri acizu kililiru 'diyiniri ni eca e'dazaru drile.
nyn_prompt: Ebyombeko birungi n'eby'omugasho omu by'obushubuzi n'okutambura. Amahanga ku garikugyezaho kutunguuka, omugasho gw'entambura nungi nigweyongyera kureebeka.

eng_prompt: In any organization, the dynamics of leadership are constantly evolving. As circumstances shift and new challenges arise, the need for different leadership styles becomes apparent.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, enkola y'obukulembeze ekyukakyuka buli kaseera. Embeera bw'ekyuka n'okusoomoozebwa okupya bwe kujja, obwetaavu bw'enkola z'obukulembeze ez'enjawulo bweyoleka.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, tela tye ka loke tere tere. Ka jami tye ka loke ki peko manyen tye kabino, miti me yoo me tela mapat-pat nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta kere, ejai aijulanakineta nuka eingarenone. Kwape ijulakinor ejautene keda atiokisio nuitetiak, apolor eipud loka aiboisio nuegelegela nuka eingarenone.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo driceza ni 'diyi oja eyi sa'wa driasi. E'yo yi ni i ojazu azini e'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi ni e'doria, lezu geri driceza ni ndundu 'diyi ma ovu e'dazaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, obwebembezi nibugyenda nibuhinduka. Embeera ku erikuhinduka hamwe n'oburemeezi obutsya, ekyetengo ky'emitwarize y'obwebembezi etarikushushana nikyeyoreka.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced and ever-changing environment, effective leadership requires clarity of purpose and direction. To inspire your team and drive success, maintaining a sharp focus on your goals is essential.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, obukulembeze obulungi bwetaagisa okuba n'ekigendererwa n'obulagirizi. Okukubiriza ttiimu yo n'okuvuga obuwanguzi, okukuuma essira ku biruubirirwa byo kya mugaso.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, tela maber mito ni dano gubed ki ngec matut i kom ngo ma omyero gutim ki ngo ma omyero gutim. Pi cuku cwiny lutic megi ki kelo loc, keto cwinyi I kom yub ma itye kwede pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ekot engarenone loajokan ajaut keda alosikineta nu ecaete. Kanu aisinyikokit eswamak kon keda aitodolikin akerianut, ibusakinit jo apodokinit alosikinetekon.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, driceza kililiru ri le 'ba ma ovu egata azini driceza kililiru be. Mi vile amuti avitaniri ava fezu azini drile suza ma ti ojizu, asi 'bazu e'yo mini lele 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'ahonaaho, obwebembezi burungi nibwetaaga ekigyendererwa n'obwebembezi oburikwetegyerezibwa. Okuheereza tiimu yaawe amaani n'okureetaho obusinguzi, okuta omutima aha bigyendererwa byawe n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In any situation, it's essential to consider the impact of our actions on others. Making thoughtful choices can lead to a more harmonious and respectful environment.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri ebikolwa byaffe gye bikwata ku balala. Okukola okusalawo okulungi kusobola okuleetawo embeera ey'emirembe n'okussa ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare mo keken, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwoki pa jami ma watimo I kom jo mukene. Moko tam maber twero kelo kuc ki woro ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Kojautene ediokere, ejokuna aomoom epone loepedoriata aswamisiowok aitolitol luce. Aswam aseununeta nuejok epedorete ayangaun ainapakina keda ayongite.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ciri ma alea, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani 'ye 'ba azi 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'duza kililiru ri eco fe angu aa'zu tualu inzita be.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera yoona, n'eky'omugasho okureeba oku ebikorwa byaitu birikukwata aha bandi. Okukora encwamu n'obwegyendesereza nikibaasa kureetaho obusingye n'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: In a world that is constantly changing, it's essential to adapt our mindset. Embracing new possibilities can lead to growth and innovation.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekyukakyuka buli kaseera, kya mugaso okukyusa endowooza yaffe. Okukkiriza ebintu ebipya ebiyinza okubaawo kisobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma tye ka loke tere tere, pire tek tutwal me loko tam wa. Jolo jami mapat-pat manyen twero kelo dongo lobo ki diro manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ijulakina duc, ejokuna aijulakin aomisiowok. Aingarakin aswam iboro luitetiak epedori ayangaun apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ojapi sawa driasi ri ma alea, eri orodriru ama ma omi ojazu. Afa ndundu o'diru 'diyi a'izuri eco fe zota azini e'yo ndundu eyi edezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikuguma neehinduka, n'eky'omugasho kuhindura emiteekateekyere yaitu. Okukoresa emiringo misya, nikibaasa kureetaho entunguuka n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: To foster a strong sense of community and ensure effective governance, it is essential for local authorities to engage with their constituents. Understanding the demographics and needs of the population is crucial for making informed decisions.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu ey'amaanyi n'okukakasa obukulembeze obulungi, kya mugaso eri ab'obuyinza ku byalo okukwatagana n'abalonzi baabwe. Okutegeera omuwendo gw'abantu n'ebyetaago by'abantu kikulu nnyo mu kukola okusalawo okulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi dongo cwiny me ribbe ikin lwak ki neno ni tela tye maber, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me tedero me lok ki lubol kwir gi. Niang lok kom wel dano ki miti pa dano pire tek tutwal pi moko tam matye ki ngec matut.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aomisio nuka itunga keda apugan najokan, ejokuna apedorosio nuka atutubena aiswamanar keda itunga luka atutubenakec. Amisikin nuikamunitos itunga keda ipudesia luka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu E'yo 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni azini afa eyini le 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entwaza nungi omu bantu n'obwebembezi burungi, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bashemereire kukorengana n'abantu abu barikujwekyera. Okwetegyereza omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'ebyetengo by'abantu n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kukora encwamu nungi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals find themselves in difficult financial situations due to unexpected expenses and rising living costs. As a result, they often struggle to meet the demands of various payments and obligations.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beesanga mu mbeera y'ebyensimbi enzibu olw'ensaasaanya etasuubirwa n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya. N'ekivuddemu, batera okulwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'okusasulwa n'obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nongo gitye I peko me lim pi cente ma gitiyo kwede ma pe byek tye I komgi ki mede pa wel cente me kwo. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gi nongo peko me cobo miti gi me cul mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu edumunenete awate kec kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun kanuka aitosom ikapun lu mam eomitai ka aijar naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi ainingosit aitodolikin ipudesia luka aitac keda iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi eyi esu e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea e'yo robia ayuza 'bani ega kokoru azini aje 'bani aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci e'yo 'bani lezu eyi ofezu azini e'yo ndundu eyini le 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibeeshangira omu mbeera mbi y'esente, ahabw'enshohoza etarikuteekateekwaho hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'emihendo y'ebintu. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kurwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'okushashurwa hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about budget transparency, the government has decided to take decisive action. To ensure accountability, the parliamentarian will clear the costs on behalf of the people.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bwerufu mu mbalirira, gavumenti esazeewo okubaako ky'ekolawo. Okukakasa embalirira, omubaka wa paalamenti ajja kusasula ssente ku lw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom bedo ki lok ada I kom byek lim, gamente omoko tamme me timo gin mo. Me neno ni kitiyo ki kor tic maber, lamemba me parliament biculu pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka ebajet, abu apugan koseu aswam kagogong. Kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, ebuni emeeba loka airabet aitac ikapun luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'du e'yo azi okporu 'yezu. E'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu, azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyi nga aje 'da ofe o'bi eyi ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eshaziremu kukora kyona ekirikwetengyesa, ahabw'okwerarikirira okuriyo nikweyongyera aha by'embaririra y'eihanga. Okureeba ngu hariho embaririra, omukiiki omwishengyero naija kushashura abantu.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service and numerous legislative achievements, the parliamentarian is eager to continue their work. With the upcoming elections approaching, they are actively campaigning to secure support from their constituents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga baweereza n'obunyiikivu era nga batuuse ku buwanguzi bungi mu by'amateeka, ababaka ba paalamenti beesunga okugenda mu maaso n'emirimu gyabwe. Ng'okulonda okujja kusembera, bakola kakuyege n'obunyiikivu okufuna obuwagizi okuva mu balonzi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki cobo miti pa luwang lwak I ot moko cik, lumemba me parliament tye ki miti matek me medde ki ticgi. Ki cok pa yer matye kabino ni, gitye ka bito kwi matek tutwal me nongo cwak ki bot lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin keda agogongu kotoma airabet, ekapakina imeeban luka airabet ainyikokin aswamukec. Kwape eyapie aseo, eutasi kesi aisup aseeta kanu adumun agangat kama ejaasi itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu asi driasi azini e'yo drileba ni karakara legiko ni 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, memba koloseni ni 'diyi avasi muzu azi yiniri be drile. E'yo opetaa emupi 'diyi ni ecazu ogogo risi, eyi ti odaza 'ye okporu atita esuzu engazu 'ba angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu buheereza n'okutunga obuhanguzi omu by'obutegyeki, abany'eishengyero baine ekihika ky'okugumizamu n'emirimo yaabo. Oburuuru oburikwija ku burikuhika haihi, bariyo nibakora kampiini n'amaani kutunga obushagiki kuruga omu bantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are eager to participate in the upcoming election, but they face significant financial barriers. As a result, the costs associated with the registration process become a major obstacle for them.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baagala nnyo okwenyigira mu kulonda okujja, naye basanga obuzibu bungi mu by'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, ebisale ebyekuusa ku kwewandiisa bifuuka ekizibu kya maanyi gye bali.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki miti me bedo tye I yer matye kabino ni, ento ginongo peko me lim mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, wel cente ma mite me coone doko peko madit tutwal botgi.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi itunga luipu ajaikin toma aseo naebunit, konye ejaasi kesi keda atiokisio nuipu nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etiai loka ikapun lu itwasamao kanu aiwadikaun erai ainingosit naepol noi kanejaas kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ava be pa tuzu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea ra te eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, aje e'yo ru siza niri ma dria ri eca e'yo azi okporu ni eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi baine ekihika ky'okwejumba omu karuuru akarikwiija, kwonka baine oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, ebishare ebirikukwatanisa n'okwehandikisa nibibaremesa munonga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent budget constraints and the need to allocate resources more effectively, it has become essential to evaluate our current spending practices. One area that warrants immediate attention is the cost associated with student registration.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu obuli mu mbalirira gye buvuddeko n'obwetaavu bw'okugabanya obulungi eby'obugagga, kifuuse kikulu okwekenneenya enkola zaffe ez'okusaasaanya ssente. Ekimu ku bintu ebyetaaga okukolebwako amangu bye bisale ebiva mu kwewandiisa kw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me byek me lim matye cokcok-ki ki miti me poko lim maber, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma watiyo kwede ki lim. Kabedo acel ma omyero ki tii iye oyot oyot obedo wel cente ma mite me coyo lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ebajet keda eipud loka aikor iboro ejok, erai ibore yenepol noi airereor iponesio luka aitosom ikapun. Adiopebon na ekoto aitemokin atipet ngesi etiai lo ikapun lu itwasamao kanu aiwadikaun esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru otita ajeni o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu geri kililiru 'diyisi, eri eca orodriru ama ma geri robia ayuzuri ma ale andrizu. E'yo azi alu lepi 'ba ma 'ba asi mbeleru ri eri aje sukulu anzi eyi ma ru sizu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra obwahati hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okugaba kurungi eby'obugaiga, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho okushwijuma enshohoza yaitu eriho hati. Ekintu kimwe ekishemereire kutaho amaani ahonaaho, n'omuhendo ogurikukwata aha kwehandikisa kw'abeegi.

eng_prompt: In today's world, where crime rates are on the rise, it's crucial to stay vigilant. Awareness can be the first line of defense against potential threats.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ng'obuzzi bw'emisango bweyongedde, kikulu nnyo okubeera obulindaala. Okumanyisibwa kuyinza okuba enkola esooka ey'okwekuuma ku kutiisibwatiisibwa okuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kare-ni, ma rwom me timo bal tye ka medde, pire tek tutwal me bedo ma wangwa twolo. Miyo ngec twero bedo yoo me gwokke ikare me peko ma twero bino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, ne iyata abilibilio naka ikisila, ejokuna noi asalakin epodokinit. Aitijenaret nes epone losodit loka ayuwara kama ejaasi iboro luitukurianete.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo onzi ma ongmbo ni tuzu, eri orodriru aa'zu mile be. E'yo mile oziza niri eco ovu ageitema okori e'yo ewaru ecopi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, ahu obukozi bw'ebibi bweyongyeire, n'eky'omugasho kuguma oyeteekateekire. Okumanyisa abantu, nikyo kintu ky'okubanza ekirikubaasa kubahwera kwetantara akabi.

eng_prompt: To streamline the payment process and enhance community engagement, the district is exploring innovative solutions for resident fees. One potential approach is to simplify the payment structure for local services.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okwanguya enkola y'okusasula n'okutumbula enkolagana mu kitundu, disitulikiti eri mu kunoonya engeri empya ez'okusasula ebisale by'abatuuze. Engeri emu eyinza okukozesebwa kwe kwanguya enkola y'okusasula empeereza y'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Me yubu yub me cul ki medo rwom me tic pa lwak, district tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me nongo cente pi lutedero. Yoo acel matwero tic kwede en aye me dwoko wel cul ma mite pi kony ma tye ikabedo wa yot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitapatan ainapeta nuka aitac ka aitojokar ainapeta nuka itunga, euta edisitrikt aingic iwaitin luitetiak luka aitac ikapun luka itunga. Epone ediope loepedorio aitodolikin ngesi aitapatan epone loka aitac ikapun luka aijaanakinio.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani robia ofezu ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu ongulumu eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo otuzu, distrikiti ni geri o'diru 'diyi onda e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini sukulu fizi ofezu 'diyi ma dria. Geri azi ecopi ra 'diyi ma azi eri geri 'bani robia ofezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo esizu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Disiturikiti eriyo necondooza omuringo murungi gw'okushashurira abatuuragye ebishare by'eishomero. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukorwa, n'okwanguhiiriza omuringo gw'okushashurira obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In a recent community meeting, local residents expressed their concerns about encroaching development on their properties. Recognizing the urgency of the situation, the member of parliament took action to support their cause.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abatuuze b'omu kitundu baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'okuyingirira enkulaakulana ku bintu byabwe. Olw'okukimanya nti embeera yali mbi nnyo, omubaka wa paalamenti yakola kyonna ekisoboka okuwagira ensonga yaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom donyo pa dongo lobo I kom jami gi. I nge niang kit ma peko ne tye kwede, lamemba me parliament otimo gin mo me cwako ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu alomar toma aiboisio kec. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuka ejautene, abu emeeba loka airabet kiswama kanu aigang akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo angu ezoma ni eyi ma nyaku eyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma dria ri nizu 'boria, memba koloseni ni 'da 'du e'yo atita fezu e'yo eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekicweka orwabaireho juba, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'okutaahirira eby'entunguuka aha bintu byabo. Omukiiki omwishengyero ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, akakora kyona ekirikubaasika kushagika ekigyendererwa kyabo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about land exploitation, the local community gathered to discuss potential solutions. Recognizing the importance of protecting their resources, the member of parliament made sure that people do not sell their land.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kubulankanya kw'ettaka, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri z'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Ng'ategeera obukulu bw'okukuuma eby'obugagga byabwe, omubaka wa paalamenti yakakasa nti abantu tebaguza ttaka lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom tim me nywaro tic ki ngom, lwak gugure me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Pi niang ber pa gwoko lonyo gi, lamemba me parliament oneno ni dano pe gucato ngom gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naka aitwasam alupok, apotu itunga luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Kanu ajenun ajokis naka ayuwar iborokec, abu emeeba loka airabet koany ebe mam itunga egwelanarete alupokokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo nyaku ayuza ma dria, ongulumu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. Erini e'yo orodri afa yini 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma e'yo egazu risi, memba koloseni ni 'da ne ra kini 'ba eyi ma nyaku ozi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahabw'okunyaga eitaka, abantu b'omubyaro baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Omukiiki omwishengyero ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obugaiga byabo, akareeba ngu abantu tibarikuguza eitaka ryabo.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of food security and sustainable development, local leaders have been advocating for increased participation in farming initiatives. As a result, the parliamentarian has sensitized people to engage in agricultural activities.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'obutebenkevu bw'emmere n'enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo babadde balwanirira okwongera okwetaba mu byobulimi n'obulunzi. N'ekivuddemu, omubaka wa paalamenti asomesezza abantu okwenyigira mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lutela me tedero guniang ber pa gwoko cam ki dongo lobo maber, gubedo ka cuku cwiny lwak me bedo tye i yub me pur. Macalo adwogi ne, lamemba me parliament opwonyo dano me donyo ilok me pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka amamus na inyamat keda apol na ejok, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aigang itunga alomar toma akoru. Kanuka ngun, isisianakinit emeeba loka airabet itunga alomar akoru.
lgg_prompt: Drileka angu ndundu eyi ma dricepi 'diyi e'bi e'yo orodriru e'yo nyaka ako ni azini angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma e'yo ega eyini lezu 'ba eyi ma fi e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba paliamenti ni 'da fe imbata 'ba eyini eyini eyini ani 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'eby'okurya n'entunguuka, abebembezi b'ebyaro batwire nibarwanirira okwongyera kwejumba omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu, omukiiki omwishengyero, akeegyesa abantu okwejumba omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's pressing needs, the local government has decided to prioritize economic development initiatives. To ensure these plans are effectively implemented, the parliamentarian will lobby for funds and establish income-generating activities.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyetaago by'ekitundu eby'amangu, gavumenti y'ebitundu esazeewo okukulembeza enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna. Okukakasa nti enteekateeka zino ziteekebwa mu nkola obulungi, omubaka wa paalamenti ajja kusonda ensimbi n'okutandikawo emirimu egivaamu ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti pa lwak, gamente me tedero omoko tamme me keto yub me dongo lobo obed gin ma pire tek. Me neno ni yub magi ki keto itic maber, lamemba me parliament obi yenyo cente me cako tic ma kelo cente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, abu apugan naka atutubet koseu aisingarenit nuka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun. Kanu awanyun ebe itwasamao akiro ngun ejok, ebuni emeeba loka airabet ailip ikapun kanu aitolomun aswamisinei nu itolomete ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi asi e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi 'du okporu. Otita 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu kililiru, azi'ba paliamenti ni 'diyi nga robia tra dika eyi nga e'do 'yeta robia ejipi 'diyi e'do.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro, ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu, eshaziremu kwebembeza enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'entaasya. Okureeba ngu enteekateeka ezi zikozirwe kurungi, omukiiki omwishengyero naija kuronda esente n'okutandikaho emirimo erikureeta entaasya.

eng_prompt: Upon entering the political arena, he carefully considered his motivations and aspirations. With a strong sense of purpose, he sought to make a meaningful impact in his community.
lug_prompt: Bwe yayingidde mu byobufuzi, yalowooza nnyo ku bigendererwa bye n'ebiruubirirwa bye. Ng'alina ekigendererwa eky'amaanyi, yafubye okukola eky'omuganyulo mu kitundu kye.
ach_prompt: I kare ma odonyo I tenge me cung iwibye, en otamo matut tutwal I kom miti ne ki miti ne. Ki miti matek tutwal, en oteme me kelo alokaloka maber I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana alomar toma akiro nuka epolitikis, abu ngesi koomoom ejok nuikamunitos apeleikinata ke keda apeleikinata ke. Keda apeleikinet naepol noi, abu ngesi kotam aswam ibore yen ejok kotoma atutubeteke.
lgg_prompt: Erini fizu pari politikiniri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri ega e'yo i ma ava fepi azini egata erini 'diyi ma dria avasi. Asi 'baza okporu be, eri nda e'yo orodriru 'yezu ongulumu erivileri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutaaha omu by'obutegyeki, akateekateeka n'obwegyendesereza aha bigyendererwa bye n'ebigyendererwa bye. Ahabw'okugira ekigyendererwa ky'amaani, akateeraho kukora ekintu ky'omugasho omukyanga kye.

eng_prompt: Driven by a passion for wellness and community, he has dedicated his life to finding innovative solutions. His mission is clear: to empower individuals to lead healthier, more fulfilling lives.
lug_prompt: Olw'okwagala ennyo obulamu obulungi n'ekitundu, obulamu bwe abumalidde mu kunoonya eby'okugonjoola ebizibu. Ekigendererwa kye kyeyoleka bulungi: okuwa abantu amaanyi okubeera n'obulamu obulungi era obumatiza.
ach_prompt: Pi mar ma en tye kwede pi kwo maber ki lwak, en odyero kwone me nongo yoo me tic manyen. Miti ne nen atyer kamaleng: miyo kero ki dano me kwo kwo maber dok ma yomo cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Keda amina naepol noi naka aijar keda aijar naka itunga, abu ngesi ijaik aijarake kanu adumun iwaitin luitetiak. Ecai alosikineteke: aitigogong itunga aijar aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Leta erini aa'zu muke azini ongulumu eyini risi, fe i ma idri e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu. Eri ma asisile e'da kililiru: 'ba yi dri okpo fezu aa'zu rua ala be, dika aa'zu ayikosi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu aine rukundo y'amagara marungi hamwe n'abantu,yehaireyo amagara gye kuronda oburyo bw'okutereeza embeera. Ekigyendererwa kye nikimanywa gye: okuheereza abantu amaani g'okutuura n'amagara marungi, n'okumarwa.

eng_prompt: As the leader of a small, struggling nation, he constantly weighs the needs of his citizens against the pressures from foreign powers. His commitment to their welfare drives him to prioritize their interests above all else.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze w'eggwanga ettono, erirwanagana, buli kaseera apima ebyetaago bya bannansi be n'okunyigirizibwa okuva mu mawanga amalala. Obumalirivu bwe eri obulungi bwabwe bumukubiriza okukulembeza ebigendererwa byabwe okusinga ebirala byonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela me lobo matidi matye ka lweny, en ipol kare tamo I kom miti pa anywali ne ka iporo ki lyeto ma aa ki bot lobo ma woko. Cwinye matek tutwal I kom ber bedo gi weko en keto miti gi bedo mukwongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon loka akwap naedit naetiono noi, epodokinit ngesi ipudesia luka itungake keda ipudesia luka akwapin nukokinga. Ainakina ke mama ejaasi kesi isinyikokini ngesi aisingarenit ipudesia kec adepar icie iboro.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba kari werea azini e'yo ewaru be ni ru, eri sawa driasi e'yo lepi kari anzi ivile 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'du e'yo okpo engapi kari amve 'diyi vu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo erini owizu yi ma ta mbazuri ni eri dri ava fe e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'duzu okporu aga e'yo azi 'diyi dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi w'eihanga rikye, eririkuteganisibwa, buriijo naarebera ebyetengo by'abantu be kurugirira aha kugyemeserezibwa kuruga omu mahanga g'aheeru. Okwehayo kwe ahaby'amagara gaabo nikimureetera kwebembeza ebyetengo byabo okukira ebindi byona.

eng_prompt: In times of political uncertainty, collaboration can lead to more effective governance. Embracing dialogue and cooperation may yield better outcomes for the community as a whole.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali butebenkevu mu byobufuzi, okukolera awamu kusobola okuleetawo enfuga ennungi. Okukkiriza enteeseganya n'obwegassi biyinza okuvaamu ebirungi eri ekitundu kyonna okutwaliza awamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me cungu iwi bye, winye twero kelo tela maber. Cwako lok ki winye twero kelo adwogi maber pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka amamus acamanar kotoma politikis, epedori aimorikikina ayangaun epugae loajokan. Aitodolikin aineranara keda aiswamanara epedori ayangaun akiro nuajokak kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ni aa'zu e'yere 'diyi ma alea, ti ecita eco fe driceza kililiru ni ecazu ra. E'yo nzeza azini ti icita a'izu ri eco e'yo onyiru eji ongulumu eyini dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko omu by'obutegyeki, okukwatanisa nikubaasa kureetaho obwebembezi burungi. Okwikiriza okuganiira n'okukwatanisa, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebirungi ahabw'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges during the election campaign, he remains optimistic about his chances. His unwavering dedication to his constituents fuels his belief in a successful outcome.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi mu kakuyege w'okulonda, akyalina essuubi ku mikisa gye. Obumalirivu bw'alina eri abo b'awagira bweyongera okumukakasa nti ajja kutuuka ku buwanguzi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en orwatte ki peko mapol I kare me bito kwir, en pud tye ki gen I kom gum ma en tye kwede. Cwinye matek tutwal I kom jo ma en yerogi medo gen ma en tye kwede I kom adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda atiokisio nuipu kapak kana aisup aseeta, ejaasi ngesi keda aomisio nuikamunitos arerengesioke. Apodokinit ke naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga luka atutubeteke einakini ngesi aiyuun ebe ebuni ngesi aitodolikin akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro dri fuzu e'yo ewaru karakara yi be ti odaza opetaa ni ma alia ra ti, eri asi'baza be drileba erini 'diyi ma dria. Asi feza erini 'ba erini opi nyapi 'diyi driri fe asi'baza erini e'yo drile suzaniri ma dria drile.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi obu yaabaire aine omu hururu y'akaruuru, akaguma aine amatsiko aha migisha ye. Okwehayo kwe aha bantu abu arikujwekyera nikimwongyera okwikiririza omubirugyemu.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges facing the nation, he believed that true progress could only be achieved through collective effort. Inspired by the potential of his fellow citizens, he envisioned a future where everyone played a role in shaping their society.
lug_prompt: Ng'amanyi okusoomoozebwa eggwanga kwe lyolekaganye nakwo, yakkiriza nti enkulaakulana eya nnamaddala esobola okutuukibwako okuyita mu kaweefube ow'awamu. Ng'asinziira ku busobozi bwa bannansi banne, yalowooza ku biseera eby'omu maaso nga buli omu alina ky'akola mu kubumba ekitundu kye.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko ma lobo ne tye ka kato ki iye, en obedo ki niyee ni dongo lobo me ada twero time ka dano ducu guribe kacel. Ki cuku cwiny I kom kero pa anywali luwote, en obedo ki tam I kom anyim ma dano weng tye ki tic ma omyero gutim me yubu kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda akwap, aomit ngesi ebe epedorio aitodolikin apol kotoma aswam nepepe. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi kanu apedor naka itungake, abu ngesi opodokinit oingaren na itunga kere epedorete aitopolor aiboisitikec.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru kari ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, eri a'i ra kini 'ba eco angu ezoma e'yo adaru 'diyi esu geri 'ba dria ma okpo 'bazu tualurisi. E'yo erini esu kari anzi ivile 'diyi ma okpo si ri fe erini egata ewu drialeri ma dria 'ba dria ni azi ngazu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma edeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu eihanga ririkushanga, akaikiriza ngu entunguuka y'amazima neebaasa kubaho kurabira omu kukorera hamwe. Ahabw'okushagikwa obushoboorozi bw'abatuuragye bagyenzi be, akateekateeka aha biro by'omumaisho ahu buri omwe yaabaire aine eki yaakora omukuhanga ebyanga bye.

eng_prompt: After years of struggle and perseverance, the community had begun to show signs of resilience and unity. With new initiatives and support from local leaders, he believed that change was within reach.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulwana n'okugumiikiriza, ekitundu kyali kitandise okulaga obubonero bw'obugumu n'obumu. N'enteekateeka empya n'obuwagizi okuva mu bakulembeze b'ebyalo, yakkiriza nti enkyukakyuka yali esoboka.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny ki diyo cwiny pi mwaki mapol, lwak onongo dong gucako nyutu lanyut me diyo cwiny ki ribe. Ki yub manyen ki kony ma aa ki bot lutela me tedero, en obedo ki niyee ni aloka-loka twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ejie keda atitingikinit, ageunos itunga aitodun ijenuneta luka aimorikikina keda aimorikikina. Keda aswamisio nuitetiak keda agangat kama ejaasi engarenok luka atutubet, aomit ngesi ebe epedorio aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Eli a'di 'diza azini asi teza ma vutia, ongulumu 'da e'doki eceta e'dazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu tualu ti ecita be. Otita o'diru eyi pie azini atita engazu drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu, eri a'i ra kini ojata eco i 'ye ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okurwana n'okugumisiriza, abantu bakaba batandikire kworeka obumanyiso bw'okugumisiriza n'okukwatanisa. Ahabw'enteekateeka nsya n'obuhwezi kuruga omu beebembezi b'ebyaro, akaikiriza ngu empinduka ekaba eri haihi kubaho.

eng_prompt: In the midst of political turmoil, he realized that aligning with the ruling party was crucial for the development of his region. The challenges faced by the people of West Nile demanded a united front to secure necessary resources and support.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butabanguko mu byobufuzi, yakizuula nti okukwatagana n'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza kyali kikulu nnyo mu kukulaakulanya ekitundu kye. Okusoomoozebwa abantu b'omu West Nile kwe boolekaganye nakwo kwetaaga obumu okusobola okufuna ebyetaago n'obuyambi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kuku kuku me cungu iwi bye, en oniang ni ribbe ki dul me cungu iwi bye matye I loc obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo me but lobo ne. Peko ma dano me West Nile tye ka kato ki iye mito ribe me nongo kony ki kony ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka amumu naka epolitikis, abu ngesi koany ebe arucokina keda epate loipugai erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka aiboisit ke. Atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luko West Nile ekotosi aimorikikina kanu adumun iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru politiki ni 'diyi ma talasi, eri esu ra kini ti ecizu amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepiri be ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. E'yo ewaru 'ba angu westnile niri ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi le ti ecita eyini ani afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu tualu atita eyini esu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu butabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki, akeetegyereza ngu okukwatanisa n'ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki kikaba kiri eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'ekyanga kye. Oburemeezi obu abantu ba West Nile barikurabamu, buketenga okukwatanisa kutunga obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Her dedication to transparency and fairness in decision-making set a high standard for governance. Many admired her ability to unite differing factions and foster collaboration among lawmakers.
lug_prompt: Okwewaayo kwe eri obwerufu n'obwenkanya mu kukola okusalawo kwaleetawo omutindo ogw'oku ntikko mu bukulembeze. Bangi beewuunya obusobozi bwe obw'okugatta ebiwayi eby'enjawulo n'okutumbula enkolagana mu babaka ba palamenti.
ach_prompt: Dyerene me bedo ki ada ki ber bedo ikare me moko tam okelo rwom me tela maber tutwal. Dano mapol gubedo ki miti i kom kit ma en oribo kwede dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat dok okelo winye ikin luwang lwak I ot moko cik.
teo_prompt: Ainakina ke mama ejai aica ka abeit kotoma aitolomun aseununeta abu koinak adoketait naepol noi naka apugan. Apotu itunga luipu kowanyutu apedorit ke naka aimorikikin atiokisio nuegelegela ka aitopolor aiswamanara kanejaas imeeban luka airabet.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma ava e'yo ada azini e'yo ada ma dria e'yo 'duza ma alia ri fe wura onyiru driceza ni. Ba karakara eyi ai eri ma okpo ti ecita ejizu amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea azini ti ecita ejizu 'ba legiko ni 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okwehayo kwe ahabw'amazima n'oburinganiza omu by'okucwamu, kikareetaho omutindo gw'amaani omu bwebembezi. Baingi bakasiima obushoboorozi bwe obw'okugarukanisa ebibiina ebitarikushushana n'okureetaho okukwatanisa omu bany'eishengyero.

eng_prompt: From an early age, she was passionate about social issues and community service. Inspired by her family's dedication to public service, she decided to pursue a career in politics.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu buto, yayagala nnyo ensonga z'abantu n'okuweereza abantu. Olw'okuba ab'omu maka ge baali bamalirivu okuweereza abantu, yasalawo okuyingira eby'obufuzi.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kare ma en pud tidi, en obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom lok makwako kwo pa lwak ki tic pi lwak. En omoko tamme me donyo I lok me cungu iwi-bye pien lugang megge onongo gudyere me tic pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Ageun editeu, amina ngesi noi akiro nuka itunga keda aijanakin itunga. Aponi isinyikokinai ngesi kanu ainakina naka ekaleke kanu aijaanakin itunga, abu ngesi koseu alomar toma akiro nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu de eri ma eli werea, eri andra ava be e'yo o'bi yi ma eselea azini azi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo familia erivileri ni ava fezu azi ngazu o'bi eyidri risi, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo politiki niri 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga akiri muto, akaba naakunda enshonga z'abantu hamwe n'okuheereza abantu. Ahabw'okugira ngu eka ye ekaba eyehaireyo kuheereza abantu, akasharamu kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: After years of working in local government and engaging with the community, he felt a growing sense of purpose. This involvement not only deepened his understanding of the issues at hand but also fueled his ambition to make a larger impact.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'akolera mu gavumenti z'ebitundu era ng'akolagana n'abantu mu kitundu, yawulira ng'alina ekigendererwa. Okwenyigiramu kuno tekukoma ku kumuyamba kutegeera nsonga eziriwo naye era kyamuleetera okuba n'ekiruubirirwa eky'okukola ekisingawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi mwaki mapol I gamente me tedero ki ribbe ki lwak, en owinyo ni tye ki tyen lok me kwo. Tic man pe omedo niang mege I kom lok matye I cing keken ento bene omedo miti mege me kelo alokaloka madit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kotoma apuganisinei nu okwap keda aiswamanara keda itunga, abu ngesi kopup ajokis. Mam aswamisioit ngin abu koinak ngesi amisiikin akiro nuikamunitos akiro ngun konye abu koinak ngesi apodokinit aswam ibore yen ejok.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini azi ngazu local government ma alia azini ti ecizu o'bi yi be 'bori ma vutia, eri ama asi 'baza e'yo azi ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di 'duza 'di awini lu eri ma vata e'yo dria 'diyi ma dria ri otu ku te eri ma asi 'baza e'yo azi okporu 'yezu ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikukorera omu gavumenti z'ebyanga n'okukoragana n'abantu, akeehurira aine ekigyendererwa. Okwetabamu oku tikuretsire kwetegyereza kwe aha nshonga ezabaire ziriho kwonka, kureka kwongyeire n'ekigyendererwa kye ky'okukora omurimo muhango.

eng_prompt: In a bid to consolidate power, the ruling government has increasingly relied on military presence in political matters. This strategy aims to suppress dissent and maintain control over any potential threats to their authority.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza obuyinza, gavumenti eri mu buyinza yeeyongedde okwesigama ku kubeerawo kw'amagye mu nsonga z'ebyobufuzi. Akakodyo kano kalina ekigendererwa eky'okunyigiriza abawakanya n'okukuuma obuyinza ku bintu byonna ebiyinza okutiisa obuyinza bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I miti ne me bedo ki twero, gamente matye iwi ker kombedi ojenge tutwalle I kom mony me donyo I lok me cungu iwi bye. Yub man tye ki miti me lweny i kom jo ma kwero lok pa gamente ki dok me juko tim mo keken ma twero balo twero gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitam aitogogong apugan, ejai apugan na ejai oicolong aingarakin ajore kotoma akiro nuka epolitikis. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitikitik ngul lumam ecamunitos nuikamunitos apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu opi dria, gamete opi dria ri ni asi 'ba e'yo asikari eyini 'diyi ma dria e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu 'ba ageti otipi gamete be 'diyi atrizu dika lezu okpo fezu e'yo dria ecopi e'yo onzi 'yepi okpo yini ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'okwongyera amaani omu bwebembezi, gavumenti eri omu butegyeki eyeyongyeire kwesiga amahe omu by'obutegyeki. Enteekateeka egi neegyenderera okucwekyereza abarikuhakanisa n'okurinda obutegyeki bwabo oburikubaasa kutiinisa obushoborozi bwabo.

eng_prompt: In a recent statement, military officials expressed concerns about political stability in the country. They emphasized the need for unity among political factions to ensure a cohesive governance structure.
lug_prompt: Mu sitatimenti eyafulumizibwa gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'amagye baalaga obweraliikirivu ku butebenkevu mu by'obufuzi mu ggwanga. Baakkaatiriza obwetaavu bw'obumu mu bibiina by'ebyobufuzi okusobola okuteekawo enkola y'obukulembeze ey'awamu.
ach_prompt: I lok ma kicwalo cokcok-ki, lumony gunyutu lworo gi i kom ber bedo me cungu iwi-bye I lobo man. Guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ber pa ribe ikin dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat me neno ni tela tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitodunet napac, apotu lukapolok luka ajore itodutu aiyalongongikec kanu ainapakina naka akwap. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka aimorikikina kiding ipatei kere kanu awanyun ebe ejai apugan na imorikikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi eyini nze o'diru ri ma alea, azi'ba asikari eyini 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo asianzu politiki ni kari 'di ma alea ri ma dria. Eyi fe okpo e'yo ti ecita ni amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria eyini ani e'yo driceza ni aa'zu tualu ri nezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kihandiiko ekyabaireho juba, abakuru omu mahe boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obutebekana bw'eby'obutegyeki omu ihanga. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa omu bibiina by'obutegyeki kugira ngu habeho engyenderwaho nungi y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising between the military and civilian government, leading to a power struggle that has caught the attention of the public. In this charged atmosphere, the army is strategically maneuvering to undermine opposition leaders.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati wa gavumenti y'amagye n'ey'abantu baabulijjo, ekiviiriddeko okulwanagana kw'obukulembeze okukutte abantu. Mu mbeera eno embi, amagye gakola enteekateeka okunafuya abakulembeze b'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Lweny obedo ka mede ikin mony ki gamente pa civilian, ma okelo lweny me tela ma okelo tam pa lwak. I kare man ma lweny tye matek tutwal, mony tye ka tic ki diro mapat-pat me balo tela pa jo ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kiding apugan naka ajore keda apugan naka itunga, ido eyangaunitos ingungeta lu apugan lu ingalaunit itunga. Kotoma ojautene lo loepol noi, eutasi ajore aitemonokin nuepedorete aitolitol engarenok luka etepegak.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu gavumete asikari eyini 'diyi ma eselea 'ba asikari ru ku 'diyi pie, e'yo fepi a'di opi nyaza ni ecazu e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'di ma alea, asikari eyi e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye drice'ba amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyi ma okpo ndezu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati y'amahe n'abantu ba buriijo, ekirikureetaho okurwanira amaani okureeteire abantu baingi kufayo. Omu bwire obu obw'akabi,amahe gariyo nigakora emiringo etari emwe n'emwe okuremesa abebembezi b'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing political tensions, military leaders convened to discuss their role in the upcoming electoral process. Recognizing the potential impact of their involvement, they began formulating plans to sway public opinion.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke bw'ebyobufuzi obweyongera, abakulembeze b'amagye baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mulimu gwabwe mu kulonda okubindabinda. Olw'okukitegeera nti okwenyigira kwabwe kuyinza okukosa abantu, baatandika okukola enteekateeka z'okukyusa endowooza z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye I lok me cungu iwi bye matye kamede, lutela me mony gubedo ka lok I kom tic gi I yer matye kabino ni. Ki niang adwogi maber ma twero bedo I kom timgi, gucako yubu yub me kelo alokaloka I tam pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin naka ingungeta luka politikis, apotu engarenok luka ajore iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit kesi aswam kotoma aseo naebunit. Apotu kesi kojenutu atiokisio nuepedorete alomar toma, apotu kesi kogeutu aitolomun aitemonokineta nuepedorete aijulakin aomisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru politiki ni tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba asikari eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu azi eyini nga opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo eyini ani e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma orodri ndrezu risi, eyi e'do otuta eyi 'ye e'yo o'bi eyini ega 'diyi ojazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'amahe bakashutama kuhanuura omurimo gwabo omu karuuru akarikwija. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi oburikubaasa kuruga omu kwejumba kwabo, bakatandika kukora enteekateeka z'okuhindura ebiteekateeko by'abantu.

eng_prompt: In a bid to secure their hold on power, the government has devised a controversial strategy. They believe that leveraging military support will ensure a favorable outcome in the upcoming elections.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza obuyinza, gavumenti ezuddewo enkola etali nnungi. Balowooza nti okukozesa obuyambi bw'amagye kijja kuleetawo ebirungi mu kulonda okujja.
ach_prompt: I miti ne me bedo I loc, gamente okatti ki yoo mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat Gitye ki niyee ni tic ki kony pa mony bikelo adwogi maber I yer matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong apedorokec, etolomu apugan iponesio luetioko. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitosom agangat naka ajore ebuni ayangaun akiro nuajokak kotoma aseo naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu opi nyaza ma alia, gamete e'do otuta azi e'yo agapi 'diyi ma dria. Yi a'ira kini atita asikari eyini ri ma ayuta ni nga agata muke ni esu opeta emupi 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obutegyeki bwabo, gavumenti eteireho enkora etarikwetegyerezibwa. Nibateekateeka ngu okukoresa obuhwezi bw'amahe, nikiija kureetaho ebirungi omu karuuru akarikwija.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing unrest and allegations against the military, the commander addressed the press to clarify the army's stance. He emphasized the importance of maintaining neutrality in political matters to uphold the integrity of the forces.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanukula obwegugungo obweyongera n'ebigambibwa ku magye, omuduumizi yayogeddeko eri bannamawulire okunnyonnyola ennyikira y'amagye. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'obutabaako ludda lwe tuwagira mu nsonga z'ebyobufuzi okusobola okukuuma obwesimbu bw'amagye.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me jemo ki adot matye kamede I kom mony, ladit mony oloko ki lucoo lok angea me tito ngo ma mony tye ka timo. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ma pe icwako tung ka mo I lok me cungu iwi bye me gwoko ber bedo pa mony.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin nuka amumu keda aitoroneta nuepolok nuikamunitos ajore, abu ekomada kiner keda lu iyemuto kanu aitetem nuikamunitos ajore. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka amamut ajaut toma akiro nuka politikis kanu aidar ajore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani tozu asikari eyi ma rua 'diyi pie, komanda 'da nze e'yo 'ba osisiani 'diyi pie e'yo asikari eyini 'diyi ma dria. Eri fe okpo orodri 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele kuzu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea eyini ani asikari eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebirikugambwa aha mahe,omuduumizi akagamba n'abanyamakuru kworeka enteekateeka y'amahe. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda obutakwatanisa omu nshonga z'eby'obutegyeki, kugira ngu amahe g'eby'obutegyeki gagume gaine obwesigye.

eng_prompt: During the briefing, the general addressed the troops about the current situation in the region. He emphasized the importance of maintaining stability and the role of the army in achieving that goal.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana, Genero yayogeddeko eri amagye ku mbeera eriwo mu kitundu. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obutebenkevu n'omulimu gw'amagye mu kutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me cokke, jenerol oloko ki lumony I kom ngo matye katimme I twok piny eni. En owaco ni pire tek me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo ki tic pa mony me cobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, abu lokapolon kiner keda ajore nuikamunitos ejautene loejai katutubet. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aidar ainapakina keda aswam naka ajore kanu aitodolikin alosikinet ngin.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'da ma alea, generali 'da nze e'yo asikari eyini e'yo angu 'da ma alea sa'wa 'disi ri ma dria. Eri 'ba okpo orodri asianzu ma tambazu ri ma dria azini azi asikari eyini e'yo 'da 'yezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, Genero akagamba n'amahe ebirikukwata aha mbeera eriho omu kyanga. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda obutebekana hamwe n'omurimo gw'amahe omu kuhikiiriza ekigyendererwa ekyo.

eng_prompt: As crime rates have surged in recent months, community concerns have grown louder. The local government has responded by deploying additional law enforcement personnel to the streets.
lug_prompt: Ng'obumenyi bw'amateeka bweyongedde mu myezi egiyise, okweraliikirira kw'abantu kweyongedde. Gavumenti y'ebitundu ezzeemu n'esindika abakuumaddembe abalala ku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me timo bal omede kwede I dwe ma okato ni, lworo I kin lwak bene omede tutwal. Gamente me tedero ocwalo abili mapol I gudu.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor abilibilio naka ikisila ilapio lu atuboros, apolor aiyalongong naka itunga. Abu apugan naka atutubet kobongok kowai lo aipikakin ipolisin luipu orotin.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo e'yo onzi 'yeza niri ni tuzu mba agapi 'diyi ma alea risi, asi otiza ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri omvi 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma azi eyi nzila eyi ma alea dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi kweyongyera omu myezi ehingwireho, okwerarikirira kw'abantu kweyongyeire. Gavumenti y'ebyaro egarukiremu erikwongyera abakozi b'ebiragiro aha nguuto.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments, local authorities held a press conference to address growing concerns. They emphasized the importance of staying informed and vigilant regarding the ongoing issues in West Nile.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baatudde olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okukola ku nsonga ezigenda zeeyongera. Baakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okubeera abamanyifu era abeegendereza ku nsonga ezigenda mu maaso mu West Nile.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gubedo ki kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya me lok I kom peko matye kamedde anyim. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me bedo ki ngec ki bedo ma wanggi twolo I kom jami matye katimme I west nile.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena kijaikisi airiamunet nejaas lu iyemuto kanu aitemitem atiokisio nu iyatakinete. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aijen keda acoikina nuikamunitos akiro nuiswamasi ko West Nile.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo nzeza 'ba osisiani 'diyi pie e'yo ewaru tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi fe okpo orodri aa'zu o'dukoti be azini mile be e'yo mupi drile angu westnile niri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru kugamba aha nshonga ezirikweyongyera. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okuguma nitumanya kandi twetegyereza enshonga ezirikugyenda omu maisho omuri West Nile.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in technology and infrastructure have transformed the local economy. As a result, entrepreneurs are finding it easier to navigate the challenges of running a business.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya n'ebizimbe ebikoleddwa gye buvuddeko kikyusizza eby'enfuna by'eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, abasuubuzi bakisanga nga kyangu okwaŋŋanga okusoomoozebwa kw'okuddukanya bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I tenge me tet ki gedo okelo aloka loka I tenge me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, lutim biacara tye ka nongo yot tutwal me lweny i kom peko me doro biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana keda aiboisio nuitegelikina ijulakisi edumune loka ikapun loka akwapuwok. Kanuka ngun, epatana agwelanarak aitodolikin atiokisio nuka aitolot ebiasara.
lgg_prompt: Zota o'diru e'yo tekenologia ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi oja e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi eri esu ewakokoru e'yo ewaru tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu tekinorogye n'ebyombeko ehindwire eby'entaasya y'eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abashubuzi nikibanguhiira okureeba oburemeezi oburi omu kutwara bizinesi omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, technology has revolutionized the way we shop and interact with businesses. With just a few clicks, consumers can explore a vast array of options from the comfort of their homes.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, tekinologiya akyusizza engeri gye tugula ebintu n'engeri gye tukwataganamu ne bizineesi. N'okunyiga katono, abaguzi basobola okunoonyereza ku bintu bingi nga bali mu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kareni, tet manyen okelo aloka-loka I kit ma wacato ki winye kwede ki biacara. Ki dwiro manok keken, luwil twero nongo yoo mapol tutwal ki I gangigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, ejulaki etatai loakwana epone loegwelanar oni keda aiswamanara keda ibiasaran. Keda ailik ikidioko, epedorete agwelak airereonor iboro luipu kotoma oreria kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, tekenologia oja geri amani afa jezu azini aa'zu tujari be 'diyi ra. O'duko were si, 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi eco e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye engazu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, tekinorogye ehindwire omuringo ogu turikugura ebintu n'oku turikukorengana na bizinesi. Abaguzi nibabaasa kukoresa oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe kuruga omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, innovative solutions are transforming the way we interact with the marketplace. By harnessing the power of the internet, new platforms are emerging to facilitate seamless communication and transactions.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, obuyiiya bukyusa engeri gye tukwataganamu n'akatale. Mu kukozesa amaanyi ga yintaneeti, emikutu emipya givaayo okwanguyiza empuliziganya n'okutunda ebintu.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, diro manyen tye ka loko kit ma wawinye kwede ki lucat. I tic ki kero pa intanet, kabedo mapat-pat manyen tye kabino me weko lok ki cato wil bedo yot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, eutai aijulakin epone loiswamanara oni keda esokoni. Kowai lo aitwasam agogong naka elago, eutasi iponesio luitetiak alomun kanu aitapatan einer keda agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, geri o'diru 'diyi ojata eji geri amani aa'zu 'ba cu'a 'diyi pie ri ma dria. Geri oli internetniri ma okpo ayuzu risi, pari o'diru 'diyi efu e'yo nzeza azini tujari 'yezu ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, okujumbura kuriyo nikuhindura omuringo ogu turikukoraganamu n'abantu. Ahabw'okukoresa amaani ga intaneeti, emikutu misya eriyo neetandika kuhwera omu by'empurizagana n'okuguza ebintu.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved a comprehensive plan to upgrade infrastructure and expand public transit options. As a result, residents can expect significant enhancements in their daily commutes.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kakkirizza enteekateeka ennambulukufu ey'okutumbula eby'entambula n'okugaziya entambula y'olukale. N'ekyavaamu, abatuuze basobola okusuubira okulongoosebwa mu ntambula yaabwe eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Kancil me boma madit omoko yub me ilo malo rwom me tic ki yub me wot pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero twero bedo ki gen ni yoo gi me wot nino ducu obi yube.
teo_prompt: Abu ekansulo loka eibuga itigogong ainapeta nuka aisiteteun iboro ka aitanyanyar elose loka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eomitos itunga ebe epote kesi aitojokaar eipone lo elosete kesi kangipaaran.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ai otita azi 'bani ecozu afa ayuzaru o'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika geri acizu o'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eco geri eyini acizu o'du driasi ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize enteekateeka y'okutunguura ebyombeko n'okwongyera aha ntambura y'abantu boona. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye nibabaasa kugira amatsiko g'okutunguuka omu ntambura yaabo eya burizooba.

eng_prompt: Fostering open communication and collaboration is essential in any industry. By implementing effective networking strategies, stakeholders can enhance their connections and trust.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula empuliziganya ennungi n'okukolagana kwa mugaso mu mulimu gwonna. Mu kuteeka mu nkola enkola ennungi ey'okukolagana, abakwatibwako basobola okutumbula enkolagana yaabwe n'obwesige.
ach_prompt: Kony me lok ki winye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic mo keken. I yoo me keto yub me kubbe maber itic, joo ma timo tic gi twero medo kubbe gi ki gen gi ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Aitopolor einer loepukora ka aiswamanara ejok kotoma okampuni kere. Kowai lo aitegear iponesio luajokak luka arucokina, epedorete itunga aitojokar arucokina kec keda amunokina kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza ngmboru azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru okalamvu dria eyi ma alea. Geri 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba eyi pie geri kililiru 'diyisi, 'ba ambo eyi ma eselea 'diyi eco eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea asi 'bazu eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho empurizagana n'okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho omu kampuni zoona. Kurabira omu kukoresa oburyo burungi bw'okukorengana, abarikukwataho nibabaasa kwongyera aha kukwatanisa kwabo n'okwesiga.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising incidents of theft and violence in the area, local authorities have been exploring innovative solutions. One promising approach involves implementing advanced tracking systems for the boda-boda men.
lug_prompt: Olw'obubbi n'obutabanguko obweyongera mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo babadde banoonya engeri empya. Enkola emu esuubiza ezingiramu okuteekawo enkola ey'omulembe ey'okulondoola abavuzi ba boodabooda.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me kwo ki tim gero matye kamede i kabedo eni, lutela me tedero gubedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me cobo peko eni. Yoo acel matye ki gen obedo keto yub me tic ki nyonyo manyen me lubo kor bodaboda.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuka akoko keda amumu kotoma aiboisit, eutasi apedorosio nuka atutubet aimo iwaitin luitetiak. Epone ediope loejok noi ngesi aitolomun iwaitin luingarakinete itunga luitolosete ibodabodan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ogu ni tuzu tualu ngiringiri be angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi geri ndundu eyi nda. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu kililiru 'diyi ma azi geri 'bani ecozu 'ba bodaboda ru 'diyi ma pamvu onezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obushuma n'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro batwire nibasherura oburyo burungi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikureetaho amatsiko n'okutandikaho enkora y'omutaano y'okurondooza abavugi ba bodaboda.

eng_prompt: To optimize efficiency and reduce delays, a sophisticated system was developed. This system integrates real-time data to manage logistics effectively.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obulungi n'okukendeeza ku kulwawo, enkola ey'omulembe yakolebwa. Enkola eno ekwataganya obubaka mu budde obutuufu okusobola okuddukanya obulungi ebintu.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me tic ki dwoko piny galle, kiyubu yoo me tic manyen tutwal. Yub man tiyo ki ngec me kare ki kare me doro yub me wot maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae loajokan ka aitidisiar aiyap, aponi kitolomunai epone loajokan noi. Imoriarit eswamae lo akiro kotoma apak kanu aitemonokin iboro ejok.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu azini sa'wa ezaza ma omgbo esizu, 'ba e'do geri azi onyiru ni. Otita 'di ni e'yo eyi 'ye sa'wa dria eyini ani ecozu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okukora kurungi n'okutuubya aha kukyerererwa, enkora y'omutaano ekakorwa. Enkora egi neekoresa ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha bintu ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Many businesses are looking for ways to reduce expenses while maintaining quality. One solution that has gained popularity is implementing more efficient processes.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi nnyingi zinoonya engeri y'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya ate nga zikuuma omutindo. Ekimu ku bintu ebyeyongedde okumanyika kwe kussaawo enkola ennungi.
ach_prompt: Biacara mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me dwoko piny wel cente ma gitiyo kwede kun gigwoko rwom me jami. Yoo acel ma oywek tutwal me tyeko peko en aye keto itic yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ibiasaran luipu aimo iponesio luka aitidisiar ikapun lu itwasamao kosodete aidar adoketait na abeit. Adiopebon loepedori aitemokin ngun ngesi aitegear iwaitin lu iswamaere ejok.
lgg_prompt: Tujura karakara eyi geri nda robia ayuza ma omgbo esizu eyini ani aa'zu muke ri be. E'yo azi 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma aza kozu ri eri geri azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi enyingi ziriyo nizironda oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza kandi zikaguma ziri aha mutindo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga, n'okutandikaho enkora nungi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the transportation sector has faced numerous challenges, prompting the need for innovative solutions. One such initiative has emerged, focusing on uniting local bodaboda riders to enhance their working conditions and overall quality of life.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitongole ky'ebyentambula kifunye okusoomoozebwa kungi, ekireetedde obwetaavu bw'okuyiiya engeri y'okukikolamu. Ekimu ku bikolwa ng'ebyo kivuddeyo, okussa essira ku kugatta abavuzi ba boodabooda b'omu kitundu okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'emirimu n'omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, tenge me wot orwatte ki peko mapol ma oweko mite ni myero kikel yoo manyen me cobo peko eni. Yub acel ma kit meno dong ocake, keto cwiny I kom ribo ludwo bodaboda me ilo malo rwom me ticgi ki rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina erionget loka elose keda atiokisio nuipu, nu eyangaunitos eipud loka aitolomunun iwaitin luitetiak. Aponi kitolomunai epone ediopebon loepodokinit aimorikikin iderepan luka ibodabodan kanu aitojokar ejautene loka aswam kec keda aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, esele acipa niri esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyini ani lezu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri ndundu eyi sizu. E'yo 'dile 'diyi ma azi efu 'bo, asi 'bazu 'ba bodaboda onzupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ti ecita ma dria e'yo eyini azi ngazu 'diyi otuzu azini geri eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eby'engyenda bitungire oburemeezi bwingi, ekireesireho ekyetengo ky'okutunga oburyo burungi. Ekigyendererwa kimwe nk'ekyo kitandikireho, ekirikugyenderera okukwatanisa abavugi ba bodaboda, okutunguura emituurire yaabo hamwe n'emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: By implementing new communication features and feedback systems, the platform has fostered a more collaborative environment. As a result, both riders and customers are experiencing enhanced interactions.
lug_prompt: Mu kuteekawo engeri z'empuliziganya empya n'enkola z'okuddamu, omukutu gutumbudde embeera y'okukwatagana. N'ekivuddemu, abavuzi ne bakasitoma bakolagana bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ki keto yub manyen me kubbe ki miyo tam, dul enoni okelo yub me ribbe. Macalo adwogi ne, ludwo mutoka kacel ki luwil tye ka nongo ber bedo ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitegear iponesio luitetiak luka einer keda iponesio luka abongonokin, abu atutubet ngin koinak aimorikikina. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ibodabodan keda agwelak airiamun ejok.
lgg_prompt: Geri o'dini e'yo nzezu azini geri o'dini o'duko fezu 'diyisi, pari o'dukoti edrizu 'da eji angu ti icita ni 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba mutukari onzupi 'diyi tualu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi pie yi ma eselea e'yo o'yozu yi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta omu nkora empurizagana nsya hamwe n'oburyo bw'okugarukamu, omukutu gwongyeire aha kukwatanisa. N'ekyarugiremu, abavugi hamwe n'abaguzi nibatunga enkoragana nungi.

eng_prompt: With the rise of innovative technology and increasing demand for efficient logistics, a new initiative is being launched. This initiative aims to simplify entry into the industry and provide essential resources for aspiring entrepreneurs.
lug_prompt: Olw'okugula tekinologiya omupya n'obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okutambuza ebintu obulungi, enteekateeka empya etongozebwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okwanguyiza okuyingira mu mulimu n'okuwa ebyetaago ebikulu eri abo abaagala okutandikawo bizineesi.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa diro me tet manyen ki mede pa miti me tic maber, yub manyen tye ka kati. Yub man tye ki miti me weko donyo I tic eni bedo yot ki miyo kony ma mite pi joo ma mito timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Keda apol naka etatai loakwana keda eipuda lo aitolot iboro ejok, eutai aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet na erai aitapatan alomar toma okampuni ka aijaikin agangat nejaas lu ekotosi agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia o'diru ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu kililiru ri pie, 'ba e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu fizu okalamvu 'di ma alea ewakokoru dika lezu afa orodriru 'diyi fezu 'ba lepi tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu tekinorogye eyeyongyeire hamwe n'obwetago bw'okutambuza ebintu omu muringo murungi, enteekateeka nsya eriyo neetongozibwa. Ekigyendererwa n'okworobya okutaaha omu by'obushubuzi n'okuheereza abantu eby'okukoresa eby'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Before the group set off on their journey, the guide gathered everyone for a brief safety meeting. He emphasized the importance of riding responsibly and adhering to the rules of the road.
lug_prompt: Nga ekibinja tekinnasitula lugendo lwabwe, omulagirizi yakungaanya buli omu mu lukiiko lw'ebyokwerinda. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuvuga n'obuvunaanyizibwa n'okugoberera amateeka g'oku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod gurup ne pe gucako wotgi, ngat ma nyutu kama dano tye iye olwongo dano weng pi kacokke me gwoko ber bedo. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa dwoyo motoka maber ki lubu cik me gudu.
teo_prompt: Erongo egurupu egeuna alosit, abu engarenon kitukok itunga kere kanuka airiamunet naka ayuwara. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka airenge ejok keda aitup ikisila luka erot.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ongulumu 'da e'doni aci ku, 'ba angu e'dapi 'diyi tra 'ba dria eyi mitingi werea e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria. Eri fe okpo orodri mutukari ti ojizu kililiru azini azita nzila dria 'diyi ma vuti obizuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Guruupu etakatandikire orugyendo rwabo, omurambuzi akarundaana buri omwe omu rukiiko rw'eby'okwerinda. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okuvuga n'obwegyendesereza n'okukuratira ebiragiro by'ahanguuto.
