eng_prompt: As the nation faces pressing issues and growing discontent, citizens are increasingly motivated to make their voices heard. This surge in civic engagement is evident in the rising number of individuals participating in political discussions and activities.
lug_prompt: Ng'eggwanga lyolekaganye n'ebizibu eby'amangu n'obutali bumativu obweyongera, bannansi beeyongera okukubirizibwa okuleeta amaloboozi gaabwe okuwulirwa. Okweyongera kuno mu kwenyigira mu by'obufuzi kweyolekera mu kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu abeenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo n'emirimu gy'ebyobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka nongo peko mapigi tego ki cwer cwiny matye kamede, anywali tye ka nongo tekcwiny me winyo dwon gi. Medde pa tic pa lwak nen I wel dano matye ka lok I kom lok me cungu iwi bye.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuepolok noi keda amamut aiyalama, ekotosi itunga aijaikin iporotoi kec aipup. Apolou na naka aswam naka itunga itodunit ebe iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi toma opegeta keda aswamisinei nuka politikis.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni dri fuzu e'yo okporu 'diyi be tualu e'yo 'bani aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi pie, kari anzi eyi ma ava tu e'yo eyi ma o'duko esizu. E'yo 'ba eyini fizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea tualu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea tupi tutu ri ece e'yo 'ba eyini fizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea tupi tutu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obu eihanga ryatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani n'obutashemererwa obweyongyeire, abatuuragye beyongyeire kugira amaani g'okuhurira eiraka ryabo. Okweyongyera kw'abantu abeejumbire omu by'obutegyeki, nikweyoreka omubare gw'abantu abeejumbire omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'emirimo y'eby'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and uncertainty, a group of dedicated individuals has come together with a common purpose. Their mission is clear: to make a positive impact on the community.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, ekibinja ky'abantu abeewaddeyo kyegasse wamu n'ekigendererwa ekimu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kitegeerekeka bulungi: okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennungi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki peko ki peko, gurup pa dano ma gudyere cokke kacel ki miti acel. Miti gi nen atyer kamaleng: me kelo alokaloka maber I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda atiokisio keda amamus ajenanut, egurupu loka itunga lueminasi kesi aimorikikin keda apeleikinet adiope. Eswamae kec ecai: aitodolikin aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru be tre 'di ma alea, ongulumu 'ba yi owipi yi ma ngulupi si 'diyi emu tualu asisile aluri be. Asisile yiniri e'da kililiru: lezu ojata kililiru ejizu ongulumu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi n'obutegyendesereza, guruupu y'abantu abehaireyo eri hamwe n'ekigyendererwa kimwe. Ekigyendererwa kyabo nikimanywa kurungi: okukora ebirungi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After a series of successful campaign events, the candidate has gained significant support among local party members. With a strong platform focused on community development, the candidate wants to represent the ruling party in Arua.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukola kakuyege omulundi ogw'omuddiring'anwa, eyeesimbyewo afunye obuwagizi bungi mu bammemba b'ekibiina mu kitundu. Ng'alina enteekateeka ey'amaanyi ekwata ku nkulaakulana y'ekitundu, eyeesimbyewo ayagala okukiikirira ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza mu Arua.
ach_prompt: Ingee bito kwi mapol ma owoto maber, lacungu ne onongo cwak madit tutwal I kin lumemba me dul me cungu iwi bye me tedero. Ki yub matek tutwal I kom dongo lobo pa lwak, lacungu ne mito cung pi dul me cungu iwi bye matye I loc I Arua.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikampeins luekeriaka, adumu abwoan agangat kama ejaasi imeeban luka epate. Keda ainapeta nuegogong nuikamunitos apol naka itunga, ekoto abwoikin epate lo ipugai kotoma Arua.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti odaza drile suzaru 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba pa sopi 'da esu atita angiri 'ba amuti politiki ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Otita okporu asi 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma ezota ma dria risi, agu pa tupi 'da le pa tu amuti politiki ni kari 'di ma dri cepiri ma paria Arua.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuronda akaruuru akarungi, oyesimbireho atungire obushagiki bw'amaani omu bantu b'ekibiina. Oyesimbireho naayenda kujwekyera ekibiina ekiri omu butegyeki omuri Arua, ahabw'okugira ngu aine enteekateeka y'amaani aha ntunguuka y'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the election approached, the candidate gathered his supporters for a crucial meeting. With a determined look, he prepared to share his vision for the future of their community.
lug_prompt: Ng'okulonda kusembera, eyeesimbyewo yakungaanya abawagizi be mu lukiiko olukulu. Nga mumalirivu, yeetegese okugabana ebirowoozo bye ku biseera by'omu maaso eby'ekitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yer tye cok, lacungu ne olwongo lucwake me bedo ki kacoke ma pire tek. Ki wang matek, en oyubbe me nywako tam ma mege I kom anyim pa kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aseo, abu abwoan kitukok egangitokoke kanuka airiamunet naepol noi. Keda asesen naecamunitai, abu ngesi okapakina aimor aomisioitike kanuka ingaren naka atutubetekec.
lgg_prompt: Opeta eyini ecazu ogogo risi, agu pa tupi 'da tra i ma 'ba atita fepi 'diyi mitingi okporu ni ma alea. E'da asi 'baza be, eri otu i e'yo erini ega ewu drialeri ma dria ongulumu yiniri ma dria 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru ku bwahikire, oyesimbireho akarundaana abahagizi be omu rukiiko rw'amaani. Aine amaisho amarungi, akeeteekateekyera kugabana ebiteekateeko bye ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya by'ekyanga kyabo.

eng_prompt: During the gathering, he felt a sense of nostalgia and wanted to share more about himself. As the conversation flowed, he decided it was the right moment to open up about his roots.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana, yawulira ng'ayagala okwogera ebisingawo ebimukwatako. Ng'emboozi egenda mu maaso, yasalawo nti kye kiseera okwogera ku nsibuko ze.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke, en obedo ki miti me nywako lok mapol I kome. I kare ma lok tye ka wot anyim, en omoko tamme ni man obedo kare maber me lok I kom kama en aa ki ie.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, abu ngesi kopup epone loemina ngesi einer nuipu nuikamunitos akekuan. Neautar einer ngol alosit, abu ngesi kotema ebe erai kwana apak naedolit kanu einer nuikamunitos iraasitake.
lgg_prompt: Sawa okuta 'da nirisi, eri ega e'yo erini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria ra dika eri le e'yo nze i ma ngulupi ma dria drile. E'yo nzeza ni mu drile, eri 'du e'yo kini eri sawa kililiru e'yo nzezu i ma ola ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, akeehurira arikwenda kugamba ebirikumukwataho. Okugaaniira kwagyenda nikugyenda omu maisho, akasharamu ngu n'obwire burungi bw'okugamba ebirikukwata aha mirandira ye.

eng_prompt: During our conversation, he reflected on his journey through academia. He shared how his experiences shaped his understanding of various subjects and prepared him for future challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu mboozi yaffe, yafumiitiriza ku lugendo lwe mu by'ensoma. Yayogera ku ngeri bye yayitamu gye byamuyamba okutegeera amasomo ag'enjawulo n'okwetegekera okusoomoozebwa mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma watye ka lok, en oloko I kom wot mege I gang kwan. En otito kit ma jami ma en okato ki iye okonyo kwede I niang I kom pwony mapatpat ki yubbe pi peko ma obikato anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aineranara kosi, abu ngesi koomoom nuikamunitos akeswam kotoma asioman. Abu ngesi kolim epone loabu akeswam koinak ngesi amisiikin nuka aisisiaeta nuegelegela kosodi aitemonokin ngesi kanuka atiokisio nuka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Sawa amani e'yo nzeria, eri ega e'yo aci erini 'diyi ma dria geri onitaniri ma aliasi. Eri olu e'yo erini esu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi geri erini e'yo onizu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria azini otuzu e'yo ewaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugaaniira kwaitu, akateekateeka aha rugyendo rwe omu by'obwegyese. Akagamba oku ebyamuhikireho byamuhwereire kwetegyereza amashomo gatari gamwe na gamwe n'okweteekateekyera oburemeezi bw'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: His commitment to lifelong learning has always been evident. Throughout his academic journey, he pursued knowledge across various fields.
lug_prompt: Obumalirivu bwe mu kuyiga obulamu bwe bwonna bulijjo bubadde bweyoleka. Mu kusoma kwe kwonna, yanoonya okumanya mu bintu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Cwinye I kom kwan pi kare me kwone ducu nen I kare weng. I kare ne weng me kwan, en obedo ka yenyo ngec I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Erai duc aomisioitike mama ejaasi asioman naka aijar kere. Kotoma asiomanike kere, abu ngesi kodum acoa kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Asi feza erini onita idri erini ma alia ri e'da sa dria si. Sawa erini acizu onita ma aliarisi dria, eri nda ondua esele ndu ndu yi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okwehayo kwe omu kwega kumara amagara ge goona kweyorekyeire buriijo. Omu rugyendo rwe rwona rw'eby'obwegyese, akasherura obwengye omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: Throughout his career, he has held various positions in the industry, gaining valuable insights and skills. His extensive background has equipped him with a deep understanding of the field.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gye gyonna egy'omulimu, abadde mu bifo eby'enjawulo mu mulimu guno, n'afuna amagezi n'obukugu obw'omuwendo. Obuyigirize bwe obw'amaanyi bumuyambye okutegeera obulungi omulimu guno.
ach_prompt: I kare me ticce weng, en obedo I kabedo mapat-pat I tenge enoni, ma oweko en onongo ngec ki diro ma pigi tego. Ngec madit ma en tye kwede omiye ngec matut tutwal I kom tic enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuke kere, ejaasi ngesi keda aiboisio nuegelegela kotoma okampuni kangol, ido abu ngesi kodum acoa naepol noi. Acoa naepol noi naejaatar ngesi abu ijaik ngesi amisiikin nuikamunitos aswamisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini azi ngazu dria, ebi pari ndundu eyi 'du okalamvu 'di ma alea, erini ondua orodriru azini ondua orodriru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo erini onita be angiri ri fe eri dri vata angiri e'yo 'di ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu murimo gwe gwona, atwire omu myanya mingi omu by'obushubuzi, yaatunga obwengye n'emyoga y'omugasho. Obwegyese bwe obw'ahaiguru, bumuhwereire kwetegyereza gye omurimo ogu.

eng_prompt: Throughout his career, he has built a diverse portfolio of experiences. His extensive background includes collaborations across various sectors.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gyonna gy'amaze ng'aweereza, alina ebintu bingi by'ayiseemu mu bulamu. Ebyafaayo bye ebinene bizingiramu enkolagana mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare me ticce weng, en obedo ki ngec mapol tutwal. Ngec mapol ma en tye kwede kwako winye I tenge mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuke kere, adumu ngesi amisiarit naepol noi. Akiroke nuepolok imoriaritos aiswamanara kotoma iriongeta luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma alea dria, eri si e'yo erini esu 'diyi karakara. E'yo erini oni 'diyi ma alia ti ecita esele ndu ndu yi ma eselea ri indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mirimo ye yoona, atungire oburemeezi bwingi. Eby'obuhangwa bwe nibitwariramu okukwatanisa omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: In addition to his busy career, he dedicates much of his free time to community service. His involvement in various local organizations reflects his commitment to making a difference.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okuba n'eby'okukola bingi, ebiseera bye ebisinga obungi eby'eddembe abimalira ku kuweereza abantu. Okwenyigira kwe mu bitongole by'omu kitundu eby'enjawulo kulaga obumalirivu bwe mu kukola enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Medo i kom tic matek ma en tye kwede, en tiyo ki cawane mapol me konyo lwak. Bedo mege I dul mapat-pat me tedero nyutu mitine me kelo alokaloka.
teo_prompt: Kilema aswamuke naepol noi, einanakini ngesi apakike naepol noi kanu aijaanakin itunga. Ajaas ke toma oriongeta lu atutubet itodunit ainakina ke aitolomun aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: Azi erini 'yezuri ma drile, eri sawa erini ovuzu azi kokoruri ma alia 'diyi ma pari 'du azi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ngazu. E'yo erini fizu amuti angu 'da ma alea ndundu 'diyi ma alea ri ece ava erini owizu ojata ejizu ri.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera aha mirimo ye y'amaani, obwire bwe obwingi obw'obugabe nabuheereza omu mirimo y'abantu. Okwejumba kwe omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe, nikyoreka okwehayo kwe kukora empindahinduka.

eng_prompt: From a young age, he was captivated by the thrill of competition and the camaraderie it fostered. Every weekend, he would eagerly watch games, dreaming of one day being a part of that world.
lug_prompt: Okuva mu myaka emito, yakwatibwako nnyo okuvuganya n'omukwano ogwaliwo. Buli wiikendi, yalabanga emipiira n'obwagazi, ng'aloota olunaku lumu okubeera ekitundu ky'ensi eyo.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kare ma en pud tidi, en obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom pyem ki winye ma obedo tye ikin dano. I tum pa cabit ducu, en neno tuku ki mit kom, kun lekke me bedo but lobo meno.
teo_prompt: Ageun editeu, apotu kesi koinakisi ngesi aiyalama naka abolobol keda aiswamanara. Kanginiwiken, amina ngesi asesen aboliasio, aomit ngesi ebe adiopepaaran ebuni ngesi ajaut toma akwap kangin.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu eli werea ri ma alea, eri ma asi ndra e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri pie. Sabiti ni i deria, eri te avita yi ndre avasi, orobi be o'du alu ovuzu wudrikuru 'da ma azi.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga akiri muto, akakwatwaho okushemererwa kw'okuhayahayana hamwe n'omukago ogwabaire nigureetwaho. Buri wiikendi, akaba nareeba emizaano n'ekihika ky'amaani, arikuteekateeka ngu eizooba rimwe naija kuba omu nsi egyo.

eng_prompt: In addition to his role in the community, he has developed a keen interest in entrepreneurship. This passion has led him to explore various ventures and opportunities.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko omulimu gwe mu kitundu, ayagala nnyo eby'obusuubuzi. Okwagala kuno kumuleetedde okunoonyereza ku mirimu n'emikisa egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Medo I kom ticce I kabedo enuni, en bene tye ki miti I kom biacara. Miti man oweko en ocako timo jami mapol.
teo_prompt: Kilema akeswam kotoma atutubet, emina ngesi noi aswam ebiasara. Amina na abu koyangau ngesi aingic aswamisinei nuegelegela keda arerengesio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Azi erini nga ongulumu ma alea ri ma azi ma drilea, eri e'do leta angiri tujari 'yezu. Leta 'di fe erini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu azini drileba ndundu eyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera aha murimo gwe omu bantu, atungire ekyetengo ky'amaani omu by'obushubuzi. Ekyetengo eki kimureeteire kuronda emirimo etari emwe n'emwe n'emigisha etari emwe.

eng_prompt: Driven by a deep sense of compassion and a desire for social change, he has dedicated his efforts to understanding the challenges faced by his community. With a vision for a brighter future, he seeks innovative solutions to uplift those around him.
lug_prompt: Olw'obusaasizi obw'amaanyi n'okwagala okukyusa embeera z'abantu, akoze kyonna ekisoboka okutegeera okusoomoozebwa abantu b'omu kitundu kye kwe boolekaganye nakwo. Ng'alina ekirooto ky'ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebitangaavu, anoonya engeri empya ez'okusitula abo abamwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: Ki cwiny me kica ki miti me kelo aloka-loka I kabedo ma en bedo iye, en oketo cwinye me niang peko ma lwak tye ka kato iye. Ki neno me anyim maber, en yenyo yoo manyen me tyelo kor jo ma orumu.
teo_prompt: Keda asianut naepol noi keda eipud loka aijulakin ejautene loka itunga, abu ngesi iswama agogongu kanu amisiikin atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luka atutubetekec. Keda aomisioit naka aijar naejok koingaren, emoot ngesi iwaitin lu itolomunete iboro lu itojokaret itunga luejaasi ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Asi ndriza okporu azini ava ojata ejizu ongulumu eyi ma eselea risi, fe okpo erini e'yo ewaru ongulumu erini 'diyi esu 'diyi vazu. E'yo dreza ewu drialeri ma dria ri si, eri geri ndundu eyi nda 'ba eri ma agei 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira esaasi nyingi hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okuhindura embeera z'abantu, akoreise amaani ge kumanya oburemeezi obu abantu be barikurabamu. N'ekigyendererwa ky'ebiro bya nyensya birungi, naasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura abantu abamwetooroire.

eng_prompt: The community has been struggling with corruption and mismanagement for years. Recognizing the urgent need for change, he is determined to take action.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kirwanagana n'obuli bw'enguzi n'enzirukanya embi okumala emyaka. Ng'ategeera obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkyukakyuka, mumalirivu okubaako ky'akolawo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lweny ki camucana ki tela marac pi mwaki mapol. Ki niang ni aloka-loka tye kamitte oyot, en omoko tamme me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda ecamusana keda eyaitene loaronon adaun ikar luipu. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aijulanakineta, ekapakina ngesi aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi dri ci e'yo anyamgbolo ni azini driceza kililiru ri be eli karakara. Erini e'yo ojata lepi mbeleru ri ma e'yo egazu 'bori ma e'yosi, eri asi 'ba e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'obushomankuzi hamwe n'obwebembezi bubi kumara emyaka mingi. Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'ahonaaho ky'empinduka, ayehaireyo kukora.

eng_prompt: After observing the struggles within his community, he felt a deep sense of responsibility to take action. Motivated by a desire for change, he began to explore ways to address the challenges that many were experiencing.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba entalo mu kitundu kye, yawulira obuvunaanyizibwa obw'amaanyi okubaako ky'akolawo. Olw'okuba yali ayagala nnyo enkyukakyuka, yatandika okunoonya engeri y'okugonjoolamu ebizibu abantu bangi bye baali boolekaganye nabyo.
ach_prompt: Inge neno peko matye I kabedo ne, en owinyo ni myero otim gin mo. Pi mitine me kelo aloka-loka, en ocako yenyo yoo me tyeko peko ma dano mapol tye ka kato iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka awanyun atiokisio nuka atutubeteke, abu ngesi kowomit ebe ibusakinit ngesi aswam ngun. Keda eipud loka aijulakin akiro, abu ngesi kogeu aimo iwaitin lu itemonokinet atiokisio nu ejaas itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo a'di 'diza ongulumu erivileri ma alea 'diyi ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, eri ama asi e'yo 'yezu ra. Asisile erini lezu ojata ejizu risi, eri e'do geri nda e'yo ewaru 'ba karakara eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba entaro omu kyanga kye, akeehurira aine obujunaanizibwa bw'okukora. Ahabw'okugira ngu akaba naayenda empinduka, akatandika kuronda oburyo bw'okutereeza oburemeezi obu baingi baabaire nibatunga.

eng_prompt: In his speech, he outlined the importance of community engagement and accountability in governance. He believes that effective leadership is rooted in understanding and addressing the needs of the constituents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe, yalambika obukulu bw'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu n'embalirira mu bukulembeze. Alowooza nti obukulembeze obulungi businziira ku kutegeera n'okukola ku byetaago by'abantu b'omu bitundu by'akiikirira.
ach_prompt: I lok mege, en oloko I kom ber pa miyo kony ki kor tic ki lwak I tela. En tye ki niyee ni tela maber aa ki I niang ki cobo miti pa lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oinerike abu ngesi kitetem ajokis naka aimorikikin itunga keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma apugan. Iyuunit ngesi ebe engarenone loajokan erai amisiikin ka aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini nze ri ma alea, ece orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea azini e'yo eyini 'ye eyi ma dria ri ma dria. Eri a'ira kini driceza kililiru ri enga e'yo vata ma dria azini e'yo 'ba angu erini opi nyazani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe, akashoborora omugasho gw'abantu kwejumba omu by'obwebembezi. Naayikiriza ngu obwebembezi burungi nibureetwa okwetegyereza n'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abu orikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: Driven by a deep sense of responsibility, he believes that true leadership comes from understanding the needs of the community. His commitment to public service fuels his desire to advocate for those he represents.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuvunaanyizibwa obw'amaanyi, akkiriza nti obukulembeze obutuufu buva mu kutegeera ebyetaago by'abantu. Obumalirivu bwe mu buweereza bw'olukale bwongera amaanyi mu kwagala kwe okulwanirira abo b'akiikirira.
ach_prompt: Pi tic matek ma en tye kwede, en tye ki niyee ni tela maber aa ki I niang miti pa lwak. Cwinye i kom tic pa lwak oweko en tye ki miti me cungu pi jo ma en cung pigi.
teo_prompt: Keda aswam naepol noi, iyuunit ngesi ebe engarenone loajokan elomunit kotoma amisiikin ipudesia luka itunga. Apodokinit ke naka aijanakin apugan einakini ngesi eipud loka aigang ngul luebwoikinit ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza erini okporu risi, eri a'ira kini driceza a'da ri enga e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma vata ma dria. Asi feza erini azi ngazu o'bi eyidri ri ni fe erini asi 'bazu a'di 'dizu 'ba erini pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obujunaanizibwa bwe obw'amaani, naikiriza ngu obwebembezi obwabuzima niburuga omu kwetegyereza ebyetengo by'abantu. Okwehayo kwe omu buheereza bwa gavumenti nikimwongyera amaani g'okurwanirira abo abu arikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with misunderstandings and isolation, he feels a deep calling to connect with others. Driven by empathy, he believes that true change begins with listening to those around him.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obutategeeragana n'okweyawula, awulira okuyitibwa okw'amaanyi okukwatagana n'abalala. Ng'akubirizibwa okusaasira, akkiriza nti enkyukakyuka entuufu etandikira mu kuwuliriza abo abamwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki apoka-poka ki bedo kene, en winyo lwongo matek me kube ki jo mukene. Pi kica ma en tye kwede, en tye ki niyee ni aloka loka me ada cake ki winyo lok pa jo ma orumu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda amamus acamanar keda luce, epupi ngesi aiwororio naepol noi naka arucokina keda luce. Keda apodokinit, iyuunit ngesi ebe aijulanakineta nukabeit egeunete kopupokin ngul luejaasi ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo erita ako ni azini aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ku ri ma alea, eri e'yo 'bani eri omvezu eyi ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri ma dria. Asi ndriza ma e'yosi, eri a'ira kini ojata a'da ri ni e'do 'ba eri ma ageia 'diyi ma e'yo eriza si.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire obutetegyerezana n'okwetantara abandi, nahurira okwetwa kw'amaani kw'okukwatanisa n'abandi. Ahabw'okugira esaasi, naikiriza ngu empinduka eyaabuzima neetandika n'okuhurikiza abo abamwetooroire.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges, the new leader has outlined a comprehensive plan. His primary focus is on addressing the disparities that have long plagued the nation.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, omukulembeze omupya alaze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Essira ly'assa ku kugonjoola obutali bwenkanya obumaze ebbanga nga butawaanya eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim matye cokcok-ki, latela manyen okatti ki yub maber tutwal. En oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom cobo peko me apoka-poka matye ka yelo lobo man pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, abu engarenon loitetet kitodu ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet ke nes aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas akwap adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba o'diru 'da e'da otita azi dria ma dria. Asi 'baza erini okori e'yo esele coza ebipi candi fepi kari 'di ma alea sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwahati, omwebembezi omusya ataireho enteekateeka y'omutaano. Ekikuru eki arikuteekateekaho n'okutereeza obutaikirizana obumazire obwire buraingwa burikuteganisa eihanga.

eng_prompt: In a world increasingly divided by differences, he believes that unity is essential for progress. With a vision for a more inclusive community, he seeks to inspire collaboration among diverse groups.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okweyawulayawula olw'enjawulo, alowooza nti obumu bwa mugaso mu nkulaakulana. Ng'alina ekiruubirirwa eky'okussaawo ekitundu ekirimu abantu bonna, anoonya okuleetawo enkolagana mu bibiina eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: En tye ki niyee ni ribe obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo. Ki neno me bedo ki kabedo ma dano weng tye iye, en mito cuku cwiny dano me ribe ikin gurup mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetiakatiaka noi naarai egelegela, iyuunit ngesi ebe aimorikikina erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol. Keda aomisioit naka itunga kere, ekoto ngesi aisinyikokit aiswamanara kiding igurupun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma esele coza tualuri ma alia, eri a'ira kini ti ecita eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. E'yo erini lezu ongulumu 'ba dria ma eselea ri si, eri le ti ecita eji ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikweyongyera kwebaganisamu ahabw'obutakwatanisa, naikiriza ngu okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka. N'ekigyendererwa ky'okureetaho obumwe omu bantu, naasherura okureetaho okukwatanisa omu guruupu ezitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In order to promote fairness and equity among all residents, the committee has proposed a new policy. This initiative aims to address the disparities that have long existed within our community.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obwenkanya n'obwenkanya mu batuuze bonna, akakiiko kateesezza etteeka eppya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo enjawukana ezibaddewo mu kitundu kyaffe okumala ebbanga.
ach_prompt: Me kelo ber bedo ikin lwak, dul enoni okatti ki tam me kelo cik manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko apoka-poka ma obedo tye ikin lwak wa pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolorite nuka asipokina keda asipokina kanejaas itunga kere, etemoki ekomiti ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitemokin atiakatiaka na ajai apak naepol noi kotoma atutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo ada ma omgbo otuzu 'ba dria aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, komiti 'da fe egata azita o'di ni. E'yo 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo esele coza ni aa'pi sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma aza kozu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okureetaho oburinganiza n'oburinganiza omu batuuragye boona, akakiiko kateireho ekiteiso ky'okukora ekiragiro kisya. Ekigyendererwa ky'ekigyendererwa eki n'okugonjoora obutaikirizana obumazire obwire buraingwa omu bantu baitu.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, it is essential to ensure that all voices are heard and considered. Engaging individuals in discussions fosters a sense of ownership and accountability.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, kya mugaso okulaba nti amaloboozi gonna gawulirwa era ne gatunuulirwa. Okwenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuleetawo enneewulira y'obwannannyini n'embalirira.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, pire tek tutwal me neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo dok ki tamo I komgi. Bedo tye pa dano ikare me nywako lok weko dano giwinyo ni gin weng gubedo pa weggi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ejokuna noi awanyun ebe epupio ka apodokinit akiro nuka itunga kere. Aitolomio naka itunga kotoma oineresinei eyangauni aomisioit ebe eraasi kesi ikulepek ka eipone lo itwasamatere akiro.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alia, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba o'duko dria yi eri azini ega e'yo yi ma dria ra. E'yo nzeza 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ni fe 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi ni azini eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu eiraka ry'omuntu weena rihurirwa kandi rikateekwateekwaho. Okweta abantu omu kuhanuura, nikureetaho okwetegyereza n'okureetaho embaririra.

eng_prompt: As part of his vision for community development, he aims to empower local farmers and artisans. To achieve this, he will introduce cooperative unions.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa bye eby'okukulaakulanya ekitundu, aluubirira okutumbula abalimi b'omu kitundu n'abakozi b'emikono. Okutuukiriza kino, ajja kutandikawo ebibiina by'obwegassi.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub mege me dongo lobo, en tye ki miti me tyelo kor lupur ki lutic me tedero. Me cobo man, en obi cako dul me ribbe.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma aomisioitike nuka apol naka itunga, ekoto ngesi aitogogong akoriok keda luitolomete iboro. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ebuni ngesi aitolomun asusaitin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini lezu ongulumu eyi ezozu ri ma azi ru, eri le okpo fe 'ba amvu 'yapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri tualu 'ba afa edele drisi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eri nga amuti ti icita ni 'diyi e'do.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka ye y'okutunguura ebyanga, aine ekigyendererwa ky'okutunguura abahingi n'abakozi b'eby'emikono. Okuhikiiriza eki, naija kutaho ebibiina by'okweteerana.

eng_prompt: As a newly elected leader, he understands the weight of his responsibilities. With a deep commitment to unity and fairness, he is determined to advocate for every community member.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze eyaakalondebwa, ategeera obuzito bw'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe. Olw'okwagala ennyo obumu n'obwenkanya, mumalirivu okulwanirira buli muntu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela ma kiyero manyen, en oniang peko me tic ma en tye kwede. Ki keto cwinye tutwal I kom ribe ki ber bedo, en omoko tamme me lweny pi dano weng me kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon lo eseunitai, ejeni ngesi ajokis naka aswamuke. Keda ainakina naepol noi mama ejai aimorikikina keda asipokina, ekapakina ngesi aigang itunga kere luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba 'bani pele o'diru ri ru, eri e'yo azi erini 'diyi ma nziza va. Asi 'baza be ti ecita azini e'yo ada ma dria, eri asi 'ba e'yo nzezu 'ba dria ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi omusya otoorainwe, nayetegyereza oburemeezi bw'obujunaanizibwa bwe. Ahabw'okwehayo munonga aha kukwatanisa n'oburinganiza, amaririire kurwanirira buri muntu omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with diversity and differing beliefs, it is essential to recognize the inherent value of every individual. Embracing the idea that each person reflects a unique aspect of the divine can foster compassion and understanding among us.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde enjawukana n'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo, kya mugaso okutegeera omuwendo gwa buli muntu. Okukkiriza ekirowoozo nti buli muntu alaga engeri ey'enjawulo ey'obwakatonda kisobola okutumbula okusaasira n'okutegeeragana mu ffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki jami ma pat pat ki niyee mapat pat, pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa ngat acel acel. Jolo tam ni ngat acel-acel tye ki jami ma kite dok pat tutwal I kom lubanga twero weko kica ki niang bedo tye ikinwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda iponesio luegelegela keda aiyuuneta nuegelegela, ejok ajenun ajokis naka nginitunganan. Aingarakin aomisioit ebe itodunit ngin itunganan iponesio luitegelikina luka Edeke epedori aitopolor aitim keda apuponoro kidingikosi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo a'ita ni ndundu 'diyi pie tre, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu ma orodri a'izu. E'yo 'ba alu alu ni e'dazu e'yo wura ndusi Munguniri ma dria ri ma a'izu ri eco ama ma eselea asi ndriza azini vata ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire enzikiriza zitarikushushana, n'eky'omugasho kumanya omugasho gwa buri omwe. Okukiriza ekiteekateeko ngu buri muntu aine enshonga ye ey'omutaano, nikibaasa kureetaho okusaasira n'okwetegyerezana omuriitwe.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by young entrepreneurs in the community, he has developed a comprehensive plan to support their initiatives. To achieve this, he intends to lobby funds from the government through youth livelihood programs.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa abavubuka abatandisi b'emirimu kwe basanga mu kitundu, akoze enteekateeka ey'amaanyi okuwagira enteekateeka zaabwe. Okutuukiriza kino, agenderera okusaka ensimbi okuva mu gavumenti ng'ayita mu pulogulaamu z'okubeezaawo obulamu bw'abavubuka.
ach_prompt: Pien en oniang peko ma bulu matye katic ki biacara gitye ka kato ki iye, en okatti ki yub me miyo kony botgi. Me cobo man, en mito yenyo cente ki bot gamente kun tiyo ki yub me konyo bulu.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda atumunak luitolosete ibiasaran kotoma atutubet, etolomu ngesi ainapeta nuigangitos kesi. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ekoto ngesi ailip ikapun kama ejai apugan itoritos ainapeta nuka aijar naka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba ode tujari 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyisi, eri e'do otita eyi atita fezu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eri le robia tra engazu gamete vu geri otita 'ba ode eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu eminyeeto erikukora bizinesi erikushanga omukyanga, akozire enteekateeka y'okushagika enteekateeka zaayo. Okuhikiiriza eki, nayenda kuronda esente kuruga omu gavumenti kurabira omu nteekateeka z'okutunguura eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the disparities in funding across various regions, he has been researching the impact of current financial allocations. As a result, he intends to advocate for an increase in the equalisation grants.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba amanyi enjawulo eriwo mu kuwa ensimbi mu bitundu eby'enjawulo, abadde anoonyereza ku ngeri ensimbi gye zigabanyizibwamu mu kiseera kino. N'ekyavaamu, agenderera okulwanirira okwongeza ensimbi z'obuyambi ez'okwenkanankana.
ach_prompt: I nge niang apoka-poka matye I kin dul mapat-pat me lim I but lobo mapat-pat, en obedo ka kwedo adwoki pa yub me lim matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, en tye ki miti me lweny pi medo lim ma kimiyo me medo rwom me lim marom.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiaketait naka ikapun kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, euta ngesi aingic nuikamunitos eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ekoto ngesi aikeun nuka aiyatakin ikapun lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo esele coza robia ni angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria risi, ebi e'yo vuti onda e'yo robia 'bani fele sa'wa 'disi 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eri le a'di 'di robia fele 'ba eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu trotro.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya entaaniso omu by'empiiha omu byanga ebitarikushushana, atwire naacondooza aha bikwatireine n'enshohoza eriho obwahati. N'ekyarugiremu, aine ekigyendererwa ky'okurwanirira okwongyera omuhendo gw'esente ezirikwingana.

eng_prompt: In the context of sustainable development, the role of land management cannot be overstated. Effective use of land resources is crucial for fostering economic growth and improving livelihoods in rural areas.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera, omulimu gw'okuddukanya ettaka tegusobola kugambibwa nnyo. Okukozesa obulungi eby'obugagga by'ettaka kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu mu byalo.
ach_prompt: I yub me dongo lobo matye anyim, tic pa tela me ngom pe omyero ki lok I komgi tutwal. Tic ki lonyo me ngom maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki ilo malo rwom me kwo I caro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuikamunitos apol naejok, mam epedorio aitogogong ajokis naka eyaitene loka alupok. Aitosom alupok ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor apol keda aitojokar aijar naka itunga lukocaloi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma alea, 'ba econi azi e'yo nyaku ma tambazu ri ma dria ri ma omgbo otu ku. Afa nyaku ni 'diyi ma ayuta kililiru ri eri orodriru zota e'yo robiani ma alia azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntunguuka erikugumaho, omugasho gw'okureeberera eitaka tigurikubaasa kugambwaho munonga. Okukoresa kurungi eby'eitaka n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'entatsya n'okutunguura emituurire y'abantu omu byaro.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent increase in land disputes, community leaders held a meeting to discuss the importance of land ownership rights. They emphasized the need for proper documentation to protect individual properties from potential encroachments.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano bw'ettaka obweyongedde gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baatuuzizza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'obwannannyini ku ttaka. Baakakasizza obwetaavu bw'okubeera n'ebiwandiiko ebituufu okukuuma ebintu by'omuntu okuva eri abasenze.
ach_prompt: Pi lok me lara ngom matye kamede I kare-ni, lutela me kabedo guyubu kacoke me nywako lok I kom ber pa twero pa wegine ngom. Guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom miti me bedo ki karatac maber me gwoko jami pa dano ki I kom jo ma donyo I ngomgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin naka ingungeta luka alupok, apotu engarenok luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka apedorosio nuka alupok. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka aiwadika iboro ejok kanu ayuarite iboro kama ejaasi ngul luepedorete alomar toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu orodri e'yo nyaku ma e'ipika niri ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi e'yo lezu kokobi kililiru 'diyi ma ta mbazu afa 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo 'ba eyini ecozu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entongane z'eitaka okweyongyera ebiro ebi, abebembezi b'ekyanga bakakora orukiiko kuhanuura aha bukuru bw'obugabe bw'eitaka. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okuba n'ebihandiiko ebihikire, kugira ngu ebintu by'abantu birekye kutaahirirwa.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the urgent need for modernization, the city planner has outlined a comprehensive strategy. With a focus on sustainability and efficiency, he intends to ensure infrastructural development.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuzza ebintu ku mulembe, omutegesi w'ekibuga akoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Ng'assa essira ku buwangaazi n'obwangu, agenderera okukulaakulanya ebizimbe.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ni mite tutwal me kelo aloka-loka I boma madit, luyub yub me boma madit okatti ki yoo mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat Ki keto cwiny I kom gwoko kwo ki tic maber, en tye ki miti me neno ni dongo lobo obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loepol noi loka aisiteteun eswamae loakwana, abu etemonokinan loka eibuga kitemok ainapeta nuepedorete kesi aswam. Keda apodokinit aijar naejok ka aswam ejok, ekoto ngesi awanyun apol naka aiboisio.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo ewu curu'do 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ma e'yo egazu risi, 'ba aku ambu cityniri ma e'yo otupi 'diyi e'da otita azi dria 'diyi ma dria. Erini asi 'bazu e'yo ewu drile ri ni azini e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria, eri le angu ezoza ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunguura orurembo,orikukora enteekateeka y'orurembo akozire enteekateeka. N'ekigyendererwa ky'okutunguura ebyombeko.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of the electoral process relies heavily on the conduct of its participants. Therefore, it is essential for individuals to uphold respectful and responsible behavior during campaigns.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obulungi bw'okulonda kwesigama nnyo ku nneeyisa y'abo abeetabamu. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu okweyisa mu ngeri ey'ekitiibwa era ey'obuvunaanyizibwa mu biseera by'okunoonya obululu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir jenge tutwalle I kom kit pa joo matye I yer ne. Pi meno, pire tek ni dano omyero gubed ki woro ki kit maber ikare me bito kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo, amunonoro naka ainapeta nuka aseo esipokinitai noi kotupitete iponesio luka itunga luejaikina toma. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi itunga ajaut keda iponesio luajokak kapak kana aisup aseeta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma adriza kililiru ri ni pa so tutuni 'ba pa tupi opetaa ma alea 'diyi ma adriza ma dria. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba yi dri adriza inzitaru azini asi'baza be 'diyi ma ta mbazu sawa ti odazanirisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru nibwegamira aha micwe y'abarikubwejumbiramu. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abantu boona kugira emicwe y'ekitiinisa n'obujunaanizibwa omu bwire bw'ehururu.

eng_prompt: During the community meeting, he passionately expressed his views on the importance of a cohesive society. He emphasized the need for a strong foundation to ensure progress and harmony among the citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu, yalaga n'obwagazi endowooza ye ku bukulu bw'ekitundu okubeera obumu. Yakikkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'omusingi omunywevu okulaba nga wabaawo enkulaakulana n'obumu mu bannansi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lwak, en oloko ki mit kom I kom ber pa ribbe ikin lwak. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom miti me bedo ki guti matek me neno ni anywali tye ka dongo ki bedo ki winye ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, abu ngesi kiner aomisioke nuikamunitos ajokis naka aimorikikina naka itunga. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka adukun atukot naegogong kanu awanyun apol keda aimorikikina kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini 'da ma alea, eri ece egata erini 'diyi e'yo orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu tualu ri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi e'yo lezu 'ba ma si e'yo okporu angu ezoma ni azini aa'ta tualu kari anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga, akashoborora ebiteekateeko bye aha mugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu bantu. Akashoboorora ekyetengo ky'omusingye gw'amaani, okureeba ngu hariho entunguuka n'obumwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In a world where collaboration often leads to innovation, he believes that healthy competition can drive progress. This perspective allows him to appreciate the contributions of others in the field.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi omukago mwe gutera okuvaamu obuyiiya, alowooza nti okuvuganya okulungi kusobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana. Endowooza eno emusobozesa okusiima ebikolebwa abalala mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ribe ikin dano ipol kare kelo diro manyen, en tye ki niyee ni pyem maber twero kelo dongo lobo. Neno man weko en pwoyo tic pa jo mukene I tenge ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetapit aimorikikina ayangaun acoasinei nuitetiak, iyuunit ngesi ebe abolobol najokan epedori ayangaun apol. Ingarakini aomisioit ngin ngesi aisiyalamikin aswamisio nuka luce kotoma aswam kangin.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani ti ecita ejizu tualuri ma alea, eri a'ira kini baka seza kililiru ri eco angu ezoma eji ra. Egata 'di ni eri dri fe awa'difo fe e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni 'ye angu 'di ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu okukwatanisa kurikureetaho okujumbura, naikiriza ngu okuhayahayana kurungi nikubaasa kureetaho entunguuka. Ekiteekateeko eki nikimuhwera kusiima ebi abandi bakozire.

eng_prompt: In a time of increasing political division, he believes collaboration is essential for a healthy democracy. He advocates for a united approach to ensure that every voice is heard and valued throughout the electoral process.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera kino eky'okweyongera kw'enjawukana mu byobufuzi, alowooza nti okukwatagana kwa mugaso mu demokulasiya omulungi. Ayagala wabeewo enkola ey'awamu okulaba nti buli ddoboozi liwulirwa era liweebwa ekitiibwa mu kulonda kwonna.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma apoka-poka me cungu iwi-bye tye kamede, en tye ki niyee ni ribe obedo gin ma pire tek pi loc alwak. En cwako yub me ribe me neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo dok ki woro gi ikare weng me yer.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naepol noi naka atiakatiaka naka epolitikis, iyuunit ngesi ebe epol aiswamanara kanu aseo najokan. Igangit ngesi epone loimorikikina kanu awanyun ebe epupio ka ayongite iporotoi kere kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa esele coza politiki niri ni tuzu ri ma alea, eri a'ira kini ti ecita eri orodriru e'yo democracia ni aa'zu muke ri ni. Eri a'di 'di geri ti ecita ni si nezu ra kini 'ba eri o'duko 'ba dria ni azini 'ba ega e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu eby'obutegyeki byeyongyeiremu okwebaganisamu, naateekateeka ngu okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obugabe bw'okusharamu. Nahagira ngu habeho okukwatanisa okureeba ngu buri jwi ryahurirwa kandi rikatwarwa nk'ery'omugasho omu by'oburuuru byona.

eng_prompt: In today's increasingly polarized climate, it's essential to reflect on the true purpose of political engagement. We must remember that the foundation of democracy lies in collaboration and understanding among diverse perspectives.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero eyeeyongera okubaamu enjawukana, kikulu nnyo okufumiitiriza ku kigendererwa ekituufu eky'okwenyigira mu byobufuzi. Tulina okujjukira nti omusingi gwa demokulasiya guli mu kukwatagana n'okutegeeragana mu ndowooza ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma dano tye ki apoka-poka, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom tyen lok me donyo I lok me cungu iwi-bye. Omyero wiwa opo ni guti me tela pa lwak tye I winye ki winye ikin jo ma tam gi pat pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loegelegela lo ilolo, ejokuna noi aomoom nuikamunitos alosikinet naka alomar toma akiro nuka politikis. Ibusakinit oni aiitun ebe atukot naka aseo naka itunga erai aimorikikina keda apuponoro kanejaas iponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo esele coza ni tutu ri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo egazu e'yo a'da e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria. Le ama ma ega ra kini e'yo democracia niri ma vuti ni aa ti ecita azini vata ma alea 'ba e'yo ndundu 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'erizooba oburimu okwebaganisamu, nikikuru kuteekateeka aha kigyendererwa ekihikire ky'okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki. Twine kwijuka ngu omusingi gwa demokurasiya n'okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana ahagati y'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: Despite their fierce rivalry in the business world, he believes that mutual respect is essential for success. As the competition heats up, he reflects on the importance of camaraderie even among adversaries.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okuvuganya kwabwe okw'amaanyi mu nsi ya bizinensi, alowooza nti okussa ekitiibwa mu buli omu kya mugaso eri obuwanguzi. Okuvuganya bwe kweyongera, afumiitiriza ku bukulu bw'omukwano ne mu balabe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka pyem matek tutwal I tenge me biacara, en tye ki niyee ni woro dano weng pire tek pi cobo miti ne. I kare ma pyem tye ka medde, en tamo I kom ber pa ribbe kadi wa ikin lumone.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda epeget loepol noi kotoma akwap naka ebiasara, iyuunit ngesi ebe ayongite yenice ejok kanu akerianut. Kwape epol abolobol, abu ngesi koomoom ajokis naka aimorikikina araida ijaasi ngul lueboloboloete.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma baka seza okporu tujari ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, eri a'ira kini inzita yi ma eselea ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo baka seza niri ni ecaria drizaru, eri ega orodri aa'ta tualu ri ma dria ata 'ba aribo ru 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu baraabe nibahakanisa munonga omu by'obushubuzi, naateekateeka ngu okuheerezana ekitiinisa n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Obu okuhayahayana kuriyo nikweyongyera, naateekateeka aha mugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'omu bataahi.

eng_prompt: After months of tension and rivalry, he has finally decided that enough is enough. The time has come for him to take decisive action against his opponent.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obunkenke n'okuvuganya, kyaddaaki asazeewo nti ekimala kimala. Ekiseera kituuse okubaako ky'akolawo ku gw'avuganya naye.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me telle ki pyem, dong otyeko moko tamme ni ma oromo dong oromo. Kare dong oromo pi en me timo gin mo I kom ngat ma tye ka pyem kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka engunget keda abolobol, abu ngesi kotema ebe edolit. Adolu kwana apak naka ngesi aswam nuepedori ngesi aswam mama ejai loeboloboloete keda ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Mba yi ma vutia asi omiza azini baka seza ma vutia, asizu asi 'du kini ca 'di ca 'bo. Sa'wa ca erini e'yo 'yezu okporu 'ba erini baka sezu 'diyi ma rua.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'obunkenke n'okuhayahayana, ahamuheru ashaziremu ngu ekirikumara n'ekirikumara. Obwire buhikire ngu akore eky'amaani ahari ou arikuhakana nawe.

eng_prompt: The current administration has failed to address the pressing issues facing the community. Many residents feel that new perspectives and ideas are necessary for progress.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti eriwo eremereddwa okukola ku bizibu abantu bye boolekaganye nabyo. Abatuuze bangi bawulira nti endowooza empya n'ebirowoozo byetaagisa mu nkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Tela matye kombedi pe twero cobo peko mapigi tego ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye. Lutedero mapol tamo ni tam ki tam manyen mite pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Epiko eyaitene loakwana aitemokin atiokisio nu etereikina keda itunga. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe aomisio ka aomisio nuitetiak ejokuka kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: Driceza sawa 'disi ri o'bi e'yo okporu ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza ko ti. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara 'diyi ega kini egata o'diru 'diyi orodriru angu ezoma ni.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi oburiho obwahati, buremirwe kukora aha nshonga ezirikuteganisa abantu. Abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu emiteekateekyere misya n'ebiteekateeko bisya nibyetengwa aha ntunguuka.

eng_prompt: The local economy has been struggling, and community leaders are seeking innovative solutions. In response to this challenge, he is exploring various strategies to stimulate growth.
lug_prompt: Eby'enfuna by'ekitundu bibadde bikaluba era abakulembeze b'ekitundu banoonya engeri z'okubigonjoolamu. Ng'ayanukula okusoomoozebwa kuno, anoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Biacara me tedero tye ka canne tutwal dok lutela me tedero tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me cobo peko ne. Macalo adwogi me peko man, en tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me kelo dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Ejai ationis naepol noi naka ikapun luka atutubet, ido eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aimo iwaitin luitetiak luka aitemokin ngun. Kanu aitemokin ainingosit na, euta ngesi aingic iwaitin luegelegela lu itolomunere apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea ri ebi dri ci, dika drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi geri ndundu eyi nda. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, eri geri ndundu zota ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi onda.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya y'ekyaro bitwire nibirwanagana, kandi abebembezi b'ebyaro nibaronda oburyo bw'okutereeza. Ahabw'oburemeezi obu, ariyo naronda oburyo bw'okureetaho entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Many residents in Arua struggle to meet their basic needs due to a lack of resources and opportunities. As a result, the community faces significant challenges in improving their quality of life.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi mu Arua balwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe olw'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa n'emikisa. N'ekivuddemu, ekitundu kisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwakyo.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol I Arua gitye ki peko me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi pi can lim ki gum me tic. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak nongo peko madit tutwal I ilo malo rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luko Arua eutasi ainingosit aitodolikin ipudesia kec kanuka amamus na iboro keda arerengesio. Kanuka ngun, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuepolok nuka aitojokar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara aa'pi Arua 'diyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu e'yo afa ayuzaru azini drileba eyini yo risi. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini eyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi omuri Arua nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu n'emigisha. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunguura emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings from community leaders and residents about the growing needs of the population, the district officials have consistently overlooked essential planning measures. As a result, many critical issues have gone unaddressed, leading to widespread dissatisfaction among the citizens.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga abakulembeze b'ekitundu n'abatuuze balabula nnyo ku byetaago by'abantu okweyongera, abakungu ba disitulikiti beerabira enteekateeka ez'omugaso. N'ekivuddemu, ensonga nnyingi enkulu tezikoleddwako, ekiviiriddeko obutali bumativu mu bannansi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lutela me tedero kacel ki lutedero gubedo ka ciko dano i kom jami ma mite pi wel dano matye kamede, lutic me district gubedo ka cayo yub mapigi tego. Macalo adwogi ne, lok mapigi tego mapol pe kitimo i komgi, man okelo cwer cwiny I kin anywali mapol.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai engarenok luka atutubet keda itunga luipu nuikamunitos ipudesia luka itunga luipu, mam eswamak luko disitrikt epalunitos ainapeta nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, mam itemokinitai akiro nuipu nuepolok, eyangauni amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza engazu drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi vu tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ra ti, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi e'bi e'yo otita eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, e'yo okporu karakara eyi awini eyi ma aza ko ku, e'yo 'da fe kari anzi eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kwingi kuruga omu beebembezi b'ebyanga hamwe n'abatuuragye ahabyetaago by'abantu, abakuru omu disiturikiti bagumire nibarekyerera enteekateeka ez'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, enshonga nyingi nz'amaani tizikikozirweho, ekirikureetaho obutetegyerezibwa omu bantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate economic growth and empower local entrepreneurs, a new initiative has been launched. This program aims to support aspiring business owners by offering financial resources and guidance.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu, enteekateeka empya etongozeddwa. Pulogulaamu eno egendereddwamu okuyamba abo abaagala okuba bannannyini bizinensi ng'ebawa obuyambi bw'ensimbi n'obulagirizi.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki miyo kero ki lutim biacara me tedero, yub manyen kicako. Yub man tye ki miti me konyo lutim biacara matye ki miti me timo biacara kun gimiyo kony me lim ki tira.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitigogong agwelanarak luka atutubet, aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aigangit ngul lu ekotosi agwelanar kowai lo aijaikin kesi ikapun ka aicoreta.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini okpo fezu 'ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri, 'ba e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu atita fezu 'ba lepi tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri geri robia fezu azini imbata fezurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okutunguura abashubuzi b'omwihanga, enteekateeka nsya etandikirweho. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuhwera abarikwenda kutandika bizinesi, obwo erikubaheereza obuhwezi bw'esente n'obuhabuzi.

eng_prompt: In a passionate speech addressing the crowd, he emphasizes the importance of fresh perspectives in today's rapidly changing world. He believes that the energy and creativity of the younger generation are crucial for driving meaningful change.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe okw'obwagazi eri abantu, assa essira ku bukulu bw'okuba n'endowooza empya mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu. Alowooza nti amaanyi n'obuyiiya bw'omulembe omuto bikulu nnyo mu kuleetawo enkyukakyuka ey'omugaso.
ach_prompt: I lok ma obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma tye ka lok ki lwak, en onyuto ber pa bedo ki tam manyen I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni. En tye ki niyee ni kero ki diro pa jo matino obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo aloka loka maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oinerike loajokan nejaas itunga, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aomisio nuitetiak kotoma akwap naka lolo naejok noi. Iyuunit ngesi ebe agogongu keda acoa naka atumunak eraasi nuepolok noi kanu aitodolikin aijulakineta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini nze 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma tia avasi ri ma alea, eri asi 'ba orodri egata o'diru ni 'diyi ma dria wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru 'di ma alea. Eri a'ira kini okpo azini ondua 'ba oderu 'diyiniri orodriru ojata orodriruni ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe okw'omuhimbo, akahamiiriza omugasho gw'ebiteekateeko ebisya omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire juba. Naayikiriza ngu amaani n'okujumbura kw'eminyeeto n'eby'omugasho omu kureetaho empinduka.

eng_prompt: As part of his commitment to sustainable energy solutions, he is focused on improving infrastructure and accessibility. His leadership will play a crucial role in advancing the energy sector.
lug_prompt: Ng'omu ku biruubirirwa bye eby'okutumbula eby'amasannyalaze, assa essira ku kutumbula ebyetaago n'obwangu bw'okutuukako. Obukulembeze bwe bujja kukola kinene nnyo mu kutumbula eby'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub mege me neno ni mac omede anyim, en oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom medo rwom me tic ki yoo me nongo mac. Tela mege obi konyo tutwal I dongo tenge me mac.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediopet kotoma ainakina ke kanu aitemokin nuka akim, epodokinit ngesi aitojokar iboro ka adolokin kes. Ebuni eingarenoneke aswam naepol noi kanu aitopolor erionget loka akim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini asi 'bazu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma azi ru, eri asi 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini geri 'bani ecozu eyi esuzu ri ma dria. Eri ma driceza ni nga azi okporu nga esele aci niri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'ekicweka ky'okwehayo kwe ahaby'amashanyarazi ebirikugumaho, naata amaani omu kutunguura ebyombeko hamwe n'okureetaho amashanyarazi. Obwebembezi bwe nibwija kukora omurimo muhango omu kutunguura eby'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: In his approach to projects, he consistently prioritizes achieving measurable outcomes. Colleagues often admire his focus on delivering tangible results.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ye ku pulojekiti, bulijjo akulembeza okutuuka ku bivaamu ebipima. Banne batera okwegomba okufaayo kwe ku kutuusa ebivaamu ebirabika.
ach_prompt: I yoo mege me timo tic mapat-pat, en keto miti me nongo adwogi maber ikare weng. Lutic luwote ipol kare gimaro neno kit ma en keto kwede cwinye me kelo adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma epone loepedoria ngesi aitodolikin ipurojektin, isingarenit ngesi aitodolikin akiro nuepedorio ajenun. Ekotosi duc ipaupakec epodokinit ke kanu aitodolikin akiro nuepedorio aanyun.
lgg_prompt: Geri erini otita eyi 'yezu ri ma alea, eri sa'wa driasi e'yo orodriru 'bani eco o'bi eyi ma eselea 'diyi esuzu. Azi'ba azi 'diyi sawa driasi ayiko esu erini asi 'bazu e'yo yi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogu arikukoramu purogyekiti, buriijo naata omutwe okutunga ebirugyemu ebirikubaasa kupimibwa. Abakozi bagyenzi be nibakunda okuta omutima aha bintu ebirikureebeka.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing needs of the community, he dedicated himself to improving local infrastructure. His efforts focused on enhancing the quality of life for residents.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obweyongera, yeewaayo mu kutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Amaanyi ge gaali ku kutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bw'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: I nge niang miti pa lwak matye kamede, en oketo cwinye me yubu jami ma mite ikabedo ne. En oketo cwinye tutwalle I kom ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ipudesia luka itunga, abu ngesi koinak akekuan aitojokar aiboisio nuka atutubet. Apodokinit ngesi aitojokar adoketait na aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini lele tu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, eri owi i afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo erini 'ba ri e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ebyetaago by'abantu, akeehayo kutunguura ebyombeko by'ekyaro. Amaani ge gakaba gari aha kutunguura omutindo gw'emituurire y'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Having spent his childhood in a small town, he developed a deep connection with the community. This upbringing instilled in him a strong sense of empathy and a desire to help others.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yali abeera mu kabuga akatono ng'akyali muto, yakulaakulanya enkolagana ey'oku lusegere n'abantu b'omu kitundu. Engeri gye yakuzibwamu yamuyamba okuba omusaasizi n'okwagala okuyamba abalala.
ach_prompt: Pien en obedo I taun matidi I kare ma en pud tidi, en odongo wat macok ki lwak. Kit ma en odongo kwede okonye me bedo ki cwiny me kica ki miti me konyo jo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu ngesi kodau apolouke kotoma otaun lodidi, abu ngesi kodum arucokina naepol keda itunga luka atutubet. Apolou na abu koinak ngesi apuponoro keda eipud loka aingarakin luce.
lgg_prompt: Erini i vile mvaari ezazu tawuni werea ma alia 'bori ma e'yosi, eri e'do aa'ta onyiru ongulumu 'da ma alea. E'yo erini zozuri fe erini asi ndriza okporu azini ava 'ba azi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumara obuto bwe omu tawuni nkye, akatunga enkoragana nungi n'abantu b'omukyanga. Okukuzibwa oku kukamuhwera kugira esaasi n'ekyetengo ky'okuhwera abandi.

eng_prompt: With a successful career and a strong commitment to his loved ones, he embodies the values of responsibility and dedication. His friends often admire his ability to balance work and family life seamlessly.
lug_prompt: Ng'alina omulimu omulungi n'obumalirivu obw'amaanyi eri abaagalwa be, alaga empisa z'obuvunaanyizibwa n'okwewaayo. Mikwano gye gitera okwegomba obusobozi bwe obw'okukwataganya obulungi emirimu n'amaka.
ach_prompt: Ki ticce maber tutwal ki keto cwinye matek tutwal I kom dano ma en maro, en nyuto ber pa tic ki dyere. Lureme maro bedo ki miti i kom kit ma en timo kwede tic kacel ki kwo me paco labongo ayela mo keken.
teo_prompt: Keda aswam ke najokan keda ainakina ke mama ejaasi luminan ke, itodunit ngesi ajokis naka aswam keda ainakina. Etapit ikepapero aisiyalamikin ngesi kanu apedorit ngesi aimorikikin aswam keda aijar naka ekale.
lgg_prompt: Azi erini drile suzaru azini asi feza okporu 'ba erini leletu 'diyi dririsi, eri e'da e'yo orodriru azi ngaza ni azini asi feza ni 'diyi. Eri ma agyipi eyi sa'wa driasi ayiko esu e'yo erini ecozu azi ngazu tualu familia ma edri be geri kililiru si ri si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emirimo ye mirungi hamwe n'okwehayo kw'amaani ahabwa abakundwa be, nayoreka emigasho y'obujunanizibwa n'okwehayo. Banywani be buriijo nibamusiima ahabw'obushoboorozi bwe obw'okukoresa emirimo ye hamwe n'amaka gye.

eng_prompt: In light of recent concerns about response times and service efficiency, it is crucial for the district to evaluate the current operations of emergency medical services. Addressing these issues will help guarantee that the ambulances are utilized effectively and meet the needs of the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bikwata ku budde bw'okwanukula n'obukozi bw'obuweereza, kya mugaso nnyo eri disitulikiti okwekenneenya enkola y'obujjanjabi obw'amangu eriwo. Okukola ku nsonga zino kijja kuyamba okukakasa nti emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde zikozesebwa bulungi n'okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lworo ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom kare me tic ki diro me miyo kony me yot kom, pire tek tutwal ki district me ngiyo kit ma tic me miyo kony me yot kom tye kawot kwede kombedi. Cobo peko magi bikonyo me neno ni kitiyo ki ambulance maber dok ocobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyalongongo na pac kanuikamunitos apak naka abongokin keda eswamae loajokan, ejokuna noi edisitrikt airereor eswamae loka amukian naka engeso. Aitemokin akiro nu ingarakini awanyun ebe itwasamao amotokan nuadekis ejok ka aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi sawa 'bani e'yo 'yezu ri ma dria azini azi ngaza kililiru ri ma dria, eri orodriru distrikiti ni e'yo 'yeta azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyiniri ma ale andrizu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ni nga fe nezu ra kini 'ba ambulansi 'da eyi ayu kililiru dika eyi nga e'yo o'bi eyini le 'diyi 'ye ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira okwabaireho ebiro ebi ahabw'obwire bw'okugarukamu hamwe n'obuheereza burungi, n'eky'omugasho munonga disiturikiti kushwijuma emirimo y'eby'amarwariro ag'ahonaaho. Okukora aha nshonga ezi nikiija kuhwera okureeba ngu za ambyurensi zikozesibwa kurungi n'okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety and well-being of our students, it is crucial that we prioritize the hiring process for transportation staff. This means focusing on candidates who demonstrate strong moral principles and a commitment to ethical behavior.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abayizi baffe, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza enkola y'okupangisa abakozi b'entambula. Kino kitegeeza okussa essira ku beesimbyewo aboolesa empisa ennungi n'obumalirivu mu nneeyisa ennungi.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko kwo pa lutino kwan wa, pire tek tutwal ni omyero wakwong coyo lutic me wot. Man te lokke ni omyero waket cwiny wa i kom lucungu matye ki kit mabeco dok ma lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ayuara keda aijar naka esisiak wok, ejokuna noi aisingarenit aitolom eswamak lu elose. Apolouke ebe ibusakinit aibwaikin agogongu mama ejaasi abwoak luitodunitos iponesio luajokak keda iponesio luajokak.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini sukulu anzi amavile 'diyi ma ageitema azini aa'ta muke ri, eri orodriru amani e'yo 'bani azi'ba acipa ni 'diyi sizu ri 'duzu okporu. E'yo 'di ma efi kini le 'ba ma 'ba asi 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma dria e'yo adriza onyiru 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abeegi baitu baine oburinzi n'amagara marungi, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza omuringo gw'okupangisa abakozi b'eby'engyenda. Eki nikimanyisa okuta amaani aha beesimbireho abarikworeka emicwe n'emitwarize mirungi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in the misuse of emergency services. Many individuals are now calling for ambulances for non-emergency situations, often to facilitate their daily routines.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera mu kukozesa obubi obuweereza obw'amangu. Abantu bangi kati bayita emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde mu mbeera ezitali za mangu okusobola okukola emirimu gyabwe egya bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me nywaro tic ki kony me ot yat omede tutwal. Dano mapol kombedi tye ka lwongo ambulance pi peko ma pe tye atura, pol kare me konyo tic gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, eyatakinos noi aitolitol ejanakine lo engeso. Eutasi itunga luipu ailip amotokan nuadekis kanu atiokisio nu mam eraas nu engeso, kanu aitapatan aswamisinei kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ayuzu geri onzi si ri ma omgbo tu ra. Ba karakara eyi curu'do ambulansi eyi omve e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alea ku 'diyi ma alea, tutuni eyini ani eyi ma azi eyi 'yezu o'du driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'okukoresa kubi obuheereza oburikwetengwa. Abantu baingi obwahati nibashaba za ambyurensi omu mbeera ezitarikwetengwa, okukora emirimo yaabo eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: Despite their primary purpose of providing emergency medical services, the ambulances in the district have become a tool for illicit activities. Concerns have been raised about the misuse of these vehicles by local authorities.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga ekigendererwa kyazo ekikulu kwe kuwa obujjanjabi obw'amangu, emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde mu disitulikiti zifuuse bikozesebwa mu bikolwa ebimenya amateeka. Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku kukozesa obubi emmotoka zino abakulembeze b'ebyalo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ticgi madit tye me miyo kony me yot kom ma opoto atura, ambulance me district dong odoko yoo me timo jami ma turu cik. Lutela me tedero gubedo ki lworo I kom nywaro tic ki mutoka magi.
teo_prompt: Karaida erai alosikinet kec naepol noi naka aijanakin amukian na engeso, araas amotokan nuadekis lu iswamaete iboro lumam ekisil ecamakinit. Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu aitwasam amotokan nu erono kanejaas apedorosio nuka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Asisile yini okori tro ovuzu azakoma e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi fezu ra ti, ambulansi distrikiti 'da ma alea 'diyi eca curu'do afa ayuzaru 'yeta azita palaa ku 'diyi 'yezu. Asi otiza efu e'yo 'ba okpo e'ipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini mutukari 'diyi ayuzu geri onzi si ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ekigyendererwa kyazo ekikuru eky'okuheereza obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, za ambyurensi omu disiturikiti zihindukire ebikwato by'emirimo etari mu mateeka. Hariho okwerarikirira aha kukoresa kubi emotoka ezi ab'obushoborozi omu byaro.

eng_prompt: Recent audits have revealed significant discrepancies in the financial reports submitted by various departments. As a result, the district is grappling with serious concerns regarding the management of its budget.
lug_prompt: Okubalirirwa kw'ebitabo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwalaga obutakwatagana mu lipoota z'ebyensimbi ezaaweebwayo ebitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti erwanagana n'okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku nkozesa y'embalirira yaayo.
ach_prompt: Ngiyo kor tic ki lim ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I lok kom lim ma dul mapat-pat omiyo. Macalo adwogi ne, district tye ki peko madit tutwal I kom kit me tic ki byek me lim.
teo_prompt: Angicio naka ikapun kotoma apakio nu itodunitos amamut acamanar kotoma iripotan luka ikapun lu ijukunitos iripotan luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ejai edisitrikt aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos eyaitene loka ebajet ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo esele coza ni 'diyi o'duko siza robia ni enyati ndundu eyini fe 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti ni dri ci e'yo okporu eyi be e'yo otita aje robia niri ma tambazu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the safety and well-being of patients during transport is of utmost importance. Therefore, it is essential for drivers to prioritize caution and attentiveness on the road.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abalwadde mu ntambula kya mugaso nnyo. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abavuzi b'ebidduka okuba abeegendereza n'okussaayo omwoyo nga bali ku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa lutwo I kare me wot obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ki ludwo mutoka me gwokke ki keto cwinygi I kom ngo matye katimme I gudu.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong ayuara keda aijar najokan naka adekak kapak naka elose erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi iderepan aisingarenit acoikina kosodete apodokinit noi korot.

eng_prompt: To ensure timely responses and enhance patient care, a comprehensive tracking system has been implemented. This allows for real-time updates on the location and status of emergency vehicles.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti abalwadde bajjanjabibwa mu budde era n'okutumbula obujjanjabi bw'abalwadde, enkola enzijuvu ey'okulondoola abantu ekoleddwa. Kino kisobozesa okumanya ebipya ku kifo n'embeera y'emmotoka ez'amangu mu budde obutuufu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kimiyo kony ki lutwo ikare ki kome ki bene me ilo malo rwom me gwoko lutwo, ki keto yub me lubu kor lutwo I tic. Man weko inongo ngec manyen I kom kabedo ki kit ma mutoka ma miyo kony me atura tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eponio aingarakin adekak kotoma apak ka aitojokar amukian naka adekak, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuka aingic adekasinei. Ingarakini ngin aitijenar aiboisio keda ejautene loka amotokan nu engeso.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma aza kozu sa'wa dria azini e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do geri 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma pamvu onezu dria 'diyi 'yeta ma alia. Diri fe o'dukoti o'diru 'diyi esu sa'wa 'disi mutukari e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma pari azini wura ma dria.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyazuuliddwa, ttiimu yakizuula nti ebyazuuliddwa tebyali bituufu. Olw'okweraliikirira ebiyinza okuvaamu, baasalawo okwongera okunoonyereza.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwoki me kwed ma okwongo, dul ne oniang ni ngec ne pe obedo ber tutwal. Pi lworo I kom adwogi ne, gumoko tamgi me timo kwed mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nusodit, apotu etimu kojenutu ebe mam akiro ngun eraasi nukabeit. Apotu kesi kopodokisi nuikamunitos nuepedorete atakanun, apotu kesi koseutu aingic akiro nuipu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent feedback from the community, a meeting has been organized to discuss improvements in emergency response. Key personnel have gathered to ensure that ambulance drivers are equipped with the necessary tools and knowledge for optimal service delivery.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ndowooza abantu gye bafunye gye buvuddeko, olukiiko lutegekeddwa okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutereezaamu embeera ez'amangu. Abakozi abakulu bakungaanidde okukakasa nti abavuzi b'emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde baweebwa ebikozesebwa ebyetaagisa n'amagezi okusobola okuwa obuweereza obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tam ma aa ki bot lwak cokcok-ki, kiyubu kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit me medo rwom me miyo kony ikare me peko ma opoto atura. Lutic ma pigi tego gugure me neno ni ludwo ambulance gunongo jami tic ki ngec ma mite pi miyo kony maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aomisio nuka itunga, etemokinitai airiamun kanu aitemitem eipone lo ebeitor aitemokin atiokisio nu engeso. Apotu itunga luapolok kotukokinos kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi iderepan luka amotokan nuadekis keda iboro ka acoa kanu aijanakin ejok.

eng_prompt: As emergency response times continue to lag behind national standards, it has become increasingly clear that our healthcare system is in dire need of improvement. To address this critical issue, more funding should be directed to fueling ambulances.
lug_prompt: Ng'obudde bw'okukola ku mbeera ez'amangu bweyongera okubeera emabega w'omutindo gw'eggwanga, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebyobulamu byaffe byetaaga okulongoosebwa. Okusobola okukola ku kizibu kino ekikulu ennyo, ssente nnyingi zirina okuteekebwa mu mafuta ga mmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kare me miyo kony ikare me peko ma opoto atura tye ka medde anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni yub me yot komwa mito alokaloka madit tutwal. Me tyeko peko man, omyero kimed cente me wilo moo I ambulance.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos apakio nuka engeso ajaut kau naka adoketait naka akwapuwok, ecai cut ebe ekotosi ewai lo amukian wok aitojokar. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ibusakinit aipikakin ikapun luipu toma akinyet naka amotokan nuadekis.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of health crises, local authorities have prioritized the establishment of additional medical facilities. This initiative aims to ensure that communities have better access to urgent care services.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu ogweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakulembezza okuzimba amalwaliro amalala. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukakasa nti ebitundu bisobola okufuna obujjanjabi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki peko me yot kom, lutela me tedero guketo cwiny gi me yubu odi yadi mukene. Yub man tye ki miti me neno ni lwak tye ki gum me nongo kony me yot kom.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance regional connectivity and promote economic growth, the government has initiated several infrastructure projects. These initiatives aim to improve living standards and foster trade in remote areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkolagana mu bitundu n'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, gavumenti etandiseewo pulojekiti z'ebizimbe eziwerako. Enteekateeka zino zigendereddwamu okutumbula embeera z'obulamu n'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi mu byalo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me kubu kabedo mapatpat ki dongo lobo, gamente ocako yub mapat-pat me gedo. Yub magi tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano ki dongo biacara I caro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong arucokina naka aiboisio keda aitopolor apol naka ikapun, etolomu apugan ipurojektin luipu. Alosikinetekec erai aitojokar adoketait na aijar ka aitopolor agwelanar kotoma aiboisio nuka ocaloi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo yi ecipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, gamete e'do otita afa ndundu eyi sizu 'diyi karakara. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otuzu tualu tujari angu caloru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okukwatanisa omu byanga hamwe n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya, gavumenti etandikireho purogyekiti nyingi z'okwombeka. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okutunguura emituurire n'okushongyera eby'obushubuzi omu byaro.

eng_prompt: Local governments have implemented various initiatives to boost economic growth and infrastructure in the region. As a result, border districts have experienced significant changes and improvements.

ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero guketo yub mapat-pat itic me medo rwom me lim ki gedo i twok piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, districts matye I wang lobo gunongo alokaloka madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etolomu apuganisinei nu okwap iboro luegelegela kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun keda adukena kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, adumutu idisitriktan luko oikoru aijulanakineta nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo ndundu eyini ani zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'da ma alea. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti boda'a 'diyi esu ojata okporu azini otuta yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti z'ebyanga ziteire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi, okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'ebyombeko omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti eziri aha nsharo zitungire empindahinduka n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: To ensure adequate resources and support are allocated, it is essential to gather accurate data on the population of displaced individuals. This information will help local authorities address the needs of refugees effectively.

ach_prompt: Me neno ni kimiyo kony ki jami ma oromo, pire tek tutwal me coko ngec matir I kom wel dano ma oryemogi ki I gangi gi. Ngec man bikonyo lutela me tedero me cobo miti pa luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aanyun ebe ijaikitai iboro keda agangat naedolit, ejokuna aituk akiro nu abeit nuikamunitos enaaba loka itunga luekotosi aibwot. Ingarakini akiro nu apedorosio nuka atutubet aitemokin ipudesia luka ikerai ejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru azini atita kililiru ni esuzu, eri orodriru o'dukoti kililiru 'diyi trazu kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyiniri ma dria. O'duko 'diri nga azakoma fe drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini e'yo emunyale eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating crisis, the humanitarian organization mobilized teams to assess the situation. Their first step was to gather accurate data on the affected populations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obuzibu obweyongera, ekitongole ekiyamba abantu kyakunga ttiimu okwekenneenya embeera. Omutendera gwabwe ogwasooka gwali gwa kukungaanya biwandiiko ebituufu ku bantu abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, dul ma miyo kony ki dano gu jogo luticgi me neno ngo matye katimme. Yubgi me acel obedo me coko lok ada I kom dano ma onongo peko eni.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential for displaced individuals to find strength in community. By fostering connections among refugees in various districts, we can create a support network that enhances their resilience.

ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi dano ma orwenyo gangi gi me nongo kero ki bot lwak. I dongo kubbe ikin luring ayela I districts ma padi padi, watwero yubu yub me miyo kony ma weko gi cung matek.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, ejokuna noi itunga lu ekerete adumun agogongu kotoma atutubet. Kowai lo aitopolor arucokina kiding ikerai ko disitriktan luegelegela, ipedori oni aitolomun egangitok lu igangitos kesi.

eng_prompt: Governments and organizations around the world are recognizing the urgent need to address the challenges faced by displaced individuals. As a result, various initiatives and programs are being implemented to support their integration and well-being.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti n'ebitongole okwetooloola ensi yonna bikimanyi nti kyetaagisa nnyo okukola ku bizibu abantu ababundabunda bye basanga. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka n'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ziteekebwa mu nkola okuwagira okwegatta kwabwe n'obulungi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Gamente kacel ki dule mapat-pat I wilobo gitye ka niang ni mitte tutwal me tyeko peko ma luring ayela tye ka kato ki iye. Macalo adwogi ne, yub ki yub mapat-pat tye ka kati me konyo winye ki ber bedo gi.

lgg_prompt: Gamete eyi tualu amuti wudrikuru ma alea ndulu 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru 'ba angu kokoru 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye eyini ani otita eyi 'ye eyini ani aa'zu eyi ma eselea dika eyi ma aa muke.

N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka n'enteekateeka nyingi ziriyo nizitwarwa omu nkora okubahwera kwegaita hamwe n'okuba gye.
