teo_prompt: Aimorikikin itunga luka atutubet toma ainapeta nuka aitolomun aseununeta erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aanyun ebe ebwoikitai ipudesia kec keda iboro lu ekotosi kesi. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna aomoom akiro kec kapak kana aitolomun ikoruo luka idisitriktan.
lgg_prompt: O'bi angu ma alia 'diyi suzu e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alia ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba pa tu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria kililiru. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'bani e'yo yini 'diyi 'duzu e'yo boda distrikiti ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutwarira abantu b'omubyaro omu nkora y'okusharamu, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu ebyetengo byabo n'ebi barikwenda nibijwekyerwa kurungi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho okwetegyereza ebiteiso byabo baaba nibaronda ensharo za disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing demographic changes and regional development, local authorities have decided to gather comprehensive data. This initiative aims to better understand the needs and challenges faced by communities in these areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw'abantu egenda mu maaso n'enkulaakulana y'ebitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okukung'aanya obubaka obujjuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutegeera obulungi ebyetaago n'okusoomoozebwa ebitundu bye bisanga mu bitundu bino.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me aloka-loka me wel dano matye kawot anyim ki dongo lobo I but lobo mapat-pat, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me coko ngec matut. Yub man tye ki miti me niang maber miti ki peko ma lwak nongo ikabedo magi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aijulanakineta nuka itunga keda apol naka aiboisio, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubena aituk akiro kere. Alosikinet na erai amisiikin ejok ipudesia keda atiokisio nu ejaas itunga kaiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma kalafe ojazu tualu angu ezoma ni angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri pie, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi trazu dria. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu e'yo 'bani le azini e'yo ewaru ongulumu angu 'diyi ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi vazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'empindahinduka y'abantu n'entunguuka y'ebyanga, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bashaziremu kurundaana ebihandiiko byona. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera kwetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo n'oburemeezi obu abantu b'omumyanya egi barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: Tensions have escalated in recent months, leading to increased military presence along the frontier. As negotiations have failed, the situation has deteriorated rapidly.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu myezi egiyise, ekiviiriddeko amagye okweyongera ku nsalo. Olw'okuba enteeseganya ziremereddwa, embeera yeeyongedde okwonooneka.
ach_prompt: Lworo omede tutwal I dwe ma okato ni, ma oweko wel mony omede I wang lobo. Kit ma winye pe olare kwede, jami tye ka time marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eyatakinos aiyalongongo kotoma olapio lu atuboros, ido abu koyangau aiboisio nuipu noi nuka ajore koikoru. Kwape abu ipegeta ibiroros, abu ejautene omunar noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo fepi asikari eyini aa'zu boda milea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu. E'yo erita ako ni e'dezu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo eza i okposi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongyeire omu myezi ehingwireho, ekyareteire amahe kweyongyera aha nsharo. Ahabw'okugira ngu okuteesa kuremirwe, embeera eyeyongyeire kusiisikara.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have surfaced regarding the source of the ambulances used in the local healthcare system. Community leaders are questioning the origins of the vehicles, raising concerns about their funding and distribution.
lug_prompt: Amawulire agafulumye gyebuvuddeko gakwata ku nsibuko ya ambyulensi ezikozesebwa mu byobulamu by'omu kitundu. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu babuusabuusa ensibuko y'emmotoka, ekireetawo okweraliikirira ku nsimbi n'okugabibwa kwazo.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic mapat-pat okatti cokcok-ki I kom kama ambulance ma kitiyo kwedgi I tenge me yot-kom me tedero aa ki iye. Lutela me kabedo gitye ki akala-kala I kom kama mutoka ne oaa ki ie, ma okelo lworo I kom lim ki poko gi.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai iripotan luitetiak nuikamunitos ewai lo itwasamaere amotokan nuadekis. Eutasi engarenok lu atutubet abuonokin nu ageunet naka amotokan ngun, ayangaun aiyalongong kanu ikapun ka aikor.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi efu e'yo ambulansi 'bani ayu arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma esuta ma dria. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi zita eji e'yo mutukari 'da eyini engazu ri ma dria, e'yo asi otiza eji robia eyini esu ri ma dria tualu afa eyini awazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Hariho ripoota eziherize kurugaho, ezirikukwata aharurengo rwa za ambyurensi ezirikukoresibwa omu by'amagara. Abeebembezi b'ebyanga nibabangaanisa oburugo bw'ebiiruka, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira aha sente n'okubigaba.

eng_prompt: As the community gathered to discuss the recent influx of emergency vehicles, a sense of curiosity filled the air. Whispers of gratitude and surprise spread among the crowd when they learned the source of the generous gift.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ky'okuyingira kw'emmotoka ez'amangu gye buvuddeko awo, baayagala okumanya ebisingawo. Okuwuubaala okw'okusiima n'okwewuunya kwasaasaana mu bantu bwe baamanya ensibuko y'ekirabo eky'omutima omugabi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lwak gugure me nywako lok I kom motoka ma obino cokcok-ki, miti me ngeyo jami mapol obedo I cwinygi. Dano gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma guniang kama mic eni oa ki iye.
teo_prompt: Neautar itunga atukonokin kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos amotokan nu engeso, apotu itunga luka atutubet kopuputu eipuda. Apotu akiro nuka aisiyalamikin keda aumokin koswamata kanejaas itunga luapotu kojenutu aiboisit naelomunit ainakinet ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini okuzu e'yo nzezu mutukari azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma efizu o'diru ri ma dria, e'yo 'ba eyini lezu e'yo onizu ri ga angu 'da ma alea tre. E'yo awaza awa'difo ni azini osuta ni 'diyi ere eyi o'bi eyi ma eselea eyini e'yo esuzu afa feza 'da engazu ngmboru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bikwatiraine n'emotoka ezirikuhwera abarwaire, bakagira ekyetengo ky'okumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Okuhuhahurira okw'okusiima n'okutangaara kukahika omu bantu ku baamanyire oburugo bw'ekiconco ky'embabazi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent delivery reports, the logistics team confirmed that all necessary vehicles had arrived on schedule. In a follow-up meeting, the speaker acknowledged receipt of the ambulances.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza alipoota z'okutambuza ebintu ezaakaggwa, abakola ku by'okutambuza ebintu bakakasizza nti emmotoka zonna ezaali zeetaagibwa zaatuuse mu budde. Mu lukiiko olwaddako, omwogezi yakakasizza okufuna ambyulensi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwoki me tic ma otime cokcok-ki, joo ma tiyo ilok kom jami mapat-pat gumoko ni mutoka weng ma mite oo I cawa kikome. I kacoke me lubu kor tic, lalok madit omoko ni en onongo ambulances.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iripotan luka aitolomunun iboro, apotu itunga luitolosete iboro itigogongoto ebe adolutu amotokan kere kotoma apak. Kotoma airiamunet na etupakinit, abu eraban kitogogong ebe adumutu kesi amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti e'yo oji'ba 'diyi esu ra kini mutukari dria lele 'diyi eca sawa dria si. Dri fuza ma vutia, anzenzea ei ai ra kini eyi esu ambulansi 'da eyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha kuheereza, tiimu y'eby'entambura ekahamya ngu ebiiruka byona ebirikwetengwa bikahika omu bwire. Omu rukiiko orwakuratsireho, sipiika akahamya ngu akatunga za ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for emergency medical services, local organizations have launched a fundraising campaign. Community leaders emphasize the urgent need for additional resources to ensure timely medical assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'amangu, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bitandise kaweefube w'okusonda ssente. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakkaatiriza obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi obulala okukakasa obujjanjabi mu budde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom ma opoto atura, dul mapat-pat me tedero gucako yub me jogo cente. Lutela me kabedo giwaco ni mite ni omyero kimed kony me yot kom ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian na engeso, etegeasi iriongeta luka atutubet aituk ikapun. Apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitogogongoto eipud loka aiyatakin iboro kanu awanyun ebe ejai amukian kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otuta robia trazu ri 'bo. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo 'bani le mbeleru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria eyini ani azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu sa'wa dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, ebitongore by'omubyaro bitandikireho ehururu y'okushorooza esente. Abeebembezi b'ebyaro, nibaha amaani ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutunga obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara omu bwire.

eng_prompt: In response to the urgent need for medical assistance in the disaster-stricken area, she organized a fundraising campaign. With the generous contributions she received, she was able to purchase and donate some of the ambulances.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanukula obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi bw'obujjanjabi mu kitundu ekikoseddwa akatyabaga, yategeka kaweefube w'okusonda ssente. Olw'obugabi bw'obuyambi bwe yafuna, yasobola okugula n'okuwaayo ambyulensi ezimu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me miti me kony me yot kom I kabedo ma peko ma poto atura otimme iye, en oyubu yub me jogo cente. Ki kony ma en onongo, en owilo ki dok omiyo ambulances mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian kotoma aiboisio nuetiroritor atiokisio, abu ngesi kitemok aituk ikapun. Keda agangat na abu ngesi kodum, abu ngesi kopedo agwel ka aijaikin amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi angu e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu, eri otu e'yo robia trazu ri ra. Afa dria dria erini esu 'diyisi, eri je azini fe ambulansi 'diyi ma azi yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'amaani bw'obujanjabi omu myanya y'ebihikiirizi, akatebekanisa ehururu y'okushorooza esente. Ahabw'obuhwezi obu yaatungire, akabaasa kugura n'okugaba za ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: The school had been buzzing with excitement all week as students prepared for the important event. Finally, the day had arrived when everyone would gather to discuss the upcoming changes.
lug_prompt: Essomero libadde lijjudde essanyu wiiki yonna ng'abayizi beetegekera omukolo omukulu. N'ekisembayo, olunaku lwali lutuuse nga buli omu ajja kukungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkyukakyuka ezigenda okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Cwiny lutino obedo yom tutwal I gang kwan I cabit ma okato ni lutino tye ka yubbe pi yub ma pire tek. I agiki ne, nino oo ma dano weng gucokke me nywako lok I kom aloka-loka matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi esomero keda aiyalama osabiti kere najaar esisiak aitemonokin kanuka epucit loepol. Kawasia, adolu aparan na ebeit nginitunganan atukonokin kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta nuepote atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ebi aa ayiko si sabiti 'da ma alea ndulu sukulu anzi eyini otuta 'yezu omu okporu 'da ni. Asizu, o'du 'ba dria ni okuzu agbatara gbazu ojata emupi 'diyi ma dria ri eca 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero rikaba riri ery'okushemererwa esande yoona, abeegi barikweteekateekyera omukoro gw'omugasho. Aha muheru, eizooba rikaba ryahikire obu buri omwe yaabaire nayeteeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mpindahinduka ezabaire niziija kubaho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for emergency medical services has significantly increased. As a result, the introduction of new ambulances has greatly enhanced our ability to respond to health crises.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obw'amangu bweyongedde nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, okuleeta ambyulensi empya kyongedde nnyo obusobozi bwaffe obw'okukola ku bizibu by'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti pa dano me nongo kony me yot kom oyot-oyot omede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kelo ambulance manyen omedo kero wa me tic i kom peko me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi eipuda lo amukian na engeso. Kanuka ngun, aitolomunio naka amotokan nuadekis nuitetiak aitojokar noi apedorosiowok nuka aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, leta azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi ma dria ri tu ra. E'yo 'disi, ambulansi o'diru 'diyi ma e'dota otu okpo amani ecozu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, obwetago bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obw'ahonaaho bweyongyeire munonga. N'ekyarugiremu,okutandikaho za ambyurensi nsya, kitwongyeire amaani omu kukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation, she finally gathered enough evidence to reveal the truth. The public had a right to know what was happening behind the scenes.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi ng'anoonyereza, yasobola okukungaanya obujulizi obumala okulaga ekituufu. Abantu baalina eddembe okumanya ebyali bigenda mu maaso emabega w'empenda.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi dwe mapol, en ocoko caden ma oromo me tito lok ada. Lwak onongo gitye ki twero me ngeyo ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic, abu ngesi kodum aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aitodun abeit. Ejaas itunga keda apedor na ajenun nuiswamasi kau naka ainapeta.
lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza ma vutia, eri oku asizu afa ecetaru 'diyi e'dazu e'yo adari e'dazu ra. O'bi eyi ma drilemgbo ci nizu e'yo i 'yepi o'bi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza, ahamuheru akakunganya obujurizi oburikumara kworeka amazima. Abantu bakaba baine obugabe kumanya ebyabaire nibibaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing number of patients, the hospital administration held an emergency meeting. They quickly realized that additional resources were necessary to accommodate the growing demand for care.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera, abaddukanya eddwaliro baatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu. Baakiraba mangu nti ebikozesebwa ebirala byetaagibwa okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lutwo, ludito me ot yat gubedo ki kacoke madit tutwal. Guniang oyotoyot ni lim mukene mite me cobo miti me gwoko lutwo matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaba lo adekak, abu eyaitene lo adekis iriamunos katipet. Apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe ekotoi iboro luiyatakinitai kanu aitodolikin eipuda loka amukian.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyi ni tupi tutu risi, driceza arojo niri 'ye mitingi mbeleru ni. Eyi esu mbeleru kini le 'ba ma fe 'ba eyini afa ayuzaru dika eyini ani ecozu e'yo 'ba eyini lezu eyi ma tambazu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire, abarikukurira eirwariro bakakora orukiiko rw'amaani. Bakareeba bukiri kare ngu eby'obugaiga ebindi bikaba nibyetengwa, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'okureeberera abarwaire.

eng_prompt: In some regions, cultural practices and societal pressures contribute to the exploitation of young girls. As a result, many schoolgirls face horrific violations that occur with alarming regularity.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu ebimu, enkola z'obuwangwa n'okunyigirizibwa mu kitundu biviirako okutulugunyizibwa kw'abawala abato. N'ekivuddemu, abawala b'essomero bangi boolekaganye n'okutulugunyizibwa okw'entiisa okukolebwa buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mukene, tim me tekwaro kacel ki lyeto ma aa ki bot lwak aye kelo nywaro tic ki lutino anyira. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino anyira mapol nongo peko me butu tek tek ki lutino anyira ma time kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio ace, einakinitos inonosio keda ainapeta nuka itunga aitolitol apesur nudidika. Kanuka ngun, ejaas apesur nu esomero keda aibu aisiolo naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Angu azi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi azini okpo ongulumu eyini 'diyi fe ezoanzi nyiri eyini aa'zu candi ru. E'yo 'disi, ezoanzi sukulu lapi 'diyi ma karakara eyi e'yo 'bani eyi obizu okporu 'diyi esu sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka ebimwe, emicwe y'obuhangwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'abantu nibireetaho okukoresa kubi abaishiki bato. N'ekyarugiremu, abaishiki b'amashomero baingi nibatuntuzibwa omu muringo mubi munonga.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, the stigma surrounding premarital relationships can result in severe consequences for young women. When a girl is deemed to have lost her honor, families often resort to drastic measures to restore their reputation.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, okunyoomebwa okwetoolodde okwegatta nga tonnafumbirwa kusobola okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri abakyala abato. Omuwala bw'atwalibwa okuba ng'afiiriddwa ekitiibwa kye, ab'omu maka ge baddukira mu bikolwa eby'amaanyi okuzzaawo erinnya lye.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, lewic makwako butu imit ma peya inyome twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom mon matino. Kace kitamo ni anyakani orwenyo woro ne, lugang pa anyakani ipol kare gi tiyo ki yoo matek tutwal me dwoko nying anyakani.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, aibucaret na eidicane eringa edukokina epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok nejaas angor nudidika. Arai ewomitai ebe etwaniarit apese aibuses ke, etapit ikalia aswam kagogong kanu ainyakun ekirorike.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu eyi ma eselea de nga po'di eyi awini eyi 'du ku 'diyi eco adri e'yo onzi eyi ejipi oku oderu 'diyi ma dria ra. Ba ka e'yo 'du kini zamva azi avi inzita iniri ra, familia eyi e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye eyini ani inzita iniri ogozu ogogo.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa bingi, okushekyerera abakazi abarikuza omu bushwere batakashwire, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi by'amaani aha bakazi bato. Omwishiki ku arikutwarwa nk'otaine kitiinisa, ab'eka ye nibatandika kukoresa oburyo bw'amaani kugaruraho eiziina rye.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the safety and well-being of children is a fundamental responsibility of society. It is crucial to recognize the vulnerabilities that girl children face in order to advocate for their rights and protection.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bw'abaana buvunaanyizibwa bw'ekitundu. Kya mugaso nnyo okutegeera obunafu abaana abawala bwe basanga okusobola okulwanirira eddembe lyabwe n'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Neno ni lutino tye maber obedo tic pa lwak. Pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma lutino anyira nongo wek walweny pi twero gi ki gwokgi.
teo_prompt: Aiyangaun ayuara ka aijar najokan naka idwe erai aswam naepol noi naka itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas idwe lu apesur kanu aigang apedorosio kec.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri eyi ma tambazu azini aa'zu muke ri eri azi okporu ongulumu eyini ni i. Eri orodriru e'yo 'bazu e'yo ewaru ezoanzi eyini esu 'diyi ma dria eyini ani a'di 'dizu drilemgbo eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abaana nibatereera, n'obujunaanizibwa bw'abantu. N'eky'omugasho kumanya oburemeezi obu abaana b'abaishiki barikurabamu kwenda kurwanirira obugabe bwabo n'oburinzi.

eng_prompt: It is essential for society to protect its most vulnerable members. Holding perpetrators accountable for their actions is a crucial step in achieving justice.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso eri ekitundu okukuuma abantu baakyo abateesobola. Okuvunaana abazzi b'emisango olw'ebikolwa byabwe ddaala lya mugaso mu kutuukiriza obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lwak me gwoko lucan. Coyo lutim bal pi timgi obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me nongo ngol matir.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga ayuarite itunga lu ican. Aitepesen itunga lu iswamaete nuarokok kanu aswamisiokec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu adumun etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru ongulumu eyini 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu. ꞋBani ꞌba eꞌyo onzi ꞌyeꞌba ꞌdiyi ombezu eꞌyo yini ꞌye ꞌdiyi ma dria ri eri eꞌyo okporu ꞌbani ecozu eꞌyo liza kililiruri esuzu.

nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe, n'eky'omugasho kumanya n'okuheereza ekitiinisa eby'obuhangwa n'emitwarize etarikushushana erikubumba ebyanga byaitu. Kuturikutwara eby'obuhangwa nk'eby'omugasho, nitureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okusiima omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: After years of development and infrastructure improvements, the local government submitted a proposal to elevate the status of the town. The decision was met with excitement and anticipation from the residents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'enkulaakulana n'okulongoosa ebizimbe, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaawaayo ekiteeso ky'okutumbula embeera y'ekibuga. Ekyasalibwawo kyasisinkanye essanyu n'okusuubira okuva mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me dongo lobo ki yubu jami mapat-pat, gamente me tedero omiyo tam me ilo rwom me boma ne malo. Lutedero gubedo ki yom cwiny madit tutwal I kom moko tam ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitopol keda aitojokar aiboisio, abu apugan naka atutubet ijaik aomisioit naka aikeun adoketait naka etaun. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kiswamata keda aiyalama naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli angu ezoma ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe egata eyini lezu tawuni 'da ma omgbo otuzu. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fu dri e'yo 'duza 'da si ayikosi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'entunguuka n'okutunguura ebyombeko, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekataho ekiteiso ky'okwongyera aha rurengo rw'orurembo. Encwamu ekashangwa n'okushemererwa n'okushemererwa kuruga omu batuura gye.

eng_prompt: After a competitive election season filled with passionate debates and community engagement, the residents of Arua city eagerly awaited the results. The announcement finally came, signaling a significant change in the local governance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akalulu akaabaddemu okuvuganya okw'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, abatuuze b'omu kibuga kya Arua baali beesunga nnyo ebyava mu kulonda. Ekirango kyaddaaki kyajja, nga kiraga enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I ngee pyem I kare me bolo kwir ma opong ki laro lok ki miti madit tutwal I kin lwak, lutedero me Arua gubedo kakuru adwogi yer ki miti madit tutwal. Lok angea ne dong otum, ma onyuto alokaloka madit tutwal I tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolobol naka aseo naejaasi keda ipegeta luipu keda aimorikikina naka itunga, apotu itunga luka eibuga loka Arua idarakisi akiro nuelomunete. Abu alimoret ngin kodolu, itodunit aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma apugan naka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa ni baka seza ni 'diyi ma vutia agbatara okporu azini e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi pie, 'ba aa'pi angu Arua niri ma alea 'diyi te o'duko agata ni 'diyi avasi. E'yo azi eceza 'da emu asizu e'yo ojata okporu ni e'dapi e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akaruuru k'okuhayahayana karimu okuhanuura kw'amaani n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, abatuuragye b'omururembo rwa Arua bakategyereza ebyarugire omu buruuru. Ekirango kikahwaho kikareetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu bwebembezi bw'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: Understanding our roots and the experiences that shaped us is essential for fostering a sense of identity. By exploring the past, we can appreciate the diverse influences that contribute to our present.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ensibuko zaffe n'ebyo bye twayitamu ebitubumba kikulu nnyo mu kukuza enneewulira y'endagamuntu. Mu kunoonyereza ebyayita, tusobola okusiima ebintu eby'enjawulo ebiviiriddeko ebiriwo kati.
ach_prompt: Niang kama aa ki iye ki jami ma wakato ki iye pire tek tutwal pi dongo kit ma wanen kwede. Ka watamo I kom jami ma otime I kare mukato angec, watwero bedo ki pwoc I kom jami mapat-pat ma okelo kwo wa I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Amisikin alibunetekosi keda akiro nuapotu kiswamautu oni ejok kanu aitopolor ajenanut wok. Kowai lo aanyanar akiro nukolo, ipedori oni ajenun iboro luegelegela luepedorete aitodolikin akiro nuiswamasi kwape kwana.
lgg_prompt: Angu amani engazu 'diyi vazu tualu e'yo amani ebipi ama edepi 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru e'yo 'bani ama 'bazu 'ba azi 'diyi ru ri ezozu. E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma ale andrita si, ama eco e'yo ndundu ama vile ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburugo bwaitu hamwe n'ebyaturebeireho ebirikutubumba n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho okwetegyereza kwaitu. Twayetegyereza eby'enyima, nitubaasa kusiima ebintu bingi ebirikutureetera kubaho hati.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, human societies have developed unique ways of life shaped by their environments and experiences. As a result, the diversity of cultural practices among various groups is vast and fascinating.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu bakulaakulanyizza engeri z'obulamu ez'enjawulo nga basinziira ku mbeera zaabwe n'ebyo byebayitamu. N'ekivuddemu, enkola z'obuwangwa ez'enjawulo mu bibiina eby'enjawulo nnene ate nga zisikiriza.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, kabedo pa dano guyubu kit me kwo mapat-pat malubbe ki kabedo gi ki jami ma guwok ki iye. Macalo adwogi ne, tekwaro mapat-pat matye ikin dul mapat-pat tye mapol dok mit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etolomutu itunga iponesio luka aijar luitegelikina luitemokinitai kotoma aiboisio kec keda akirokec. Kanuka ngun, iponesio luegelegela luka inonosio luka igurupun luegelegela epol noi ido isiyalamikit noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'ba ada eyini 'diyi ezo geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi ndu ndu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi vu tualu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, e'yo suruni 'diyi ma esele coza ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri angiri azini ndrizaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu batungire emize y'omutaano y'okutuura omu myanya yaabo hamwe n'ebibarikurabamu. N'ekyarugiremu, emicwe y'eby'obuhangwa etarikushushana omu guruupu ezitari zimwe n'emwe n'ey'omutaano munonga.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various tribes have interacted and exchanged ideas, leading to the sharing of beliefs and practices. As a result, certain cultural elements have emerged that are recognized across multiple groups.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, amawanga ag'enjawulo gakwataganye n'okuwanyisiganya ebirowoozo, ekiviiriddeko okugabana enzikiriza n'enkola. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu by'obuwangwa ebimu bivuddeyo ebimanyiddwa mu bibiina eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, kaki mapat-pat gubedo ka lok kacel dok gunywako tamgi, ma oweko gupoko niyee ki timgi. Macalo adwogi ne, jami tekwaro mukene okatti ma dano mapol ongeyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, inerasi atekerin nuegelegela kosodete aimor aomisio, ayangaun aimor aiyuunikec keda iponesiokec. Kanuka ngun, eponitos iponesio ice luka einono luejenara kotoma ogurupun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, suru ndundu eyi e'yo nze eyi ma eselea azini eyi awa eyi ma egata eyi pie eyini ani e'yo eyi ma a'ita eyi awazu tualu 'yeta eyi pie. E'yo 'disi, e'yo suruni azi 'diyi efu amve 'bani ega ongulumu karakara yi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, amahanga agatari gamwe gakwataniise kandi gahaana ebiteekateeko, ekyarugiremu okugabana enyikiriza n'emitwarize. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obuhangwa ebimwe birugireho ebirikumanywa omu guruupu nyingi.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, the transfer of wealth and assets from one generation to the next is a common practice. This often leads to the expectation that family members will receive what their parents have accumulated over their lifetime.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, okukyusa obugagga n'ebintu okuva ku mulembe ogumu okudda ku mulala kikolwa kya bulijjo. Kino kitera okuleetawo okusuubira nti abantu b'omu maka bajja kufuna ebyo bazadde baabwe bye bakung'aanyizza mu bulamu bwabwe bwonna.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, kobo lonyo ki jami kibot yalwak acel me cito bot yalwak mukene obedo tim ma dano mapol timo. Man ipol kare kelo gen ni jo me ot binongo jami ma lunyodogi guyubu ikare me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, aijulakin abar keda iboro anyoun kotoma ateker adiope kitoni naetupakini erai ibore yenetapit. Eyangauni ngin aomisioit ebe epote itunga luka ekale adumun iboro luedumunitos auriakakec kotoma aijarakec kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni karakara eyi ma alea, lonyi eyi ma ti ojazu engazu ewu alu ma alea cazu ewu drusiri ma alea ri eri 'yeta azi 'bani 'ye sa'wa driasi ni i. Diri tuni fe egata kini 'ba familia ma alia 'diyi nga afa yi ma tipika yini tra idri yini ma alia 'diyi isu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bwingi, okuhindura obugaiga n'ebintu kuruga omu murembe gumwe kuza omu ogundi, n'ekikorwa kya buriijo. Eki nikireetaho amatsiko ngu abantu b'omuka nibaija kutunga eki abazaire baabo batungire omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of conflict and turmoil, the community has finally found a sense of stability and harmony. Residents often express their gratitude for the tranquility that now defines their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'obukuubagano n'obutabanguko, ekitundu kyasembyeyo okufuna emirembe n'obumu. Abatuuze batera okulaga okusiima kwabwe olw'obutebenkevu kati obulambika obulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki lweny, lwak dong gunongo kuc ki ber bedo. Lutedero ipol kare ginyuto pwocgi pi kuc matye I kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ingungeta keda amumu, adumu kwana itunga ainapakina keda aimorikikina. Etapit duc itunga aisiyalamikin kanu ainapakina naka aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu 'di isu asizu asi anzuru azini aa'ta tualuri ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi awa'difo e'da asianzu eyini aa'zu eyi ma edri o'du driasi ri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko, abantu batungire obusingye n'obumwe. Abatuuragye nibakira kworeka okusiima kwabo ahabw'obutebekana obwahati oburikworeka entuura yaabo eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: Emergency services received multiple calls reporting flames and smoke rising from the downtown area. Witnesses described a chaotic scene as people rushed to evacuate nearby buildings.
lug_prompt: Abakola ku by'amangu baafuna amasimu agawerako nga galaga omuliro n'omukka okuva mu kibuga wakati. Abaabaddewo baayogedde ku kavuyo akaaliwo ng'abantu bafubutuka okuva mu bizimbe ebiriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Dul ma miyo kony pi peko ma opoto atura gunongo cim mapol ma waco ni mac ki mato taa tye ka aa ki I dye boma madit. Lucaden guwaco ni kuku kuku obedo tye ikare ma dano tye ka ngweco ki I odi matye cok.
teo_prompt: Apotu aiboisio nu engeso kodumutu isimun luipu lu elimonorete akim naka akim keda ekwam kotoma atutubet. Apotu ajenak kitetemoto amumu naarai apotu itunga kikerata anyoun kotoma adukena nueyapiete.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi esu simu eyi karakara eyi e'yo aci ni azini acika ni 'diyi ma dria engazu aku ambo tawuni niri ma alea risi. Sadini eyi ece e'yo ngiringiri ni 'ba eyini arizu jo eyi ma agei 'diyi ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikuhwera abatarikwebaasa, bikatunga esimu nyingi ezirikugamba aha muriro n'omwika kuruga omu tawuni eya rwagati. Abajurizi bakashoborora akavuyo ahabwokuba abantu bakahunga omu byombeko ebiri haihi.

eng_prompt: Witnesses reported seeing flames erupting from the building late last night. Emergency services quickly arrived on the scene to contain the blaze.
lug_prompt: Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baalabye omuliro ogwakutte ekizimbe ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero. Abakola ku by'amangu baatuuka mangu mu kifo omuliro we gwakutte okukkakkanya omuliro.
ach_prompt: Lucaden guwaco ni guneno mac ma lyel ki I ot ne laworo I dyewor. Lutic me nongo kony oyot oyot gu oo I kabedo ne me lweny I kom mac ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu akim kogeutu aibiror kotogo akware nabian. Apotu lu engeso kodolokisi atipet aiboisit kanu aitikitik akim.
lgg_prompt: Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi ndre aci ni efu jo 'da ma alea ini ajerisi. Ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi eca angu 'da ma alea mbeleru aci 'da ma okpo ndezu.
nyn_prompt: Abajurizi bagambire ngu bareebire omuriro gurikuruga omu kyombeko ekiro kya nyomwebazyo. Ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahonaaho kuhika aha mwanya okuzibira omuriro.

eng_prompt: Despite the intense flames and thick smoke that engulfed the structure, emergency responders worked tirelessly to evacuate everyone inside. Miraculously, all occupants managed to escape just in time.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omuliro gwali mungi n'omukka omungi ogwali gukutte ekizimbe, abakola ku by'amangu baakola butaweera okusengula abantu bonna abaali munda. Mu ngeri ey'ekyamagero, bonna abaalimu baasobola okutoloka mu budde.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed mac obedo ka lyel matek tutwal ki ito ma omako gedo ne, lutic me gwoko kuc otiyo matek tutwal me kwanyo dano weng matye ie. I yoo me tango, dano weng ma obedo I motoka ne gulwi I cawa kikome.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajai akim naepol noi keda ekwam loapol noi loabu kodum aduketait ngin, apotu lu engeso iswamata kagogong kanu aitobwot itunga kere luejaasi toma. Koipone kalo ejok, apotu itunga kere luejaasi toma opotu kosiata kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci ni okporu tu 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba e'yo mbeleru 'diyi nga azi ande kokoru 'ba dria alia 'diyi ofuzu. A'daru, 'ba dria ovupi alenia 'diyi apa sa'wa dria ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho omuriro gw'amaani hamwe n'omwika gw'amaani ogwabaire nigwetorora ekyombeko, ab'eby'omutaano bakakora n'amaani okwihaho buri omwe owabaire ari omunda. Omu muringo gw'eky'okutangaaza, boona abaabaire bari omuri yo, bakabaasa kutoroka omu bwire.

eng_prompt: As the flames engulfed the structure, panic spread among the attendees. With smoke filling the air, they quickly realized they had to escape before it was too late.
lug_prompt: Omuliro bwe gwakutte ekizimbe, abantu bonna abaaliwo baatya nnyo. Nga omukka gujjula empewo, baakiraba mangu nti balina okutoloka nga bukyali.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac omako ot ne, lworo omako dano ma gubedo tye. I kare ma yamo opong ki mac, gunongo ni omyero guring mapud kare pe okato.
teo_prompt: Nealomunia akim aduketait ngin, apotu itunga lukatutubet kokuriaka. Keda akinyet naeleleba kokwam, apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe ibusakinit kesi akerit erongo apak.
lgg_prompt: Aci 'da ni jo 'da ma alea risi, ori ere 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma eselea. Acika ni oli ma alea ri si, eyi esu mbeleru kini eyi ma apa de nga po'di sa'wa ecani ku.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro ku gwatandikire kuturira ekyombeko, obwimukiriro bukajanjaara omu bantu abaabaire bariho. Ahabw'okwijuza omwika omu mwanya, bakareeba ngu bashemereire kutoroka bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple emergency calls about a large blaze in the abandoned warehouse, the firefighters quickly arrived on the scene. Despite their efforts, the flames spread rapidly, prompting the police to intervene and help control the situation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna amasimu ag'amangu agawerako ku muliro mu sitoowa eyasuulibwa, abazinya mwoto baatuuka mangu mu kifo. Newankubadde baakola kaweefube, omuliro gwasaasaana mangu, ekyaletera poliisi okuyingirawo n'okuyamba okukkakkanya embeera.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo lwongo mapol pi peko me mac madit tutwal I ot gwoko jami ma kiweko woko, lunek mac guo oyot-oyot I kabedo ne. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek, mac ne onya oyot-oyot tutwal, ma oweko abili odonyo I tic me gengo peko ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun isimun luipu luepedorete aikwenyar akimian nuikamunitos akim naepol noi kotogoi loaponi kojalakinai, apotu itunga luitomonyi akonye kodolokisi aiboisit. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogong, abu akim isiarakin atipet, ido abu koinak ipolisin aingarakin aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia aci amboru pari afa ta mbazuri ma alia ri ma dria, 'ba aci anyupi 'diyi eca angu 'da ma alea mbeleru. Okpo yini 'diyi ma talasi, aci nderi ere i mbeleru, erini ani fezu polisi yini fizu azini azakoma fezu e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga esimu nyingi z'akabi ahabw'omuriro gw'amaani omu sitoowa, abarikurwanisa omuriro bakarahuka kuhika aha mwanya. Oihireho amaani gaabo, omuriro gukajanjaara ahonaaho, ekyareteire poriisi kutaahamu n'okuzibira embeera.

eng_prompt: As the flames roared higher, panic spread among the crowd gathered nearby. Firefighters rushed to the scene, but the blaze was relentless, consuming everything in its path.
lug_prompt: Nga ennimi z'omuliro zigenda ziwuuma waggulu, obunkenke bwabuna mu bantu abaali bakungaanidde okumpi awo. Abazinya mwoto baddukidde mu kifo, naye omuliro gwali tegukoma, nga gwokya buli kimu mu kkubo lyagwo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac tye ka lyel malo, lworo omako dano ma gugure cok. Lunek mac gudok oyotoyot I kabedo ne, ento mac ne obedo ka mako jami weng ma obedo I yo ne.
teo_prompt: Neapolor akim noi, apotu itunga lu atukokinos kokuriaka. Apotu etudengak akim kokerata aiboisit, konye mam akim abu kowolio, konyamete iboro kere luejaasi orot ke.
lgg_prompt: Aci ma aci ni ecaria uru, ori ere 'ba trapi yi ma ageia 'diyi ma eselea. Ba aci anyupi 'diyi ari pari 'da ma alea mbeleru, te aci nderi ri asi driasi, afa dria eri ma geri alia 'diyi nya'i.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro ku gwagumire nigureenga ahaiguru, abantu boona abaabaire bateeranire haihi bakatandika kutiina. Abacwekyeri b'omuriro bakahunga aha mwanya, kwonka omuriro gukaba gutarikuhwaho, gukacwekyereza buri kimwe ekyabaire kiri omu muhanda gwagwo.

eng_prompt: A fierce fire broke out in the early hours of the morning, engulfing the entire structure in flames. Despite the firefighters' efforts, the blaze spread rapidly, leaving nothing but ashes in its wake.
lug_prompt: Omuliro ogw'amaanyi gwabalukawo mu matumbi budde, ne gukwata ekizimbe kyonna mu muliro. Wadde nga abazinya mwoto baakola kyonna ekisoboka, omuliro gwasaasaana mangu ne gulekawo evvu lyokka.
ach_prompt: Mac ma ocwe matek tutwal okatti I cawa me odiko ma owango ot weng. Kadi bed ni lugwok mac gutiyo matek, mac ne onya oyot tutwal ma oweko buru keken I ngeye.
teo_prompt: Abu akim naepol noi kogeu atupuruc, ido abu akim onyam aduketait kere. Karaida iswamata itunga lu akim, abu akim isiarakin atipet, ido abu kojalak abenyak bon.
lgg_prompt: Aci okporu ni e'do sa'wa drioru o'bitisi, afa jo 'da ma alea 'diyi dria ve. E'yo 'ba aci anyupi 'diyi ni okpo 'bazu ra ti aci nderi ere i mbeleru erini ani afa azi kuzu drinia ku.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro gw'amaani gukakurukaho omu shaaha z'akasheeshe, gwashwekyerera ekyombeko kyona omu muriro. Oihireho amaani g'abacwekyeri b'omuriro, omuriro gukajanjaara ahonaaho, gutsigaho omucuucu gwonka.

eng_prompt: Despite the firefighters' best efforts to contain the blaze, the flames spread rapidly through the structure. Panic ensued as residents evacuated, but it quickly became clear that the situation was dire.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abazinya mwoto baakola kyonna ekisoboka okukkakkanya omuliro, omuliro gwasaasaana mangu mu kizimbe kyonna. Obunkenke bwabalukawo ng'abatuuze badduka, naye kyalabika mangu nti embeera yali mbi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lugwok mac gutemo matek me neko mac, mac ne onya oyot-oyot tutwal I ot ne. Lworo obedo tye ikare ma lutedero guweko kabedo gi, ento oyot-oyot nen atyer kamaleng ni peko ne obedo rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu itunga lu etwakiete akim iswamata kagogongu aitikitik akim, abu akim isiarakin katipet kotoma aduketait. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kokerata, konye apotu kojenutu atipet ebe erono noi ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Ba aci eyi o'dipi 'diyi ni tro okpo 'bazu aci nde ma aza kozu ra ti aci nde ere i jo 'da ma alea dria mbeleru. E'yo ewaru efu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni angu 'da ma alea risi te e'da mbeleru kini e'yo nde onzi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu abarikurwanisa omuriro barikuteeraho kurwanisa omuriro, omuriro gukajanjaara munonga omu byombeko. Hakabaho okwerarikirira ahabw'abatuuragye kuruga omu maka gaabo, kwonka kikarebeka butunu ngu embeera ekaba eri kubi munonga.

eng_prompt: After the loud explosion rocked the area, emergency responders rushed to the scene. Fortunately, the people who were in the building were not injured.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okubwatuka okw'amaanyi okukankanya ekitundu, ab'amangu baddukidde mu kifo. Ekirungi abantu abaali mu kizimbe tebaakosebwa.
ach_prompt: Inge mwoc madit ma opoto I kabedo ne, joo ma miyo kony oyot oyot gucito I kabedo ne. Ki gum maber, dano ma onongo gitye I ot ne pe gunongo awano.
