lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, abasawo baakizuula nti tewaaliwo bulabe bwa kukwatibwa bulwadde. N'ekyavaamu, abo abaakwatagana n'abalwadde baalekebwa okugenda.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, lutic yoto kom gumoko ni peko me two pe tye. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma gubedo cok ki lutwo ni kiweko gioo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu imurok kodumutu ebe emamei bobo ationis naka adeka. Kanuka ngun, aponi kojalakinai lu ikamanara keda adekak alosit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, amuti dakitari eyini 'diyi esu ra kini e'yo azo esuzuri ma e'yo yo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba eyi ecipi 'ba azoru 'diyi pie 'diyi ku muzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, tiimu y'abashaho ekashanga ngu tihaine akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukorengana n'abarwaire, bakarekyebwa kugyenda.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to impact communities worldwide, healthcare professionals and researchers are mobilizing their efforts. Many individuals are dedicating their time and resources to develop effective treatments and vaccines.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa ebitundu okwetooloola ensi yonna, abakugu mu byobulamu n'abanoonyereza bakunga amaanyi gaabwe. Abantu bangi bawaayo ebiseera byabwe n'eby'obugagga byabwe okuzuula obujjanjabi obulungi n'eddagala erigema.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano I wilobo lung, ludiro me yot kom kacel ki lukwed tye ka rayo kero gi. Dano mapol tye ka tic ki cawa gi ki cente gi me yubu yat agwera ki yat me cango two.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aitolitol itunga kotoma akwap kere, eutasi ipirioitin luka angaleu keda angicak aimorikikin agogongukec. Itunga luipu ijanakinete apak kec keda iborokec kanu adumun amukian na ejok ka ikee luikisere ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ongulumu yi bi wudrikurusi dria, 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi tualu 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi pie okpo yini 'diyi tra. Ba karakara eyi sa'wa azini lonyi eyini 'diyi 'ba aro feza kililiru azini aro atrizuri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa abantu omunsi yoona, abakugu omu by'amagara hamwe n'abakyondoozi bariyo nibarundaana amaani gaabo. Abantu baingi nibaheereza obwire bwabo n'ebintu byabo okutandikaho emibazi n'okugyema kurungi.

eng_prompt: The pandemic has disrupted supply chains and limited access to essential resources. As a result, communities are facing unprecedented challenges in securing basic necessities.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bbunansi kitaataaganyizza enkola y'okutambuza ebintu n'okukendeeza ku kufuna ebintu ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu bisanga okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo mu kufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Poto pa gemo eni obalo yoo me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal I nongo jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Abu adeka itolitol ewai lo akorio ka aitidisiar adumun iboro lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuikamunitos adumun iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Azo efupi wakakaru ꞌdi eza geri ꞌbani afa ꞌbani lele ꞌdiyi awazu ꞌdiyi azini geri ꞌbani afa orodriru ꞌdiyi esuzu ꞌdiyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esu eyini ani ecozu afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ekirwaire ky'omuze kiteganiise emiringo y'okugaba ebintu n'okutunga ebintu ebirikwetengwa munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga ebyetengo by'abantu.

eng_prompt: After weeks of struggling to make ends meet, we finally reached out for help. To our surprise, a local organization stepped in to assist us.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tufuba okweyimirizaawo, twasobola okufuna obuyambi. Ekyatwewuunyisizza, ekitongole ky'omu kitundu kyayingirawo okutuyamba.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwowa, I agiki ne wapenyo pi kony. Watye ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma dul mo me tedero obino ka miyo kony botwa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitelekaar aijar, apotu sio adolokisi aingarakinio. Kanu aumok iso, abu erionget loka atutubet kolom aingarakin sio.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia a'di 'dizu afa dria 'diyi esuzu, ama esu asizu azakoma ra. Ama dri osutasi, amuti azi angu 'da ma alea ni fi ama aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi turikuteganisibwa okureeberera ebyetaago byaitu, tukaheza twabona obuhwezi. Ekyatutangaaza, ekitongore ky'omukyanga kikaija kutuyamba.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the devastating natural disaster, many communities were left struggling to meet their basic needs. Despite efforts to coordinate aid, logistical challenges hindered the distribution of essential supplies.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'akatyabaga k'obutonde, ebitundu bingi byalekebwa nga birwana okulaba nga bituukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu. Ng'oggyeko kaweefube w'okukwasaganya obuyambi, ebisoomooza mu ntambula byataataaganya okubunyisa ebintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma peko ma poto atura obalo jami mapol, kabedo mapol odong ki peko me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Kadi bed ni ki keto tek me neno ni jami ma mite me konyo dano obedo tye, peko ma obedo tye oweko poko jami ma mite pi dano obedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atiokisio nu akwap, aponi kojalakinai itunga luipu ainingosit adumun iboro lu ipudasi kesi. Karaida iswamao agogongu kanu arucokinit agangat, abu ainingosia kotoma aikor iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba ku ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. Okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo azakoma ni 'diyi otuzu ra ti, e'yo ewaru e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi atri e'yo afa orodriru 'diyi awazu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa, abantu baingi bakasigara nibarwana kumaraho ebyetengo byabo. N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okureeberera obuhwezi, oburemeezi omu by'entambura bukaremesa okugaba ebintu ebikuru.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances and logistical challenges, the government announced a change in the electoral schedule. As a result, the elections were delayed.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa n'okusoomoozebwa mu ntambula, gavumenti yalangiridde enkyukakyuka mu nteekateeka y'okulonda. N'ekyavaamu, okulonda kwalwawo.
ach_prompt: Pi jami ma otimme atura ki peko me tic, gamente owaco ni myero kilok yub me yer. Macalo adwogi ne, yer ne ogalle.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai keda atiokisio, abu apugan kolimo aijulanakineta kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiyapai aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ega kokoru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete azi ojata sa'wa opetaa ni ri ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, opeta eyi ma sa'wa eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etarikuteekateekwaho hamwe n'oburemeezi, gavumenti ekarangirira empindahinduka omu ntebeekanisa y'eby'oburuuru. Ekyarugiremu,oburuuru bukakyerererwa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of isolation and uncertainty, many individuals battling the virus are feeling the weight of their prolonged hospital stays. The emotional and physical toll of their illness is becoming increasingly difficult to bear.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga beeyawula n'obutali bukakafu, abantu bangi abalwanyisa akawuka bawulira obuzito bw'okumala ebbanga eddene mu ddwaliro. Obulumi bw'ebirowoozo n'obw'omubiri olw'obulwadde bwabwe bweyongera okuba obuzibu okugumira.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me bedo kengi ki peko, dano mapol matye ka lweny i kom kwidi tye ka winyo peko me bedo I ot yat pi kare malac. Adwogi marac ma two eni okelo i kom dano tye ka doko tek tutwal me cirone.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka atiakar keda amamus aijen, itunga luipu lu ejie keda ekorona epupete ationis naka aiboi adekis adaun apak naepol noi. Ationis na aomisio keda akuan naka adekakec erai na etiono aitingikin.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia 'bani eyi ma esele cozu azini aa'zu e'yo kokoru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba karakara a'di 'dipi azo korona niri be 'diyi e'yo eyini aa'zu arojoa sa'wa ezu ri ma e'yosi. E'yo eyi ma rua azini egata eyini esu azo 'da ma e'yosi 'diyi eca curu'do kongolokoru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okwetoroora hamwe n'obutahamya, abantu baingi abarikurwanisa akakooko bariyo nibahurira oburemeezi bw'okumara obwire buraingwa omu irwariro. Omuhendo gw'ebiteekateeko hamwe n'omubiri gw'oburwaire bwabo niguguma niguguma niguguma nigugumira.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of the electoral process is crucial for ensuring fair representation. To uphold this principle, a dedicated body oversees the administration of elections.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwesimbu bw'enkola y'okulonda bukulu nnyo mu kukakasa okukiikirira okw'obwenkanya. Okukuuma omusingi guno, akakiiko akakola ku by'okulonda kalondoola enkola y'okulonda.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni lucungu iwi bye tye maber. Me gwoko cik man, dul ma ki keto me doro kit ma yer tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo, ejokuna noi ainapeta nuka aseo kanu awanyun ebe ebwoikitai itunga koipone kaloejok. Kanu aitogogong ainapeta nu, ejai atukot naeyait nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri eri orodriru 'bani 'ba eyi ma paria kililiru ri nezu. Lezu e'yo 'di ma ta mbazu, amuti azi ngapi e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma driceza ma pamvu one ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, oburingaaniza omu by'okuteera akaruuru n'obw'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu hariho oburingaaniza omu kuteera akaruuru. Okukuratira engyenderwaho egi, ekitongore ekyehaireyo nikireeberera eby'okuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: In preparation for upcoming elections, political organizations focus on shaping their candidates' public personas. This involves strategic communication to ensure their messages resonate with voters.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okulonda okujja, ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bitadde essira ku kukola ebifaananyi by'abeesimbyewo byabwe mu lujjudde. Kino kizingiramu empuliziganya ey'obukodyo okulaba nti obubaka bwabwe bukwatagana n'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yer matye kabino anyim, dul me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat keto cwinygi tutwalle I yubu nying lucungu gi. Man kwako kubbe maber me neno ni lok meggi owiny ki bot lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit, isingarenitos iriongeta luka politikis aitolomun ikiroria luka abwoak kec. Imoriarit ngin einer loajokan kanu awanyun ebe epupete aseak akirokec.
lgg_prompt: Otuta 'yezu opeta emupi 'diyi ni, amuti politiki ni 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo 'ba yini pa tuzu 'diyi ma dria o'bi eyidri. Di ma alia e'yo nzeza geri kililiru 'diyisi nezu ra kini o'duko yini 'diyi 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma asi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwiija,ebibiina by'obutegyeki nibita amaani omu kutunguura eiziina ry'abeesimbireho. Eki nikitwariramu empurizagana nungi okureeba ngu obutumwa bwabo nibuhurirwa abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, party members are gearing up for a crucial decision. The upcoming meeting will focus on selecting new leadership to guide the party's future direction.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebiseera by'okulonda bisembera, bammemba b'ekibiina beetegekera okusalawo okw'amaanyi. Olukiiko olujja lujja kussa essira ku kulonda obukulembeze obupya okusobola okulungamya ekibiina mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me yer tye cok, lumemba me dul me cungu iwi bye ne tye ka yubbe me moko tam ma pire tek. Kacoke matye kabino ni biketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom yero lutela manyen me doro dul me cungu iwi-bye ne I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, eutasi imeeban luka epate aitemonokin aseunet naepol noi. Airiamunet na ebunit epodokinit aseun engarenone loitetet lo ebeit aingarenikin epate koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecaria, memba amuti politiki ni 'diyi eyi otu e'yo azi okporu ni 'yezu. Mitingi emupi 'disi ri nga asi 'ba driceza o'diru ni opezu driceza amuti ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, abanyakibiina nibeteekateekyera okusharamu kw'amaani. Orukiiko orurikwija niruza kuta amaani omu kutoorana abebembezi abasya ab'okwebembera ekibiina omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In a country where safety and security are paramount, the role of law enforcement becomes crucial. Citizens look to their police force for assurance and protection in times of need.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga obukuumi n'obutebenkevu bye bisinga obukulu, omulimu gw'abakuumaddembe gufuuka mukulu nnyo. Bannansi beesigama ku poliisi yaabwe okufuna obukakafu n'obukuumi mu biseera by'obwetaavu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma gwoko kuc ki ber bedo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, tic pa lugwok cik doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Anywali tye ka yenyo kony ki gwok ki bot abili gi ikare me peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na epolok noi ayuwar keda ayuwara, erai aswam naka ipolisin naepol noi. Emunokinos itunga ipolisin kec kanu aitogogong keda ayuwar kotoma apakio nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Kari azi ageitema ni aa'zu okporu ndeni ri ma alea, azi 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyiniri eca okporu. Kari anzi eyi asi'baza azini tambaza esu engazu polisi eyivile 'diyi vu sa'wa e'yo ewaru eyini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu ihanga ahu eby'okwerinda n'oburinzi biri bikuru munonga, omurimo gw'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro niguhinduka ogw'omugasho munonga. Abatuuragye nibaronda obuhwezi n'obukuumi omu pooriisi yaabo omu bwire bw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In maintaining public safety and order, it is essential for citizens to cooperate with law enforcement. Compliance with police directives helps ensure a secure environment for everyone.
lug_prompt: Mu kukuuma obukuumi n'obutebenkevu mu bantu, kikulu nnyo bannansi okukolera awamu n'abakuumaddembe. Okukolera ku biragiro bya poliisi kiyamba okuteekawo obukuumi eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: I gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo pa lwak, pire tek tutwal ni anywali omyero gutii kacelo ki joo ma gwoko cik. Lubu cik pa abili konyo me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ayuara keda ainapakina, ejokuka itunga aiswamanara keda ipolisin. Atupitos aicoreta nuka ipolisin ingarakini awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma tambazu kililiru, eri orodriru kari anzi eyini ti ecizu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. Azita polisi eyini 'diyi ma vuti obiza ni fe angu aa'zu ageitema be 'ba dria ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kurinda obusingye n'obutebekana, abatuuragye bashemereire kukwatanisa n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Okukuratira ebiragiro bya poriisi nikihwera okureeba ngu buri omwe aba aine obusingye.

eng_prompt: In many situations, individuals often rely on their instincts rather than adhering to guidelines. This tendency can lead to misunderstandings and mistakes.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera nnyingi, abantu beesigama ku nneewulira zaabwe mu kifo ky'okugoberera ebiragiro. Endowooza eno esobola okuleetawo obutategeeragana n'ensobi.
ach_prompt: I kare mapol dano gijenge I kom tam gi me kaka lubu cik. Miti man twero kelo tele ki bal.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol, emunokina itunga aijen kec itia aitup aicoreta. Epedori ngin ayangaun amamus acamanar keda aibucanaro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba eyi tutuni eyi ma asi 'ba e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria aga azita eyi ma vuti obizu. Adriza 'di eco fe e'yo vata ako ni azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera nyingi, abantu nibeesiga engyenderwaho yaabo omu mwanya gw'okukuratira ebiragiro. Omuze ogu nigubaasa kureetaho obutetegyerezana n'enshobi.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by justice, accountability is essential for maintaining order. Every individual, regardless of their status, must adhere to the same legal standards.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekifugibwa obwenkanya, embalirira ya mugaso mu kukuuma obutebenkevu. Buli muntu kinnoomu, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera ye, alina okugoberera emitendera gy'amateeka gye gimu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma kitye ka loc iye I yoo matir, nyutu kor tic pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Dano weng, labongo paro pi rwom me kwogi, omyero gulub cik marom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na epugaere keda etube loajokan, ibusakinit aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kanu aidar ainapakina. Nginitunganan, araida ejaasi keda adoketait adiope, ekot aitup ikisila lu eputosi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'bani opi nya e'yo liza kililiru si 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru azita eyi ma tambazu. Le 'ba dria eyi ma obi azita eyi ma vuti e'yo eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ekirikutegyekwa oburingaaniza, embaririra n'ey'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye. Buri muntu weena, oihireho embeera ye, ashemereire kukuratira ebiragiro ebirikushushana.

eng_prompt: Recent discussions within the community have revealed deep-seated disagreements on various theological interpretations. As a result, tensions have escalated, leading to noticeable divisions.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko mu kitundu kulaga obutakkaanya obuli mu njigiriza z'eddiini ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, obunkenke bweyongedde, ekiviiriddeko enjawukana ezirabika.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kin lwak onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I kom lok me dini mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, telle omede ma oweko apoka-poka obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei lu atuboros kotoma atutubet itodunitos amamut acamanar naepol noi kanuikamunitos aomisio nuegelegela nuka ediini. Kanuka ngun, eyatakinos ingungeta, ido eyangaunitos atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara ongulumu eyi ma eselea o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo erita ako 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra, e'yo esele coza ni 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura okuhweireho omu bantu, kworeka obutaikirizana aha nshonga z'eby'ediini ezitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, obunkenke bweyongyeire, ekirikureetaho okwebaganisamu.

eng_prompt: In a world often divided by differing beliefs, it is essential for those in positions of spiritual authority to model compassion and unity. By fostering a spirit of camaraderie, they can inspire their communities to embrace understanding and respect.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi etera okwawukana olw'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo, kyetaagisa abo abali mu bifo eby'obukulembeze mu by'omwoyo okuteekawo ekyokulabirako ky'obusaasizi n'obumu. Mu kukuza omwoyo gw'obwegassi, basobola okusikiriza ebitundu byabwe okwettanira okutegeera n'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opoke-oo pi dini mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal pi joo matye ki twero me cwiny me nyutu cwiny me kica ki ribe. Ki dongo cwiny me ribe, gitwero cuku cwiny lwak me niang ki woro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetiakatiaka kanu aiyuunikec nuegelegela, ejokuna noi ngul luejaasi keda apedorosio nuka edini aanyunet naka asianut keda aimorikikina. Kowai lo aitopolor eipud loka aimorikikina, epedorete kesi aisinyikokin itunga kec acamanar ka ayongite.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea esele coza e'yo aitanisi ndundu 'diyisi, eri orodriru 'ba okpo e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ni aa'zu ecetaru asi ndriza azini ti ecita be. Aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu risi, eyi eco ongulumu eyivile 'diyini ava fe vata azini inzita esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu okwebaganisamu ahabw'enyikiriza ezitari zimwe, n'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'eby'omwoyo kuba eky'okureeberaho ky'embabazi n'okukwatanisa. Kubarikutunguura omutima gw'okukwatanisa, nibabaasa kuhwera abantu baabo kwetegyerezana n'okuheerezana ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: In situations where they feel powerless or unheard, individuals often resort to drastic measures. Frustration can lead to a sense of urgency that compels them to act independently.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera nga bawulira nga tebalina maanyi oba nga tebawuliddwa, abantu baddukira mu bikolwa eby'amaanyi. Obwennyamivu busobola okubaleetera okuwulira obwangu ekibawaliriza okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma giwinyo calo gipe ki kero onyo pe ki winyo lokgi, dano ipol kare gi tiyo ki yoo matek tutwal. Cwer cwiny twero weko giwinyo ni kare dong odic ma weko gitimo jami labongo kony pa ngat mo keken.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepupiata kesi ebe emamei apedor arai mam epupio, etapit itunga aitwasam nuepedorete kesi. Atiokisio eyangaunete epone loepedoriata kesi aswam iboro bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyini aa'zu okpo kokoru kani ku 'bani eyi erizu ku 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye. E'yo eyini aa'zu e'yere ri eco fe eyini aa'zu e'yo mbeleru eyini ani ecozu e'yo 'yezu eyi ma ngulupi si ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera ezi barikwehurira bataine maani nainga batahurirwe, abantu nibatandika kukoresa oburyo bw'amaani. Okwerarikirira nikubaasa kureetaho ekiteekateeko ky'okwerinda ekirikubareetera kukora ebintu ahabwabo.

eng_prompt: It's easy to confuse admiration with genuine concern, especially when surrounded by people who seem supportive. However, the depth of their feelings may not always align with their outward expressions.
lug_prompt: Kyangu okutabula okwewuunya n'okufaayo okwa nnamaddala naddala nga weetooloddwa abantu abalabika nga abawagira. Kyokka, engeri gye bawuliramu eyinza obutafaanagana n'engeri gye boogeramu.
ach_prompt: Yot tutwal me nyweno lok me bedo ki miti ki paro pi dano tutwalle kace itye I kin dano ma nen calo cwako. Kadi bed kumeno, kit ma giwinyo kwede pol kare pe rwatte ki kit ma gi loko kwede.
teo_prompt: Epatana aitolitol aisiyalamikin keda apodokinit, kacut neidunyasi ijo keda itunga luesubit bala igangitos ijo. Konye, aticepak mam epone loepupiata kesi eputosi keda akiro nuinerasi kesi kinga.
lgg_prompt: Eri ewakokoru e'yo 'bani asi fezu 'ba eyi ma dria ri ojazu asi feza adaru be, tutuni 'ba ecopi atita fepi 'diyi ka ovu eyi ma ageia ci ria. Kani si, e'yo eyini ega sa'wa driasi 'diyi econi aa e'yo eyini nze amve 'diyi pie ku.
nyn_prompt: Kyanguhi okubuzabuza okushemererwa n'okufaayo okw'amazima, namunonga waaba oyehinguririize abantu abarikureebeka nk'abarikushagika. Kwonka, ebiteekateeko byabo nibibaasa kuba bitarikuhikaana n'ebi barikugamba.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with constant distractions and overwhelming information, it's easy to feel overlooked. Many individuals prioritize their own concerns over the needs of others.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebiwugulaza buli kaseera n'amawulire agasukkiridde, kyangu okuwulira nga tosonyiyibwa. Abantu bangi bakulembeza ebyetaago byabwe okusinga ebyetaago by'abalala.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki jami ma dwoyo tam ki ngec mapol tutwal, yot tutwal me winyo calo pe ki paro piri. Dano mapol giketo miti gi bedo gin ma pire tek loyo miti pa luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda iboro luipu luitegelikina keda akiro nuipu noi, epatana aipalor. Itunga luipu isingarenitos ipudesiakec adepar ipudesia luka luce.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea afa e'yo onzi 'yepi sa'wa driasi azini o'duko angiri 'diyi pie, eri ewakokoru ama egazu kini 'ba adi ama ra. Ba karakara eyi e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebintu ebirikureetaho oburemeezi hamwe n'amakuru maingi, kyanguhi kwehurira otarikwetegyerezibwa. Abantu baingi nibakuza ebyetengo byabo kukira eby'abandi.

eng_prompt: Building connections with others can enrich our lives in many ways. Friendships provide support, joy, and a sense of belonging.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba enkolagana n'abalala kiyinza okugaggawaza obulamu bwaffe mu ngeri nnyingi. Emikwano giwa obuyambi, essanyu n'okuwulira ng'oli wamu n'abalala.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki wat ki jo mukene twero lonyo kwo wa i yo mapol. Lurem miyo kony, yomcwiny ki winyo ni itye ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikin keda luce epedori aitojokar aijar wok koiponesio luipu. Einanakini epaperone agangat, aiyalama keda aomisioit.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta tualu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri eco ama edri ma omgbo otu geri karakara eyi si. Agyipika eyi atita fe, eyini ayiko fe, dika eyi fe 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa n'abandi nikibaasa kutunguura amagara gaitu omu miringo mingi. Omukago nigureeta obuhwezi, okushemererwa n'okumanya ngu oriho.

eng_prompt: Taking responsibility for your actions is essential in both personal and professional settings. Embracing a mindset of ownership can lead to greater success and trust in your relationships.
lug_prompt: Okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa ku bikolwa byo kya mugaso mu mbeera zo ez'obuntu n'ez'ekikugu. Okukkiriza endowooza y'obwannannyini kiyinza okuviirako obuwanguzi n'obwesige mu nkolagana zammwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki twero I kom jami ma itimo pire tek tutwal I kwo ni ki I tic ma megi. Bedo ki tam me bedo ki twero I kom jami weng twero weko wucobo miti ki gen I kinwu.
teo_prompt: Ayangar aswamisiokon erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuka itunganan keda nuka aswam. Ajaut keda aomisioit naka ajaut keda itunganan epedori ayangaun akerianut keda amunokina kotoma ajanarakon.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu e'yo mini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo mi ngulupi ni azini azi ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'duzu e'yo mi ma ngulupi niri ma dria ri eco fe drile suza angiri azini asi'baza eyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutwara obujunanizibwa aha bikorwa byawe, n'eky'omugasho omu mirimo yaawe. Okukoresa emiteekateekyere y'obukama, nikibaasa kureetaho obusinguzi n'obwesigye omu mikago yaanyu.

eng_prompt: It's important to understand that seeking help from law enforcement is a responsible action when faced with a crime. Many people fear that involving the police may label them as wrongdoers, but that is far from the truth.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okutegeera nti okunoonya obuyambi okuva mu bakuumaddembe kikolwa kya buvunaanyizibwa ng'oyolekaganye n'omusango. Abantu bangi batya nti okwenyigiramu kwa poliisi kuyinza okubatwaala ng'abamenyi b'amateeka, naye ekyo si kituufu.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang ni yenyo kony ki bot abili obedo tic maber kace itye ka nongo bal. Dano mapol gitye ki lworo ni kelo abili I tic man twero weko kilwongogi ni lutim bal, ento meno pe obedo lok ada.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin ebe aimo aingarakinio kama ejaasi ipolisin erai ibore yenibusakinit aswam arai itereikina keda emusago. Ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe aimorikikin ipolisin epedori aitodun kesi kwape luiswamaete nuarokok, konye mam ngun erai abeit.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru vazu kini azakoma esuzu engazu 'ba azita ma ta mba'baa 'diyi vu ri eri e'yo azi orodriruni 'ba ka e'yo onzi isu ria. Ba karakara eyi 'ye urisi kini polisi eyi ma ti suzu e'yo 'di ma alea ri ni nga eyi 'ba 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ru, te 'da e'yo adani ku.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu okushaba obuhwezi kuruga omu b'ebiragiro n'ekikorwa ky'obujunaanizibwa waaba oine ekihagaro. Abantu baingi nibatiina ngu okwetabamu poriisi nikibaasa kubareetaho akamanyiso nk'abakozi b'ebibi, kwonka ekyo tikihikire.

eng_prompt: In moments of prosperity and comfort, individuals often become absorbed in their own lives. However, when faced with adversity, a sense of empathy and community tends to emerge.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okukulaakulana n'obutebenkevu, abantu batera okwemalira ku bulamu bwabwe. Newankubadde, nga twolekaganye n'ebizibu, enneewulira y'okusaasira n'obwegassi etera okuvaayo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lonyo ki yom-cwiny, dano ipol kare gi keto cwiny gi i kom kwogi. Kadi bed kumeno, kace itye ka nongo peko, cwiny me kica ki ribbe ikin dano bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka abar keda aijar najokan, epodokitos itunga aijarakec bon. Konye, karai etereikina keda atiokisio, epone loka aitim keda aimorikikina elomuni.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa lonyi be azini e'yo yi 'yepi muke 'diyi ma alia, 'ba yi sawa driasi yi 'ba yi ma idri yi ma ngulupi ma dria. Kani si, 'ba ka e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu, asi ndriza azini o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi efu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obusinguzi n'obusingye, abantu nibafa aha magara gaabo. Kwonka, ku orikuhikwaho oburemeezi, habaho okusaasibwa n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: In moments of hardship, the true nature of relationships often comes to light. You begin to realize who genuinely cares for you amidst the struggles.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, engeri entuufu ey'omukwano etera okulabika. Otandika okutegeera ani akufaako mu butuufu wakati mu kulwanagana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, kit ma wat tye kwede I adaa pol kare nen ka maleng. I cako niang anga ma paro piri I kare ma itye I peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, etakanunete akiro nuka abeit nuka eidicane. Ibuni jo amisiikin itunganan yenepodokinit jo kotoma ationis.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, e'yo a'da 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi e'da sa'wa driasi. Mi e'do ni a'di asi mi ma dria a'daru ri e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, amazima g'omukago nigakira kureebeka. Nootandika kumanya orikukufaho munonga omu bwire bw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Supporting one another strengthens family bonds and fosters a sense of community. By offering assistance, we create an environment where everyone feels valued and cared for.
lug_prompt: Okuwagiragana kunyweza enkolagana y'amaka n'okutumbula enneewulira y'ekitundu. Mu kuwa obuyambi, tutondawo embeera buli omu gy'awulira nti wa muwendo era afaayo.
ach_prompt: Konyre ikin dano jingo wat ikin jo me ot. I miyo kony, wayubu kabedo ma dano weng winyo ni pigi tek dok giparo pigi.
teo_prompt: Aingaranakin yenice itogogongi eidicane lo okale ka aitopolor aomisio nuka itunga. Kowai lo aijanakin agangat, itolomuni oni ejautene lo epupiata itunga kere ebe ejokuka ido epodokitai kes.
lgg_prompt: Atita fezu 'ba azi 'diyi ma eselea ri ni aku eyi ma eselea ri ma okpo otu dika eri fe 'ba eyini aa'zu tualu. Afa azakoma fezurisi, ama angu azi ngazu 'ba dria ni aa'zu orodriru azini asi 'bazu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhagirana nikongyera amaani omu maka n'okureetaho obumwe omu bantu. Twaheereza obuhwezi, nitureetaho embeera ahu buri omwe arikuhurira aine omugasho kandi arikureebererwa.

eng_prompt: Supporting those we care about strengthens our relationships and fosters a sense of community. When we lend a hand to our friends, we not only uplift them but also create a positive environment for everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Okuwagira abo be tufaako kinyweza enkolagana yaffe era kitumbula enneewulira y'obumu. Bwe tuwaayo omukono eri mikwano gyaffe, tetukoma ku kubasitula wabula n'okutondawo embeera ennungi eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Cwako jo ma waparo pi gi jingo wat ikin wa dok weko wawinyo maber ikin wa. Ka wamiyo kony ki lurem wa, pe wa cuku cwiny gi keken ento bene wa kelo kwo maber pi dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Aingarakin ngul lu imina oni itojokari eidicane wok ido ijaikini oni aimorikikina. Arai ingarakini oni ipapero wok, mam oni itojokari kesi bon konye ijaikit oni ejautene loajokan kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Atita fezu 'ba amani asi 'bazu yi ma dria ri ni ama ma eselea 'diyi ma okpo enga dika eri fe amani aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma eselea. Aka ama ma dri fe ama agyipi yi dri, ama ngani lu yi otu ku te ama vini angu kililiru eji 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okuhagira abo abu turikufaho nikyongyera omukago gwaitu n'okureetaho obumwe omu bantu. Kuturikuyamba banywani baitu, titurikubagaruramu amaani kyonka, beitu nitureetaho n'embeera nungi ahabwa buri omwe orikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: In a world where grand gestures often overshadow small acts of kindness, it's important to recognize the value of every effort made on our behalf. Even the simplest actions can have a profound impact on our lives.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ng'ebikolwa ebinene bisingira wala ebikolwa ebitonotono eby'ekisa, kikulu okumanya omugaso gwa buli kaweefube akolebwa ku lwaffe. N'ebikolwa ebitonotono bisobola okukosa ennyo obulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma jami madongo ipol kare balo jami matino matino me kica, pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa tute weng ma kitimo piwa. Kadi jami matino tino twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi aswamisio nuapolok keda aswamisio nudidik nuka asianut, erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ajokis naka aswamisio nu iswamao kanukosi. Karaida aswamisio nuepataka epedorete aitodolikin aijar wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo onyiru 'diyi tutuni e'yo onyiru werea 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru amani e'yo dria 'bani 'ye ama dria 'diyi ma orodri isuzu. E'yo werea 'diyi eco adri e'yo okporu 'ye idri amavileri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu ebikorwa bihango birikukira ebikorwa bikye eby'embabazi, nikikuru kumanya omugasho gw'amaani agakozirwe ahabwaitu. N'ebikorwa ebikye nibibaasa kukora kihango aha magara gaitu.

eng_prompt: Expressing gratitude is an important aspect of building strong relationships. A simple acknowledgment can go a long way in fostering goodwill and encouraging further collaboration.
lug_prompt: Okwebaza kintu kikulu nnyo mu kuzimba enkolagana ey'amaanyi. Okusiima okutonotono kusobola okukola kinene mu kutumbula enkolagana ennungi n'okukubiriza okukolagana okulala.
ach_prompt: Nyuto pwoc obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dongo wat. Miyo pwoc matidi twero konyo tutwal me kelo ber bedo ki cuku cwiny me medde ki tic kacel.
teo_prompt: Aitodun aisiyalamikinit erai ibore yenepol noi aiduk eidicane loegogong. Aitijenaret naedit epedori aingarakin noi kotoma aitopolorite aiswamanara ka aisinyikokinit aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: Awa'difo eceza eri e'yo azi orodriru aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ri sizu. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo aꞌizuri eco fe eꞌyo onyiru ꞌyezu ꞌba yi ma eselea azini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okusiima n'ekintu ky'omugasho omu kwombeka enkoragana nungi. Okusiima okukye nikubaasa kuhwera munonga omukureetaho omukago murungi n'okureetaho okukwatanisa okundi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals facing homelessness struggle with feelings of isolation and despair. However, the presence of supportive friends or family can make a significant difference in their experience.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abatalina we babeera balwanagana n'enneewulira y'okweyawula n'okuggwaamu essuubi. Newankubadde, okubeerawo kwa mikwano oba ab'enganda ezibawagira kusobola okuleetawo enjawulo mu byebayitamu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gipe ki gangi giwinyo calo gitye kengi dok gipe ki gen. Kadi bed kumeno, bedo tye pa lurem onyo lugang ma cwak twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu luemameototor ireria kes ejaasi keda aiyalongong keda aiyalongong. Konye, ajaut naka ipapero luigangitos arai ekale epedori aijulakin aijen kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara aku koko 'diyi dri ci e'yo yi ma esele cozu azini ava ako be. Kani si, aa'ta agyipi azini familia atita fepi 'diyiniri eco ojata okporu eji e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abatarikubamu butaaho, nibarwanagana n'enyehurira y'okwetorora hamwe n'okwerarikirira. Kwonka, okubaho kw'abanywani nainga ab'eka abarikubahagira, nikibaasa kukora empindahinduka y'amaani omu bibarikurabamu.

eng_prompt: In a world where kindness can make a significant difference, we often find ourselves in a position to lend a hand. Whether through small gestures or larger acts of charity, supporting others can create a ripple effect of positivity.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ng'ekisa kisobola okuleetawo enjawulo ey'amaanyi, tutera okwesanga mu mbeera ey'okuwaayo omukono. Ka kibeere mu bikolwa ebitonotono oba ebikolwa ebinene eby'obuzirakisa, okuyamba abalala kusobola okuleetawo embeera ennungi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma kica twero kelo aloka-loka madit tutwal, pol kare wanongo ni watye ki kero me miyo kony. Obedo tic matino-tino onyo tic madongo me konyo dano, konyo jo mukene twero kelo adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepedoriata iponesio lukajokak aijulakin ejautene, ipedori oni aingarakin. Arai kitosomaete iponesio ludidik arai bo aswamisio nuepolok nuka aigang luce, epedori aingarakin luce ayangaun aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani asi ndriza ecozu ojata okporu ejizu ri ma alea, ama isu ama ma ngulupi sa'wa driasi e'yo azakoma fezu 'diyi ma alea. Ka tro adriza werea 'diyi si kani 'yeta ambo 'diyi si, atita fezu 'ba azi 'diyi dri ri eco e'yo muke 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu embabazi zirikubaasa kukora empindahinduka y'amaani, buriijo nitubaasa kuhayo omukono. Yaaba kurabira omu bikorwa bikye nainga ebikorwa bihango by'obuhwezi, okuhwera abandi nikibaasa kureetaho entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Maintaining cleanliness in our daily routines is essential for overall health. Simple practices like washing hands regularly can make a significant difference in disease prevention.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo mu mirimu gyaffe egya bulijjo kya mugaso eri obulamu okutwalira awamu. Ebikolwa ebitonotono nga okunaaba mu ngalo buli kaseera bisobola okuleetawo enjawulo mu kutangira endwadde.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek pi yotkom wa. Timo jami matino tino calo lwoko cing kare ki kare twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I gengo two.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aila kanginiparan erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu. Aswamisio nuepataka kwape ailot akanin duc epedori aitodolikin aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza 'yeta amavile o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru alata ma dria. Yeta ewakokoru ekile dri ojiza le 'diyi eco ojata okporu eji e'yo azo atrizu 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obuyonjo omu mirimo yaitu eya burizooba, n'eky'omugasho aha magara gaitu goona. Ebintu bikye nk'okunaaba omungaro butoosha, nibibaasa kureetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu kuzibira endwara.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow and more people gather in confined spaces, public health officials are increasingly concerned about the potential risks. The close proximity of individuals in these environments creates ideal conditions for pathogens to thrive and spread.
lug_prompt: Nga omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera okukula era abantu bangi bakungaana mu bifo ebitono, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku bulabe obuyinza okubaawo. Okubeera kumpi kw'abantu mu bitundu bino kitondawo embeera ennungi eri obuwuka okukula n'okusaasaana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye I boma tye kamede ki dongo ki dano mapol gure I kabedo matidi, lutic me yot kom tye ka paro pi peko ma twero bedo tye. Bedo cok pa dano I kabedo magi weko jami ma kelo two dongo dok nya.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma oibuga keda itunga luipu lu atukonokin aiboisio nu ikidioko, epodokinitos eswamak luka angaleu nuikamunitos atiokisio nu epedorete atakanun. Aidunyet naka itunga kotoma aiboisio nu ijaikit adekasinei apol ka awear.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu drile dika 'ba karakara eyi tra eyi angu eyi ma alea, azi'ba alata ni 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo ewaru ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria. ꞋBani ꞌba yi ma eselea tualu angu ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi fe eꞌyo onyiru ꞌba azo be ꞌdiyi ni zozu azini yi erezu.
nyn_prompt: Omubare gw'abantu omu ndembo nigugumizamu nigweyongyera kandi abantu baingi nibateeranira omu myanya mikye, ab'ebyamagara beeyongyeire kwerarikirira akabi akarikubaasa kubaho. Okukwatanisa kw'abantu omu myanya egi, nikireetaho embeera nungi y'oburwaire kukura n'okujanjaara.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous promises and initiatives aimed at supporting families, many expectant mothers continue to face significant challenges. Reports indicate a lack of adequate resources and services for those in need during their pregnancy.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ebisuubizo bingi n'enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okuyamba amaka, bamaama bangi abali embuto bakyasanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Lipoota ziraga ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa n'obuweereza obumala eri abo abali mu bwetaavu nga bali mbuto.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gimiyo cikke ki yub mapol me konyo gangi, mon mapol ma oyac pud gitye ka nongo peko mapol. Adwogi tic nyutu ni pe tye jami ki kony ma oromo pi joo matye ki peko ikare me yacu.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu aisumuneta keda ainapeta nu ekotoi aigangite ikalia, angor nuipu nu epotiete eringa etereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok. Itodunitos iripotan amamus na iboro ka aijanakino na itunga lu icanakino kapak naka apotu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani owizu familia eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma talasi, ayia okporovu karakara eyi nga po'di e'yo ewaru eyi esu. O'duko ece kini afa ayuzaru azini azakoma fele 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi dri sawa yini okporovururi ma alia yo.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiraganiso bingi n'enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okuhwera amaka, abakazi baingi abarikuzaara nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Ripoota nizooreka eibura ry'ebintu ebirikumara n'obuheereza bw'abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi baaba baine enda.

eng_prompt: Ensuring the health and well-being of citizens is a fundamental duty of any government. Access to medical care and disease prevention programs is essential for a thriving society.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obulamu n'obulungi bwa bannansi mulimu gwa gavumenti yonna. Okufuna obujjanjabi n'enteekateeka z'okwetangira endwadde kya mugaso eri ekitundu okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Neno ni kwo pa anywali tye maber obedo tic ma pire tek pa gamente. Nongo kony me yot kom ki yub me gengo two obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Aimaniman nuka angaleu keda aijar naka itunga erai aswam naepol noi naka apugan. Adumunun amukian ka aitikitik adekasinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba kari ni 'diyi ma rua ala azini aa'ta muke ri ma tambazu ri eri azi gamete ni okporu ni i. E'yo aro esuzu azini e'yo azo atrizu 'diyi ma esuta eri orodriru ongulumu eyini zozu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abatuuragye batunga amagara marungi n'omurimo gw'omugasho gwa gavumenti yoona. Okutunga obujanjabi hamwe n'enteekateeka y'okuzibira endwara, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'abantu okukura.

eng_prompt: Maintaining proper hygiene is essential for overall health. One of the simplest yet most effective practices is regular hand washing.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu okutwalira awamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebyangu era ebikola obulungi kwe kunaaba engalo buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek pi yotkom. Yo acel ma yot dok tiyo maber loyo weng en aye lwoko cing kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Aidar aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin lu epatana konye lu iswamaete ejok ngesi ailot akanin duc.
lgg_prompt: Alata ma tambaza eri orodriru aa'zu rua ala be dria. Geri azi alu ewakokoru te azi ngapi muke ndeni ri eri dri ojiza sa'wa driasi ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'eby'obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikwetengwa kwonka ogurikukora kurungi n'okunaaba engaro buri kaire.

eng_prompt: As conflicts and instability continue to plague neighboring countries, many individuals are seeking safety and a better life. This influx of people is putting pressure on Uganda's resources and infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Ng'obukuubagano n'obutali butebenkevu bikyagenda mu maaso n'okubonyaabonya amawanga agaliraanyeewo, abantu bangi banoonya obukuumi n'obulamu obulungi. Okuyingira kw'abantu kuno kuteeka akazito ku by'obugagga bya Uganda n'ebintu ebigasiza awamu abantu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lweny ki kuku-kuku tye kamede ki balo lobo matye jirani, dano mapol tye ka yenyo gwok ki kwo maber. Dano mapol matye kabino I lobo Uganda tye ka keto lyeto I kom lonyo me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos ingungeta keda amamus aipuc aimusung akwapin nu idunyare, eutasi itunga luipu aimo ayuwara keda aijar najokan. Alomun na itunga erai ibore yenepedori aitolitol iboro keda iboro luingarakinete itunga luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ni mu drile kari jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alia, 'ba karakara eyi ageitema nda azini edri muke ni. E'yo 'ba eyini emuzu kari 'di ma alea ri ni okpo 'ba lonyi kari Uganda niri ni 'diyi ma dria tualu afa ayuzaru kari 'di ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obu entaro n'obutabanguko birikugumizamu nibiteganisa amahanga agatuherereire, abantu baingi nibaronda oburinzi n'amagara marungi. Okugaruka kw'abantu omu ihanga nikureetaho oburemeezi ahaby'obugaiga n'ebyombeko bya Uganda.

eng_prompt: As the number of people in urban centers continues to rise, the risk of infectious diseases becoming widespread increases significantly. It is crucial to implement effective measures to protect public health.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga bwe gugenda gweyongera, emikisa gy'endwadde ezisiigibwa gyeyongera nnyo. Kya mugaso nnyo okuteekawo enkola ennungi okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye I boma tye ka medde, gum me nongo two ma kobo bene tye kamede tutwal. Pire tek tutwal me keto yoo maber me gwoko yotkom pa lwak itic.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma oibuga, iyata arereng naka adekasinei nu ikopas noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi aitegear iwaitin lu eyuaritos nuka ayuarite angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ni mu drile turia, e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta ma omgbo ni tu ra. Eri orodriru 'yeta kililiru 'diyi 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo ogurikuguma nigweyongyera, akabi k'endwara ezirikuturira nikweyongyera munonga. N'eky'omugasho okutaho oburyo burungi bw'okurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In densely populated environments, individuals are often in close proximity to one another. This close contact can facilitate the transmission of pathogens and increase the risk of outbreaks.
lug_prompt: Mu bifo ebirimu abantu abangi, abantu batera okubeera kumpi n'abalala. Okukwatagana kuno okw'okumpi kusobola okwanguyiza okusaasaana kw'endwadde n'okwongera ku bulabe bw'okubalukawo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano dwong iye, dano mapol gibedo cok ki luwotgi. Kube macok man twero weko kwidi ma kelo two nya dok medo gum me poto pa two.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nu ipu itunga, idunyasi duc itunga. Airiamun na epedori aitapatan awea na adekasinei ka aiyatakin ationis naka abwangun.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'ba eyini aa'zu tre 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi aa eyi ma eselea ogogo. Aa'ta tualu 'diri eco fe azo eyi ma ereta ma omgbo ni tu ra dika eri eco e'yo azo eyini e'dozu 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya erimu abantu baingi, abantu nibatuura haihi n'abandi. Okukwatanisa kurungi nikureetaho okujanjaara kw'endwara n'okwongyera akabi k'okubarukaho kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: Many citizens are unaware of the health risks they face in their daily lives. This lack of awareness is largely due to insufficient public health education initiatives.
lug_prompt: Bannansi bangi tebamanyi bulabe bw'ebyobulamu bwe basanga mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Obutali bumanyirivu buno businga kuva ku nteekateeka ezitali zimala ez'okusomesa abantu ku byobulamu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol pe gingeyo peko me yot kom ma ginongo ikwo gi me nino ducu. Bedo peke pa ngec man pole tye macalo adwogi me peko me pwony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu mam ejenete atiokisio nu adekasinei nu itereikina keda kes kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan. Amamus na aijen erai naarai mam isisianakinete itunga nuikamunitos angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi karakara eyi nini e'yo ewaru eyini esu eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria ku. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba yi ma mile ozizuri ma ako ꞌdi eꞌyo ꞌbani imbata fezu eꞌyo alata ma dria ꞌdiyi ma dria kililiru kuri ma eꞌyosi.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye abaingi tibarikumanya akabi akarikubaasa kubaho aha magara gaabo. Okuremwa kwegyesa abantu ebirikukwata aha magara nikirugirira aha nteekateeka y'okwegyesa abantu ebitarikumara.

eng_prompt: It's important to maintain good hygiene, especially during flu season. One of the simplest ways to do this is by regularly washing your hands.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okukuuma obuyonjo naddala mu biseera bya ssennyiga. Emu ku ngeri ennyangu ey'okukikolamu kwe kunaaba engalo buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Pire tek me gwoko lengo, tutwalle ikare me two aburu. Yo acel ma yot me timo man aye me lwoko cingi kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenejok aidar aila kacut apakio nu ekurut. Ediopet ewai lo epatana aswam ngun ngesi ailot akanin kon duc.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru alata ma tambazu tuni sa'wa abua nirisi. Geri azi ewakokoru mini ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri mini mi dri ojizu sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okurinda obuyonjo, okukira munonga omu bwire bwa senyiga. Omuringo gumwe gw'okukora eki n'okunaaba engaro zaawe obutoosha.

eng_prompt: Understanding health and hygiene is crucial for maintaining well-being. Educating young minds about the importance of disease prevention can empower them to make informed choices.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebyobulamu n'obuyonjo kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obulamu obulungi. Okusomesa abavubuka ku bukulu bw'okwetangira endwadde kibasobozesa okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Niang lok me yot kom ki gwoko lengo pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo maber. Pwonyo tam pa bulu i kom ber pa gengo two twero minigi kero me moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin nuka angaleu ka aila erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aijar najokan. Aisisianakin atumunak ajokis naka aitikitik adekasinei epedori ainakin kes apedor aiswamaun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: Angu alata azini alata ma vata eri orodriru aa'ta muke ri ma tambazu. Imbata feza 'ba oderu 'diyi dri orodri azo atrizu 'diyi ma dria ri ni fe eyini okpo e'yo 'duzu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza eby'amagara n'obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara marungi. Okwegyesa eminyeeto omugasho gw'okuzibira endwara, nikibaasa kubahwera kucwamu gye.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating crisis, local organizations and citizens have been rallying to provide support. Recognizing the urgent need for assistance, the government has stepped up to help the refugees in the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ekyeyongera, ebitongole by'omu kitundu n'abatuuze babadde bakungaana okuwa obuyambi. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi, gavumenti eyimiriddewo okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, dule me tedero kacel ki anywali me tedero gubedo kacoke me miyo kony. Pien gamente oniang ni mite ni kimi kony oyot-oyot tutwal, en okatti me konyo luring ayela matye ilobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata, iriamununos iriongeta keda itunga luka atutubet aijaikin agangat. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aingarakinio katipet, elomunit apugan aingarakin ikerai lu akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ma omgbo tupi 'disi, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu kari anzi eyi pie eyi tra atita fezu. E'yo 'bani e'yo azakoma lezu mbeleru ri ma e'yo egazu risi, gamete e'do pa so azakoma fezu emunyale kari ma alia 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire,ebitongore by'omubyaro hamwe n'abatuuragye batwire nibarundaana obuhwezi. Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuhwezi, gavumenti erugireyo kuhwera empungi eziri omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: As society becomes increasingly litigious, individuals are seeking formal resolutions for disputes that were once settled informally. This shift in behavior reflects a growing reliance on the legal system to address grievances.
lug_prompt: Ng'abantu beeyongera okwemulugunya, abantu banoonya engeri z'okugonjoolamu obutakkaanya obwali bugonjoolwa mu butongole. Enkyukakyuka eno mu nneeyisa eraga obwesige obweyongera ku nkola y'amateeka okugonjoola okwemulugunya.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lwak tye kamede ki kelo telle, dano tye ka yenyo yoo me tyeko telle macon ma onongo ki tyeko i yo ma pe jenge I kom gamente. Alokaloka man I kit dano nyutu ni dano tye ka jenge tutwal I kom cik me tyeko koko.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata ingungeta kotoma atutubet, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu itemokinet ingungeta lumojong. Aijulakinio na naka iponesio itodunit ebe iyata itunga aiyuunikec mama ejaasi ikisila kanu aitemokin ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'dozu e'yo eyi 'yezu tutu risi, 'ba eyi e'yo eyi ma aza ko geri azita palaa ku 'diyi ma alea e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi. Ojata 'yeta ma alia 'diri ece asi'baza tupi geri azita palaa 'diyi ma dria e'yo onyota ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu kubarikweyongyera kugira entongane, abantu nibaronda oburyo bw'okutereeza entongane ezabaire nizikorwaho omu butongore. Empindahinduka y'emitwarize neeyoreka okweyongyera kwesiga enkora y'ebiragiro kukora aha kwetomboita.

eng_prompt: In the judicial system, various processes are in place to ensure that cases are addressed in a timely manner. One crucial aspect of this system is the scheduling of hearings.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'ekiramuzi, emitendera egy'enjawulo giriwo okukakasa nti emisango gikolebwako mu budde. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno kwe kuteekawo enteekateeka y'okuwulira emisango.
ach_prompt: I tenge me ngolo kop, yoo mapat-pat tye me neno ni lok tye ka time ikare ki kome. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo yub me winyo lok.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget loka ikatubok, ejaas iponesio luegelegela kanu awanyun ebe itemonokino imusagon kotoma apak. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi ainapeta nuka apupio.
lgg_prompt: Geri dwani ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye nezu ra kini 'ba kesi eyi ma aza ko sa'wa dria. E'yo azi okporu e'yo 'di ma dria ri eri sawa 'bani e'yo erizu 'diyi 'yezu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore ekiramuzi, hariho emiringo mingi y'okureeba ngu emishango ekorwaho omubwiire. Ekikuru munonga omu nkora egi n'okutebeekanisa okuhurira emishango.

eng_prompt: The scheduling of legal proceedings is a complex process that requires careful consideration. Various factors must be assessed before a judge can determine an appropriate court date.
lug_prompt: Okukola enteekateeka y'okuwulira emisango kizibu era kyetaagisa okwetegereza ennyo. Ensonga ez'enjawulo zirina okwekenneenyezebwa nga omulamuzi tannasalawo lunaku lwa kkooti olulungi.
ach_prompt: Yubu nino me winyo lok I kot obedo yoo matek tutwal ma mito tam matut. Tye jami mapol ma omyero ki nen ma peya langol kop omoko nino me winyo lok.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin apak naka apupio naka imusagon erai ibore yen etiono noi ido ekot aomoom ejok. Ipu iboro luibusakinit airereor eringa ekatubon itutub aparan na adieket.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'bani e'yo dwani ni 'diyi 'yezu ri eri e'yo azi kongolokoru lepi 'ba ma ega e'yo drinia kililiru. Le 'ba ma one e'yo ndundu eyi de nga po'di 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi 'duni mba o'du kililiru dwani ni ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Okutebeekanisa okuhurira orubanja n'omuringo gw'amaani ogurikwetenga okushwijumwa n'obwegyendesereza. Enshonga nyingi zishemereire kushwijumwa omuramuzi atakacwiremu eizooba ry'okuhurira omushango.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing pandemic, many public spaces have implemented strict health measures. As a result, the judicial system has had to adapt to ensure the safety of all involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, ebifo bingi ebyolukale biteekeddewo enkola enkakali mu byobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ekiramuzi kirina okukola enkyukakyuka okukakasa obukuumi bw'abo bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two korona matye kawot anyim, kabedo mapol ma lwak bedo iye guketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa lungol kop omyero gutim alokaloka me gwoko kwo pa dano weng makubbe ki lok eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, ejaas aiboisio nuipu nuka itunga toma ainapeta nuka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, ejai ewai lo ikatubok aijulakin kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, angu o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'ba azita rua ala ni okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alia. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu e'yo liza ma drilea ri 'ye ojata lezu 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburiho obwahati, emyanya y'abantu baingi eteireho engyenderwaho y'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa ahaby'oburingaaniza kiine kukora empindahinduka okureeba ngu boona abarikukwatwaho baba baine oburinzi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential for citizens to adhere to guidelines set forth by authorities. Compliance with these directives ensures the safety and well-being of the entire community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kya mugaso nnyo bannansi okugoberera ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo ab'obuyinza. Okukolera ku biragiro bino kikakasa obukuumi n'obulungi bw'ekitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal pi anywali me lubu cik ma gamente oketo. Lubu cik magi gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, ejokuka itunga atupakinit aicoreta nuitolomunitos apedorosio. Atupitos aicoreta nu eyangauni ayuwara keda aijar najokan naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, eri orodriru kari anzi eyini azita drice'ba eyini 'diyi ma vuti obizu. Azita 'diyi ma vuti obiza ni fe o'bi eyini aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru munonga abatuuragye kukuratira ebiragiro ebyateirweho ab'obushoborozi. Okukuratira ebiragiro ebi, nikireetaho oburinzi n'amagara marungi omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: The tension in the courtroom was palpable as the judge prepared to deliver the verdict. Many had gathered, hopeful for a resolution, but the atmosphere hinted at the divisive nature of the case.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke mu kkooti bwalabika ng'omulamuzi yeetegekera okuwa ensala. Bangi baali bakungaanye nga basuubira okugonjoolwa, naye embeera eyaliwo yalaga enjawukana mu musango.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I ot kot I kare ma langolkop tye ka yubbe me miyo ngolo kop mege. Dano mapol gugure, ki gen me nongo yoo me tyeko lok, ento jami ma obedo tye onyuto apoka-poka matye I lokke.
teo_prompt: Apol noi aiyalongong kotoma adieket najaar atubon aitemonokin aitolomun etube. Apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos, komuno ebe eponio aitemokin ngun, konye abu ejautene kitodu atiakatiaka naka emusago ngol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omizaniri ndra pari dwaniniri ma alia e'dazaru 'ba e'yo lipiri ni otuta 'yeria e'yo liza fezu. Ba karakara eyi tra eyi asi'baza be e'yo 'da ma aza kozu, te angu 'da ece e'yo 'di ma esele coza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira omu kooti kukareebeka nk'oku omuramuzi yaabaire ayeteekateekire kuheereza ensharaho. Abantu baingi baketeeranira hamwe, baine amatsiko g'okutereera enshonga, kwonka embeera eyabaire eriho ekoreka okwebaganisamu kw'omushango.

eng_prompt: After months of intense legal battles and uncertainty, the community finally received the long-awaited decision. The judge's ruling brought a sense of relief and joy to all involved.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'entalo z'amateeka ez'amaanyi n'obutali bukakafu, ekitundu kyatuuka ku kusalawo okwali kulindiriddwa okumala ebbanga. Ensala y'omulamuzi yaleeta obuweerero n'essanyu eri abo bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny matek tutwal I kot ki bedo ki akala-kala, lwak dong gunongo ngolo kop ma gubedo kakuru pi kare malac. Ngolo kop pa langol kop okelo yweyo ki yom-cwiny bot dano weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ejie loepol noi loka ikisila keda amamus acamanar, apotu itunga kodumutu aseunet naedaunitai apak naepol noi. Abu etube loka ekatubon koyangau aiyalama keda aiyalama mama ejaasi itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Mba a'di 'diza okporu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma vutia, ongulumu 'da esu asizu e'yo liza 'bani ebi te sawa ezu ri ra. E'yo liza 'ba e'yo lipiri niri eji ava azini ayiko 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana kurungi omu biragiro hamwe n'obutetegyerezibwa, abantu bakahendera batunga okusharaho okwatwireho obwire buraingwa. Ensharaho y'omuramuzi ekareeta oburuhuuko n'okushemererwa ahari boona abakukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by law, it is essential to have a system in place that evaluates actions and holds individuals accountable. This ensures that justice is served and that everyone is treated fairly under the legal framework.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abafugibwa amateeka, kya mugaso okubeera n'enkola mu kifo ekyetegereza ebikolwa n'okuvunaana abantu ssekinnoomu. Kino kikakasa nti obwenkanya buweebwa era nti buli omu ayisibwa mu bwenkanya mu nkola y'amateeka.
