eng_prompt: Despite numerous reports highlighting the alarming conditions faced by vulnerable youth, many advocates believe that the current policies fall short. As a result, there is growing frustration among activists and parents alike regarding the lack of effective measures in place.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga alipoota nnyingi ziraga embeera embi abavubuka abatalina mwasirizi gye boolekaganye nayo, abawagizi bangi balowooza nti enkola eziriwo tezikwatagana. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo obwennyamivu obweyongera mu balwanirizi b'eddembe n'abazadde ku lw'obutaba na nkola nnungi eriwo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni adwoki me kwed mapol nyutu peko ma bulu matye ki peko tye ka kato ki iye, dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni cik matye kombedi pe tye maber. Macalo adwogi ne, cwer cwiny tye kamede ikin joo ma lwenyo I kom gamente ki lunyodo pi bedo peke pa yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu iripotan luitodunitos ejautene loaronon loetereikina keda atumunak lu ican, eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam ainapeta nuejaas kopana iswamaete ejok. Kanuka ngun, ejai aiyalongong kanejaas itunga keda auriak kanu amamus na iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: O'duko karakara eyi ka tro e'da e'yo onzi 'ba ode e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma dria ra ti, 'ba karakara eyi ega kini azita curu'do 'diyi e'de ra. E'yo 'disi, ava ako ni tu 'ba a'di 'dipi e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea tualu tipika eyi pie e'yo 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu kililiru ku ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ripoota nyingi ezirikworeka embeera y'akabi eri eminyeeto etarikwetengwa, abarikurwanirira eby'obuhangwa nibateekateeka ngu ebiragiro ebiriho hati tibirikumara. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho okwetomboita ahagati y'abarwanirizi b'obuhangwa hamwe n'abazaire ahabw'obutabaasa kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: As the world grappled with an unprecedented health crisis, many aspects of daily life began to change dramatically. From social interactions to economic stability, the effects of the pandemic were felt across all sectors of society.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi erwanagana n'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obutatera kubaawo, ebintu bingi mu bulamu obwa bulijjo byatandika okukyuka. Okuva ku nkolagana y'abantu okutuuka ku butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, ebikosa ekirwadde bbunansi byawuliddwa mu bitundu byonna eby'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka lweny ki peko me yot kom ma pud pe obedo tye, jami mapol I kwo me nino ducu ocako loke tutwal. Nicake I kom kubbe ikin dano me oo I kom bedo ki kuc I tenge me lim, adwogi pa two korona obedo I tenge weng me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda ationis naka angaleu naepol noi, apotu iponesio luipu luka aijar kogeutu aijulakin noi. Anyoun kotoma aiswamanara keda itunga kitoni ainapakina kotoma ikapun, aponi kopupunai atiokisio nuka adeka naka ekorona kotoma atutubena kere.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi be, e'yo karakara idri ni o'du driasi 'diyi e'do yi oja okporu. E'dozu e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea ri vu kpere e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu, e'yo azo 'deza 'di ni fe 'diyi e'da esele dria o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obu ensi yaabaire neetandika kurwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara, ebintu bingi omu magara g'abantu bikatandika kuhinduka munonga. Kuruga aha kukorengana n'abantu, okuhisya aha butebekana omu by'entaasya, ebyabaireho ahabw'endwara ruranda nsi bikahurirwa omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic forced communities into lockdown, traditional education came to a halt. Families sought new ways to sustain themselves and adapt to the changing circumstances.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyawaliriza ebitundu okuggalwa, ebyenjigiriza eby'ennono byayimirira. Amaka ganoonya engeri empya ez'okweyimirizaawo n'okumanyiira embeera ezikyuka.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two ma opoto ni oweko gamente oloro piny, kwan me tekwaro ocung woko. Gangi guyenyo yoo manyen me gwoko kwo gi ki bene me ngi ki alokaloka matye.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu adeka koinak itunga agolokin akwap, abu asioman naka einono kobwoun. Apotu ikalia komoata iponesio luitetiak luka aijar kec ka ajenun aijulakinet naka ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni ongulumu eyi ombezu angu ti opiza ma alea risi, onita e'yo a'bini 'diyi ma alea ri so pa ra. Familia eyi nda geri o'diru eyini ecozu eyi ma edri ta mbazu dika eyini ecozu aa'zu e'yo eyi ojapi 'diyi be ra.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi ku yaareeteire abantu kukingaho, obwegyese bw'enzarwa bukemereera. Amaka gakasherura oburyo busya bw'okwebeisaho n'okumanya embeera ehindukire.

eng_prompt: As urbanization continues to reshape the landscape of many countries, Uganda is experiencing significant changes in its rural areas. This transformation is leading to the development of new urban centers to accommodate the growing population.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga kweyongera okukyusa embeera y'ensi mu mawanga mangi, Uganda efuna enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu byalo byayo. Enkyukakyuka eno ereetawo enkulaakulana y'ebibuga ebipya okusobola okusuza omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo pa boma tye kamede ki kelo aloka-loka I kabedo mapat-pat me lobo Uganda, Uganda bene tye ka neno aloka-loka madit tutwal I kabedo me caro. Aloka-loka man tye ka kelo dongo lobo I boma mapat-pat manyen me gwoko wel dano matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aijulakin ejautene loka akwapin nuipu, ejai Uganda aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma aiboisio nuka ocaloi. Euta aijulanakineta ngun ayangaun apol naka itaunin luitetiak kanu aidar enaaba loka itunga luepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tawuni eyi ma ezota ni mu drile angu kari karakara eyini aa'zu 'diyi ojazu risi, Uganda ni ojata okporu 'diyi esu angu erivile calo ru 'diyi ma alea. Ojata 'di ni fe angu o'diru tawuni ru 'diyi ezozu kalafe 'ba eyini tupi tutu ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu omu ndembo nikugumizamu kuhindura amahanga maingi, Uganda eriyo neetunga empindahinduka y'amaani omu byaro byayo. Empindahinduka egi eriyo nereeta entunguuka y'endembo nsya, kugira ngu zitungure abantu abarikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In our organization, we prioritize collaboration and thorough evaluation before any project moves forward. Therefore, all proposals must undergo a rigorous review process.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyaffe, tukulembeza okukolagana n'okwekenneenya obulungi nga pulojekiti yonna tennagenda mu maaso. N'olwekyo, ebiteeso byonna birina okwekenneenyezebwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: I dul megwa, waketo cwiny I kom ribbe ki ngiyo kor tic weng mapwod yub mo keken pe owoto anyim. Pi meno, tam weng omyero ki nen gi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget wok, isingarenit sio aiswamanara keda airereonor ejok eringa epurojekt ngol elosi ngaren. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit airereonor aomisio kere.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri ma alea, ama e'yo ti icita ni azini e'yo eti ondaza kililiru ri 'du okporu rakaka de nga po'di otita azi mu drile ku. Ka'dini, le 'ba ma andri e'yo dria 'bani lele 'diyi ma ale kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyaitu, nitwebembeza okukwatanisa n'okushwijuma purogyekiti etakatandikire. N'ahabw'ekyo, ebiteiso byona bishemereire kushwijumwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent challenges we've faced, it's clear that we need a dedicated group to address these issues. I propose we gather some key members to discuss our next steps.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza okusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo gyebuvuddeko, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga ekibinja ekyewaddeyo okukola ku nsonga zino. Nteesa tukuŋŋaanye bammemba abakulu tukubaganye ebirowoozo ku kiddako.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo peko ma wanongo cokcok-ki, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero wabed ki gurup matye ki miti me cobo peko magi. Atye ki tam ni myero wacok lumemba mapigi tego me nywako tam i kom ngo ma omyero watim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor atiokisio nuetereikina keda oni pac, ecai cut ebe ikoto oni egurupu lo ekapakina aitemokin akiro nu. Aomit eong ebe ibusakinit oni atukun imeeban ice luepolok kanu aitemitem nu ebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amani esu o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri e'da kililiru kini ama le ongulumu azi asi 'bapi e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ma egata 'ba kini ama ma tra memba okporu 'diyi ma azi eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo amani eco 'ye drile ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma oburemeezi obu twarabiremu, nikyoreka butunu ngu nitwetenga guruupu eyekundiire kukora aha nshonga ezi. Ninteisa ngu tukore orukungano rw'abanyakibiina abakuru, kugira ngu tuhanuure aha kirikukurataho.

eng_prompt: With the advent of digital technology and online services, many bureaucratic processes have been streamlined. As a result, residents can now submit their construction plans from the comfort of their homes.
lug_prompt: Olw'okujja kwa tekinologiya wa digito n'obuweereza ku mutimbagano, enkola z'emirimu nnyingi zitereezeddwa. N'ekyavaamu, abatuuze kati basobola okuwaayo pulaani zaabwe ez'okuzimba nga bali mu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ki bedo tye pa tet manyen me intanet ki tic ki intanet, yoo me tic mapol odoko yot tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero dong twero cwalo yubgi me gedo I gangigi.
teo_prompt: Keda aitolomunio naka etatai loakwana keda elago, aponi itidisiarai ainapeta nuipu. Kanuka ngun, epedorete kwana itunga aijukar ainapeta kec nuka aduko koreriakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia ni azini geri oli aliasi 'diyi ma e'dota si, e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eco curu'do otita afa eyi sizu 'diyi fe aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okubaho kwa tekinorogye eya digito hamwe n'obuheereza aha mitimbagano, emirimo y'eby'obutegyeki ehindukire ey'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye hati nibabaasa kuheereza enteekateeka zaabo z'okwombeka omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Before any building project can commence, all stakeholders must ensure that the proposed plans meet safety and zoning regulations. Therefore, the district plays a crucial role in overseeing and approving these plans.
lug_prompt: Nga pulojekiti y'okuzimba yonna tennatandika, abakwatibwako bonna balina okukakasa nti pulaani eziteeseddwa zituukana n'ebiragiro by'obukuumi n'okugabanya ebifo. N'olw'ekyo, disitulikiti ekola omulimu omukulu mu kulondoola n'okukkiriza enteekateeka zino.
ach_prompt: Mapwod yub me gedo mo keken pe ocake, dano weng omyero gunen ni yub ma kiyubu tye malube ki cik me gwoko ber bedo. Pi meno, distrik tye ki tic mapire tek tutwal me neno ki moko yub magi.
teo_prompt: Erongo epurojekt edio lo aiduk egeuna, ekot itunga kere awanyun ebe itodolikinete ipulanin lu ekotoi ayuwara keda ainapeta nuka aiduk. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi edisitrikt keda aswam naepol noi naka aimaniman ka aitigogong ipulanin lu.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di otita azi jo sizu ni e'doni ku, le 'ba dria ma ne ra kini otita 'bani lele 'diyi ma aa azita agei tema ni azini zooni 'diyi pie. Ka'dini, distrikiti ni azi okporu nga otita 'diyi ma pamvu onezu azini yi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Purojekiti y'okwombeka etakatandikire, abu kirikukwataho boona bashemereire kureeba ngu enteekateeka yaayo ehikaana n'ebiragiro by'okwombeka. N'ahabw'ekyo, disiturikiti neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureebuuza n'okwikiriza enteekateeka ezi.

eng_prompt: Effective collaboration among various governmental entities is essential for fostering growth and progress within a community. Without a unified approach, efforts to enhance the district's infrastructure and services may falter.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana ennungi wakati w'ebitongole bya gavumenti eby'enjawulo ya mugaso mu kutumbula enkulaakulana n'enkulaakulana mu kitundu. Awatali nkola emu, kaweefube w'okutumbula ebizimbe n'obuweereza mu disitulikiti ayinza okulemererwa.
ach_prompt: Ribbe maber ikin dul mapat-pat pa gamente pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki dongo lobo I kabedo moni. Labongo yoo acel, yub me ilo malo rwom me gedo ki tic mapat-pat I district twero poto.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina najokan kiding iriongeta lu apugan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor apol keda apol kotoma atutubet. Arai emamei epone ediope, epedorete agogong naka aitojokar adukena keda aijanakino naka itunga ko disitrikt aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita kililiru amuti gameteni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru zota azini zota ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Geri ti ecita niri kokoru, okpo 'bani 'ba distrikiti ma afa ayuzaru 'diyi otuzu azini azakoma fele 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eco e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa kurungi ahagati y'ebitongore bya gavumenti ebitarikushushana n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho entunguuka n'entunguuka omu bantu. Hatariho enkora erikukwatanisa, amaani g'okutunguura ebyombeko n'obuheereza omu disiturikiti nigabaasa kuremwa.

eng_prompt: As Uganda continues to develop, it's essential to create urban environments that foster economic growth and cultural vibrancy. A model for this can be seen in Kampala, with its bustling markets and lively atmosphere.
lug_prompt: Nga Uganda egenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana, kikulu nnyo okutondawo ebibuga ebireetawo enkulaakulana mu byenfuna ne mu byobuwangwa. Ekyokulabirako ky'ekyo kisobola okulabibwa mu Kampala, n'obutale bwayo obujjudde abantu n'embeera yaayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma Uganda tye kamede ki dongo, pire tek tutwal me yubu kabedo me boma madongo ma kelo dongo lobo ki dongo tekwaro. Labol me timo man twero nenne I Kampala, ki cuk matye ki dano mapol tutwal I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi Uganda apol, ejokuna noi aitolomun aiboisio nuka itaunin nu itopoloete apol keda aijar naka inonosio. Aanyunet naka ngun epedorio awanyun ko Kampala, keda isokonin lu epuakata noi keda aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni mu drile zozu, eri orodriru angu tawuni ru 'diyi edezu angu zota e'yo robiani azini e'yo suruni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌdi ma eꞌda ndre Kampalaa, cu yini ꞌdiyi ma alia tualu angu yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Uganda ku erikugumizamu n'okutunguuka, n'eky'omugasho okutandikaho emyanya y'endembo erikureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'obuhangwa. Eky'okureeberaho ky'ekyo nikibaasa kureebeka omuri Kampala, n'obutare bwayo burimu abantu baingi kandi burimu amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In the ongoing effort to improve community engagement, local leaders are preparing to present their visions for the future. Each group aims to address the unique needs and aspirations of the residents they represent.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube agenda mu maaso okutumbula okukwatagana kw'ebitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo beetegekera okwanjula ebirooto byabwe eby'ebiseera eby'omu maaso. Buli kibiina kiruubirira okukola ku byetaago eby'enjawulo n'okwegomba kw'abatuuze be bakiikirira.
ach_prompt: I tute ma tye kawot anyim me medo rwom me tic pa lwak, lutela me tedero tye ka yubbe me nyutu tam gi pi anyim. Dul acel-acel tye ki miti me cobo miti ki miti pa lutedero ma gicung pigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na elosi akonye kanu aitojokar aineranara naka itunga, eutasi engarenok luka atutubena aitemonokin aitodiar aomisio kec nuka oingaren. Ekot ngin egurupu aitemokin ipudesia keda ipudesia luka itunga luebwoikinitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otu eyi ma egata ewu drialeri ni 'diyi e'dazu. Amuti alu alu ma asisile lezu e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube orikugyenda omu maisho, abebembezi b'ebyaro bariyo nibeteekateekyera kworeka enteekateeka yaabo ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya. Buri guruupu negyenderera kukora ahabyetaago by'omutaano n'ebigyendererwa by'abatuuragye abu erikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In a diverse organization, each department may prioritize different objectives based on their unique challenges and opportunities. As a result, the vision and strategies of individual leaders can vary significantly.
lug_prompt: Mu bitongole eby'enjawulo, buli kitongole kisobola okukulembeza ebigendererwa eby'enjawulo okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa n'emikisa gyabyo egy'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, okwolesebwa n'obukodyo bw'abakulembeze kinnoomu bisobola okwawukana ennyo.
ach_prompt: I dul mapat-pat, dul acel-acel twero bedo ki miti mapat-pat malube ki peko gi ki gum gi. Macalo adwogi ne, neno ki diro pa lutela acel acel twero bedo pat tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta luegelegela, epedori edipatiment aisingarenit alosikineta nuegelegela kotupitete atiokisio nuegelegela keda arerengesio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, epedorete aomisio keda iwaitin luka engarenok luegelegela atiakakin.
lgg_prompt: Amuti ndundu eyi ma alea, enyati alu alu eco e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye eyini ani e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma dria azini drileba eyini esu 'diyi vusi. E'yo 'disi, egata azini otuta drice'ba alu alu 'diyini 'diyi eco co esele ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bitongore ebitarikushushana, buri kitongore nikibaasa kwebembeza ebigyendererwa ebitarikushushana kurugirira ahaburemeezi n'emigisha yaakyo. N'ekyarugiremu, okworekwa n'oburyo bw'abebembezi, nibibaasa kuba nibitaana munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous reforms aimed at promoting transparency and accountability, many citizens remain disillusioned with the political system. Recent reports indicate that unethical practices are becoming more prevalent among officials.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo enkyukakyuka nnyingi eziteekeddwawo okutumbula obwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa, bannansi bangi bakyalemereddwa enkola y'ebyobufuzi. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti ebikolwa ebitali bya mpisa byeyongedde mu bakungu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni aloka-loka mapol tye ma ki keto pi kelo ada ki kor tic, pol pa dano pud cwinygi pe yom ki yub me cungu iwi-bye matye. Adwogi tic manyen nyutu ni tim maraco tye ka nya ikin lutic.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas aijulanakineta nuipu nu ekotoi aitopolorite nuka aica ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, mam itunga luipu iyalamasi keda epone loka epolitikis. Itodunitos iripotan luitetiak ebe ejai aswamisio nuarokok noi kanejaas eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojataa karakara 'bani lezu e'yo ada ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi awi asi nyoza be geri politiki ni 'diyisi. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo onzi 'diyi curu'do curu'do azi'ba eyi ma eselea tutu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho empindahinduka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okureetaho amazima n'embaririra, abatuuragye baingi tibashemerereirwe enkora y'eby'obutegyeki. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka ngu ebikorwa ebitahikire byeyongyeire omu bakungu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, numerous scandals have emerged, highlighting the pervasive issue of corruption within various sectors. As public outcry grows, officials are under increasing pressure to implement effective measures.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, emivuyo mingi gizzeewo, nga giraga ensonga y'obuli bw'enguzi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. Obwegugungo bw'abantu bwe bweyongera, abakungu beeyongera okunyigirizibwa okussa mu nkola enkola ennungi.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, bal me camcana mapol otimme, ma nyutu ni tim me camcana tye mapol tutwal I tenge mapat-pat. Kit ma lwak tye kamede ki jemo, lutic tye ka nongo lyeto me keto jami ma mite itic.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apotu imusagon luipu kotakanutu, itodunitos ecamusana loepol noi kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kwape iyata aimony naka itunga, ejaas eswamak toma ainingosit naka aitegear iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi karakara eyi efu e'yo anyamgbolo ni esele ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'ba eyini aoko e'dazu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba eyi okpo esuza ma alea eyini ani ecozu e'yo azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, hakabaho obushomankuzi bwingi, oburikworeka obushomankuzi omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. Obwimukiriro bw'abantu ku burikweyongyera, abakuru beyongyeire kugyemeserezibwa kutaho oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about food security and sustainability, the government has outlined several key initiatives. Among these priorities is the enhancement of agricultural practices to support local farmers and increase crop yields.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'emmere n'obutebenkevu, gavumenti etaddewo ebintu ebikulu ebiwerako. Mu bino ebirina okukulembezebwa kwe kutumbula enkola z'ebyobulimi okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu n'okwongera ku makungula.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko cam, gamente okatti ki yoo mapat-pat mapigi tego. I kin jami ma omyero waket cwiny I komgi obedo ilo malo rwom me pur wek okony lupur me tedero ki medo kac pa cam.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit amamus na inyamat, abu apugan kitodu ainapeta nuipu. Imoriaritos nu ebeit aisingarenit ngesi aitojokar iponesio luka akor kanu aigang akoriok luka atutubet ka aiyatakin esake.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu asi otiza be e'yo nyaka ma tambaza ma dria, gamete 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi karakara. E'yo okporu 'diyi ma eselea geri agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri azini nyaka ofuza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erikugarukamu okwerarikirira okurikweyongyera ahaby'okurya, eretsireho enteekateeka nyingi. Omuri ebi eby'okubanza n'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa b'omwihanga n'okwongyera aha buhingi n'oburiisa bw'ebihingirwe.

eng_prompt: Many healthcare professionals face significant challenges in their careers, particularly in the public sector. As a result, the compensation for public hospital doctors often falls short of expectations.
lug_prompt: Abasawo bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu mirimu gyabwe naddala mu bitongole bya gavumenti. N'ekivuddemu, okuliyirira abasawo mu malwaliro ga gavumenti emirundi egisinga tekutuukana na biteeberezebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom mapol nongo peko madit tutwalle I tenge pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, cul pa ludaktari me odi yadi pa gamente ipol kare pe bedo marom ki kit ma byek tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ipirioitin luipu luka angaleu ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma aswamukec kacut kotoma aiboisio nuka apugan. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc atacio naka imurok luka adekisia nuka apugan aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu azi eyini 'diyi ma alea, tutuni esele o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, arioti ofeza dakitari arojo gameteni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria ri ni sawa driasi ca e'yo 'bani ega 'diyi vurisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abashaho baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu mirimo yaabo, namunonga omu bitongore bya gavumenti. N'ekyarugiremu,okurihirira abashaho b'omu marwariro ga Gavumenti, tikurikwikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: Many healthcare professionals have expressed frustration over the delays in receiving their salaries. This issue has led to a growing concern about the sustainability of public healthcare services.
lug_prompt: Abasawo bangi balaze obwennyamivu olw'okulwawo okufuna emisaala gyabwe. Ensonga eno ereeseewo okweraliikirira okweyongera ku buwangaazi bw'obujjanjabi bw'olukale.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi galle me nongo mucara gi. Lok man okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom gwoko yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luipu luka angaleu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aiyap adumun eropitikec. Eyangau akirot ngin aiyalongong naepol noi kanu aijar naka amukian naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni karakara eyi ece candi eyini sa'wa eza eyini eyi ma musara esuzu risi. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza tupi e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi o'biyini 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abashaho baingi boorekire okwetomboitwa ahabw'okukyerererwa kutunga emishara yaabo. Enshonga egi ereesireho okwerarikirira ahabw'obuheereza bw'ebyamagara.

eng_prompt: After enduring months of lockdowns and health crises, society is slowly beginning to heal. As vaccination rates rise and restrictions ease, communities are finding ways to reconnect and rebuild.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugumira emyezi gy'omuggalo n'ebizibu by'ebyobulamu, abantu batandise okuwona mpola. Ng'omuwendo gw'okugema gweyongera n'obukwakkulizo bukendeera, ebitundu binnoonya engeri y'okuddamu okukwatagana n'okuddamu okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko dwe mapol me loro piny ki peko me yot kom, lwak tye ka cango mot mot. I kare ma rwom me gwero dano tye ka medde ki juku tic pa gamente, lwak tye ka nongo yoo me kube ki gedo kabedo gi odoco.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angirikin ilapio luka agolokinio naka akwap keda atiokisio nuka angaleu, egeunos itunga angaleun motimot. Kwape iyata adoketait naka aikis ekato ka aitapatan ikisila, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu arucokina ka aiduk bobo.
lgg_prompt: Mba angu ti opiza ni azini e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma ti ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi e'do atita esu e'yere. Ongmbo aro soza niri ni tuzu azini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi atrizu ri ni ecazu ewakokoru risi, ongulumu eyi geri nda eyi ecizu dika eyi sizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara ameezi mingi omu mukingo hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara, abantu batandikire kukira mpora mpora. Nk'oku emihendo y'okugyema erikweyongyera kandi n'ebiragiro bikakyendeera, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okugaruka kukwatanisa n'okugaruka kwombeka.

eng_prompt: In the face of countless challenges, healthcare professionals dedicate their lives to caring for others. Their commitment to patient well-being is evident in every aspect of their work.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okungi, abasawo bawaayo obulamu bwabwe okulabirira abalala. Obumalirivu bwabwe eri obulamu bw'abalwadde bweyolekera mu buli kimu kye bakola.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko mapol tutwal, lutic yoto kom giketo kwogi me konyo jo mukene. Cwiny gi me miyo kony ki lutwo nen I jami weng ma gitimo.
teo_prompt: Kojautene lo atiokisio nuipu, einanakinete ipirioitin luka angaleu aijarakec kanu aidar luce. Ainakina kec mama ejaasi adekak ewanyunitai kotoma aswamukec kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tre 'diyi ma drilea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi eyi ma edri 'ba asi asi 'bazu 'ba azi 'diyi ma tambazu. Eyi ma ava 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri e'da eyi ma azi eyi ma eselea dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bwingi, abashaho nibaheereza amagara gaabo kureeberera abandi. Okwehayo kwabo aha magara g'abarwaire, nikyerekwa omu mirimo yaabo yoona.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have uncovered suspicious financial activities within various departments. As a result, concerns have been raised about the integrity of government funds.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko awo kuzudde ebikolwa by'ensimbi ebiteeberezebwa mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bwesimbu bw'ensimbi za gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyutu ni dul mapat-pat tye katic ki cente i yoo ma pe atir. Macalo adwogi ne, lworo tye I kom ber pa lim pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac apotu odumutu aswamisinei nu eomitai ebe ejaas toma oriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ejai aiyalongong kanuikamunitos aiyuwara naka apiyai nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi esu e'yo robia ni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi enyati ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'bi asi otiza e'da geri gameteni robia ayuzu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho, kushangire emirimo y'esente etarikwetegyerezibwa omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha sente za gavumenti.

eng_prompt: Ensuring that employees feel valued and secure in their financial situation is crucial for maintaining high morale. Timely compensation plays a significant role in fostering a productive work environment.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti abakozi bawulira nga ba muwendo era nga balina obukuumi mu mbeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma empisa ennungi. Okuliyirira mu budde kikola kinene nnyo mu kutumbula embeera y'emirimu ennungi.
ach_prompt: Neno ni lutic giwinyo ni pigi tek dok gi tye agwoka I lok me limgi pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo pa lutic. Culu dano ikare ki kome obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me weko tic owoto maber.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe ewomitos eswamak ebe ejokuka ido eyuwara kotoma ojautene kec loka ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar iponesio luka eswamak. Ainanakin ikapun kotoma apak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor eswamae loejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa azi'ba eyini aa'zu orodriru azini aa'zu ageitema be geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru aa'zu 'ba eyini aa'zu muke ri ma tambazu. Robia ofeza sa'wa dria ri eri orodriru angu azi ngazu orodriru ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abakozi bahurira baine omugasho kandi baine oburinzi omu by'entaasya, n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuguma baine emicwe mirungi. Okushumbuusibwa omu bwire nikiyamba munonga omukureetaho emirimo mirungi.

eng_prompt: Labor laws protect workers' rights and ensure fair compensation for their efforts. When employers fail to meet their payment obligations, employees have the option to take collective action.
lug_prompt: Amateeka g'abakozi gakuuma eddembe ly'abakozi n'okukakasa okuliyirirwa mu bwenkanya olw'okufuba kwabwe. Abakozesa bwe balemererwa okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo byabwe eby'okusasula, abakozi balina eky'okusalawo okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Cik ma doro tic gwoko twero pa lutic dok neno ni kiculu gi maber pi tic gi. Ka wegi tic okwero culu mucara gi, lutic tye ki yoo me culu mucara gi.
teo_prompt: Eyuwaritos ikisila luka eswamak apedorosio nuka eswamak ka aitac kes ejok kanu aswam kec. Arai ipiko ikulepek aswam aitodolikin aitac kec, ejaas eswamak keda aseunet naka aswam nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Azita azi'ba eyini 'diyi azi'ba eyi ma drilemgbo ma ta mba dika eyi ma arioti ofe kililiru. ꞋBa azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ka eꞌde yi vile eꞌyo ꞌbani yi ofezu ꞌdiyi ꞌye ku, ꞌba azi feꞌba ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo ꞌye yi ma eselea ꞌi.
nyn_prompt: Ebiragiro by'abakozi nibirinda obugabe bw'abakozi kandi nibyoreka ngu nibashumbuusibwa kurungi ahabw'amaani gaabo. Abakozesa ku baremirwe kushashura abakozi baabo, abakozi baine eky'okukora kukorera hamwe.

eng_prompt: In many organizations, payroll schedules can vary based on different departments or roles. This flexibility allows for better cash flow management and accommodates varying payment cycles.
lug_prompt: Mu bitongole bingi, enteekateeka y'omusaala eyinza okwawukana okusinziira ku bitongole oba emirimu egy'enjawulo. Enkyukakyuka eno esobozesa enzirukanya y'ensimbi ennungi n'okusasula emirundi egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I dul mapat-pat, yub me culu mucara twero bedo pat-pat malubbe ki dul mapat-pat onyo tic mapat-pat. Aloka-loka man weko tic ki cente bedo yot dok bene weko ki culu cente I yoo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta nuipu, epedorete ainapeta nuka aitac aiboisio nuegelegela arai bo aswamisinei nuegelegela. Ecamakinit aijulanakineta ngun eyaitene loajokan loka ikapun ido epedori aitac ikapun kotoma apakio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi ma alea, sa'wa 'bani musara ofezu ri eco aa ndundu arakala eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'di ni fe geri robia ayuzuri ma tambazu kililiru dika eri vini geri 'bani robia ofezu 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bitongore ebingi, enteekateeka y'okushashura neebaasa kuba etarikushushana kurugirira aha bitongore ebitarikushushana. Enkora egi neebaasisa okukoresa kurungi esente n'okushashura ebintu omu bwire butari bumwe na bumwe.

eng_prompt: Having a reliable source of income is essential for managing your finances effectively. One practical step to ensure financial stability is to open a bank account.
lug_prompt: Okubeera n'ensibuko y'ensimbi eyeesigika kya mugaso mu kuddukanya obulungi ensimbi zo. Omutendera ogumu ogw'obwenkanya mu by'ensimbi kwe kuggulawo akawunti mu bbanka.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki yoo me nongo cente ma genne pire tek tutwal me doro cente ni maber. Yo acel maber me bedo ki lim maber obedo yabo account I beng.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda ewai lo eyuara lo edumununet ikapun ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ikapun kon ejok. Epone ediope loajokan loka aanyun ebe iyuwara ikapun erai apukor aingadis naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu geri robia esuzu kililiru be ri be ri eri orodriru mini ecozu mi ma robia ayuzu kililiru beni. E'yo azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ta mbazuri eri akawunti ero robia ta mbazuri ma ti zizu.
nyn_prompt: Okugira oburugo bw'esente oburikwesigwa n'obw'omugasho omu kukoresa gye esente zaawe. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kureetaho obutebekana omu by'empiiha n'okwigura akawunti omu banka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local economies and ensure essential services are maintained, the government allocates funds to various municipalities. This financial assistance is crucial for enabling councils to meet their operational needs.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba ebyenfuna by'ekitundu n'okulaba ng'obuweereza obw'omugaso buyimiridde, gavumenti egaba ensimbi mu munisipaali ez'enjawulo. Obuyambi buno obw'ensimbi bukulu nnyo mu kusobozesa akakiiko okutuukiriza ebyetaago byaako.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor tic me lim ki gwoko jami ma mite pi kwo pa lwak, gamente miyo cente bot municipalities mapat-pat. Kony me lim man pire tek tutwal pi konyo kancil me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aigangia ikapun luka atutubet ka awanyun ebe eyuwara aijanakino na aijar, ijanakini apugan ikapun mama ejaasi imeunisipaliti luegelegela. Erai agangat na naka ikapun naepol noi kanu aingarakin ikansilan aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo robiani angu ma alia 'diyi atizu azini nezu ra kini azi orodriru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia, gamete ni robia fe munisipaliti ndundu yi dri. Azakoma robia ni 'diri orodriru council eyini ecozu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera eby'entaasya y'ekyaro n'okureeba ngu obuheereza obw'omugasho nibubaho, gavumenti neegaba esente omu za munisiparite ezitarikushushana. Obuhwezi obu obw'esente n'obw'omugasho munonga omu kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'obukiiko.

eng_prompt: In response to the unprecedented challenges posed by the pandemic, healthcare workers faced immense pressure and long hours. To acknowledge their dedication and sacrifices, many hospitals and healthcare facilities decided to raise their salaries.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi, abasawo baayolekaganye n'obunkenke obw'amaanyi n'essaawa empanvu. Okusiima okwewaayo kwabwe n'okwefiiriza, amalwaliro mangi n'ebitongole by'ebyobulamu byasalawo okwongeza emisaala gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma two korona okelo, lutic yoto kom gubedo ki lyeto madit tutwal ki tic pi cawa malac. Me nyuto pwoc pi tic matek ma gutimo, odi yadi mapol gumedo mucara gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuelomunitos kanuka adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu odumutu aiyalongong naepol noi keda isawan luipu. Kanu aisiyalamikin aswamukec keda aijarakec, apotu adekisia nuipu kiyatakisi eropitikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni ejile 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu e'yo okporu azini sawa ezu 'diyi. E'yo eyini eyi owizu azini eyini eyi owizu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu, arojo karakara eyi 'du eyi ma musara otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obw'omutaano obureesirweho endwara ruranda nsi, abashaho bakashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani n'obwire bureingwa. Ahabw'okusiima okwehayo kwabo n'okwefeerereza kwabo, amarwariro maingi gakasharamu kwongyera emishaara yaabo.

eng_prompt: In any collaborative environment, it's essential to establish clear expectations and responsibilities. When tasks are completed, it becomes crucial to assess performance and ensure that everyone is held accountable for their contributions.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna ey'okukolagana, kya mugaso okuteekawo ebisuubirwa n'obuvunaanyizibwa ebitegeerekeka obulungi. Emirimu bwe gimala, kifuuka kikulu okwekenneenya enkola n'okulaba nga buli omu avunaanibwa ku bye yakola.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken me winye, pire tek tutwal me keto gen ki tic matye. Ka tic otum, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma tic tye katime kwede ki neno ni dano weng tye ka timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kowai kalo aiswamanara, ejokuna aitolomun nu ekoto ijo keda nu ebeit aswam. Arai engetakina aswamisio, erai ibore yenepol noi airereor eswamae ka awanyun ebe itunga kere itodunitos nu iswamatos kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria ti icita ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria azini azi eyi ma dria 'diyi 'bazu kililiru. Azi ka de 'bo, eri eca orodriru e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu ani nezu ra kini 'ba dria ni e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kukwatanisa kwona, n'eky'omugasho okutaho ebirikuteekateekwaho n'obujunaanizibwa. Emirimo ku erikuhwa, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho kushwijuma emikorere n'okureeba ngu buri omwe naajunanizibwa aha mirimo ye.

eng_prompt: In response to rising health concerns, officials have recognized the need for increased public awareness. As a result, they have implemented initiatives aimed at informing citizens about prevalent health issues.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera, abakungu bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'okwongera okumanyisa abantu. N'ekivuddemu, bataddewo enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutegeeza bannansi ku bizibu by'ebyobulamu ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede, lutic guniang ni omyero ki med rweyo lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, guketo yub me miyo ngec bot lwak i kom peko me yot kom matye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu, ejenete eswamak eipud loka aisisianakin itunga. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu kesi iwaitin lu isisianakinete itunga nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi tutu 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma fe o'bi eyini imbata ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye eyini ani kari anzi eyini imbata fezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'amagara, abakuru nibamanya ngu abantu bashemereire kweyongyera kwegyesibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, batandikireho enteekateeka y'okumanyisa abantu ebikwatiraine n'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the popularity of alternative transportation methods has surged in Uganda. As a result, many residents have turned to motorcycles for their daily commuting needs.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obuganzi bw'entambula endala bweyongedde mu Uganda. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi baddukidde ku pikipiki olw'ebyetaago byabwe eby'okutambula buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, rwom me tic ki yoo me wot mukene omede tutwal I lobo Uganda. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol gucako tic ki piki-piki me cobo miti gi me wot nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi eipone lo alosit ko Uganda. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu olototo ipikipikin kanu alosit aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alia, geri acizu ndu ndu 'diyi ma ongmbo tu kari Uganda niri ma alea tutu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi oja eyi pikipiki eyi ma dria eyini acizu eyivile o'du driasi 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, abantu beeyongyeire kukoresa emiringo endiijo y'engyenda omu Uganda. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi bahindukire bakakoresa pikipiki omu by'engyenda zaabo eza buriizooba.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve safety and reduce accidents, new regulations have been implemented for motorcycle usage. These guidelines emphasize the importance of limiting the number of passengers on motorcycles.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukuumi n'okukendeeza ku bubenje, amateeka amapya gateekeddwawo ku nkozesa ya ppikipiki. Ebiragiro bino bikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukomya omuwendo gw'abasaabaze ku pikipiki.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me gwoko kuc ki dwoko piny rwom me peko me gudi, kiketo cik manyen I tic I kom tic ki piki piki. Cik magi nyutu ber pa gengo wel luwot I piki-piki.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara ka aitidisiar akangasia, aponi ibwaikinai ikisila luitetiak kanu aitwasam ipikipikin. Isinyikokitos aicoreta ngun ajokis naka aitidisiar enaba lo itunga luejaasi toma opikipikin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ageitema ma omgbo otuzu azini drileonzi eyi ma omgbo esizu, 'ba e'do azita o'diru eyi pikipiki eyi ma ayuza ma dria. Azita 'diyi okpo fe orodri 'bani 'ba eyi ma kalafe ombezu pikipiki eyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'okwerinda n'okukyendeeza butandu, ebiragiro bisya bitandikirweho aha kukoresa pikipiki. Ebiragiro ebi nibyoreka omugasho gw'okukyendeeza omuhendo gw'abantu abari aha pikipiki.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been building for weeks over unresolved grievances among the workers. It only took one minor incident to ignite their frustrations.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bumaze wiiki eziwera nga bweyongera olw'okwemulugunya okutannagonjoolwa mu bakozi. Kyabadde kyetaagisa akabenje akatono okukuma omuliro mu mitima gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye pi cabit mapol pi koko ma pe kicobo ikin lutic. Obedo gin acel matidi keken ma okelo cwer cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu kanu engunget lo mam itemokitai kiding eswamak. Apotu iboro luikidioko luapotu kiswamata kanu aitolitol aiyalongongokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ebi tu sabiti eyi ma alea e'yo azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ku 'diyisi. Eri 'du lu e'yo azi werea ni eyi ma asi ezaza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi ahabw'okwetomboitwa okutarikushobororwa omu bakozi. Kikaba nikyetengyesa ekintu kimwe kikye kureetaho okwerarikirira kwabo.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, various branches of government and elected officials play crucial roles in shaping policies. Additionally, local leaders and community representatives contribute to the decision-making process that affects citizens' lives.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, amatabi ga gavumenti ag'enjawulo n'abakungu abalonde bakola emirimu emikulu mu kukola enkola. Okwongerako, abakulembeze b'ebitundu n'abakiise b'ebitundu bayambako mu kukola okusalawo okukosa obulamu bwa bannansi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, jang gamente mapat-pat ki lutic ma kiyero gi gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal I yubu cik. Medo i kom meno, lutela me tedero kacel ki lucungu pi lwak gi konyo ikare me moko tam ma gudo kwo pa anywali.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka aseo, iriongeta lu apugan luegelegela keda eswamak lu eseunitai iswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ainapeta. Kilema, engarenok keda abwoikinitok luka atutubet ingarakinete aitolomunun aseununeta nuetiroritos aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia niri ma alea, arakala gameteni ndundu 'diyi tualu azi'ba ope'ba 'diyi pie azi okporu nga e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma edeta ma alea. Azi dika, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tualu 'ba pa tupi ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie e'yo peta pezu kari anzi eyi ma edri eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, ebitongore bya gavumenti ebitarikushushana hamwe n'abantu abaronzirwe nibakora emirimo y'amaani omu kukora ebiragiro. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, abeebembezi b'ebyaro hamwe n'abajwekyerwa b'abantu b'omubyaro, nibahwera omu kukora encwamu erikukwata aha magara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant increase in the number of young people obtaining driver's licenses. This trend reflects a growing independence and mobility among the younger generation.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abavubuka abafuna pamiti z'okuvuga ebidduka. Enkola eno eraga okwefuga n'okutambula mu mulembe omuto ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel bulu ma tye ka nongo license me dwoyo mutoka omede tutwal. Man nyutu ni anyira matino tye ka nongo kero me timo jami weng ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakin enaaba loka atumunak lu edumunenete alasisi naka airenge. Itodunit aswamisioit na apol naka aipugaikin bon keda alosit kanejaas atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kalafe 'ba ode yini kokobi mutukari ti ojizu 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'di ece e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ma driwala azini acita ma omgbo ni tuzu tu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, omuhendo gw'eminyeeto erikutunga pamiti z'okuvuga emotoka gweyongyeire. Enkora egi neeyoreka okweyongyera kw'okwetegyeka n'okutambura kw'eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster greater community engagement, the government has opened channels for citizen participation. This initiative aims to encourage collaboration between officials and residents on various issues affecting the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okwetaba kw'abantu, gavumenti egguddewo emikutu gy'okwetabamu kw'abatuuze. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okukubiriza enkolagana wakati w'abakungu n'abatuuze ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ezikwata ku kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me medo rwom me ribbe pa lwak, gamente oyabo yoo mapat-pat pi anywali me bedo tye. Yub man tye me cuku cwiny winye ikin lutic ki lutedero I kom lok mapat-pat matye ka yelo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma aswamisio, apugan apuko iponesio luka itunga ajaut toma aswamisio. Alosikinet na erai aisinyikokit eswamak keda itunga aiswamanara kanu akiro nuegelegela nuetiroritos itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete zi geri kari anzi eyini fizu e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ti ra. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu ti ecita 'ba azi nga'baa 'diyi ma eselea 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri otuzu e'yo ndundu ongulumu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okwetabamu kw'abantu baingi,gavumenti egwireho oburyo bw'okureetaho okwetabamu kw'abantu. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureetaho okukwatanisa ahagati y'abakungu n'abatuuragye aha nshonga nyingi ezirikuteganisa abantu.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to spread, public health officials are urging citizens to follow safety guidelines. In response to the escalating crisis, the government implements various measures to safeguard the health of its population.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okusaasaana, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza bannansi okugoberera ebiragiro by'obukuumi. Mu kwanukula ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera, gavumenti ekozesa enkola ez'enjawulo okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu baayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona tye kamede ki nya, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego lwak me lubu cik ma kwako gwoko kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, gamente tye katic ki yoo mapat-pat me gwoko yot-kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini adeka aisiarakin, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga aitup aicoreta nuka ayuwara. Kanu aitemokin ationis na iyata, ejai apugan iboro lu eyuaritos kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga ke.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ma ereta ni mu drile, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi kari anzi eyi ai azita e'yo eyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma vuti obizu. E'yo ewaru ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete ni geri ndundu eyi 'du e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma rua ala ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku burikugumizamu kujanjaara, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu kukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda. Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, gavumenti neekora emiringo mingi okurinda amagara g'abantu baayo.

eng_prompt: As the COVID-19 pandemic swept across the globe, many countries implemented strict lockdown measures to curb the spread of the virus. These measures had significant economic repercussions, particularly in developing nations like Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe bwe kyakwata ensi yonna, ensi nnyingi zaateekawo omuggalo okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Ebintu bino byakosa nnyo eby'enfuna naddala mu nsi ezikyakula nga Uganda.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona opoto I wilobo lung, lobe mapol guloro piny matek tutwal me gengo nya pa two eni. Yub eni okelo adwoki marac tutwal I kom lim ki biacara, tutwalle I lobe matye ka dongo calo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Neautar adeka naka COVID-19 aisiarakin akwap kere, apotu akwapin nuipu kogolokisi akwap kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona. Apotu iboro lu itolitoli akiro nuka ikapun kacut akwapin nuepolok kwape nat Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo COVID-19 niri ni i erezu wudrikuru ma alea risi, kari karakara eyi 'ba angu ti opiza okporu 'diyi azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. E'yo 'diyi 'ye onzi e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria tuni kari zopi zopi zopi 'diyi ma alia ekile Uganda le 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa COVID-19 ku bwabaire nibujanjaara ensi yoona, amahanga maingi gakataho emihingo y'amaani, okubaasa kuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko. Ebiragiro ebi bikakora kihango omu by'entaasya, namunonga omu mahanga agarikutunguuka nka Uganda.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect millions worldwide, people are growing increasingly anxious about the availability of a safe and effective solution. Many are eagerly awaiting updates from health officials and researchers regarding the timeline for a coronavirus vaccine.
lug_prompt: Nga ekirwadde kikyagenda mu maaso okukosa obukadde n'obukadde mu nsi yonna, abantu beeyongera okweraliikirira ku kubeerawo kw'ekigonjoola eky'obukuumi era ekikola. Bangi balindirira n'obwagazi amawulire okuva mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu n'abanoonyereza ku bikwata ku biseera eby'okugema akawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa dano milion mapol I wilobo lung, dano tye ka mede ki lworo I kom nongo yoo me cobo peko ma peke ki peko. Dano mapol gitye ka kuro ngec manyen ki bot ludito me yotkom kacel ki lukwed I kom kare me nongo yat agwera me two korona.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aimusung imilionin luka itunga kotoma akwap kere, ekuriaka itunga noi kanuikamunitos adumunet naka epone loepedoriata kesi aitemokin. Eutasi itunga luipu aidar akiro nuitetiak kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu keda angicak nuikamunitos apak naka adumun ekato loka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile e'yo 'yezu 'ba milioni wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ma dria, 'ba eyi asi otiza be e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo nde ma aza kozu kililiru azini kililiru ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi te asi driasi o'dukoti engazu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi vu azini 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi vu sa'wa 'bani aro azo korona niri atrizu ri esuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa obukaikuru bw'abantu omunsi yoona, abantu beyongyeire okwerarikirira ahabw'okugira ngu hariho oburyo burungi kandi burungi. Abantu baingi bategyereize amakuru kuruga omu bakuru b'ebyamagara hamwe n'abakyondoozi, ebirikukwata aha bwire bw'okutunga omubazi gw'okugyema akakooko ka korona.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, it has become increasingly clear that our current measures are insufficient. To effectively combat this ongoing crisis, we must reevaluate our strategies and implement more robust guidelines.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola zaffe eziriwo kati tezimala. Okusobola okulwanyisa obulungi ekizibu kino ekigenda mu maaso, tulina okuddamu okwetegereza enkola zaffe n'okussa mu nkola ebiragiro ebinywevu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo ma watye kwede kombedi pe tye ma oromo. Me lweny maber I kom peko man matye kawot anyim, omyero wanen yoo ma watye kwede ki keto cik matego I tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, ejenuna noi ebe mam iwaitin lu itwasamao kwape kwana edolitos. Kanu aitiji ationis na, ekot oni airereor iwaitin wok kosodete aitegear ainapeta nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyiniri ni mu drile tu, e'da curu'do e'yo amani 'ye sawa 'disi 'diyi cani ku. A'di 'dizu e'yo ewaru 'di be kililiru, le ama ma one geri amani azi ngazu 'diyi dika ama ma 'ba azita okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu enkora eriho obwahati terikumara. Okubaasa kurwanisa kurungi oburemeezi obu oburiyo nibubaho, twine kushwijuma oburyo bwaitu n'okuta omu nkora ebiragiro by'amaani.

eng_prompt: Even the most carefully laid plans can be disrupted by unforeseen circumstances. It's important to remember that even minor details can have significant consequences.
lug_prompt: N'enteekateeka ezikolebwa n'obwegendereza zisobola okutaataaganyizibwa olw'embeera etasuubirwa. Kikulu okujjukira nti n'obuntu obutono buyinza okuba n'ebikulu ebivaamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi pulan ma kiyubu maber loyo weng twero poto atura. Pire tek me poo ni jami matino tino bene twero kelo adwogi marac.
teo_prompt: Karaida itemonokino ejok aitemonokineta epedori aitolitol kanuka iboro lumam iwomit ijo. Erai ibore yenepol noi aiitun ebe akiro nu ikidioko epedorete aitodolikin nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Ata otita 'bani oti kililiru tu 'diyi eco e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi eza ra. Eri orodriru egazu kini e'yo werea 'diyi eco vini e'yo onzi 'ye ra.

eng_prompt: Our family gatherings are always lively and full of energy. It's amazing how our family tree has grown over the years.

teo_prompt: Atukonawok nuka ekale etapit duc aiyalama ido eleleba keda agogongu. Erai ibore yenitegelikina epone loepolor ekosi ekale kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile okuta familia eyini 'diyi sa'wa driasi aa ayikosi azini okpo be tre. Eri osutaru geri familia amavile 'diyiniri zozu eli agapi 'bo 'diyisi.

eng_prompt: I've been thinking about how music can really shape our moods and experiences. I'm curious to know your preferences when it comes to different genres.
lug_prompt: Mbadde ndowooza ku ngeri ennyimba gye ziyinza okukyusaamu embeera zaffe n'ebyo bye tuyitamu. Njagala okumanya by'oyagala bwe kituuka ku mirimu egy'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: Everyone has someone they look up to for inspiration and guidance in their life. I'm curious to know, who inspires you the most?
lug_prompt: Buli omu alina omuntu gw'atunuulira okufuna okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi mu bulamu bwe.

Amaizi ku garikutandika kugwa, nikyoreka butunu ngu embeera y'obwire eri haihi kuhinduka munonga.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership requires a deep understanding of the needs and aspirations of those you lead. It is not merely a position of power, but a chance to make a meaningful impact in the lives of others.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwetaagisa okutegeera ebyetaago n'ebiruubirirwa by'abo be bakulembera. Si kifo kya buyinza kyokka, wabula n'omukisa okukyusa obulamu bw'abalala.
ach_prompt: Tela maber mito niang maber tutwal I kom miti ki miti pa jo ma itelo gi. Pe obedo kabedo me twero keken, ento obedo kare me kelo alokaloka I kwo pa dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan ekoto amisiikin iboro keda ipudesia luka ngul luingarenikinit ijo. Mam erai aiboisit na apugan bon, konye erai arereng naka aitodolikin aijar naka luce.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri le mi ma va e'yo 'ba mini dricezu 'diyi ma afa lele 'diyi ma dria. Eri ovuni lu pari okpo ni ku, te drileba azi ngazu orodriru idri 'ba azi 'diyiniri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okwetegyereza kurungi ebyetengo n'ebigyendererwa by'abo abu orikwebembera. Ti nk'omwanya gw'obushoborozi, kureka n'omugisha gw'okukora kihango omu magara g'abandi.

eng_prompt: After months of fundraising and community support, the church members gathered to discuss their next project. They decided it was time to invest in a reliable vehicle to aid their outreach efforts.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okusonda ssente n'obuyambi okuva mu kitundu, bammemba b'ekkanisa baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulojekiti yaabwe eddako. Baasazeewo nti kye kiseera okusiga ensimbi mu mmotoka eyeesigika okuyambako mu kaweefube waabwe ow'okubunyisa amawulire.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me jogo cente ki miyo kony ki lwak, lumemba me kanica gugure me nywako lok I kom yub gi mukene. Gumoko ni kare dong oromo me keto cente I kom motoka ma genne me konyo tic gi me rweyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aituk ikapun keda agangat naka itunga, apotu imeban luka ekanisa kiriamunos kanu aitemitem epurojektikec lo etupakini. Apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai kwana apak naka aipikakin ikapunukec toma amotoka naejok kanu aingarakin kesi aitodolikin akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani robia trazu azini atita ongulumu eyini fezu 'bori ma vutia, memba kanisa ni 'diyi tra eyi e'yo onzezu otita eyini emupi 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo robia 'bazu mutukari asi'baza be 'diyi ma alea eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okurundaana esente n'obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu, abany'ekanisa bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha purogyekiti yaabo erikukurataho. Bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okuta esente omu motooka erikwesigwa, okubaasa kuhwera omu kukora emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and careful consideration, the company finally decided to invest in a new vehicle for their expanding logistics operations. The lorry was bought at two hundred eighty-five million shillings.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteesa n'okulowooza ennyo, kkampuni yasalawo okussa ssente mu mmotoka empya okusobola okugaziya emirimu gyayo egy'okutambuza ebintu. Loole yaguliddwa ku bukadde bwa siringi bibiri kinaana mu butaano.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki tam matut, dul ne dong omoko tamgi me wilo mutoka manyen pi dongo tic gi. Kiwilo lorry ne ciling milyon miya aryo ki pyer aboro wiye abic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda aomoom ejok, abu ekampuni koseu agwel amotoka naitetet kanu aitanyanyar aswamukec. Aponi kogwelai elore ngol imilionin akwatarei akaisakanyauni ikany.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini e'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da asizu asi 'du e'yo sende 'bazu mutukari o'dini ma alia e'yo afa ozizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ba je lorri nderi silingi milioni turu iri kali aro drini towi si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuteesa n'okuteekateeka kurungi, kampuni ekacwamu kugura emotoka nsya y'okwongyera aha mirimo yaabo. Roore ekagurwa obukaikuru magana abiri kinaana na butaano.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support the community and create job opportunities, the church is exploring new initiatives. One of these initiatives involves offering hiring services to local businesses and individuals.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba ekitundu n'okutondawo emirimu, ekkanisa enoonyereza ku bintu ebipya. Emu ku nteekateeka zino ezingiramu okuwa obuweereza bw'okupangisa eri abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu n'abantu ssekinnoomu.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo lwak ki cako tic, kanica tye ka yenyo yoo manyen. Acel me kin yub magi obedo miyo tic me pango odi bot lutim biacara ki dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang itunga keda aitolomun aswamisinei, euta ekanisa aingic iboro luitetiak. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio nu imoriaritos aipagis itunga keda ibiasaran luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu ma aza kozu azini drileba azi fezu 'diyi e'dozu, kanisa ni e'yo o'diru 'diyi onda. E'yo azi alu 'diyi ma azi lezu 'ba tujari 'yepi ogogo 'diyi dri azini 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi dri azi pangisa ni 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu n'okutandikaho emirimo, ekanisa eriyo nekora enteekateeka nsya. Emwe aha nteekateeka ezi neetwariramu okupangisa eby'obushubuzi n'abantu buntu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges faced by the church, community members recognized the importance of supporting their spiritual leaders. As a result, they organized a gathering to discuss how best to assist the clergy during this difficult time.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa ekkanisa kweyolekaganye nakwo gyebuvuddeko, abantu b'ekitundu bakitegedde obukulu bw'okuwagira abakulembeze baabwe ab'omwoyo. N'ekyavaamu, baategeka olukungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okuyambamu bannaddiini mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma kanica onongo cokcok-ki, lwak guneno ber pa cwako lutela gi. Macalo adwogi ne, guyubu kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit me konyo lutela dini I kare man matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda ekanisa pac, apotu itunga luka atutubet kojenutu ajokis naka aigang engarenok kec luka edini. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi kitemokisi airiamunet kanu aitemitem eipone lo ebeitor aingarakin imakio luka ekanisa kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kanisa ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu orodri atita fezu drice'ba eyivile 'diyi dri ri ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi otu mitingi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu atita fezu padere eyini sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu ekanisa etungire, abantu b'omukyanga bakareeba omugasho gw'okushagika abebembezi baabo b'eby'omwoyo. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okuhanuura oku barikubaasa kuhwera abeebembezi b'ediini omu bwire obu bugumire.

eng_prompt: The company has recently acquired a new lorry to expand its operations. This vehicle will play a crucial role in enhancing our logistics capabilities.
lug_prompt: Kampuni yaakafuna loole empya okugaziya emirimu gyayo. Emmotoka eno ejja kukola omulimu munene mu kutumbula obusobozi bwaffe obw'okutambuza ebintu.
ach_prompt: Kampuni onongo lorry manyen cokcok-ki me medo ticgi. Motoka man bikonyo tutwal I ilo malo rwom me jami ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Adumu ekampuni ngol elore loitetet kanu aitanyanyar aswamukec. Ebuni emotoka lo aitolot aswam naepol noi kanu aikeuna iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da esu curu'do lorri o'dini azi erini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Mutukari 'di ni nga azi okporu nga e'yo amani eco 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni etungire roore nsya, okubaasa kwongyera aha mirimo yaayo. Emotoka egi neija kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'entambura.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline operations and allocate resources more effectively, church leaders have been reviewing the budget for the upcoming fiscal year. As a result, they have decided to implement cost-cutting measures in various areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza emirimu n'okugabanya obulungi eby'obugagga, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa babadde beetegereza embalirira y'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. N'ekivuddemu, basazeewo okussaawo enkola z'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lutela me kanica gubedo ka ngiyo byek me lim pi mwaka me lim matye kabino. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tam gi me dwoko piny wel cente ma mite I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitapatan aswam ka aikor iboro ejok, eutasi engarenok lu ekanisa airereor ebajet loka ekaru loka ikapun lo ebunit. Kanuka ngun, aseutu kesi aitwasam iwaitin lu aitidisiar etiai loka ikapun kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azi ngazu kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu kililiru, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ebi otita aje robia ni eli robiani emupi ri ma ale andri. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'du e'yo 'yeta aje ma omgbo esizu 'diyi 'yezu angu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'ekanisa babaire nibashwijuma embaririra y'omwaka gw'eby'esente ogurikwija. N'ekyarugiremu, bashaziremu kutaho oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza omu myanya etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to diversify its revenue streams and support community initiatives, the diocese has been exploring new opportunities. Recently, discussions have led to the decision to venture into business activities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugaziya ensibuko z'ensimbi n'okuwagira enteekateeka z'ekitundu, obulabirizi bubadde bunoonyereza ku mikisa emipya. Gye buvuddeko, okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuleetedde okusalawo okwenyigira mu byobusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Diocese obedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo cente ma en nongo ki me miyo kony bot lwak. Cocoki, nywako lok okelo moko tam me donyo I biacara.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aiyatakin aiboisio nuka ikapun keda aigangite nuka atutubet, euta edaiosis aingic arerengesio nuitetiak. Apakio nu, apotu ipegeta koyangautu aseunet naka alomar toma aswamisinei nuka agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu geri erini robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria, dayasesi ebi geri o'diru 'diyi onda. O'du 'diyi ma alia, e'yo onzeza fe 'bani asi 'duzu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura esente zaayo n'okushagika enteekateeka z'ekyanga, obureeberezi butwire nibucondooza aha migisha misya. Obwahati, okuhanuura kurugiremu okusharamu kwejumba omu mirimo y'eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: After facing numerous challenges with their aging fleet, the church leaders convened to discuss potential solutions for their transport problems. They recognized that reliable transportation was essential for their outreach programs and community services.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusanga okusoomoozebwa kungi n'abantu baabwe abakaddiye, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ebizibu by'entambula. Baakitegeera nti entambula eyeesigika yali ya mugaso nnyo mu nteekateeka zaabwe ez'okubunyisa amawulire n'obuweereza mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo peko mapol ki mutoka gi ma otii, lutela me kanica gubedo ka lok i kom yoo me tyeko peko me wot gi. Gu niang ni wot maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi yub gi me konyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumunun atiokisio nuipu nuikamunitos amotokan kec nuemojongito, apotu engarenok lu ekanisa iriamunos kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu elose. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe ejokuna noi elose loajokan kanu aitodolikin ainapeta kec ka aijanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara yini dri fuzu yi vile mutukari eli be 'diyi be 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi tra yi e'yo nzezu e'yo ecopi e'yo ewaru yini acizu 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu ra kini acita kililiru ri eri orodriru otita eyini 'diyi ma alea azini azakoma ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga oburemeezi bwingi ahabw'abantu baabo abakuzire, abeebembezi b'ekanisa bakashutama kuhanuura aha buremeezi bw'engyenda. Bakeetegyereza ngu engyenda nungi n'ey'omugasho omu nteekateeka zaabo n'obuheereza bwabo omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of their current needs and future projects, the leadership team has decided to invest in new equipment. To enhance their operational efficiency, the bishop team will embark on purchasing a brand new double cabin.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku byetaago byabwe mu kiseera kino ne pulojekiti ez'omu maaso, abakulembeze basazeewo okussa ssente mu kugula ebyuma ebipya. Okutumbula emirimu gyabwe, ttiimu y'omulabirizi ejja kutandika okugula emmotoka empya eya double cabin.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom miti gi kombedi ki yub gi me anyim, lutela gumoko tamgi me keto lim I jami tic manyen. Me medo rwom me tic gi, dul pa bishop gubi cako wilo mutoka manyen me double cabin.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos ipudesia kec keda ipurojektin lu oingaren, aseutu etimu loka engarenok aipikakin ikapunukec toma acuman nuitetiak. Kanu aitogogong eswamae kec, ebuni etimu loka ebisop agwel emotoka loitetet loka double cabin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egazu e'yo eyini le sa'wa 'disi azini otita ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, amuti driceza ni 'diyi 'du e'yo robia ayuzu afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo yini azi ngazu kililiru ri otuzu, amuti Bisopi ni 'diyi nga e'do mutukari double cabin ru o'diru ni je.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyetengo byabo ebirikubaho hati hamwe na purogyekiti nzabo ez'omumaisho, tiimu y'obwebembezi eshaziremu kutamu sente omu byoma bisya. Okutunguura emirimo yaabo, tiimu y'omureeberezi neija kutandika kugura emotoka nsya eya double cabin.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for community support and outreach, a new initiative was proposed. This led to the formation of a dedicated organization aimed at fostering connections and providing assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obuyambi n'okubunyisa amawulire mu kitundu, enteekateeka empya yateesebwako. Kino kyaviirako okuteekebwawo kw'ekitongole ekigenderera okukwataganya n'okuwa obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak me miyo kony ki cwalo ngec bot lwak, kimiyo tam manyen. Man oweko kicako dul mo matye ki miti me kubu dano ki miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka agangat keda aisisianakin itunga, aponi kitemokinai ainapeta nuitetiak. Abu ngin koyangau aitolomunio naka atukot naka aimorikikin keda aijanakin agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu atita ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo tuzu, 'ba fe egata e'yo azi o'dini ni. E'yo 'di fe 'bani amuti azi ngapi 'ba eyi ma eselea azini azakoma fezu 'diyi e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi n'okuhutuura abantu omu byaro, ekiteiso kisya kikateebwaho. Eki kikareetaho okutandikaho ekitongore ekirikugyenderera okukwatanisa n'okuheereza obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: The Church of Uganda is known for its diverse dioceses, each varying in size and influence. Among these, two stand out due to their extensive geographical reach and significant congregational numbers.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa ya Uganda emanyiddwa olw'obulabirizi bwayo obw'enjawulo, nga buli bumu bwa njawulo mu bunene ne mu buyinza. Mu bino, bibiri bisibuka olw'ensangibwa yaabyo empanvu n'omuwendo gw'ekibiina omunene.
ach_prompt: Kanica me Uganda oywek pi diocese ne mapat-pat, acel-acel tye ki dit ki twero ma pat-pat. I kin magi, aryo gi pat ki mukene pi kabedo gi mapol ki wel dano mapol matye I kacokke.
teo_prompt: Ejenara ekanisa loko Uganda kanu aiboisio nuegelegela, nuegelegela kotoma apol keda apedor. Kotoma ngul, iarei kes itegelikina kanuka aiboisio nuipu noi nuejaasi keda ikuristayon luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ni i ma dayasesi ndundu eyi pie, eyi ma kalafe eyi ndundu tualu okpo eyini 'diyi pie. Diyi ma eselea, iri yi e'da yi ma eselea e'yo angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma ongmbo angirisi azini kalafe angiri 'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ekanisa ya Uganda nemanywa ahabw'obureeberezi bwayo oburikushushana, buryomwe arikushushana omu bukuru n'amaani. Omuri ebi, bibiri nibyetegyerezibwa ahabw'obuhangwa bwabyo obw'ahaiguru hamwe n'omuhendo gw'abakurisitaayo.

eng_prompt: The church has been expanding its influence in the region for many years. As a result, the diocese covers six districts.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa ebadde egaziya obuyinza bwayo mu kitundu okumala emyaka mingi. N'ekyavaamu, obulabirizi buzingiramu disitulikiti mukaaga.
ach_prompt: Kanica obedo ka dongo twero ne I but piny eni pi mwaki mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, diocese man tye ki districts abicel.
teo_prompt: Eyataki ekanisa apedoroke kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun ikar luipu. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi edaiosis keda idisitriktan ikanyape.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa ebi okpo erini angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otu eli karakara 'bo. E'yo 'disi, dayasesi 'di ma alea distrikiti eyi azia.
nyn_prompt: Ekanisa etwire neyongyera amaani omu kyanga kumara emyaka mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, obureeberezi nibutwariramu disiturikiti mukaaga.

eng_prompt: The community has long faced challenges with inconsistent electricity access, hindering development and daily activities. Recently, efforts have been made to enhance energy infrastructure in the region.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kimaze ebbanga nga kisanga okusoomoozebwa olw'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze, ekiremesa enkulaakulana n'emirimu gya bulijjo. Gye buvuddeko, kaweefube akoleddwa okutumbula eby'amasannyalaze mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki peko me mac pi kare malac ma oweko dongo lobo ki tic me nino ducu odoko tek tutwal. I kare ma okato cokcok-ki, ki keto tek me ilo malo rwom me gedo me mac I but piny eni.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda ainingosia nuka amamus adumunun akim na ekwam, nu isimiki apol keda aswamisinei nuka nginiparan. Apakio nu, iswamao agogongu kanu aitojokar iboro lu akim katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da esu e'yo ewaru eyi sa'wa ezu eyini aci esuzu ku risi, e'yo angu ezoma ni azini e'yo eyini 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi atrizu. O'du 'diyi ma alea, 'ba 'ye okpo e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amashanyarazi, ekirikuremesa entunguuka hamwe n'emirimo yaabo eya buriizooba. Obwahati, hariho amaani agakozirwe okutunguura ebyombeko by'amashanyarazi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: To meet the increasing energy demands of the region, the power plant underwent significant upgrades. As part of this initiative, a five hundred kilovolts generator was installed to boost power generation.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze obweyongera mu kitundu, ekkolero ly'amasannyalaze lyatereezebwa nnyo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, jenereeta ya kilovolts ebikumi bitaano yateekebwawo okutumbula amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti me mac matye kamede i twok piny eni, yub me yubu mac I kabedo enoni otime matek tutwal. Macalo but yub man, ki keto generator me kilovolts miya abic me medo mac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo akim lo iyata aiboisit, aponi itojokar aiboisit na akim. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ibwaikinai egenereta loka kilovolts akwatakany kanu aitopolor akim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci ni angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba otu angu aci ni 'da ma omgbo ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba osu genereta okpo kilovoltsni turu towi ni aci edeza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'amashanyarazi omu kyanga, eikorero ry'amashanyarazi rikongyerwamu amaani. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ekitongore ky'amashanyarazi ekya kilovolts magana ataano kikateebwaho okwongyera amaani omu kukora amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: To meet the growing energy demands of the region, a significant upgrade to the existing infrastructure is necessary. As part of this initiative, six generators will be installed to enhance the power supply.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze obweyongera mu kitundu, kyetaagisa okulongoosa ennyo ebintu ebiriwo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, jenereta mukaaga zijja kuteekebwawo okwongera ku bungi bw'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti me mac matye kamede i twok piny eni, omyero kimed rwom me gedo ma tye kombedi. Macalo but yub man, kibi keto generators abicel me medo mac.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo akim lo iyata aiboisit, ibusakinit aitojokar iboro lu ejaas. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aipikakin ijenereta ikanyape kanu aikeuna akim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci ni angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma aza kozu, le 'ba ma otu afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga genereta azia 'diyi osu aci awaza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'amashanyarazi ebyeyongyeire omu kyanga, ebyombeko ebiriho nibyetengwa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,genereta mukaaga niziija kutebwaho okwongyera amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: The project to enhance the local power supply is set to begin soon. As part of this initiative, two four megawatt generators will be installed after their transportation from Tororo.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti y'okutumbula amasannyalaze mu kitundu eyolekedde okutandika mu bbanga ttono. Ng'ekitundu ky'enteekateeka eno, jenereta bbiri eza megawatt nnya zijja kuteekebwawo oluvannyuma lw'okutambuzibwa okuva e Tororo.
ach_prompt: Yub me medo mac I tedero obi cake cokcok-ki. Macalo but yub man, kibi keto generators aryo me megawatte angwen ingee cwalo gi ki Tororo.
teo_prompt: Epurojekt lo aitopolor akorio na akim nes ebeit ageun atipet. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, eponio aibwaikin ijeneretan iarei luka megawatts iwongon akaulo na ayangar ko Tororo.
lgg_prompt: Otita aci awaza angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri nga e'do mbeleru. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga genereta yi osu engazu Tororoa 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti y'okwongyera amashanyarazi omu byaro neeza kutandika juba. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, za genereta ibiri eza megawaati ina, niziija kuteebwaho bwanyima y'okutwarwa kuruga Tororo.

eng_prompt: After evaluating the current power supply issues, the management decided it was time for an upgrade. To ensure uninterrupted operations, a new generator will be installed at the factory.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebizibu by'amasannyalaze ebiriwo, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo nti kye kiseera okulongoosa. Okukakasa nti emirimu tegitaataaganyizibwa, jenereta empya ejja kuteekebwa ku kkolero.
ach_prompt: Ingee neno peko me mac matye kombedi, ludito tic gumoko ni kare dong oromo me medo rwom me mac. Me neno ni tic tye kawot maber, kibi keto jenereta manyen I Cuma me yubu jami.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor atiokisio nuka akim, apotu eyaitene ocamutu ebe erai apak naka aisiteteun. Kanu awanyun ebe mam ibusakinit aibiror aswam, eponio aipikakin ejenereta loitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci oseza ni sawa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bani aci ma omgbo otuzu ra. Azi ngaza kililiru ri nezu, 'ba nga genereta o'diru 'ba pari afa edezu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma oburemeezi bw'amashanyarazi oburiho obwahati, abarikureeberera eby'amashanyarazi bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okutunguura amashanyarazi. Okureeba ngu emirimo neekora,genereta ensya neija kutebwa aha eikorero.

eng_prompt: Local entrepreneurs have expressed frustration over the ongoing energy shortages. As a result, many potential investors are hesitant to commit to new ventures.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu balaze obwennyamivu olw'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze erigenda mu maaso. N'ekivuddemu, bamusigansimbi bangi batya okwenyigira mu bizineesi empya.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara me tedero gunyutu cwer cwiny gi pi peko me nok pa mac matye kawot anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, lutim biacara mapol pe gimito timo biacara manyen.
teo_prompt: Apotu agwelanarak luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aikidiokus na akim. Kanuka ngun, ekapakina itunga luipu luepedorete aingada ikapun aswam iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Ba tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece candi e'yo aci ako ni mupi drile ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eco'ba lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo yi owizu tujari o'diru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abashuubuzi b'omubyaro boorekire okwetomboitwa ahabw'eibura ry'amashanyarazi erikugyenda omu maisho. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi abarikubaasa kuta esente omu bizinesi, tibarikwenda kwehayo omu mirimo misya.

eng_prompt: Residents in West Nile have been facing numerous challenges due to unreliable electricity supply. As a result, the community has been struggling to cope with the frequent disruptions.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze mu West Nile babadde basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi olw'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze. N'ekyavaamu, ekitundu kibadde kilwana okugumira okutaataaganyizibwa okuliwo buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Lutedero me West Nile gubedo kanongo peko mapol pi mac ma pe tiyo maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak gubedo ka tute matek me lweny ki peko ma obedo ka time kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga luko West Nile keda atiokisio nuipu kanuka amamus na akim. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit itunga aitikitik atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu westnile niri ma alea 'diyi ebi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu e'yo aci ako nirisi. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi ebi dri ci e'yo 'bani eyi atrizu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye b'omuri West Nile batwire nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi ahabw'amashanyarazi agatarikwesigwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu batwire nibarwana kurwanisa oburemeezi oburikukira kubaho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost economic development and improve living standards, local officials have been advocating for enhanced infrastructure. As part of this initiative, the government of Uganda has encouraged power transmission in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde balwanirira ebikozesebwa ebirongoofu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ya Uganda ekubirizza okutambuza amasannyalaze mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me lim ki rwom me kwo pa lwak, lutic me tedero gubedo ka lweny pi gedo ma beco. Macalo but yub man, gamente me Uganda ocuku cwiny I kom kubu mac ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitojokar adoketait na aijar, ekotosi eswamak luka atutubet aitojokar adukena. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu apugan nako Uganda isinyikok aitwasam akim katutubet.
