lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu ezoma ma omgbo otuzu azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi a'di 'di afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete Uganda niri fe ava aci awaza angu 'da ma alea ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okutunguura omutindo gw'entuura y'abantu, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibarwanirira ebyombeko ebirungi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,gavumenti ya Uganda eyongyeire amaani omu by'amashanyarazi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: As energy prices continue to rise and demand increases, many individuals are beginning to feel the financial strain. Concerns about the future of energy costs have sparked discussions in communities and households alike.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebbeeyi y'amasannyalaze yeeyongera okulinnya n'obwetaavu bweyongera, abantu bangi batandise okuwulira obuzibu bw'ensimbi. Okweraliikirira ku bbeeyi y'amasannyalaze mu biseera eby'omu maaso kuleetedde okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bitundu ne mu maka.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel mac tye ka medde ki ito ki miti me mac bene tye ka medde, dano mapol tye ka winyo peko me lim. Lworo I kom wel mac I kare me anyim okelo nywako lok I kin lwak ki gangi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos itiaisinei luka akim aiyatakin keda eipuda lo akim, egeunete itunga luipu apodokinit nuka ikapun. Akiro nuikamunitos etiai loka akim koingaren eyangautu ipegeta kotoma atutubena keda ikalia.
lgg_prompt: Aje aci osezariniri ni tuzu drile azini afa 'bani le 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu drile, 'ba karakara yi e'do e'yo ewaru robia ma alia 'diyi ma e'yo ega. Asi otiza aje aci osezariniri ma dria ewu drialeri ma alia ri fe agbatara ongulumu eyi ma eselea aku eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Emihendo y'amashanyarazi ku erikugumizamu neyeyongyera kandi n'okwetenga kweyongyera, abantu baingi batandikire kuhurira oburemeezi bw'esente. Okwerarikirira aha bishare by'amashanyarazi omu biro by'omumaisho, kireesireho okuhanuura omu bantu hamwe n'amaka.

eng_prompt: The region has long struggled with inconsistent electricity access, hindering economic growth and development. However, recent investments in infrastructure are set to change this dynamic.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kimaze ebbanga nga kirwanagana n'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze, ekiremesa enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna n'enkulaakulana. Newankubadde, okusiga ensimbi okwaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo kusobola okukyusa embeera eno.
ach_prompt: But piny eni obedo ka lweny pi kare malac ki peko me mac ma obedo ka gengo dongo lobo ki dongo lobo. Kadi bed kumeno, keto lim I tic ikare ma okato cokcok-ki obi loko kit ma tic tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Ationis na aiboisit kangin adaun apak naepol noi kanu amamus adumunun akim naka epiei, ido isimiki apol keda apol. Konye, eponio aijulakin epone ngol kanu aipikakin ikapun mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ma alea ri ebi dri ci e'yo aci ako niri be, e'yo 'dipi zota e'yo robiani azini angu ezoma niri atripi. Kani si, lonyi vuti aleza o'diru 'bani 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi nga e'yo 'di oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kitwire nikirwanagana n'obutabaho bw'amashanyarazi, ekirikuremesa entunguuka n'entunguuka. Kwonka, okuta esente omu by'okwombeka nikiza kuhindura aha nshonga egi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are struggling to make ends meet due to rising living costs and stagnant wages. As a result, financial insecurity has become a pervasive issue in society.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bazibuwalirwa okweyimirizaawo olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya n'emisaala okuyimirira. N'ekivuddemu, obutali butebenkevu mu by'ensimbi bufuuse kizibu kya buli wamu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo ki mucara matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, peko me can lim odoko peko madit tutwal I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aijar naarai eyatakinos itiaisinei luka aijar keda eropit loepol noi. Kanuka ngun, amamus na ikapun erai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi dri ci eyi ma edri ta mbazu e'yo aje 'bani aa'zu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu azini musara eyini aa'zu pa sozu ri si. E'yo 'disi, e'yo lonyi ako niri eca curu'do e'yo azi ongulumu eyi ma alea ndulu ni i.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibarwana kureberera amagara gaabo ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera hamwe n'emishaara etari kugyenda gye. N'ekyarugiremu, obutabanguko bw'esente buhindukire enshonga y'amaani omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In today's technology-driven world, reliable energy sources are essential for the smooth functioning of various industries. Many companies rely heavily on electricity to power their equipment and maintain operations.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekulemberwa tekinologiya, ensibuko z'amasannyalaze ezeesigika za mugaso mu kukola obulungi amakolero ag'enjawulo. Kampuni nnyingi zeesigama nnyo ku masannyalaze okukola ku byuma byazo n'okulabirira emirimu gyazo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni tye ki diro me tet manyen tutwal, yoo me nongo mac ma genne obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi tic pa cuma mapat-pat mapat-pat. Kampuni mapol gijenge tutwalle I kom mac elektriciti me tic ki jami ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda etatai loakwana, epolok noi aiboisio nuka akim kanu aswam ejok kotoma okampuni luegelegela. Ipu ikampunin lu itwasamaete akim naka epiei kanu aitwasam iboro kec ka aidar aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ewu andruri ma alea tekenologia si, geri aci esuzu 'diyi orodriru okalamvu ndundu eyini azi ngazu kililiru. Amuti karakara yi yi ati aci ma dria okporu yi vile afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma okpo fezu azini azi yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu tekinorogye, oburugo bw'amashanyarazi oburikwesigwa n'obw'omugasho omu kukora kurungi kw'amakorero agatari gamwe na gamwe. Kampuni nyingi nizikoresa amashanyarazi kukora ebyoma byazo n'okureeberera emirimo yaazo.

eng_prompt: Local energy production has struggled to keep pace with the growing demand from both residential and commercial sectors. As a result, many residents and businesses are facing challenges in accessing reliable electricity.
lug_prompt: Amasannyalaze agafulumizibwa mu ggwanga gafunye obuzibu okukwatagana n'obwetaavu obweyongera okuva mu bitongole by'abatuuze n'eby'obusuubuzi. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi ne bizinensi basanga okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna amasannyalaze agesigika.
ach_prompt: Yubu mac I tedero tye ka tute matek tutwal me cobo miti pa lwak ki biacara matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero ki biacara mapol gitye ka nongo peko me nongo mac ma genne.
teo_prompt: Aitolomio na akim kotoma akwapuwok etionikinit aitodolikin eipuda lo itunga keda agwelanarak. Kanuka ngun, etereikina itunga keda ibiasaran luipu keda ainingosia nuka adumun akim naejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa aci edepi angu 'da ma alea ogogo 'diyi e'bi dri ci e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea tualu 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu tujari karakara eyi pie e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini aci esuzu geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okukora amashanyarazi omwihanga kigumire kukuratira ebyetaago by'abantu n'eby'obushubuzi. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi hamwe na bizinesi nibatunga oburemeezi omu kutunga amashanyarazi agarikwesigwa.

eng_prompt: The construction of the Karuma Hydropower Station has been a significant development for the region. Once operational, it is expected to greatly enhance energy availability for local communities and industries.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba essundiro ly'amasannyalaze e Karuma kibadde kya nkulaakulana ya maanyi eri ekitundu. Bwe kinaatandika okukola, kisuubirwa okutumbula ennyo amasannyalaze mu bitundu ne mu makolero.
ach_prompt: Gedo mac ma aa ki I pii I Karuma obedo dongo lobo madit tutwal pi twok piny eni. Ka kicako tic kwede, byek tye ni obi medo rwom me mac I kabedo mapat-pat me tedero ki cuma mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Adukio naka akim naka epiei ko Karuma erai apol naepol noi kotoma aiboisit. Arai kogeu aswam, eomitai ebe ebuni aitojokar noi akorio na akim mama ejaasi itunga keda icuman.
lgg_prompt: Afa omvele Karuma Hydro Power Station ruri ma sita ebi ovu angu ezoma okporu ni angu 'di ma alea. Ba ega kini 'bani e'dozu azi ngazu 'boria, eri nga aci ma esuta ma omgbo otu ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri tualu okalamvu eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka eikorero ry'amashanyarazi erya Karuma, n'entunguuka y'amaani omu kyanga. Ku erikwija kutandika kukora, neeza kwongyera amaani omu by'amashanyarazi omu byaro hamwe n'amakorero.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the latest energy market trends and forecasts, we have determined that there will be no fluctuations in pricing. As a result, consumers can expect stability in their electricity bills moving forward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkulaakulana mu katale k'amasannyalaze n'okuteebereza, tusazeewo nti tewajja kubaawo nkyukakyuka mu bbeeyi. N'ekivuddemu, abaguzi basobola okusuubira obutebenkevu mu bisale byabwe eby'amasannyalaze okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo jami matye katime I cuk me mac ki byek ma watye kwede, wamoko ni wel mac pe obiloke. Macalo adwogi ne, luwil twero bedo ki gen ni cente gi me mac bibedo maber ikare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iponesio luka esokoni loka akim keda aomisio nuka akim, apotu sio ajenutu ebe emamei aijulanakineta kotoma itiaisinei. Kanuka ngun, epedorete agwelak ajenun ebe ebuni ikapun kec luka akim ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci osezari ma o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama 'du e'yo kini aje ma ojata ni nga ovu yo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aci ayupi 'diyi eco ega kini yi ma aje aci osezariniri nga ovu kililiru muzu drile ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu katare k'amashanyarazi n'okuteebereza, tushazireho ngu tiharikuza kubaho empindahinduka omu bishare by'amashanyarazi. N'ekyarugiremu, abaguzi nibabaasa kugira amatsiko ngu ebishare byabo by'amashanyarazi nibiza kutereera omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: The community gathered to mourn the passing of a beloved leader. His unwavering faith and dedication to the church had inspired many throughout the years.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaanye okukungubaga olw'okufa kw'omukulembeze omwagalwa. Okukkiriza kwe okunywevu n'obumalirivu bwe eri ekkanisa byazzaamu bangi amaanyi okumala emyaka.
ach_prompt: Lwak gugure me koko pi too pa latela ma dano maro. Niye matek ma en obedo kwede ki keto cwinye i kom kanica okonyo dano mapol tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aimony atwanare naka engarenon loamina. Amuno ke naepol noi keda ainakina ke nejai ekanisa abu isinyikok itunga luipu kokaru lu atuboros.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi tra eyi emvo 'yezu drice'ba leletu 'da ma drata si. Eri ma a'ita okporu azini asi feza kanisa dri ri fe ava 'ba karakara eyini eli karakara eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuririra okufa kw'omwebembezi owabaire nakundwa munonga. Okwikiriza kwe okw'amaani hamwe n'okwehayo kwe aha kanisa bikagaruza amaani abantu baingi okumara emyaka mingi.

eng_prompt: Despite his rigorous schedule and commitment to his patients, the doctor had recently returned from a remote area where malaria was prevalent. He dismissed his initial symptoms as mere fatigue, but they soon escalated.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko enteekateeka ye enkakali n'obumalirivu eri abalwadde be, omusawo yali yakakomawo okuva mu kitundu eky'ewala omwali omusujja gw'ensiri. Obubonero bwe obwasooka yabutwala ng'obukoowu, naye mu bbanga ttono ne bweyongera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo ki kare me tic matek tutwal ki keto cwinye I kom lutwo ne, daktar ne odwogo cokcok-ki ki I kabedo ma two malaria tye iye. En okwero lanyut ne me acel ni obedo olo keken, ento oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda aswam naepol noi keda ainakina mama ejaasi adekak ke, abu emuron ngol kobongok kotoma aiboisit naejaasi keda eimidi. Abu ngesi konger ijenuneta ke kwape apasit, konye apotu kiyatakinos.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu sawa be okporu azini asi feza be 'ba azoru 'diyi vu ti, dakitari 'da ego ndra engazu angu calo ru malaria ni 'diyi ma alia. Eri 'du e'da erini e'dale okorisi 'diyi ekile andezaru, te eyi ma omgbo tu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entebeekanisa ye n'okwehayo kwe ahabarwaire be, dokita akaba aherize kugaruka kuruga omu kyaro ahu omushwija gw'ensiri gukaba guri. Akatwara obumanyiso bwe nk'obw'oburuhe, kwonka bwanyima bukongyera.

eng_prompt: As we gather here today to honor his memory, we reflect on the impact he had on all our lives. It is with heavy hearts that we bid farewell to a beloved friend and family member.
lug_prompt: Nga tukungaanidde wano leero okumujjukira, tufumiitiriza ku ngeri gye yakwatamu obulamu bwaffe. Kirimu emitima emizito okusiibula mukwano gwaffe omwagalwa era ow'omu maka gaffe.
ach_prompt: Ka wacokke kany tin me woro wiye, watamo I kom adwogi ma en okelo I kwo wa weng. Watye ki arem cwiny madit tutwal I kare ma watye ka weko laremwa ki dano me gangwa ma wamaro.
teo_prompt: Neimoriar oni ne ilolo kanu aiitun aiitun ngesi, iwomoomoomo oni nuikamunitos epone loajokan loajaatar ngesi kotoma aijar wok kere. Erai keda aiyalongong naepol noi sio aijalakin epapero loajokan keda etunganan lo okale.
lgg_prompt: Amani ta trazu 'dia andru inzita fezu eri ma e'yo egazu, ama e'yo ega e'yo erini 'ye idri ama dria ma dria 'diyi ma dria. Eri asi nzizaru amani ama ma agyi leleturi azini 'ba familia ma alia 'diyi kuzu'i.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikuteeranira aha erizooba okuheereza ekitinisa okujaguza kwe, nituteekateeka aha mugasho ogu yaagizire aha magara gaitu. N'omutima gw'oburemeezi ngu tukasiibula munywani waitu kandi memba w'eka.

eng_prompt: In a small town where faith was deeply intertwined with daily life, the man had openly criticized the church and its teachings. His controversial views had alienated him from the community, leading to a growing resentment among the townsfolk.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono nga okukkiriza kwakwataganira ddala n'obulamu obwa bulijjo, omusajja yali avumirira ekkanisa n'enjigiriza zaayo mu lwatu. Endowooza ze ez'obutakkaanya zaali zimuggye ku bantu, ekiviiriddeko obukyayi obweyongera mu bantu b'omu kibuga.
ach_prompt: I taun mo matidi kama niyee obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me nino ducu, laconi obedo ka kwero kanica kacel ki pwonygi. Tam mege ma kelo apoka-poka okete mabor ki lwak, ma oweko kiniga omede ikin lwak me boma.
teo_prompt: Kotoma otaun lodidi loejaasi aiyuun keda aijar naka nginiparan, abu etunganan ngol kitoron ekanisa keda aisisianakineta ke. Apotu aomisioke nuetioko itiakisi ngesi kama ejaasi itunga luka atutubet, ido abu koyangau anyunyura kanejaas itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea a'ita ni aa'zu o'du driasi ri ma alea, agu 'da nze e'yo kanisa ni azini imbata erini 'diyi ma dria. Egata erini 'diyi eri ma esele co ongulumu eyi ma eselea, erini ani fezu 'ba tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyini asi onzi tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kabuga kakye ahu enyikiriza yaabaire ekwatiriine n'amagara ga buriizooba, omushaija akahakanisa ekanisa hamwe n'enyegyesa zaayo. Ebiteekateeko bye ebirikuhababana bikamureetera okwetantara abantu b'omubyaro, ekyarugiremu okwetomboita kw'abantu b'omururembo.

eng_prompt: After months of struggling to make ends meet, he finally decided to confront the church leaders about the unpaid rent. His insistence on receiving the overdue payments, however, led to unexpected consequences.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'alwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo, yasalawo okutunula mu maaso g'abakulembeze b'ekkanisa ku nsonga z'obutasasula ssente z'obupangisa. Kyokka okukkaatiriza kwe ku kufuna ssente ezaali zisubiddwa, kyavaamu ebizibu bye yali tasuubira.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo, en dong omoko tamme me lok ki lutela me kanica I kom cul me ot ma pe oculo. En obedo ka cuko cwinye tutwal I kom nongo cul ma onongo dong okato, ento man okelo adwogi ma pe byek tye I kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitelekaar aijar, abu ngesi kotub einer keda engarenok lu ekanisa kanu ikapun lu ipagisaere. Abu ngesi kiketakin adumun ikapun lu eyapiete, konye abu koyangau atiokisio numam ngesi aomit.
lgg_prompt: Mba erini dri ciria afa dria esuzu 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu asi 'du e'yo nzezu drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi be e'yo sende ofele ku ri ma dria. E'yo erini asi 'bazu e'yo ofeta ma esuta ma dria, kani si, fe e'yo erini ega ku 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana kwebaisaho, ahamuheru akasharamu kugamba n'abebembezi b'ekanisa aha nshonga y'okushashura esente z'obupangisa. Okugumizamu kwe aha kushashura esente ezabaire zitarikushashurwa, kikareetaho ebitarikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: After months of turmoil and division within the congregation, the church leadership decided it was time to address the situation. They believed that a heartfelt apology from the excommunicated Christian could help heal the rift and restore unity among the members.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obutabanguko n'enjawukana mu kibiina, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa baasalawo nti kye kiseera okukola ku mbeera. Baalowooza nti okwetonda okuva mu mutima gw'omukrisitaayo eyagobeddwa mu kkanisa kusobola okuwonya enjawukana n'okuzzaawo obumu mu bammemba.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny ki apoka-poka I kacokke, lutela me kanica gumoko ni kare dong oromo me cobo peko eni. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni kwayo kica ki bot Lakricitayo ma ki ryemo ki i kacokke twero konyo me cango apoka-poka ki dwoko ribe ikin lumemba.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu amumu keda atiakatiaka kotoma okanisa, apotu engarenok luka ekanisa koseutu ebe erai apak naka aitemokin ejautene. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ailip aitimio kama ejai ekristayot lo alemar kotoma ekanisa epedori aingarakin aimuke atiakatiaka keda aimorikikina kanejaas imeban.
lgg_prompt: Mba ngiringiri azini esele coza kanisa ma alia 'diyi ma vutia, driceza kanisa niri 'du e'yo 'di ma aza kozu ra. Yi a'i ra kini truta engazu asi driasi engazu kristiani 'bani odro amuti 'da ma alea ri ma alea ri eco azakoma fe e'yo esele coza ni 'diyi atizu azini ti ecita ejizu 'ba amuti nde ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'obutabanguko n'okwebaganisamu omu kanisa, abebembezi b'ekanisa bakasharamu ngu obwire buhikire kukora aha nshonga egyo. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okushaba okusaasirwa kuruga omu mutima gw'omukristaayo obingirwe, nikubaasa kuhwera omu kukyendeeza okwebaganisamu n'okugaruraho okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: During the heated discussion about the landlord-tenant relationship, the tenant accused the landlord of exploiting his position. In response, the Christian calmly defended his actions, asserting his rights as a property owner.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku nkolagana wakati w'abapangisa ne bannannyini mayumba, omupangisa yalumiriza nnannyini mayumba okukozesa obubi ekifo kye. Mu kwanukula, Omukrisitaayo mu bukkakkamu yawolereza ebikolwa bye, ng'alaga eddembe lye nga nnannyini ttaka.
ach_prompt: Ikare me laro lok matek I kom wat I kin won ot ki lapang ot, lapang ot okok I kom won ot me nywaro tic ki twero ne. I gamo lokke, Lakricitayo ocwako tim mege, kun waco ni en tye ki twero macalo rwed jami.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opeget loepol noi loikamunit eidicane loejai kiding ikulepek itogoi keda epagisak, abu epagisak kitoron ikulepek itogoi kanu aitosom adoketaitike. Kanu abongokin, abu ekristayot igang aswamisioke, itogogongit apedorosioke kwape elope alupok.
lgg_prompt: Sawa agbatara okporu e'yo aa'zu 'ba angu e'ipiru 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria risi, 'ba angu e'ipiru 'da to angu e'ipiru 'da e'yo erini aa'zu alenia ri ayuzurisi. Omvitaniria, kristiani 'da ati e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria, erini i ma drilemgbo ekile nyaku ma e'iruri le.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura kw'amaani aha nkoragana ya mukama w'enju n'omupangisa, omupangisa akajunaana mukama w'enju okukoresa kubi omwanya gwe. Omu kugarukamu, Omukristaayo akahakanisa ebikorwa bye, arikworeka obugabe bwe nk'omukama w'eitaka.

eng_prompt: Despite his lifelong dedication to the church, his controversial actions in the final years of his life had alienated many within the community. As tensions rose, the clergy gathered to discuss their stance on his funeral rites.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde yali yeewaddeyo mu kkanisa obulamu bwe bwonna, ebikolwa bye eby'obutakkaanya mu myaka gy'obulamu bwe egyasembayo byayawula abantu bangi mu kitundu. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, abakulembeze b'eddiini baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kifo kyabwe ku mikolo gy'okuziika.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en odyero kwone ducu bot kanica, tim mege ma obedo ki apoka-poka I mwaki me agiki me kwone okelo apoka-poka I kin lwak. I kare ma telle omedde, lupwonye dini gugure me nywako tam gi I kom yub me yik.
teo_prompt: Karaida ijaanakinit ngesi ekanisa aijarake kere, aswamisioke nuetioko kotoma ikar lu awasia luka aijarake ajalakisi itunga luipu kotoma atutubet. Neyatakinor aiyalongong, apotu imakio imakio kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aidayo ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu idri erivuri ma alia ava fezu kanisa driri ma talasi ra ti, e'yo erini 'ye eli asizu idri eriniri ma alia 'diyi oga 'ba karakarau ongulumu ma alia 'diyi ma esele ra. Erita ako ni turia, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini 'ye eri ma dra ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu yaabaire ayehaireyo aha kanisa amagara gye goona, ebikorwa bye omu myaka y'ahamuheru y'amagara gye bikareetaho okwetantara abantu baingi omu bantu. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ediini baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga y'okuziika.

eng_prompt: The congregation gathered in somber reflection, mourning the recent departures that had left a palpable void. As the pastor delivered his heartfelt sermon, the weight of grief hung heavy in the air.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaanye mu ngeri ey'ekikangabwa, nga bakungubaga olw'abantu abaavaawo gyebuvuddeko awo abaalekawo ekiwuubaalo. Ng'omusumba awa okubuulira kwe okw'omutima, obuzito bw'ennaku bwabadde mu bbanga.
ach_prompt: Lucristayo gugure me tam matut tutwal, kun gikumo jo ma ocito cokcok-ki ma oweko peko mapol tutwal. I kare ma lakwat tye ka miyo pwony ma oa ki I cwinye, arem me kumo obedo I yamo.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikuristayon kimorikikinos kotoma aomisio nuarokok, aimony kanu alosit naka itunga luapotu kojalakisi aipal. Neinanakinia epasita alimonokineke, apol noi aiyalongong kotoma okwam.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba kanisa 'diyi tra eyi e'yo egazu e'yo ewaru eyi ma dria, eyini emvo 'yezu e'yo 'ba eyini acizu o'diru 'diyi ma dria eyini ani aa'zu e'yo kokoru 'diyi ma dria. Atalao ni e'yo erini olu engazu asi driasi ri 'yeria, e'yo candi ni 'diyi ovu oli ma alia nzizaru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeeranira hamwe, barikuteekateeka munonga, barikuganya okugyenda kw'abagyenzi baabo okwabaire kurekyeireho eibura ry'amaani. Obu paasita yaabaire naaha engyesa ye erikuruga aha mutima, oburemeezi bw'obusaasi bukaba buri ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: After weeks of traveling through the dense jungles of South America, he began to feel increasingly unwell. The symptoms started with a high fever and severe headaches, leaving him worried about his health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'atambula mu nsiko za South America, yatandika okuwulira obubi. Obubonero bwatandika n'omusujja ogw'amaanyi n'okulumwa ennyo omutwe, ekyamuleka nga mweraliikirivu ku bulamu bwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me wot I bunga me kupiny me lobo Amerika, en ocako winyo marac tutwal. Lanyut ne ocake ki lyeto ma obedo lamal tutwal ki two wic matek tutwal, ma oweko en obedo ki lworo I kom yotkom mege.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka alosit kotoma okibira luko South America, abu ngesi kogeu amamut ejok. Apotu ijenuneta ngun kogeutu keda eimidi loepol noi keda ariebo na akou naepol noi, abu kojalak ngesi iyalongongoi kanu angaleuke.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti ma vutia acizu angu jere ru America andraleruri ma aliasi 'bori ma vutia, eri e'do i ama kililiru ku. Wura e'dazu 'diyi e'do rua driza urusi azini dri gaza okporu 'diyisi, erini ani asi otizu e'yo eri ma rua ala ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okutambura omu kibira ky'amashuuma ga America, akatandika kwehurira kubi munonga. Obubonero bukatandika n'omushwija gw'ahaiguru hamwe n'obusaasi bw'omutwe, ekyamurekire ayerarikiriire amagara gye.

eng_prompt: In recent months, tensions have risen between the church and certain community members who openly criticize its teachings. As a result, the clergy will not tolerate people who are against the church.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, obunkenke bweyongedde wakati w'ekkanisa n'abantu abamu mu kitundu abavumirira enjigiriza zaayo mu lwatu. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'eddiini tebajja kugumiikiriza bantu abawakanya ekkanisa.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, telle omede ikin kanica ki lwak mogo ma kwero pwonygi. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye dini pe biyee dano ma kwero kanica.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, apolor ingungeta kiding ekanisa keda itunga ice luka atutubet luetepegitos aisisianakineta ke. Kanuka ngun, mam engarenok luka ekanisa eyangaritos itunga lumam ecamunitos ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'diyi ma alea, erita ako tu kanisa ma eselea 'ba ongulumu ma alea e'yo nze'ba kanisa ma e'yo onzi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ngani 'ba ageti otipi kanisa be 'diyi ma ti ta ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, obunkenke bweyongyeire ahagati y'ekanisa n'abantu abamwe abarikuhakanisa engyesa zaayo. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ediini tibarikwija kugumisiriza abantu abarikuhakanisa ekanisa.

eng_prompt: The community has been grappling with an overwhelming sense of grief and loss. Tragedy has struck the church, leaving its members in shock and mourning.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kirwanagana n'ennaku ey'amaanyi n'okufiirwa. Ekikangabwa kituuse ku kkanisa, ne kireka bammemba baayo mu kutya n'okukungubaga.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lweny ki cwer cwiny ki rwenyo jami mapol tutwal. Peko madit otimme I kanica, oweko lumemba ne gubedo ki ngeng tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi itunga luka atutubet ngin keda aiyalongong naepol noi. Adumutu atiokisio ekanisa, kojalakisi imebanakec aumok keda aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi dri ci e'yo candiru tualu afa aviza be. E'yo ewaru 'ye kanisa ni, erini 'ba erini 'diyi ku osutaa azini emvo ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'obusaasi bwingi n'okufeerwa. Ekikangabwa kiteganiise ekanisa, kikasiga abantu baayo omukutangaara n'okucura.

eng_prompt: After years of cultivation and development, the farmers received a notice from the landowner. They were informed that the lease for the land given to them is expired.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulima n'okukulaakulana okumala emyaka, abalimi baafunye ekiwandiiko okuva ewa nnannyini ttaka. Baategeezebwa nti liizi y'ettaka eyabaweebwa yaggwaako.
ach_prompt: Ingee poto ki dongo lobo pi mwaki mapol, lupur gunongo waraga ki bot rwed ngom. Ki niango gi ni licenc me ngom ma kimiinigi dong otum.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka akoru ka apol, apotu akoriok kodumutu aiwadikaet kama ejai elope alupok. Aponi olimokinai kes ebe adaun apak naka aipagis alupok nu ijaikitai kes.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani ori ezozu azini angu ezozu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi esu o'duko engazu nyaku ma e'iruri vu. Ba lu eyi dri kini kokobi 'bani fele eyidri nyaku 'da ma dria ri ma o'du aga 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuhinga n'okutunguuka, abahingi bakatunga ekihandiiko kuruga owa mukama w'eitaka. Bakamanyisibwa ngu endagaano y'eitaka ei bahairwe ekahwaho.

eng_prompt: Despite their initial enthusiasm for establishing a new mission, the Italian missionaries encountered unexpected financial difficulties. As a result, they struggled to meet their obligations, including the lease for the land they intended to cultivate.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde mu kusooka baali banyiikivu mu kutandikawo emisomo emipya, abaminsani aba Yitale baasanga obuzibu mu byenfuna mu ngeri etasuubirwa. N'ekyavaamu, baalwana okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe, nga mw'otwalidde ne liizi y'ettaka lye baali bagenderera okulimirako.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni cwinygi obedo yom me cako tic pa lumicon manyen, lumiconari me lobo Italy gunongo peko me lim ma pe byek tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, gubedo ki peko me cobo tic gi, ma I kingi obedo nongo ngom ma gubedo ki miti me pur.
teo_prompt: Karaida ekotosi kesi aitegear emisionari loitetet, apotu imisionaris luka Italy kodumutu atiokisio nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etiono kesi aitodolikin aswamisio kec, aimoriarit aipagis alupok nu akotosi kesi akoru.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu ava be e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'bazu o'diru 'diyi e'dozu ra ti, 'ba e'yo 'yepi kari Italy niri ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi ndra dri ci e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi 'yezu, tualu e'yo nyaku eyini le amvu 'yazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushemererwa kwabo okw'okubanza okutandikaho omurimo musya, ababuurizi b'ediini kuruga Italy bakashanga oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, bakarwana kuhikiiriza obujunanizibwa bwabo, otwariiremu n'okupangisa eitaka eri baabaire nibenda kuhinga.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous warnings and opportunities to settle their debts, the church continued to neglect its financial responsibilities. As a consequence, the local authorities took drastic measures against the congregation.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalabulwa emirundi mingi n'emikisa okusasula amabanja gaabwe, ekkanisa yeeyongera okulagajjalira obuvunaanyizibwa bwayo obw'ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, ab'obuyinza mu kitundu baakola ebikolwa eby'amaanyi ku kibiina.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki ciko gi tyen mapol ki gum me culu banya gi, kanica omede ki cayo ticgi me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me tedero gutiyo ki yoo matek tutwal I kom lucristayo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritai kesi keda arerengesio nuipu nuka aitac apesenin kec, apotu ikanisan inyikokisi apalunit aswamukec nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kiswamata nuarokok mama ejaasi ikuristayon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza karakara 'diyi ma talasi azini drileba yini yi vile mari ofezu 'diyi ma talasi, kanisa mu drile azi erini robia ma dria 'diyi adizu. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo okporu kanisa ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kwingi n'omugisha gw'okushashura amabanja gaabo, ekanisa ekagumizamu etarikufayo aha mirimo yaayo y'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro, bakakora ekikorwa ky'amaani ahari abaikiriza.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, religious institutions have played a vital part in shaping communities and guiding moral values. One of their primary missions has always been to share their beliefs and teachings with others.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebitongole by'eddiini bikoze omulimu munene mu kubumba ebitundu n'okulungamya empisa. Ekimu ku bigendererwa byabwe ebikulu kibadde kya kugabana nzikiriza n'enjigiriza zaabwe n'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, gangi kwan me dini gubedo ki tic mapire tek tutwal me yubu kwo pa lwak ki pwonyo dano kit me kwo. Ticgi ma pire tek obedo nywako niye gi ki pwony gi ki joo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, ejaasi iriongeta luka idiinin keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun itunga keda aingarenikin itunga koipone loajokan. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio kec nuapolok erai aimor aiyuunikec keda aisisianakinikec keda luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyi nga azi okporu ongulumu eyi ma edeta ma alea. Asisile yini okporu 'diyi ma azi ebi ovu e'yo yi ma a'ita azini e'yo onita ni 'diyi awazu 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, ebitongore by'ediini bikozire omurimo gw'amaani omu kutendeka abantu n'okubahabura aha mitwarize. Kimwe aha bigyendererwa byabo ebikuru n'okugabana enyikiriza zaabo n'enyegyesa zaabo n'abandi.

eng_prompt: Frustration has been mounting among the local community as they witness the encroachment of the Church on their ancestral lands. Many feel that their heritage and way of life are under threat, prompting a strong desire to take action.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu bweyongedde mu bantu b'omu kitundu nga balaba ekkanisa nga eyingirira ettaka lya bajjajjaabwe. Bangi bawulira nti eby'obugagga byabwe n'engeri y'obulamu bwabwe biri mu matigga, ekireetera okwagala okw'amaanyi okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny obedo ka mede ikin lwak ikare ma guneno kanica tye ka donyo I ngom pa kwaro gi. Dano mapol giwinyo ni tekwaro gi kacel ki kit me kwo gi tye kama rac tutwal, ma oweko gitye ki miti matek me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kanejaas itunga luka atutubet nawanyunia kesi ekanisa elomar toma alupok nuka lukapapaakec. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe ejai aijar kec aimusung, ido ngin einakini kesi eipud loepol noi loka aswam ibore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo candi feza ni e'bi tu 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea eyini e'yo kanisa ni fizu angu eyi ma a'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea ri ndrezu risi. Ba karakara eyi ega kini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi azini geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alea, e'yo 'di fe eyini asi 'bazu e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bantu b'omubyaro, ahabw'okureeba ekanisa erikutaahirira eitaka ryabaishenkurubo. Baingi nibateekateeka ngu eby'obuhangwa n'emitwarize yaabo biri omu kabi, ekirikubareetera kugira ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukora.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the community over the ownership of the contested property. Residents gathered in anticipation as the parish council announced a meeting to address the ongoing land dispute.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu olw'obwannannyini ku ttaka erivuganyizibwako. Abatuuze baakuŋŋaanye nga beesunga nga akakiiko k'ekigo kalangirira olukiiko olw'okugonjoola enkaayana z'ettaka ezigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I kin lwak I kom rwom me ngom matye I laro ne. Lutedero gucokke ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma lutela me parish guwaco ni gubi bedo ki kacoke me tyeko laro lok me ngom matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kotoma atutubet kanuka ikulepek alupok nuitepegitai. Apotu itunga lu atutubet kimorikikinos koipone lo alimor ekansulo loka atutubet airiamunet kanu aitemokin engunget lo alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ri e'bi tu ongulumu eyi ma eselea e'yo angu 'bani agata gazu 'da ma eipika eyi ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi asi driasi kanisulu parisi niri ni otita mitingi ni azi ngazu e'yo ngiringiri nyaku ni mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu bantu ahabw'obukama bw'eitaka eririkuhakanisibwa. Abatuuragye baketeerana bategyereize obu akakiiko k'omuruka karangiriire orukiiko rw'okukora aha ntongane z'eitaka ezirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The debate over the proposed new church had become increasingly heated, with strong opinions on both sides. As tensions rose, the committee decided to take decisive action to maintain unity and focus on their mission.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiteeso ky'ekkanisa empya kwali kweyongedde, n'endowooza ez'amaanyi ku njuyi zombi. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, akakiiko kaasazeewo okubaako kye kakolawo okukuuma obumu n'okussa essira ku kigendererwa kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Laro lok I kom yub me ot lega manyen ne odoko tek tutwal, ki tam matego I tenge aryo weng. I kare ma telle omedde, dul enoni omoko tamgi me timo gin mo pi gwoko ribe ki keto cwinygi I kom tic gi.
teo_prompt: Apol noi epeget loikamunit ekanisa loitetet, keda aomisio nuegogong noi kotoma aiboisio kere. Neyatakinor atiokisio, abu ekomiti koseu aswam kagogong kanu aidar aimorikikina kosodete aitodolikin aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara kanisa o'diru 'da ma dria ri eca curu'do okporu, egata okporu 'diyi pie kala iri 'diyi ma eselea. Erita ako ni turia, komiti 'da pe e'yo 'yezu ti ecita ma tambazu dika asi 'bazu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura aha nteekateeka y'ekanisa ensya kweyongyeire kuba okw'amaani, n'ebiteekateeko by'amaani aha mbaju zombi. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, akakiiko kakacwamu kukora eky'amaani, okurinda okukwatanisa n'okuta amaani aha kigyendererwa kyabo.

eng_prompt: In a small, secretive town, a mysterious figure had compiled a list of individuals believed to have committed wrongdoings. As the sun set, a sense of dread filled the air, knowing that the time for reckoning had come.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono, ak'ekyama, omuntu atamanyiddwa yali akuŋŋaanyizza olukalala lw'abantu abateeberezebwa okuba nga baakola ebikolobero. Ng'enjuba egwa, okutya kwajjula mu bbanga, nga bakimanyi nti ekiseera ky'okubalirira kyali kituuse.
ach_prompt: I taun mo matidi, ma dano pe ngeyo, ngat mo oyubo nying dano ma byek tye ni gutimo bal. Ikare ma ceng tye ka poto, lworo omako dano mapol tutwal, pien onongo gingeyo ni kare me ngolo kop dong oromo.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi lo aiyeyea, abu itunganan yen mam ejenuna kitolomu ikiroria luka itunga lu eomitai ebe iswamaete nuarokok. Neautar akolong aibiror, apotu akurianu kilelebunos kokwam, ajenete ebe adolu apak naka aitodun nueswamauna kesi.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni azi werea, ozizaru ni ma alia, 'ba azi 'bani nile ku ni tra 'ba 'bani ega kini 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma ru eyi. Etuka ni ecaria 'boria, ori ga angu ma aliasi, nizu kini sawa 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi 'yezu ri eca 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu kabuga kakye, ak'ekihama, omuntu otarikwetegyerezibwa akakora orunyiriri rw'abantu abarikuteekwateekwaho kuba bakozire ebibi. Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, obwoba bukaija omu mwanya, kumanya ngu obwire bw'okubaririra bukaba buhikire.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and community discussions, the church has finally reached a decision regarding the contested property. Stakeholders have expressed their concerns, but the leadership believes this move will benefit the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'enteeseganya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu, ekkanisa emalirizza okusalawo ku bikwata ku kibanja ekiwakanyizibwa. Abakwatibwako balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe naye abakulembeze balowooza nti kino kijja kuganyula ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki nywako lok ikin lwak, kanica dong omoko tamgi I kom jami ma lara tye I komgi. Dano mapol gunyutu lworo gi, ento lutela tye ki niyee ni tic man bikonyo lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda ipegeta luka itunga, adaun ekanisa aitemokin nuikamunitos iboro luitepegitai. Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongo kec, konye eyuunit engarenone ebe ebuni aswamisioit ngin aimedaun itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini e'yo o'yozu ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, kanisa esu asizu e'yo 'du e'yo angu 'da ma dria ra. Ba ambo ndundu eyi ece asi otiza eyi ma dria ra te driceza 'da ai ra kini e'yo 'di ni nga ongulumu eyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuteisa hamwe n'okuhanuura omu bantu, ekanisa eherize kusharamu ahaby'eitaka eririkuhakanisibwa. Abantu boona boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo, kwonka abebembezi nibateekateeka ngu ekigyendererwa eki nikiija kugasira abantu.

eng_prompt: Understanding the financial landscape of a nation is crucial for its citizens. Awareness of fiscal policies and budget allocations can empower individuals to engage more effectively in civic discussions.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera embeera y'ebyensimbi mu ggwanga kya mugaso nnyo eri bannansi baayo. Okumanyisibwa ku nkola y'ebyensimbi n'ensengeka y'embalirira kisobola okuwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi okwetaba obulungi mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kwa bannansi.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma lim me lobo moni tye kwede pire tek tutwal pi anywali ne. Bedo ki ngec i kom cik ma doro lok kom lim ki kit ma byek lim kitiyo kwede twero weko dano bedo ki kero me nywako lok ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin ejautene loka ikapun loka akwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka itungake. Aisisianakino nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka ikapun keda ebajet epedori aitigogong itunga alomar toma opeget loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo e'yo robia ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru kari anzi erini 'diyi dri. E'yo mile oziza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria azini otita ajeni 'diyi ma esele cozu 'diyi ma dria ri eco fe 'ba yi dri okpo fizu e'yo nzeza o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza entatsya y'eihanga n'eky'omugasho munonga aha batuuze baaryo. Okumanyisibwa ebikwatireine n'ebikwatireine n'emishoro hamwe n'embaririra, nikibaasa kuhwera abantu kwejumba omu kuhanuura kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, transparency and open communication are essential for fostering trust between citizens and their leaders. With the right tools and platforms, individuals can actively engage in the political process.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwerufu n'okuwuliziganya mu bwesimbu bikulu nnyo mu kutumbula obwesige wakati wa bannansi n'abakulembeze baabwe. Abantu basobola okwenyigira mu byobufuzi nga balina ebikozesebwa ebituufu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo ki ada ki lok atir pire tek tutwal pi kelo gen ikin anywali ki lutela gi. Ki jami tic ki yub matir, dano acel-acel twero bedo tye I yub me cung iwibye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, aica keda einer loepukora erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor amunokina kiding itunga keda engarenok kec. Keda iboro ka iponesio luajokak, epedorete itunga ajaut toma akiro nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, e'yo ada azini e'yo nzeza ngmboru ri eri orodriru asi'baza ejizu kari anzi eyi ma eselea drice'ba eyivile 'diyi pie. Afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi pie, 'ba yi eco fi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuby'obutegyeki, oburingaaniza n'empurizagana ey'amazima n'ey'omugasho omukureetaho obwesigye ahagati y'abantu n'abebembezi baabo. Abantu nibabaasa kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki baine ebikwato n'emitendera ehikire.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the power of governance ultimately resides with the people. To ensure that their rights and freedoms are protected, citizens must remain vigilant and engaged in the political process.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obuyinza bw'okufuga ku nkomerero buba mu bantu. Okusobola okukakasa nti eddembe lyabwe likuumibwa, bannansi balina okubeera obulindaala n'okwenyigira mu byobufuzi.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, twero me tela tye bot lwak. Me neno ni ki gwoko twero ki bedo agonya gi, anywali omyero gubed ma wanggi twolo dok gubed tye I yub me cung iwibye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, apedor naka aipuga erai kanejaas itunga. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuaritai apedorosio kec keda ailajara kec, ekot itunga asalakin epodokitos ka ajaut toma akiro nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, okpo driceza niri asizu aa o'bi eyi vu. Aa'zu kililiru kini 'ba ma mba drilemgbo yini azini driwala yini 'diyi ma ta, le kari anzi ma ovu mile be azini eyi ma su e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, abantu nibo baine obushoborozi bw'okwebembera. Okureeba ngu obugabe bwabo n'obugabe bwabo birindwa, abatuuragye bashemereire kuguma beteekateekire n'okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Taxation plays a crucial role in funding essential services and infrastructure in any community. Therefore, it is important to educate residents about their responsibilities and the benefits of contributing to the local economy.
lug_prompt: Emisolo gikola omulimu munene mu kusonda ssente z'obuweereza n'ebizimbe ebikulu mu kitundu kyonna. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okusomesa abatuuze ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe n'emigaso gy'okuyambako mu by'enfuna by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Mucoro konyo tutwal I miyo kony me lim I kabedo mo keken. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lwak i kom tic gi ki ber pa konyo ilok me lim.
teo_prompt: Isolosinei iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aigangia aiboisio keda aiboisio nuepolok noi kotoma atutubet. Kanuka ngun, ejok aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos aswam kec keda ajokis naka aingarakin edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Musoro eyi azi okporu ni nga robia fezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyini tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie ongulumu eyi ma alea. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri imbata fezu azi eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu orodri eyini ecozu e'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okushorooza emishoro nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kushashurira obuheereza n'ebyombeko ebikuru omu kyanga kyona. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kwegyesa abatuuragye obujunanizibwa bwabo n'emigasho y'okuhwera omu by'entaasya y'ekyaro.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve tax compliance and awareness among citizens, the government has recognized the need for better education on taxation matters. As part of this initiative, Uganda Revenue Authority has set up various conferences to educate people about taxation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula amateeka g'emisolo n'okumanyisa bannansi, gavumenti etegedde obwetaavu bw'okusomesa obulungi ku nsonga z'emisolo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, Uganda Revenue Authority etaddewo enkungaana ez'enjawulo okusomesa abantu ku by'emisolo.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me lubu cik me mucoro ki rweyo lwak, gamente oniang ni omyero ki pwony lwak i kom lok me mucoro. Macalo but yub man, dul me Uganda Revenue Authority oketo kacoke mapol me pwonyo dano i kom mucoro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aitojokar aitup ikisila luka isolosinei ka aisisianakin itunga, abu apugan koany eipud loka aisisianakin itunga nuka isolosinei. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, etemoki Erionget Loka Ikapun airiamunun kanu aisisianakin itunga nuka isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba kari anzi eyi ma eselea imbata fezu azini imbata fezu e'yo musoro ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete esu e'yo lezu onita fezu e'yo musoro ni 'diyi ma dria ri ra. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, amuti Uganda Revenue Authority niri 'ba otita karakara eyi imbata fezu o'bi eyidri e'yo musoro ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omutindo gw'emishoro hamwe n'okumanyisa abantu, gavumenti eyorekire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okwegyesa abantu aha nshonga z'emishoro. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ekitongore ky'emishoro ekya Uganda Revenue Authority kitandikireho enteerane nyingi z'okwegyesa abantu ebirikukwata aha mishoro.

eng_prompt: Engaging in discussions about economic issues is crucial for a healthy democracy. One important topic that often sparks debate is the effectiveness and fairness of taxation policies in the country.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga z'ebyenfuna kya mugaso nnyo mu demokulasiya omulungi. Omulamwa ogumu omukulu ogutera okuleetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo bwe bulungi n'obwenkanya bw'enkola y'emisolo mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok I kom lok me lim obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tela pa lwak. Lok acel ma pire tek ma pol kare kelo laro lok obedo ber pa cik me mucoro I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Alomar toma oineresinei nuikamunitos akiro nuka ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aseo najokan. Adiopet akiro nuepolok nuepedorete ayangaun epeget ngesi aitodolikineta nuka isolosinei kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo democracia ni aa'zu muke ri ni. E'yo azi okporu agbatara ejipi sa'wa driasi ri eri geri kililiru azini kililiru e'yo musoro ofeza ma dria kari ma alia 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu kuhanuura aha nshonga z'eby'entaasya n'eky'omugasho munonga omu by'obutegyeki. Omutwe gumwe ogw'omugasho ogurikukira kureetaho okuhanuura n'okukoragye n'oburinganiza bw'ebiragiro by'emishoro omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about fiscal responsibility, it has become clear that the general public tends to prioritize immediate financial concerns over the complexities of tax regulations. As a result, many individuals remain indifferent to the nuances of how tax policies are structured and implemented.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'omusolo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abantu batera okukulembeza eby'ensimbi okusinga amateeka g'emisolo. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi tebafaayo ku ngeri enkola z'omusolo gye zitegekebwamu n'okuteekebwa mu nkola.
ach_prompt: I nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom tic ki mucoro, nen atyer kamaleng ni lwak ipol kare giketo cwinygi tutwal I kom lok me lim I kom cik mapat-pat makwako mucoro. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol pe giparo pi kit ma kiyubu ki keto cik me mucoro itic kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, ecai cut ebe ekotosi itunga aisingarenit akiro nuka ikapun adepar ikisila luka isolosinei. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu epodokinitos epone loitemonokino ka aitodolikin ainapeta nuka isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ece ra kini o'bi eyi le e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo okporu azita musoro ni 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi asikokoru geri 'bani azita musara ofezu 'diyi sizu azini 'bani eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho okurikukwata aha nshonga z'emishoro, nikyoreka butunu ngu abantu nibakira kwebembeza eshonga z'empiiha kukira ebiragiro by'emishoro. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi tibarikufayo aha nkora y'ebiragiro by'emishoro.

eng_prompt: As income inequality continues to rise, many citizens are feeling the burden of an outdated tax system. It is crucial for individuals to recognize the impact of tax policy on their financial well-being and the economy as a whole.
lug_prompt: Ng'obutafaanagana mu nfuna bweyongera okulinnya, bannansi bangi bawulira omugugu gw'enkola y'emisolo enkadde. Kya mugaso nnyo abantu kinnoomu okutegeera engeri enkola y'omusolo gy'ekosaamu embeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi n'ebyenfuna okutwaliza awamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma can lim tye kamede kwede, anywali mapol tye ka winyo peko me yub me mucoro macon. Pire tek tutwal ki dano me niang adwoki pa cik me mucoro I kom limgi ki lim pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor amamus airiamara naka ikapun, epupete itunga luipu ationis na isolosinei lumojong. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga ajenun epone loepedoriata ainapeta nuka isolosinei aijar kec keda edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza afa isuzuri ma eselea ri ni mu drile tu, kari anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru musoro ofeza ni ewu drio ri ma alea ri ma e'yosi. Eri orodriru 'ba alu alu 'diyi ni e'yo azita musoro ni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu geri eyini robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo robiani 'diyi pie dria.
nyn_prompt: Obutaingana bw'entaasya bweyongyeire kweyongyera, abatuuragye baingi nibahurira oburemeezi bw'enkora y'emishoro eyahwaireho. N'eky'omugasho munonga abantu kumanya omugasho gw'ebiragiro by'emishoro aha ntatsya yaabo hamwe n'eby'entaasya yoona.

eng_prompt: In recent years, residents of West Nile have increasingly voiced their concerns over unfair tax practices. As a result, community leaders have mobilized efforts to address these grievances.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, abatuuze b'e West Nile beeyongedde okulaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'emisolo egitali gya bwenkanya. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakunga abantu okukola ku kwemulugunya kuno.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak me West Nile omede ki nyutu lworo gi i kom yub me mucoro ma pe ber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kabedo guyubu yoo me tyeko koko magi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apotu itunga luko West Nile kitodiasi aiyalongongokec kanuka iponesio luarokok luka isolosinei. Kanuka ngun, imorikikinos engarenok luka atutubet agogongu kanu aitemokin angurian nu.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu westnile niri ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo musoro ofeza geri kililiru ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra okpo e'yo onyota 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abatuuragye ba West Nile beeyongyeire kworeka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'emishoro etari y'oburingaaniza. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bateire amaani omu kukora aha kwetomboita oku.

eng_prompt: In order to address the pressing issues surrounding our current tax system, we have decided to launch an initiative focused on comprehensive reform. To ensure the success of this initiative, collaboration with key stakeholders is essential.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu ezeetoolodde enkola yaffe ey'emisolo eriwo kati, tusazeewo okutongoza enteekateeka eyeesigamiziddwa ku nnongoosereza enzijuvu. Okukakasa obuwanguzi bw'enteekateeka eno, okukwatagana n'abakwatibwako abakulu kya mugaso.
ach_prompt: Me tyeko peko matye i kom yub me mucoro ma watye kwede kombedi, wamoko tamwa me kelo aloka-loka mapol. Pi neno ni tic man owoto maber, ribbe ki joo ma pigi tego obedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok nuikamunitos esolo loakwana, aseutu sio aitegear ainapeta nuikamunitos aijulanakineta. Kanu awanyun ebe epedori aswam ngun, ibusakinit aimorikikin keda itunga luapolok.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo okporu ama vile geri musoro trazuri ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu, ama asi e'do e'yo azi 'bani asi 'bazu ojata dria ma dria. E'yo 'di ma drile suzu, ti ecita 'ba ambo 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikukwata aha nkora yaitu y'emishoro eriho hati, tushaziremu kutandikaho enteekateeka y'okuhindura ebintu byona. Okureeba ngu enteekateeka egi neekora gye, okukwatanisa n'abaine akakwate n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent events and growing concerns within the community, many individuals felt it was crucial to come together. As a result, they organized gatherings to address pressing issues affecting their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'obweraliikirivu obweyongera mu kitundu, abantu bangi baalaba nga kya mugaso okujja awamu. N'ekyavaamu, baategeka enkiiko okwogera ku nsonga ez'amangu ezikwata ku bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki lworo matye kamede I kin lwak, dano mapol otamo ni pire tek tutwal me ribbe. Macalo adwogi ne, guyubu kacoke me lok I kom peko matye ka yelo kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongongo naka itunga, apotu itunga luipu kowomitos ebe ejokuna aimorikikin. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi itemokisi airiamununeta kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuetiroritos aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu asi otiza tupi ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie, 'ba karakara eyi ega kini eri orodriru emuzu tualu. E'yo 'disi, eyi otu okuta eyi e'yo ewaru eyi ma edri o'du driasi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira okweyongyeire omu bantu, abantu baingi bakareeba ngu n'eky'omugasho kwegaita hamwe. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatebekanisa enteerane z'okugamba aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa amagara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: Despite the controversy surrounding his appointment, the local government proceeded with the ceremony. Many community members expressed their concerns about the legitimacy of the process.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo okusika omuguwa okwetooloola okulondebwa kwe, gavumenti y'ebitundu yagenda mu maaso n'omukolo. Abantu b'omu kitundu bangi baalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe ku bwenkanya bw'enkola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni laro lok obedo tye I kom yer mege, gamente me tedero omede ki yub ne. Lwak mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom yub eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ingungeta kanu aseunio ke, abu apugan naka atutubet kinyikok aitolot epucit ngol. Apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongosiokec kanuikamunitos abeit naka ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako erini 'ba opezuri ma dria ra ti, gamete angu 'da ma alea ri mu drile omu 'da be. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obutaikirizana obwabaireho ahabw'okutooranwa kwe, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekagumizamu n'omukoro. Abantu baingi omu byaro boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'enteekateeka egyo.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions among community members, a consensus emerged on the need for a unified voice. As a result, he was confirmed as the representative for Muslim leaders.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bantu b'ekitundu, okukkaanya kwavaayo ku bwetaavu bw'eddoboozi ery'awamu. N'ekyavaamu, yakakasibwa okuba omukiise w'abakulembeze b'abasiraamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol ikin lwak, winye obedo tye I kom miti me bedo ki dwon acel. Macalo adwogi ne, kimoko ni en obedo lacungu pi lutela pa cilam.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu kanejaas itunga luka atutubet, apotu itunga luka atutubet opuputu nuikamunitos eipuda lo aimorikikina. Kanuka ngun, aponi itigogongorai ngesi kwape abwoikiniton engarenok lu isiramun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, ti ecita efu e'yo lezu o'duko ti ecita niri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai eri 'ba pa tupi drice'ba isilamu eyini 'diyi ma paria ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga omu bantu b'omukyanga, hakabaho okukirizana aha nshonga y'okugira eiraka rimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, akahamibwa nk'omujwekyerwa w'abebembezi b'abasiraamu.

eng_prompt: The judge called the case to order, expecting the defendant to be present for the proceedings. However, after waiting for several minutes, it became clear that the defendant was absent.
lug_prompt: Omulamuzi yayita omusango okutereera, ng'asuubira omuwawaabirwa okubeerawo mu kuwulira omusango. Naye oluvannyuma lw'okulinda eddakiika eziwerako, kyeyoleka bulungi nti omuwawaabirwa teyabaddewo.
ach_prompt: Langol kop ne olwongo pido ne me winye, kun tye ki byek ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni obubedo tye ikare me winyo pido ne. Kadi bed kumeno, ingee kuru pi dakika mapol, onen atyer kamaleng ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni peke.
teo_prompt: Abu ekatubon onyarau emusago ngol, aomit ebe ebuni lo iwosatai ajaikin toma apupio. Konye, akaulo naka aidar idakikan luipu, aponi kojenunai ebe emamei lo iwosatai.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo lipiri omve kesi 'da ma ti e'dozu kililiru, erini egazu kini agu 'bani toleri nga ovu e'yo eriza ma alia ci. Kani si, 'bani tezu dakika karakara 'bori ma vutia, eca kililiru kini agu 'bani toleri yo.
nyn_prompt: Omuramuzi akeeta omushango kugyenda omu maisho, arikuteekateeka ngu orikujunaanwa naija kubaho omu kuhurira omushango. Kwonka, bwanyima y'okurinda edakiika nyingi, kikarebeka butunu ngu orikujunaanwa akaba atariho.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about community cohesion, concerns have been raised regarding the actions of certain influential figures. Their rhetoric and decisions appear to be contributing to a growing divide among followers.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku kukwatagana kw'ekitundu, okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bikolwa by'abantu abamu ab'amaanyi. Ebigambo byabwe n'okusalawo kwabwe birabika nga biviiriddeko enjawukana mu bagoberezi okweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom ribbe pa lwak, lworo obedo tye I kom tim pa dano mogo ma oywek tutwal. Lokgi kacel ki moko tam gi tye ka kelo apoka poka ikin lulub korgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos aimorikikina naka itunga, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aswamisio nuka itunga ice luejenara. Akiro kec keda aseununeta kec esubit bala eyangaunitos atiakatiaka kanejaas atupitokokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea e'yo ti icita ongulumu eyini ri ma dria, 'ba e'bi asi otiza eji e'yo 'yeta 'ba azi okporu 'diyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza yini azini e'yo yini 'dule 'diyi fe esele coza ma omgbo ni tuzu 'ba yi ma vuti obi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha kukwatanisa kw'abantu, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha bikorwa by'abantu b'amaani. Engambo zaabo hamwe n'ebiteiso byabo nibireebeka nk'ebirikureetaho okwebaganisamu ahagati y'abakuratsi baabo.

eng_prompt: In a historic election marked by a strong turnout, the community of Arua gathered to cast their votes. After a heated campaign filled with passionate debates, the results were finally announced.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okw'ebyafaayo okwabaddemu abantu abangi, abantu b'omu Arua baakuŋŋaanye okukuba akalulu. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya akalulu akaabaddemu okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, ebyavaamu byalangirirwa.
ach_prompt: I yer me tekwaro ma dano mapol gubedo tye iye, lwak me Arua gugure me bolo kwir. Ingee bito kwi matek tutwal ma opong ki laro lok matek tutwal, adwogi yer ne dong kinyuto.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo naepol noi najaasi keda itunga luipu, apotu itunga luka Arua kotukokinos aicak abootin. Akaulo naka ikampeins luejaasi keda epeget loepol noi, aponi kolimorai akiro nuelomunitos.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ewu driori ma alea 'ba karakara eyi emuzu opetaa 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi voti 'bezu. E'yo agbatara ni okporu 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba azi e'yo agata ni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru k'ebyafaayo akarimu abantu baingi, abantu ba Arua baketeerana kuteera akaruuru. Bwanyima y'okuronda akaruuru akarimu okuhanuura kw'amaani, ebyarugiremu bikarangirirwa.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been growing discontent among various communities regarding political decisions. This dissatisfaction has led to a critical examination of leadership within the Muslim community.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo obutali bumativu mu bitundu eby'enjawulo ku nsonga z'ebyobufuzi. Obutali bumativu buno buviiriddeko okwekenneenya ennyo obukulembeze mu kitundu ky'Abasiraamu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, cwer cwiny tye ka mede ikin lwak malube ki moko tam me cung iwibye. Cwer cwiny man oweko lutela me dini cilam gucako timo peny.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga luegelegela kanuikamunitos aseununeta nuka epolitikis. Amamus na aiyalama ayangau aingic naepol noi naka engarenone kotoma atutubet naka isiramun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi e'bi tu ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria. Erita ako 'di fe 'bani driceza isilamu eyini 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, habeireho okwetomboita omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe aha bikwatiraine n'ebiteiso by'eby'obutegyeki. Obutahikiirira obu, buretsireho okushwijuma obwebembezi omu bantu b'abasiraamu.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising within the community as members expressed dissatisfaction with the council's decisions. The final straw came when the Supreme Council announced its controversial plan to sell off Muslim properties.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu kitundu nga bammemba balaga obutali bumativu olw'okusalawo kw'olukiiko. Enkomerero yajja olukiiko olw'oku ntikko bwe lwalangirira enteekateeka yaalwo ey'okutunda ebintu by'abasiraamu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde I kin lwak I kare ma lumemba gunyutu cwer cwiny gi I kom moko tam pa kancil. Tyen lok me agiki obino I kare ma dul me Supreme Council otito yubgi me cato jami pa cilam.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma atutubet naarai apotu imeban itodutu amamut aiyalama kanu aseununeta nuka ekansulo. Abu atutubet ngin kobu ne alimoria ekansulo loka apolon akapanakinikec naka agwelar iboro lu isiramun.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ri e'bi tu ongulumu eyi ma alea 'ba eyini e'da eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku e'yo 'dule kanisulu 'da ni 'diyisi. E'yo asizuri emu amuti supreme council niri ni e'yo otuta eyini lezu afa isilamu eyini 'diyi ozizu ri oluzu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu bantu, ahabw'okugira ngu tibarashemerereirwe ebiteiso by'akakiiko. Enkomerero ekabaho obu orukiiko rukuru rwarangirira enteekateeka yarwo y'okuguza ebintu by'abasiraamu.

eng_prompt: After much deliberation and consideration of various candidates, the council finally reached a consensus on the most suitable individual for the position. This choice was not made lightly, as the responsibilities of leadership demand a unique set of attributes.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okulowooza ku bantu ab'enjawulo abaali beesimbyewo, akakiiko kaatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku ani asinga okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa obwo. Okusalawo kuno tekwakolebwa mpola mpola, kubanga obuvunaanyizibwa bw'obukulembeze bwetaagisa ebintu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako tam ki tam I kom lucungu mapol, dul enoni owinye I kom ngat ma oporre pi tic enoni. Yer man pe otime atyer kamaleng, pien tic pa lutela mito jami mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem ka aomoom nuikamunitos abwoak luipu, abu ekansulo kodolok acamanar kanu itunganan yenepedori aswam ngun. Mam aseunet ngin aponi kitolomunai katipet, naarai ipudasi engarenok iponesio luitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egaza ma vutia azini 'ba karakara pa tupi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu 'da esu asizu ti ecita 'ba muke ndeni pari 'da ni ma dria. Ba 'duni e'yo 'di ewakokoru ku a'dusikuni azi driceza ni 'diyi le 'ba ma ovu wura ndu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga n'okushwijuma abetsimbireho, akakiiko kakahika aha kwikirizana aha muntu oshemereire entebe egyo. Okucwamu oku tikukozirwe mpora mpora, ahabw'okuba obujunanizibwa bw'obwebembezi nibwetaga emicwe y'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In today's diverse society, fostering unity and collaboration among different communities is essential. One way to achieve this is by encouraging Muslims to come together and contribute positively to the welfare of all.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino ab'enjawulo, okutumbula obumu n'okukolagana mu bitundu eby'enjawulo kya mugaso. Engeri emu ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukubiriza abasiraamu okwegatta n'okukola ekisingawo ku lw'obulungi bw'abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma dano tye ma pat pat, dongo ribe ki winye ikin lwak ma pat pat obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Yo acel me cobo man obedo ki cuku cwiny cilam me ribbe kacel wek gutim jami mabeco pi ber bedo pa dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar naka itunga luegelegela, epolokit aimorikikina keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luegelegela. Epone ediope loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aisinyikokinit isiramun aimorikikin kosodete aswam kagogong kanu ajokis naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, ti ecita azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri lezu isilamu eyini ava fezu emuzu tualu dika eyi ma nga azi muke 'ba dria eyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba abaine emicwe etarikushushana, okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe n'eky'omugasho. Omuringo gumwe gw'okukora eki n'okuhiga abasiraamu kukorera hamwe, kugira ngu buri omwe atungye ebirungi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the strength of the Muslim community relies heavily on the solidarity of its leaders. It is essential for them to present a united front to effectively address the challenges facing their followers.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu, amaanyi g'abasiraamu geesigama nnyo ku bumu bw'abakulembeze baago. Kya mugaso nnyo okuba obumu okusobola okukola ku bizibu abagoberezi baabwe bye boolekaganye nabyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, teko pa cilam jenge tutwalle I kom ribe pa lutela gi. Pire tek tutwal ni myero gubed ma guribe pi tyeko peko ma lulub korgi tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, agogong naka isiramun ejai kotoma aimorikikina naka engarenok ke. Erai ibore yenepol noi kesi aitodiar aimorikikina kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas atupitok kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, okpo ongulumu isilamu eyini 'diyi niri ati drice'ba eyini 'diyi ma ti ecita ma dria. Eri orodriru eyini ti ecita ejizu e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, amaani g'abasiraamu nigeesigama munonga aha kukwatanisa kw'abebembezi baabo. N'eky'omugasho kureetaho obumwe, kugira ngu babaase kukora aha buremeezi obu abakurasi baabo barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: Amid growing unrest among the local population, the supreme council convened an emergency meeting to address the controversial decision. Tensions escalated as community leaders expressed their concerns over the implications of the new Khadi.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butabanguko obweyongera mu bantu b'omu kitundu, olukiiko olukulu lwayita olukiiko olw'amangu okukola ku kusalawo okukontana. Obunkenke bweyongedde ng'abakulembeze b'ekitundu balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku bikwata ku Khadi omuggya.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny matye kamede I kin lutedero, dul ma doro lok kom gamente olwongo kacoke ma opoto atura me lok I kom tam makelo apoka-poka. Lworo omede ikare ma lutela me kabedo mapatpat gunyutu lworo gi I kom adwoki pa Khadi manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apol naka amumu kanejaas itunga luka atutubet, abu ekansulo loapolon konyarau airiamunet naka atipet kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aseunet ngin. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu engarenok luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos nuepedorete aswam naka Khadi loitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma talasi, supreme council omve mitingi mbeleru e'yo 'duza 'da ma aza kozu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi tu drile drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ni e'dazu asi otiza eyini e'yo Khadi o'diru ni 'diyi ma dria risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu bantu b'omubyaro,akakiiko akakuru kaketa orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kukora aha nsharamu egyo etarikwetegyerezibwa. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'abeebembezi b'ebyanga kworeka okwerarikirira kwabo aha bikwatiraine na Khadi omusya.

eng_prompt: During a recent interfaith dialogue, participants discussed the structure and governance of various religious organizations. The conversation turned to the leadership roles within Christianity, prompting questions about the nature of authority in different faiths.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kw'amadiini gyebuvuddeko awo, abeetabamu baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsengeka n'enfuga y'ebitongole by'amadiini eby'enjawulo. Emboozi yakyukira ku mirimu gy'obukulembeze mu bukrisitu, ekyaleetawo ebibuuzo ku butonde bw'obukulembeze mu nzikiriza ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lok ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ikin dini mapat-pat, joo ma obedo tye guloko i kom yub ki tela pa dule me dini mapat-pat. Lok ne olokke I kom tic pa lutela I dini pa lucristayo, ma okelo lapeny I kom kit ma tela tye kwede I dini mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka aineranara naka idiinin luegelegela, apotu itunga kitetemoto epone loipugatere iriongeta lu idiinin luegelegela. Abu einer kijulakin toma aswamisinei nuka engarenok kotoma ikurisitayon, ido abu koyangau aingiseta nuikamunitos apedorosio nuka idiinin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu dini eyi ma eselea o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi agbatara gba e'yo amuti ndundu eyi ma driceza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza 'da oja i azi driceza ni kristiani eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria, erini fezu zita eyi ejizu e'yo driceza ni dini ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'amadiini agatarikushushana, abeejumbiremu bakahanuura aha nkora n'obwebembezi bw'ebitongore by'amadiini ebitarikushushana. Okuganiira kukahindukira aha mirimo y'obwebembezi omu bukurisitaayo, ekyaretsireho ebibuuzo ebirikukwata aha nshonga y'obushoborozi omu nyikiriza ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: In the wake of recent conflicts and divisions, community leaders gathered to discuss the importance of solidarity. They recognized that only through collaboration could they heal the rifts and build a stronger future for Arua district.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano n'enjawukana ezaaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okwegatta. Baakitegeera nti okuyitira mu kukolagana bokka basobola okuwonya enjawukana n'okuzimba ebiseera by'omu maaso eby'amaanyi eri disitulikiti ya Arua.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lweny ki apoka-poka obedo tye cokcok-ki, lutela me kabedo gugure me nywako lok I kom ber pa ribe. Guniang ni ka gutiyo kacelo ci gitwero tyeko apoka-poka ki yubu anyim maber pi Arua.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ingungeta keda atiakatiaka pac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aimorikikina. Apotu kesi kojenutu ebe kowai lo aiswamanara kesi bon epedorete aitemokin atiokisio ka aiduk ingaren loegogong kanuka edisitrikta loka Arua.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri azini esele coza ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu orodri ti ecita niri ma dria. Eyi esu ra kini eyi eco lu ti ecita si esele coza eyi ma aza ko dika eyi si ewu drialeri distrikiti Arua niri ni okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko n'okwebaganisamu okwabaireho juba, abeebembezi b'ebyanga baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okukwatanisa. Bakeetegyereza ngu okurabira omu kukwatanisa, nibo barikubaasa kumaraho obutaikirizana n'okwombeka nyensya nungi omu disiturikiti ya Arua.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower the next generation, the organization has launched a new program. This initiative aims to foster personal growth and community engagement among participants.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omulembe oguddako, ekitongole kitongozza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula enkulaakulana y'omuntu n'okwenyigiramu kw'ekitundu mu beetabamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor anyim, dul ne oyabo yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me tyelo kor dongo pa ngat acel acel ki bedo tye pa lwak ikin joo matye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong ateker na etupakini, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitopolor apol naka itunga keda aimorikikin itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi dri, amuti 'da e'do otita azi o'diru ni. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu zota ma omgbo otuzu tualu ongulumu eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura abantu ab'omurembe ogurikwija, ekitongore kitandikireho puroguraamu nsya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu n'okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to engage the youth and foster critical thinking, local government officials are planning a series of educational initiatives. One key component of this initiative will be to encourage student participation in discussions on important societal issues.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyingiza abavubuka n'okutumbula endowooza ennungi, abakungu ba gavumenti z'ebitundu bateekateeka enteekateeka z'ebyenjigiriza eziwerako. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka eno kwe kukubiriza abayizi okwetaba mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'omugaso mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me weko bulu bedo ki tam maber, lutic pa gamente me tedero tye ka yubu yub me pwony mapol. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo cuku cwiny lutino kwan me nywako lok I kom lok mapigi tego I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aisisianakin atumunak ka aisisianakin itunga aomisio nuajokak, eutasi eswamak luka apugan aitemonokin nuka aisisia. Adiopet koboro luapolok luka aswamisioit kana erai aisinyikokit esisiak ajaut toma oineresinei nuikamunitos akiro nuepolok nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba ode eyi ma eselea azini e'yo egazu kililiru, azi'ba gamete ni angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otu otita onita ni karakara eyi. Afa azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri ni mu adri sukulu anzi eyi ma ava engazu e'yo nzezu e'yo okporu ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho eminyeeto n'okureetaho emiteekateekyere mirungi, abakuru omu gavumenti z'ebyaro bariyo nibatebekanisa enteekateeka y'eby'obwegyese. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu nteekateeka egi n'okushaba abeegi kwejumba omu kugaaniira aha nshonga nkuru z'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to cultivate the next generation of influential leaders, the initiative has been designed to empower young individuals with the skills and knowledge necessary for effective leadership. By focusing on personal development and community engagement, the program aims to create a lasting impact on both the students and their communities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukulaakulanya omulembe oguddako ogw'abakulembeze ab'amaanyi, enteekateeka eno ekoleddwa okuwa abavubuka amagezi n'obukugu obwetaagisa mu bukulembeze obulungi. Mu kussa essira ku nkulaakulana y'omuntu n'okwenyigiramu kw'ekitundu, pulogulaamu egenderera okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ey'olubeerera ku bayizi n'ebitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me pwonyo lutela mabeco manyen, yub eni kiyubu me miyo diro ki ngec ma mite pi lutela mabeco. I keto cwiny I kom dongo pa ngat acel acel ki ribbe pa lwak, yub eni tye ki miti me kelo adwogi maber pi kare malac I kom lutino kwan ki kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitolomun engarenok luka ateker naetupakini, etemokinitai ainapeta ngun kanu aitogogong atumunak keda acoa keda acoa na ekotoi kanu aingarenikin ejok. Kowai lo aisingarenit apol naka itunganan keda aiswamanara keda itunga, ekot ainapeta ngun aitolomun ajokis naepol noi mama ejaasi esisiak keda itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu drice'ba okporu ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi ezozu, 'ba otu e'yo 'di 'bazu 'ba ode eyi ma okpo fezu ondua azini ondua eyini le driceza muke ri si. Otita 'da ni asi 'bazu e'yo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni zozu azini e'yo ongulumu eyini 'yezu ri ma dria, lezu orodri ewu drile ri ejizu sukulu anzi eyi ma dria tualu ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutendeka omurembe ogurikukurataho gw'abebembezi ab'amaani, enteekateeka etebekanisiibwe okuheereza eminyeeto emyoga n'obwengye ebirikwetengwa ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. Omu kuta amaani aha ntunguuka y'omuntu weena hamwe n'okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu, puroguraamu negyenderera kureetaho entunguuka y'obwire buraingwa aha beegi hamwe n'abantu b'omubyanga byabo.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, it is essential to equip young minds with the skills and knowledge necessary for effective leadership. To address this need, the program focuses on developing critical thinking, collaboration, and innovative problem-solving abilities among students.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, kya mugaso okuwa abavubuka amagezi n'obukodyo obwetaagisa mu bukulembeze obulungi. Okukola ku bwetaavu buno, pulogulaamu essira eritadde ku kukulaakulanya endowooza ey'obwegendereza, okukwatagana, n'obuyiiya mu kugonjoola ebizibu mu bayizi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni, pire tek tutwal me miyo diro ki ngec ma mite pi tela maber. Me tyeko miti man, yub eni oketo cwinygi tutwalle I dongo tam matir, ribe, ki diro me cobo peko I kin lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ejokuna noi aijaikin atumunak acoa keda acoa na ipudasi kesi kanu aingarenikin ejok. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, isingarenit ainapeta ngun aitopolorite aomisio, aiswamanara keda aomisio nuka aitemokin atiokisio kanejaas esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do i ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba oderu 'diyi dri ondua fezu tualu ondua eyini le driceza muke ri be. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, otita 'di 'ba asi e'yo egaza kililiru 'diyi ezozu, ti icita ma dria, azini e'yo ewaru eyi ma aza kozu geri o'diru 'diyisi sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza eminyeeto emyoga n'obwengye ebirikwetengwa ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. Okukora aha nshonga egi, puroguraamu neeta amaani omu kutunguura emiteekateekyere y'abeegi, okukwatanisa, n'okumanya oku barikubaasa kumaraho oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: Involving students in the governance of their educational environment fosters a sense of ownership and responsibility. Their unique perspectives can lead to more effective and relevant policies that enhance the learning experience.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira kw'abayizi mu kuddukanya ebitundu byabwe eby'okusomeramu kikulaakulanya enneewulira y'obwannannyini n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Endowooza zaabwe ez'enjawulo zisobola okuviirako enkola ennungi era ez'omugaso ezongera ku bumanyirivu bw'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye pa lutino kwan I tela me gang kwan gi weko giwinyo ni gitye ki twero ki twero. Tam gi ma pat pat twero kelo yoo me tic maber dok ma ber ma medo rwom me kwan.
