teo_prompt: Aitolomio na esisiak kotoma aipuga aiboisio nu isisiaete kesi eyangauni aomisioit naka ajaut keda apedor. Iponesio kec luitegelikina epedorete ayangaun ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar aisisia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyini fizu e'yo angu eyini sukulu lazu 'diyi ma dricezu ri ma alea ri ni fe eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi ni azini eyi ma azi eyi 'yezu. Egata eyini 'diyi eco fe 'ba eyini azita kililiru azini orodriru 'diyi esu eyini ani onita ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okweta abeegi omu bwebembezi bw'eby'obwegyese bwabo, nikureetaho okwetegyereza n'obujunaanizibwa. Ebiteekateeko byabo eby'omutaano nibibaasa kureetaho enkora nungi kandi erikukwata ahaby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In today's lecture, we will explore the fundamental principles of political systems and their impact on society. By the end of the session, students will acquire knowledge about governance.
lug_prompt: Mu kusomesa kwa leero, tujja kunoonyereza ku misingi emikulu egy'enkola z'ebyobufuzi n'engeri gye bikwatamu abantu. Ku nkomerero y'olutuula, abayizi bajja kufuna amagezi ku bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: I pwony ma tin, wabineno cik mapigi tego ma doro tela me cungu iwi bye ki adwogi ne I kom lwak. Ikare ma pwony otum, lutino kwan gubi nongo ngec i kom tela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisisianakino naka lolo, ibuni sio airereor nutupitono nuka ainapeta nuka epolitikis keda epone loepedoriata kesi itunga. Kangetakinet naka airiamun, epote esisiak adumun acoa naikamunit epugae.
lgg_prompt: Imbata andruri ma alia, ama nga e'yo vuti onda e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma dria azini geri yini yi 'yezu o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. Sesioni 'da ni i deria, sukulu anzi eyi nga ondua esu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwegyesa kwa erizooba, nitwija kushwijuma emisingye y'eby'obutegyeki hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo aha bantu. Omushomo ku guraabe gwahwaire, abeegi nibaija kutunga obwengye oburikukwata aha bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a harmonious community, it is essential for individuals to understand their rights and responsibilities. Awareness of societal guidelines helps prevent misunderstandings and promotes cooperation among citizens.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukulaakulanya ekitundu eky'obumu, kyetaagisa buli muntu okutegeera eddembe lye n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe. Okumanyisibwa ku biragiro by'ekitundu kiyamba okutangira obutategeeragana n'okutumbula enkolagana mu bannansi.
ach_prompt: Pi kelo ribbe ikin lwak, pire tek ni dano weng omyero guniang twero gi ki tic gi. Miyo ngec i kom cik ma doro kwo pa lwak konyo me gengo telle ki kelo ribe ikin anywali.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor itunga luimorikikina, ejokuna itunga amisiikin apedorosiokec keda aswamukec. Aitijenaret naka aicoreta nuka itunga ingarakini aitikitik amamus acamanar ka aitopolor aiswamanara kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma aa'ta tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu eyini eyi ma drilemgbo azini azi eyivile 'diyi vazu. E'yo mile oziza azita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ni azakoma fe erita ako atrizu dika eri fe ti ecita kari anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho obusingye oburikukwatanisa, nikikuru omuntu weena kwetegyereza obugabe bwe n'obujunaanizibwa bwe. Okumanyisa abantu ebiragyiro, nikizibira obutetegyerezana n'okureetaho okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming conference, students have been studying various aspects of political systems and their impact on society. Their research will culminate in a competition where they will showcase their understanding of governance dynamics.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukungaana olujja, abayizi babadde basoma ku bintu eby'enjawulo ebikwata ku nkola z'ebyobufuzi n'engeri gye bikwatamu abantu. Okunoonyereza kwabwe kujja kutuuka ku ntikko mu mpaka mwe bajja okulaga okutegeera kwabwe ku ntambula y'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kacoke matye kabino ni, lutino kwan gubedo ka kwano lok mapat-pat makwako tela me cungu iwi-bye ki adwogi ne I kom lwak. Kwed gi obi oo I agiki I pyem ma gibi nyutu niang gi I kom tela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin airiamun na ebunit, eutasi esisiak aisisia iboro luegelegela luka epolitikis keda epone loepedoriata kesi itunga. Ebuni aingic kec aitodolikin toma abolobol na ebeit kesi aitodun amisiikin kec nuikamunitos apugan.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita imbatani emupi 'diyiniri ma alia, sukulu anzi eyi ebi e'yo ndundu politiki ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo eyini 'ye ongulumu eyi ma dria 'diyi oni. E'yo vuti ondaza yini 'diyi nga ca ongmbo urusi a'bala yini yi ma vata e'dazu e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza oruteerane orurikwija, abeegi batwire nibeega ebirikukwata ahaby'obutegyeki hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo aha bantu. Okucondooza kwabo nikwiija kuhika aha muheru gw'empaka, ahu barikworeka okwetegyereza kwabo aha ntwaza y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous selection process, the top performers in each subject area have been identified. These exceptional individuals will now receive specialized coaching to prepare them for the upcoming challenges.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsulwamu okw'amaanyi, abasinga okukola obulungi mu buli ssomo bazuuliddwa. Abantu bano ab'enjawulo bajja kufuna okutendekebwa okw'enjawulo okubategekera okusoomoozebwa okujja.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me yero lutino, lutino ma gutimo maber loyo weng I gang kwan acel-acel dong kiyubu gioo. Dano ma beco eni gubi nongo pwony ma pire tek me yubu gi pi peko matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainapeta nuka aseo, aponi kojenunai lu iswamaete ejok kakere kotoma aisisiaeta kangun. Epote kwana itunga lu luitegelikina adumun aisisianakino na itegelikina kanu aitemonokin kes kanuka atiokisio nu ebunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu okporu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'ba agapi muke ndeni e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi esu 'bo. Ba wura ndusi 'diyi nga imbata esu eyini ani eyi otuzu e'yo ewaru emupi 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukuratira omuringo gw'obwegyendesereza omu kutoorana abeegi, abakusingayo kukora kurungi omuri buri ishomero bamanyirwe. Abantu aba ab'omutaano nibaija kutunga okutendekwa okw'omutaano kw'okubatebeekanisa okurwanisa oburemeezi oburikwija.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events that have divided our communities, we believe it is essential to foster a sense of national pride and unity. To achieve this, we are launching an initiative aimed at celebrating our shared values and heritage.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko ebyawuddemu ebitundu byaffe, tukkiriza nti kya mugaso okutumbula enneewulira y'eggwanga n'obumu. Okutuukiriza kino, tutongoza enteekateeka egendereddwamu okujaguza empisa zaffe ez'awamu n'obusika.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma okelo apoka-poka I kabedo wa, watye ki niyee ni pire tek tutwal me kelo awaka ki ribe I kin lobo wa. Me cobo man, watye ka cako yub me kwero jami mabeco ma wan weng watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nueswamasi pac lu atiakatiaka itunga wok, iyuunit sio ebe ejokuna aitopolor aiyalama keda aimorikikina kotoma akwapuwok. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, iuta sio aitegear ainapeta nu aimorikikinit ainumunum iponesio ka inonosio wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yo si, e'yo esele cozu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma eselea, ama a'ira kini eri orodriru e'yo kari ni 'diyi ma afusi azini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, ama e'do otita azi 'bani lezu e'yo amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati ebirikubaganisamu abantu baitu, nitwikiriza ngu n'eky'omugasho kureetaho okwetunguura n'okukwatanisa omu ihanga. Okuhikiiriza eki, turiyo nitutongoza enteekateeka erikugyenderera okujaguza emicwe yaitu hamwe n'obuhangwa bwaitu.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing political landscape, it is essential for individuals to be informed about the structures and processes that shape their societies. A solid grasp of governance principles can empower students to engage more meaningfully in civic discussions.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eky'ennaku zino ekyukakyuka amangu, kya mugaso nnyo eri abantu kinnoomu okumanyisibwa ku nsengeka n'enkola ebikulaakulanya ebitundu byabwe. Okutegeera obulungi emisingi gy'obukulembeze kisobola okuwa abayizi amaanyi okwetaba mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'omugaso.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma lok me cungu iwi bye tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal ki dano me bedo ki ngec i kom yub ki yoo me tic matye ka yubu kabedo gi. Niang matut I kom cik ma doro tela twero weko lutino kwan bedo ki kero me nywako lok ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka epolitikis loka lolo, ejokuna itunga aijen nuikamunitos epone loitemokinet itunga kec. Ajenunet naejok naka ainapeta nuka epugae epedori aitigogong esisiak ajaut toma opeget loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni curu'do oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu ni eyi ma ni e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. Vata kililiru e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria ri eco sukulu anzi eyini okpo fe e'yo nzezu e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki eby'erizooba ebirikuhinduka juba, niky'omugasho omuntu weena okumanyisibwa ebirikukwata ahabyombeko n'emitendera erikukora omu byanga bye. Okwetegyereza gye emisingye y'obwebembezi nikibaasa kuhwera abeegi kwejumba omu kuhanuura kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: In order to foster meaningful change and progress, it is essential for citizens to understand their rights and responsibilities. Empowering the population with knowledge will enable them to actively participate in the democratic process.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkyukakyuka ey'omugaso n'enkulaakulana, kya mugaso nnyo bannansi okutegeera eddembe lyabwe n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe. Okuwa abantu amagezi kijja kubasobozesa okwetaba mu nkola ya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: Pi kelo aloka-loka ki dongo lobo maber, pire tek tutwal pi anywali me niang twero ki tic gi. Miyo ngec ki lwak bikonyogi me bedo tye I yub me tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijulanakineta ka apol, ejokuna itunga amisiikin apedorosio kec keda aswamisinei kec. Aitogogong itunga keda acoa ebuni aingarakin kes ajaut toma ainapeta nuka aseo naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ojata kililiru azini zota ejizu, eri orodriru kari anzi eyini eyi ma drilemgbo azini azi eyivile 'diyi vazu. O'bi eyini okpo fezu onita si ri ni nga eyi ma aza ko e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho empindahinduka n'entunguuka, n'eky'omugasho munonga, abatuuragye kwetegyereza obugabe bwabo n'obujunaanizibwa bwabo. Okwongyera abantu amaani n'obwengye, nikiija kubahwera kwejumba omu by'obugabe bw'okusharamu.

eng_prompt: Given its rapid population growth and economic development, Arua has demonstrated the necessary attributes of a thriving urban center. Elevating its status would not only recognize its potential but also attract further investment and resources.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu okw'amangu n'enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, Arua eraga ebisaanyizo by'ekibuga ekikulaakulana. Okusitula omutindo gwayo tekikoma ku kukakasa busobozi bwayo naye era kisikiriza okusiga ensimbi n'ebikozesebwa ebirala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dongo pa wel dano ki dongo lobo madit tutwal, Arua onyuto jami ma mite me bedo boma madit ma dongo. Medo rwom ne pe bi weko dano ngeyo kero ne keken ento bene bikelo lim ki biacara mukene.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo eyatakinor enaaba loka itunga keda apol naka ikapun, etodunit Arua iponesio luajokak luka aiboisit naepol noi naka eibuga. Aitopoloor adoketait ke mam ebuni ajenun ebe epedori ngesi aswam konye ebuni bobo ayangaun ikapun keda iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini tuzu mbeleru tualu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi pie risi, Arua e'da e'yo 'ba eyini lezu aa'zu aku ambo ru 'diyi ma alea ri ra. Eri ma wura otuzuri ngani lu e'yo erini eco 'ye ra 'diyi 'ye ku te eri nga vini lonyi vuti aleza ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi eji drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abantu hamwe n'entunguuka y'eby'entaasya, Arua eretsireho ebintu ebirikwetengwa nk'orurembo rw'amaani. Okutunguura omutindo gw'eihanga tikirikumanyisa kumanya obushoboorozi bwaryo, kureka n'okureetaho eby'obushubuzi n'eby'obugaiga ebindi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the leader's primary responsibility is to ensure the well-being of the nation. It is essential for the government to prioritize the needs and welfare of its citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, obuvunaanyizibwa bw'omukulembeze obusookerwako kwe kufaayo ku bulungi bw'eggwanga. Kya mugaso gavumenti okukulembeza ebyetaago n'obulungi bwa bannansi baayo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, tic pa latela ma pire tek en aye me neno ni lobo tye maber. Pire tek ni gamente omyero oket miti pa anywali ne obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, aswam na engarenon nes awanyun ebe ejokuka akwap. Erai ibore yenepol noi apugan aisingarenit ipudesia keda aijar naka itungake.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, azi drice'ba ni okori eri kari ma ta mbazu. Eri orodriru gamete ni e'yo 'ba kari anzi erini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'duzu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi,omurimo mukuru gw'omwebembezi n'okureeba ngu eihanga rigira amagara marungi. N'eky'omugasho gavumenti kwebembeza ebyetengo n'amagara marungi g'abantu baayo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing demand for air travel and economic development, local officials have been exploring various transportation initiatives. One of the key proposals under consideration is the development of a regional airport to enhance connectivity and support business growth.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'entambula y'ennyonyi n'enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde banoonyereza ku nteekateeka z'entambula ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku biteeso ebikulu ebirowoozebwako kwe kukulaakulanya ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi eky'ekitundu okusobola okwongera ku mpuliziganya n'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me wot ki dege ki dongo lobo, lutic me tedero gubedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me wot. Tam acel ma pire tek ma gitye ka tam iye en aye me yubu bar dege me rwom ma malo wek kubbe ki biacara omedde.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka alosit keda idegei keda apol naka ikapun, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aingic iwaitin luegelegela luka alosit. Adiopet koboro lueutai airereonor ngesi aitopolor esawe loka idegei kanu aitojokar arucokina keda agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi geri ndundu acizu 'diyi ma eti onda e'yo lezu acizu ndege si ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi pie. E'yo azi okporu 'bani egale 'diyi ma azi ndege pari angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma ezota ecozu e'yo eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu tujari eyi ma zota ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'entambura y'enyonyi hamwe n'entunguuka omu by'entaasya, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibateekateeka ahaby'engyenda bitari bimwe na bimwe. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikuteekateekwaho n'okutunguura ekishaayi ky'endegye eky'omubyanga, okureetaho empurizana n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In order to promote national unity and ensure equitable development, it is essential to address the disparities that exist between different areas. A fair allocation of resources can help bridge the gap and support underprivileged communities.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obumu bw'eggwanga n'okukakasa enkulaakulana ey'obwenkanya, kyetaagisa okukola ku njawulo eriwo wakati w'ebitundu eby'enjawulo. Okugaba eby'obugagga mu ngeri ey'obwenkanya kisobola okuyamba okuziba ekituli n'okuyamba abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Me kelo ribe I kin lobo ki dongo lobo maber, pire tek tutwal me tyeko apoka-poka matye ikin lobe mapat-pat. Poko jami i yo maber twero konyo me juko apoka-poka ki konyo kabedo ma can tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aimorikikina naka akwap ka awanyun apol na ejok, ejok aitemokin atiakatiaka naejai kiding aiboisio nuegelegela. Aikor iboro ejok epedori aingarakin aitanang aiboisio nu ican.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita kari niri ma omgbo otuzu azini angu ezoma kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru e'yo esele coza angu ndundu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma awaza kililiru ri eco azakoma fe esele coza ma omgbo esizu azini atita fezu ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho okukwatanisa kw'eihanga n'entunguuka ey'oburingaaniza, n'eky'omugasho okukora aha nshonga ezitarikushushana eziri ahagati y'ebyanga ebitarikushushana. Okugaba eby'obugaiga omu muringo ogurikworeka oburinganiza, nikibaasa kuhwera abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: The current strategies for urban growth in Arua have proven ineffective in addressing the city's needs. Stakeholders have expressed the necessity for a comprehensive approach to improve infrastructure and services.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka eziriwo kati ez'okukulaakulanya ebibuga mu Arua tezirina mugaso gwonna mu kukola ku byetaago by'ekibuga. Abakwatibwako balaze obwetaavu bw'enkola ey'awamu okutumbula ebizimbe n'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Yub matye kombedi me dongo boma me Arua pe tye ki adwoki maber I cobo miti pa citi. Lutela mapat-pat guwaco ni mite ni dano weng omyero gutii ki yoo acel me ilo malo rwom me tic mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokineta nuka apol naka itaunin ko Arua mam iswamaete ejok kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka eibuga. Apotu itunga itodutu ebe ibusakinit aitolot akiro kere kanu aitojokar aiboisio keda ejanakine.
lgg_prompt: Otita curu'do tawuni eyi ezozu Arua 'diyi e'da eyi kililiru ku e'yo aku ambo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ba ambo ndundu eyi e'da e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria geri 'bani ecozu afa ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora eriho obwahati y'okutunguura orurembo omuri Arua terikubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'orurembo. Abakwatiraine nabo boorekire ekyetengo ky'okukoresa emiringo yoona kutunguura ebyombeko hamwe n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: During a recent meeting, local leaders gathered to discuss pressing issues affecting their community. They emphasized the need for immediate attention and support from higher authorities.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'amangu ezikwata ku kitundu kyabwe. Baakakasizza obwetaavu bw'okufaayo n'obuyambi okuva mu b'obuyinza ab'oku ntikko.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gugure me nywako lok I kom peko matye ka yelo kabedo gi. Guwaco ni omyero kimii kony ki bot lutela ma malo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuetiroritos itunga kec. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka aingarakinio ka agangat kama ejaasi apedorosio nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi azi ebipi o'diru ni ma alea, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu eyi 'yepi ongulumu eyivile 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo e'yo 'bani lezu asi 'bazu mbeleru azini atita esuzu engazu 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abeebembezi b'ebyaro baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa ebyanga byabo. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okureeberera n'obuhwezi kuruga omu b'obushoborozi ab'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: The recent decisions made by lawmakers have sparked intense debates among party members. As a result, many are beginning to question the motivations behind their actions.
lug_prompt: Okusalawo okwakakolebwa ababaka ba palamenti kuleeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bammemba b'ekibiina. N'ekivuddemu, bangi batandise okubuusabuusa ebigendererwa by'ebikolwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Tam ma luwang lwak I ot moko cik omoko cokcok-ki okelo laro lok I kin lumemba me dul me cungu iwi-bye ne. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka cako bedo ki akala-kala I kom tyen lok ma oweko gutimo jami magi.
teo_prompt: Aseununeta nuitolomunitai pac kama ejaasi imeeban luka airabet eyangautu epeget loepol noi kama ejaasi imeeban luka epate. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu ageun abuonokin nu iswamaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ni 'dule o'diru 'diyi fe agbatara okporu 'diyi 'ba amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okusharaho okwakozirwe abany'eishengyero, kireesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu ba memba b'ekibiina. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi batandikire kubuza ebigyendererwa by'ebikorwa byabo.

eng_prompt: After years of advocacy and community support, the local government finally approved the application for city status. This long-awaited recognition is expected to bring significant benefits to the area.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga balwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu n'obuyambi okuva mu bantu, gavumenti y'ebitundu yasemba okukkiriza okusaba kw'ekibuga. Okusiimibwa kuno okwabadde kulindiriddwa okumala ebbanga ddene kusuubirwa okuleeta emiganyulo egy'amaanyi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki cwak pa lwak, gamente me tedero i agiki ne oyee kwac me bedo city. Pwoc man ma dano gubedo kakuru pi kare malac ni obi kelo ber pa dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aicoreta keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, abu apugan naka atutubet kocam ailip naka aiboisit naka esite. Ainanakinet na naepol noi naewomitai ebe ebuni ayangaun ameda naepol noi aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara e'yo o'dukoti edrizu azini atita ongulumu eyini ri ma vutia, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi asizu rukusa fe e'yo 'ba eyini lezu aa'zu aku ambo ru ri si. Ba ega e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi esuzu sa'wa ezu ri ni nga orodri amboru eji angu 'da ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okurwanirira obusingye n'obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekaikiriza okushaba kw'orurembo. Ekitiinisa eki kitwire nikiteekateekwaho kureeta emigasho y'amaani omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Local leaders believe that achieving city status will enhance economic development and improve infrastructure in the region. They are actively engaging with community members to gather support for this initiative.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'ebyalo balowooza nti okutuuka ku ddaala ly'ekibuga kijja kutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Bakolera wamu n'abantu b'omu kitundu okukungaanya obuwagizi ku kaweefube ono.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gitye ki niyee ni nongo rwom me city obi kelo dongo lobo ki dongo lobo I but piny eni. Gitye ka lok ki lwak me coko cwak pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos engarenok luka atutubet ebe adumun adoketait na esite ebuni aitopolor edumune loka ikapun keda aitopolor aiboisio nuka atutubet. Eutasi kesi aiswamanar keda itunga luka atutubet kanu adumun agangat kanuka aswamisioit kana.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ai ra kini ecazu aku ambo ru ri ni nga angu ezoma ma omgbo otu angu 'da ma alea. Eyi azi nga okporu 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie atita trazu e'yo 'di 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abebembezi b'ebyaro nibaikiriza ngu okuhika aha rurengo rw'orurembo nikiija kutunguura eby'entatsya n'ebyombeko omu kyanga. Bariyo nibakwatanisa n'abantu b'omubyaro kurundaana obuhwezi bw'ekigyendererwa eki.

eng_prompt: In light of recent community feedback and growing concerns about local resources, the district has initiated a series of meetings to address pressing issues. As a result, district officials are focused on improving the welfare of the people.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kuddamu kw'abantu gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'obugagga by'omu kitundu, disitulikiti etandiseewo enkiiko ez'enjawulo okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu. N'ekivuddemu, abakungu ba disitulikiti essira balitadde ku kutumbula embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok ma lwak owaco cokcok-ki kacel ki lworo ma tye kamedde I kom jami me tedero, district ocako kacoke mapol me tyeko lok mapigi tego. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me dictri komgi tye I kom ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aomisio nuka itunga luka atutubet keda aiyalongong naka iboro luka atutubet, etegearit edisitrikt airiamununeta nuipu kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos eswamak luko disitrikt aitojokar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko o'diru ongulumu eyini fe 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu asi otiza tupi 'diyi pie afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria, distrikiti e'do mitingi karakara eyi e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi asi 'ba o'bi eyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebi abantu barikugarukamu ebiro ebi hamwe n'okwerarikirira ahaby'obugaiga, disiturikiti etandikireho enkiiko z'okukora aha nshonga ezirikwetengwa munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru aha disiturikiti, nibagyenderera okutunguura entuura y'abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the local economy has shown signs of recovery. As a result, many individuals in the community have started to explore various entrepreneurial ventures.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, eby'enfuna by'eggwanga biraze obubonero bw'okudda engulu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi mu kitundu batandise okunoonyereza ku bizineesi ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato angec, biacara me lobo man onyuto lanyut me roc. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol I kabedo gi gucako timo biacara mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, etodunit edumune loka ikapun kotoma akwapuwok ijenuneta luka angaleun. Kanuka ngun, ageutu itunga luipu aingic ibiasaran luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da eceta eyi e'dapi ra 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do tujari ndundu eyi 'ye 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, eby'entaasya by'eihanga byorekire obubonero bw'okugaruka omu ntebe. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi omu byanga batandikire kukora emirimo y'obushubuzi etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Residents in Arua district have been facing increasing challenges in their daily lives due to unreliable electricity access. As a result, local businesses and households are struggling to meet their energy needs.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze mu disitulikiti ya Arua babadde basanga okusoomoozebwa mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo olw'obutaba na masannyalaze. N'ekivuddemu, bizinensi n'amaka g'omu kitundu galwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago byaago eby'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Lutedero me Arua gubedo ka nongo peko mapol tutwal I kwo gi pi peko me mac. Macalo adwogi ne, biacara me tedero kacel ki gangi tye ka tute matek me cobo miti gi me mac.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga luko disitrikt loka Arua keda atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan kanuka amamus na akim. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ibiasaran keda ikalia luka atutubet aitodolikin ipudesia kec luka akim.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi distrikiti Arua niri ma alea 'diyi ebi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyi ma edri o'du driasi e'yo aci ako nirisi. E'yo 'disi, tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tualu aku eyi pie dri ci eyini ecozu eyi ma aci esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye omu disiturikiti ya Arua, batwire nibatunga oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu magara gaabo ga buriizooba, ahabw'obutabaasa kutunga amashanyarazi. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obushubuzi hamwe n'amaka g'omubyaro nibirwana kumaraho ebyetengo byago by'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Access to essential services is crucial for the development and well-being of communities. Many rural areas still lack basic infrastructure, hindering their growth and quality of life.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obuweereza obwetaagisa kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana n'obulungi bw'ebitundu. Ebitundu by'ebyalo bingi bikyalina ebikozesebwa ebikulu, ekiremesa okukulaakulana kwabyo n'omutindo gw'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony ma mite pi kwo pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki ber bedo pa lwak. Kabedo mapol me caro pwod gi peke ki jami ma mite pi dongo lobo gi ki rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun ejanakine lo itwasamao ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda ajokis naka itunga. Aiboisio nuipu nu ocaaloi eringa emamiatatar keda iboro luingarakinete kesi apolo keda adoketait na aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Afa orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni azini aa'ta onyiru ongulumu eyini ri ni. Angu caluru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alia nga po'di afa ayuzaru 'diyi yo, e'yo yini zozu azini geri yini aa'zu ri atripi.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza obw'omugasho n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'entunguuka y'abantu. Emyanya mingi y'ebyaro ekiriyo teine byombeko by'omugasho, ekirikuremesa entunguuka yaabo hamwe n'omutindo gw'amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's modern economy, reliable energy sources are crucial for maintaining productivity. Many industries rely heavily on consistent power supply to function effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino eby'omulembe, ensibuko z'amasannyalaze ezeesigika za mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma ebivaamu. Amakolero mangi geesigama nnyo ku masannyalaze agatali ga bulijjo okukola obulungi.
ach_prompt: I tenge me lim ma ite kare ni, yoo me nongo mac ma genne obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko tic. Cuma me yubo jami mapol jenge tutwalle I kom mac ma bedo tye kare ki kare me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loakwana loka ikapun, epolok noi aiboisio nuka akim kanu aidar aswam. Ipu icuman lu itwasamaete akim na etapit kanu aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni ewu curu'do ri ma alea, geri aci esuzu 'diyi orodriru e'yo afa ndundu eyi edezu ri ma tambazu. Okalamvu karakara eyi asi 'ba okpo eyini aci esuzu ri ma dria eyini ani azi ngazu kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entatsya y'erizooba, oburugo bw'amashanyarazi oburikwesigwa n'obw'omugasho munonga omukureeberera eby'obushuubuzi. Amakorero maingi nigakoresa amashanyarazi agatarikuhinduka kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: Located in the heart of the city, the museum showcases a diverse collection of art and historical artifacts. Its unique exhibits and engaging programs draw visitors from around the world.
lug_prompt: Esangibwa mu mutima gw'ekibuga, ekifo ekikuumirwamu ebintu eby'edda kiraga ebintu eby'enjawulo eby'emikono n'eby'ebyafaayo. Emyoleso gyayo egy'enjawulo ne pulogulaamu ezisikiriza zisikiriza abagenyi okuva mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Kanonge I cwiny boma madit, museum eni nyutu jami mapat-pat makwako cal ki jami macon. Yub mapat-pat me nyuto jami mapat-pat manonge iye ki yub mapat-pat manonge iye kelo wele ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat me wilobo.
teo_prompt: Ejai toma osite, itodunit aiboisit naingadaere iboro luegelegela luka aputosia keda akiro nukolosek. Itodianaro ke luitegelikina keda ainapeta nu isiyalamikinete ingalaunete ipejok kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani museum 'da esu aku ambu city niri ma alea, museum 'da e'da afa edele drisi 'diyi tualu e'yo ewu driori ma alea 'diyi pie. Afa ndundu erini e'dazu 'diyi tualu otita ndrizaru 'diyi pie 'diyi omu eyi eji engazu wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya ogurikwetwa museum nigushangwa ahagati y'orurembo, nigworeka eby'emikono bingi hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa. Omworeko gwayo ogw'omutaano hamwe na puroguraamu ezirikushemeza, nizisikiriza abagyenyi kuruga omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: Uganda is known for its stunning landscapes and rich biodiversity, attracting visitors from around the world. Many travelers seek unique experiences in the heart of Africa, eager to explore its natural wonders.
lug_prompt: Uganda emanyiddwa olw'ebifo byayo ebirabika obulungi n'ebiramu eby'enjawulo, ebisikiriza abagenyi okuva mu nsi yonna. Abatambuze bangi banoonya ebintu eby'enjawulo mu mutima gwa Afirika, nga baagala nnyo okulambula ebyewuunyo byayo eby'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda oywek pi kabedo mamwonya tutwal ki jami makwo mapol ma kelo wele ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat. Luwot mapol giyenyo jami ma beco tutwal I cwiny lobo Afrika, ki miti me neno jami mamwonya me cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Ejenara Uganda kanu aiboisio nuibusiak noi keda iboro luegelegela, ido ingalaunete ipejok kotoma akwap kere. Eutasi alotok luipu aimo iboro luitegelikina kotoma Africa, ekotosi airereonor iboro luibusiak luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri angu ndrizaru tu 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu afa nyakuni 'diyi pie, omuru 'ba emupi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ejipi engazu wudrikuru ma alea ndulu. Ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi karakara eyi e'yo ndundu Africa ma alea 'diyi nda eyini ani ava be angu ndundu nyakuni 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Uganda nemanywa ahabw'oburungi bw'ensi hamwe n'obuhangwa bwayo, ekirikureeta abagyenyi kuruga omunsi yoona. Abagyenzi baingi nibaronda eby'okureeberaho by'omutaano omu mutima gwa Afirika, baine ekihika ky'okureeba ebirikutangaaza byayo eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In research and data analysis, it is common to work with limited resources or time constraints. Therefore, selecting a representative subset can provide valuable insights without the need to examine every element.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza n'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko, kyabulijjo okukola n'ebikozesebwa ebitono oba obunafu mu budde. N'olw'ekyo, okulonda ekitundutundu ekikiikirira kisobola okuwa amagezi ag'omugaso nga tekyetaagisa kwekenneenya buli kintu.
ach_prompt: I kwed ki ngiyo lok angeya, pol kare tic ki jami ma nok onyo kare manok. Pi meno, yero dul matidi matye kacungu pire twero miyo ngec ma pire tek labongo miti me ngiyo jami weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic keda aingic akiro, etapit duc aswam keda iboro lu ikidioko arai bo apak na ikidioko. Kanuka ngun, aseun atutubet naebwoikinit epedori aijaikin acoa naepol noi komam ejai eipud loka airereor iboro kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ma alia azini e'yo eti ondaza ma alia, eri azi ngazu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe were si kani sawa ma kalafe were si. Ka'dini, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi opezu ri eco e'yo orodriru 'diyi fe e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo dria eyi ma ale andrizu ri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza n'okushwijuma ebihandiiko, nikikira kukorwa n'ebintu bikye nainga obwire bukye. N'ahabw'ekyo, okuronda ekicweka ekirikujwekyera nikibaasa kureetaho okwetegyereza okw'omugasho, hatariho ekyetengo ky'okushwijuma buri kintu.

eng_prompt: As local populations grow and urban development increases, many towns aspire to elevate their status. Understanding the criteria for achieving city status is crucial for these municipalities seeking recognition and additional resources.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu bwe beeyongera n'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga bwe yeeyongera, ebibuga bingi byagala okutumbula embeera yaabyo. Okutegeera enkola y'okutuuka ku ddaala ly'ekibuga kikulu nnyo eri munisipaali zino ezinoonya okusiimibwa n'obuyambi obulala.
ach_prompt: Ka wel dano me tedero tye ka dongo ki dongo lobo tye ka mede, town mapol tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom gi. Niang jami ma mite me nongo rwom me city pire tek tutwal pi municipality magi matye ka yenyo cwak ki kony mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape epoloi enaaba loka itunga keda apol naka itaunin, ekotosi itaunin luipu aikeun adoketait kec. Amisiikin nutupitono kanu adumun adoketait na esite erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka imeunisipaliti lu ekotosi aijen ka aiyatakin ikapun.
lgg_prompt: O'bi angu ma alia 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu angu ezoma ni tuzu tualu, tawuni karakara eyi asi 'baza be eyi ma wura otuzu. E'yo 'bani ecozu aku ambo eyi esuzu 'diyi ma vata ma vata eri orodriru munisipaliti 'diyi eyini ani ecozu e'yo 'yezu ra azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu dika.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro kubarikweyongyera n'entunguuka y'endembo kweyongyera, endembo nyingi nizetenga kwimusya omutindo gwazo. Okwetegyereza engyenderwaho y'okutunga orurembo n'eky'omugasho munonga aha munisiparite ezirikwetenga okumanywa n'okwongyerwa obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Uganda is a diverse country with a rich tapestry of cultures and beliefs. Among its various faiths, Islam has a significant presence and influence.
lug_prompt: Uganda nsi ya njawulo erimu obuwangwa n'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo. Mu nzikiriza zaayo ez'enjawulo, obusiraamu bulina okubeerawo n'obuyinza obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki tekwaro ki dini ma pat pat. I kin dini ne mapat-pat, cilam tye ki twero madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Erai Uganda akwap naejaasi keda inonosio keda aiyuunikec luegelegela. Kotoma aiyuunikec nuegelegela, ejaasi isiramun keda apedor naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri kari ndundu eyi ma eselea e'yo suruni azini aita ni 'diyi pie tre. Dini erini ndundu 'diyi ma eselea, isilamu ma e'yo ci.
nyn_prompt: Uganda n'eihanga eririmu eby'obuhangwa n'enyikiriza nyingi. Omu nyikiriza zaayo ezitarikushushana, obusiraamu bwine amaani maingi.

eng_prompt: In the heart of the bustling city, a revered figure stands as a beacon of knowledge and spirituality. With years of experience and deep understanding, the sheikh dedicates his life to nurturing the community's faith.
lug_prompt: Mu mutima gw'ekibuga ekijjudde abantu, omuntu ow'ekitiibwa ayimiridde ng'ettaala y'amagezi n'eby'omwoyo. Olw'obumanyirivu bw'emyaka n'okutegeera okw'amaanyi, seeka awaayo obulamu bwe okukulaakulanya enzikiriza y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I cwiny boma madit man ma dano dwong iye tutwal ni, dano ma kiworo tye macalo lanyut me ngec ki lok me cwiny. Ki ngec me mwaki mapol ki niang matut, sheik ocwalo kwone me dongo niye pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osite loepol noi, ejai itunganan yen ejenara noi kwape aanyunet naka acoa keda aiyuunikec. Keda ikar luipu luka amisiarit keda amisiarit naepol, abu sheik ijaik aijarake aitopoloun aiyuun naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma aliari ma alia, 'ba azi inzile inzi 'diyi pa so ekile eceta ondua ni azini e'yo onitaniri le. E'yo erini 'ye eli karakara eyi ma alea azini vata angiri be, sheik 'da fe i ma edri aita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mutima gw'orurembo orurimu abantu baingi, omuntu orikuheebwa ekitiinisa ayemereire nk'ekyererezi ky'obwengye n'eby'omwoyo. Ahabw'emyaka mingi y'obumanyirizi hamwe n'okwetegyereza, sheikh akaheereza amagara gye okureeberera enyikiriza y'abantu.

eng_prompt: Loyalty is a complex emotion that can manifest in various forms. From standing by a friend in tough times to supporting a brand through thick and thin, individuals show their commitment in unique ways.
lug_prompt: Obwesigwa nneewulira enzibu eyinza okweyoleka mu ngeri ez'enjawulo. Okuva ku kuyimirira ne mikwano mu biseera ebizibu okutuuka ku kuwagira ekika mu biseera ebirungi n'ebibi, abantu balaga obumalirivu bwabwe mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Bedo lagen obedo kit ma dano winyo kwede dok twero nen i yo mapatpat. Nicake ki cung tung bot larem I kare me peko me oo I cwako brand I kare maber ki marac, dano acel-acel nyutu keto cwinygi I yoo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Erai aiyuun epone loetiono noi loepedori aitodun iponesio luegelegela. Anyoun kotoma aibwo keda epapero kotoma apakio nuetioko kitoni aigangit itunga kotoma aijar naejok keda naetiono, itodunitos itunga ainakina kec koiponesio luitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi 'baza niri eri e'yo azi ewaru ecopi i e'dapi wura ndundu eyi ma alea ni i. E'dozu pa sozu agyi be sa'wa ewaru ma alia kpere atita fezu amuti azi ma dria e'yo ewaru ma alia, 'ba yi yi yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi yi ma ava e'da geri ndu ndu si.
nyn_prompt: Obwesigwa n'enyehurira y'amaani erikubaasa kweyoreka omu miringo mingi. Kuruga aha kwemerera na munywani waabo omu bwire bugumire kuhisya aha kushagika ekika kyabo omu burungi n'obubi, abantu boona booreka okwehayo kwabo omu miringo etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, places of worship play a central role in community life. For followers of Islam, the mosque serves as a vital space for spiritual gatherings and communal prayers.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, amasinzizo gakola omulimu omukulu mu bulamu bw'ekitundu. Ku bagoberezi b'obusiraamu, omuzikiti gukozesebwa ng'ekifo ekikulu eky'enkuŋŋaana z'eby'omwoyo n'okusaba okw'awamu.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, odi lega timo tic mapire tek tutwal I kwo pa lwak. Pi lulub kor cilam, ot lega pa cilam obedo kama pire tek tutwal pi gure ki lega pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, ejaasi aiboisio nu ilipere keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka itunga. Kanu atupitok isiramun, erai emusikit aiboisit naepol noi na atukonokin keda ailipasinei.
lgg_prompt: A'bi karakara eyi ma alea, pari inzizu 'diyi azi okporu 'ye ongulumu eyi ma edria. E'yo isilamu eyini 'diyi ma vuti obipi 'diyi dri, maskiti 'da ni azi nga angu orodriru okuta e'yo aitanisi azini izita ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'yezu ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa bingi, emyanya y'okuramizamu neekora omurimo gw'amaani omumagara g'abantu. Abakuratsi b'obusiraamu, omuzigiti nigukora nk'omwanya gw'omugasho gw'enteerane z'eby'omwoyo hamwe n'okushaba kw'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Various religious traditions have developed distinct structures to manage their communities and practices. Among these, both Catholic and Protestant denominations have established formal administrative systems to guide their operations.
lug_prompt: Amadiini ag'enjawulo gataddewo enkola ez'enjawulo okuddukanya ebitundu n'enkola zaago. Mu bino, amadiini g'Abakatuliki n'Abapolotesitante gataddewo enkola z'okuddukanya emirimu gyago.
ach_prompt: Dini mapat-pat guyubu yoo mapat-pat me doro kabedo gi ki tic gi. I kin dini magi, dini pa Katoli ki protestant guyubu yoo me tela gi me doro tic gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu idiinin luegelegela kitolomutu iponesio luegelegela lu eyaitere aiboisio kec keda iponesiokec. Kotoma ngul, apotu ikanisan luka itulikan keda ipurotesitantan itolomutu ainapeta nu eyaitene kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dini ni ndundu 'diyi e'do geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ma ongulumu eyi ma tambazu azini eyi ma 'yeta eyi ma aza kozu. Diyi ma eselea, kanisa katulika eyini azini protestanti eyini 'diyi e'do geri driceza ni 'diyi azi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Enyikiriza z'ediini ezitarikushushana, zitandikireho emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okureebereramu ebyanga byabo n'emitwarize yaabo. Omuri ebi, amadiini g'abakaturiki hamwe n'ag'abaporotesitante gatandikireho enkora y'okwebembera emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, young people often seek ways to express their identities and connect with one another. One popular method they employ is the use of catchy phrases and slogans.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, abavubuka batera okunoonya engeri z'okwolesa obumanyirivu bwabwe n'okukwatagana ne bannaabwe. Engeri emu gye bakozesa kwe kukozesa ebigambo ebisikiriza.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, bulu ipol kare gi yenyo yoo me nyutu kit gi ki kubbe I kingi. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal ma gitiyo kwede obedo tic ki lok ma mako dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naepol noi, emoete atumunak iwaitin lu itodunet aijen kec ka arucokina keda luce. Adiopet ewai lo ejenara noi lo itwasamaete kesi ngesi aitwasam akiro nu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, 'ba oderu 'diyi tutuni geri nda yi ma ngulupi ecezu azini yi ecizu yi ma eselea. Geri azi alu yini ayuzuri e'yo nzeza azini o'duko eceza 'diyi ayuzuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, abantu bato nibasherura oburyo bw'okworeka ebirikubakwataho n'okukwatanisa na bataahi baabo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga ogu barikukoresa n'okukoresa ebigambo ebirikukwata.

eng_prompt: In any society, maintaining peace and safety is essential for the well-being of its citizens. This responsibility often falls on the shoulders of law enforcement agencies.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi bwa bannansi baakyo. Obuvunaanyizibwa buno butera kugwa ku bibegabega by'ebitongole ebikuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pire tek pi ber bedo pa anywali ne. Tic man ipol kare poto iwi dul ma gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, aidar ainapakin keda ayuwara erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itungake. Etapit duc aswamisioit ngin aibwo mama ejaasi atukona nu ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria ma alea, asianzu ma tambaza azini ageitema ma tambaza eri orodriru aa'ta muke kari anzi erini 'diyiniri ni. Azi 'diri sawa driasi e'de amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu boona, okurinda obusingye n'oburinzi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburungi bw'abantu baayo. Obujunanizibwa obu buriijo nibugwa aha mikono y'ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the government recognizes the importance of religious freedom and the role of faith in society. As a result, various faith-based groups can collaborate and establish formal networks.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, gavumenti emanyi obukulu bw'eddembe ly'eddiini n'omugaso gw'enzikiriza mu bantu. N'ekivuddemu, ebibiina by'enzikiriza eby'enjawulo bisobola okukolera awamu n'okuteekawo emikutu emitongole.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, gamente ngeyo ber pa bedo agonya me dini ki tic pa dini I kabedo wa. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat ma jenge i kom dini mapat-pat twero ribbe kacel me yubu kubbe.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejeni apugan ajokis naka ailajara naka idiinin keda ajokis naka aiyuun kotunga. Kanuka ngun, epedorete igurupun lu ediini aimorikikin kosodete adukun elago.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, gamete ni orodri drilemgbo e'yo aitanisi 'diyiniri ma dria azini orodri e'yo aitanisi 'diyiniri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo aitanisi ndundu 'diyi eco ti eci azini yi ma eselea 'diyi e'do ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, gavumenti neetegyereza omugasho gw'obugabe bw'ediini hamwe n'omugasho gw'enyikiriza omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, guruupu z'ediini ezitarikushushana nizibaasa kukwatanisa kandi zitandikeho emikutu.

eng_prompt: The role of religious institutions in society often raises questions about their legal status and funding. As communities seek to support their local mosques, the debate over their classification becomes increasingly relevant.
lug_prompt: Omulimu gw'amatendekero g'eddiini mu kitundu gutera okuleetawo ebibuuzo ku mbeera yaago mu mateeka n'ensimbi. Ng'abantu bagezaako okuwagira emizikiti gyabwe, okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye girina okutwalibwamu kweyongera okuba okw'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Tic pa dule me dini ikin lwak ipol kare kelo lapeny i kom cik gi ki cente gi. I kare ma lwak tye ka yenyo yoo me konyo ot lega pa cilam gi, laro lok I kom kit ma ki guru kwede ot lega pa cilam gi tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka iriongeta luka idiinin kotoma atutubet eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos adoketaitikec keda apiyai. Kwape ekotosi itunga aigang imusikitin kec, epol noi epeget loikamunit aijen kec.
lgg_prompt: Azi amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyini ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ni e'yo eyi eji e'yo eyini aa'zu azita palaa azini robia eyini esu ri ma dria. Ongulumu eyini lezu atita fezu maskiti eyivile ogogo 'diyi dri, agbatara eyi ma esele coza ma dria ri eca orodriru tu.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'ebitongore by'ediini omu bantu, nigureetaho ebibuuzo ebirikukwata aha nshonga zaabyo omu biragiro hamwe n'esente zaabyo. Abantu ku barikugyezaho kuhwera emizigiti yaabo, okuhanuura aha nkora yaabo nikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: As the organization prepares for its annual transition, the outgoing leaders reflect on their achievements and challenges. With the end of the term approaching, the focus shifts to selecting and preparing the next generation of leaders.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitongole kyetegekera enkyukakyuka yaakyo eya buli mwaka, abakulembeze abava mu ntebe balowooza ku bye batuuseeko n'okusoomoozebwa kwabwe. Ekisanja bwe kinaatera okuggwaako, essira lijja kuteekebwa ku kulonda n'okuteekateeka abakulembeze ab'omulembe oguddako.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul ne tye ka yubbe pi aloka-loka ma time mwaka ki mwaka, lutela macon gi tamo I kom jami ma gutimo ki peko ma gukato ki iye. I kare ma agiki me tem tye cok, keto cwiny tye I kom yero ki yubu lutela me kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kwape itemonokini erionget aijulanakineta nuka ekaru, engarenok lu elosete aomoom nu iswamatos keda atiokisio kec. Neyapiete angetakinet naka atamu, ejai agogong naka aseun ka aitemonokin engarenok luetupakini.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'di ni otuta 'yeria e'yo yi ojazu eli vusi 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba mupi drile 'diyi e'yo ega e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi pie. E'yo termi ni i deria ri si, e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri oja i e'yo 'ba drice'ba o'diru 'diyi opezu azini otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ekitongore kirikweteekateekyera empinduka yaakyo eya buri mwaka, abebembezi abarikurugaho nibateekateeka aha byatungire hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabo. Ahabw'okugira ngu ekisanja ky'obwa purezidenti kiri haihi kuhwa, amaani nigahindukira omu kutoorana n'okutebeekanisa omurembe ogurikukurataho gw'abebembezi.

eng_prompt: Frustration grew among the employees as they learned about the recent changes to the company's policy. In response, a group of them organized a rally to voice their concerns.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu bweyongera mu bakozi bwe baamanya ku nkyukakyuka ezaakakolebwa mu nkola ya kampuni gye buvuddeko. Mu kwanukula, ekibinja kyabwe kyategese olukungaana okwogera ebibaluma.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny omede ikin lutic ikare ma gunongo ngec I kom aloka-loka ma otime I cik pa dul ne cokcok-ki. Macalo adwogi ne, gurup acel ikingi guyubu kacoke me miyo tam gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak itakadikisi noi nawanyunia kesi nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka ikisila luka ekampuni. Kwape abongokinet, abu egurupu kakesi itemok airiamunet kanu aitodun aiyalongongokec.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko ako tu azi'ba eyi ma eselea eyini e'yo onizu ojata amuti 'da ni 'diyi ma dria risi. Erini e'yo 'da omvizu, ongulumu azi eyi otu mitingi eyi e'dazu e'yo eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bakozi ku baaherize kumanya empindahinduka ezabaireho omu biragiro bya kampuni. Nk'eky'okugarukamu, guruupu yaabo ekatebekanisa oruteerane rw'okugamba ebibarikuteekateeka.

eng_prompt: It's important to understand the rules that govern our society. Following regulations not only keeps you safe but also fosters a positive relationship with law enforcement.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okutegeera amateeka agafuga ekitundu kyaffe. Okukolera ku mateeka tekikoma ku kukukuuma naye era kikulaakulanya enkolagana ennungi n'abakuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me niang cik ma doro kabedo wa. Lubu cik pe weko I bedo agwoka keken ento bene weko I bedo ki wat maber ki joo ma gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin ikisila luipugatos itunga wok. Atupitos ikisila mam einakini ijo ayuwara bon konye eyangauni eidicane loajokan keda lu ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru azita ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma dri cepi 'diyi vazu. Azita eyi ma vuti obizu ri ni lu mi ma ta mba ku te eri vini e'yo eyi ma eselea 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebiragiro ebirikutegyeka abantu baitu. Okukuratira ebiragiro tikirikukureetera oburinzi kyonka, kureka nikureetaho enkoragana nungi n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Access to menstrual hygiene products is essential for women's health and well-being. Unfortunately, many women around the world still face challenges in obtaining these basic supplies.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebintu ebikozesebwa mu buyonjo bw'abakyala mu nsonga z'ekikyala kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu n'obulamu obulungi bw'abakyala. Eky'ennaku, abakyala bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna bakyasanga okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna ebintu bino ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Nongo jami me gwoko lengo pa mon ikare me two dwe pire tek tutwal pi yotkom gi. Ki gum marac, mon mapol I wilobo pud gitye ki peko me nongo jami magi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun iboro lu aila kaparan na elap ejok kanu angaleu naka angor. Nukaiturur, eringa angor nuipu kotoma akwap kere ejaas keda atiokisio nuka adumun iboro lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo rua ala ni oku eyini aa'zu imba eyi ma alea 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru oku eyi ma rua ala azini aa'ta muke ri ni. Drile onziru, oku karakara wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi nga podi dri fu e'yo ewaru yi be afa orodriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikwaho ebintu by'okweboneza omu kwezi n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abakazi. Eky'obusaasi, abakazi baingi omunsi yoona nibatunga oburemeezi omu kutunga ebintu ebi eby'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Many people are seeking eco-friendly alternatives to disposable hygiene products. One popular option gaining traction is the use of reusable pads.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya engeri endala ezitali za bulabe eri obutonde mu kifo ky'ebintu eby'obuyonjo ebikozesebwa omulundi gumu. Ekimu ku bintu ebyeyambisibwa ennyo kwe kukozesa ppamba w'ekikyala addamu okukozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene ma pe balo cwec ma orumuwa me kaka tic ki jami me gwoko lengo. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye me tic ki bongi ma konyo lutino I kare me two.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio luajokak luka aidar aila itia iboro lu itwasamao irwan aarei. Epone ediope loetapit itunga aitosom ngesi aitosom apads nu itwasamao irwan ipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi geri ecozu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu muke 'diyi nda aga afa alata ni 'bani ayu pale alu 'diyi. E'yo azi 'bani le saaru 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma eselea ri eri padi eyi ayuzu 'bani eyi ayu pale karakara 'diyi ma ayuza.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibasherura oburyo oburikubaasa kurinda obuhangwa bw'ensi omu mwanya gw'ebintu ebirikukoresibwa omu by'obuyonjo ebirikukoresibwa omurundi gumwe. Ekintu kimwe ekirikumanywa munonga n'okukoresa za paadi ezirikubaasa kukoresibwa emirundi mingi.

eng_prompt: Many people are seeking sustainable alternatives to traditional menstrual products. One option gaining popularity is reusable pads, which offer both environmental benefits and cost savings.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya engeri endala ez'obuwangaazi okusinga eddagala ly'ekinnansi eriweweeza ku nsonga z'ekikyala. Ekintu ekimu ekyeyongera okwettanirwa kwe kukozesa ppamba w'ekikyala ow'emirundi ebiri, nga kino kiganyula obutonde bw'ensi era kikendeeza ne ku nsaasaanya.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mukene mapat ki macon me tic ki jami ma konyo ikare me two dwe. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal en aye padi ma kitiyo kwedgi tyen mapol, ma kelo ber pa cwec ma orumuwa ki bene dwoko piny wel cente.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aimo iponesio luajokak luka aitwasam ikee luka elap. Adiopebon naepol noi ngesi apads nu itwasamao irwan ipu, ijaikitos kesi ajokis na akwap keda aitidisiar etiai loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi geri azi ecopi aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi nda aga aro oku eyi ma eselea 'diyi ra. E'yo azi alu 'bani lezu 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri pad eyi ayupi dika 'diyi, orodri angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi fepi tualu aje ma omgbo ma omgbo ma omgbo esipi ra 'diyi.

eng_prompt: Engaging in hands-on activities has always brought me joy. There's something incredibly satisfying about creating something with my own two hands.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu mirimu gy'emikono kindeetedde essanyu. Waliwo ekintu ekinyuma ennyo mu kutondawo ekintu n'emikono gyange.
ach_prompt: Timo jami ma weko abedo ki yomcwiny I kare weng. Tye gin mo ma yomo cwiny tutwal I kom cweyo gin mo ki cinga.
teo_prompt: Aswam aswamisinei nu itunga eyangaunit eong aiyalama. Ejai aiyalama naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ibore keda akanin ka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu ri fe ma dri ayiko sa'wa driasi. Afa azi ayiko fepi tu ni ma dria afa azi edezu ma ma dri yi be ci.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu mirimo y'emikono, nikireeta okushemererwa. Hariho ekintu ekirikumatiza munonga okukora ekintu n'emikono yangye.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, a significant number of individuals have pursued higher education. Despite their qualifications, they find themselves struggling to secure employment.
lug_prompt: Mu kuvuganya kw'omulembe guno ku mirimu, abantu bangi bagenze mu matendekero aga waggulu. Wadde nga balina ebisaanyizo, beesanga nga balwana okufuna emirimu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek pi nongo tic, dano mapol dong gukwano I rwom ma malo. Kadi bed ni gukwano, ginongo tek tutwal me nongo tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei lolo, itunga luipu elomunitos toma asioman naka okuju. Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apedorosio, etionikinitos kesi adumun aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, kalafe angiri 'ba eyini 'diyi mu onita ururi ma alea 'bo. Yi ma onita ma talasi, yi yi esu dri ci azi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'eby'emirimo ak'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, abantu baingi baine emishomo y'ahaiguru. Oihireho emishomo yaabo, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okutunga emirimo.

eng_prompt: The economic challenges facing Uganda have disproportionately affected its younger population. As a result, many young people are struggling to find stable employment opportunities.
lug_prompt: Okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna Uganda kw'eyolekaganye nakwo kukosezza nnyo abavubuka baayo. N'ekivuddemu, abavubuka bangi balwana okufuna emirimu egy'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Peko me can lim ma Uganda tye ka kato ki iye obalo wel dano matino tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, bulu mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo tic matye kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuka ikapun nu etereikina keda Uganda emunasi itunga ludidika noi. Kanuka ngun, eutasi atumunak luipu ainingosit adumun aswamisinei nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia esuzu kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi eza 'ba ode kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi saaru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ode karakara eyi dri ci drileba azi eyini aa'zu sa'wa driasi 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obu Uganda erikurabamu, bukwatsire munonga eminyeeto. N'ekyarugiremu, eminyeeto mingi eriyo neerwana kuronda emirimo y'obutuura.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, individuals are constantly seeking ways to enhance their employability. By investing time in learning new skills, one can open up various opportunities for financial gain.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, abantu buli kaseera banoonya engeri z'okwongera ku busobozi bwabwe obw'okufuna emirimu. Omuntu bw'awaayo ebiseera okuyiga ebintu ebipya, asobola okufuna amagoba mu by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal I kom tic, dano tye ka yenyo yoo me medo rwom me ticgi. Ka ngat moni oketo cwinye me pwonyo diro manyen, ci en twero nongo lim mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka esokoni loka aswamisinei ilolo, eutasi itunga aimo iwaitin lu epedoriata kesi adumun aswamisinei. Kowai lo aipikakin apak aisisia acoasinei nuitetiak, epedori itunganan adumun ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba eyi sa'wa driasi geri nda eyini ani ecozu azi esuzu ra 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Sa'wa 'bazu ondua o'diru 'diyi onizu risi, 'ba azi eco drileba ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi ma ti zi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kataare k'eby'emirimo ak'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, abantu nibasherura emiringo y'okwongyera aha mirimo yaabo. Omuntu ku arikutaho obwire bw'okwega emyoga misya, naabaasa kutunga emiringo mingi y'okutunga esente.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower the younger generation, various community programs have been established. These initiatives focus on equipping youths with practical skills that can enhance their employability and foster entrepreneurship.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omulembe omuto, pulogulaamu z'ekitundu ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo. Enteekateeka zino zissa essira ku kuwa abavubuka obukugu obw'omugaso obusobola okutumbula obusobozi bwabwe obw'emirimu n'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor jo matino, ki keto yub mapat-pat ikabedo mapat-pat. Yub magi keto cwiny gi tutwalle I kom miyo diro me tic ki bulu ma twero weko gi nongo tic ki dongo biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong atumunak, etolomun ainapeta nuegelegela. Alosikinet na erai ainakin atumunak acoa na epedori aitopolor aswamisinei kec ka aitopolor agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba oderu 'diyi dri okpo fezu, 'ba e'do otita ongulumu eyini 'diyi karakara. Otita 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo 'ba ode eyini ondua afa eyi ma dria 'diyi fezu eyini ani ecozu azi esuzu ra azini tujari 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eminyeeto, puroguraamu nyingi zitandikirweho. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza eminyeeto emyoga erikubaasisa kutunga emirimo n'okutandikaho eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In some cultures, strict regulations govern women's behavior, particularly regarding substances like alcohol. These societal norms often dictate what is deemed acceptable for women, leading to significant restrictions.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa obumu, amateeka amakakali gafuga enneeyisa y'abakyala naddala ku bintu nga omwenge. Emitendera gy'ekitundu gino gitera okulagira abakyala kye batwala okuba ekikkirizibwa, ekireetawo obukwakkulizo obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mukene, cik matek loyo doro tim pa mon tutwalle I kom jami calo kongo. Cik mapat-pat magi ipol kare nyutu ngo ma mon omyero gutim, ma man kelo kigeng mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio ice, ejaas ikisila luitikitikete iponesio luka angor kacut nuikamunitos iboro kwape nat ajon. Iponesio lu luka itunga itodunitos iboro lu ecamunitai kanu angor, ido eyangauni aitikitik naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni azi 'diyi ma alia, azita okporu 'diyi oku yi ma adriza ma dri ce tuni e'yo afa onzi ekile ewa le 'diyi ma dria. A'yota ongulumu eyini 'diyi e'da e'yo 'bani ega kini oku eyini aa'zu muke 'diyi ma dria, dika e'yo 'bani eyi atrizu 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa ebimwe, hariho ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikutegyeka emicwe y'abakazi, okukira munonga ebirikukwata aha bintu nk'amaarwa. Emitwarize y'abantu egi neekira kuragiira abakazi ebi bashemereire kukora, ekirikubareetera oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: Each year, people around the world come together to honor the achievements and contributions of women. This global celebration highlights the ongoing struggle for gender equality and women's rights.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, abantu okwetooloola ensi yonna bakungaana wamu okussa ekitiibwa mu bintu abakyala bye batuuseeko n'ebyo bye bakoze. Okujaguza kuno okw'ensi yonna kulaga olutalo olugenda mu maaso olw'okwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu n'eddembe ly'abakyala.
ach_prompt: Mwaka ki mwaka, dano me wilobo ducu gure kacel me woro jami ma mon otimo. Kwero nino man I wilobo nyutu lweny matye kawot anyim pi twero pa mon ki coo.
teo_prompt: Kangolikaru, imorikikinos itunga kotoma akwap kere ayongite aitodolikineta keda aswamisio nuka angor. Inumunumio na naka akwap kere itodunit ejie lo elosi akonye kanu apedorosio nuka angor keda ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: Eli vusi, 'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi dria 'diyi emu tualu inzita fezu e'yo oku eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Omu wudrikurusiri ece a'di 'diza mupi drile e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria azini drilemgbo oku eyini ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwaka, abantu okwetoroora ensi yoona nibejumba hamwe okuheereza ekitinisa ebirikubaasa kukorwa abakazi. Okujaguza oku okw'ensi yoona, nikyoreka okurwana okurikugyenda omu maisho ahabw'oburinganiza n'obugabe bw'abakazi.

eng_prompt: Understanding reproductive health is crucial for ensuring individuals can make informed choices about their bodies and futures. This leads to an important discussion about the various rights and services available in this area.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebyobulamu bw'okuzaala kwa mugaso nnyo okukakasa nti abantu basobola okusalawo obulungi ku mibiri gyabwe n'ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Kino kireetawo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'omugaso ku ddembe n'obuweereza obw'enjawulo obuliwo mu kitundu kino.
ach_prompt: Niang I kom yotkom me butu imit pire tek tutwal pi neno ni dano acel acel twero moko tam maber I kom komgi ki anyimgi. Man kelo nywako lok ma pire tek I kom twero ki kony mapat-pat matye I kabedo man.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin nuikamunitos aur erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aanyun ebe epedorete itunga aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos akwan kec keda ingaren kec. Eyangauni ngin aineranara naepol noi naikamunit apedorosio nuegelegela keda aijaanakinio na ejaas atutubet kana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onizu e'yo anzi tiza niri ma dria ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba eyi eco peta kililiru 'du eyi ma rua azini ewu ewu drialeri ma dria ra. E'yo 'di ni e'yo nzeza okporu ni eji drilemgbo azini azakoma ndundu angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza eby'amagara g'okuzaara n'eky'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu abantu bacwamu kurungi ebikwatiraine n'emibiri yaabo hamwe n'ebiro byabo by'omumaisho. Eki nikireetaho okuhanuura okw'omugasho aha bugabe n'obuheereza oburiho omu kicweka eki.

eng_prompt: As the rates of alcohol consumption among women continue to rise, it's crucial to address the underlying factors contributing to this trend. Community support and targeted education programs may play a vital role in promoting healthier choices.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'okunywa omwenge mu bakyala gweyongera okulinnya, kikulu nnyo okukola ku nsonga eziviirako omuze guno. Obuyambi bw'ekitundu ne pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza ezitunuuliddwa ziyinza okukola omulimu omukulu mu kutumbula okusalawo okulungi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me mato kongo I kin mon tye kamede kwede, pire tek tutwal me cobo peko matye ka kelo tim man. Kony pa lwak kacel ki yub me pwony ma kiyubu maber twero konyo tutwal I ilo malo rwom me kwo.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka aimat ajon kanejaas angor, ejokuna noi aitemokin akiro nuepedorete ayangaun epone lo. Agangat na itunga keda ainapeta nuka asioman nu itutuoritai epedorete aswam naepol noi kanu aitopolor aseununeta nu engalete.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo ewa mvuza ni oku eyi ma eselea ri ni mu drile tu, eri orodriru e'yo e'yo 'di fepi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Atita ongulumu eyini ri tualu otita imbatani 'diyi pie ri eco azi okporu nga e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abakazi abarikunywa amaarwa nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha nshonga ezirikureetaho omuze ogu. Obuhwezi bw'abantu hamwe na puroguraamu z'eby'obwegyese nizibaasa kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Cultural norms and values can significantly influence the status of individuals within a community. In certain regions, gender roles are defined in ways that elevate women's positions in various aspects of life.
lug_prompt: Ennono n'empisa z'obuwangwa zisobola okukosa ennyo embeera y'abantu mu kitundu. Mu bitundu ebimu, emirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu ginnyonnyolwa mu ngeri ezitumbula ebifo by'abakyala mu mbeera z'obulamu ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Cik me tekwaro ki jami ma pigi tego twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa dano I kabedo moni. I but lobo mukene, kitito tic pa mon ki coo I yoo ma ilo malo rwom pa mon I kabedo mapat-pat me kwo.
teo_prompt: Inonosio keda iponesio luka inonosio epedorete aitodolikin adoketait naka itunga kotoma atutubet. Kaiboisio ace, itetemitai aswamisinei nuka ikiliok keda angor koipone kalo itopoloori adoketait naka angor kotoma aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni 'diyi azini e'yo orodriru 'diyi eco e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otu ra. Angu azi 'diyi ma alia, 'ba azi oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie 'diyi ece geri oku eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otuzu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Emichwe n'emitwarize y'obuhangwa nibikora kihango aha mutindo gw'abantu omu kyanga. Omu bicweka ebimwe, emirimo y'abashaija n'abakazi neshoboororwa omu miringo erikutunguura emyanya y'abakazi omu bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: If you feel that your concerns are not being addressed, it's important to take further action. You have the right to seek assistance from the authorities.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba owulira nti ebikweraliikiriza tebikolebwako, kikulu okwongera okubaako ky'okola. Olina eddembe okufuna obuyambi okuva mu b'obuyinza.
ach_prompt: Ka iwinyo ni pe kitye ka timo gin mo I kom peko ni, pire tek ni omyero imedde ki timo gin mo. Itye ki twero me penyo kony ki bot lutela.
teo_prompt: Arai iwomit jo ebe mam itemonokinitai ationis kon, ejokuna aswam nuipu. Ijaas ijo keda apedor na aimo aingarakinio kanejaas apedorosio.
lgg_prompt: Eka ega kini 'ba ni e'yo mi dria 'diyi ma aza ko ku, eri orodriru e'yo 'yezu drile. Mi drilemgbo be azakoma esuzu engazu drice'ba eyi vu ci.
nyn_prompt: Ku oraabe nooshusha ngu ebirikukwerarikiriza tibirikukorwaho, n'eky'omugasho okwongyera kukora. Oine obugabe kushaba obuhwezi kuruga omu b'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: Due to increasing concerns over public health and safety, the Ugandan government initiated discussions about the regulation of alcoholic beverages. As a result, they decided to take action against the widespread consumption of sachet waragi.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, gavumenti ya Uganda yatandika okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'okuggya amateeka ku mwenge. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo okulwanyisa okunywa waragi mu nsawo.
ach_prompt: Pi lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak, gamente me Uganda ocako nywako lok I kom cik ma doro mato kongo. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo me lweny i kom cam pa waragi ma opong ki kicaa.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, abu apugan nako Uganda kogeu aitemitem nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aimat ajon. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi koseutu aitikitik aimat ewaragi.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza ma omgbo tupi o'bi ma rua ala ma dria, gamete Uganda niri e'do e'yo nze e'yo azita ewa mvuza ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu e'yo waragi 'bani nya sachet ru 'diyi ma ayuza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha magara n'obuhwezi bw'abantu, Gavumenti ya Uganda ekatandika okuhanuura aha nshonga y'okureeberera ebyokunywa ebirimu amaarwa. N'ekyarugiremu,bakahayo amaani okurwanisa okukoresa munonga waragi.

eng_prompt: Many beverages are sold in various types of containers, but certain products require specific packaging to maintain their quality. One common choice for packaging is glass, especially for items like spirits and wines.
lug_prompt: Ebyokunywa bingi bitundibwa mu bintu eby'enjawulo, naye ebintu ebimu byetaaga okupakibwa mu ngeri ey'enjawulo okusobola okukuuma omutindo gwabyo. Ekimu ku bintu abantu bye basinga okulonda okupakinga bye giraasi naddala ku bintu nga omwenge n'omwenge.
ach_prompt: Jami amata mapol ki cato gi I kabedo mapat-pat, ento jami mukene mito yub mapat-pat me gwoko rwom gi. Yub acel ma dano mapol yero me boyo jami en aye gilac, tutwale pi jami macalo kongo ki kongo vino.
teo_prompt: Egwelanario imaten luipu kotoma adukena nuegelegela, konye iboro ice ipudasi ainapeta nuegelegela kanu aidar adoketait kec. Adiopet aseunet na itwasamao kanu aipikakin iboro erai agilasin, kacut kanu iboro kwape nat imaten keda iwain.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa mvuza 'diyi ozi wura ndundu eyi ma alea, te afa azi 'diyi le 'ba ma o'ba eyi geri ndusi eyini ani aa'zu muke. Afa azi 'bani lele tu 'bani afa eyi ma tambazu ri eri gilasi, tutuni e'yo ekile ewa eyi pie azini ewa eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ebyokunywa ebingi nibiguzibwa omu bikondo by'emiringo mingi, kwonka ebintu ebimwe nibyetenga okupakwa omu muringo gw'omutaano kugira ngu bigume biri aha mutindo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kukoresibwa omu kukora ebintu n'egiraasi, okukira munonga aha bintu nk'eby'okunywa hamwe na viinyo.

eng_prompt: After hearing her troubling account of the events, I couldn't help but wonder about the signs of abuse she might be hiding. It’s crucial to understand the situation fully before jumping to conclusions about her experiences.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ennyinyonnyola ye eyeeraliikiriza ku ebyo ebyali bibaddewo, nnali sisobola kwebuuza ku bubonero bw'okutulugunyizibwa bwe yali ayinza okuba nga yeekweka. Kikulu nnyo okutegeera embeera mu bujjuvu nga tonnaba kusalawo ku bye yayitamu.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok mege ma pe ber I kom jami ma otimme, pe atwero weko tamo I kom lanyut me nywaro tic ma en twero bedo ka kanne. Pire tek tutwal me niang maber tutwal I kom ngo matye katimme mapwod pe ingolo kop I kom ngo ma en okato iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo napupunia eong akiroke nuikamunitos akiro ngun, abu eong apedori aomoom nuikamunitos aanyuneta nuka aitisiliario naepedori ngesi aingop. Erai ibore yenepol noi amisiikin ejautene ngol eringa iswama nuikamunitos akeswam.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo erini nze e'yo ewaru e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ma econi ndra e'yo ega e'yo ecetaru erini ecozu yi ozizuri ma dria ku. Eri orodriru e'yo 'da vazu kililiru rakaka de nga po'di e'doni e'yo 'du e'yo erini ebi 'ye 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okumuhurira arikugambira ebyabaireho, nkaba ntarikubaasa kwetegyereza obubonero bw'okunyangarazibwa oku yaabaire nayeshereka. N'eky'omugasho munonga kwetegyereza embeera omu bwijwire, otakagiire omu bigyezo ebirikukwata aha bi yaarabiremu.

eng_prompt: In today's world, information spreads rapidly and can often be misleading. It's crucial to critically evaluate the sources and motives behind the messages we encounter.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, amawulire gasaasaana mangu era gayinza okubuzaabuza. Kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya ensibuko n'ebigendererwa by'obubaka bwe tusanga.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, lok angeya nya oyot dok pol kare twero bwolo dano. Pire tek tutwal me niang kama lok aa ki iye ki miti me kwena ma wanongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na apakio nu, ekorete akiro katipet ido epedori duc aitolitol. Erai ibore yenepol noi airereor alibuneta keda apeleikinata nuka akiro nu iwanyuni oni.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, o'duko yi ere mbeleru azini eco sawa driasi 'ba ma dri oja ra. Eri orodriru geri amani e'yo amani isule 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, amakuru nigajanjaara juba kandi nigabaasa kuhabya abantu. N'eky'omugasho kushwijuma oburugo n'ebigyendererwa by'obutumwa obu turikushanga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events highlighting gender inequality, many groups are stepping up to advocate for women's rights. One such initiative has gained significant attention and momentum.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko ebiraga obutali bwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu, ebibiina bingi biyimiriddewo okulwanirira eddembe ly'abakyala. Emu ku nteekateeka ng'ezo efunye okufaayo okw'amaanyi n'obwangu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma nyutu apoka-poka ikin mon ki coo, gurup mapol tye ka lweny pi twero pa mon. Yub acel ma kit meno tye ka nongo miti madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nueswamasi pac itodunitos amamus airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor, eutasi igurupun luipu aikeun apedorosio nuka angor. Aswamisioit adiope kwape kangin adumunit apodokinit naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru e'dapi e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma dria, ongulumu karakara eyi tu pa e'yo a'di 'dizu drilemgbo oku eyini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi alu 'dile 'diyi esu asi 'baza angiri azini okpo angiri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho ebirikworeka obutaingana omu maka, guruupu nyingi ziriyo nizirwanirira obugabe bw'abakazi. Ekigyendererwa kimwe nk'ekyo kitungire amaani n'omuhimbo.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the diverse roles individuals play in shaping communities is essential for progress. In particular, the involvement of women in various sectors can lead to significant advancements.
lug_prompt: Okumanya emirimu egy'enjawulo abantu gye bakola mu kubumba ebitundu kya mugaso mu nkulaakulana. Okusingira ddala, okwenyigira kw'abakyala mu bitongole eby'enjawulo kusobola okuleetawo enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Niang tic mapat-pat ma dano acel-acel timo me yubu kabedo mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo. Tutwalle, bedo tye pa mon I tenge mapat-pat twero kelo dongo lobo madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ajenun aswamisinei nuegelegela nu iswamaete itunga kotoma aitolomun aiboisio ejok kanu apol. Kacut, ajaut naka angor toma oriongeta luegelegela epedori ayangaun apol.
lgg_prompt: Azi 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu ongulumu eyi ma edeta ma alea ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni. Tutunisi, oku yini fizu esele ndundu eyi ma alea ri eco angu ezoma eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza emirimo y'abantu omu kutunguura ebyanga n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka. Okukira munonga,okwejumba kw'abakazi omu bitongore ebitarikushushana, nikibaasa kureetaho entunguuka y'amaani.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a harmonious living environment, it is essential to educate all family members about their responsibilities. Understanding these roles can lead to better communication and cooperation within the household.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula embeera y'obulamu ey'obumu, kya mugaso okusomesa abantu bonna mu maka ku buvunaanyizibwa bwabwe. Okutegeera emirimu gino kisobola okuleetawo empuliziganya ennungi n'okukwatagana mu maka.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kwo tye maber, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo dano weng me ot i kom tic gi. Niang tic magi twero weko lok ki winye bedo tye I gang.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijar najokan, ejok aisisianakin itunga kere luka ekale nuikamunitos aswamisinei kec. Amisiikin aswamisinei nu epedori ayangaun einer loajokan keda aiswamanara kotoma okalia.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu aa'ta tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba dria familia ma alea 'diyi imbazu eyi ma azi eyi ma dria. Azi 'diyi ma vata eco fe e'yo nzeza kililiru azini ti icita aku eselea ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho obusingye burungi, nikikuru kwegyesa abantu boona omu maka, obujunanizibwa bwabo. Okwetegyereza emirimo egi nikibaasa kureetaho empurizagana n'okukwatanisa omu maka.

eng_prompt: Public support is crucial for the implementation of many initiatives. Without community backing, even the most well-planned government projects may struggle to achieve their goals.
lug_prompt: Obuwagizi bw'abantu bukulu nnyo mu kussa mu nkola enteekateeka nnyingi. Awatali buwagizi bw'ekitundu, ne pulojekiti za gavumenti ezitegekeddwa obulungi ziyinza okulwana okutuuka ku bigendererwa byazo.
ach_prompt: Kony pa lwak pire tek tutwal pi keto yub mapol itic. Labongo kony pa lwak, yub pa gamente ma kiyubu maber loyo weng pe twero cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Agangat na itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitegeario naka aswamisio nuipu. Arai mam itunga igangitos, epedorete ipurojektin lu apugan lu itemonokitai ejok aitodolikin apeleikinata kec.
lgg_prompt: Atita o'bi eyini ri eri orodriru e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu. Ongulumu eyi ma atita kokoru, otita gamete ni 'bani oti kililiru 'diyi eco dri ci e'yo eyini lele 'diyi esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obuhwezi bw'abantu n'obw'omugasho omukutandikaho enteekateeka nyingi. Hatariho obushagiki kuruga omu bantu, purogyekiti za gavumenti n'obu zaakuba zitebekanisiibwe kurungi, nizibaasa kuremwa kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byazo.

eng_prompt: As economic conditions improve, families often find themselves with more financial resources at their disposal. This boost in income can significantly impact their quality of life.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyenfuna bwe yeeyongera okutereera, amaka gatera okwesanga nga galina ssente nnyingi. Okweyongera kuno mu nfuna kusobola okukyusa ennyo omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ka rwom me lim tye kamedde, gangi pol kare nongo ni gitye ki lim madwong. Medo rwom me nongo lim man twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Arai itojokar ejautene loka ikapun, epedorete ikalia ajaut keda ikapun luipu. Aiyatakinio naka ikapun epedori aitojokar adoketait na aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ni otuzu 'boria, familia eyi eyi esu eyini geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma kalafe angiri. Robia esuza ma omgbo otuza 'diri eco eyi ma edri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'eby'entaasya ku erikweyongyera, amaka nigashanga ngu gaine esente nyingi nz'okukoresa. Okweyongyera kw'entaasya nikubaasa kukora kihango aha mitwarize yaabo.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the distribution of agricultural workers varies significantly between urban and rural settings. This trend highlights the reliance on farming as a primary occupation in less populated regions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, okugaba kw'abakozi b'ebyobulimi kwawukana nnyo wakati w'ebibuga n'ebyalo. Enkola eno eraga obwesige mu bulimi ng'omulimu omukulu mu bitundu ebitalina bantu bangi.
