ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, poko lutic me pur pat tutwal I kin boma madongo ki ma icaro. Man nyutu kit ma dano tye ka jenge I kom pur macalo tic ma pire tek I kabedo matye ki wel dano manok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuipu, etiai loka eswamak lu akoru egelegela noi kiding itaunin keda icaloi. Itodunit aswamisioit na ebe itwasamao akoru kwape aswam naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nu ikidioko itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba azi ngapi agirikica ma alea 'diyi ma awata aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma eselea calo ru 'diyi pie ri co esele saaru. E'yo 'di ece e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu agirikica ma dria ekile 'yeta okporu angu kalafe angiri be 'diyi ma alea ri le.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, okugabwa kw'abakozi b'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nikutandukana ahagati y'endembo hamwe n'ebyaro. Enkora egi neeyoreka okwerinda kw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nk'omurimo gw'omutaano omu byanga ebitarimu bantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In social dynamics, the formation of a collective often requires a minimum number of participants. Understanding the definition of a group is essential for analyzing interactions within communities.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera z'abantu, okutondawo ekibiina kitera okwetaagisa omuwendo omutono ogw'abetabamu. Okutegeera ennyonyola y'ekibinja kya mugaso mu kwekenneenya enkolagana mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: I kwo pa lwak, cako dul pa lwak ipol kare mito wel dano manok tutwal. Niang tyen lok pa gurup pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma dano ribe kwede ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar naka itunga, ibusakinit itunga idis bon ajaut toma. Amisiikin nuikamunitos egurupu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aanyanar eidicane lo itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi ma e'dota le 'ba kalafe were eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi. E'yo ongulumu ma e'yo vazu ri eri orodriru aa'ta ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa, okutandikaho ekibiina nikyetenga abantu bakye. Okwetegyereza enshoboorora y'ekibinja n'eky'omugasho omu kushwijuma enkoragana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the skies opened up and the downpour continued for days, many people found themselves stuck indoors. While the weather posed challenges for most, there was one group that welcomed the relentless rain with open arms.
lug_prompt: Eggulu bwe lyagguka era enkuba ne yeeyongera okumala ennaku, abantu bangi beesanga nga basibidde mu mayumba. Wadde ng'embeera y'obudde yaleetawo okusoomoozebwa eri abasinga obungi, waaliwo ekibinja ekimu ekyasanyukira enkuba eyali etonnya.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma polo oyabe dok kot omede ki cwer pi nino mapol, dano mapol onongo gitye I odigi. Kadi bed ni piny okelo peko bot dano mapol, tye gurup acel ma ojolo kot ma obedo ka cwer tutwal-li ki cwinygi ducu.
teo_prompt: Neapukor akuj kosodi edou ainyikokin aitep adaun aparasia nuipu, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu ebe emamiatatar kesi oreria kec. Karaida abu ekuse ka etepe koyangau ainingosit mama ejaasi itunga luipu, ejai egurupu ediope loabu ijaunit edou ngol keda akaninikec.
lgg_prompt: Angu ni e'doria azini ozoo ni mu drile o'du eyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi aku alea ci. Angu mile ni tro ovuzu e'yo ewaru ru 'ba pari yi dri ra ti, ongulumu alu ni a'i ozo 'di asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Obwengye ku bwaigwire kandi enjura neegumizamu kumara ebiro, abantu baingi bakashangwa bakingire omu maka gaabo. N'obu embeera y'obwire yaabaire ereesire oburemeezi aha bantu baingi, hakaba hariho guruupu emwe eyakiira enjura etarikuhwaho n'amaani.

eng_prompt: Farmers often seek out areas with rich soil and ample nutrients. The quality of the land plays a crucial role in determining agricultural productivity.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okunoonya ebitundu ebirimu ettaka eggimu n'ebirimu ebiriisa ebingi. Omutindo gw'ettaka gukola kinene nnyo mu kusalawo ebibala by'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Lupur ipol kare giyenyo kabedo ma tye ki ngom ma opong ki moc cam ma oromo. Rwom me ngom pire tek tutwal I neno adwogi me pur.
teo_prompt: Etapit akoriok amoun aiboisio nuejaasi keda alupok nuejokuka keda inyamat luipu. Adoketait na alupok erai naepol noi naepedori aitodolikin eswamae lo akoru.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tutuni angu nyaku be angiri azini afa nyakuni 'diyi be angiri 'diyi nda. Nyaku ma wura ni azi okporu nga afa ofule agirikica ma alia 'diyi ma e'yo 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa nibakira kuronda emyanya erimu eitaka rirungi kandi eririmu ebiriisa bingi. Omutindo gw'eitaka nigukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the community, local officials have been advocating for increased financial support. As a result, government has funded several projects.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebyetaago by'ekitundu okweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde balwanirira obuyambi bw'ensimbi obwongezeddwayo. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti etadde ssente mu pulojekiti ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, lutic me tedero gubedo ka lweny pi medo kony me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente oketo lim I yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, ekotosi eswamak luka atutubet aiyatakin agangat naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, abu apugan igang ipurojektin luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lele tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi a'di 'di atita robia niri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, gamete fe robia otita karakara eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibarwanirira okwongyerwa obuhwezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, gavumenti eteire esente omu purogyekiti nyingi.

eng_prompt: Despite significant funding and resources allocated to various initiatives, many have failed to achieve their intended goals. As a result, the effectiveness of these government programs has come under scrutiny.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ensimbi nnyingi n'ebikozesebwa ebyateekebwa ku nteekateeka ez'enjawulo, nnyingi ziremereddwa okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byazo. N'ekivuddemu, obulungi bwa pulogulaamu za gavumenti zino buzze mu kwekenneenya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kimiyo cente ki jami ma mite pi yub mapat-pat, polgi pe gucobo miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, kit ma yub pa gamente magi tiyo kwede tye ka keng.
teo_prompt: Karaida ijaikitai ikapun luipu keda iboro luipu toma aswamisio nuegelegela, epikosi luipu aitodolikin alosikinetekec. Kanuka ngun, eutai airereor ajokis naka ainapeta nu apugan.
lgg_prompt: Robia kalafe angiri 'bani fele e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma talasi, karakara eyi o'bi e'yo eyini lele 'diyi esu kuye. E'yo 'disi, e'yo otita gameteni 'diyi ni ngazu azi ngazu kililiru ri ma eti ondaria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho esente nyingi n'ebintu ebirikuheebwa emirimo etari emwe, bingi biremirwe kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabyo. N'ekyarugiremu, oburungi bwa puroguraamu za gavumenti ezi, butandikire kushwijumwa.

eng_prompt: The proposed land bill has sparked significant debate among community members and policymakers. Many are concerned that its provisions will primarily favor large developers rather than the average citizen.
lug_prompt: Ebbago ly'etteeka ly'ettaka eriteeseddwa livuddeko okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bantu b'ekitundu n'abakola amateeka. Bangi beeraliikirivu nti enteekateeka zaayo zijja kuyamba nnyo abazimbi ab'amaanyi okusinga bannansi aba bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Cik me ngom ma kimito kelo laro lok madit tutwal ikin lwak ki lutela. Dano mapol tye ki lworo ni yub man bikonyo lutic madongo me kaka konyo anywali ma rwom gi lapiny.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuikamunitos alupok nes ayau epeget loepol noi kiding itunga luka atutubet keda luitolomete ikisila. Iyalongongosi itunga luipu ebe epote ainapeta ngun aingarakin itunga luapolok itia itunga lukatutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azita e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma dria ri fe agbatara angiri 'ba ongulumu'a 'diyi ma eselea azini 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi asi otiza be kini e'yo erini 'yele 'diyi nga tutuni orodri fe 'ba angu ezopi angiri 'diyi dri aga 'ba kari ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ekiteiso ky'eiteeka ry'eitaka kireesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu bantu n'abakozi b'ebiragiro. Baingi niberarikirira ngu ebiteiso byayo nibiija kuhwera abarikukora emirimo y'amaani okukira abatuuze ba buriijo.

eng_prompt: As the agricultural sector continues to evolve, many are exploring innovative solutions to enhance productivity and efficiency. One such solution gaining attention is the implementation of electronic vouchers for farmers.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi kigenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, bangi banoonya engeri empya ez'okwongera ku bulimu n'obwangu. Ekimu ku biyinza okugonjoola ekizibu ekyo kwe kuteekawo enkola ey'okukozesa kompyuta okuyamba abalimi n'abalunzi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tenge me pur tye kamede ki dongo, polgi tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me medo rwom me pur. Yub acel ma tye ka nongo miti madit tutwal obedo cako tic ki intanet me miyo waraga ma nyutu ni lupur gubedo lupur.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit erionget loka akor apoloun, eutasi luipu aimo iwaitin luitetiak lu itopoloorete eswamae loajokan. Adiopet koboro lu ekotosi akoriok aswam ngesi aitolomun akaadi naka akoru naka akoriok kolago.
lgg_prompt: Esele agrikica niri ni mu drile zozu, 'ba karakara eyi geri ndundu 'diyi onda afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi alu 'dile 'bani lezu 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi ma asi esuzu ri geri 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni karatasi 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ayuzu oli aliasi ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nikigumizamu n'okutunguuka, baingi nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'oburiisa. Omuringo gumwe ogurikureetaho amaani, n'okutandika kukoresa ebaruha z'abahingi n'abariisa ezirikukoresibwa aha mikutu.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a tropical region, I was always surrounded by a variety of delicious and nutritious foods. Among them, cassava stands out as a personal favorite due to its versatility and rich flavor.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba nnakulira mu kitundu ekirimu ebbugumu, nnateranga okulya emmere ewooma era erimu ebiriisa. Mu byo, muwogo gusibuka ng'ogusinga okwagalibwa omuntu olw'obukozi bwagwo n'obuwoomi bwagwo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka dongo I kabedo ma lyeto tye iye, pol kare onongo atye I kabedo ma opong ki cam ma mit dok tye ki moc cam mapol. I kingi, gwana obedo gin ma dano maro tutwal pi jami mapol ma en tiyo kwede ki mit ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Apolou eong kotoma aiboisit naemwanar akwap, ajai eong keda inyamat luipu luibusakinit eong ainyam. Kanejaas kesi, eminakinit eong emuogo noi naarai epedori aswam iboro luipu ka ajon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mani zozu angu drizaru 'diyi ma alia, ma ovu ma ageia sawa driasi nyaka ndrizaru azini rua ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. Yi ma eselea, gbanda e'da i ekile 'ba ma ngulupi ni leleri ru a'disikuni eri afa ndu ndu 'diyi 'ye azini eri ma a'di ni.
nyn_prompt: Okukurira omu kicweka ky'obutiti, nkaba nyetooroirwe eby'okurya bingi ebirimu ebiriisa. Omuri byo, muhogo nigumanywa munonga ahabw'oburungi bwagwo n'oburungi bwagwo.

eng_prompt: To enhance sustainability and resilience in agriculture, experts recommend adopting varied farming practices. This approach not only improves soil health but also mitigates risks associated with climate change and market fluctuations.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obuwangaazi n'obutebenkevu mu byobulimi, abakugu bateesa okwettanira enkola z'okulima ez'enjawulo. Enkola eno tekoma ku kutumbula bulamu bwa ttaka naye era ekendeeza ku bulabe obuva ku nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'enkyukakyuka mu katale.
ach_prompt: Pi ilo malo rwom me pur, ludiro miyo tam me tic ki yoo mapatpat me pur. Yoo man pe yubu yotkom me ngom keken ento bene dwoko piny rwom me peko ma bino macalo adwogi me alokaloka piny ki alokaloka me cuk.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aijar naka akoru, icorete ipirioitin aitwasam iponesio lu akoru luegelegela. Mam epone lo itojokari nuka alupok bon konye itidisiari atiokisio nu ikamanara keda aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda esokoni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica niri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba onita angiri be 'diyi le 'ba ma 'du geri ori ezoza ni ndundu 'diyi. Geri 'di ni lu nyaku ma alata otu ku te eri vini e'yo ewaru e'yo angu mile ni ojazu azini e'yo cuu ni ojazu 'diyi ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abakugu nibahaburwa okukoresa emiringo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa etarikushushana. Enkora egi terikwongyera aha magara g'eitaka, kureka neekyendeeza aha kabi akarikuruga omu mpindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'empindahinduka y'akatare.

eng_prompt: Understanding the factors that influence public opinion is crucial for policymakers. Various elements, such as transparency, perceived effectiveness, and community impact, can significantly sway public perception of government initiatives.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ensonga ezikwata ku ndowooza z'abantu kya mugaso nnyo eri abakola amateeka. Ebintu eby'enjawulo, nga obwerufu, ebirowoozebwa okuba ebikola obulungi, n'ebikosa abantu, bisobola okukyusa endowooza y'abantu ku nteekateeka za gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Niang ngo ma kelo tam pa lwak pire tek tutwal ki lutela. Jami mapol calo bedo ki ada, nen calo tic maber, ki adwoki pa lwak twero kelo alokaloka I tam pa lwak I kom yub pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin iboro lu itopoloete aomisio nuka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi mama ejaasi ngul luitolomete ikisila. Akiro nuegelegela kwape nat aica, aomit ebe iswamat ejok, keda aomisio nuka itunga, epedorete aijulakin aomisio nuka itunga nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'bi yi ma egata oja'ba 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'ba azita sipi 'diyi dri. E'yo ndundu ekile e'yo ada le, e'yo 'bani ega kini azi nga kililiru, azini e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi, eyi eco o'bi eyi ma egata e'yo gamete ni 'diyi ma dria ri oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikuteganisa enteekateeka y'abantu, n'eky'omugasho munonga ahari abo abarikukora ebiragiro. Ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe, nk'oburingaaniza, okureebeka nk'okukora kurungi hamwe n'okureebeka nk'okukora kurungi omu bantu, nibibaasa kuhindura emiteekateekyere y'abantu aha nteekateeka za gavumenti.

eng_prompt: As agricultural practices evolve, it's essential to consider how we can support traditional farmers in adapting to new technologies. We need to explore effective strategies for bridging the gap between conventional methods and innovative farming techniques.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkola z'ebyobulimi zikulaakulana, kya mugaso okulowooza ku ngeri gye tuyinza okuyambamu abalimi ab'ennono mu kwetegereza tekinologiya omupya. Twetaaga okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ez'okuziba ekituli wakati w'enkola z'okulima eza bulijjo n'enkola z'okulima ez'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: Ka yub me pur tye ka dongo, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma watwero konyo kwede lupur me tekwaro me ngiyo ki diro manyen me pur. Omyero wanong yoo maber me tyeko apoka-poka matye ikin yoo me pur macon ki diro me pur manyen.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi iponesio luka akor aijulakin, ejokuna aomoom epone loipedoria oni aigangakite akoriok lu atekerin aitwasam etatai loitetet. Ibusakinit oni aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aimik atiokisio kiding iponesio luka akor lumojong keda iponesio luka akor luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Geri agirikica ni 'diyi ni zoria, eri orodriru ama ma ega geri amani ecozu atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba oku 'diyi dri geri eyini ecozu aa'zu tekenologia o'diru 'diyi pie ri ma dria. Le ama ma nda geri kililiru 'bani ecozu esele cozu geri ori ezoza ni oku 'diyi ma eselea geri ori ezoza ni o'diru 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Emikorere y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ku erikugyenda neetunguuka, niky'omugasho okureeba oku turikubaasa kuhwera abahingi n'abariisa b'obuhangwa kukoresa tekinorogye ensya. Twine kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okureeba ngu hariho entaaniso ahagati y'emiringo y'obuhingi eya ira hamwe n'emihanda y'obuhingi n'oburiisa ey'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the agricultural sector plays a crucial role in the economy and food security. Understanding the governing bodies involved is essential to grasping how agricultural policies are implemented.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, eby'obulimi n'obulunzi bikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu by'enfuna n'obutebenkevu bw'emmere. Okutegeera ebitongole ebifuga ebikwatibwako kya mugaso okutegeera engeri enkola z'ebyobulimi gye ziteekebwamu mu nkola.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, tenge me pur timo tic mapire tek tutwal I tenge me lim ki gwoko cam. Niang dul ma doro lok eni pire tek tutwal pi niang kit ma ki keto kwede cik me pur itic.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaasi erionget loka akor keda aswam naepol noi kotoma edumune loka ikapun keda akor naka inyamat. Amisikin atukona nu eyaitos kes ejok kanu amisiikin epone lo itwasamaere ainapeta nuka akoru.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, esele agirikica niri ni azi okporu nga e'yo robiani azini nyaka ma tambaza ma alea. Amuti driceza ni 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru geri 'bani azita agirikica ni 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea ri vazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'entaasya hamwe n'eby'okurya. Okwetegyereza ebitongore ebirikwebembera eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, nikikuru munonga omu kumanya oku ebiragiro by'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa bishemereire kuta omu nkora.

eng_prompt: Despite extensive advertising and outreach efforts, the turnout for the event was disappointing. Organizers had hoped for a larger crowd to engage with the program.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo okulangirira n'okubunyisa amawulire, abantu bangi tebajja ku mukolo ogwo. Abategesi baali basuubira abantu bangi okwenyigira mu pulogulaamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kicwalo lok angeya mapol me cwalo ngec bot lwak, wel dano ma obino I yub ne pe obedo ber tutwal. Luyub obedo ki gen ni dano mapol bibedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida aponi kiswamata noi alimonor iboro keda aitodolikin itunga, mam itunga luipu apotu opotu toma opucit kangol. Amuno etemonokinak ebe epote itunga luipu alomar toma ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'dukoti edrizu azini o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba emu'ba omu 'da ma alea 'diyi ndra asi nyoza ru. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi 'ba ndra asi kini 'ba karakara eyi nga fi otita 'da ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okuronda n'okuhutuura abantu, abantu abaizire aha mukoro tibarashemerereirwe. Abatebekanisa bakaba baine amatsiko ngu abantu baingi nibaza kwejumba omu puroguraamu.

eng_prompt: After a challenging season marked by unpredictable weather and market fluctuations, many farmers are beginning to see signs of recovery. With improved crop yields and favorable conditions, they are optimistic about the future of their farm produce.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ebiseera ebizibu ebyalimu embeera y'obudde etategeerekeka n'enkyukakyuka mu katale, abalimi bangi batandise okulaba obubonero bw'okuwona. Olw'amakungula g'ebirime okulongooka n'embeera ennungi, balina essuubi ku biseera by'ebirime byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Inge kare me poto ma obedo tek tutwal ma obedo ki peko me piny ki aloka-loka me cuk, lupur mapol dong gucako neno lanyut me roc. Gitye ki gen I kom anyim pa camgi pien kac gi tye ka dongo dok jami weng tye maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apakio nuetioko nuejaasi keda ekuse keda ekuse keda aijulanakineta nuka esokoni, eutasi akoriok luipu asesen ijenuneta luka angaleun. Keda aitojokaar aswam naka iraan keda ejautene loejok, ejaasi kesi keda aomisio nuikamunitos ingaren naka iraanakec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma vutia, e'yo angu mile ni aa'zu ku azini e'yo cuu ni ojazu 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi e'do e'da e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ra. Ori efiza ma omgbo otuzu azini wura onyiru 'diyisi, eyi asi'baza be ewu drialeri ma dria afa eyini ofule amvua 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bw'oburemeezi obwaretsirweho embeera y'obwire etarikwetegyerezibwa hamwe n'empindahinduka omu butare, abahingi baingi batandikire kureeba obubonero bw'okugaruka. Ahabw'amasharuura g'ebihingirwe kweyongyera n'embeera nungi, baine amatsiko aha biro by'omumaisho eby'ebihingirwe byabo.

eng_prompt: In rural communities, collaboration often leads to greater success. To address shared challenges and enhance productivity, farmers with a common interest form groups.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, okukolera awamu kitera okuvaamu obuwanguzi obw'amaanyi. Okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa okwa wamu n'okutumbula ebirime, abalimi n'abalunzi abalina ebigendererwa bye bimu bakola ebibiina.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me caro, winye ipol kare kelo loc madit. Pi tyeko peko ma dano weng tye kwede ki medo rwom me pur, lupur matye ki miti acel giyubu gurup.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi, aimorikikina eyangauni akerianut naepol noi. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas keda kesi ka aitojokar eswamae, ekotosi akoriok lu ekotosi kesi aswam igurupun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea, ti ecita ni tutuni drile suza eji. E'yo ewaru tualu 'diyi ma aza kozu azini afa ofule 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba e'yo aluri lepi 'diyi amuti eyi e'do.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro, okukwatanisa nikureeta obusinguzi. Okubaasa kukora ahaburemeezi oburikushangwa hamwe n'okwongyera ahaby'amasharuura, abahingi n'abariisa abaine ebigyendererwa ebirikushushana, nibakora guruupu.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with distractions and fleeting interests, the ability to dedicate oneself fully to a cause or goal can make all the difference. Whether in personal relationships, career aspirations, or personal growth, unwavering dedication lays the foundation for success.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebiwugulaza n'okwegomba okw'akaseera obuseera, obusobozi bw'okwewaayo mu bujjuvu eri ensonga oba ekigendererwa kisobola okuleetawo enjawulo. Ka kibeere mu nkolagana y'obuntu, okwegomba kw'emirimu, oba okukulaakulana kw'obuntu, okwewaayo okutajjulukuka kuteekawo omusingi gw'obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki jami ma dwoyo tam ki miti ma kato, kero pa dano me keto cwinygi i kom gin moni twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal. Kadi bed ni itye I kin dano, miti me nongo tic, onyo dongo pa dano, keto cwiny ma pe lokke obedo guti me nongo loc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda iboro luipu luepedorete aitolitol akiro keda ipudesia luka apak naedit, apedorit itunganan aswam kagogongu kere kanu aswam iboro luekotosi itunganan. Karaida ejaasi keda eidicane loajokan, aswam naejok, arai bo apol, ainakina naepol erai atukot naka akerianut.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea afa e'yo onzi 'yepi azini e'yo lepi sa'wa ezu 'diyi pie tre, okpo fezu 'ba aluni i 'bazu dria e'yo azi ma dria kani e'yo azi ma dria ri eco ojata eji ra. Ka tro ovu e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea, asi 'baza e'yo azi ni 'diyi ma dria, kani ku zota e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma alea, asi 'bazu asi driasi ri ni e'yo drile suza niri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebirikuturabya hamwe n'ebigyendererwa ebirikugyenda omu maisho, okubaasa kweheereza kimwe aha nshonga n'ekigyendererwa nikibaasa kureetaho entaaniso. Yaaba ori omukukorengana n'abantu, omu bigyendererwa by'okukora emirimo, nainga okukura, okwehayo okutahwamu amaani nikyo musingye gw'obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: Building relationships within your industry can open up new opportunities and provide valuable insights. Engaging with peers and mentors is essential for professional growth.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba enkolagana mu mulimu gwo kisobola okuggulawo emikisa emipya n'okuwa amagezi ag'omugaso. Okukwatagana ne banno n'ababuulirira kyetaagisa nnyo mu kukulaakulana kw'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: Gedo wat ikin lutic megi twero yabo gum manyen ki miyo ngec ma pire tek. Winye ki lurem ki lupwonye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa ludiro.
teo_prompt: Adukun eidicane kotoma okampuni kon epedori ayangaun arerengesio nuitetiak ido ijaikini ijo acoa naejok. Aiswamanara keda ipaupa keda lu isisianakinete itunga ejok kanu apoloun kotoma aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea okalamvu mivileri ma alea 'diyi sizu ri eco drileba o'diru 'diyi ma ti zi dika eri eco mi dri ondua orodriru 'diyi fe ra. Ti ecita 'ba yi ma eselea azini 'ba imbata fe'baa 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru zota azi ngazaniri ni.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka enkoragana omu kampuni yaawe, nikibaasa kwiguraho emigisha misya n'obwengye bw'omugasho. Okukorengana na bagyenzi baawe n'abakuhabura n'eky'omugasho omukutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate economic growth and improve quality of life, policymakers are prioritizing funding for essential services. This strategic approach aims to address pressing societal needs and enhance community well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu, abakola amateeka bakulembeza okuvujjirira obuweereza obwetaagisa. Enkola eno ey'obukodyo egendereddwamu okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu eby'amangu n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor dongo pa lim ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano, lucungu iwi bye mapat-pat tye ka keto lim I tic ma pire tek loyo weng. Yub man tye ki miti me cobo miti pa lwak ki medo rwom me kwo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitojokar adoketait na aijar, eutasi itunga luitolomete ikisila aisingarenit ainanakin ikapun mama ejaasi ijanakino luka itunga. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga ka aitojokar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robianiri ma alia azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba azita sipi 'diyi robia fezu azi orodriru 'diyi dri oko. Geri 'bani e'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru ri lezu e'yo o'bi eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'okutunguura omutindo gw'entuura y'abantu, ab'eby'obutegyeki bariyo nibaheereza sente z'obuheereza. Enkora egi neegyenderera kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu n'okutunguura entuura y'abantu.

eng_prompt: I heard that the mathematics course was really challenging, but I thought it might be beneficial for my studies. Did you decide to sign up for it?
lug_prompt: Nawulira nti essomo ly'okubala lyalimu okusoomoozebwa naye nalowooza nti liyinza okuba ery'omuganyulo mu kusoma kwange.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ni kwan me cura obedo gin matek tutwal, ento atamo ni twero bedo ber tutwal pi kwan na.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong ebe etiono noi aisisia aimar, konye aomit eong ebe epedori aingarakin eong kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri ndra kini kosi namba niri e'yo ewaru 'dileni'i, te ma ega eri nga ovu orodriru ma vile onita ni.
nyn_prompt: Mpuriire ngu omushomo gw'okubara gukaba guri ogw'oburemeezi, kwonka nkateekateeka ngu nigubaasa kuba ogw'omugasho aha mishomo yangye.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous benefits outlined in the program, many farmers remained skeptical about its value. As a result, they chose not to participate in the registration process.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga pulogulaamu eyo yalimu emiganyulo mingi, abalimi bangi baali babuusabuusa omuganyulo gwayo. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo obuteetaba mu kwewandiisa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni adwogi mabeco mapol tye I yub eni, lupur mapol pud gubedo ki akala-kala I kom ber pa yub eni. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tamgi pe me bedo tye ikare me coone.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ajokisio nuelimoritai kotoma ainapeta ngun, apotu akoriok luipu kongeroto ajokis naka ainapeta ngun. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi koseutu mam ajaikin toma aiwadikao.
lgg_prompt: Orodri karakara 'bani ece otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara ori ezo'ba 'diyi awi asi otiza be orodri erini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi pe eyi ma ru osizu ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho emigasho mingi omu puroguraamu, abahingi baingi bakaguma nibabangaanisa omugasho gwayo. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu okwetabamu omu kwehandikisa.

eng_prompt: Cassava is a versatile root vegetable that is a staple in many tropical regions. Its starchy tubers can be processed in various ways to create different food products.
lug_prompt: Muwogo omubisi ogukozesebwa ennyo era oguliibwa mu bitundu bingi eby'obutiti. Ebikoola byayo ebirimu sitaaki bisobola okulongoosebwa mu ngeri ez'enjawulo okukola emmere ey'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Gwana obedo pot dek matye ki tyen mapol tutwal ma dano mapol gitiyo kwede i kabedo ma piny lyet iye. Kitwero yubu tyen nyig yat man i yoo mapat-pat me yubu cam mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Erai emuogo idiasio luegelegela lu enyamete itunga kaiboisio nuipu. Epedorio aitemonokin imukerun lu ejaas keda esitaaka koiponesio luegelegela kanu aiswamaun inyamat luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Gbanda eri tibi ini wura ndundu eyi pie dika eri nyaka 'bani nya sa'wa driasi angu drioru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea ri i. Ba eco eri ma o'bu sita ru 'diyi ede geri ndundu eyini ani nyaka ndundu eyi edezu.
nyn_prompt: Muhogo n'emboga y'emirandira erikukoresibwa munonga kandi n'ey'omugasho omu bicweka bingi eby'obutiti. Enjuma zaayo ezirimu sitaka nizibaasa kukorwa omu miringo etari emwe n'emwe kukora eby'okurya bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: West Nile Uganda is known for its diverse agricultural practices due to its fertile soil and favorable climate. Many farmers in the region cultivate a variety of crops to support both local consumption and trade.
lug_prompt: West Nile Uganda emanyiddwa olw'obulimi bwayo obw'enjawulo olw'ettaka lyayo eggimu n'embeera y'obudde ennungi. Abalimi bangi mu kitundu balima ebirime eby'enjawulo okusobola okugula n'okusuubulagana.
ach_prompt: West Nile Uganda oywek pi yub mapat-pat me pur pi ngom ma moc ki piny ma ber. Lupur mapol i twok piny eni gipuru jami apita mapatpat me cobo miti gi ki biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Ejenara West Nile Uganda kanu iponesio lu akoru luegelegela kanuka alupok nu epotiete ka ekuse ka etepe. Akoriok luipu luka atutubet ekoriete ikorion luegelegela kanu agwel keda agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri ma woko westnile niri ma alea e'yo ori ezoza ni ndundu 'diyisi e'yo nyaku ni onyiru azini angu mile ni muke risi. Ba ori ezo'ba angu 'di ma alea karakara 'diyi ori ndundu eyi ezo eyini ani afa eyini nya ogogo 'diyi ma tambazu tualu tujari 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: West Nile Uganda nemanywa ahabw'obuhingi n'oburiisa bw'emiringo mingi ahabw'eitaka ryayo erirungi n'obwire burungi. Abahingi baingi omu kyanga nibahinga ebihingirwe by'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe, kugira ngu babaase kugura n'okuguza ebintu byabo.

eng_prompt: The correctional system in Uganda has undergone significant changes over the years. As a result, the majority of facilities are now operated by the state.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'amakomera mu Uganda ebaddemu enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi okumala emyaka. N'ekyavaamu, ebifo ebisinga kati biddukanyizibwa gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Gangi buc I lobo Uganda olokke tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi tic mapol kombedi gamente aye tye ka tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ajai aijulanakineta nuipu noi toma orionget loka isibei koUganda kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, apugan nes kwana eyait aiboisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani arujo eyi ma tambazu kari Uganda niri ma alea ri esu ojata angiri eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, pari arojo ni 'diyi ma abari eyi curu'do azi nga kari ni.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'ebihome omu Uganda ehindukire munonga okumara emyaka mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro amaingi hati nigakorerwa gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In the legal system, various roles contribute to the functioning of the courts. One such position is that of the court of appeal registrar, which plays a crucial part in managing appeals.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka, emirimu egy'enjawulo giyamba ku mirimu gya kkooti. Ekimu ku bifo ng'ebyo kye kya omuwandiisi wa kkooti ejulirwamu, akola omulimu omukulu mu kuddukanya okujulira.
ach_prompt: I tenge me cik, tic mapat-pat konyo I tic pa kot. Kabedo acel ma kit meno obedo pa Court of Appeal Registrar, ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal I doro lok me apil.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila, ejaasi aswamisinei nuegelegela nu ingarakitos aswam naka adieket. Adiopet kotoma aiboisit kangin ngesi naka ekalani loka ekooti loka apolon, loiswamai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitikitik apolon.
lgg_prompt: Geri e'yo liza ni 'diyi ma alia, azi ndundu eyi fe koti eyini azi ngazu kililiru. Pari 'dile 'diyi ma azi alu eri 'ba osipi makata apili niri ni, azi okporu 'yepi e'yo apili ni 'diyi ma aza kozu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ebiragiro, emirimo mingi neehwera omu kukora kwa kooti. Emwe aha myanya egyo n'ey'omuhandiiki wa kooti y'okujurira, orikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureeberera okujurira.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the election results and considering the discrepancies reported, many are questioning the integrity of the process. Some individuals are now debating whether legal action is warranted to challenge the outcome.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyava mu kulonda n'okulowooza ku butakwatagana obwazuuliddwa, bangi babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'enkola. Abantu abamu kati bakubaganya ebirowoozo oba okutwalira amateeka mu ngalo kyetaagisa okuwakanya ebyava mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: I ngee ngiyo adwogi yer ki neno lok mapat-pat makikatti kwede, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom ber pa yub enoni. Dano mukene kombedi gitye ka laro lok kace omyero ki cwal gi I kot me kwero adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro nuka aseo keda aomisio nuka amamus acamanar, itunga luipu epodokinito abeit naka ainapeta ngun. Eutasi kwana icetunga epeget arai ibusakinit aitolot akiro nuka ikisila kanu aitepeg akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'duko opetaa ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo onzi 'bani ece 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo 'yeta 'da ni aa'zu e'yo ada be ri si. Ba azi 'diyi curu'do agbatara gba kani le 'ba ma 'du e'yo azita palaa 'diyi e'yo 'di ma dria ra ya ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugire omu buruuru hamwe n'okureeba oburemeezi oburikworekwa, baingi nibabangaanisa oburingaaniza bw'enteekateeka egyo. Abantu abamwe hati nibahanuura yaaba ebiragiro nibyetengwa kuhakanisa ebirugiremu.

eng_prompt: In legal contexts, it is important to understand the various terms and conditions that can affect a case. One such term that often arises is the concept of a warranty.
lug_prompt: Mu nsonga z'amateeka, kya mugaso okutegeera amateeka n'obukwakkulizo obw'enjawulo obusobola okukosa omusango. Ekimu ku bigambo ng'ebyo ebitera okujja ye walanti.
ach_prompt: I lok makwako cik, pire tek tutwal me niang cik mapat-pat matwero balo lok. Lok acel macalo man ma pol kare bino en aye lok me warranty.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka ikisila, ejokuna noi amisiikin ikisila luegelegela luepedorete aitolitol emusago. Adiopet akiro kwape kangin nuepolok noi ngesi aomisioit naka awaranti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru azita ndundu ecopi e'yo azi 'yepi ra 'diyi vazu. E'yo azi alu 'dile 'bani efu sawa driasi ri egata warantini ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu biragiro, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebiragiro ebitarikushushana ebirikubaasa kuteganisa omushango. Ekigambo kimwe nk'ekyo ekirikukira kubaho, n'ekya waaranti.

eng_prompt: In the legal system, judges hold significant authority over the proceedings in their courtrooms. They have the discretion to evaluate the merits of a case and determine whether it should proceed.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'amateeka, abalamuzi balina obuyinza bungi ku misango mu kkooti zaabwe. Balina obuyinza okwekenneenya ensonga z'omusango n'okusalawo oba gulina okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I tenge me cik, lungol kop tye ki twero madit tutwal I kom lok matye I kot gi. Gitye ki twero me neno ka lok moni tye kakare dok gimoko kace omyero gumedde anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okisila, ejaasi ikatubok keda apedor naepol noi naka aitolot imusagon lu adieket kec. Ejaasi kesi keda apedor naka airereor akiro nuka abeit nuka emusago kosodete aseun arai ibusakinit kesi ainyikokin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza ma alia, 'ba e'yo li'baa 'diyi ma okpo e'yo yi 'yepi dwania 'diyi ma dria ci. Eyi ma okpo e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini e'yo 'duzu kani le eyi ma mu drile ra ya ri ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ebiragiro, abaramuzi baine obushoborozi bwingi aha mishango omu kooti zaabo. Baine obushoborozi bw'okushwijuma emigasho y'omushango kandi bakasharamu yaaba gushemereire kugumizamu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance voter privacy and ensure a fair election process, new measures have been implemented. One significant change is the introduction of a more secure voting method.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'ekyama by'abalonzi n'okukakasa enkola y'okulonda ey'obwenkanya, enkola empya ziteekeddwa mu nkola. Enkyukakyuka emu enkulu kwe kuteekawo enkola y'okulonda ey'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko mung pa lubol kwir ki neno ni yer otimme maber, kiketo yoo manyen mapat-pat itic. Alokaloka acel ma pire tek tutwal obedo kelo yoo me bolo kwir maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong akiro nuka aiyeyea nuka aseak ka awanyun ebe ejai aseo na abeit, aponi ibwaikinai iwaitin luitetiak. Adiopet aijulanakineta nuepolok ngesi aitolomunio naka iwaitin lu ayuara luka aicak abootin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma e'yo yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini geri opetaa eyini aa'zu e'yo ada be 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma alea, 'ba 'ba e'yo o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Ojata azi okporu ni ri geri ageyitema ni voti 'bezuri ma e'dota ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu abateezi b'akaruuru bakoresa oburingaaniza omu karuuru, hatandikirweho engyenderwaho nsya. Empindahinduka y'amaani n'okutandikaho enkora y'okuteera akaruuru ey'eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the democratic process relies heavily on a well-organized electoral system. To ensure fair and transparent elections, a dedicated body oversees the entire electoral process.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, enkola ya demokulasiya yeesigamye nnyo ku nkola y'okulonda etegekeddwa obulungi. Okusobola okukakasa nti okulonda kuba kwa mazima na bwerufu, waliwo ekitongole ekikola ku nsonga z'okulonda.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, tela pa lwak jenge tutwalle I kom yub me bolo kwir ma kiyubu maber. Me neno ni yer tye maber labongo ayela, dul ma ki keto me doro yer weng.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejai aseo na itemonokino ejok. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aseo najokan, ejai atukot naeyait ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, geri o'bi eyini ecozu opeta eyi 'yezu ra 'diyi tutuni aa geri 'bani opeta eyi otuzu kililiru 'diyisi. E'yo opetaa kililiru azini e'yo ada be 'diyi nezu, amuti azi ngapi e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma pamvu one ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, enkora ya demokurasiya neyesigama munonga aha nkora y'oburuuru etebekanisiibwe kurungi. Okureeba ngu akaruuru karimu oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza, hariho ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa ahaby'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: In today's complex legal landscape, individuals and businesses often find themselves facing a myriad of legal challenges. To navigate these difficulties effectively, many seek the expertise of legal professionals.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'amateeka enzibu, abantu ssekinnoomu ne bizinensi batera okwesanga nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo mu mateeka. Okusobola okwaŋŋanga ebizibu bino obulungi, bangi banoonya amagezi g'abakugu mu by'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma cik tye matek tutwal, dano ki biacara ipol kare ginongo gi tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Me lweny i kom peko magi maber, dano mapol giyenyo kony ki bot lupirida.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nuka ikisila luka lolo, itunga keda ibiasaran itereikina keda atiokisio nuipu noi nuka ikisila. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejok, ekotosi itunga luipu aingarakinio kama ejaasi ipiriotin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, 'ba yi ma ngulupi azini tujara 'yepi 'diyi yi esu e'yo ewaru azita ma dria 'diyi karakara. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, 'ba karakara eyi imbata nda 'ba onita be e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu biragiro by'erizooba ebirikuteganisa, abantu n'abashuubuzi nibashanga oburemeezi bwingi omu biragiro. Okumaraho oburemeezi obu kurungi, baingi nibasherura obuhabuzi bw'abakugu omu by'amateeka.

eng_prompt: The integrity of the judicial system relies heavily on the principles upheld by those in positions of authority. It is essential for judges to maintain impartiality to ensure that justice is served.
lug_prompt: Obulambulukufu bw'ekitongole ekiramuzi businziira nnyo ku misingi egikuumibwa abo abali mu bifo by'obuyinza. Kya mugaso abalamuzi okukuuma obutasosola okukakasa nti obwenkanya buweebwa.
ach_prompt: Ber pa dul pa lungol kop jenge tutwalle I kom cik ma lutela tye kwede. Pire tek tutwal ni lungol kop omyero pe gubed ki apokapoka me neno ni ngolo kop atir otime.
teo_prompt: Apedorit naka apugan naka ikatubok esipokinitai noi kotupitete ikisila luka itunga luejaasi toma aiboisio nuapolok. Erai ibore yenepol noi atubok amamut atiakatiaka kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinio etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ada e'yo dwani ni 'diyi ma dria ri yi ati okporu e'yo 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria. Eri orodriru 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ni aa'zu opendu kokoru nezu ra kini 'ba fe e'yo liza kililiru ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburingaaniza bw'ekitongore ekirikucwera emishango omu kooti nikirugiirira aha misingye y'abo abari omu myanya y'obushoborozi. N'eky'omugasho abaramuzi kuguma bataine rubaju, kugira ngu oburingaaniza buheerezebwe.

eng_prompt: Elections are a fundamental aspect of democratic governance, providing citizens with the opportunity to express their political preferences. During this process, individuals can select candidates who align with their values and vision for the future.
lug_prompt: Okulonda kintu kikulu nnyo mu demokulasiya, kiwa bannansi akakisa okulaga ebyo bye baagala mu byobufuzi. Mu nkola eno, abantu basobola okulonda abeesimbyewo abakwatagana n'emitindo gyabwe n'okwolesebwa kwabwe eri ebiseera by'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Yer obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tela pa lwak, miyo kare ki anywali me nyutu miti gi me cung iwibye. Ikare me yub man, dano acel acel twero yero lucungu ma rwate ki jami ma pigi tego ki neno gi pi anyim gi.
teo_prompt: Eraas aseo ibore yenepol noi kotoma apugan naka itunga, ijaikini itunga arereng naka aitodun ipudesia kec luka epolitikis. Kotoma ainapeta nu, epedorete itunga aseun abwoak lu etupitos iponesiokec keda aomisioitikec nuka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa eri e'yo azi okporu e'yo driceza o'biyini 'diyi ma dria, erini fe kari anzi eyini drileba e'dazu e'yo yini lele politiki ni 'diyi. Sawa 'di ma alea, 'ba alu alu eco 'ba pa tupi eyi ma adriza azini egata ewu drialeri ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ope ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru n'ekintu kikuru munonga omu bwebembezi bwa demokurasiya, nikiha abantu omugisha gw'okworeka ebi barikwenda omu by'obutegyeki. Omu nkora egi, abantu nibabaasa kutoorana abesimbireho abarikuhikaana n'emitwarize yaabo hamwe n'ekirooto kyabo ky'ebiro bya nyensya.

eng_prompt: In legal proceedings, various parties play distinct roles, each with specific responsibilities and rights. One important role in the appeals process is that of the individual or entity challenging a decision made by a lower court.
lug_prompt: Mu misango gy'amateeka, enjuyi ez'enjawulo zikola emirimu egy'enjawulo, buli emu n'obuvunaanyizibwa n'eddembe eby'enjawulo. Omulimu ogumu omukulu mu nkola y'okujulira gwe gw'omuntu oba ekitongole okuwakanya okusalawo okwakolebwa kkooti eya wansi.
ach_prompt: I lok makwako cik, dul mapat-pat timo tic mapat-pat, acel-acel tye ki tic ki twero mapat-pat. Tic acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub me lego kot en aye pa ngat onyo dul ma kwero tam ma kot matino omoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opeget loka ikisila, itunga luegelegela iswamaete aswamisinei nuegelegela, kanginitunganan ejaas keda apedorosio keda apedorosio nuegelegela. Aswam adiope naepol noi kotoma aijulujuleta ngesi naka itunganan arai erionget loetepegit aseunet naka ekooti lodidi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza azitaniri ma alia, amuti ndundu yi azi ndu ndu 'ye, alu alu ma azi azini driwala yini 'diyi ci. Azi alu orodriru e'yo apili ni 'diyi ma alia ri eri 'ba alu alu kani amuti e'yo liza dwani ele 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu mishango y'ebiragiro, abantu baingi nibakora emirimo etarikushushana, buri omwe aine obujunanizibwa n'obugabe bwe. Omurimo gumwe ogw'omugasho omu kujurira n'ogw'omuntu buntu nainga ekitongore ekirikuhakanisa okusharamu okwakozirwe kooti eyahansi.

eng_prompt: Failure to comply with legal obligations can lead to serious consequences. In many jurisdictions, unpaid fines are treated as a criminal offense.
lug_prompt: Okulemererwa okugoberera ebiragiro kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi. Mu bitundu bingi, engassi ezitasasuddwa zitwalibwa ng'omusango.
ach_prompt: Kwero lubu cik twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal. I twok piny mapol, pwod ma pe kiculu kitero calo bal.
teo_prompt: Aimikit atupakinit ikisila epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok. Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, eyangaritai aitac ikapun kwape emusago.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita palaa 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku ri eco e'yo onzi eji ra. Kari karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba panga 'bani ofe ku 'diyi 'du ekile e'yo azita onyoza ni le.
nyn_prompt: Okuremwa kukuratira ebiragiro, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebizibu by'amaani. Omu matware maingi, emishaara etashashwirwe, neetwarwa nk'ekihagaro.

eng_prompt: There have been numerous allegations of misconduct and unethical behavior surrounding his actions in office. Many constituents are questioning his integrity and ability to represent their interests effectively.
lug_prompt: Wabaddewo ebigambibwa bingi ku mpisa embi n'enneeyisa etali ya mpisa okwetooloola ebikolwa bye mu woofiisi. Abalonzi bangi babuusabuusa obwesimbu bwe n'obusobozi bwe okukiikirira obulungi ebigendererwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Koko mapol obedo tye I kom tim maraco ki tim maraco ma en otimo I kare ma en tye I opic. Lubol kwir mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo mege ki kero mege me cung pi miti gi maber.
teo_prompt: Epuakata akiro nuipu nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok keda iponesio luarokok nuikamunitos aswamisioke kotoma oyapesi. Eutasi itunga luipu aomit ebe mam ngesi iswamai ejok ka apedorit abwoikin ipudesia kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yo eri ma adriza onzi azini adriza onzi ma dria 'diyi ebi ovu karakara. Ba pari opi nyazani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi karakara eyi e'yo ega e'yo ada erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini okpo erini ecozu eyi ma egata eyi ma paria kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Habaireho ebigambibwa bingi ebirikukwata aha micwe mibi n'emitwarize etari y'emitwarize omu mirimo ye omu ofiisi. Abantu baingi abarikumujwekyera nibabangaanisa obwesigwa bwe n'okubaasa kwe kujwekyera ebigyendererwa byabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: By-elections play a crucial role in maintaining the democratic process within a legislative body. Understanding the circumstances that trigger these elections is essential for grasping their significance in governance.
lug_prompt: Okuddamu okulonda kwa mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma enkola ya demokulasiya mu bibiina by'amateeka. Okutegeera embeera ezaaviirako okulonda kuno kikulu nnyo mu kutegeera obukulu bwakwo mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Yer mapat-pat tye ki tic mapire tek tutwal I gwoko loc alwak I dul me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat. Niang ngo ma okelo yer eni pire tek tutwal pi niang ber pa yer eni I tela.
teo_prompt: Aswam na aseo erai naepol noi kanu aidar aseo naka itunga kotoma airabet. Amisiikin ejautene loabu koyangau aseo erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amisiikin ajokis naka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa 'bani opeta eyi ma alea 'diyi azi okporu ni nga e'yo democracia ni 'diyi ma tambazu amuti legiko ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo e'yo opeta 'diyi fepi 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'bani ecozu eyi ma orodri e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea ri vazu.
nyn_prompt: Okugarukamu akaruuru nikakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda enkora ya demokurasiya omu bibiina by'obutegyeki. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureetaho akaruuru aka n'eky'omugasho munonga omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: As the university expands its focus on interdisciplinary studies, there is a growing need to define the purpose of the new health science laboratory. Faculty and students are eager to explore innovative research opportunities and practical applications in the field of health science.
lug_prompt: Nga yunivasite egaziya essira lyayo ku misomo egy'enjawulo, waliwo obwetaavu obweyongera okunnyonnyola ekigendererwa ky'ekkeberero lya sayansi w'ebyobulamu eppya. Abasomesa n'abayizi baagala nnyo okunoonyereza ku bintu ebipya n'engeri y'okubikozesaamu mu byobulamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gang kwan me yunibaciti tye ka mede ki keto cwinygi I kom yub mapat-pat, miti tye me niang tyen lok me ot pim manyen me yot-kom. Lupwonye ki lutino kwan gitye ki miti matek me yenyo yoo me timo kwed manyen ki tic mapat-pat I tenge me cayanc me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyatakini eunibasite akeswam toma aisisia naka iponesio luegelegela, ejai eipud loepol noi aitodun alosikinet naka aiboisit nainwakere nuka esayanis. Ekapakina esisiak keda esisiak aingic apedorosio nuka aingic keda aitosom akiro nuka sayanis nuka angeleu.
lgg_prompt: Univasiti ni asi 'bazu e'yo onita ni ndundu eyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu risi, le 'ba ma 'ba e'yo afa 'bani lezu angu o'diru arojo ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ra. Imba'ba onita ni 'diyi tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie ava be geri e'yo eti ondazu o'diru 'diyi ondazu azini geri eyini ecozu eyi ayuzu e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Yunivasite ku erikweyongyera kuta amaani omuby'obwegyese, hariho ekyetengo ky'okumanya ekigyendererwa kya rabaratore y'ebyamagara ensya. Abeegyesa hamwe n'abeegi baine ekihika ky'okushwijuma emiringo y'okucondooza n'okukoresa omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: As I was researching the higher education system in Uganda, I became curious about the number of institutions available to students. Specifically, I wanted to know how many public universities the country has to offer.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali nnoonyereza ku by'enjigiriza ebya waggulu mu Uganda, nnayagala okumanya amatendekero ameka abayizi ge balina. Okusingira ddala, nnali njagala okumanya zi ssettendekero za gavumenti mmeka eggwanga lye lirina.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka kwedo lok I kom yub me kwan me rwom ma malo I lobo Uganda, abedo ki miti me ngeyo wel gangi kwan ma tye pi lutino kwan. Ki lok ada, onongo amito niang wel gangi kwan me rwom ma malo me gangi kwan pa gamente ma lobo man tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aingic nuka asioman naka okuju ko Uganda, abu eong aomoom nuipu isomeroi lu ejaas esisiak. Kacut akoto eong ajenun iunibasitin lu apugan lu ejaas akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo vuti ondazu geri onita uruleruri ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea risi, ma eca ava be angu onita ni sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma kalafe ma dria. Ale ndra ni univasiti gameteni 'diyi ma kalafe kari 'di ma alea si.
nyn_prompt: Obu naabaire nincondooza ahaby'obwegyese bw'ahaiguru omu Uganda, nkaba niinyenda kumanya omuhendo gw'amatendekyero agariho abeegi. Okukira munonga, nkaba niinyenda kumanya za Yunivasite za Gavumenti ezi eihanga ryaitu riine.

eng_prompt: As I embark on my academic journey, I find myself navigating the bustling life of higher education. Each day brings new challenges and opportunities for growth.
lug_prompt: Nga ntandika olugendo lwange olw'okusoma, nneesanga nga ntambulira mu bulamu obw'amatiribona obw'okusoma okw'oku ntikko. Buli lunaku luleeta okusoomoozebwa okupya n'emikisa gy'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma acako kwan, anongo atye ka wot I kwo me rwom ma malo ma dano dwong iye. Nino ki nino kelo peko ki gum me dongo lobo manyen.
teo_prompt: Neageuna eong asioman, apotu eong adumutu eong aijar naka asioman naikiara. Kanginipaaran eyangauni ainingosia nuitetiak keda arerengesio nuka apol.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'doria ma vile aci onitaniri ma aliarisi, ma isu ma ma ngulupi ni e'yo onita ururi ma alia 'diyi ma alia. O'du alu alu ni e'yo ewaru azini drileba zota ni 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Obu naabaire nintandika orugyendo rwangye rw'eby'obwegyese, nkashanga nyine amagara maingi omu mashomero agahaiguru. Buri eizooba nirireeta oburemeezi obusya n'omugisha gw'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: The higher education landscape in Uganda has evolved significantly over the years. As a result, various institutions have emerged to cater to the growing demand for tertiary education.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyenjigiriza ebya waggulu mu Uganda ekyuse nnyo okumala emyaka. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero ag'enjawulo gazzeewo okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'okusoma okw'oku ntikko obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Kwan me rwom ma malo I lobo Uganda olokke tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mapat-pat okati me cobo miti me kwan me rwom ma malo matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi aijulakineta nuka asioman nako Uganda kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, apotu isomeroi luegelegela opotu kanu aitodolikin eipud loka asioman na okwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita uruleruri ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea ri oja i saaru eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, pari onita ni ndundu 'diyi efu e'yo 'bani lezu onita uruleruri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obwegyese bw'ahaiguru omu Uganda bihindukire munonga okumara emyaka mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero agatari gamwe, gatandikire kukora aha byetaago by'obwegyese bwahaiguru obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: When considering the infrastructure of higher education institutions, it's important to evaluate their physical and academic resources. One key aspect to examine is the total enrollment capacity of these universities.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba otunuulira ebizimbe by'amatendekero aga waggulu, kikulu okwekenneenya ebintu byabwe eby'omubiri n'eby'ensoma. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu eby'okwekenneenya bwe bungi bw'abayizi abali mu zi ssettendekero zino.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka neno jami ma mite pi gangi kwan me rwom ma malo, pire tek tutwal me neno jami ma mite pi gangi kwan me rwom ma malo. Gin acel ma pire tek ma omyero wanen en aye wel lutino kwan ma tye I univaciti magi.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aomoom nuka aiboisio nuka isomeroi luapolok, ibusakinit aanyun iboro lu iswamaete kesi keda lu isisiaete kesi. Adiopebore naepol noi naibusakinit airereor ngesi adeka naka itunga luejaas ounibasitin lu.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka angu onita uruleruri ni 'diyi ma e'yo ega, eri orodriru afa yini 'diyi ma ale andrizu tualu afa onita ni 'diyi pie. E'yo azi okporu 'bani eco andri ri eri 'ba sukulu lapi university 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ni.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka aha byombeko by'amatendekyero agaheiguru, n'eky'omugasho kushwijuma eby'omubiri n'eby'obwegyese byaago. Enshonga enkuru y'okushwijuma, n'omuhendo gw'abeegi omu yunivasite ezi.

eng_prompt: The university prides itself on fostering a culture of inquiry and innovation. To support this mission, various programs and resources are available for students interested in exploring their academic interests through research.
lug_prompt: Yunivasite yeenyumiriza mu kutumbula obuwangwa bw'okunoonyereza n'obuyiiya. Okuyambako omulimu guno, pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo n'ebikozesebwa biriwo eri abayizi abagala okunoonyereza ku bye baagala mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan me yunibaciti ne tye ki awaka I kom dongo tekwaro me kwed ki diro manyen. Me tyelo kor tic man, yub mapat-pat tye pi lutino kwan ma gimito kwedo jami ma gimaro me kwan kun gitiyo ki kwed.
teo_prompt: Isiyalamikit eUnibasiti akekuan kanu aitopolor eipone lo aingic ka aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Kanu aigang aswam na, ejaas ainapeta keda iboro luegelegela kanu esisiak lu ekotosi aingic aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: Univasiti 'da ni i ma ngulupi ovu afusi e'yo vuti ondaza ni azini e'yo eti ondaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di atizu, otita azini afa ndundu eyi sukulu anzi lepi e'yo eyini le onita ma alea 'diyi ma eti ondazu geri vuti ondazanirisi 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Yunivasite neyesiimisa ahabw'okureetaho enkora y'okubuuririza n'okujumbura. Okuhwera omurimo ogu, hariho puroguraamu nyingi n'ebintu ebirikubaasa kuhwera abeegi abarikwenda kushwijuma ebyetengo byabo by'obwegyese barikuraba omu kucondooza.

eng_prompt: When two parties agree to the terms of an arrangement, they often formalize their understanding through a written document. This document outlines the obligations and rights of each party involved.
lug_prompt: Enjuyi bbiri bwezikkaanya ku mateeka g'entegeeragana, zitera okukakasa okukkaanya kwazo mu buwandiike. Ekiwandiiko kino kiraga obuvunaanyizibwa n'eddembe lya buli ludda olukwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Kace dul me cungu iwi-bye aryo owinye I kom cik me winye, pol kare gi keto winye gi I tic kun gitiyo ki waraga ma kicoyo. Karatac man tito tic ki twero pa dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Arai icamanara itunga iarei nuka ainapeta nuka acamanar, etapit kesi aitodun acamanarakec kowai lo aiwadika. Itodunit apapula ngin apedorosio keda apedorosio nuka ngin itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Amuti iri ka a'i e'yo otuta ni 'diyi ma dria, eyi tutuni e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi 'ba geri kokobi sizaru si. Kokobi 'di ece azi azini drilemgbo 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyiniri ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu babiri ku barikwikiriza ebiragiro by'entebekanisa, nibakira kuhamya okwetegyerezana kwabo barikurabira omu kihandiiko. Ekihandiiko eki nikishoboorora obujunanizibwa n'obugabe bwa buri muntu.

eng_prompt: Higher education plays a crucial role in shaping the future of individuals and society. Among the various types of educational establishments, universities stand out as key players in this landscape.
lug_prompt: Obuyigirize obwa waggulu bukola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukola ebiseera by'abantu n'ebitundu eby'omu maaso. Mu matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza ag'engeri ez'enjawulo, zi ssettendekero ze zisinga okuba ez'omugaso mu mbeera eno.
ach_prompt: Kwan me rwom ma malo konyo tutwal I yubu kwo pa dano I kare me anyim. I kin gangi kwan mapat-pat, gangi kwan me rwom ma malo tye macalo lutic mapigi tego I kabedo man.
teo_prompt: Asioman na okwap erai naepol noi kanu aitolomun ingaren naka itunga keda atutubet. Kotoma oriongeta lu asioman luegelegela, iswamaete iunibasitin kwape lu epolok noi kotoma akwap kana.
lgg_prompt: Onita uruleru ri ni azi okporu nga ewu drialeri 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni azini ongulumu eyi ma eselea. Pari onita ni ndundu eyi ma eselea, university eyi 'ba okporu e'yo 'di ma alea 'diyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese bw'ahaiguru, nibukora omurimo muhango omu kuhanga eby'omumaisho by'abantu n'ebyanga. Omu matendekyero g'eby'obwegyese ag'emiringo mingi, amatendekyero ga yunivasite nigamanywa nk'ag'omugasho omu by'obwegyese ebi.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a culture of trust and collaboration, the management has implemented new guidelines. These guidelines emphasize the importance of open communication and accountability among team members.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula obuwangwa bw'okwesiga n'okukolagana, abaddukanya emirimu bataddewo ebiragiro ebipya. Ebigobererwa bino bikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okuwuliziganya mu bwesimbu n'embalirira mu bammemba ba ttiimu.
ach_prompt: Me kelo tekwaro me bedo ki gen ki winye, ludito tic guketo cik manyen itic. Cik magi keto cwiny I kom ber pa lok I kin lumemba me dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor einono lo amunokina ka aiswamanara, etolomu eyaitene ikisila luitetiak. Isinyikokitos ainapeta ngun ajokis naka einer koipone kaloejok keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere itimun.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma aa'ta asi'baza be tualu ti icita be ri ma omgbo otuzu, driceza 'da 'ba azita o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Azita o'bale 'diyi okpo fe orodri e'yo nzeza ngmboru azini e'yo nzeza 'ba amuti ma alia 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho obwesigwa n'okukwatanisa, abarikukurira ekitongore bateire omu nkora engyenderwaho nsya. Ebiragiro ebi nibyoreka omugasho gw'empurizagana ey'amazima n'embaririra omu ba memba ba tiimu.

eng_prompt: As people age, their physical abilities and stamina often decline. This difference in vitality is particularly noticeable when comparing the younger and older generations.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe bagenda bakaddiwa, obusobozi bwabwe n'amaanyi gaabwe bikendeera. Enjawulo eno mu maanyi yeeyoleka nnyo bw'ogeraageranya omulembe omuto n'omukulu.
ach_prompt: Ka dano woto ki tii, kero gi me kom ki kero gi me tic bene woto ki dok piny. Apoka-poka man nen tutwalle ka iporo kin joo matino ki joo ma otii.
teo_prompt: Neipolorata itunga, ekidiokoto apedorosiokec keda agogongukec. Atiaketait na kotoma aijar erai na itegelikina noi itirianiata atumunak keda lu emojongitos.
lgg_prompt: Ba eyini zoria, eyi ma okpo tualu okpo eyini 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo ni esi esi esi esi. Esele coza okpo alia 'diri e'da tualu 'bani 'ba oderu 'diyi o'bizu 'ba 'wara 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikukura, amaani gaabo n'amaani gaabo g'omubiri nibikyendeera. Entaaniso y'amaani neeyoreka munonga waaba nogyeragyeranisa eminyeeto n'enkuru.

eng_prompt: Corruption undermines trust in government and erodes the foundations of democracy. To maintain integrity and accountability, it is essential to hold those in power responsible for their actions.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi butyoboola obwesige mu gavumenti n'emisingi gya demokulasiya. Okukuuma obwesimbu n'obuvunaanyizibwa, kya mugaso okuvunaana abo abali mu buyinza olw'ebikolwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Camucana balo gen i kom gamente dok balo guti pa loc alwak. Me gwoko ber bedo ki kor tic, pire tek tutwal me neno ni joo matye I loc gi timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka apiyai itidisiari amunokina apugan ido itolitoli apugan naka itunga. Kanu aidar ailajaara keda aitodunit ebe ibusakinit itunga luejaasi toma apugan aitodun ebe ibusakinit kesi aitodun nuiswamaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Anyamgbolo ni asi'baza gamete ma dria ri eza dika eri geri o'bi eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri eza ra. Aa'zu e'yo ada be azini e'yo 'yezu kililiru, eri orodriru 'ba opi dria 'diyi 'duzu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obushumankuzi nibutuma abantu baremwa kwesiga gavumenti kandi bukashiisha emisingye ya demokurasiya. Okugumizamu n'oburingaaniza n'embaririra, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu abo abari omu bwebembezi nibajunanizibwa ahabw'ebikorwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In many professional settings, employees are expected to adhere to a structured schedule. This structure helps ensure that tasks are completed efficiently and within designated timeframes.
lug_prompt: Mu bifo bingi eby'ekikugu, abakozi basuubirwa okugoberera enteekateeka etegekeddwa. Enkola eno eyamba okukakasa nti emirimu giwedde bulungi era mu budde obutegekeddwa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol mapat-pat me tic, lutic omyero gulub kare ma kiyubu pi tic gi. Yub man konyo me neno ni tic otum maber dok I kare ma kiketo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu nuka aswam, eomitai ebe ibusakinit eswamak aitup ainapeta. Ingarakinit epone ngol awanyun ebe itodolikinio aswamisinei ejok ido kotoma apak naitemokinitai.
lgg_prompt: Pari azi ni karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba le azi'ba eyi ma obi sa'wa eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma vuti. Otita 'di ni fe nezu ra kini 'ba azi yi de kililiru azini sawa 'bani 'bale 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'eby'emikono, abakozi bashemereire kukuratira enteekateeka y'okukora. Enkora egi neehwera okureeba ngu emirimo ekorwa kurungi kandi omu bwire obuteirweho.

eng_prompt: In examining various forms of governance, it's clear that leadership styles can vary significantly. While some leaders inspire and empower their followers, others impose strict control and demand absolute obedience.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya enkola z'obukulembeze ez'enjawulo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola z'obukulembeze zisobola okwawukana ennyo. Wadde nga abakulembeze abamu bakubiriza n'okuwa abagoberezi baabwe amaanyi, abalala bateekawo obuyinza obw'amaanyi era ne baagala okugondera mu bujjuvu.
ach_prompt: I ngiyo yoo me tela mapat-pat, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me tela mapat-pat twero bedo pat-pat tutwal. I kare ma lutela mukene cuku cwiny ki miyo twero ki lulub korgi, lutela mukene gimiyo twero matek dok gimito ni dano ducu gubed luwiny.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo airereor iponesio lu apugan luegelegela, ecai cut ebe egelegela iponesio luka engarenok. Karaida isinyikokitos engarenok ice ka aitigogong itunga kec, icie itosomaete apedor ido ekotosi aitup.
lgg_prompt: Geri driceza ni ndundu 'diyi ma ale andrita ma alea, eri e'da kililiru kini geri driceza ni 'diyi eco aa ndu ndu saaru. Drice'ba azi 'diyi ka tro ava fe azini okpo fe 'ba yi ma vuti obi 'diyi dri ra ti, azi 'diyi okpo 'ba okporu azini le 'ba ma obi yi dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma emiringo y'obwebembezi etari emwe, nikyoreka butunu ngu emiringo y'obwebembezi neebaasa kuba etarikushushana. N'obu abeebembezi abamwe baraabe nibaheereza abakurasi baabo amaani, abandi nibategyeka kandi nibashaba ngu boona babagondere.

eng_prompt: As the election season heats up, candidates are ramping up their campaigns and strategies. The stakes are high, and every move is being scrutinized by the public and the media.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kigenda kisembera, abeesimbyewo bongedde amaanyi mu kakuyege n'obukodyo bwabwe. Emikisa giri waggulu, era buli kikolwa kyekenneenyezebwa abantu n'emikutu gy'amawulire.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye kamedde anyim, lucungu tye ka medo rwom me bito kwir gi. Peko tye malo dok lwak ki lucoo lok angea tye ka ngiyo jami weng matye katime.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakin apak naka aseo, eutasi abwoak aiyatakin ikampeins kec keda iwaitin kec. Epol ationis, ido itunga keda lu iyemuto eutasi airereor akiro kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu drizaru, 'ba pa tupi 'diyi e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu azini geri eyini agbatara 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo otu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi angiri, o'bi eyi tualu 'ba oyuyuani 'diyi pie e'yo dria eyini 'ye 'diyi ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuza kweyongyera, abesimbireho bariyo nibongyera amaani omu kampeyini zaabo n'emitendera yaabo. Ebigyendererwa biri ahaiguru, buri kimwe ekirikukorwa abantu hamwe n'abanyamakuru nibashwijuma.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, some argue that a strong, decisive figure is necessary to make tough choices. However, this raises an important question about the qualities we value in our leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, abamu bagamba nti omuntu ow'amaanyi era omumalirivu yeetaagibwa okukola okusalawo okukaluba. Naye ekyo kireetawo ekibuuzo ekikulu ekikwata ku ngeri ennungi abakulembeze baffe ze balina.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, jo mukene giwaco ni ngat matye ki kero, ngat ma moko tam pire tek me moko tam matek. Kadi bed kumeno, man kelo lapeny mapire tek tutwal I kom kit mabeco ma wamaro I lutela wa.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, ebakasi icetunga ebe ibusakinit itunganan yenegogong aswam aseununeta nuetioko. Konye, eyangauni ngin aingiset na epol ajokis naikamunit iponesio lu ikoto oni kotoma engarenok wok.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, 'ba azi 'diyi 'yo kini 'ba okporu azini asi 'baza be 'diyi orodriru e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'duzu. Kani si, e'yo 'di eji zita azi orodriru ama vile drice'ba 'diyi ma wura amani leleri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abamwe nibagira ngu omuntu w'amaani, orikubaasa kucwamu nikyetengwa okukora encwamu egumire. Kwonka eki nikireetaho ekibuuzo ky'omugasho aha mitwarize ei turikutwara nk'ey'omugasho omu beebembezi baitu.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, individuals and communities have often found themselves constrained by oppressive systems and societal norms. In their quest for a better life, they yearn for the liberation that allows them to express their true selves.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu babadde beesanga nga baziyizibwa enkola ezinyigiriza n'emitendera gy'embeera z'abantu. Mu kunoonya obulamu obulungi, beegomba eddembe eribasobozesa okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, dano ki kabedo mapat-pat pol kare nongo gi tye ka diyo gi pi yub me diyo dano ki cik me kabedo gi. I yenyo kwo maber, gitye ki miti me bedo agonya ma weko gi nyutu kit gi kikome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apotu itunga keda atutubena odumutu ebe itikitikitai kesi kanuka iponesio luiticete ka iponesio luka itunga. Kotoma aimo aijar najokan, ekotosi kesi ailajara na ijaikini kesi aitodun iponesio kec luka abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba alu alu azini ongulumu eyi esu eyi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyini candi fezu 'diyisi tualu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie. Eyi ma geri eyini aa'zu edriru muke ndeni ri ndazu ri ma alea, eyi le driwala eyini ani eyi ma ngulupi a'da 'diyi e'dazu ri saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu hamwe n'abantu b'omubyanga bakeesharinga ahabw'enkora y'okunyigiriza hamwe n'emitwarize y'abantu. Omu kuronda amagara marungi, nibenda obusingye oburikubabaasisa kworeka amazima gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are drawn to charismatic leaders who inspire hope and change. As a result, these leaders often cultivate a dedicated base of supporters.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi basikirizibwa eri abakulembeze abalungi abaleeta essuubi n'enkyukakyuka. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze bano batera okukulaakulanya abawagizi abeewaddeyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gimaro lutela mabeco ma kelo gen ki aloka loka. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela magi ipol kare gi bedo ki lucwak mapol.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ekotosi engarenok lu iswamaete ejok lu eyangaununete amuno keda aijulakin. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc engarenok lu adumun egangitok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi le drice'ba okporu asi'baza fepi azini ojata ejipi 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba 'diyi tutuni 'ba atita fepi eyidri 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibenda abebembezi abarungi abarikureetaho amatsiko n'empinduka. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi aba nibatunga abahagizi baingi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, elected representatives are responsible for shaping the legal framework that governs the nation. Their role involves deliberating on various issues and proposing solutions to address the needs of their constituents.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, abakiise abalondebwa bavunaanyizibwa ku kukola amateeka agafuga eggwanga. Omulimu gwabwe guzingiramu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga ez'enjawulo n'okuteesa ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ebyetaago by'abantu be bakiikirira.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, luwang lwak ma kiyero gi ki twero me yubu cik ma doro lobo. Tic gi obedo nywako tam I kom lok mapat-pat ki miyo tam me cobo miti pa lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naeyait apugan, itunga lueseunitai kes ikamunitos nu aitolomun ikisila lu epugaete akwap. Aswam kec imoriarit aitemitem akiro nuegelegela ka aitolomun iwaitin lu itemonokinet ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba 'bani ope eyi ma paria 'diyi e'yo azita kari 'di ma dri cepi 'diyi ma edeta ma dria. Azi yiniri ma alia e'yo nzeza e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria azini geri ndundu eyini ecozu e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, abajwekyerwa abatoorainwe, nibo baine obujunaanizibwa bw'okukora ebiragiro ebirikutegyeka eihanga. Omurimo gwabo nigutwariramu okuhanuura aha nshonga ezitarikushushana n'okureetaho oburyo bw'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: Many countries struggle to achieve their full potential due to various systemic issues. Among these, corruption stands out as a significant barrier that undermines progress and prosperity.
lug_prompt: Ensi nnyingi zirwana okutuuka ku busobozi bwazo obujjuvu olw'ensonga z'enkola ez'enjawulo. Mu bino, obuli bw'enguzi bwe businga okulemesa enkulaakulana n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Lobo mapol tye ka tute matek me cobo miti gi pi peko mapat-pat matye. I kin jami magi, camucana tye macalo lageng madit tutwal ma balo dongo lobo ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit akwapin nuipu aitodolikin apedorosiokec kere kanuka akiro nuegelegela. Kotoma ngun, ejai amidicio naka apiyai kwape ibore yenepedori aitikitik apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi dri ci ecozu eyi ma okpo esuzu e'yo ndundu eyini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, anyamgbolo ni e'da ekile e'yo okporu angu ezoma ni azini zota ni atripi ri le.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga maingi nigarwana kuhikiiriza obushoboorozi bwago bwona ahabw'eshonga nyingi. Omuri ebi, obushomankuzi nibureebeka nk'oburemeezi bw'amaani oburikuremesa entunguuka n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In life, we often encounter situations where others may hurt or betray us. It's essential to cultivate a spirit of compassion and understanding towards those who have caused us pain.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu, tutera okusanga embeera abalala mwe bayinza okutulumya oba okutulyamu olukwe. Kya mugaso okukulaakulanya omwoyo gw'okusaasira n'okutegeera eri abo abatuleetera obulumi.
ach_prompt: I kwo, ipol kare warwatte ki jami ma twero cwero cwiny dano onyo balo gen ma watye kwede i komgi. Pire tek tutwal me bedo ki cwiny me kica ki niang pi jo ma gukelo arem i komwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar, etapit sio adumunun ejautene loepedoriata luce aimusung oni arai bo abilibil oni. Erai ibore yenepol noi adumun etau lo esiana ka amisiikin ngul lu eyangaunitos oni apipil.
lgg_prompt: Idri ma alia, ama sawa driasi dri fu e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ni ecozu ama enzazu kani ku ama ma o'dizu ra 'diyi be. Eri orodriru aa'zu asi ndriza be tualu vata be 'ba ama dri candi fepi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara, nitukira kuhikwaho embeera ezi abandi barikubaasa kutuhurira kubi nainga kutugurira. N'eky'omugasho okworeka embabazi n'okwetegyereza abo abatureesireho obusaasi.

eng_prompt: Investing in community health initiatives is essential for improving overall well-being. By addressing local health needs, we can create a stronger, healthier population.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu nteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu kitundu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula embeera z'abantu okutwalira awamu. Bwe tukola ku byetaago by'ebyobulamu mu kitundu, tusobola okutondawo abantu abanywevu era abalamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I yub me yot kom pa lwak pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak. Ka watiyo I kom peko me yot kom I tedero, watwero yubu dano ma komgi yot dok ma komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma aitemonokineta nuka angaleu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitojokar aijar naka itunga. Kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio nuka angaleu, ipedori oni aitolomun itunga lu egogong ka lu engalete.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu otita e'yo rua alanisi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea ri eri orodriru geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otuzu. E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu risi, ama eco 'ba okporu azini rua ala be 'diyi ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu mirimo y'eby'amagara omu byaro n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura entuura y'abantu. Twakora ahabyetaago by'eby'amagara omu byaro, nitubaasa kureetaho abantu b'amaani kandi abaine amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Many citizens are expressing their dissatisfaction with the government's policies and actions. As protests grow louder, it becomes clear that the current regime has not done enough.
lug_prompt: Bannansi bangi balaga obutali bumativu bwabwe olw'enkola n'ebikolwa bya gavumenti. Okwekalakaasa bwe kweyongera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti gavumenti eriwo kati tekoze kimala.
ach_prompt: Anywali mapol tye ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom cik ki tim pa gamente. Ka jemo tye kamede, nen atyer kamaleng ni gamente matye kombedi pe otimo ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu itodunitos amamut aiyalamakec kanuka ainapeta keda aswamisio nuka apugan. Kwape iyata aidiya, ecai cut ebe mam apugan na ejai kopana iswamat ejok.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku e'yo gamete ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni tu uru, eri eca e'da kini opi nyaza sawa 'disi ri 'yeni nga e'yo angiri ku.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi nibereka obutetegyerezibwa bwabo ahabw'ebiragiro n'ebikorwa bya gavumenti. Okwesharinga kwayeyongyera, nikyoreka butunu ngu obwebembezi oburiho obwahati tibukozire ekirikumara.

eng_prompt: I can't believe you showed up to the party like this. What happened to you tonight?
lug_prompt: Sikikkiriza nti wajja ku kabaga nga bw'otyo.
ach_prompt: Pe atwero ye ni I bino I pati man.
teo_prompt: Mam eong acamunit ebe abu jo kobu opucit kwangun.
lgg_prompt: Ma econi a'i kini mi emu omu nderi ma alia 'dile ku.
nyn_prompt: Tindikwikiriza ngu okeija aha mbaga otyo.

eng_prompt: After months of waiting and preparing the barn, I finally noticed signs that my cow was in labor. I spent the morning anxiously checking on her, hoping everything would go smoothly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga nnindirira n'okuteekateeka ekisulo, kyaddaaki nnalaba obubonero obulaga nti ente yange yali mu kuzaala. Nnamala ku makya nga nneeraliikirira nnyo nga mmukebera, nga nsuubira nti buli kimu kijja kutambula bulungi.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me kuro ki yubu ot pa dyang, I agiki ne aneno lanyut ma nyutu ni dyangi tye ka winyo arem me nywal. Abedo ki lworo madit tutwal I odiko me ngiyo kit ma en tye kwede, ki gen ni jami weng obuwot maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aidar ka aitemonokin etogo, abu eong aanyun ijenuneta luka aidoun naka akitenguka. Abu eong adau atupuruc naepol noi aanyanar ngesi, aomit ebe epote iboro kere alosit ejok.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani te azini jo anyapa ta mbazuri otuzu 'bori ma vutia, asizu ma ndre eceta kini ma vile ti ri mva osi'i. Ma eza o'bitisi asi otiza be eri andrizu asi 'baza be kini e'yo dria nga mu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutegyereza n'okutebeekanisa eibikiro ry'ente, nk'ahamuheru nkareeba obubonero ngu ente yangye ekaba eri omu kuzaara. Nkamara omukasheeshe nyine okwerarikirira ndikukyebera oku arikugyenda, nyine amatsiko ngu buri kimwe nikiija kugyenda kurungi.

eng_prompt: I've always had a hard time remembering names, no matter how many times I meet someone. It feels like my brain just can't keep track of all the faces and names I encounter.
lug_prompt: Bulijjo kinzibuwalira okujjukira amannya, ne bwe nsisinkana omuntu emirundi emeka. Kiwulikika nga obwongo bwange tebusobola kujjukira ffeesi zonna n'amannya ge nsanga.
ach_prompt: I kare weng atye ki peko me poo I kom nying dano, kadi bed arwatte ki ngat moni tyen adi. Winyo calo adam mega pe twero niang wang ki nying weng ma arwatte kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Ationikinit eong duc aiitun ikiroria, araida iriamuna eong keda itunganan irwan adi. Esubit bala mam adamaka epedori aijen ereetin keda ikiroria kere luetereikina keda eong.
lgg_prompt: Ma isu sawa driasi e'yo ewaru ru yi ma e'yo egazu, ma ka ta fu 'ba azi be paleko si ra ti. Eri e'da kile ma omi econi ma andretia azini ru mani esu 'diyi ma pamvu ma ta mba ku.
nyn_prompt: Buriijo nkibona oburemeezi kwijuka amaziina, n'obu naakubugana omuntu emirundi engahi. Nikireebeka nk'obwonko bwangye tiburikubaasa kumanya amaisho n'amaziina agu ndikushanga.

eng_prompt: Understanding the foundation of a healthy family dynamic is essential for fostering a supportive environment. To ensure stability and well-being, it's important to identify the fundamental requirements that families must meet.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera omusingi gw'amaka amalungi kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuza embeera ey'obuwagizi. Okukakasa obutebenkevu n'obulungi, kya mugaso okuzuula ebyetaago ebikulu amaka bye galina okutuukiriza.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma kwo me ot bedo maber kwede pire tek tutwal pi yubu kabedo me gwoko dano. Me neno ni kuc ki ber bedo tye, pire tek tutwal me niang jami mapigi tego ma gangi omyero ocob.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin apolou naka ekale loejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aiboisit naigangit. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai ainapakina keda aijar najokan, ejokuna ajenun iboro luibusakinit ikalia aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo familia eyini aa'zu muke ri ma e'yo vazu ri eri orodriru angu atita fepi 'diyi ezozu. Aa'zu e'yere azini aa'zu muke, eri orodriru afa familia eyini lele aa'zu muke 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza omusingi gw'amaka marungi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho obusingye burungi. Okureeba ngu hariho obutebekana hamwe n'obuhangwa burungi, nikikuru kumanya ebyetengo by'amaani ebi amaka gashemereire kuhikiiriza.

eng_prompt: I've been curious about your farm lately. It seems like you have quite a few animals; I'm wondering about your cattle specifically.
lug_prompt: Mbadde njagala okumanya ebikwata ku faamu yo gye buvuddeko. Kirabika olina ebisolo ebitonotono; nze nneebuuza ku nte zo mu bulambulukufu.
ach_prompt: Abedo ki miti me ngeyo jami mapol I kom poto ni I kare-ni. Nen calo itye ki lee mapol tutwal; atye kapenye I kom dyangi mamegi tutwalle.
