teo_prompt: Akoto eong ajenun nuikamunitos amisirikon apakio nu. Esubit bala ijaas ijo keda itiang lu ikidioko noi; akoto eong aomoom nuikamunitos aituk kon.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi ovu ava be mi vile angu ori ezozaniri ma dria o'du 'diyi ma alia. Eri ena kile mi vu anyapa yi ma kalafe were; ma osu mi vile ti 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninyenda kumanya ebirikukwata aha faamu yaawe ebiro ebi. Nikireebeka oine enyamaishwa nkye munonga; ninyebuuza aha nte zaawe okukira munonga.

eng_prompt: Many people underestimate the long-term effects of their drinking habits. It's important to recognize how excessive alcohol consumption can impact overall health.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banyooma ebiva mu mize gyabwe egy'okunywa omwenge mu bbanga eggwanvu. Kikulu okumanya engeri okunywa omwenge ekisukkiridde gye kiyinza okukosaamu obulamu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol pe tamo I kom adwogi marac ma mato kongo kelo I komgi I kare me kare malac. Pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma mato kongo tutwal twero balo kwede yotkom pa dano.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuka apak naepol nuka aimat ajon. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun epone loepedoriata aimat ajon aitolitol angaleu.

eng_prompt: As we explore the impact of societal behaviors on health, it's crucial to consider how certain patterns of consumption can spread among populations. This raises an intriguing question about the nature of consumption itself.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe tunoonyereza ku ngeri enneeyisa y'abantu gy'ekosaamu ebyobulamu, kikulu okulowooza ku ngeri ebintu ebimu gye bisaasaanamu mu bantu. Kino kireetawo ekibuuzo ekyewuunyisa ku butonde bw'okukozesa.

lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma, kikulu okuba n'enteekateeka etegeerekeka obulungi. Tandika n'okulambika ebiruubirirwa byo eby'ekiseera ekiwanvu n'oluvannyuma obimenye mu mirimu egisobola okukolebwa.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is essential in building relationships and conveying our thoughts clearly. However, it's important to remember that listening plays a crucial role in this process as well.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu kuzimba enkolagana n'okutuusa ebirowoozo byaffe bulungi. Newankubadde, kya mugaso okujjukira nti okuwuliriza kukola omulimu munene mu nkola eno nayo.

nyn_prompt: Okugamba kurungi n'eky'omugasho omukwombeka enkoragana n'okugamba ebiteekateeko byaitu kurungi. Kwonka, n'eky'omugasho kwijuka ngu okuhurikiza nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu nkora egi nayo.

eng_prompt: Due to its favorable climate and abundant resources, many people have chosen to settle in this area. As a result, the demand for housing and services has significantly increased.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'obudde ennungi n'eby'obugagga ebingi, abantu bangi basazeewo okusenga mu kitundu kino. N'ekivuddemu, obwetaavu bw'amayumba n'obuweereza bweyongedde nnyo.

eng_prompt: In order to overcome the challenges we face, it's essential that we work together as a cohesive unit. Building a strong foundation of mutual respect and understanding is crucial for our success.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuvvuunuka ebisoomooza bye twolekaganye nabyo, kikulu nnyo okukolera awamu ng'ekibinja ekikwatagana. Okuzimba omusingi omunywevu ogw'okussa ekitiibwa n'okutegeeragana kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bwaffe.

eng_prompt: Understanding yourself can lead to greater personal growth and improved relationships. Discovering the nuances of your personality type can provide valuable insights into your behaviors and choices.
lug_prompt: Okwetegeera osobola okukulaakulana n'okukolagana obulungi n'abalala. Okuzuula engeri z'omuntu wo kisobola okukuwa amagezi ku nneeyisa yo n'okusalawo kwo.

eng_prompt: Nestled in the heart of East Africa, Uganda boasts a diverse landscape that includes lush forests, stunning lakes, and majestic mountains. Its rich culture and vibrant wildlife make it a captivating destination for travelers.
lug_prompt: Nga esangibwa mu mutima gwa East Africa, Uganda yeenyumiriza mu bifo eby'enjawulo omuli ebibira ebibisi, ennyanja ezirabika obulungi n'ensozi ez'ekitiibwa. Ebyobuwangwa byayo eby'obugagga n'ebisolo byayo eby'omu nsiko ebinyuma bigifuula ekifo ekisikiriza eri abatambuze.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye I dyere me lobo Afrika kunyango, tye ki kabedo ma pat pat ma I kingi obedo bunga, nam mamwonya tutwal ki godi madongo tutwal. Tekwaro ne ma beco kacel ki lee lum ma beco weko bedo kabedo ma oyomo cwiny lulim piny.

lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri aa angu East Africa niri ma alea, kari Uganda niri ma e'yo angu ndundu eyi ma dria, oce ndrizaru 'diyi, azini 'be okporu 'diyi pie. E'yo suruni 'diyi ma omgbo angiri tualu anyapa asea 'diyi pie 'diyi fe angu 'da ni ecazu angu 'ba aci'ba 'diyi dri ayiko fezu.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eri ahagati y'amahanga g'oburugwa-izooba bwa Afirika, erimu ebibira, enyanja n'enshozi. Eby'obuhangwa byaayo eby'omutaano hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'omumarindiro g'enyamaishwa, nibigihindura omwanya murungi gw'abarambuzi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive world, having the right skills and knowledge is essential for success. To achieve your goals and unlock new opportunities, it's crucial to invest in your learning journey.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ejjudde okuvuganya, okubeera n'obukugu n'amagezi ebituufu kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byo n'okufuna emikisa emipya, kya mugaso okuteeka ssente mu kusoma kwo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek tutwal, bedo ki diro ki ngec matir pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc. Me cobo miti ni ki nongo gum manyen, pire tek tutwal me keto cente I kwan ni.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru a'bala ma alia andruri ma alia, ovuzu ondua kililiru azini ondua kililiru 'diyi be ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo mini lele 'diyi esuzu azini drileba o'diru 'diyi ma ti zizu, eri orodriru tujari 'yezu geri mini onita onizu ri ma alia.

eng_prompt: Could you please provide some information about your academic background? I'm curious to know more about your educational qualifications.

eng_prompt: As election season approaches, candidates often make bold commitments to win over voters. However, once they take office, the reality of governance may lead to questions about their integrity and accountability.

eng_prompt: In times of challenge and uncertainty, unity becomes our greatest strength. It is essential for the progress and stability of our nation that we come together, regardless of our differences.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, obumu bwe bufuuka amaanyi gaffe agasinga. Kya mugaso eri enkulaakulana n'obutebenkevu bw'eggwanga lyaffe okujja awamu, awatali kufaayo ku njawulo zaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, ribe obedo kerowa madit loyo weng. Obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo wa kacel ki bedo mot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, aimorikikina erai agogong wok naepol noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda ainapakina naka akwapuwok aimorikikin, araida egelegela oni.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia, ti ecita ni eca okpo amani okporu ndeni ri i. Eri orodriru zota azini asianzu kari amavileri niri ni ama emuzu tualu ama ma esele coza ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, okukwatanisa n'amaani gaitu. N'eky'omugasho ahabw'entunguuka n'obutebekana bw'eihanga ryaitu ngu tukwatanise, oihireho entaaniso zaitu.

eng_prompt: In many African countries, political power often remains concentrated in the hands of a few individuals. This raises questions about the longevity of their leadership and the factors that contribute to their extended tenures.
lug_prompt: Mu mawanga ga Afirika mangi, obuyinza bubeera mu mikono gy'abantu abatono. Kino kireetawo ebibuuzo ku bbanga ly'obukulembeze bwabwe n'ensonga ezibaleetera okuwangaala.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol me lobo Afrika, loc me cungu iwi bye pol kare bedo I cing dano manok. Man kelo lapeny I kom kwo pa lutela gi ki ngo ma oweko gubedo I tic pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuipu nuko Africa, ejai apugan toma akanin luka itunga luikidioko. Eyangauni ngin aingiseta nuikamunitos apak naepol noi naka engarenone kec keda akiro nuepedorete ayangaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Kari Africa ni karakara 'diyi ma alia, opi nyaza politiki niri ni sawa driasi awi 'ba were eyi ma dria. E'yo 'di eji zita eyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma driceza ni aa'zu sa'wa ezu ri ma dria tualu e'yo eyini aa'zu sa'wa ezu 'diyi pie 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi ga Afirika, obushoborozi bw'eby'obutegyeki buri omu mikono y'abantu bakye. Eki nikireetaho ebibuuzo ebikwatiraine n'obwire bw'obwebembezi bwabo hamwe n'enshonga ezirikubareetera kumara obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: Increasing the representation of women in decision-making roles is crucial for fostering inclusive governance. By empowering women to engage in political processes, societies can address issues that disproportionately affect them.
lug_prompt: Okwongera ku bakiise b'abakyala mu kukola okusalawo kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula enfuga erimu abantu bonna. Mu kuwa abakyala amaanyi okwenyigira mu byobufuzi, ebitundu bisobola okukola ku nsonga ezibakosa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Medo rwom me cung pa mon ikare me moko tam pire tek tutwal pi kelo tela ma dano weng twero bedo iye. I yoo me miyo kero ki mon me donyo I yub me cungu iwi bye, kabedo mapat-pat twero cobo peko matye ka yelo gi.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakin abwoikinitok angor kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor apugan na imoriarit itunga kere. Kowai lo aitigogong angor ajaut toma akiro nuka politikis, epedorete itunga aitemokin atiokisio nuetiroritos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba pa tupi oku yi ma paria e'yo 'duza ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo driceza 'ba dria ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo okpo fezu oku eyini fizu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea risi, ongulumu eyi eco e'yo eyini candi fepi eyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera aha bakiiki b'abakazi omu by'okucwamu n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obwebembezi burimu abantu boona. Okuha abakazi amaani g'okwejumba omu by'obutegyeki, abantu nibabaasa kukora aha nshonga ezirikubateganisa.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of practical skills in today's economy, many schools are reevaluating their curricula. As a result, they are increasingly integrating programs that focus on entrepreneurship and sustainable farming practices.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya omugaso gw'obukugu mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino, amasomero mangi gazzeemu okwekenneenya ensoma yaago. N'ekivuddemu, beeyongera okugatta pulogulaamu ezissa essira ku by'obusuubuzi n'enkola z'okulima eziwangaala.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ber pa diro me tic cing I tenge me lim I kare-ni, gangi kwan mapol tye ka ngiyo kit ma gangi kwan gi pwonyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka medo yub mapat-pat maketo cwinygi I kom biacara ki pur matye kamede anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka acoa naka akan kotoma akwap naka lolo, eutasi isomeroi luipu airereor aisisiaeta kec. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aimorikikin ainapeta nu isingarenitos nuka agwelanar keda akoru na ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri ondua afa edele drisi 'diyiniri ni e'yo lonyi ni ewu andruri ma alia 'diyi ma dria risi, sukulu karakara eyi otita onita ni eyivile 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. E'yo 'disi, eyi curu'do otita eyi e'do tujari 'yezu tualu geri ori ezoza eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'emyoga y'omungaro omu by'entaasya y'erizooba, amashomero maingi gariyo nigashwijuma engyenderwaho yaabo y'okwegyesa. N'ekyarugiremu,beyongyeire kutaho puroguraamu ezirikugyenderera eby'obushubuzi n'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for quality education in the region, the University has developed a comprehensive plan. This initiative aims to address the educational disparities faced by communities in Northern Uganda.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusoma okw'omutindo mu kitundu, Yunivasite ekoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo enjawulo mu byenjigiriza mu bitundu by'omu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: Pi miti me kwan ma tye kamede i twok piny eni, gang kwan me yunibaciti okatti ki yub maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko peko me kwan ma dano ma tung kumalo me Uganda tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman naejok noi kotoma aiboisit, etolomu eUnibasiti ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet na erai aitemokin atiokisio nuka asioman nu ejaas itunga luko Nyakoi nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu onita muke ri ma omgbo angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, University 'da e'do otita eyi 'ye dria. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo esele coza onita ma dria ongulumu kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'obwegyese burungi omu kyanga, Yunivasite ekozire enteekateeka y'omutaano. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'obwegyese oburikushangwa abantu b'omumatemba ga Uganda.

eng_prompt: Finding purpose and fulfillment often comes from a deep commitment to something greater than ourselves. Embrace the calling that resonates within your heart and guides your actions.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ekigendererwa n'obumativu bulijjo biva mu kwewaayo okw'amaanyi eri ekintu ekisinga ku ffe. Kwatira ddala omulanga oguli mu mutima gwo era ogukulembera mu bikolwa byo.
ach_prompt: Nongo tyen lok ki yomcwiny pol kare aa ki I keto cwiny I kom gin mo madit loyo wa. Jolo lwongo matye I cwinyi dok ma doro tici.
teo_prompt: Adumunun alosikinet keda aiyalama elomunit kotoma ainakina nejai ibore yen epol adepar oni. Kocam aiwororio na epupuni kotoma etau kon kosodi aingarenikin aswamisiokon.
lgg_prompt: Asisile esuzu azini ayiko esuzu ri ni tutuni enga e'yo asi 'bazu e'yo azi okporu ndeni ama ma drilea ri vu. Le mi ai e'yo 'bani mi omvezu emi ma asi ma alea dika mi ma 'yeta ma dri cepi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga ekigyendererwa n'okumarwa nikuruga omu kwehayo munonga aha kintu ekirikukirayo. Yakiira okwetwa okurikuhurira omu mutima gwawe n'okwebembera ebikorwa byawe.

eng_prompt: The institution has made significant strides in expanding its global presence. As part of its mission to enhance education across the continent, it has established various campuses.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kikoze enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kugaziya okubeerawo kwakyo mu nsi yonna. Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa byayo eby'okutumbula ebyenjigiriza mu ssemazinga, etaddewo amatendekero ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dul enoni otimo alokaloka madit tutwal I dongo dul enoni I wilobo lung. Macalo but yub meggi me ilo malo rwom me kwan I lobo Afrika, guyubu gangi kwan mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Etolomu erionget apol noi kotoma aitanyanyar aiboisit ke kotoma akwap kere. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamuke naka aitojokar asioman kotoma akwapin nukokinga, adukun isomeroi luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da 'ye drile suza okporu erini i ma angu edrizu wudrikurusi ndulu ri ma alea. E'yo erini lezu onita ma omgbo otuzu kari Africa niri ma alea ndulu ri ma azi ru, eri si pari onita ni 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kitungire entunguuka y'amaani omu kushanjuura omwanya gwakyo omunsi yoona. Nka kimwe aha bigyendererwa byakyo by'okutunguura eby'obwegyese omuri Afirika, kitandikireho amatendekyero maingi.

eng_prompt: The community had been buzzing with anticipation for weeks. Residents gathered to discuss important issues affecting their neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Abantu mu kitundu babadde beesunga okumala wiiki eziwera. Abatuuze baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga enkulu ezikwata ku kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki yom cwiny pi cabit mapol. Lutedero gugure me lok I kom lok mapigi tego matye ka yelo kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama kanu isabitin luipu. Apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuetiroritos aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi aa ayikosi sabiti karakara eyi ma alea. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu eyi 'yepi angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibashemererwa kumara esande nyingi. Abatuuragye baketeerana kuhanuura aha nshonga nkuru ezirikuteganisa ebyaro byabo.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations and discussions, the leaders of both institutions finally reached a consensus. This collaboration aims to enhance research opportunities and student exchanges.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'enteeseganya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abakulembeze b'ebitongole byombi baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Enkolagana eno egendereddwamu okutumbula emikisa gy'okunoonyereza n'okuwanyisiganya abayizi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me winye ki nywako lok, lutela me dul aryo egoni dong guwinye. Ribbe man tye ki miti me medo gum me timo kwed ki winye ikin lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda ipegeta, apotu engarenok luka atukona ngun kere opuputu acamanara. Alosikinet naka aimorikikina kangin erai aitojokar arerengusio nuka aingic keda aimor esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba amuti iri 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi eca asizu ti ecita ma dria ra. Ti ecita 'di ma asisile lezu drileba e'yo vuti ondaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini sukulu anzi eyi ma esele cozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuteisa n'okuhanuura, abebembezi b'ebitongore byombi bakahendera bahika aha kwikirizana. Enkoragana egi negyenderera okwongyera aha migisha y'okucondooza hamwe n'okugarukanisa abeegi.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, understanding the fundamentals of entrepreneurship is essential. This course is designed to equip students with practical skills and insights into effective business management.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, okutegeera emisingi gy'obusuubuzi kya mugaso. Omusomo guno gukoleddwa okuwa abayizi obukugu obw'omugaso n'okutegeera mu nzirukanya ennungi eya bizinensi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek pi nongo tic, niang kit me cako biacara pire tek tutwal. Kwan man kiyubu me miyo ngec ki lutino kwan i kom kit me doro biacara maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei lolo, ejokuna noi amisiikin nuka agwelanar. Itemonokinitai ekoosi lo kanu aijaikin esisiak acoa ka acoa na aitolot ebiasara ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, vata e'yo tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru. Ba ede kosi 'diri sukulu anzi yi dri ondua azini ondua fezu tujari oceza kililiru ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'empaka z'emirimo, okwetegyereza eby'obushubuzi n'eky'omugasho munonga. Omushomo ogu gukozirwe kuheereza abeegi emyoga n'obwengye bw'okureeberera bizinesi kurungi.

eng_prompt: Despite significant investments in higher education, many students are graduating without the skills needed for today's job market. This disconnect between academic training and industry requirements has raised concerns among employers and educators alike.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ssente nnyingi eziteekeddwamu mu matendekero aga waggulu, abayizi bangi batikkirwa nga tebalina bukugu obwetaagisa okufuna emirimu. Enjawulo eno wakati w'okutendekebwa mu by'ensoma n'ebyetaago by'amakolero ereeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakozesa n'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki keto lim madit tutwal I gangi kwan me rwom ma malo, lutino kwan mapol tye ka tyeko kwangi labongo diro ma mite me nongo tic. Bedo peke pa kubbe ikin pwony ki jami ma mite pi tic okelo lworo ikin ludito tic ki lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipikakinitai ikapun luipu noi toma asioman naka okuju, eutasi esisiak luipu alomun kosomero komamei acoa na ekotoi kanu adumun aswamisinei. Amamus na aiswamanara kiding aisisia keda iboro lu ekotoi kotoma okampuni ayangau aiyalongong kanejaas ikulepek aswam keda esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi vuti aleza angiri ni tro ovuzu onita uruleruri ma alia ra ti, sukulu anzi karakara eyi onita univasiti niri de ondua 'bani lele azi esuzu ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi kokoru. Erita ako onita ma eselea afa 'bani lele okalamvu ma alia 'diyi pie ri eji asi otiza 'ba azi fe'baa 'diyi ma eselea 'ba onita onipi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuta esente nyingi omu by'obwegyese obwaheiguru, abeegi baingi nibahendera emishomo yaabo bataine bukugu oburikwetengwa kukora emirimo erizooba. Okuremwa kukwatanisa ahagati y'eby'obwegyese n'ebyetaago by'amakorero, kireesireho okwerarikirira omu bakoresa hamwe n'abeegyesa.

eng_prompt: As the demands of modern work schedules increase, many individuals are seeking flexible learning options. Online education offers a convenient solution that allows students to balance their professional and academic commitments.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'emirimu egy'omulembe guno bweyongera, abantu bangi banoonya eby'okusoma eby'enjawulo. Okusoma ku mutimbagano kusobozesa abayizi okukwataganya emirimu gyabwe egy'ekikugu n'ebyensoma.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa yub me tic ma ite kare ni tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me kwan mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat. Kwan iwi yamo (internet) obedo yoo maber tutwal ma weko lutino kwan bedo ki kare me timo ticgi ki kwan gi I rwom marom.
teo_prompt: Kwape eipud loka ainapeta nuka aswam eyatakin, ekotosi itunga luipu aijulakin epone loka aisisia. Asioman nako olago einakinit esisiak apedorit aitirian aswamukec keda asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani le sa'wa 'bani azi ngazu ewu 'disi ri ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, 'ba karakara eyi geri onita ni 'diyi nda. Onita geri oli aliasi ri ni geri kililiru fe sukulu anzi eyini eyini eyini ani eyi ma e'yo onita ni azini onita ni 'diyi 'yezu tro tro.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo by'emirimo y'omurembe nibyeyongyera, abantu baingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okwega oburikwetengwa. Okwegyesa aha mitimbagano nikuhwera abeegi kurwanisa oburemeezi omu mirimo yaabo hamwe n'eby'obwegyese bwabo.

eng_prompt: By clarifying the requirements and resources available, we can bridge the gap between potential learners and the opportunities they seek. This initiative aims to empower individuals from diverse backgrounds to pursue their educational goals.
lug_prompt: Bwe tulambika obulungi ebyetaago n'ebikozesebwa ebiriwo, tusobola okuziba omuwaatwa wakati w'abayizi abayinza n'emikisa gye banoonya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula abantu okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byabwe eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Ka waniang jami ma mite ki jami ma watye kwede, watwero juko apoka-poka matye ikin lutino kwan ki gum ma gitye ka yenyo. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo kero ki dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat me cobo miti gi me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitijenar iboro lu ekotoi keda iboro lu ejaas, ipedori oni aimik eidicane loejai kiding esisiak keda arerengesio nu ekotos kesi. Alosikinet na erai aitigogong itunga lu aiboisio nu egelegela kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekec nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lele azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma e'yo eceza si, ama eco esele coza sukulu anzi ecopi ra 'diyi pi ma eselea drileba yini nda 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo esi ra. Otita 'di ma asisile okpo fezu 'ba engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini le onita ma alea 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Kurabira omu kushoboorora ebirikwetengwa hamwe n'ebintu ebirikuba biriho, nitubaasa kuzibira omwanya oguri ahagati y'abeegi n'emigisha ei barikusherura. Ekigyendererwa ky'enteekateeka egi n'okwongyera abantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe amaani, kugira ngu babaase kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo by'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, understanding technology is essential for success. As part of the curriculum, students will explore various aspects of computer usage.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, okutegeera tekinologiya kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda okusomesebwa, abayizi bajja kunoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukozesaamu kompyuta.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, niang lok kom tet manyen obedo gin ma pire tek pi nongo loc. Macalo but yub me pwonye, lutino gubi pwonyo kit me tic ki kompiuta.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, amisiikin etatai loakwana erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Kwape ediope kotoma aisisiaeta, epote esisiak aingic iwaitin luegelegela luka aitosom akompiutan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia ni ewu andruri ma alea, e'yo tekenologia ni 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo onitani 'diyi ma azi ru, sukulu anzi eyi nga e'yo ndundu komputa eyi ma ayuza ma dria 'diyi onda.

eng_prompt: The local community has been advocating for improved maternal healthcare services for years. In response to these needs, the government has allocated funds for a significant upgrade to the facility.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu babadde balwanirira empeereza y'ebyobulamu eri bamaama abali embuto okumala emyaka. Mu kwanukula ebyetaago bino, gavumenti etaddewo ensimbi ez'okutumbula ekifo.
ach_prompt: Lwak me tedero gubedo ka lweny pi medo rwom me kony me yot kom pa mon ma oyac pi mwaki mapol. Me cobo miti magi, gamente omiyo cente me ilo malo rwom me ot yat eni.
teo_prompt: Isinyikokitos itunga luka atutubet aitojokar amukian naka angor kanu ikar luipu. Kanu aitemokin ipudesia lu, ejaiki apugan ikapun kanu aisiteteun adoketait na adekis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi a'di 'di azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi okporovu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria eli karakara. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba robia angu 'da ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro batwire nibarwanirira obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara g'abakazi abaine enda okumara emyaka mingi. Gavumenti, ahabw'ebyetaago ebi, eteireho esente z'okutunguura eirwariro.

eng_prompt: To improve the infrastructure in the region, the government has initiated a major road construction project. However, the budget for this ambitious endeavor requires external financial support.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu, gavumenti etandiseewo pulojekiti ennene ey'okuzimba enguudo. Kyokka, embalirira y'omulimu guno omunene yeetaaga obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva ebweru.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me gedo i twok piny eni, gamente ocako yub me yubu gudi madongo. Kadi bed kumeno, byek me lim pi yub man mito kony me lim ma aa ki woko.

nyn_prompt: Okutunguura ebyombeko omu kyanga, gavumenti etandikireho purogyekiti y'amaani y'okwombeka enguuto. Kwonka embaririra y'ekigyendererwa eki neeyetenga obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga aheeru.

eng_prompt: When considering a new home, many factors come into play, including design, materials, and location. One of the most common questions potential homeowners ask is about the timeline for construction.
lug_prompt: Mu kulowooza ku maka amapya, ebintu bingi bijja mu muzannyo, omuli enkola, ebikozesebwa, n'ekifo. Ekimu ku bibuuzo ebitera okubuuzibwa bannannyini mayumba abasuubirwa kwe ku bbanga ly'okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka tamo I kom ot manyen, jami mapol bino I tic, ma I kingi obedo kit ma kiyubu kwede, jami tic, ki kabedo. Lapeny acel ma wegi odi mapol gi penyo en aye I kom kare me gedo.
teo_prompt: Arai iwomomo ijo ebe ibusakinit jo adukun etogo loitetet, ipu iboro luibusakinit jo aswam keda aiboisit naibusakinit jo adumun. Adiopet aingiseta nuetapit ikulepek itogoi aingitingit ngesi nuikamunitos apak naka aiduk.
lgg_prompt: Aku o'diru ma e'yo egazu 'boria, e'yo karakara eyi emu e'yo 'yezu, ekile afa 'bani ayu 'diyi pie, azini angu 'bani eyi sizu 'diyi pie. E'yo azi 'ba lepi jo e'ipiru 'diyi ozipi tu 'diyi ma azi sa'wa 'bani jo sizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka aha maka masya, ebintu bingi nibibaho, otwariiremu engyenderwaho, eby'okukoresa hamwe n'omwanya. Kimwe aha bibuuzo ebirikukira kubuzibwa bakama b'amaju, n'obwire bw'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: Access to medical services in the area is severely limited. Many residents must travel long distances to receive basic healthcare.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi mu kitundu kikaluba nnyo. Abatuuze bangi balina okutambula engendo empanvu okufuna obujjanjabi obusookerwako.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom I kabedo eni tye magoro tutwal. Lutedero mapol omyero guwot I bor piny me nongo kony me yot kom.

nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu kyanga tikyorobi munonga. Abatuuragye baingi baine kugyenda engyendo ndaingwa kutunga obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple meetings and discussions about the upcoming construction project, the team has not taken any actionable steps. As a result, they have failed to start the process of land clearing.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkiiko nnyingi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku pulojekiti y'okuzimba ejja, ttiimu tennakola kintu kyonna kisoboka. N'ekivuddemu, balemeddwa okutandika enteekateeka y'okugogola ettaka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kacoke ki nywako lok mapol obedo tye I kom yub me gedo matye kabino anyim, dul enoni pe otimo gin mo keken ma twero konyo. Macalo adwogi ne, pe gitwero cako yub me yubu ngom.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu airiamununeta keda ineresinei nuikamunitos epurojekt lo ebunit lo aduko, mam etimu iswamat adiokiro nuepedorio aitodolikin. Kanuka ngun, epikosi kesi ageun aitemokin alupok.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi karakara eyi 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu otita afa sizu ri ma dria ra ti, amuti 'da 'duni nga e'yo azi 'bani eco 'ye ra ni ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi o'bi e'do e'yo 'bani angu 'da ma ta mbazu ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho enkiiko nyingi n'okuhanuura ahari purogyekiti y'okwombeka erikwija, tihaine eki tiimu ekozire. N'ekyarugiremu,baremirwe kutandika omurimo gw'okutereeza eitaka.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions about improving local healthcare services, the residents recognized the urgent need for better maternal care. In a show of solidarity, the community has offered land for construction of the maternity ward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo ku ky'okutumbula ebyobulamu mu kitundu, abatuuze baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulabirira bamaama abalwadde. Mu kulaga obumu, abantu bawaddeyo ettaka okuzimba waadi y'abazaalisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok matut I kom ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom I kabedo gi, lutedero guniang ni kony me yot kom pa mege tye kamitte tutwal. Me nyuto ribe, lwak gumiyo ngom me yubu ot nywal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem nuikamunitos aitojokar amukian, apotu itunga kojenutu eipud loka angor nu epotiete. Kanu aitodun aimorikikina, ejaikisi itunga alupok kanu aiduk ewoodi lo idoere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo lezu azakoma fele ayia eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ra. Ti ecita e'dazu, ongulumu 'da fe nyaku wadi oku eyini osizu ri sizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga aha kutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu byaro, abatuuragye bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okureeberera abakazi abaine enda. Omu kworeka okukwatanisa, abantu baheireyo eitaka ry'okwombekamu eishomero ry'okuzaariramu.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the final invoice, it became clear that the costs had skyrocketed beyond our initial agreement. We had expected a reasonable increase, but this was far beyond what was discussed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza invoice esembayo, kyazuuka nti ebisale byali byeyongedde nnyo okusinga bwe twali tukkiriziganyizzaako. Twali tusuubira okwongezebwa, naye kino kyali kisukka nnyo ku ekyo ekyateesebwako.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo invoice me agiki, onen atyer kamaleng ni wel ne omede malo tutwal ma pe wawinye I kome con. Wabedo ki byek me nongo medo lim, ento man obedo kama bor tutwal ki ngo ma kinywako iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor invoice lo awasia, apotu kojenutu ebe apolor etiai loka ikapun adepar lu apotu sio acamanaros. Iwomit sio ebe ebuni aiyatakin ikapun, konye mam ngun aponi kitemokinai.
lgg_prompt: Ma vutia invoice asizu ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini aje 'da tu uru aga amani ati okorisi ri ra. Ama ega ndra e'yo otuza kililiru ni ma dria ra, te 'di aga e'yo 'bani nze ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ekihandiiko kya invoice eky'ahamuheru, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebishare byeyongyeire munonga kukira ebi twabaire twikiriizeho. Tukaba nituteekateeka ngu nitwija kwongyerwa, kwonka eki kikaba kiri kihango kukira ekyabaire kigambirweho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the community, local organizations have been rallying support for the health centre. Recently, the church stepped up to contribute essential resources.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obweyongera, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bibadde bikunga obuyambi bw'eddwaliro. Gye buvuddeko, ekkanisa yavaayo okuwaayo ebintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, dul mapat-pat me tedero gubedo ka rweyo dano me miyo kony pi ot yat. Cokcok-ki, kanica okatti me miyo jami mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, eutasi iriongeta luka atutubet aituk agangat kanu adekis. Apakio nu, abu ekanisa kisinyikok ainanakin iboro lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi atita tra arojo 'da ni. O'du 'diyi ma alia, kanisa enga drile afa orodriru 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago ebyeyongyeire omu bantu,ebitongore by'ebyaro bitwire nibishaba obuhwezi bw'eirwariro. Enyimaho, ekanisa ekareeta eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Local authorities recently completed a series of road repairs in the neighborhood. However, many residents are expressing dissatisfaction with the results.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti z'ebitundu zaamaliriza okuddaabiriza enguudo mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko. Wabula abatuuze bangi balaze obutali bumativu n'ebyavuddemu.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero cokcok-ki gutyeko yubu gudi mapol I kabedo gi. Kadi bed kumeno, lutedero mapol tye ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kongetakisi aitemonokin irotin luipu kotoma aiboisit. Konye, itunga luipu itodunitos amamut aiyalama kanu akiro nuelomunitos.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi de o'diru e'yo nzila eyi edezu angu eyi ma agei 'diyi ma alea 'bo. Kani si, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da kini eyi aa'ni ayikosi agata 'da eyisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro, obwahati bamazire kukora enguuto nyingi omu byaro. Kwonka abatuuragye baingi tibarikwikirizana n'ebyarugire omu bigyezo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a significant increase in the demand for healthcare services across various regions. This trend highlights the importance of ensuring that quality health services are available to all citizens, regardless of their location.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu bwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Enkola eno eraga obukulu bw'okukakasa nti ebyobulamu eby'omutindo biriwo eri bannansi bonna, awatali kufaayo ku kifo we babeera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel dano ma mito kony me yot kom omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Man nyutu ber pa neno ni rwom me kony me yot kom tye pi anywali weng, labongo paro pi kabedo ma gitye iye.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi eipuda lo amukian kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Itodunit aswamisioit na ajokis naka awanyun ebe ejaas amukian na adoketait nejaas itunga kere, araida ejaasi kesi aiboisio kere.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra. E'yo 'di ece orodri 'bani nezu ra kini azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi kari anzi dria eyini aa'zu pari cirisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Enkora egi neeyoreka omugasho gw'okureeba ngu obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obw'omutindo nibubaho aha batuuze boona, oihireho ahu barikutuura.

eng_prompt: Many local health centres are struggling to meet the needs of their communities. As a result, essential services for mothers and their children are often unavailable.
lug_prompt: Amalwaliro g'ebitundu mangi galwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ebitundu byaago. N'ekivuddemu, obuweereza obw'omugaso eri bamaama n'abaana baabwe tebutera kubaawo.
ach_prompt: Odi yadi mapol tye ka yele me cobo miti pa lwak gi. Macalo adwogi ne, kony ma mite pi mege ki lutino gi ipol kare pe nonge.
teo_prompt: Eutasi adekisia nuipu noi aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga kec. Kanuka ngun, mam duc ijanakino lu ipudasi angor keda idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Arojo karakara eyi dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, azakoma orodriru ayia eyini tualu anzi eyivile 'diyi pie 'diyi esuni eyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Amarwariro maingi ag'omubyaro nigateganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu baago. N'ekyarugiremu, obuheereza bw'omugasho aha bakazi n'abaana baabo tiburikukira kubaho.

eng_prompt: As the community faces a rising health crisis, hospitals are struggling to keep up with the demand for medical care. This alarming trend has put immense pressure on the already overburdened healthcare system.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kyolekaganye n'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, amalwaliro galwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi. Enkola eno eyeeraliikiriza etadde akazito ak'amaanyi ku kitongole ky'ebyobulamu ekijjudde omugugu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lwak tye ka nongo peko me yot kom matye kamede, odi yadi tye ka tute matek me bedo ki miti me nongo kony me yot kom. Tim man oketo lyeto madit tutwal I kom yub me yot kom ma onongo dong opong ki tic mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina itunga keda ationis naka angaleu naepol noi, eutasi adekisia ainingosit aitodolikin eipuda lo amukian. Ejautene lo loerono noi einakinit ainingosit naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga luka angaleu luejaasi keda ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, arojo eyi dri ci e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo onzi 'di 'ba okpo angiri geri alata ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikurabana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, amarwariro nigateganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'obujanjabi. Omuringo ogu ogurikwerarikiriza, guteire oburemeezi bw'amaani aha kitongore ky'eby'amagara ekirikujunanizibwa munonga.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a clean environment is essential for the health and well-being of residents. To foster a sense of responsibility and pride, local groups should come together to address litter and promote sustainability.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obutonde obuyonjo kya mugaso eri obulamu n'obulungi bw'abatuuze. Okutumbula enneewulira y'obuvunaanyizibwa n'okwenyumiriza, ebibiina by'ebitundu birina okukwatagana okukola ku kasasiro n'okutumbula obuwangaazi.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo me kabedo ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal pi yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak. Me medo rwom me tic ki awaka, dul me tedero omyero guribe kacel me lweny i kom yugi ki tyelo kor dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda aiboisio nu elaete ejok kanu aijar naka itunga. Kanu aitopolor apedor ka aiyalama, ekot igurupun luka atutubet aimorikikin kanu aitemokin agasia ka aitopoloria aijar.
lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma tambazu alaru ri eri orodriru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma rua ala ni. Azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu, le ongulumu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma emu tualu e'yo okurunya ni 'diyi ma aza kozu, dika eyi ma otu e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'obwegyendesereza n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abatuuragye. Okureetaho obujunanizibwa n'okwetunguura, guruupu z'ebyaro zishemereire kukorera hamwe okukora aha kasasiro n'okureetaho entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many cultures have recognized the importance of living in harmony with nature. They implemented sustainable practices to ensure the preservation of the land for future generations.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, obuwangwa bungi bukitegedde obukulu bw'okubeera mu nkolagana n'obutonde. Baateekawo enkola ez'obutebenkevu okulaba ng'ettaka likuumibwa emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, tekwaro mapol guniang ber pa kwo malube ki cwec ma orumuwa. Guketo itic yoo mapat-pat me gwoko ngom pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, ejenete inonosio luipu ajokis naka aijar nepepe keda isuban luka Edeke. Apotu kesi itolomutu iponesio luajokak kanu awanyun ebe eyuwaritai alupok kanu aijar naka itunga luetupakinete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, e'yo suruni karakara 'diyi esu orodri aa'zu tualu afa nyakuni 'diyi pie ri ra. Eyi e'do geri eyini ecozu angu 'da ma ta mbazu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa bingi bimanyire omugasho gw'okutuura omu busingye n'obuhangwa. Bakata omu nkora emiringo y'obuhangwa, okureeba ngu eitaka rikagumaho ahabw'eminyeeto y'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Conserving biodiversity is essential for the health of our ecosystems. By protecting various species, we ensure the balance and resilience of natural habitats.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obutonde obw'enjawulo kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'ebiramu byaffe. Bwe tukuuma ebika by'ebisolo eby'enjawulo, tukakasa nti obutonde tebuva ku mulamwa.
ach_prompt: Gwoko cwec ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal pi kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa. I gwoko jami makwo mapatpat, waneno ni kabedo ma lubanga aye ocweyo tye marom.
teo_prompt: Aidar iboro luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar na isuban. Kowai lo ayuarite iponesio luegelegela, ijeni oni ebe ejokuna noi aiboisio nuka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru afa amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma alata ni. Afa nyakuni ndundu 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama nga angu nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'eby'omugasho aha magara g'obuhangwa bwaitu. Kurabira omu kurinda eby'obuhangwa ebitarikushushana, nitureeba ngu eby'obuhangwa bigumizamu.

eng_prompt: The impact of habitat destruction and poaching is becoming increasingly evident. Conservationists are alarmed by the rising number of wildlife casualties.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu kusaanyaawo obutonde bw'ensi n'okuyigga ebisolo mu bumenyi bw'amateeka byeyongera okweyoleka. Abakuuma obutonde bw'ensi beeraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'ebisolo by'omu nsiko okweyongera okufiirwa.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma balo kabedo pa dano kacel ki dwaro lee iwi ali tye ka nen atyer kamaleng. Jo ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa gitye ki lworo I kom wel lee lum matye ka too.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi atiokisio nuka amunar aiboisio nuka ekwam keda ameja itiang. Iyalongongosi itunga luidarete isuban kanu aiyar itiang lukokutwi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu aa'zu 'diyi ma ezaza azini anyapa asea 'diyi ma anyapa asea 'diyi ma anyapa asea 'diyi ma anyapa asea 'diyi ma anyapa asea 'diyi ma anyapa asea 'diyi pie ri ni i e'da ewakokoru. Ba e'yo afa asea 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo 'bani anyapa asea 'diyi o'dizu 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu risi.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'okushiisha eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'okwiba enyamaishwa omu buryo butahikire, nibweyongyera kweyoreka. Abarikurwanirira eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi beerarikirire ahabw'omuhendo gw'enyamaishwa ogweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: The vibrant landscapes and rich cultural heritage of the nation attract millions of visitors each year. As a result, the hospitality and service industries thrive, contributing significantly to the economy.
lug_prompt: Ebifo ebirabika obulungi n'ebyobuwangwa eby'eggwanga bisikiriza obukadde n'obukadde bw'abagenyi buli mwaka. N'ekivuddemu, eby'obulambuzi n'obuweereza bikulaakulana, ne biyamba nnyo mu by'enfuna.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma leng tutwal ki tekwaro ma beco pa lobo man kelo wele mapol mwaka ki mwaka. Macalo adwogi ne, tic me jolo welo ki miyo kony tye ka dongo, ma man okonyo tutwal ilok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nuibusiak ka inonosio luibusiak luka akwapuwok ingalaunete ipejok imilionin kangolikaru. Kanuka ngun, apolor ewai lo aijaun itunga keda aijaanakin itunga, ido ingarakinete noi toma odumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Angu ndrizaru tu 'diyi azini e'yo suruni kari 'di ma alia 'diyi 'ba omuru milioni yi eji eli vusi. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu angu a'izuri ni tualu okalamvu azi ngazani 'diyi pie tu uru dika eyi fe orodri angiri e'yo robiani 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa n'oburungi bw'eihanga, nibireetaho abagyenyi nyamwingi buri mwaka. N'ekyarugiremu, amakorero g'okutangirira abagyenyi n'obuheereza nigatunguuka, ekirikureetaho entunguuka y'amaani omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: The preservation of our planet's most stunning landscapes is essential for future generations. One effective way to achieve this is through the establishment of national parks.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma ebifo ebirabika obulungi mu nsi yaffe kya mugaso eri emirembe egijja. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kuyita mu kutondawo amakuumiro g'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko kabedo mamwonya tutwal I lobowa pire tek tutwal pi anyim. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man obedo cako ka gwoko lee.
teo_prompt: Aidar aiboisio nuibusiak noi kotoma akwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka itunga lu oingaren. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aitolomun aiboisio nuidarere itiang.
lgg_prompt: Angu ndrizaru tu nyaku dria 'diyi ma tambazu ri eri orodriru ewu drusiri ni. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri 'bani angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi sizu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda emyanya mirungi y'ensi n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu b'omubiro by'omumaisho. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okutandikaho amarindiro g'enyamaishwa.

eng_prompt: Access to certain areas is restricted to ensure the preservation of their unique ecosystems. Only authorized personnel are allowed to enter these designated zones.
lug_prompt: Okuyingira mu bifo ebimu kukugirwa okusobola okukuuma obutonde bwabyo obw'enjawulo. Abantu abakkiriziddwa bokka be bakkirizibwa okuyingira mu bifo bino ebyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Gitye ki kigeng me donyo I kabedo mukene me gwoko cwec ma pat pat matye I kabedogi. Dano ma ki yee gi keken aye gi yee gi me donyo I kabedo magi.
teo_prompt: Mam ecamakitai alomar aiboisio ace kanu aidar isubanakec luitegelikina. Itunga lu ecamakitai bon kes ecamakitai alomar toma aiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ba atri fizu angu azi 'diyi ma alia ci nezu ra kini 'ba afa yi ma esele ndu 'diyi ma ta mba. Ba lu 'ba driwala be 'diyi dri fizu angu 'bani ope 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okuhika omu myanya emwe tikirikwikirizibwa, okureeba ngu eby'obuhangwa byabyo ebitarikushushana bigumibwaho. Abantu abarikwikirizibwa bonka nibo barikwikirizibwa kutaaha omu myanya egyo.

eng_prompt: Conservation organizations are increasingly collaborating with local communities and governments. Their efforts focus on sustainable practices that protect endangered species and their habitats.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuuma obutonde bw'ensi byeyongedde okukolagana n'ebitundu ne gavumenti. Kaweefube waabwe assa essira ku bikolwa eby'obutebenkevu ebikuuma ebika by'ebisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo n'ebifo we bibeera.
ach_prompt: Dule ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa tye ka tic kacel ki gamente. Tute gi tye tutwalle me gwoko jami mapat-pat matye ka rweny ki kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta lu idarete isuban kes iswamaete nepepe keda itunga keda apuganisinei. Isingarenitos kesi aswam kagogongu kanu ayuarite iponesio luka itiang luepedorete aibiror keda aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambapi 'diyi curu'do ti eci o'bi angu ma alia 'diyi pie tualu gamete be. Eyi ma okpo 'ba geri eyini aa'zu ewule ewule 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu tualu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikurinda eby'obuhangwa byeyongyeire kukwatanisa n'abantu b'omubyaro hamwe na gavumenti. Amaani gaabo nigata amaani aha mihanda y'obuhangwa erikurinda eby'obuhangwa ebiri omu kabi k'okuhwaho hamwe n'obutuuro bwabyo.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation into illegal wildlife trafficking, authorities presented compelling evidence against the suspects. In response to the growing concern for endangered species, the high court has issued a warrant of arrest for the said poachers.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okunoonyereza ku kukukusa ebisolo by'omu nsiko mu bumenyi bw'amateeka, ab'obuyinza baayanjudde obujulizi obukakali ku bateeberezebwa. Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo, kkooti enkulu efulumizza ekiragiro ky'okukwata abayizzi abo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me kwedo lok me donyo ki lee lum iwi alii, lutela gumiyo caden matek i kom jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom kwai lee mapat-pat matye I peko me rweny, court madit omiyo waraga me mako lukwal lee I alii.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic akiro nuikamunitos akoko na itiang lukokutwi, apotu apedorosio itodutu aitogogongoret naepol noi mama ejaasi ngul luitepesenitai. Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka itiang luejaasi toma ationis, abu ekooti lokapolon ijaik apapula naka aikamanario naka itunga luimukete itiang lukokutuwi.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo vuti ondaza afa asea 'diyi ma oguzani azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba eyi e'da e'yo azi okporu 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ma dria. E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, dwani ururi fe waraga 'ba anyapa asea 'diyi o'dipi 'diyi obizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza ebirikukwata ahakubuzaho kw'enyamaishwa, ab'obushoborozi bakahayo obujurizi bw'amaani oburikuhakanisa abarikuteekateekwaho. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira kw'ebihangirwe ebiri omu kabi k'okuhwaho, kooti enkuru ehaire ekiragiro ky'okukwata abahigi b'enyamaishwa.

eng_prompt: The diverse landscapes and rich biodiversity found throughout the country make it a unique destination. From lush forests to stunning lakes, Uganda showcases the beauty of the natural world.
lug_prompt: Ensi ez'enjawulo n'ebiramu eby'enjawulo ebisangibwa mu ggwanga lyonna bigifuula ekifo eky'enjawulo. Okuva ku bibira ebibisi okutuuka ku nnyanja ezirabika obulungi, Uganda eraga obulungi bw'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapat-pat me kabedo mapat-pat ki jami makwo mapat-pat ma nonge I lobo man weko kabedo man bedo pat tutwal. Cako ki bunga ma tye ki lum mapol tutwal naka wa I nam mamwonya tutwal, Uganda nyutu leng pa cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nuegelegela keda iboro luegelegela luejaasi toma akwap kere einakini ngin aiboisit na itegelikina. Anyoun kotoma okibira luibusiak kitoni oicorin luibusiak, itodunit Uganda aibuses naka isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Angu ndundu angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi tualu afa ndundu nyakuni 'diyi pie kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi fe angu 'di ni aa'zu ndundu. Engazu jere efiza be kpere yi alio ndrizaru 'diyi ma alia, Uganda ece onyiru wudrikuru nyakuni 'diyiniri ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa eby'omutaano hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ebihangirwe ebirikushangwa omw'ihanga ryona, nibireetera eihanga eri okuba ery'omutaano. Kuruga aha bibira ebihango kuhisya aha nyanja ezirikutangaaza, Uganda neeyoreka oburungi bw'ensi y'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: With its rich history, stunning landscapes, and vibrant culture, Morocco has become a top destination for travelers from around the globe. The country's unique blend of tradition and modernity attracts millions of tourists each year.
lug_prompt: N'ebyafaayo byayo eby'obugagga, ebifo ebirabika obulungi, n'ebyobuwangwa ebinyuma, Morocco efuuse ekifo ekikulu eri abatambuze okuva mu nsi yonna. Eby'obuwangwa n'eby'omulembe eby'eggwanga lino bisikiriza obukadde n'obukadde bw'abalambuzi buli mwaka.
ach_prompt: Ki tekwaro ne, kabedo ne mamwonya tutwal, ki tekwaro ne, Morocco odoko kabedo madit tutwal pi luwot ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat me wilobo. Lobo man tye ki tekwaro ma pat ki me kare-ni ma kelo lulim piny milion mapol mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Keda akiro nukolo, aiboisio nuibusiak, keda inonosio luibusiak, araun Morocco aiboisit naepol noi naka alotok kotoma akwap kere. Apolou naka inonosio keda iponesio luitetiak luka akwapuwok ingalaunete imilionin luka itunga kangolikaru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driorisi, angu ndrizaru 'diyi pie, tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie, Morocco eca angu 'ba aci'ba enga'ba wudrikuru ma kalasi kuru 'diyi ni muzu ri'I. Kari 'di ma e'yo a'bini tualu ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi eji 'ba mile otizani 'diyi ma omgbo eli vusi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyafaayo byayo eby'omutaano, ebishushani byayo ebirikutangaaza, hamwe n'obuhangwa bwayo, Morocco ehindukire omwanya murungi gw'abarambuzi kuruga omunsi yoona. Eby'obuhangwa n'eby'omurembe by'eihanga, nibireetaho obukaikuru bw'abarambuzi buri mwaka.

eng_prompt: The country's diverse wildlife and stunning landscapes attract millions of visitors annually. As a result, tourism has become a vital sector for Uganda's economy.
lug_prompt: Ebisolo by'omu nsiko eby'enjawulo mu ggwanga n'ebifo ebirabika obulungi bisikiriza obukadde n'obukadde bw'abagenyi buli mwaka. N'ekivuddemu, eby'obulambuzi bifuuse bya mugaso nnyo mu by'enfuna bya Uganda.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol limo lobo man mwaka ki mwaka pi jami ma beco ma tye iye. Macalo adwogi ne, tic me limo piny odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me lim me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Itiang lukokutwi luegelegela luka akwapuwok keda aiboisio nuibusiak ingalaunete ipejok imilionin kangolikaru. Kanuka ngun, araun erionget loka elatok loejok noi kanu edumune loka ikapun koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Kari ꞌdi ma anyapa asea ndu ndu ꞌdiyi azini angu ndrizaru ꞌdiyi ꞌba mile otizani ꞌdiyi eji eli alu alu vusi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu ri eca esele orodriru e'yo robia ni kari Uganda niri ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa by'eihanga ebitarikushushana hamwe n'ebishushani ebirikutangaaza, nibireeta abagyenyi nyamwingi buri mwaka. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'oburambuzi bihindukire eby'omugasho omu by'entaasya ya Uganda.

eng_prompt: The growth of the travel industry has significant economic implications for many regions. As more people explore new destinations, local businesses and services thrive.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ekitongole ky'ebyentambula erina kinene ky'ekola ku byenfuna by'ebitundu bingi. Abantu bwe beeyongera okulambula ebifo ebipya, bizinensi n'obuweereza mu kitundu bikulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Dongo pa biacara me wot tye ki adwoki madit tutwal I kom biacara me but lobo mapol. Ka dano mapol tye ka limo kabedo manyen, biacara ki kony me tedero tye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Apol naka erionget loka alosit ejaas keda ikapun luipu noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu. Kwape itunga luipu elosete aiboisio nuitetiak, epoloete ibiasaran keda aijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Angu acizu ri ma zota ni angu karakara eyi ma e'yo robia esuzu ri ma omgbo otu. Ba karakara eyini muzu angu o'diru 'diyi ma alea ri si, tujari kari 'di ma alea 'diyi tualu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi pie tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'eby'engyenda nikureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya omu byanga bingi. Abantu baingi ku barikuza omu myanya misya, ebyobushubuzi n'obuheereza nibyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: As the region attracts more visitors each year, local businesses are thriving and creating new job opportunities. This surge in tourism is having a positive impact on the economy and the workforce.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kisikiriza abagenyi bangi buli mwaka, bizinensi z'omu kitundu zikulaakulana n'okutondawo emirimu emipya. Okweyongera kuno mu by'obulambuzi kukosa bulungi eby'enfuna n'abakozi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma twok piny eni kelo wele mapol mwaka ki mwaka, biacara me tedero tye ka dongo dok bene tye ka kelo tic mapol. Medde pa biacara me limo piny tye ki adwoki maber I kom biacara ki lutic.
teo_prompt: Kwape ingalauni aiboisit ngin ipejok luipu kangolikaru, eutasi ibiasaran luka atutubet apol ka aitolomun aswamisinei nuitetiak. Apol naka ewai lo elatok nes ejaas keda epone loajokan loka aitopolor edumune loka ikapun keda eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'di ni omu eyi ejizu eli driasi, tujari angu 'di ma alea 'diyi zo tualu drileba azi eyini o'diru 'diyi pie. E'yo angu ndundu eyi onezu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ni orodri eji e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria tualu 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ekicweka nikireeta abagyenyi baingi buri mwaka, bizinesi z'omubyaro nizikura kandi zitandikaho emirimo misya. Okweyongyera kw'eby'oburambuzi kuriyo nikukora kihango ahaby'entaasya hamwe n'abakozi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the continent has seen a significant increase in international visitors, driven by improved infrastructure and a growing interest in its diverse cultures and landscapes. As a result, many countries are capitalizing on their natural beauty and rich heritage to attract travelers from around the globe.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ssemazinga alabye okweyongerayongera kw'abagenyi okuva mu nsi z'ebweru, nga kino kivudde ku mutindo gw'ebizimbe n'obwagazi mu byobuwangwa n'ebifo ebyenjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ensi nnyingi zikozesa obulungi bwazo obw'obutonde n'obugagga bwazo okusikiriza abatambuze okuva mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lobo man oneno medde pa wel wele ma aa ki lobo mawoko, malubbe ki dongo pa jami tic ki miti madwong I kom tekwaro ki kabedo ma pat pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe mapol tye katic ki ber pa cwec ma orumuwa ki tekwaro gi me ywayo lulim piny ma aa ki I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit akwapin nuka akwapin ace eyatakinor noi enaaba loka ipejok luka akwapin ace, kanuka iboro lu itojokaritai ka eipud loka itunga luka inonosio luegelegela keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, eutasi akwapin nuipu aitosom aibuses kec keda iborokec luibusiak kanu aisukunyun alotok kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu nderi ndre 'ba omuru engapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra, e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini ava tupi e'yo suruni azini angu ndundu 'diyi ma dria 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, kari karakara eyi orodri esu e'yo onyiru eyini 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo onyiru eyini 'diyi pie 'ba aci'ba enga'ba wudrikuru ma alea ndulu 'diyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Kontinenti ereebire okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abagyenyi kuruga omu mahanga agandi, ahabw'okutunguuka kw'ebyombeko hamwe n'okukunda eby'obuhangwa n'emyanya yaayo etarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, amahanga maingi gariyo nigakoresa oburungi bwago bw'obuhangwa hamwe n'obuhangwa bwago bw'omutaano kureeta abarambuzi kuruga omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: As the tourism sector continues to show signs of recovery, industry leaders are calling for increased investment. They believe that enhanced funding could significantly boost local economies and attract more visitors.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitongole ky'eby'obulambuzi kyeyongera okulaga obubonero bw'okudda engulu, abakulembeze mu by'obulambuzi basaba okwongera okusiga ensimbi. Balowooza nti ensimbi ezongezeddwayo zisobola okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu n'okusikiriza abagenyi bangi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tenge me limo piny tye ka medde ki nyutu lanyut me roc, lutela me tenge enoni tye ka lego ni omyero kimed keto lim I tic. Gitye ki niyee ni medo lim twero tyelo kor tic me lim ki biacara me tedero ki kelo wele mapol.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit erionget loka elatok aitodun ijenuneta luka angaleun, ekotosi engarenok luka erionget aiyatakin aipikakin ikapun. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aiyatakin ikapun epedori aitopolor edumune loka ikapun kosodete ayangaun ipejok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Esele omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu ri ni mu drile eceta eyi e'dazu, drice'ba okalamvu 'da ni 'diyi ai 'ba eyini lonyi vuti aleza 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Yi a'ira kini atita robia niri ma omgbo otuzuri eco e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eri eco omu eyi ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'oburambuzi kukirikwongyera kworeka obumanyiso bw'okugaruka omu ntebe, abebembezi b'eby'oburambuzi nibashaba kwongyera ahaby'obushubuzi. Nibateekateeka ngu okwongyerwa esente nikubaasa kutunguura entaasya y'ekyaro n'okureeta abagyenyi baingi.

eng_prompt: In light of declining visitor numbers and the need for economic revitalization, local officials gathered to discuss strategies for boosting tourism. During the meeting, the district leader emphasized the importance of diversifying attractions to draw more visitors to the area.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kukendeera kw'omuwendo gw'abalambuzi n'obwetaavu bw'okuzzaawo ebyenfuna, abakungu b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula obulambuzi. Mu lukungaana, omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okussaawo ebifo eby'enjawulo okusikiriza abagenyi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel lulim piny matye kadok piny ki miti me roco lim, lutic me tedero gugure me nywako tam i kom yoo me ilo malo rwom me limo piny. Ikare me kacoke enoni, latela me district owaco ni ber tutwal me kelo jami ma weko dano mapol bino ka limo kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitidisiar enaaba loka ipejok keda eipud loka aisiteteun edumune loka ikapun, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itopoloere elatok. Kotoma airiamunet, abu engarenon lo edisitrikt kitogogong ajokis naka aiboisio nuipu nu ingalaunete itunga aipejokin aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe omu eyini emupi angu ndundu eyi onepi 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. Mitingi 'da ma alea, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'da fe okpo orodri angu ndundu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea eyini ani omu eyi ejizu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu omuhendo gw'abagyenyi guriyo nigukyendeera hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okugarura busya eby'entaasya, abakuru b'ebyaro bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi. Omu rukiiko, omwebembezi wa disiturikiti, akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukoresa ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebirikureeta abarambuzi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: The travel industry plays a crucial role in boosting local economies. As more visitors flock to a destination, various sectors benefit from increased demand for services and accommodations.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ky'ebyentambula kikola kinene nnyo mu kutumbula eby'enfuna by'eggwanga. Abagenyi bwe beeyongera okujja mu bifo, ebitongole eby'enjawulo biganyulwa mu kweyongera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza n'okusula.
ach_prompt: Dul ma loyo lok kom wot timo tic mapire tek tutwal me ilo malo rwom me lim I tedero. Ka wele mapol obino ikabedo moni, dul mapat-pat nongo ber pa mede pa miti me tic ki kabedo.
teo_prompt: Iswamai erionget loka alosit aswam naepol noi kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun. Nepe eponenete ipejok aiboisio nuipu, epote iriongeta luipu aimedaun kotoma eipuda lo aiboi keda aiboisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu acipa niri ni azi okporu nga e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Omu eyini emuzu angu eyini muzu 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, esele ndundu eyi orodri esu e'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fezu azini angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Eby'engyenda nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kutunguura eby'entaasya y'eihanga. Abagyenyi ku barikweyongyera kwija omu myanya, ebitongore ebitarikushushana nibigasirwa omu kweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza n'oburaaro.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a troubling trend in wildlife trafficking. Conservationists are alarmed by the increasing number of incidents involving poaching and illegal trade.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga enkola eyeeraliikiriza mu kukukusa ebisolo by'omu nsiko. Abakuuma obutonde bw'ensi beeraliikirivu olw'obubbi bw'ebisolo n'obusuubuzi obutali mu mateeka obweyongera buli lukya.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim me cato lee lum ma pe ki cik. Jo ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa gitye ki lworo I kom medde pa tim me dwaro lee iwi ali ki cato jami I yoo ma pe atir.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu epone loetiono noi loka aikamanario naka itiang lukokutwi. Iyalongongosi itunga luidarete isuban kanu aiyatakin na amumu keda agwelanar namam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi e'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma oguzuri ma dria ra. Ba afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mba'baa 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo kalafe tupi e'yo anyapa asea 'diyi o'dizu azini tujari 'yezu azita palaa ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka enkora y'okwiba enyamaishwa. Abarikurwanirira eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi, beerarikirire ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu kuhiiga enyamaishwa n'okuguza ebintu omu buryo butahikire.

eng_prompt: Conservation efforts and habitat restoration initiatives have been gaining momentum across various regions. As a result, more species are thriving in their natural environments.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube w'okukuuma n'okuzzaawo obutonde bw'ensi abadde yeeyongera mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ebika by'ebisolo bingi bikulaakulana mu butonde bwabyo.
ach_prompt: Yub me gwoko cwec ma ikabedo mapatpat tye ka mede I but lobo mapatpat. Macalo adwogi ne, kwai jami mapatpat tye ka dongo I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Aswam na aidar isuban keda aiboisio nu ekwam ejai apol noi kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ejarete iponesio luipu noi kotoma aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo ꞌbani ꞌba ꞌdiyi ma ta mbazu azini geri ꞌbani ecozu angu yini ovuzu alenia ꞌdiyi ogozu vile ꞌdiyi ma omgbo tu angu ndundu yi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, anyapa asea 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Amaani g'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'okugarura busya eby'obuhangwa, gatungire amaani omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obuhangwa bingi biriyo nibikurira omu myanya yaabyo y'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Conservation efforts have been ramped up significantly over the past few years. As a result, wildlife reserves are reporting positive trends in the population of endangered species.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube w'okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi ayongezeddwayo nnyo mu myaka egiyise. N'ekyavaamu, amakuumiro g'ebisolo by'omu nsiko galaga enkulaakulana mu bungi bw'ebisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo.
ach_prompt: Yub me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa omede tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo ma kigwoko iye jami makwo ilum tye kakelo adwogi maber I kom wel jami makwo ilum matye kama rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi aswam naka aidar isuban kotoma okaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi aiboisio nuidarere itiang lukokutwi keda iponesio luajokak luka itiang lukokutwi luepedorete aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Ba 'ba okpo e'yo angu ta mbazani 'diyi ma tambazu eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi e'yo onyiru 'diyi ece e'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma kalafe ni ovuzu e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amaani g'okurinda eby'obuhangwa geeyongyeirwemu munonga omu myaka mikye ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, amarindiro g'enyamiishwa gariyo nigareetaho entunguuka omu bungi bw'enyamiishwa eziri omu kabi k'okuhwaho.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated as protesters clashed with law enforcement during the ongoing teachers' strike. In the chaos, a confrontation broke out, leading to a tragic incident.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde nga abekalakaasi balwanagana n'abakuumaddembe mu kwekalakaasa kw'abasomesa okugenda mu maaso. Mu kavuyo, okulwanagana kwabalukawo, ekyaviirako ekintu eky'entiisa.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde ikare ma lujemo gubedo ka lweny ki abili ikare me jemo pa lupwonye matye kawot anyim. Ikare me kuku kuku enoni, lweny ocake ma okelo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu ediyak ogiroto keda ipolisin kotoma aidiya naka isisianakinak. Kotoma amumu kangin, apotu ingungeta kobwangunos, ido abu koyangau akangas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu 'ba ngiringiri 'ye'baa 'diyi ni aco cozu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie sa'wa imba'ba eyini ngiringiri 'yezu ri si. Ngiringiri 'da ma alea, ngiringiri efu dika e'yo azi onzi ni i 'ye i.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'abeshaaringi kurwanagana n'ab'ebiragiro omu keesharingo k'abegyesa akarikugyenda omu maisho. Omu kavuyo, hakabarukaho okurwana, ekyarugiremu akabi.

eng_prompt: After assessing the situation and ensuring everyone's safety, the authorities decided to take immediate action. They announced that support would be provided to those affected by the incident.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera n'okukakasa obukuumi bwa buli omu, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Baalangirira nti obuyambi bujja kuweebwa abo abaakosebwa ebyaliwo.
ach_prompt: Ingee neno ngo matye katimme ki neno ni dano weng tye maber, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo cut. Gunyuto ni kibi miyo kony bot jo ma peko eni okelo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejautene keda aanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere, apotu apedorosio koseutu aswam katipet. Aponi kolimorai ebe eponio aijaikin agangat nejaas ngul luetirorit akangas ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'da onezu azini 'ba dria ma tambazu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi. Eyi azi kini 'ba nga atita fe 'ba e'yo 'da 'yepi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma embeera n'okureeba ngu buryomwe aine oburinzi, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho. Bakarangirira ngu obuhwezi nibwija kuheebwa abo abakozirwe kubi ekyabaireho.

eng_prompt: Understanding the use of force in law enforcement is crucial for both officers and the public. Many people wonder about the circumstances that justify the use of lethal force by police.

ach_prompt: Niang kit ma abili ki lwak gitiyo ki teko ikare me keto cik itic pire tek tutwal. Dano mapol gipenye I kom ngo ma oweko abili tiyo ki teko me neko dano.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin eipone lo itwasamaere agogongu kotoma aitup ikisila erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas ipolisin keda itunga kere. Ipu itunga lu ejenete ejautene lo ebeitor ipolisin aitwasam agogongu na eyarit.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, laughter and cheers filled the air on the schoolyard. A group of students gathered for their weekly football match, unaware of the impending danger.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, enseko n'okukuba enduulu byajjula empewo mu luggya lw'essomero. Ekibinja ky'abayizi baakungaanidde okuzannya omupiira gwabwe ogwa buli wiiki nga tebamanyi bulabe obwali bujja.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, nyero ki woo opong I dyekal me gang kwan. Dul pa lutino kwan gugure pi tuku odilo gi me cabit ki cabit, kun pe gingeyo peko matye kabino.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu akwena keda aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma alaro naka esomero. Apotu egurupu loka esisiak kotukokinos kanu abolia naka emopira kangolisabiti, komam ejenete nuikamunitos ationis naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, o'duko azini ayiko ga angu sukulua 'diyi ma alia tre. Ongulumu sukulu anzi eyi tra eyi abala mupira tuzani wiki driasi 'diyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo ewaru emupi 'diyi ma dria ku.

eng_prompt: Concerned about the recent string of incidents in the neighborhood, the police decided to reach out to the young victim. They wanted to ensure he felt safe and supported during his recovery.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira olw'ebintu ebibaddewo mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, poliisi yasalawo okutuukirira omuvubuka eyakosebwa. Baayagala okukakasa nti awulira obukuumi era n'obuyambi ng'awona.

teo_prompt: Apotu ipolisin kopodokisi nuikamunitos akangasia nuipu nuiswamasi koidunyet, apotu kopedosi adolokin itunganan yeniticanitai. Akotosi kesi awanyun ebe eyuwara ngesi ido igangitai ngesi kotoma apak naka angaleuke.

eng_prompt: Authorities have been investigating a shooting incident that occurred on Monday evening, leaving the community in shock. After gathering evidence and witness statements, police have identified and apprehended a suspect.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza babadde banoonyereza ku kukubwa kw'amasasi okwabaddewo akawungeezi ka Mmande okwaleka abantu mu kutya. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi n'ebigambo by'abaabaddewo, poliisi ezudde n'ekwata omutemu.
ach_prompt: Lutela gubedo ka kwedo lok me celo dano ma otimme I ceng baraja otyeno ma oweko lwak obedo ki ngeng tutwal. Ingee coko caden ki lok pa caden, abili gunongo ki mako ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome.
teo_prompt: Eutasi apedorosio aingic akangas naka ainomio naka imudun luapotu kotakanutu Nabalasa atibong, kojalakisi itunga akurianu. Akaulo naka aituk ajenanut keda akiro nuka ajenak, apotu ipolisin kojenutu kosodete aikamar lo iwosatai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi ebi e'yo 'bani osu gbizu o'du alu ma ondresi ri ma eti onda, erini fezu ongulumu eyini aa'zu osuta ma alea. E'yo afa ecetaru azini 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ma e'yo trazu 'bori ma vutia, polisi isu azini obi agu 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi babaire nibacondooza ebirikukwata aha kuteera amasasi okwabaireho orw'okubanza omumwebazyo, ekyarekire abantu omu kabi. Bwanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi hamwe n'ebigambo by'abajurizi, poriisi ekatunga kandi yakwata omuntu owabaire nateekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: During the investigation, witnesses reported hearing a struggle before the gunfire erupted. As tensions rose, the officer attempted to explain the circumstances surrounding the incident.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza, abajulizi baategeezezza nti baawulira okulwanagana ng'amasasi tegannabalukawo. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, omuserikale yagezaako okunnyonnyola embeera eyeetoolodde ebyaliwo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwed, lucaden guwaco ni guwinyo lweny mapud muduku pe ocake. I kare ma lworo omedde, abili oteme me tito ngo ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic, apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kopuputu ingungeta eringa ainomio. Neapolor atiokisio, abu epolisit kotam aitetem akiro nuapotu kotakanutu.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo vuti ondazurisi, 'ba sadiniru 'diyi 'yo kini eyi eri e'yo aco coza ni eyi de nga po'di osu eyi e'doni ku. Erita ako ni turia, azi'ba 'da obi e'yo i 'yepi 'da ma dria 'diyi ece.

eng_prompt: After the accident occurred on campus, emergency services were called to the scene to assess the situation. Upon evaluating the injuries, paramedics determined that the student required more specialized care.
lug_prompt: Akabenje bwe kaaguddewo ku ttendekero, ab'eby'amangu baayitiddwa mu kifo okukebera embeera. Bwe beetegereza ebisago, abasawo baakizuula nti omuyizi yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ingee can me gudu ma otime I gang kwan me univaciti, kilwongo joo ma miyo kony me ot yat pi niang ngo matye katimme. Ikare me ngiyo awano ne, lutic yoto kom gumoko ni latin kwan ne mito kony pa ludiro.

lgg_prompt: Drileonzi 'da ni i 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba omve 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi angu 'da ma alea e'yo nde ma ale andrizu. Bani nya'biliko 'da eyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu ra kini sukulu mva 'da le azakoma wura ndu 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: As a parent, you often prepare for various challenges, but nothing can truly prepare you for the pain of seeing your child in distress. Whether it's a physical injury or emotional turmoil, the weight of their suffering can feel unbearable.
lug_prompt: Nga omuzadde, otera okwetegekera ebisoomooza eby'enjawulo, naye tewali kisobola kukwetegekera bulumi bw'okulaba omwana wo mu buzibu. Ka kibeere nti bafunye obuvune mu mubiri oba mu nneewulira, obuzito bw'okubonaabona kwabwe buyinza okuwulikika ng'obutagumiikiriza.
ach_prompt: Macalo lanyodo, ipol kare iyubbe pi peko mapat-pat, ento pe tye gin mo ma twero yubi pi arem me neno latinni I peko. Kadi bed ni obedo awano me kom onyo peko me tam, peko me deno can gi twero bedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape aurian, ipedori ijo aitemonokin kanuka atiokisio nuegelegela, konye emamei ibore epedori aitemonokin jo kanuka apipil naka asesen ikoku kon ejai ationis. Arai erai aimusungeta nuka akuan arai aimusungeta nuka aomisio, mam epedorete kesi aitikitik ationisikec.
lgg_prompt: Tipika ru, mi mi otu e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyi ni, te e'yo azini econi mi otu e'yo suza mi vile mva ni e'yo ewaru ma alia ri ni ku. Ka tro ovu nya'biliko rua ma aliari'i kaniku e'yo ewaru yi ma omi ma alia 'diyi'i, e'yo ewaru yini candi isuzu 'diyi ma ongmbo econi yi ta mba ku.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omuzaire, nootebeekanisiza oburemeezi butari bumwe na bumwe, kwonka tihaine ekirikubaasa kukutebeekanisiza obusaasi bw'okureeba omwana waawe aine oburemeezi. Yaaba n'obuhuta bw'omubiri nainga obw'ebiteekateeko, oburemeezi bw'okubonabona kwabo nibubaasa kuba butarikugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: After the accident, he lay on the ground, struggling to stay conscious as the pain intensified. Emergency responders arrived quickly, but the damage had already been done.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje, yeebaka wansi, ng'alwana okusigala ng'amanyi ng'obulumi bweyongera. Abakola ku by'amangu baatuuka mangu naye ebyonoonese byali byakolebwa dda.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo awano me gudi, en obuto piny I ngom kun nongo tye ka tute matek me bedo ma wange twolo pien arem ne omedde tutwal. Joo ma miyo kony oyot oyot gubino oyot, ento bal onongo dong otime.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas, abu ngesi kibiror kwap, ationikinit asalakin ejenete naarai apol ariebo. Apotu lu engeso kodolokutu katipet, konye aponi komudiarai iboro.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi 'da ma vutia, eri la va nyaku dria, erita a'di 'di erini aa'zu e'yo egazu e'yo erini 'ye 'bori ma vutia. Ba azakoma fepi mbeleru 'diyi eca mbeleru, te 'ba eza e'yo 'da 'bo.

eng_prompt: After returning from a trip to a tropical region, the boy started showing symptoms of illness. His parents took him to the doctor, where he was diagnosed with malaria.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukomawo okuva mu lugendo lwe mu kitundu ky'obutiti, omulenzi yatandika okulaga obubonero bw'obulwadde. Bazadde be baamutwala ew'omusawo gye baamuzuulamu omusujja gw'ensiri.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwogo ki I wot me cito I kabedo ma lyeto tye iye, latin awobi ne ocako nyutu lanyut me two. Lunyodone gutere bot dakta, kama kinongo iye two lyeto.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abongun kotoma alosit aiboisit naelangir noi, abu esapat kogeu aitodun ijenuneta luka adeka. Apotu auriakake koyangasi ngesi mama ejai emuron, ne aponi kodumunai eimidi.

nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okugaruka kuruga omu ruramburo omu kyanga ky'obutiti, omwojo akatandika kworeka obubonero bw'oburwaire. Abazaire be bakamutwara owa dokita, ahu yashangirwe aine omushwija gw'ensiri.

eng_prompt: After months of mounting medical bills and lost wages, the family found themselves in a dire financial situation. They were faced with the heartbreaking reality that they might have to make difficult choices regarding their son's care.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okulinnyisa ebisale by'eddwaliro n'okufiirwa emisaala, ab'omu maka ago beesanga mu mbeera embi ey'ebyensimbi. Baayolekaganye n'obutuufu obumenya omutima nti bayinza okuba nga balina okukola okusalawo okukaluba ku bikwata ku kulabirira kwa mutabani waabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me mede pa wel cul me ot yat ki rweny pa mucara, lugang ne gunongo gi ikare me can lim. Gin gunongo peko madit tutwal ni omyero gumok tam matek i kom kit me gwoko latin gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aiyatakin ikapun luka amukian keda atwaniar eropit, apotu lukokalekec odumutu kesi toma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun. Apotu kesi odumutu akiro nuetioko ebe ibusakinit kesi aiswamaun aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos aidar okookec.

eng_prompt: Local residents had been reporting a series of troubling incidents that left them feeling unsafe and anxious. Authorities were alerted to the growing concerns as the impact of the suspect's actions became increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze b'omu kitundu babadde baloopa ebintu ebitaataaganya ebyabalese nga tebalina bukuumi era nga beeraliikirivu. Ab'obuyinza baategeezebwa ku kweraliikirira okweyongera ng'ebiva mu bikolwa by'omutemu byeyongera okweyoleka.

teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet olimosi akiro nuarokok nuapotu kojalakisi kesi amamut ayuwara ka aiyalongong. Aponi olimokinai apedorosio nuikamunitos aiyalongongo naepol noi naarai apolor noi atiokisio nuka aswamisio nuka loetepesenitai.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi eyini aa'zu ageitema koko azini asi otiza be 'diyi olu. Ba fe drice'ba eyini imbata e'yo eyi ma dria e'yo 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'di ma e'yo eyini 'ye ri ni ecazu e'dazaru ri ma dria.
