eng_prompt: His actions raised concerns among community members, prompting widespread outrage. Many felt that he was overstepping his authority and disregarding the needs of the citizens.
lug_prompt: Ebikolwa bye byaleetawo okweraliikirira mu bantu b'omu kitundu, ekyaviirako abantu bangi okunyiiga. Bangi baalowooza nti yali asukkiridde obuyinza bwe n'obutafaayo ku byetaago bya bannansi.

teo_prompt: Abu aswamisioke koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas itunga lu atutubet, ido abu koyangau anyunyura naepol noi. Apotu itunga luipu opupoto ebe euta ngesi aitub apedorosioke ido mam epodokinit ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini 'ye 'diyi eji asi otiza 'ba ongulumu'a 'diyi ma eselea, erini ani aoko ejizu o'bi eyi ma eselea. Ba karakara eyi ega kini eri okpo erini 'diyi aga ra dika erini asi fezu e'yo kari anzi eyini le 'diyi ma dria ku.

eng_prompt: In our society, it is essential to uphold the dignity and safety of all individuals, particularly vulnerable groups. Therefore, strict laws are in place to deter and penalize acts of violence against women.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, kya mugaso okukuuma ekitiibwa n'obukuumi bw'abantu bonna naddala abateesobola. N'olw'ekyo, amateeka amakakali gateekeddwawo okutangira n'okukangavvula ebikolwa eby'okutulugunya abakyala.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, pire tek tutwal me gwoko woro ki ber bedo pa dano weng, tutwalle joo ma goro. Pi meno, kiketo cik matek tutwal me gengo ki miyo pwod pi tim gero i kom mon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, ejok aidar angosibib keda ayuwara naka itunga kere, kacut igurupun lu ican. Kanuka ngun, ejaas ikisila luegogong kanu aitikitik ka alecor amumu naka angor.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru inzita azini ageitema fezu 'ba dria eyini, tutuni 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri. Ka'dini, 'ba o'ba azita okporu 'diyi e'yo ngiringiri ni oku eyi ma rua 'diyi atrizu azini panga fezu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu baitu, n'eky'omugasho kurinda ekitinisa n'oburinzi bw'abantu boona, namunonga abo abatarikwebaasa. N'ahabw'ekyo, hariho ebiragiro by'amaani, okuzibira n'okufubira ebikorwa by'okunyangaraza abakazi.

eng_prompt: After hearing the details from witnesses, the parents of the injured boy felt a mix of relief and sorrow. They knew their son had been in the wrong place at the wrong time during a heated altercation.

lgg_prompt: E'yo dria erizu engazu 'ba sadiniru 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, tipika agupiamva nya'biliko esupi 'da ma tipika eyi esu ava azini candi saaru. Eyi nii kini eyi ma mvi ndra pari onzi ma alea sa'wa onzi ma alea erita ako okporu 'da ma alea.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support education and literacy among displaced children, the international organization has launched a new initiative. This program aims to provide essential resources to enhance learning opportunities in challenging environments.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira okusoma n'okuwandiika mu baana ababundabunda, ekitongole ky'ensi yonna kitongozza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa ebintu ebikulu okutumbula emikisa gy'okusoma mu mbeera ezisoomooza.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwan ki kwan ikin lutino ma luring ayela, dul me wilobo mapat-pat okati ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo jami ma mite pi ilo malo rwom me kwan I kabedo ma peko tye iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang nuka asioman keda asioma kanejaas idwe lu ikerai, etolomu erionget lo akwap kere ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aijaikin iboro lu epolok kanu aitojokar arerengusio nuka aisisia kotoma aiboisio nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu atita fezu onita azini afa lazu anzi nyiri angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma alea, amuti wudrikuru si 'da e'do otita azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile afa orodriru 'diyi fezu drileba onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu e'yo ewaru be 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika eby'obwegyese n'okushoma n'okuhandiika omu baana ababingirwe, ekitongore ky'ensi yoona kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuheereza abantu ebintu ebirikwetengwa, okubaasa kutunguura emyoga y'okwega omu myanya egumire.

eng_prompt: The local education authority has secured funding for an innovative initiative aimed at improving resources in underfunded areas. As a result, six other schools from that region will also benefit from the project.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ky'ebyenjigiriza mu kitundu kifunye ensimbi z'okukola enteekateeka ey'obuyiiya egendereddwamu okutumbula eby'obugagga mu bitundu ebitalina ssente. N'ekinaavaamu, amasomero amalala mukaaga okuva mu kitundu ekyo gajja kuganyulwa mu pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Dul ma loyo lok kom kwan I tedero gunongo cente pi yub manyen ma tye ki miti me medo rwom me lim I kabedo ma pe ki lim. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan abicel mukene bene gubi nongo ber pa yub eni.
teo_prompt: Abu erionget loka asioman kodum apiyai kanu aitolomun iboro lu itwasamao kotoma aiboisio nu ikidioko ikapun. Kanuka ngun, isomeroi ice ikanyape luka aiboisit kangin epote aimedaun kotoma opurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo onitaniri ondrepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu robia e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'bani robia esuzu ku 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, sukulu azi azia engazu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nga vini orodri esu engazu otita 'da vu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'obwegyese eky'omubyaro kitungire esente z'okutandikaho enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'obugaiga omu myanya etarikutunga sente. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero agandi mukaaga kuruga omukyanga ekyo nigeija kugasirwa omu purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming school year, we have gathered a variety of essential educational resources. Our team is excited to announce that the distribution of these scholastic materials will begin next week on Tuesday.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera omwaka gw'essomero ogujja, tukung'aanyizza ebikozesebwa mu kusoma eby'enjawulo. Ttiimu yaffe esanyuse okulangirira nti okugaba ebikozesebwa mu masomero kuno kujja kutandika wiiki ejja ku Lwokubiri.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi mwaka me kwan matye kabino ni, wa coko jami mapol ma pigi tego I gang kwan. Dul pa lutino kwan wa tye ki yom cwiny me miyo ngec ni poko jami magi bicakke I ceng ariyo me cabit manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka ekaru loka esomero lo ebunit, atukokinit sio iboro luipu lu isisiaete. Eyalama etimukosi alimor ebe epote aikor iboro lu esomero ageun osabiti ngol Naiyareit.
lgg_prompt: Otuta eli sukulu ni emupi ri ni, ama tra afa onita ni orodriru 'diyi karakara. Ama vile amuti 'diyi ayikosi azi ecezu kini afa sukulu ni 'diyi ma awa nga e'do sabiti drusirisi o'du iri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ogurikwiija, tutungire ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe by'omugasho omu kwega. Tiimu yaitu eshemereirwe kurangirira ngu okugaba ebintu ebi eby'okukozesa omu mashomero nikwija kutandika esande erikwija aha rw'okubanza.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance their operations and improve efficiency, the organization has prioritized the acquisition of essential resources. As a result, they have allocated significant financial resources towards purchasing these materials.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula emirimu gyabwe n'okutumbula obwangu, ekitongole kikulembezza okufuna ebintu ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, bataddewo ensimbi nnyingi mu kugula ebintu bino.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me tic gi ki dongo rwom me tic gi, dul eni oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom nongo jami ma mite pi tic gi. Macalo adwogi ne, guketo lim madit tutwal I wilo jami magi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aswam kec ka aitojokar eswamae kec, abu erionget isingarenit adumun iboro lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi ibwaikisi ikapun luipu kanu agwel iboro lu.
lgg_prompt: Azi eyivile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu geri eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da 'ba e'yo okporu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma esuta ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'ba robia angiri afa 'diyi jezu.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kutunguura emirimo yaabo n'okukora gye, ekitongore kitandikire kutunga eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, bateireho esente nyingi kugura ebintu ebi.

eng_prompt: Implementing engaging and interactive learning activities in the classroom can significantly enhance students' interest in education. By fostering a positive and stimulating environment, we can inspire a love for learning that lasts a lifetime.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo ebintu ebisikiriza mu kibiina kisobola okutumbula obwagazi bw'abayizi mu kusoma. Bwe tukuza embeera ennungi era ezzaamu amaanyi, tusobola okusikiriza okwagala okuyiga okuwangaala obulamu bwaffe bwonna.
ach_prompt: Keto yub me kwan ma yomo cwiny lutino kwan twero medo miti gi i kom kwan. Ka wabedo ki kabedo maber dok ma cuku cwiny dano, watwero weko dano maro kwan pi kare me kwo gi weng.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun aswamisinei nu isisiaunete idwe kotoma atukot epedori aiyatakin eipud loka esisiak kanu asioman. Kowai lo aitopolor aiboisit na ejok ka na isinyikokit, ipedori oni aisinyikokit itunga amina aisisia na edaun aijar kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni 'diyi 'bazu kilasia ri ni sukulu anzi eyi ma ava onita ma alea ri ma omgbo otu. Angu muke azini ava engapi 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama eco leta onita ni aa'zu edriru ri eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta omu nkora emirimo y'okwega erikushemeza omu kibiina, nikibaasa kwongyera aha rukundo y'abeegi omuby'obwegyese. Kurabira omukureetaho embeera nungi kandi erikugaruramu amaani, nitubaasa kureetaho rukundo y'okwega erikumara amagara gaitu goona.

eng_prompt: To ensure that every child has the resources they need for a successful education, we have gathered essential supplies and learning tools. By providing these materials, we aim to foster a positive learning environment that encourages regular attendance.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti buli mwana alina ebikozesebwa bye yeetaaga okusoma obulungi, tukung'aanyizza ebintu ebikulu n'ebikozesebwa mu kusoma. Mu kuwa ebikozesebwa bino, tugenderera okutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi ekubiriza okubeerawo buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni latin acel-acel tye ki jami ma mite pi kwan maber, wa coko jami ma mite pi lutino kwan. I miyo jami magi, watye ki miti me kelo kabedo maber me kwan ma cuku cwiny lutino me bedo tye I gang kwan kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe kangin ikoku ejaas keda iboro lu ekotos kesi kanu asioman najokan, atukutu sio iboro lu epol ajokis ka iboro lu isisiaere. Kowai lo aijanakin iboro lu, ikoto oni aitopolor aiboisit najokan naka aisisia na isinyikokini itunga ajaut osomero.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini anzi dria eyi ma afa eyini le onita muke ri ma alea 'diyi ci, ama tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi tualu afa onita ni 'diyi pie. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezurisi, ama le angu onita ni kililiru fepi anzi eyini muzu sukulu eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu buri mwana aine eby'okukozesa ebirikwetengwa omu kwega kwe kurungi, tutungire ebintu ebirikwetengwa hamwe n'ebikwato by'okwega. Omu kuheereza ebintu ebi, nituteekateeka kureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega erikureetera abaana kuguma nibaza omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, the importance of education cannot be overstated. Women who pursue higher learning often find themselves equipped with valuable skills that enhance their professional capabilities.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, obukulu bw'okusoma tebusobola kugambibwa nnyo. Abakyala abasoma mu matendekero aga waggulu batera okwesanga nga balina obukugu obw'omugaso obweyongera ku busobozi bwabwe obw'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pyem tye matek pi nongo tic, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lutino. Mon ma gikwano I rwom ma malo ipol kare ginongo ni gitye ki diro me tic ma konyo gi ilo malo rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka aswamisinei lolo, mam epedorio aitogogong ajokis naka asioman. Angor nu elomanarete asioman naka okuju duc edumunenete acoa naepol noi na itojokari aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala 'yezu ewu andruri ma alea, 'ba econi orodri onita niri ma omgbo omvi ku. Oku onita uruleruri 'dupi 'diyi tutuni eyi esu eyi ma dria ondua orodriru eyini ecozu eyi ma azi ngazu ra 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'empaka z'emirimo, omugasho gw'obwegyese tigurikubaasa kugambwa munonga. Abakazi abarikushoma aha matendekyero agaheiguru, nibatunga emyoga y'omugasho erikubongyera aha myoga yaabo.

eng_prompt: Research has consistently shown a strong correlation between parental engagement and student success. When parents actively participate in their children's education, it fosters a supportive learning environment.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga akakwate ak'amaanyi wakati w'okwenyigiramu kw'abazadde n'obuwanguzi bw'abayizi. Abazadde bwe beenyigira mu kusoma kw'abaana baabwe, kitumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Kwed nyutu ni tye kubbe matek ikin tic pa lunyodo ki cobo miti pa lutino. Ka lunyodo gubedo tye ikwan pa lutino gi, man weko kwan bedo maber.
teo_prompt: Itodunit duc aingic ebe ejai arucokina naepol noi kiding aomisio nuka auriak keda akerianut naka esisiak. Arai iswamaete auriak ejok kotoma asioman naka idwekec, itopoloori ngin aiboisit na isisiaet najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza eyi e'da sa'wa driasi aa'ta okporu tipika eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi ma drile suza be. Tipika eyi ka fi e'yo anzi eyivile 'diyini onita ma alea okporu, eri angu onita ni atita fezu ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kugyendereire kworeka okukwatanisa ahagati y'abazaire n'abeegi. Abazaire ku barikwejumba omu kwegyesa abaana baabo, nikireetaho embeera nungi y'okwega.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced families, local officials have prioritized initiatives aimed at enhancing access to learning resources. Recognizing the unique challenges faced by these communities, the district is committed to fostering an inclusive educational environment.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'amaka agasengulwa ogweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo bakulembezza enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula okufuna ebikozesebwa mu kusoma. Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo ebitundu bino kwe bisanga, disitulikiti yeewaddeyo okutumbula embeera y'ebyenjigiriza erimu abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lugangi ma gurwenyo gangi gi, lutic me tedero guketo cwiny gi I kom yub mapat-pat matye ki miti me medo rwom me nongo jami kwan. I nge niang peko mapat-pat matye I kabedo magi, district ocikke me medo rwom me kwan pa dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka ikalia luebwounitos kotoma aiboisio kec, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kisingarenitos ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar adumunun iboro lu isisiaere. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda atutubena nu, ekapakina edisitrikt aitopolor aiboisit naka asioman na itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo eyini lezu afa onita ni 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru ongulumu 'diyi ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, distrikiti owi i e'yo onita 'ba dria ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'amaka ogweyongyeire, abakungu b'ebyaro bateireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'obwegyese. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'omutaano oburikushangwa abantu aba, disiturikiti eyehaireyo kureetaho obwegyese burimu abantu boona.

eng_prompt: As nations strive to improve their standards of living, they often find themselves vying for limited supplies of essential materials. This struggle intensifies as global demand continues to rise, leading to heightened tensions and strategic maneuvering.
lug_prompt: Nga amawanga gagezaako okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwago, gatera okwesanga nga gavuganya olw'ebbula ly'ebintu ebikulu. Okulwanagana kuno kweyongera ng'obwetaavu bw'ensi yonna bweyongera okulinnya, ekireetawo okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi n'okutambula mu ngeri ey'obukodyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobe tye ka tute matek me yubu rwom me kwo gi, pol kare gi nongo gi tye ka pyem I kom jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Lweny man mede tutwal I kare ma miti me jami I wilobo tye ka medde, ma oweko telle ki lweny tye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi akwapin aitojokar adoketait na aijarakec, etapit kesi adumunun ebe ikidioko iboro lu itwasamao. Apolor ejie lo naarai iyata eipuda lo akwap kere, ido eyangauni aiyalongong naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Kari yini dri ciria geri yini aa'zu ri otuzu, yi yi esu a'bala 'ye afa orodriru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra. E'yo 'di ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo afa 'bani le wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu drile, e'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amahanga garikugyezaho kutunguura omutindo gw'entuura yaabo, nigakira kweshangira garikwesimbaho ahabw'ebintu bikye ebirikwetengwa. Entaro egi neeyongyera ahabwokuba ebyetaago by'ensi yoona nibiguma nibikura, ekirikureetaho obunkenke n'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, many families prioritize immediate financial stability over long-term academic success. As a result, some parents don't feel the importance of education.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, amaka mangi gakulembeza obutebenkevu mu byenfuna okusinga obuwanguzi mu by'ensoma obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu. N'ekivuddemu, abazadde abamu tebawulira mugaso gwa kusoma.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, gangi mapol giketo bedo ki lim oyot-oyot obedo gin ma pire tek loyo bedo ki gum me kwan pi kare malac. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo mukene pe giwinyo ber pa kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda esipidi loepol noi, ekotosi ikalia luipu aitojokaar ikapun adepar akerianut na apak naepol noi kotoma asioman. Kanuka ngun, mam auriak ice ejenete ajokis naka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alea, familia karakara eyi e'yo robia esuzu mbeleru ri 'du okporu aga drile suza onita ma alea sa'wa ezu ri. E'yo 'disi, tipika azi 'diyi nini orodri onita niri ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, amaka maingi nigakuzaho obusingye omu by'empiiha okukira obusinguzi omu by'obwegyese obwire buraingwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire abamwe tibarikumanya omugasho gw'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: After facing numerous challenges in providing for their kids, the families found solace in the resources offered by the local charity. As a result, the parents are grateful for the support given to the children by the organisation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusanga okusoomoozebwa okungi mu kulabirira abaana baabwe, amaka gano gaafuna okubudaabudibwa mu buyambi obwaweebwayo ekitongole ky'obwannakyewa eky'omu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abazadde basiima obuyambi obuweebwa abaana okuva mu kitongole.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo peko mapol me miyo jami ma mite ki lutino gi, lugang ne gunongo kwe cwiny ki bot dul ma miyo kony bot lutino. Macalo adwogi, lunyodo tye ki pwoc pi kony ma dul eni miyo ki lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumunun atiokisio nuipu nuka aidar idwekec, apotu ikalia ngun odumutu agangat kama ejaasi atukot naka agangat. Kanuka ngun, iyalamasi auriak kanu agangat na ijaikini erionget idwekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara yini esuzu yi vile anzi 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, familia 'da eyi esu asi omiza afa ndundu amuti azakoma fepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini fe 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, tipika eyi awa'difo be atita amuti 'da ni fe anzi eyivile 'diyini risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushanga oburemeezi bwingi omu kureeberera abaana baabo, amaka gakashanga okuhuumurizibwa omu by'obuhwezi ebyaheirwe ekitongore ky'obuhwezi eky'omubyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire nibasiima obuhwezi obu ekitongore kihaire abaana.

eng_prompt: Reading is a fundamental skill that greatly enhances a child's cognitive development. By fostering a love for books, parents can help their children expand their imagination and knowledge.
lug_prompt: Okusoma bukugu bwa mugaso nnyo obutumbula enkula y'okutegeera kw'omwana. Mu kukuza okwagala ebitabo, abazadde basobola okuyamba abaana baabwe okugaziya ebirowoozo n'amagezi gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwan obedo diro ma pire tek tutwal ma weko tam pa latin dongo. Ki pwonyo lutino me maro bukke, lunyodo twero konyo lutino gi me dongo tamgi ki ngec gi.
teo_prompt: Aisiom erai acoa naepol noi na itojokari aomisio nuka idwe. Kowai lo aitopoloun amin na iitabon, epedorete auriak aingarakin idwekec aiyatakin aomisio kec keda acoa kec.
lgg_prompt: Laza eri ondua azi orodriru anzi nyiri eyini ecozu e'yo onizu ri ma zota ma omgbo otuzu ni i. Tipika eyi ma leta buku eyi ma dria ri ma ezota si, eyi eco anzi eyivile 'diyi ma aza ko eyi ma egata ma omgbo otuzu azini onita ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okushoma n'omuringo gw'omugasho ogurikwongyera amaani omu kutunguuka kw'omwana. Abazaire nibabaasa kuhwera abaana baabo kutunguura ebiteekateeko byabo n'obwengye bwabo, barikwegyesa abaana baabo kukunda ebitabo.

eng_prompt: As I strolled through the bustling streets, I couldn't help but notice the vibrant atmosphere surrounding me. Everywhere I looked, there were storefronts displaying the latest fashion trends.
lug_prompt: Bwe natambulatambula mu nguudo ezaali zijjudde abantu, nnalaba embeera ennungi eyali yeetoolodde. Buli we nnatunula, waaliwo amaduuka agalaga emisono gy'engoye egyakagwawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka wot I dye gudu ma dano dwong iye, aneno kit ma dano tye ka yweyo kwede. Ka mo keken ma aneno, aneno ka ma kicato iye ruk manyen.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong alosit korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu, mam eong abu apedori aimorikikin aijar naka itunga luejaasi eong. Aiboisio kere nuakoto eong asesen, ajaasi idukai luitodianarete igoen luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Mani aciria nzila ocuzaru 'diyi ma alea, ma econi ndra e'yo angu ma ageia 'diyi ma dria ri ndre ku. Pari dria mani ndrezu 'diyi ma alia, dukani o'diru suta o'diru 'diyi e'dapi 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nintambura omu nguuto ezirimu abantu baingi, nkaba ntarikubaasa kwetantara okureeba embeera y'okushemererwa eyabaire enyetooroire. Buri hamwe ahu naareebire, hakaba hariho amaduuka agarikworeka emisono y'emyenda ey'omurembe.

eng_prompt: As consumers become more environmentally conscious, the fashion industry is witnessing a shift in shopping preferences. This change has led to a growing rivalry between retailers offering brand-new apparel and those specializing in pre-owned garments.
lug_prompt: Ng'abaguzi beeyongera okufaayo ku butonde bw'ensi, abakola emisono balaba enkyukakyuka mu ngeri gye bagula ebintu. Enkyukakyuka eno ereesewo okuvuganya okw'amaanyi wakati w'abasuubuzi b'engoye empya n'abo abakugu mu kugula engoye enkadde.
ach_prompt: Kit ma luwil tye ka medde ki gwoko cwec ma orumuwa, lucat ruk bene tye kaneno alokaloka I kit ma gimaro wilo kwede. Alokaloka man okelo pyem matye kamede ikin lucat bongi manyen ki lucat bongi macon.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi agwelak aidar ejautene lo akwap, euta erionget loka igoen asesen aijulanakineta kotoma epone loka agwel iboro. Eyangau aijulanakineta ngun abolobol naepol noi kiding agwelanarak luka igoen luitetiak keda lu egwelanarete igoen lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa je'ba 'diyi ni ecazu mile be angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma dria, okalamvu bongo edeza ni 'diyi e'yo ojata afa jeza ni 'diyi ma alea ri ndre. Ojata 'diri fe baka seza tu 'ba bongo ozipi o'diru 'diyi ma eselea 'ba bongo ozipi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abaguzi kubarikweyongyera kumanya ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi, ab'eby'emishono bariyo nibareeba empindahinduka omu kugura ebintu. Empindahinduka egi ereesireho okuhayahayana ahagati y'abatembeyi abarikuguza emyenda misya hamwe n'abo abarikuguza emyenda eyakozireho.

eng_prompt: When considering the impact of clothing on personal well-being, many people overlook the importance of hygiene and freshness. Choosing to wear new garments can significantly reduce the risk of exposure to allergens and bacteria often found in pre-owned items.

ach_prompt: Ka gitye ka tamo I kom adwoki pa bongi I kom kwo pa dano, dano mapol cayo ber pa gwoko lengo. Yer me ruko bongi manyen twero dwoko piny rwom me nongo kwidi ki kwidi ma pol kare nonge I kom jami macon.
teo_prompt: Aomoom nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata igoen aijar, mam itunga luipu epodokinito ajokis naka aila keda aila. Aseun ainap igoen luitetiak epedori aitidisiar atiokisio nuka adumun iboro luitosomao.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo 'duzu e'yo bongo eyini 'ye 'ba eyi ma rua ri ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'duzu bongo o'diru 'diyi osuzu ri eco e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi esuzu afa 'bani ayule 'diyi ma alea ra 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi ku barikuteekateeka aha mugasho gw'emyenda aha magara gaabo, nibafeerwa omugasho gw'obuyonjo n'obwegyendesereza. Okucwamu kujwara emyenda misya nikibaasa kukyendeeza munonga akabi k'okutunga oburemeezi n'obukooko oburikukira kushangwa omu bintu ebikoresirwe.

eng_prompt: Many people are looking for budget-friendly options when it comes to fashion. As a result, the popularity of thrift stores and vintage shops has surged.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya engeri ezitali za bbeeyi bwe kituuka ku misono. N'ekivuddemu, obuganzi bw'amaduuka agatunda ebintu eby'edda bweyongedde.

lug_prompt: Mu kiseera ky'okuvuganya, abakungu baalondoola nnyo bannabyamizannyo okukakasa nti bagoberera amateeka amakakali agakwata ku ngoye z'okuwuga. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ennyo, omuwuzi omu yasangiddwa ng'amenya amateeka.

teo_prompt: Kapak naka abolobol, apotu eswamak ongicata akerak kanu awanyun ebe etupitos kesi ikisila luikidioko nuikamunitos igoen luiduwere. Akaulo naka awanyanar ejok, aponi kodumunai ebe ejai ediopet abwoan lo amengerikit ikisila.

eng_prompt: As the wedding season approached, the excitement in the air was palpable. Local entrepreneurs saw an opportunity to cater to the growing demand for bridal fashion.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'embaga bwe kyasembera, essanyu lyali lirabika mu bbanga. Abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu baalaba omukisa okukola ku bwetaavu obweyongera obw'engoye z'abagole.

teo_prompt: Apotu idukai luipu luka atutubet iyatakisi iborokec kanu adumun agwelak luipu. Kilema igoen lumam itosomaete itunga, ejaasi kwana kesi keda igoen lu ipirioitin lu epedorete kesi ainap.

eng_prompt: In the heart of the city, there is a vibrant shopping district that caters primarily to fashion enthusiasts. Many of the boutiques in this area focus on providing a diverse range of clothing options for women.
lug_prompt: Mu mutima gw'ekibuga, waliyo ekitundu ky'amaduuka ekirimu abantu abangi era nga kino kisinga kuganyula abo abaagala emisono. Amaduuka mangi mu kitundu kino gatunuulira ku kuwa abakazi engoye ez'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: The local designers have been working tirelessly for months to create a stunning new collection. To celebrate their hard work and showcase their designs, they have organized a special event.

eng_prompt: Join us for a fantastic gathering this weekend! We have planned an exciting event filled with fun activities for everyone.

eng_prompt: The community center is hosting an exciting fashion show next month, and we are looking for enthusiastic participants. If you have a passion for fashion and want to showcase your style, we encourage you to get involved.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ky'ekyalo kitegeka omwoleso gw'emisono ogunyuma omwezi ogujja, era tunoonya abeetabamu abajjumbidde. Bw'oba oyagala emisono era ng'oyagala okulaga engeri yo, tukukubiriza okwenyigiramu.
ach_prompt: Gang tic pa lwak tye ki yub me nyuto ruk manyen ma mit tutwal I dwe manyen, dok watye ka yenyo joo matye ki miti me bedo tye. Ka imaro ruk dok imito nyutu kit ma irukke kwede, wacuku cwinyi me donyo iye.
teo_prompt: Ebeit atukot ngin aitolot aitodianaro na igoen luibusiak noi olap ngol, ido iuta sio aimo itunga lu ekotosi ajaikin toma. Arai imina jo iponesio luka igoen luibusiak ido ikoto aitodun iponesiokon, isinyikokini sio jo alomar toma.

nyn_prompt: Omwanya gw'abantu niguza kutaho omworeko gw'emisono ogurikushemeza okwezi okurikwija, kandi nituronda abarikwenda kwejumbamu. Ku oraabe oine rukundo y'emisono kandi noyenda kworeka omuringo gwawe, nitukuhiga kwejumbiramu.

eng_prompt: During the dry season, the availability of fresh pasture and forage can be significantly reduced. As a result, it's crucial for farmers to monitor their livestock's diet closely to ensure their health and well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'ekyeya, okubeerawo kw'amalundiro amapya n'emmere y'ebisolo kuyinza okukendeera ennyo. N'ekivuddemu, kya mugaso nnyo eri abalimi okulondoola obulungi endya y'ebisolo byabwe okukakasa nti biramu bulungi.

teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka akamu, epedorio aitidisiar eipone lo idumunet inyamat luka ekitoi. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi akoriok aanyanar ejok enyame lo itiang kec kanu awanyun angaleukec keda aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa eli vurisi, anyapa asea 'diyi ma esuta azini nyaka nyakuni 'diyi ma esuta eco esi ra. E'yo 'disi, eri orodriru 'ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi dri anyapa yini 'diyi ma nyaka ondrezu kililiru yini ani aa'zu ala be.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'ekyanda, okubaho kw'oburiisa n'ebyokurya ebishemeire nikukyendeera munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, n'eky'omugasho munonga, abahingi n'abariisa okureebuuza eby'okurya by'amatungo gaabo, okureeba ngu gaine amagara marungi n'amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: Farmers must be vigilant about the quality of feed they provide to their livestock. Contaminated feed can lead to serious health issues in animals.
lug_prompt: Abalimi balina okuba obulindaala ku mutindo gw'emmere gye bawa ebisolo byabwe. Emmere eyonoonese esobola okuvaako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu bulamu bw'ebisolo.

lgg_prompt: Le ꞌba amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma ovu mile be nyaka yini fele anyapa yini ꞌdiyi dri ꞌdiyi ma wura ma dria. Nyaka anyapa eyini aa'zu 'diyi eco fe anyapa eyi ma rua ala ni aa'zu ewaru ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa bashemereire kwegyendesereza omutindo gw'ebyokurya by'amatungo gaabo. Ebyokurya ebirimu obukooko, nibibaasa kureeta oburemeezi bw'amaani aha magara g'amatungo.

eng_prompt: Farmers are increasingly concerned about the impact of climate change on their livestock. As the dry season approaches, many are noticing a significant decline in available grazing land.
lug_prompt: Abalimi beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri enkyukakyuka y'obudde gy'ekosaamu ebisolo byabwe. Ng'ekiseera ky'ekyeya kisembera, bangi balaba okukendeera kw'ettaka ly'okulundirako.
ach_prompt: Lupur tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom adwoki pa alokaloka piny I kom dyangi gi. Ka kare me oro dong cok, dano mapol tye ka neno ni ngom me pit tye ka dwogo piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Iyalongongoi akoriok noi nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae aijaikin ibaren kec. Neyapiete akamu, ewanyunitos itunga luipu ebe ekidiokoto alupok nu ekorio.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBa amvu ꞌyaꞌba ꞌdiyi ma asi otiza eꞌyo angu mile ojazu ꞌdiyiniri ma eꞌyosi anyapa yini ꞌdiyi ma dria ri ma dria tutu. Sa'wa eli vurisi ri ni ecaria, 'ba karakara eyi angu 'bani anyapa eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa beeyongyeire kwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'empindahinduka y'obwire aha matungo gaabo. Obwire bw'ekyanda ku burikuhika haihi, abantu baingi nibareeba okukyendeera kw'eitaka ry'okurya.

eng_prompt: As the temperatures rise and rainfall becomes scarce, farmers face significant challenges in maintaining their herds. The scarcity of grass and forage leads to increased reliance on purchased feed.
lug_prompt: Ebbugumu bwe lyeyongera n'enkuba bwe yeeyongera okukendeera, abalimi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kulabirira ebisibo byabwe. Ebbula ly'omuddo n'emmere y'ebisolo liviirako okwongera okwesigama ku mmere y'ebisolo eyaguliddwa.

teo_prompt: Neiyata adoketait na akwap ido ikidioko edou, etereikina akoriok keda atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka aidar ibarenakec. Akadakada na ekitoi ka inyamat luka ekoriok eyangauni eipuda lo agwel inyamat luka ekoriok.
lgg_prompt: Angu driza ni tuzu azini ozo ni ecazu weresi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyi ma ti eyi ma tambazu. Ori azini anyapa asea 'diyi ma ako ni fe 'bani asi 'bazu anyapa asea 'diyi ma jeza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obutagatsi ku burikweyongyera kandi enjura neetandika kukyendeera, abahingi n'abariisa nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kureeberera amatungo gaabo. Eibura ry'obunyasi n'ebyokurya by'enyamaishwa, nirituma abantu beeyongyera kwesiga ebyokurya ebirikugurwa.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous community meetings and feedback sessions, the concerns of residents have gone unaddressed. As a result, the municipality leaders have failed to plan for the district.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkiiko z'ekitundu eziwerako n'okuddamu ebibuuzo, ebyeraliikiriza abatuuze tebikoleddwako. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze ba munisipaali balemeddwa okuteekerateekera disitulikiti.

nyn_prompt: Oihireho enteerane z'abantu n'okugarukwamu ebiteekateeko, ebirikuteganisa abatuuragye tibirakozirweho. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi ba munisiparite, baremirwe kukora enteekateeka aha disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In order to build trust with the community, it is essential for the district to communicate openly about its operations. This includes sharing information about how services are delivered and the criteria used for decision-making.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuzimba obwesige mu bantu, kikulu nnyo disitulikiti okwogera mu lwatu ku mirimu gyayo. Kino kizingiramu okugabana obubaka ku ngeri obuweereza gye buweebwamu n'emitendera egikozesebwa mu kukola okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Me dongo gen ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal ni dictrwik omyero olok ki lwak i kom tic gi. Man kwako poko ngec i kom kit ma tic tye kawot kwede ki yoo me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kanu adukun amunokina kanejaas itunga, ejokuna noi edisitrikt einer nuikamunitos aswamisio ke. Imoriaritos ngun aimor akiro nuikamunitos eipone lo ijanakino ka iwaitin lu itwasamao kanu aitolomun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: Lezu asi'baza sizu ongulumu eyi ma eselea, eri orodriru distrikiti ni e'yo nzezu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria o'bi eyidri. Di ma alia o'duko awaza geri 'bani azakoma fele 'diyi fezu 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'bani e'yo 'duzu 'diyi ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kwombeka obwesigye omu bantu, disiturikiti eshemereire kugamba butunu ebirikukwata aha mirimo yaayo. Eki nikitwariramu okugabana amakuru agarikukwata aha ku obuheereza burikuheebwa hamwe n'emitendera erikukoresibwa omu kusharamu.

eng_prompt: In order to build trust within the community, it is essential for local officials to uphold ethical standards. One key aspect of this is ensuring that all processes are conducted openly and fairly.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuzimba obwesige mu kitundu, kyetaagisa abakungu b'ebyalo okukuuma emitindo gy'empisa. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kukakasa nti enkola zonna zitambuzibwa mu lwatu era mu bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Me dongo gen ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal pi lutic me tedero me lubu cik. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I lok man obedo neno ni yub weng kitimo I ada ki ada.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiduk amunokina kotunga, ejokuka eswamak luka atutubet aitup iponesio lukajokak. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu ngun ngesi awanyun ebe iswamao akiro kere koipone kalo ecai ido koipone kalo ajokuna.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu asi'baza sizu ongulumu eyi ma eselea, eri orodriru azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini adriza muke 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo azi okporu 'di ni ri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo dria 'diyi 'ye e'yo kokoru azini kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kwombeka obwesigye omu bantu, n'eky'omugasho abakuru omu byaro okukuratira emitindo y'emitwarize. Ekikuru munonga omuri eki n'okureeba ngu enkora yoona ekozirwe omu buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: To ensure a smooth and efficient resolution process, it's important to have all necessary documentation on hand. This includes any proof of purchase or transaction details.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa enkola y'okugonjoola ensonga mu bwangu n'obwangu, kyamugaso okubeera n'ebiwandiiko byonna ebyetaagibwa mu ngalo. Kino kitwaliramu obukakafu bwonna obw'okugula oba ebikwata ku kusuubulagana.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub me tyeko lok tye maber, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki karatac weng mamitte. Man kwako lanyut mo keken me wilo jami onyo lok matut I kom biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorio aitemokin ationis ejok, ejokuna ajaut keda apapula kere nu ekotoi. Imoriaritos nu ajenanut naka agwel keda akiro nuikamunitos agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru aa'zu kokobi dria lele 'diyi be ci. Di ma alia afa dria ecetaru afa jeza ma dria kani ku e'yo tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma dria 'diyi indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu enshonga zikozirwe kurungi, n'eky'omugasho kugira ebihandiiko byona ebirikwetengwa. Eki nikitwariramu obuhame bwona oburikworeka okugura n'okuguza ebintu.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed numerous irregularities in local government operations. Many residents have expressed their concerns about the lack of transparency and accountability among officials.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga obutali bwenkanya bungi mu mirimu gya gavumenti z'ebitundu. Abatuuze bangi balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'obutaba na bwerufu n'embalirira mu bakungu.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim maraco mapol tutwal I tic pa gamente me tedero. Lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom bedo peke pa ada ki kor tic ikin lutic.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma apuganisinei nu okwap. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus aica keda aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi karakara eyi gamete ele 'diyi ma alea. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ada azini geri azi ngazu 'diyi ma ako si.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bwingi omu mirimo ya gavumenti z'ebyanga. Abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'eibura ry'oburingaaniza n'embaririra omu bakungu.

eng_prompt: The government has launched a comprehensive investigation into allegations of misconduct. As a result, those found guilty of unethical practices will face legal consequences.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etandise okunoonyereza okujjuvu ku bigambibwa nti waliwo emize emibi. N'ekivuddemu, abo abasingisibwa emisango gy'ebikolwa ebitali bya mpisa bajja kufuna ebiva mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Gamente ocako kwed matut I kom adot me tim maraco. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma nongo gutimo tim ma pe ber gubi nongo adwogi me bal gi i kot.
teo_prompt: Ageu apugan aingic akiro nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok. Kanuka ngun, ngul lu ewanyunitai ebe iswamaete nu mam ejok epote adumun atiokisio nuka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Gamete e'do e'yo vuti ondaza dria e'yo 'bani ega kini 'ba 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria 'bo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'bani esu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi nga dri fu e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi be ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho okucondooza aha bikwatiraine n'emicwe mibi. N'ekyarugiremu, abo abarikushangwa baine emicwe etahikire, nibaija kutwarwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: In many cases, individuals and organizations exploit public resources for personal benefit. This often leads to a misallocation of funds and undermines the intended purpose of these initiatives.
lug_prompt: Ebiseera ebisinga, abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitongole bakozesa obubi ebintu by'olukale olw'ebigendererwa byabwe. Kino kitera okuvaako okugabanyizibwamu kw'ensimbi n'okutyoboola ekigendererwa ky'enteekateeka zino.
ach_prompt: I kare mapol, dano ki dule gitiyo ki jami pa lwak me nongo magoba gi. Man ipol kare kelo nywaro tic ki lim dok balo miti pa yub magi.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuipu, itunga keda iriongeta itwasamaete iboro luka apugan kanu ameda kec bon. Eyangauni ngin aitolitolio na ikapun ido itolitoli alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba eyi tualu amuti eyi pie afa o'bi eyini 'diyi ayu orodri eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe robia ayuza geri onzi si dika eri vini e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nde 'diyi 'yezu ri eza.
nyn_prompt: Obwire obwingi, abantu n'ebitongore nibikoresa kubi eby'obugaiga bw'abantu kwenda kwegasira. Eki buriijo nikireetaho okukoresa kubi esente kandi kikashiisha ekigyendererwa ky'enteekateeka ezi.

eng_prompt: Following a lengthy investigation into widespread bribery allegations, law enforcement officials took decisive action. As a result, the anti-corruption unit arrested several people.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku bigambibwa nti waliwo enguzi, abakuumaddembe baakola eky'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, ekitongole ekirwanyisa obuli bw'enguzi kyakwata abantu bangi.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac I kom lok me bito dano mapol tutwal, lutic ma gwoko cik gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma lwenyo I kom camcana omako dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic naepol noi nuikamunitos ecamusana loepol noi, apotu ipolisin kiswamata. Kanuka ngun, abu atukot naitepegit amidicio naka apiyai ikam itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu e'yo ti razani 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi 'du e'yo okporu. E'yo 'disi, amuti a'di 'dipi anyamgbolo beri bi 'ba karakara eyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa aha bigambibwa ngu hariho oburi bw'enguzi, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakakora eky'amaani. Ekyarugiremu,ekitongore ekirikurwanisa obushomankuzi kikakwata abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of government institutions relies heavily on the principles guiding their operations. Therefore, it is essential for those in public service to adhere to a strong ethical framework.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwesimbu bw'ebitongole bya gavumenti bwesigama nnyo ku misingi egirambika emirimu gyabyo. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso nnyo abo abali mu buweereza bwa gavumenti okugoberera emitendera eminywevu egy'empisa.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa gangi tic pa gamente jenge tutwalle I kom cik ma doro ticgi. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ki lutic pa gamente me lubu cik ma doro tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naeyait apugan, amunonoro naka iriongeta luka apugan esipokinitai noi kotoma ainapeta nuengarenikinitos aswamisiokec. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi ngul luejaasi toma aswam naka apugan aitup ainapeta nuegogong.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ada amuti gameteni 'diyini 'diyi asi'baza be okporu e'yo yini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dri cezu 'diyi ma dria. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba azi ngapi gamete be 'diyini azita okporu 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, oburingaaniza bw'ebitongore bya gavumenti nibugyendera aha misingye y'emirimo yaabo. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abo abari omu buheereza bwa gavumenti okukuratira engyenderwaho y'emitwarize.

eng_prompt: Many residents have expressed their frustration with the local leadership. Concerns about the district chairman's ability to effectively manage community issues have been growing.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe eri obukulembeze bw'ekitundu. Obweraliikirivu ku busobozi bwa ssentebe wa disitulikiti okukwasaganya obulungi ensonga z'ekitundu bweyongedde.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol gunyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom lutela me tedero. Lworo I kom twero pa won kom me district me doro lok pa lwak tye ka mede.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu itodutu amamut aiyalama kec keda engarenok lu ocaalo. Apolor aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos apedor naka apolon eicolong loka edisitrikt aitemonokin akiro nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku driceza angu 'da ma alea ri be. Asi otiza e'yo 'Bili ei distrikiti niri ni e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ma dria ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwetomboitwa kwabo ahabwebembezi b'ebyaro. Okwerarikirira aha bushoboorozi bwa mukuru w'entebe ya disiturikiti kukora aha nshonga z'abantu, kweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals seeking asylum, the government has implemented various support programs. One of these initiatives focuses on empowering refugees by facilitating their integration into the local economy.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu abanoonya obubudamu ogweyongera, gavumenti etadde mu nkola pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo ez'obuyambi. Ekimu ku bintu bino kwe kutumbula abanoonyiboobubudamu nga babayamba okwenyigira mu by'enfuna by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi wel luring ayela matye kamede, gamente okatti ki yub mapat-pat me miyo kony. Acel I kin yub magi tye me medo kero pa luring ayela kun weko gidonyo I biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol loka itunga luekotosi aibwot, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aitemonokineta nu erai aitigogong ikerai kowai lo aingarakin kes alomar toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba emunyaleru emunyaleru emunyale le'baa 'diyi niri ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba otita azakoma fezu 'diyi karakara. Otita azi alu 'diyi asi 'ba okpo feza emunyale eyini geri eyini eyini fizu e'yo robiani ogogo 'diyi ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka z'obuhwezi nyingi ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikushaba obuhungiro ogweyongyeire. Omwe aha nteekateeka ezi, nigugyenderera okutunguura empungi obwo barikubayamba kwejumba omu by'entaasya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: As the conflict in the region escalates, an increasing number of people are being displaced from their homes. It is crucial for the authorities to take immediate action to address the needs of these vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Ng'obukuubagano mu kitundu bweyongera, omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera okusengulwa okuva mu maka gaabwe. Kya mugaso nnyo ab'obuyinza okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okukola ku byetaago by'abantu bano abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Lweny matye I but lobo enoni tye ka medde, wel dano mapol tye ka kobo ki I gangi gi. Pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gutim gin mo oyot-oyot me cobo miti pa dano ma peko tye i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata ingungeta katutubet, iyata enaba lo itunga lu ekerete oreria kec. Erai ibore yenepol noi apedorosio aswam katipet kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, kalafe 'ba eyini acizu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ni tu ra. Eri orodriru okpo e'ipi eyini e'yo 'yezu mbeleru e'yo 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko omu kyanga ku burikweyongyera, omuhendo gw'abantu nigweyongyera kuruga omu maka gaabo. N'eky'omugasho ab'obushoborozi kukora ahonaaho kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating crisis, local authorities have been working tirelessly to find solutions for the influx of displaced individuals. As part of their efforts, the government has allocated resources to ensure that adequate shelter and support are available.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera, ab'obuyinza mu byalo babadde bakola butaweera okuzuula eby'okugonjoola okuyingira kw'abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube waabwe, gavumenti etaddewo eby'obugagga okukakasa nti aw'okusula n'obuyambi ebimala weebiri.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, lutela me tedero gubedo katic matek tutwal me nongo yoo me cobo peko me donyo pa luring ayela. Macalo but yub meggi, gamente omiyo jami ma mite me neno ni dano tye ki kabedo ki kony ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyatasi, eutasi apedorosio nuka atutubena aswam agogongu kanu aitemokin ationis naka itunga lu ekerete kotoma aiboisio kec. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamukec, abu apugan ijaik iboro kanu awanyun ebe ejai neperot keda agangat naedolit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'di ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru e'yo 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma esuta ma aza kozu. Okpo yini 'diyi ma azi ru, gamete 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi nezu ra kini jo azini atita capira 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro batwire nibakora n'amaani kuronda oburyo bw'okutereeza abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani gaabo,gavumenti ehaireyo eby'okukoresa okureeba ngu hariho oburaaro n'obuhwezi oburikumara.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure that the needs and perspectives of displaced communities are adequately represented, local organizations have sought input from those directly affected by the crisis. As a result, refugee leaders have been involved in the planning process.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube okulaba nti ebyetaago n'ebirowozo by'abantu ababundabunda bakiikirirwa bulungi, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byanoonyezza ebiteeso okuva mu abo abakoseddwa obutereevu obuzibu. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'abanoonyiboobubudamu beenyigidde mu nteekateeka.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni miti ki tam pa lwak ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi ki cung pigi maber, dul mapat-pat me tedero guyenyo tam ki bot jo ma peko eni ogudo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela pa luring ayela gubedo tye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu kanu awanyun ebe iboro keda aomisio nuka itunga luekerete kotoma aiboisio kec ebwoikitai ejok, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet ongicata aomisio kanejaas ngul luetirorit ationis ngin. Kanuka ngun, ejaas engarenok lu ikerai toma ainapeta ngun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu nezu ra kini 'ba pa tu e'yo 'bani le 'diyi ma dria kililiru, amuti angu ma alia 'diyi a'i egata engazu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'di ni 'diyi vu. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba emunyale eyini 'diyi fi otita 'da ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu ebyetaago hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'abantu ababingirwe nibijwekyerwa kurungi, ebitongore by'omubyaro byashaba obuhwezi kuruga omu bateganisiibwe oburemeezi. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'empungi bejumbire omu nteekateeka.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals, the government has implemented a support program aimed at fostering self-sufficiency among refugees. This initiative includes providing essential resources for agricultural development.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka ez'obuyambi ezigendereddwamu okutumbula okweyimirizaawo mu banoonyiboobubudamu. Enteekateeka eno erimu okuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa mu nkulaakulana y'ebyobulimi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel luring ayela, gamente okatti ki yub me konyo luring ayela wek gubed ki kero me tic pigi kengi. Yub man tye iye miyo jami ma mite pi dongo lobo me pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol loka ikerai, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuka aigang ikerai. Imoriarit ainapeta ngun aijanakin iboro lu epol ajokis kanu aitopol akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba emunyaleru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba otuta atita fezu emunyale eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma alia 'bani afa orodriru 'diyi fezu angu ezoma agirikica niri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'empungi ogweyongyeire,gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka y'okuhwera empungi kwebaisaho. Ekigyendererwa eki nikitwariramu okuheereza ebintu by'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the challenges posed by climate change and market fluctuations, a comprehensive training program was launched. This initiative aimed to empower local farmers with essential resources and support.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa okuva mu nkyukakyuka y'obudde n'enkyukakyuka mu katale, enteekateeka y'okutendekebwa okutwalira awamu yatongozebwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula abalimi b'omu kitundu n'ebintu ebikulu n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma bino macalo adwogi me alokaloka pa piny ki alokaloka me cuk, kicako yub me pwonye mapol. Yub man obedo me tyelo kor lupur me tedero ki kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuelomunete kanuka aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda ekuse keda aijulanakineta nuka esokoni, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuituutoonorere. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitigogong akoriok luka atutubet keda iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo angu mile ni ojazu tualu e'yo cuu ni ojazu 'diyi pie 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do otita imbatani 'diyi dria. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi dri okpo fezu afa ayuzaru azini atita orodriru 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obureesirweho empindahinduka y'obwire hamwe n'empindahinduka omu butare, puroguraamu y'okutendeka abantu ekatongozibwa. Ekigyendererwa kikaba kigyendereire kuheereza abahingi b'omubyaro obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent agricultural challenges faced by local farmers, the government has announced a new initiative to support crop production. As part of this effort, the Ministry of Agriculture will verify and supply planting materials.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyobulimi abalimi b'omu kitundu kwe basanga gye buvuddeko, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okuwagira okulima ebirime. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule y'ebyobulimi ejja kukakasa n'okugaba ebikozesebwa mu kusimba.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me pur ma lupur tye ka kato ki iye cokcok-ki, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me tyelo kor pur. Macalo but tic man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom pur bineno ki poko jami me pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka akoru nuetereikina keda akoriok luka atutubet, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigang akoru na iraan. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni erionget loka akor aanyun ka aikor iboro lu iraan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'dini atita fezu ori ezoza ni 'diyi dri. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu agirikicaniri nga afa ori sazu 'diyi ma ale andri azini awa ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa obu abahingi n'abariisa b'omwihanga batungire, gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani, minisiture y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa neija kuhamya n'okugaba ebintu by'okubyara.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals seeking safety, officials have recognized the urgent need for comprehensive support programs. As part of their humanitarian efforts, the government aims at improving the livelihoods of refugees.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'abantu ababundabunda nga banoonya obukuumi, abakungu bakitegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enteekateeka z'obuyambi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu, gavumenti eruubirira okutumbula embeera z'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi ka yenyo gwok, lutic guniang ni miti tye pi yub me miyo kony mapol. Macalo yoo acel me konyo dano, gamente tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka itunga luemamete aiboisio kec, ejenete eswamak eipud loka ainapeta nuka agangat. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamukec naka aingarakin itunga, ekoto apugan aitojokar aijar naka ikerai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma kalafe tupi angu ndapi 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba eyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu atita fezu 'ba dria 'diyi dri mbeleru ri ra. Okpo yini 'ba yi ma aza kozu ri ma azi ru, gamete le geri emunyale eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo ogweyongyeire ogw'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo barikuronda oburinzi, ab'eby'obutegyeki bareebire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutandikaho enteekateeka y'obuhwezi. Nk'emwe aha nkora yaayo y'okuhwera abantu, gavumenti negyenderera okutunguura emituurire y'empungi.

eng_prompt: The ecological importance of wetlands cannot be overstated, as they provide critical habitats for countless species and act as natural water filters. Preserving these unique ecosystems is essential for maintaining biodiversity and protecting our water resources.
lug_prompt: Omugaso gw'entobutonde gw'entobazi tegusobola kugambibwa, kubanga ziwa ebifo ebikulu eri ebika by'ebisolo ebitabalika era zikola nga eby'obutonde ebirongoosa amazzi. Okukuuma obutonde buno obw'enjawulo kya mugaso mu kukuuma obutonde obw'enjawulo n'okukuuma amazzi gaffe.
ach_prompt: Ber pa cwec ma orumu dagu pe kitwero cayo ne tutwal, pien gimiyo kabedo mapigi tego pi kwai jami mapat-pat mapol dok bene gitiyo macalo jami ma ngiyo pii. Gwoko jami makwo mapat-pat magi pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kwo pa jami makwo mapat-pat ki bene gwoko lonyo me pii.
teo_prompt: Mam epedorio aitetem ajokis naka isama, naarai einakinitos kesi aiboisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi iponesio luipu ido iswamaete kwape aiboisio nuka akipi. Aidar aijar naka isuban luitegelikina erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aijar naka itiang luegelegela ka aidar iboro lu akipi.
lgg_prompt: Ba econi orodri angu yiru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma omgbo otu ku, a'disiku eyi angu aa'zu 'diyi fe anyapa karakara eyini dika eyi azi nga ekile afa yi edepi 'diyi le. E'yo afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri eri orodriru afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini afa ama vile yi dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omugasho gw'ebisharara tigurikubaasa kugambwaho munonga, ahabw'okuba niguheereza emituurire y'ebintu ebitarikubarwa kandi nibikora nk'ebihweezo by'amaizi. Okurinda eby'obuhangwa ebi eby'omutaano n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa n'eby'amaizi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals due to conflict and climate change, the government has recognized the urgent need to assist refugees in rebuilding their lives. As part of this initiative, they have allocated resources to enhance agricultural productivity and vocational training programs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'abantu abasenguddwa olw'entalo n'enkyukakyuka y'obudde, gavumenti etegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, bawaddeyo eby'obugagga okutumbula ebyobulimi n'enteekateeka z'okutendeka abantu mu by'emikono.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi macalo adwogi me lweny ki alokaloka me piny, gamente oniang ni mite tutwal me konyo luring ayela me yubu kwo gi. Macalo but yub man, guketo lim me medo rwom me pur ki pwonye me tic cing.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka itunga luebwounitos kotoma aiboisio kec kanuka ingungeta keda aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe, abu apugan koany eipud loka aingarakin ikerai adukun aijarakec. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaikisi kesi iboro kanu aikeuna akoru keda aitutuoro na acoasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba emunyale eyini aa'zu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo angu mile ni ojazu 'diyisi risi risi, gamete esu e'yo 'bani le mbeleru emunyale eyi ma aza kozu eyi ma edri sizu o'diru ri ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, eyi 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu otita imbatani afa edele drisi 'diyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo nigweyongyera ahabw'entaro hamwe n'empindahinduka y'obwire, gavumenti eyorekire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okuhwera empungi kugaruka kwombeka amagara gaabo. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, bateireho eby'okukoresa okwongyera ahaby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'okutendeka eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: As discussions about the arrival of refugee communities began, many residents gathered to share their thoughts and concerns. Despite the challenges ahead, a sense of hope emerged among the locals regarding the potential for positive change.
lug_prompt: Okuteesa ku kutuuka kw'abanoonyiboobubudamu mu bitundu bwe kwatandika, abatuuze bangi baakuŋŋaana okugabana ebirowoozo byabwe n'ebibaluma. Ng'oggyeko okusoomoozebwa okwali mu maaso, essuubi lyasituka mu bantu b'omu kitundu ku bikwata ku busobozi bw'enkyukakyuka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma nywako lok I kom oo pa luring ayela ocake, lutedero mapol gugure me nywako tam gi ki peko gi. Kadi bed ni peko tye anyim, gen obedo tye ikin lutedero ma lubbe ki aloka loka matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Neageuna aineranara nuikamunitos adolun naka ikerai, apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos kanu aimor aomisiokec keda aiyalongongokec. Karaida ejaas atiokisio nuingaren, apotu itunga luka atutubet kojaunos keda amuno naepedori aitodolikin aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza angu emunyale eyini emuzu 'diyi ma dria ri ni e'doria, 'ba karakara eyi tra eyi egata eyivile 'diyi awazu. E'yo ewaru drilia 'diyi ma talasi, asi'baza efu 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea e'yo ojata kililiru ni ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura aha kuhika kw'empungi kukatandika, abatuuragye baingi baketeeranira hamwe kugamba ebiteekateeko byabo hamwe n'ebibarikuteekateeka. Oihireho oburemeezi oburi omu maisho, abantu b'omukyanga bakagira amatsiko ngu nihabaasa kubaho empinduka.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing number of refugees and their need for sustainable livelihoods, it is crucial to support their agricultural efforts. Access to quality resources can significantly enhance their ability to cultivate crops and rebuild their lives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku muwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bwabwe obw'okweyimirizaawo, kikulu nnyo okuwagira kaweefube waabwe mu byobulimi. Okufuna eby'obugagga eby'omutindo kisobola okutumbula ennyo obusobozi bwabwe okulima ebirime n'okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel luring ayela matye kamede ki miti gi me nongo yoo me kwo maber, pire tek tutwal me konyo tic gi me pur. Nongo jami ma rwom gi malo twero medo kero gi me puru cam ki yubu kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor enaaba loka ikerai keda eipudakec loka aijar, erai ibore yenepol noi aigangite aswam kec naka akor. Adumunun iboro luejokuka epedori aitojokar apedor kec naka akoru iraan ka aiduk aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe emunyale eyini tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi tualu e'yo eyini lezu geri eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa Afa orodriru 'diyi esuzu ri eco fe eyini ecozu ori ezozu dika eyi ma edri sizu o'diru ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'empungi ogweyongyeire hamwe n'ekyetengo kyabo ky'okutunga amagara marungi, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuhwera omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa bwabo. Okutunga ebintu by'omutindo, nikibaasa kwongyera amaani omu kuhinga n'okwombeka amagara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Given the scarcity of resources and the need for sustainable food sources, it is crucial for the refugees to find ways to support themselves. One viable solution is to utilize the land available to them for farming.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bbula ly'ebikozesebwa n'obwetaavu bw'ensibuko y'emmere ey'olubeerera, kikulu nnyo abanoonyiboobubudamu okunoonya engeri z'okweyimirizaawo. Ekimu ku biyinza okukolebwa kwe kukozesa ettaka lye balina okulima.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki nok pa jami ki miti me nongo cam maber, pire tek tutwal ki luring ayella me nongo yoo me gwokke. Yo acel maber aye me tic ki ngom ma gitye kwede me pur.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo ikidioko iboro keda eipud loka adumun inyamat lu eyuwara, ejok ikerai adumun iwaitin lu igangakinete kes ikulepek. Idiopebore yenepedori aitemokin ngun ngesi aitwasam alupok nuejaas kesi kanu akoru.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako ma e'yosi tualu lezu geri nyaka esuzu 'diyi pie, eri orodriru emunyale eyini geri eyini ecozu eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo azi ecopi ra 'diyi ma azi eri nyaku eyini aa'zu 'diyi ayuzu agirikica 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'obugaiga hamwe n'obwetengo bw'okuronda oburugo bw'eby'okurya, nikirungi empungi okuronda oburyo bw'okwekorera. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasika n'okukoresa eitaka eriho kuhinga.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing food crisis, officials announced a new initiative to support vulnerable communities. As part of this effort, the government has provided ten kilograms of maize to each person.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'emmere ekigenda mu maaso, abakungu baalangirira enteekateeka empya ey'okuyamba abantu abateesobola. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ewadde buli muntu kkiro kkumi ez'emmwaanyi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me cam matye kawot anyim, lutic gunyuto yub manyen me konyo kabedo ma can tye iye. Macalo but yub man, gamente omiyo kilo apar me anyogi bot ngat acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis na inyamat na elosi akonye, apotu eswamak kolimosi ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigang itunga lu ican. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaiki apugan itunga ikilo itomon luka emudunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru nyaka ni mupi drile ri ma aza kozu, azi'ba azi 'diyi azi e'yo azi o'diru ni atita fezu ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi dri. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, gamete fe kaka kilo mudri 'ba alu alu dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'okurya oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakungu bakarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera abantu abatarikwebaasa. Omu kaweefube ogu, gavumenti ehereize buri muntu kiro ikumi z'ebicoori.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing humanitarian crisis, it is crucial for the government to prioritize the needs of vulnerable populations. Ensuring that refugees have access to adequate resources is essential for their survival and integration into society.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'abantu obugenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo gavumenti okukulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu abateesobola. Okukakasa nti abanoonyiboobubudamu bafuna ebikozesebwa ebimala kya mugaso mu kuwangaala kwabwe n'okwegatta mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal ni gamente omyero oket miti pa dano ma goro obed gin ma pire tek. Neno ni luring ayela gunongo jami ma oromo pire tek tutwal pi kwo gi ki bedo tye ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na itunga, ejokuna apugan aisingarenit ipudesia luka itunga lu ican. Aanyun ebe edumunenete ikerai iboro lu edolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar kec ka aimorikikin keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria, eri orodriru gamete ni e'yo 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu okori 'duzu okporu. E'yo 'bani 'ba emunyaleru 'diyi dri afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu kililiru ri eri orodriru eyini aa'zu edriru azini eyini aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho, ni kikuru gavumenti kwebembeza ebyetengo by'abantu abatarikwebaasa. Okureeba ngu empungi zitunga eby'okukoresa ebirikumara, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okugumaho n'okuza omu bantu.

eng_prompt: I noticed you seem to be alone quite often. Is there something you'd like to share about your family?
lug_prompt: Nkirabye nti otera okulabika ng'oli wekka.
ach_prompt: Aneno ni ipol kare ibedo keni.
teo_prompt: Abu eong aany ebe esubit bala ijai jo bon duc.
lgg_prompt: Ma ndre kini mi ena kile mi a'dulesi sawa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Nketegyereize ngu nooshusha kuba ori wenka obwire obwingi.

eng_prompt: Access to clean and sufficient water is essential for the well-being of the population and the sustainability of food production. As climate change and population growth put increasing pressure on water resources, effective management becomes crucial.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo era agamala kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi bw'abantu n'okuyimirizaawo okufulumya emmere. Ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okukula kw'omuwendo gw'abantu byongera okunyigiriza eby'obugagga by'amazzi, enzirukanya ennungi yeeyongedde okuba ey'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng dok ma oromo pire tek tutwal pi kwo pa lwak ki dongo cam. Kit ma alokaloka me piny ki mede pa wel dano tye ka medo lyeto I kom jami me pii, tic maber tye gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ido nu edolitos ejok kanu aijar na itunga ka aitolom inyamat. Kwape aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda apol naka enaaba loka itunga einakinitos aiyatakin aiboisio nuka akipi, ibusakinit aitemonokin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Yi ala azini capira ri esuzu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke o'bi eyini ri ni azini nyaka ma edeta ni. E'yo angu mile ma ojatani azini kalafe tuzaniri ni e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, e'yo yi ma tambazu kililiru ri eca orodriru.
