Okuhinduka kw'embeera y'obwire hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu, nibireetaho oburemeezi ahabintu by'amaizi, n'ahabw'ekyo okukoresa gye amaizi n'eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing climate crisis and its impact on agriculture, officials have been exploring innovative solutions to support the farming community. After extensive research and consultations with agricultural experts, a new initiative has been proposed.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'embeera y'obudde ekigenda mu maaso n'engeri gye kikosaamu ebyobulimi, abakungu babadde banoonya engeri empya ez'okuyambamu abalimi. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okwebuuza ku bakugu mu byobulimi, enteekateeka empya eteereddwawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me piny matye kawot anyim ki adwoki ne I kom pur, lutic gubedo ka yenyo yoo manyen me konyo lupur. Ingee kwed matut ki lok ki ludiro me pur, kimiyo tam manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ekuse keda ecae lo akwap keda epone lo etiroritor akoru, eutasi eswamak aimo iwaitin lu igangakino akoriok. Akaulo naka aingic ka aingitun ipirioitin luka akor, aponi kitolomunai aomisioit naitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu mile ni muzu drile ri ma e'yosi azini e'yo erini 'ye agirikica ma dria ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi ebi geri o'diru 'diyi onda 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi atizu. E'yo vuti ondaza angiri ma vutia azini e'yo nzeza 'ba nita be e'yo agirikica ma dria angiri 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, 'ba fe egata e'yo azi o'diruni ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embeera y'obwire oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abakungu batwire nibasherura oburyo bw'okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa. Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga n'okwebuuza aha bakugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, enteekateeka ensya eteirweho.

eng_prompt: Despite efforts to improve educational standards in the region, many challenges persist. A significant concern is the skill level of educators, which directly impacts the quality of instruction.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza mu kitundu, okusoomoozebwa kungi kukyaliwo. Ekintu ekikulu ekyeraliikiriza bwe bukugu bw'abasomesa, ekikosa obutereevu omutindo gw'okusomesa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tute tye me ilo malo rwom me kwan I but lobo eni, peko mapol pud tye. Gin ma pire tek tutwal obedo rwom me diro pa lupwonye, ma man balo rwom me pwony.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar adoketait na asioman kotoma aiboisit, ipu atiokisio nu eringa ejaas. Ationis naepol noi nes adoketait na acoa naka esisianakinak, na itopoloori adoketait na aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo onita ma omgbo otuzu angu 'di ma alea ra ti, e'yo ewaru karakara eyi nga po'di ci. E'yo azi okporu ni ondua imba'ba eyini ri i, dika e'yo 'di ni onita ma wura 'ye onzi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okutunguura omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese omu kyanga, hariho oburemeezi bwingi. Ekikuru n'emyoga y'abegyesa, ekirikukwata aha mutindo gw'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Recent assessments have revealed concerning trends in academic achievement among young learners. Educators and parents alike are increasingly worried about the declining performance of students in primary schools.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga engeri abaana abato gyebayitamu mu byensoma. Abasomesa n'abazadde beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'okugwa kw'ensoma y'abayizi mu masomero ga pulayimale.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni rwom me kwan pa lutino tye ka medde anyim. Lupwonye ki lunyodo gitye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma lutino kwan tye kadok piny I gang kwan me puraimari.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan lo idwe lu isisiaete. Isisianakinak keda auriak kes iyalongongosi kanu eswamae loaronon lo idwe kosomeroi luko puraimare.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo sukulu anzi nyiri eyini agazu sukulu'a ri ma dria ra. Imba'ba eyi tualu tipika eyi pie eyi asi otiza be sukulu anzi eyi ma agata sukulu piraimari ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entunguuka omu kwega kw'abaana bato. Abeegyesa hamwe n'abazaire, beerarikirire ahabw'okukyendeera kw'emishomo y'abeegi omu mashomero ga puraimare.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions and workshops aimed at enhancing educational strategies, the results have been disappointing. Many educators feel overwhelmed and uncertain about how to effectively address the challenges facing their students.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi n'emisomo egigendereddwamu okutumbula enkola z'ebyenjigiriza, ebivuddemu tebibadde birungi. Abasomesa bangi bawulira nga bazitoowereddwa era nga tebalina bukakafu ku ngeri y'okukwatamu obulungi ebisoomooza abayizi baabwe bye basanga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni nywako lok ki kacoke me pwonye mapol obedo tye pi ilo malo rwom me kwan, adwogi ne pe obedo ber tutwal. Lupwonye mapol giwinyo ni tic obwoyogi tutwal dok pe gi ngeyo kit me tyeko peko ma lutino kwan gi tye ka kato iye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ineresinei keda airiamununeta nu ekotore aitojokar ewai lo aisisia, mam akiro nuelomunitos iswamauna ejok. Isisianakinak luipu epupete epone loepedoria kesi aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas esisiak kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini otita imbatani karakara 'bani lezu geri onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo efupi 'diyi ebi ovu asi nyoza ru. Imba'ba karakara eyi ama e'yo eyi ma dria saaru dika eyi nini geri eyini ecozu e'yo ewaru sukulu anzi eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuhanuura kwingi n'emishomo erikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obwegyese, ebirugiremu tibirikureebeka gye. Abeegyesa baingi nibahurira baine oburemeezi bwingi kandi tibarikumanya oku bashemereire kukora ahaburemeezi obu abeegi baabo barikurabamu.

eng_prompt: In a rapidly changing world, educators recognized the importance of preparing their students for future challenges. They designed innovative curricula that fostered critical thinking and creativity.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekyukakyuka amangu, abasomesa bakitegedde obukulu bw'okuteekateeka abayizi baabwe okwanganga okusoomoozebwa mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Baakola enteekateeka y'ebisomesebwa ey'obuyiiya eyakuza endowooza ey'obwegendereza n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma aloka-loka tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, lupwonye oniang ber pa yubu lutino gi pi peko me anyim. Guyubu yub me pwonye manyen ma weko dano tamo maber dok giyubu jami manyen.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ijulakina katipet, apotu isisianakinak kojenutu ajokis naka aitemonokin esisiak kec kanuka atiokisio nuka oingaren. Apotu kesi itolomutu aisisiaeta nuitetiak nu isisianakinete itunga aomisio ka acoa.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ojapi mbeleru 'di ma alea, imba'ba eyi esu orodri sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi otuzu e'yo ewaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyini. Eyi ede otita onita ni o'diru 'diyi eyini ani ecozu e'yo egazu kililiru azini e'yo eyi edezu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikuhinduka juba, abeegyesa nibamanya omugasho gw'okutebeekanisa abeegi baabo okurwanisa oburemeezi bw'omumaisho. Bakakora engyenderwaho y'okwegyesa ey'omutaano erikureetaho okwetegyereza n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, knowledge and skills are more important than ever. Understanding the value of education can empower individuals and communities to thrive.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, okumanya n'obukugu bya mugaso nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kibadde. Okutegeera omugaso gw'okusoma kusobola okuwa abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu amaanyi okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot ni, ngec ki diro pire tek tutwal. Niang ber pa kwan twero konyo dano ki kabedo me dongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, epolok noi acoa keda acoa. Ajenun ajokis na asioman epedori aitigogong itunga keda atutubena kanu apol.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia ojata mbeleru ma alia, ondua azini ondua yi orodriru aga oku driorisi. Onita ma orodri vaza eco 'ba alu alu azini ongulumu yi dri okpo fe zozu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, okumanya n'emyoga n'eby'omugasho munonga. Okwetegyereza omugasho gw'obwegyese nikibaasa kuhwera abantu n'ebyanga kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, the role of educators has never been more crucial. They play a vital part in shaping the future by equipping students with the knowledge and skills they need to succeed.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, omulimu gw'abasomesa tegubanga gwa mugaso nnyo nga bwe guli kati. Bakola omulimu munene mu kubumba ebiseera by'omu maaso nga bawa abayizi amagezi n'obukugu bwe beetaaga okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma aloka-loka tye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal, tic pa lupwonye pe obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Gitye ki tic mapire tek tutwal me yubu anyim pa lutino kwan kun gimiyo itgi ngec ki diro ma mite me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, mam aswam naka isisianakinak erai naepol noi. Iswamaete kesi aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun ingaren kosodete aijaikin esisiak acoa na ekotosi kesi kanu akerianar.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, azi imba'ba eyini ri ma orodri aa'ni ndra okporu 'dini ku. Eyi azi okporu nga ewu drialeri edezu eyini sukulu anzi eyini ondua fezu eyini ani agata esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga,omurimo gw'abegyesa tigukabaire guri ogw'omugasho munonga. Nibakora omurimo gw'omugasho omu kutebeekanisa ebiro bya nyensya, obwo barikuhereza abeegi okumanya n'emyoga ei barikwetenga kubaasa kusingura.

eng_prompt: During the recent staff meeting, the administration emphasized the importance of preparing students for their future paths. They highlighted the need for a structured approach to both career guidance and effective lesson planning.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'abakozi olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okuteekerateekera abayizi emirimu gyabwe egy'omu maaso. Baalaga obwetaavu bw'enkola entegeke ey'okulungamya ku mirimu n'enteekateeka ennungi ey'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke pa lutic ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me yubu lutino kwan pi ngo ma gubi timo ikare me anyim. Guwaco ni omyero kibed ki yoo maber me miyo tira i kom ngo ma omyero I tim ki yub maber me pwonye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka eswamak pac, abu eyaitene kitogogong ajokis naka aitemonokin esisiak kanuka aswamukec naka oingaren. Apotu kesi kitetemoto eipud loka aitolot ainapeta nuka aingarenikin nuka aswam keda aitemonokin aisisiaeta.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi azi'ba eyini o'diru ri ma alea, driceza 'da fe okpo orodri sukulu anzi eyi otuzu geri eyini muzu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyisi ri ma dria. Eyi ece e'yo lezu geri 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria imbata fezu e'yo eyini lezu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria tualu otita kililiru 'bani 'ba eyi imbazu 'diyi otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'abakozi orwabaireho juba, abebembezi b'eishomero bakahamya omugasho gw'okutebeekanisa abeegi ahabw'emirimo yaabo y'omumaisho. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okutandikaho omuringo murungi gw'okuhabura abeegi aha mirimo yaabo hamwe n'okuteekateekyera gye amashomo gaabo.

eng_prompt: Effective collaboration between educators and administrators is essential for fostering a positive learning environment. By aligning their goals and strategies, they can create a framework that supports student success.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana ennungi wakati w'abasomesa n'abakulembeze ya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi. Nga bakwataganya ebiruubirirwa byabwe n'obukodyo, basobola okutondawo enkola ewagira obuwanguzi bw'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Ribbe maber ikin lupwonye ki ludito pwonye pire tek tutwal pi dongo kabedo maber me kwan. Ka guyubu yub gi ki yoo gi, gitwero yubu yoo me konyo lutino kwan me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aiswamanara naejok kiding isisianakinak keda engarenok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria aiboisit najokan naka aisisia. Kowai lo aitirian alosikineta kec keda iwaitin kec, epedorete kesi aitolomun iwaitin lu igangakitos esisiak akerianut.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita kililiru imba'ba eyi ma eselea drice'ba eyi pie ri eri orodriru angu onita ni muke ri ma omgbo otuzu. Asisile eyivile 'diyi ma eselea geri eyini eyi 'yezu 'diyi pie, eyi eco geri sukulu anzi eyini agazu ra 'diyi e'do ra.

eng_prompt: Proper nutrition plays a crucial role in a child's ability to focus and learn effectively. When students are nourished, they are more likely to engage actively in their lessons.
lug_prompt: Endya ennungi ekola omulimu munene mu busobozi bw'omwana okussaayo omwoyo n'okuyiga obulungi. Abayizi bwe baliisibwa obulungi, batera okwenyigira ennyo mu misomo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Cam maber konyo tutwal I keto cwiny ki kwan pa lutino. Ka lutino tye ka nongo cam maber, ci gibiketo cwinygi tutwal I pwonye gi.
teo_prompt: Ainyam najokan erai ibore yenepol noi lo ingarakit idwe apodokinit ka aisisia ejok. Arai enyamete idwe ejok, epedorete kesi alomar toma aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka nyaza kililiru ri eri orodriru mva ma okpo fezu asi 'bazu azini onita onizu kililiru. Sukulu anzi ka nyaka nya kililiru, yi nga fi e'yo onitani 'diyi ma alia avasi.
nyn_prompt: Okurya kurungi nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omumagara g'omwana okuta omutima n'okwega kurungi. Abeegi kubarya kurungi, nibabaasa kwejumba omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a recent evaluation of educational outcomes, it was revealed that several institutions struggled to meet basic academic benchmarks. As a result, some schools failed to produce a single first grade.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya ebivudde mu by'enjigiriza gyebuvuddeko, kyazuulibwa nti amatendekero mangi gafuba okutuukiriza emitendera gy'ebyenjigiriza egy'omusingi. N'ekyavaamu, amasomero agamu galemererwa okufulumya ekibiina ekisooka.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma otime cokcok-ki I kom rwom me kwan, kinongo ni gangi kwan mapol tye ka yele me cobo miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mukene pe gunongo lutino kwan me kilac acel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airereonor eswamae lo asioman, aponi kojenunai ebe etiono isomeroi luipu aitodolikin adoketait na aisisia. Kanuka ngun, apotu isomeroi icie ipikosi aitolomun eguredi losodit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, 'ba esu kini pari onita ni karakara 'diyi dri ci e'yo onita ni okporu 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, sukulu azi 'diyi awini sukulu anzi kilasi okori ofu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushwijuma eby'obwegyese okwabaireho juba, kikareebeka ngu amatendekyero maingi gakaba nigateganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'obwegyese. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero agamwe gakaremwa kushohoza ekibiina ky'okubanza.

eng_prompt: To foster a collaborative educational environment, it is essential to consider the perspectives and needs of all stakeholders. Engaging both parents and learners can lead to more effective and inclusive decision-making in schools.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula embeera y'okusoma ey'okukwatagana, kya mugaso okulowooza ku ndowooza n'ebyetaago by'abo bonna abakwatibwako. Okwenyigiramu kw'abazadde n'abayizi kusobola okuviirako okusalawo okulungi mu masomero.
ach_prompt: Me kelo kabedo me kwan ma ribe tye iye, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom tam ki miti pa dano weng matye iye. Bedo tye pa lunyodo ki lutino kwan twero weko moko tam I gangi kwan bedo ber dok bene konyo lutino weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor ewai lo aisisia lo imorikikina, ejokuna aomoom nu aomisio ka ipudesia luka itunga kere. Aimorikikin auriak keda esisiak epedori ayangaun aitolomunun aseununeta nuajokak kosomeroi.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita ni tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba dria ma egata azini afa lele 'diyi ma dria egazu. Tipika eyi tualu sukulu anzi eyi pie ri eco fe e'yo eyi 'yezu kililiru sukulu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho okukwatanisa omu by'obwegyese, n'eky'omugasho okureeba emiteekateekyere n'ebyetengo by'abantu boona. Okutwariramu abazaire n'abeegi, nikibaasa kureetaho okusharamu kurungi omu mashomero.

ach_prompt: Pi medo rwom me kwan maber, pire tek tutwal ni gangi omyero gubed ki miti i kom kwan pa lutino gi. Bedo tye ikit ma gudongo kwede twero medo tek cwiny gi ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisit na isisiaet na igangit, ejokuka ikalia aswam kagogong kotoma asioman naka idwekec. Aswam nepepe keda apolokec epedori aitojokar aisinyikokinit kec keda aitodolikinio kec.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita ni atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru familia eyini asi 'bazu eyi ma anzi eyi ma onita ma dria okporu. E'yo 'yezu eyi ma zota be ri eco ava fe eyidri tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega, n'eky'omugasho amaka kwejumba omu kwegyesa abaana baabo. Okwejumba omu ntunguuka yaabo nikibaasa kwongyera amaani n'obusinguzi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, the value of knowledge and skills cannot be overstated. It is essential for young people to understand how education shapes their future opportunities and personal growth.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, omuwendo gw'amagezi n'obukugu tegusobola kugambibwa nnyo. Kya mugaso nnyo abavubuka okutegeera engeri okusoma gye kukwatamu ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso n'okukulaakulana kwabwe.

teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, mam epedorio aitogogong ajokis naka acoa keda acoa. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu atumunak amisikin epone loepedoriata asioman aitolomun arerengusio kec nuka oingaren keda apol.

nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga,omugasho gw'obwengye n'obwegyese tigurikubaasa kugambwa munonga. N'eky'omugasho munonga eminyeeto kwetegyereza oku obwegyese burikubareetera emigisha omu biro by'omumaisho hamwe n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about student well-being, the local government has prioritized initiatives aimed at improving community resources. As part of this effort, the district officials look at providing enough food and quality education.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku mbeera y'abayizi, gavumenti y'ebitundu ekulembezza enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebyetaago by'ekitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakungu ba disitulikiti batunuulira okugaba emmere emala n'okusomesa okw'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom kwo pa lutino kwan, gamente me tedero oketo cwinygi I kom yub mapat-pat matye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me lonyo pa lwak. Macalo but tic man, lutic me district tye ki miti me miyo cam ma oromo ki kwan me rwom mamalo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naepol noi naikamunit aijar naka esisiak, abu apugan naka atutubet isingarenit aitojokar iboro luka atutubet. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ekotosi eswamak luko disitrikt aijanakin inyamat lu edolitos ka asioman na adoketait na abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi sukulu anzi eyi ma edri ma dria risi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'ba okpo e'yo ndundu eyini lezu afa o'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi le nyaka fezu capirisi azini onita muke ri fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha magara g'abeegi, gavumenti y'ebyaro eteire omutwe omu nteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eby'obugaiga omu byaro. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, abakuru aha disiturikiti nibaronda eby'okurya ebirikumara hamwe n'obwegyese burungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve educational standards, the school board conducted a thorough review of teacher performance across the district. As a result of their findings, they decided to take action regarding certain staff members.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza, akakiiko k'essomero kaakola okwekenneenya okw'amaanyi ku nkola y'abasomesa mu disitulikiti yonna. Olw'ebyo bye baazuula, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo ku bakozi abamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan, dul ma doro lok kom gangi kwan gutimo kwed matut I kom kit ma lupwonye tye katimo kwede I district. Macalo adwogi me gin ma gunongo, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo I kom lutic mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar adoketait na asioman, abu eyaitene lo esomero irereonor eswamae lo isisianakinak ko disitrikt. Kanu adumuneta kec, apotu kesi koseutu aswam nuikamunitos eswamak ice.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu, amuti sukulu ni 'diyi andri imba'ba eyi ma agata distrikiti 'da ma alea ndulu. E'yo yini esu 'diyi ma e'yosi, eyi 'du e'yo 'du azi'ba azi 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, a prominent member of the government was reported missing under suspicious circumstances. Authorities launched an investigation, revealing that the parliamentarian had been taken into custody just days before their disappearance.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'entiisa, omubaka wa gavumenti omututumufu yategeezebwa nti yabula mu mbeera eziteeberezebwa. Ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza, ne bakizuula nti ababaka ba paalamenti baali bakwatiddwa ng'ebula ennaku ntono babula.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, lamemba ma oywek tutwal I gamente orweny I yoo ma pe ngene. Luloc gucako kwed, ma onyuto ni lumemba me parliament onongo kimakogi I buc nino manok ma peya gurwenyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka akiro, aponi kolimorai ebe emamei emeeba loejok noi kotoma apugan. Apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic, itodunit ebe aponi ikamarai emeeba loka airabet apaarasia adis eringa kesi emamiatatar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alia, 'ba ece kini 'ba azi okporu gamete ma alia ni avi e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyisi ra. Okpo e'ipi e'do vuti ondaza, ece kini 'ba 'du agu azi ngapi paliamentia 'da arujoa o'du were de nga po'di eyi avi ku.

eng_prompt: Following a lengthy investigation into allegations of corruption, the authorities took decisive action. As a result, the parliamentarian was charged after being arrested.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku bigambibwa nti waliwo obuli bw'enguzi, ab'obuyinza baakola eky'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, omubaka wa paalamenti yavunaanibwa oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac I kom adot me camcana, lutela gumoko tam gi. Macalo adwogi ne, ki ngolo kop iwi lamemba me parliament I nge make.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic naepol noi nuikamunitos amidicio naka apiyai, apotu apedorosio kiswamata. Kanuka ngun, aponi itepesenai emeeba loka airabet akaulo na aikamanario.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo okporu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba li e'yo 'ba azi ngapi paliamentia 'da ma dria 'bani eri obizu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza obwire buraingwa aha bigambibwa ngu hariho obushomankuzi, ab'obushoborozi bakakora eky'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, omukiiki omwishengyero akajunanwa bwanyima y'okukwatwa.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the city as protesters gathered to voice their anger over recent government policies. In a shocking turn of events, the situation spiraled out of control when some individuals began throwing stones at the presidential motorcade.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kibuga nga abekalakaasi bakungaana okulaga obusungu bwabwe olw'enkola za gavumenti ezaakaggwa. Mu ngeri ey'ekikangabwa, embeera yava mu buyinza abantu abamu bwe baatandika okukuba amayinja mu mmotoka za pulezidenti.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I boma ne ikare ma lujemo gugure me nyutu akemo gi I kom cik pa gamente ma okatti cokcok-ki. I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, jami okato marac tutwal I kare ma dano mogo gucako celo mutoka pa ladit lobo ki got.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos koibuga naarai apotu ediyak kotukokinos kanu aitodiar anyunyurakec kanuka ainapeta nuka apugan. Kotoma aijulakineta nuapotu kotakanutu, abu ejautene itolitol neageuna icetunga aicak amoru mama ejaasi amotokan nuka lokapolon akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tu aku ambu city niri ma alea 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi ni eyi tra eyini eyi ma awoko ecezu e'yo gamete ni o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'da eca ewaru 'ba azi 'diyi ni e'doria oni 'bezu mutukari purezidenti ni 'diyi ma dria.

Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, embeera ekaruga omu butegyeki abantu bamwe ku batandikire kubinga amabaare omu motoka z'omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In a society where trust between law enforcement and the community is essential, it is crucial to prioritize the well-being of individuals during interactions. Ensuring that officers approach each situation with empathy and understanding can foster a safer environment for everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu omuli obwesige wakati w'abakuumaddembe n'abantu, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obulungi bw'abantu mu nkolagana. Okukakasa nti abakungu bakolagana ne buli mbeera n'okusaasira n'okutegeera kisobola okutumbula embeera ennungi eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma gen ikin dul ma gwoko cik ki lwak pire tek tutwal, pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo pa dano ikare me winye ikin dano. Neno ni abili ocobo peko ki peko ki cwiny me kica ki niang twero weko kwo bedo ber pi dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejai amunokina kiding ipolisin keda itunga, ejokuna noi aisingarenit aijar naka itunga. Aanyun ebe elosenenete ipolisin ejautene ngol keda asianut ka amisiikin epedori ayangaun aiboisit na eyuwara kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'bani asi'baza 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu eyi pie ri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni aa'zu muke ri 'duzu okporu sa'wa eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea risi. Geri azi'ba eyini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu e'yo eyi ma dria asi ndriza azini vata si ri ni angu 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini aa'zu ageitema be ri ma omgbo otu.

Okureeba ngu ba ofiisa nibatwara buri mbeera n'embabazi n'okwetegyereza, nikibaasa kureetaho obusingye bw'abantu boona abarikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation into corruption allegations, the authorities finally gathered enough evidence to take action. Tensions rose as the public awaited the outcome of the high-profile case.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi nga banoonyereza ku bigambibwa nti waliwo obuli bw'enguzi, ab'obuyinza baasobola okukungaanya obujulizi obumala okusobola okubaako kye bakolawo. Obunkenke bwalinnya ng'abantu balindirira ebinaava mu musango ogw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok me camcana pi dwe mapol, lutela gunongo caden ma oromo me timo gin mo. Lworo omedde ikare ma lwak tye kakuru adwogi me pido madit ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aingic akiro nu ecamusana, apotu apedorosio odumutu aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aswam ngun. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai autasi itunga aidar akiro nuka emusago loapolon.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo vuti ondaza e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba eyi oku asizu afa ecetaru 'diyi e'yo 'yezu. Asi otiza tu o'bi eyi ma eselea eyini e'yo efupi kesi okporu 'da ma alea ri te ria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza aha bigambibwa ngu hariho obushomankuzi, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera kurundaana obuhame oburikumara kugira ngu habeho ekyokukora. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'abantu kutegyereza ebyarugire omu mushango gw'amaani.

eng_prompt: Following a thorough investigation into allegations of misconduct, the authorities have decided to take legal action. As a result, the parliamentarian will be charged in the courts of law.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku bigambibwa nti waliwo emize emibi, ab'obuyinza basazeewo okutwala omusango mu kkooti. N'ekinaavaamu, omubaka wa paalamenti ajja kuvunaanibwa mu mbuga z'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom adot me tim maraco, lutela gumoko tamgi me cako tic I kot. Macalo adwogi ne, ki bi ngolo kop iwi lamemba me parliament I nyim kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok akiro nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok, aseutu apedorosio aitolot nu ekisil. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitepesen emeeba loka airabet adieket.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru e'yo 'bani ega kini 'ba 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'du e'yo 'duzu azita palaa. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga agu azi ngapi paliamentia 'da to kotia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza munonga ebirikugambwa ngu hariho emicwe mibi, ab'obushoborozi bashaziremu kutwara omushango omu biragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, omukiiki omwishengyero naija kujunaanwa omu kooti z'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In light of recent threats and rising tensions, the government held an emergency meeting to discuss safety measures. As a result, officials emphasized the importance of ensuring adequate protection for all elected representatives.
lug_prompt: Olw'okutiisibwatiisibwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera, gavumenti yatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okuteesa ku ngeri y'okukuumamu obulamu bw'abantu. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu baakikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukakasa obukuumi obumala eri abakiise abalonde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bura ma okato cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamedde, gamente obedo ki kacoke ma opoto atura me nywako tam i kom kit me gwoko kuc. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me gwoko luwang lwak ma kiyero gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aitukurianeta nupac keda aiyalongong, abu apugan ingalau airiamunet na engeso kanu aitemitem nuka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamak kitogogongoto ajokis na ayuarite abwoikinitok kere lu eseunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo uri gbaza o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi pie, gamete 'ye mitingi mbeleru e'yo nzezu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba 'da eyi 'ba okpo e'yo ageitema fezu 'ba dria 'bani ope eyi ma paria 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutiinatiinisa okwabaireho obwahati hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire,gavumenti ekakora orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kuhanuura ahaby'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, abakungu bakahamya omugasho gw'okurinda kurungi abantu boona abaronzirwe.

eng_prompt: Given the circumstances surrounding the case and the lack of flight risk, it is reasonable to consider alternative measures. Therefore, the court should evaluate the possibility of granting the parliamentarian a court bail.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mbeera eyeetoolodde omusango n'obutaba mu katyabaga k'okudduka, kya magezi okulowooza ku ngeri endala. N'olwekyo, kkooti erina okulowooza ku ky'okusumulula omubaka wa paalamenti ku kakalu ka kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngo ma otimme I kom lok eni ki peko me ngwec, obedo ber tutwal me tamo I kom yoo mukene. Pi meno, kot omyero otam matut kace twere me weko lamemba me parliament bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo ajaut keda akiro nuikamunitos emusago ngol keda amamus na atiokisio nuka akerit, ejokuna aomoom iponesio ice. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit ekooti airereor ationis naka alacakin emeeba loka airabet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kesi 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'bani ecozu apazu ku ri ma dria, eri e'yo kililiru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu geri azi 'diyi ma dria. Ka'dini, le koti ma one e'yo 'bani ecozu 'ba azi ngapi paliamentia 'diyi ofuzu azita pala ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera eyabaire eriho omu mushango ogu hamwe n'obutabaho bw'akabi k'okutoroka, nikiba kiri eky'omugasho kuteekateeka aha mihanda endiijo. N'ahabw'ekyo,kooti eshemereire kushwijuma oburyo bw'okwikiriza omukiiki omwishengyero kwemerererwa.

eng_prompt: Following a series of controversial statements and actions, the local authorities decided to take legal action against the elected official. As tensions rose in the community, the parliamentarian was charged and tried in Arua.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ebigambo n'ebikolwa eby'enjawulo ebirimu enkaayana, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baasalawo okutwala omukungu omulonde mu mbuga z'amateeka. Obunkenke bweyongera mu kitundu, omubaka wa paalamenti yavunaanibwa era n'awozesebwa mu Arua.
ach_prompt: I ngee lok ki tim mapat-pat makelo apoka-poka, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me cako tic i kom lutic ma kiyero gi. I kare ma telle omedde I kin lwak, lamemba me parliament kimoro adot I kome dok kipido I kome I Arua.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akiro keda aswamisio nuipu nuetioko, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet koseutu aitepesen eswaman loeseunitai. Neyatakinor atiokisio kotoma atutubet, aponi itepesenai emeeba loka airabet kosodete aitepesen ko Arua.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza azini 'yeta karakara 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'duzu 'ba opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria. Erita ako ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, 'ba ombe agu azi ngapi paliamentia 'da ma dria azini 'ba obi eri Arua.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebigambo hamwe n'ebikorwa bitari bimwe na bimwe, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakasharamu kutwara omukungu otoorainwe omu kooti. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu bantu, omukiiki omwishengyero akajunaanwa kandi yahurira orubanja rwe omuri Arua.

eng_prompt: After being charged with corruption, the high-profile politician arrived at the courthouse surrounded by reporters. As the cameras flashed, he prepared to make his case in front of the chief magistrate.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuggulwako emisango gy'obuli bw'enguzi, munnabyabufuzi ono omututumufu yatuuse mu kkooti nga yeetooloddwa bannamawulire. Nga kkamera zibwatuka, yeetegekera okuwa ensonga ye mu maaso g'omulamuzi omukulu.
ach_prompt: Inge adot me camcana, lacungu iwi bye ma oywek ni oo I ot kot ma lucoo lok angea orumu kome. I kare ma camera tye ka ryeny, en oyubbe me miyo adot mege inyim langolkop madit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na iwosatai kanu amidicio naka apiyai, abu etunganan loapolon kodol adieket elukunitos arotak iyemuto. Neautar akameran aica, abu ngesi okapakina aijaikin emusagoke mama ejai atubon loapolon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eri tozu e'yo anyamgbolo nirisi 'bori ma vutia, 'ba politiki ni okporu 'da eca dwani joa 'ba osisiani 'diyi ma kalasi kuru. Kamera eyini e'daria, eri otu i e'yo nzezu drile 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma drilea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okujunanwa omushango gw'obushomankuzi, ow'eby'obutegyeki orikumanywa munonga akahika omu kooti ayetorwaire abanyamakuru. Kkamera ku zaabaire nizikyerereera, akeeteekateekyera kugamba omushango gwe omu maisho g'omuramuzi omukuru.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy hearing, the judge determined that the evidence presented did not warrant a cash bail. As a result, the member of parliament was granted a non-cash bail of fifty million.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira omusango okumala ekiseera ekiwanvu, omulamuzi yakizuula nti obujulizi obwalagibwa tebwetaagisa kusasula kakalu ka kkooti ssente. N'ekyavaamu, omubaka wa paalamenti yakkirizibwa okweyimirirwa ku bukadde ataano.
ach_prompt: Ingee winyo lok pi kare malac, langol kop omoko ni caden ma kimiyo ni pe mite me nongo cente me bedo mabuc mawoko. Macalo adwogi ne, kiyee ki lamemba me parliament me bedo mabuc mawoko me ciling milyon pyer abic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apupio na apak naepol noi, abu ekatubon kotema ebe mam aitogogongoret naetodiaritai itodunit ebe ibusakinit ngesi alacakin ikapun. Kanuka ngun, aponi kocamakinai emeeba loka airabet alacakin imilioni akaisakany.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizuri ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri 'du e'yo kini afa ecetaru 'bani e'da 'diyi lepi 'ba ma ofu i arujoarisi ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ofu memba koloseni ni 'da arujoa milioni kali towi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira omushango kumara obwire buraingwa,omuramuzi akasharamu ngu obujurizi obwaretsirwe tiburikwetengyesa okwemerererwa omu sente. N'ekyarugiremu, omunyeishengyero akaheebwa okwemerererwa kw'obukaikuru makumi ataano.

eng_prompt: During the hearing, the evidence presented highlighted the severity of the charges against the defendant. Given the circumstances, the prosecutor advocated for strict bail terms.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera ky'okuwulira omusango, obujulizi obwanjuddwa bwalaga obunene bw'emisango egyavunaanibwa omuwawaabirwa. Okusinziira ku mbeera eyaliwo, omuwaabi wa gavumenti yasaba wabeewo ebisaanyizo ebikakali.
ach_prompt: Ikare me winyo lok, caden ma kimiyo onyuto ni adot ma ki keto i kom ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye obedo rac tutwal. Ma lubbe ki ngo ma otimme, langol kop okwayo pi cik matek tutwal me bedo mabuc mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apupio na emusago, abu aitogogongoret itodunit ebe epol noi emusago lo iwosatai lo iwosatai. Kotoma ojautene kangol, abu lo ewosan kolim ebe ibusakinit kesi alacakin ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa e'yo erizuri ma alia, afa ecetaru 'bani e'da 'diyi ece kini e'yo 'bani to agu 'bani to 'da ma dria 'diyi onzi. E'yo 'da ma alea, agu e'yo lipi 'diyi ai e'yo azita okporu 'bani 'ba ofuzu arujoarisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhurira omushango, obujurizi obwaretsirwe bukashoboorora oburemeezi bw'emishango aha kihababirwa. Ahabw'embeera eyabaire eriho, omuhababi wa gavumenti akashaba ngu habeho obukwakurizo bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: After hearing the arguments from both sides, the judge deliberated for a moment. Finally, he decided it was best to give the parties more time to prepare their evidence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ensonga okuva ku njuyi zombi, omulamuzi yalowooza okumala akaseera. Mu nkomerero, yasalawo nti kyandibadde kirungi okuwa enjuyi obudde obusingako okutegeka obujulizi bwazo.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok ma aa ki I tenge aryo weng, langolkop oloko pi kare mo. I agiki ne, en omoko tamme ni obedo ber tutwal me miyo kare ki dul ne me yubu caden gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup akiro nuka atutubena ngun kere, abu ekatubon kicorak kanu apak naedit. Kawasia abu ngesi kotema ebe ejokuna aijaikin ipatei apak naepol kanu aitemonokin ajenanut kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eriza engazu kala iri 'diyi vurisi 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri 'du e'yo yi ma dria sawa were. Asizu, eri 'du e'yo kini eri muke ndeni 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi dri sawa fezu drile e'yo ecetaru 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuhurira enshonga kuruga omu mbaju zombi,omuramuzi akateekateekaho kakye. Ekyarugiremu, akasharamu ngu kikaba kiri kirungi kuheereza enshonga obwire bwingi kutebeekanisa obujurizi bwazo.

eng_prompt: The local economy heavily relies on transportation services, and any disruption in essential utilities can have a significant impact. If the power supply continues to be unstable, many businesses, including those in the taxi park, may struggle to operate effectively.
lug_prompt: Ebyenfuna by'ekitundu byesigama nnyo ku byentambula, era okutaataaganyizibwa kw'ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo kusobola okukosa ennyo. Singa amasannyalaze gakyagenda mu maaso nga tegateredde, bizinensi nnyingi omuli n'ezo eziri mu ppaaka za takisi zijja kulwana okuddukanyizibwa obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lonyo me tedero jenge tutwalle I kom tic me wot, dok balo tic ma pire tek twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal. Ka mac omede ki bedo ma pe tye maber, biacara mapol, ma I kingi tye I taxi park, twero bedo tek tutwal me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Erai edumune loka ikapun loka atutubet loepodokinit noi nuka elose, ido aitolitol iboro lu itwasamao epedori aitolitol. Arai inyikokit akim amamus, ibiasaran luipu, aimoriarit ngul luejaasi toma aiboisit naedumunere amotokan nuapolok, mam epedorete aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ni asi'baza be angiri e'yo acipa ni 'diyi ma dria, dika e'yo azi ecopi e'depi e'yo orodriru 'diyi ma alea ri eco e'yo onzi 'ye ra. Aci ako ka mu drile, tujari karakara eyi, 'ba taxi paki 'da ma alea 'diyi pie, eco nga dri ci azi ngazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Eby'entatsya y'ekyaro neesigama munonga aha by'engyenda, kandi okuteganisibwa kw'ebintu ebirikwetengwa munonga nikubaasa kukora kihango. Amashanyarazi garikugumizamu gatarikuguma gye, bizinesi nyingi, otwariiremu n'ezo eziri omu taxi paaka, nizibaasa kurwana kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: In order to improve their working conditions and negotiate better rates, taxi drivers need to band together. Forming a collective organization would empower them to advocate for their rights more effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulongoosa embeera zaabwe ez'emirimu n'okuteesa ku miwendo emirungi, abavuzi ba takisi beetaaga okwegatta. Okukola ekibiina eky'awamu kyandibasobozesezza okulwanirira eddembe lyabwe obulungi.
ach_prompt: Me yubu rwom me ticgi ki winye pi wel cente maber, ludwo taxi omyero guribbe kacel. Cako dul ma ribe kacel obi weko gilwenyo pi twero gi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar ejautene lo aswam kec ka acamanar kanu itiaisinei luajokak, ekot iderepan luka atakisi aimorikikin. Aitolomun atukot na imorikikina ijaikini kesi agogongu na aitepeg apedorosiokec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini azi ngazu 'diyi otuzu azini agbatara gbazu aje muke 'diyi ma dria, le dereva takisi eyini 'diyi ma eci eyi tualu. Amuti ti ecita ni ma e'dota ni nga fe eyini okpo a'di 'dizu drilemgbo eyini 'diyi ma dria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kutunguura embeera zaabo z'okukoreramu n'okuteesa aha bishare birungi, abavugi ba takisi bashemereire kukorera hamwe. Okutandikaho ekitongore ky'abantu boona, nikiija kubahwera kurwanirira obugabe bwabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a bid to enhance local transportation infrastructure, government officials gathered for a significant event. The community eagerly awaited the announcement of new developments in the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula entambula mu kitundu, abakungu ba gavumenti baakuŋŋaanidde ku mukolo omukulu. Ekitundu kyalindirira n'obwagazi okulangirira enkulaakulana empya mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I yub me ilo malo rwom me tic me wot I tedero, lutic pa gamente gugure pi yub mo ma pire tek tutwal. Lwak gubedo ka kuro ki miti madit lok angeya me dongo lobo manyen I but piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar elose loka itunga, apotu eswamak luka apugan kotukokinos kanuka epucit loepol noi. Apotu itunga idaritata noi alimoret naka apol naitetet kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Afa acipa ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi tra eyi omu azi okporu ni ma alea. Ongulumu 'da eyi te asi driasi e'yo angu ezoma ni o'diru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'engyenda omu byaro, abakuru omu gavumenti baketeeranira hamwe aha mukoro gw'amaani. Abantu bakategyereza n'ekihika okurangirira entunguuka ensya omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve public transportation and reduce congestion in the city, local officials proposed a new transportation hub. After extensive planning and community consultations, the project was approved.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza entambula y'olukale n'okukendeeza ku mugotteko mu kibuga, abakungu b'ebyalo baateesa ku kifo ekipya eky'entambula. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka ennyo n'okwebuuza ku bantu, pulojekiti yakkirizibwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me yubu yoo me wot pa lwak ki dwoko piny wel dano I boma madit, lutic me tedero guyubu yoo me wot manyen. Ingee yube maber ki lok ki lwak, kimoko yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar elose lo itunga ka aitidisiar eipues loka itunga koibuga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitemokisi aiboisit naitetet naka elose. Akaulo naka aitemonokin ka aingitun itunga, aponi kocamakinai epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu acipa o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu azini omita aku ambu city niri ma alea ri esizu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe egata angu acipa ni o'diru ni. Otuta angiri 'yezu azini e'yo nzezu o'bi yi be 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ai otita 'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura entambura y'abantu boona n'okukyendeeza omwijurirano omu rurembo, abakuru b'ebyaro bakaha ekiteiso ky'omwanya musya gw'entambura. Bwanyima y'okukora enteekateeka n'okwebuuza aha bantu, purogyekiti ekaikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing energy crisis and frequent blackouts, local officials held a meeting to discuss potential solutions. After evaluating various options, they decided that investing in additional power sources was essential for the community's needs.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'amasannyalaze obugenda mu maaso n'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze erya buli kaseera, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko okuteesa ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya engeri ez'enjawulo, baasalawo nti okusiga ensimbi mu nsibuko z'amasannyalaze endala kya mugaso eri ebyetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me mac matye kawot anyim kacel ki peko me mac matye ka rweny kare ki kare, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo me cobo peko ne. Ingee neno yoo mapat-pat, gumoko ni keto cente I yub me mac mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek pi miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka akim keda amamus na akim, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kiswamata airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Akaulo naka airereonor iboro luegelegela, apotu kesi koseutu ebe ibusakinit aipikakin ikapun toma aiboisio nuka akim kanu ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru aci osezariniri ma e'yosi azini aci ako ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ndundu eyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo ra kini 'ba ma 'ba robia geri aci esuzu 'diyi ma alea dika eri orodriru e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amashanyarazi oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'okubura kw'amashanyarazi, abakuru b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe, bakasharamu ngu okuta esente omu by'amashanyarazi ebindi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: To ensure smooth operations and accommodate the growing number of electric vehicles, the taxi park has implemented a new fleet management system. This transition to electric vehicles is a crucial step towards sustainability and reducing emissions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti emirimu gitambula bulungi era n'okusembeza omuwendo gw'emmotoka z'amasannyalaze ogweyongera, paaka ya takisi etaddewo enkola empya ey'okuddukanya emmotoka. Enkyukakyuka eno ey'emmotoka ezikozesa amasannyalaze ddaala lya mugaso mu kuyimirizaawo n'okukendeeza omukka ogufuluma mu mmotoka.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic tye maber ki bene me gwoko wel mutoka ma tiyo ki mac matye kamede, taxi park okatti ki yoo manyen me doro mutoka. Alokaloka man me donyo I motoka ma tiyo ki mac obedo yoo acel ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko kwo pa dano ki dwoko piny rwom me yamo ma aa ki I motoka.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iswamai ejok ka aitodolikin enaaba loka amotokan nuka akim, etolomu epone loitetet loka aanyanar amotokan nuka akim. Aijulakin amotokan nuka akim erai adoketait naepol noi kanu aitodolikin ka aitidisiar ekwam.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza kililiru ri nezu dika mutukari aci ni 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma ta mbazu, takisi paki 'da e'do geri o'diru 'bani mutukari aci ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri 'yeta ma alea. Ojata mutukari aci oseza ni 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo azi okporu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri ma dria azini e'yo oli ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu emirimo neetambura kurungi n'okutwara emotoka z'amashanyarazi ezirikweyongyera omubare, paaka ya takisi eteire omu nkora enkora ensya y'okureeberera ebiiruka. Okuhindura emotoka z'amashanyarazi, n'omuringo gw'amaani gw'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa n'okukyendeeza omwijuzo.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing infrastructure issues and a lack of investment in the energy sector, the region is facing significant challenges. As a result, the people of Arua will have power problems for the next two years.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu by'ebizimbe ebigenda mu maaso n'ebbula ly'ensimbi mu by'amasannyalaze, ekitundu kyolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. N'ekinaavaamu, abantu b'omu Arua bajja kuba n'ebizibu by'amasannyalaze okumala emyaka ebiri egijja.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me gedo mapat-pat matye kawot anyim ki bedo peke pa lim I tenge me mac, but lobo man tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano me Arua gubi bedo ki peko me mac pi mwaki aryo mabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kanuka atiokisio nu elosi akonye keda amamus na aipikakin ikapun toma orionget loka akim, etereikina aiboisit keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Kanuka ngun, epote itunga luka Arua ajaut keda ationis naka akim adaun ikar iarei luetupakinete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu siza ni mupi drile azini lonyi vuti aleza ma ako esele aci oseza niri ma alea risi, angu 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru 'diyi ci. E'yo 'disi, 'ba Arua 'diyi nga ovu e'yo aci ni 'diyi be eli iri emupi 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho n'eibura ry'okutamu sente omu by'amashanyarazi,ekyanga kiine oburemeezi bw'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, abantu ba Arua nibaija kugira oburemeezi bw'amashanyarazi kumara emyaka ebiri erikwija.

eng_prompt: The city has been facing significant challenges with traffic congestion and limited public transport options. To address these issues, local authorities have proposed the establishment of a new taxi park.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi olw'omujjuzo gw'ebidduka n'entambula y'olukale entono. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bateesezza okuzimba paaka ya takisi empya.
ach_prompt: Boma ne obedo ka nongo peko madit tutwal ki pong pa mutoka ki yoo me wot pa lwak matye nok tutwal. Me tyeko peko magi, lutela me tedero gumiyo tam me yubu taxi park manyen.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esite keda atiokisio nuepolok nuikamunitos eipues loka amotokan keda elose loedit. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, apotu apedorosio luka atutubet itolomutu aomisioit naka aiduk epark loitetet.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ebi dri fu e'yo ewaru nzila dria omita ni azini geri o'bi eyini acizu 'diyi ma kalafe ni cazu ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe egata takisi paki o'diru ni sizu.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rwiine oburemeezi bwingi ahabw'omwijurirano gw'ebiiruka hamwe n'entambura y'abantu baingi. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bateire ekiteiso ky'okutandikaho paaka ya takisi ensya.

eng_prompt: The local government has announced plans to develop a new transportation hub in the city. This initiative aims to boost the economy and create job opportunities for residents.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu erangiridde enteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya ekifo ekipya eky'entambula mu kibuga. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula ebyenfuna n'okutondawo emirimu eri abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero owaco ni tye ki yub me dongo kabedo me wot I boma madit ne. Yub man tye ki miti me ilo malo rwom me lim ki cako tic pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Alimo apugan naka atutubet ainapeta nuka aitolomun aiboisit naitetet naka alosit koibuga. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar edumune loka ikapun ka aitolomun aswamisinei mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri azi otita eyi e'dozu angu 'bani acizu o'diru 'diyi ezozu aku ambo 'da ma alea. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini drileba azi fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro erangirire enteekateeka y'okutunguura omwanya musya gw'ebyengyenda omu rurembo. Enteekateeka egi egyendereire kutunguura eby'entaasya n'okutandikiraho abatuuragye emirimo.

eng_prompt: As economic conditions improve and new opportunities arise, individuals are seeking ways to enhance their financial stability. This shift in focus will lead to innovative strategies for generating income.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyenfuna egenda erongooka n'emikisa emipya egijja, abantu banoonya engeri z'okwongera ku butebenkevu bwabwe mu byenfuna. Enkyukakyuka mu ndowooza ejja kuleetawo enkola empya ez'okufunamu ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lok me lim tye ka yube kwede ki gum manyen tye kabino, dano tye ka yenyo yoo me medo rwom me limgi. Alokaloka man obi kelo yoo manyen me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejokunar ejautene loka ikapun keda arerengesio nuitetiak, eutasi itunga aimo iponesio luka aitojokar ejautenekec loka ikapun. Aijulakin aomisio nu ijaikini itunga iponesio luitetiak luka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ni ecazu muke dika drileba o'diru 'diyi ni e'doria, 'ba eyi geri nda eyini ecozu eyi ma robia ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri ma ojaza 'di ni nga geri o'diru 'bani ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi eji.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'eby'entaasya ku erikweyongyera, n'emigisha misya, abantu nibasherura oburyo bw'okwongyera aha ntatsya yaabo. Okuhindura enteekateeka nikiija kureetaho enkora nungi y'okutunga entaasya.

eng_prompt: The bustling atmosphere and strategic location make it a hub for both locals and visitors. With a variety of vendors and easy access to transportation, it attracts a diverse crowd looking for goods and services.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'omujjuzo n'ekifo ekirungi kifuula ekifo ekikulu eri abatuuze n'abagenyi. Olw'abasuubuzi ab'enjawulo n'entambula ennyangu, kisikiriza abantu ab'enjawulo abanoonya ebyamaguzi n'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma dano dwong iye ki kama ber tutwal weko kabedo ne bedo kama dano mapol maro iye ki wele bene. Ki lucat ma dwong ki yoo me wot ma yot, man kelo dano mapol me yenyo jami ki kony.
teo_prompt: Aiboisit naejaasi keda itunga luipu noi keda aiboisit naejok ijaikini ngesi aiboisit naejok noi nejaas itunga keda ipejok. Keda agwelanarak luegelegela keda epatana adolokin elose, ingalauni itunga luegelegela aimo iboro keda aijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'ba eyini aa'zu tualu angu eyini aa'zu kililiru ri be ri fe angu 'da ni aa'zu 'ba angu ma alea 'diyini tualu 'ba emupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Ba afa ozi'ba ndundu 'diyi pie tualu geri acizu 'diyi pie, eri o'bi karakara eyi eji afa ozizaru 'diyi ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya ogurimu abantu baingi hamwe n'omwanya murungi niguguhindura omwanya gw'abantu n'abagyenyi. Ahabw'abashubuzi b'emiringo mingi n'entambura nungi, nikireeta abantu b'emiringo mingi abarikuronda ebintu n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for improved infrastructure, local officials have announced a new development plan. This initiative aims to enhance connectivity and support economic growth in the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ebizimbe ebirongoofu, abakungu b'ebyalo balangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'enkulaakulana. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula eby'empuliziganya n'okukulaakulanya eby'enfuna mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti me dongo lobo matye kamede, lutic me tedero guyubu yub me dongo lobo manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me medo kubbe ki dongo lobo I but lobo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka aitwasam iboro lu itojokaritai, alimosi eswamak luka atutubet ainapeta nuitetiak nuka apol. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar arucokina ka aitopolor apol naka ikapun kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi azi otita angu ezoma ni o'diru ni eyi. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu e'yo eyi ecizu ri ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu zota e'yo robiani angu 'di ma alea ri dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'okutunguura ebyombeko, abakungu b'ebyaro batongoize enteekateeka nsya y'entunguuka. Ekigyendererwa n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entatsya omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Engineers have raised serious concerns about the structural integrity of the aging infrastructure. Without immediate repairs and reinforcements, the consequences could be catastrophic.
lug_prompt: Bayinginiya balaze obweraliikirivu obw'amaanyi ku bulambulukufu bw'ebizimbe ebikadde. Awatali kuddaabiriza mangu n'okunyweza, ebivaamu biyinza okuba eby'akabi.
ach_prompt: Engineers gunyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom yub me gedo ma otii ni. Labongo yubu jami oyot-oyot tutwal, adwogi ne twero bedo rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu engineers itodutu aiyalongong naepol noi kanu aduketait na iboro luemojongito. Arai mam itemonokino katipet keda agangat, epedorete akiro ngun araun nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Inginiya eyi e'da asi otiza okporu e'yo angu 'da ma sita ni aa'zu kililiru ri ma dria. E'yo 'bani eyi edezu mbeleru azini okpo fezu 'diyi kokoru, e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi eco adri onzi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ba ingyiniya boorekire okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha nkora y'ebyombeko ebikuru. Hatariho okuhunduuza ahonaaho hamwe n'okwongyera amahe, ebirikubaasa kurugamu nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi munonga.

eng_prompt: In the early days of construction, engineers often relied on locally sourced materials for their projects. As a result, many structures were built using wood, which was abundant and easy to work with.
lug_prompt: Mu nnaku ezasooka ez'okuzimba, bayinginiya beesiganga ku bikozesebwa mu pulojekiti zaabwe ebyaggibwanga wano. N'ekyavaamu, ebizimbe bingi byazimbibwa nga bakozesa embaawo, nga zino zaali nnyingi ate nga nnyangu okukolerako.
ach_prompt: Ikare macon me gedo, engineers onongo gijenge I kom jami ma aa ki kany pi yub gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gedo mapol ki yubu gi ki bao, ma obedo pol dok tic kwede obedo yot.
teo_prompt: Apakio nukakolo nuka aduko, apotu ijinias kiswamata keda iboro luedumununio katutubet kanu ipurojektin kec. Kanuka ngun, aponi odukoi adukena nuipu keda abawoi, nuapolok noi ido kopatana aswam.
lgg_prompt: O'du andra drio afa sizu 'diyi ma alia, inginiya yi ri yi ati afa 'bani je engazu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba si jo karakara eyi mbawu si, eyi ndra karakara azini azi ngazu eyi be ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu biro by'okubanza by'okwombeka, ba ingyiniya bakaba beesiga eby'okukoresa ebirikuruga omwihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyombeko bingi bikombekwa barikukoresa embaho, eyabaire eri nyingi kandi eyorobi kukoresa.

eng_prompt: The government has approved the new infrastructure project aimed at improving transportation across the country. As part of this initiative, the Uganda national roads authority will be in charge of the construction.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ekkirizza pulojekiti empya egendereddwamu okutumbula entambula mu ggwanga lyonna. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ekitongole ky'ebyenguudo mu Uganda kijja kuvunaanyizibwa ku kuzimba.
ach_prompt: Gamente omoko yub manyen me yubu jami ma mite pi yub me wot I lobo man. Macalo but yub man, dul me Uganda National Roads Authority aye obi doro tic me gedo.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan itigogong epurojekt loitetet lo ebeit aitojokar elose kakwap. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, erionget loka irotin luka akwap eraun lo ikamunitos aduko.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ai otita o'diru 'bani lezu acipa ma omgbo otuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu ri ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, amuti nzila eyi ma ta mbapi kari Uganda niri ma alea omvele Uganda National Roads Authority ni mu adri e'yo 'bani nzila 'da sizu ri ma drileru.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eikiriize purogyekiti y'okwombeka ebintu ebisya erikugyenderera okutunguura eby'engyenda omwihanga ryona. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ekitongore ky'enguuto ekya Uganda nikiija kuba nikyo kiine obujunanizibwa bw'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved the plans for the new bridge, and construction is set to begin next month. Engineers estimate that the project will require a significant amount of time to ensure safety and durability.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kakkirizza pulaani y'olutindo olupya era okuzimba kugenda kutandika omwezi ogujja. Bayinginiya bateebereza nti pulojekiti ejja kwetaaga obudde bungi okukakasa obukuumi n'obuwangaazi.
ach_prompt: Kancil me boma madit oyee yub me yubu pem manyen, dok gedo obi cake I dwe manyen. Engineers tye ki byek ni yub eni bimito kare malac tutwal me neno ni tic tye maber dok orii pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Abu ekansulo lo oibuga itigogong ainapeta nuka edaraca loitetet, ido ebeit aduko ageun olap ngol. Eomitos ijinias ebe ibusakinit epurojekt ngol ayangaikin apak naepol kanu awanyun ebe eyuara.
lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri niri ai otita daraza o'diru 'da ni 'diyi, dika 'ba e'do eyi si imba drusirisi. Inginiya eyi ega kini otita 'da le sa'wa angiri eyini ani aa'zu muke azini aa'zu sa'wa ezu.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize enteekateeka y'orutindo orusya, kandi okwombeka nikuza kutandika okwezi okurikwija. Ba ingyiniya nibateebereza ngu purogyekiti neija kutwara obwire bwingi, okureeba ngu yaagumaho.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, infrastructure development is closely regulated to ensure safety and compliance with national standards. As a result, the governing body responsible for road management holds significant authority over major construction projects.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe erabirirwa nnyo okukakasa obukuumi n'okugoberera omutindo gw'eggwanga. N'ekyavaamu, akakiiko akafuzi akavunaanyizibwa ku nzirukanya y'enguudo kalina obuyinza bungi ku pulojekiti z'okuzimba ennene.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, yub me yubu jami mapat-pat ki doro gi matek tutwal me neno ni tic tye maber dok lubu cik me lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma doro tic me gudu tye ki twero madit tutwal I kom yub madongo me gedo.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejai ainapeta nuikamunitos apol kanu awanyun ebe eyuara ka aitodolikin adoketait na akwap. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi atukot naeyait nuka irotin keda apedor naepol noi kanu ipurojektin luapolok luka aduko.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, 'ba e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma ezota ma dria 'diyi one kililiru nezu kini e'yo eyi ma tambaza azini e'yo kari ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu. E'yo 'disi, amuti driceza ni e'yo nzila eyi ma tambazu ri ma okpo otita okporu 'bani eyi sizu 'diyi ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, entunguuka y'ebyombeko neeteberezibwa munonga, okureeba ngu habaho oburinzi n'okukuratira omutindo gw'eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa ahaby'enguuto kiine obushoborozi bwingi aha purogyekiti z'okwombeka empango.

eng_prompt: To ensure the project meets all regulatory requirements and safety standards, collaboration is essential. Effective communication between the construction company and the roads authority will facilitate a smoother workflow.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti pulojekiti etuukana n'ebiragiro byonna n'omutindo gw'obukuumi, okukwatagana kwa mugaso. Empuliziganya ennungi wakati wa kkampuni ezimba n'ekitongole ky'ebyenguudo ejja kusobozesa emirimu okutambula obulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi neno ni yub eni ocobo miti pa cik ki rwom me gwoko ber bedo, winye obedo gin ma pire tek. Kube maber ikin dul ma yubu gudu ki dul ma doro tic me yubu gudi obi weko tic woto maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinit epurojekt iboro kere lu ekotoi keda adoketait na ayuwara, ejokuna aiswamanara. Einer loajokan kiding ekampuni lo eduki keda erionget loka irotin ebuni aitapatan aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni aa'zu e'yo dria 'bani lele azita palaa 'diyi pie, ti ecita eri orodriru. E'yo nzeza kililiru amuti nzila sipi 'da ma eselea amuti nzila sipi 'da pie ri ni nga fe azi ni acizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu purogyekiti ehikiiriza ebirikwetengwa omu biragiro hamwe n'omutindo gw'okwerinda, okukwatanisa n'okw'omugasho. Okuhurizana kurungi ahagati ya kampuni y'okwombeka hamwe n'ekitongore ky'enguuto, nikiija kuhwera emirimo kugyenda gye.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for durable infrastructure, the company has committed to innovative engineering practices. This initiative aims to enhance the longevity and reliability of public transportation networks.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ebizimbe ebiwangaala, kampuni yeewaddeyo mu nkola za yinginiya ez'obuyiiya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula obuwangaazi n'obwesigwa bw'entambula ey'olukale.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me gedo ma rii pi kare malac, dul ne oketo cwinye me kelo diro manyen me tic. Yub man tye ki miti me medo kare ki gen pa yub me wot pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka adukena nuegogong, ekapakina ekampuni aitolomun iponesio luitetiak luka eijiniaring. Alosikinet na erai aitojokar apak naepol ka amuno naka elose loka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu afa ayuzaru aa'pi sa'wa ezu 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti 'da owi i e'yo onduoru 'diyi 'yezu. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu geri o'bi eyini acizu 'diyi ma aa sa'wa ezu dika eyi ma aa e'yo adaru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'ebyombeko ebirikugumaho, kampuni eyehaireyo kukora emiringo ya ingyiniya etari emwe n'emwe. Ekigyendererwa ky'ekigyendererwa eki n'okureeba ngu eby'engyenda by'abantu boona bigumireho.

eng_prompt: After careful evaluation of the proposal's potential impact and feasibility, the committee convened to discuss the timeline for implementation. Ultimately, they reached a consensus on the duration needed to achieve the project's goals.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza ebiyinza okuva mu kiteeso n'ebisoboka, akakiiko kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku budde bw'okukiteeka mu nkola. Mu nkomerero, baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku bbanga eryetaagisa okutuukiriza ebigendererwa bya pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo maber adwoki pa tam eni ki kit ma twero tic kwede, dul ne gubedo ka lok I kom kare me keto yub eni itic. I agiki ne, guwinye I kom kare ma mite me cobo miti pa yub eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata aomisioit ngin aswam, apotu ekomiti iriamunos kanu aitemitem apakio nu ebeit aitodolikin. Kawasia, apotu kesi opotu kanu apak na ekotoi kanu aitodolikin alosikineta nuka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'di ma 'yeta ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu sa'wa 'bani e'yo 'di 'yezu ri ma dria. Asizu, eyi esu ti ecita sa'wa 'bani lezu otita 'da ma e'yo eyi 'yezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza enkora n'obushoboorozi bw'ekiteeso, akakiiko kakashutama kuhanuura aha bwire bw'okukiteeka omu nkora. Ahamuheru, bakaikirizana aha bwire oburikwetengwa okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa bya purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: The local government has allocated funds for infrastructure improvements. As part of this initiative, several key projects are set to enhance the city's transportation network.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu etaddewo ensimbi okutumbula ebizimbe. Ng'ekitundu ky'enteekateeka eno, pulojekiti ez'enjawulo ez'omugaso zitegekeddwa okutumbula entambula y'ekibuga.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero omiyo cente me yubu jami ma mite pi lwak. Macalo but yub man, yub mapigi tego mapol tye pi ilo malo rwom me wot I boma madit.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan naka atutubet ijaik ikapun kanu aitojokar aiboisio. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, itemonokino ipurojektin lu epolok kanu aitojokar elose loka eibuga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'ba robia afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba otita okporu karakara eyi o'ba geri acizu aku ambu cityniri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro eteireho esente z'okutunguura ebyombeko. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, hariho purogyekiti nyingi ez'omugasho ezitebeekanisiibwe kutunguura eby'engyenda omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: As the demand for new infrastructure projects continues to rise, construction companies are seeking ways to support the local economy. One effective strategy is to engage the community by hiring local workers.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bwa pulojekiti z'ebizimbe obupya bweyongera okulinnya, kkampuni ezizimba zinoonya engeri z'okuyambako mu by'enfuna by'eggwanga. Akamu ku bukodyo akasinga obulungi kwe kuyingiza abantu mu by'obufuzi nga bakozesa abakozi b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa yub me gedo tye kamede kwede, dul mapat-pat me gedo tye ka yenyo yoo me konyo biacara me tedero. Yoo acel maber me tic en aye me weko lwak gubed tye kun gitiyo ki lutic me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipud loka ipurojektin lu aduko, eutasi ikampunin lu aduko aimo iwaitin lu igangiaere edumune loka ikapun. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok ngesi aimorikikin itunga kowai lo aipagisa eswamak luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Otita afa siza ni o'diru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tutu risi, amuti afa siza ni 'diyi geri nda atita fezu e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. Otita azi orodriru ni 'diyi ma azi ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'ba azi ngapi angu 'da ma alea ogogo 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo bya purogyekiti z'okwombeka nibigumizamu kweyongyera, kampuni z'okwombeka nizironda oburyo bw'okuhwera eby'entaasya y'eihanga. Omuringo gumwe ogurikubaasa kukora gye n'okureetaho abantu omu byaro obwo orikukoresa abakozi b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: During the recent community meeting, district leaders outlined their plans for the upcoming school renovations. They emphasized the importance of balancing quality with timeliness in the construction process.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baalaga enteekateeka zaabwe ez'okuddaabiriza essomero. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukwataganya omutindo n'obudde mu kuzimba.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lwak ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela me district guwaco yub gi pi roco gang kwan matye kabino ni. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa gwoko rwom ki kare me gedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt kitetemoto ainapeta kec nuka aitemonokino na esomero. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitirian adoketait keda apak kotoma aiduk.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini o'diru ri ma alea, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ece otita eyini 'diyi e'yo sukulu eyi ma edeta ni emupi 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri aa'zu wura kililiru si azini sa'wa kililiru si ri ma dria sa'wa 'bani afa eyi sizu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bakashoborora enteekateeka yaabo y'okugarura busya eishomero erikwija. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukuratira omutindo n'obwire omu by'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure the project's success and maintain transparency, it is essential to establish clear financial oversight. This will help prevent mismanagement and misuse of resources.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obuwanguzi bwa pulojekiti n'okukuuma obwerufu, kyetaagisa okuteekawo enkola ennambulukufu ey'okulondoola ebyensimbi. Kino kijja kuyamba okutangira enzirukanya embi n'okukozesa obubi eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni yub eni ocobo miti ne ki bedo ki ada, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma tic me lim tye kwede. Man bikonyo me gengo nywaro tic ki jami.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ebuni epurojekt ngol akerianar ka ajaut keda aica, ejokuna aitolomun aingic naka ikapun. Ingarakini ngin aitikitik aitolitol ka aitolitol iboro.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ma agata nezu azini e'yo ada ma tambazu, eri orodriru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu kililiru. Diri nga azakoma fe e'yo 'bani lonyi ayuzu geri onzi si 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obusinguzi bwa purogyekiti n'okurinda amazima, n'eky'omugasho okutaho obureberezi burungi ahaby'empiiha. Eki nikiija kuhwera okurwanisa okukoresa kubi eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: The storm had unleashed its fury, causing the river to swell dangerously high. As the floodwaters surged, the bridge became a treacherous crossing for those trying to escape the rising tide.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga gwali gusumuludde obusungu bwagwo, ne guleetera omugga okujjula amazzi mu ngeri ey'obulabe. Ng'amazzi g'amataba geeyongera, olutindo lwafuuka lwa bulabe eri abo abaali bagezaako okuwona amataba.
ach_prompt: Yamo ne okatti ki akemo matek tutwal ma oweko pii ma mol I nam omede malo tutwal. I kare ma pong pa pii omede, wii pem ne odoko yoo marac tutwal pi jo ma otemo ngwec ki pii ma tye ka cwer.
teo_prompt: Apotu ekwam kolacakisi anyunyura ke, ido abu koinak ecilet aipuakata noi. Neapolor ebulone, abu edaraca koraun loetiono noi aitub kanu ngul luetamitos akerit kotoma ebulone.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da ofu okpo erivileri fezu yi ara ma omgbo ni tuzu uru tu. Yi tiza ni tuzurisi, daraza 'da eca angu azi onzi 'ba lepi yi tiza ni tupi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga gukaba gushohwize ekiniga kyagwo, ekyareteire omugyera kwijurira ahaiguru munonga. Okweyongyera kw'amaizi g'omwegyemure, orutindo rukaba rw'akabi ahari abo abaabaire nibagyezaho kutoroka aha maizi g'omwegyemure.

eng_prompt: After days of heavy rain, the river swelled beyond its banks, putting immense pressure on the aging infrastructure. As the storm intensified, the sound of cracking wood echoed through the valley, signaling the imminent failure of the bridge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ennaku z'enkuba ennyingi, omugga gwabooga ne gusukka ku lubalama lwagwo, ne guteeka akazito ku bizimbe ebikadde. Ng'omuyaga gweyongera, amaloboozi g'enku ezikutuka gawuuma mu kiwonvu, nga galaga nti olutindo lwali lunaatera okugwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare ma kot ocwe matek tutwal, kulu ne opong tutwal, ma oketo lyeto madit tutwal I kom gedo ma otii. I kare ma yamo magwar ne omedde, dwan yen ma tye ka tyer obedo ka winyo I lung, ma nyutu ni wii pem ne dong cok poto.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaarasia nuepol noi naka edou, abu ecilet kipuakata noi, ido abu koinak agogong naepol noi mama ejaasi aiboisio nuemojongito. Neyatakinor ekwam noi, apotu ikito luapotu kopukosi kotoma aiboisio kere, itodunit ebe ebuni edaraca aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo nzizaruri ma o'du 'bori ma vutia, yi ara nderi tu yi ma tiasi, erini e'yo okporu 'bazu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. Ozoo ma okpo ni tuzurisi, o'duko pati onyoza ni 'diyi ma o'duko e'da yi aliasi dria, ecepi kini daraza 'di nga e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebiro by'enjura nyingi,omugyera gukaruga aha rubaju rw'amaizi g'omugyera, ekireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha byombeko ebikuru. Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, orwari rw'enku ezirikwetomboita rukagaruka omu kicweka kyona, ekirikworeka ngu orutindo rukaba ruri haihi kugwa.

eng_prompt: After years of planning and community discussions, the city finally announced the start of the long-awaited infrastructure project. Residents are eager to see how the new bridge will improve connectivity and boost local businesses.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bateekateeka n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kitundu, ekibuga kyamala ne kirangirira entandikwa ya pulojekiti y'ebizimbe ebadde ebadde ebadde elindiriddwa okumala ebbanga. Abatuuze beesunga okulaba engeri omutala omupya gye gujja okutumbula okuyungibwa n'okutumbula bizinensi z'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki nywako lok ikin lwak, city dong otyeko cwalo lok angeya me cako yub me gedo ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac. Lutedero tye ki miti madit tutwal me neno kit ma pem manyen eni obi yubu kwede kubbe ki biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin ka aitemitem akiro nuka itunga, abu esite kolimo ageunet naka epurojekt lo idarit noi. Ekapakina itunga aanyun epone loebeitor edaraca loitetet aitojokar arucokina keda aitopolor ebiasara.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini e'yo nzezu ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, aku ambo 'da azi asizu otita afa ayuzaru 'bani ebi te sa'wa ezu ri ma e'dota ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi avasi ndrezu geri daraza o'diru 'da ni mu e'yo o'bi eyini eyi ecizu ri ma omgbo otuzu azini tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuhanuura omu bantu, orurembo rukaheza kurangirira entandikwa ya purogyekiti y'ebyombeko eyabaire etegyereirwe kumara obwire buraingwa. Abatuuragye baine ekihika ky'okureeba oku orutindo orusya rurikwija kutunguura eby'empurizagana n'okushongyera eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to restore biodiversity and enhance tourism, local leaders are advocating for the reintroduction of endangered species. Among their top priorities is the return of rhinos to the Ajai game reserve, a once-thriving habitat for these majestic animals.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuzzaawo obutonde obw'enjawulo n'okutumbula ebyobulambuzi, abakulembeze b'ebyalo balwanirira okuzzaawo ebika by'ebisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo. Ebimu ku bintu bye basinga okutwala ng'ebikulu kwe kuzza enkula mu kkuumiro ly'ebisolo erya Ajai, ekifo we zaali zibeera.
ach_prompt: I tute me roco cwec ma orumuwa ki medo rwom me limo piny, lutela me tedero gitye ka lweny pi roco cwec ma orumuwa. I kin jami ma pire tek ma gitye kwede obedo dwoko odilo I kabedo me gwoko lee me Ajai, kabedo ma yam onongo tye maber pi lee magi ma beco tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka ainyakun iboro luegelegela luka ekwam ka aitopolor elatok, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aigang aitolomunio naka iboro luegelegela luepedorete aibiror. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio kec nuepolok ngesi ainyakar ikwangak kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang luko Ajai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa nyakuni 'diyi ma esele otuzu dika e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi a'di 'di e'yo afa nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'da ma alea. E'yo eyini 'ba okporu 'diyi ma eselea ri eri e'yo 'bani omvu eyi ogozu angu Ajai ni anyapa asea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okugaruraho eby'obuhangwa n'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibarwanirira okugaruraho eby'obuhangwa ebiri omu kabi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebibarikuteekateekaho n'okugarura enkumbi omumwanya gw'okurinda enyamaishwa omuri Ajai, omwanya ogwabaire gurimu enyamaishwa ezi ez'amaani.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a troubling trend affecting wildlife conservation efforts. Many species are at risk due to illegal hunting activities.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga ekintu ekizibu ekikosa enteekateeka y'okukuuma ebisolo by'omu nsiko. Ebika by'ebisolo bingi biri mu katyabaga olw'okuyigga mu bumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma tic me gwoko lee tim tye ka doko tek kwede. Tye kwai lee mapol matye kama rac pi tim me dwaro lee iwi alii.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu eipone lo itisilanari aidar itiang lukokutwi. Iponesio luipu luka itiang ejaas ationis naarai ejai ameja nu ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza fepi okpo 'bani fe afa asea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria ra. Afa nyakuni karakara 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alia e'yo 'bani anyapa asea 'diyi 'dizu azita palaa ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa zikooreka enkora erikuteganisa enteekateeka y'okurinda enyamiishwa. Ebihangirwe bingi biri omu kabi ahabw'okuhiiga omu buryo butahikire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost tourism and improve the local economy, community leaders are exploring various strategies. One of the most promising ideas involves reintroducing endangered species to the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulambuzi n'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu banoonyereza ku bukodyo obw'enjawulo. Ekimu ku biteeso ebisinga okusuubiza kizingiramu okuzzaawo ebika by'ebisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me limo piny ki medo rwom me lim I tedero, lutela me tedero tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat. Tye tam acel matye ki gen madit tutwal I kom kelo kwai lee mapat-pat matye kama rac tutwal I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor ewai lo elatok ka aitojokar edumune loka ikapun, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aingic iwaitin luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aomisio nuepolok noi imoriarit ainyakun iponesio luka itiang luejaasi toma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo mile otizaniri ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi geri ndundu eyi onda. Egata azi alu asi 'baza be angiri ndeni ri ma azi eri afa anyapa asea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ejizu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi n'okutunguura entaasya y'ekyaro, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bariyo nibaronda oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe. Kimwe aha biteekateeko ebirikukirayo kurungi n'okugaruraho enyamaishwa eziri omu kabi k'okuhwerekyerera omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming decline in wildlife populations, officials have been exploring various conservation strategies. One of the key measures proposed was the establishment of protected areas for endangered species.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebisolo by'omu nsiko okukendeera mu ngeri eyeeraliikiriza, abakungu babadde banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okubikuumamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyateesebwako kwe kuteekawo ebifo ebikuumibwa ebisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo.
