ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dwogo piny pa wel lee lum, lutic gubedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me gwoko lee lum. Gin acel ma pire tek ma kimito timone obedo cako kabedo ma ki gwoko iye kwai lee mapat-pat matye I peko me rweny.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aibiror naka itiang lukokutwi, eutasi eswamak airereonor iwaitin lu eyuwarere. Adiopet koboro luapolok lu aponi kitemokinai ngesi aitolomun aiboisio nu eyuaritai kanu itiang luejaasi toma ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani anyapa asea 'diyi ma kalafe esizu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi ebi geri ndundu eyi ma tambazu 'diyi onda. E'yo azi okporu 'bani lele 'diyi ma azi eri angu ta mbaza ni 'diyi sizu anyapa asea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeera kw'omuhendo gw'enyamaishwa, abakungu batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okuzibiika. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebyateirweho, n'okutandikaho emyanya y'okurindirwamu enyamaishwa eziri omu kabi k'okuhwaho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, wildlife populations have faced significant threats due to illegal hunting practices. To combat this alarming trend, the government has taken decisive action to protect endangered species.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ebisolo by'omu nsiko bisanga okutiisibwatiisibwa okw'amaanyi olw'okuyigga okutali mu mateeka. Okusobola okulwanyisa embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza, gavumenti ekoze eky'amaanyi okukuuma ebika by'ebisolo ebiri mu katyabaga k'okusaanawo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel lee lum tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal pi tim me dwaro lee iwi alii. Me lweny i kom peko man, gamente otimo jami mapol me gwoko kwai lee mapat-pat matye I peko me rweny.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina itiang lukokutwi keda aitukurianeta nuepolok noi kanuka ameja nu ekisil ecamakinit. Kanu aitikitik epone lo loerono noi, eswama apugan kagogongu kanu ayuarite iponesio luka itiang luepedorete aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, anyapa asea 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru 'diyi e'yo 'ba anyapa asea 'diyi o'dizu azita palaa ku 'diyisi. A'di 'dizu e'yo onzi 'di be, gamete 'du e'yo okporu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, enyamiishwa zitungire akabi k'amaani ahabw'okuhiiga omu buryo butahikire. Okurwanisa enkora egi, gavumenti ekozire kihango okurinda eby'obuhangwa ebiri omu kabi k'okuhwaho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost the local economy, community leaders have been discussing various strategies to attract visitors. One of the key initiatives that emerged from these discussions is to promote local tourism among the people.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu babadde bateesa ku bukodyo obw'enjawulo okusikiriza abagenyi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyava mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno kwe kutumbula eby'obulambuzi mu bantu.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me biacara me tedero, lutela me tedero gubedo ka lok I kom yoo mapat-pat me kelo wele. Yub acel ma pire tek ma okatti ki I kare me nywako lok enoni obedo tyelo kor lok me limo piny I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor edumune loka ikapun, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aitemitem iwaitin luegelegela lu ingalaunete ipejok. Adiopet koboro luapolok luaponi kitolomunai kotoma aineranara kangin ngesi aitopoloritor nuka elatok kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi e'bi agbatara gba geri ndundu eyini ecozu omu eyi ejizu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu efu'ba e'yo nzeza 'diyi ma alea ri eri e'yo angu oneza angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu o'bi eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura ebyentatsya y'ekyaro, abebembezi b'ebyaro batwire nibagamba aha mihanda etari emwe n'emwe y'okureeta abagyenyi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebyarugire omu kuhanuura oku, n'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent budget shortfalls, the local government is exploring various strategies to enhance financial resources. One of the primary goals is to boost the district's income through innovative initiatives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bbula ly'embalirira gye buvuddeko, gavumenti z'ebitundu zinoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okwongera ku buyambi bw'ensimbi. Ekimu ku bigendererwa ebikulu kwe kutumbula enyingiza ya disitulikiti okuyita mu buyiiya.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me nok pa lim ma otimme cokcok-ki, gamente me tedero tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me medo lim. Miti acel ma pire tek en aye me medo cente pa district kun gitiyo ki diro manyen mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos ekadakada loka ebajet, euta apugan naka atutubet aingic iwaitin luegelegela kanu aikeun ikapun. Adiopet kotoma alosikineta nuepolok ngesi aitopolor edumune loka ikapun ko disitrikt kowai lo aitolomunun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ako ni curu'do 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu robia esu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi onda. Asisile okporu 'diyi ma azi eri lonyi distrikiti niri ma omgbo otuzu geri e'yo o'diru 'diyi si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'embaririra eriho obwahati, gavumenti y'ebyaro eriyo neetandika kuronda oburyo bw'okwongyera ahaby'empiiha. Kimwe aha bigyendererwa ebikuru n'okwongyera aha ntatsya ya disiturikiti kurabira omu bintu ebisya.

eng_prompt: Students and teachers are excited to participate in an upcoming event focused on environmental awareness. To promote knowledge about local wildlife, the school has organized a wildlife conservation quiz.
lug_prompt: Abayizi n'abasomesa basanyufu okwetaba mu mukolo ogujja ogussa essira ku kumanyisa ku butonde bw'ensi. Okutumbula okumanya ku bisolo by'omu nsiko mu kitundu, essomero litegese okubuuzibwa ku kukuuma ebisolo by'omu nsiko.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan kacel ki lupwonye cwiny gi yom me bedo tye I yub matye kabino ma okeme ki rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa. Me tyelo kor ngec i kom jami makwo ilum, gang kwan ne oyubu peny me gwoko jami makwo ilum.
teo_prompt: Iyalamasi esisiak keda isisianakinak noi ajaikin toma opucit lo ebunit lo isisianakinete itunga nuikamunitos ejautene lo akwap. Kanu aitopolor acoa naikamunit itiang lukokutwi, etemoki esomero aingiseta nuka aidar itiang lukokutwi.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie ayikosi eyini muzu 'yeta emupi 'disi mile oziza angu ama agei ri ma dria ri 'yezu. Onita afa asea 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu, sukulu 'da otu obeta afa asea 'diyi ma tambazu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi n'abeegyesa bashemereirwe kwejumba omu mukoro ogurikwija ogurikukwata aha kumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Okutunguura okumanya ebirikukwata aha nyamaishwa z'omu ihanga, eishomero ritebekaniise ebibuuzo by'okurinda eby'omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the alarming decline in animal populations, local authorities launched an awareness campaign. They aimed to educate the community about the importance of protecting natural habitats and biodiversity.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okukendeera kw'obungi bw'ebisolo mu ngeri eyeeraliikiriza, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baatandikawo kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu. Baagenderera okusomesa abantu ku mugaso gw'okukuuma obutonde n'ebiramu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dwogo piny pa wel lee, lutela me tedero gucako yub me rweyo lwak. Gubedo ki miti me pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aibiror naka itiang, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kogeutu aisisianakin itunga. Alosikinet kec arai aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka ayuarite isuban luka Edeke keda iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani anyapa eyi ma kalafe esizu omgbo angirisi risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita imbata fezu 'ba eyini. Asisile eyini ri lezu ongulumu eyini imbata fezu orodri angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma tambazu tualu afa ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyerererwa kw'omuhendo gw'enyamaishwa, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro batandikireho ehururu y'okumanyisa abantu. Bakaba baine ekigyendererwa ky'okwegyesa abantu omugasho gw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'ebintu ebirikubaho.

eng_prompt: Nestled in the heart of East Africa, Uganda boasts a diverse and stunning landscape. Its natural beauty is a treasure trove for adventurers and nature lovers alike.
lug_prompt: Nga esangibwa mu mutima gwa East Africa, Uganda yeenyumiriza mu bifo eby'enjawulo era ebirabika obulungi. Obulungi bwayo obw'obutonde bwa muwendo nnyo eri abatambuze n'abaagazi b'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye I tung kunyango me lobo Afrika dok tye ki kabedo mamwonya tutwal. Ber pa cwec ma orumuwa obedo lonyo madit tutwal pi lulim piny ki jo ma maro cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Ejai Uganda toma atutubet naka East Africa, ejaasi keda aiboisio nuegelegela nuibusiak noi. Erai aibuses ke naejok noi kama ejaasi itunga luekotosi alosit aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma angu angu ndrizaru tu 'diyi kari Africa ma kala etuni efuria 'diyi ma alea. Angu 'da ma wura onyiru ri eri lonyi 'ba acipi angu ndundu eyi onepi 'diyini tualu 'ba afa nyakuni 'diyi le'baa 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eri ahagati y'amahanga g'oburugwa-izooba bwa Africa, eine obuhangwa bw'omutaano. Oburungi bwayo obw'obuhangwa n'obw'omuhendo ahabw'abarambuzi hamwe n'abarikukunda eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost tourism and local economy, the regional government has been exploring various strategies. One of their key initiatives focuses on promoting the natural beauty and cultural heritage of the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulambuzi n'ebyenfuna by'ekitundu, gavumenti y'ekitundu ebadde enoonyereza ku bukodyo obw'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bye bakola kwe kutumbula obulungi bw'obutonde n'ebyobuwangwa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo rwom me limo piny ki biacara me tedero, gamente me twok piny obedo katamo I kom yoo mapat-pat mapat-pat. Yubgi acel ma pire tek tye me tyelo kor ber pa cwec ma orumuwa ki tekwaro me kabedo man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor elatok keda edumune loka ikapun, euta apugan naka atutubet aingic iwaitin luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aitemonokineta kec nuepolok erai aitopolorite aibuses naka isuban keda inonosio luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo omu eyini emuzu angu ndundu eyi onezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu tualu e'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie, gamete angu 'da ma alea ri ebi geri ndundu eyi onda. Yeta yini okporu 'diyi ma azi asi 'ba e'yo onyiru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otuzu tualu e'yo suruni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'oburambuzi hamwe n'entatsya y'ekyaro, gavumenti y'ekyanga etwire neetandika kukoresa oburyo butari bumwe na bumwe. Emwe aha nteekateeka yaabo enkuru n'okushongyera oburungi bw'obuhangwa n'eby'obuhangwa bw'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: The diverse ecosystems of Uganda provide a rich habitat for wildlife. As a result, the country boasts an impressive array of animal species.
lug_prompt: Eby'obutonde eby'enjawulo mu Uganda biwa ebisolo by'omu nsiko ebifo ebirungi. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga lyewaana olw'ebika by'ebisolo eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Jami mapat-pat makwo I lobo Uganda miyo kabedo maber tutwal ki lee lum. Macalo adwogi ne, lobo man opong ki kwai lee mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Isuban luegelegela luko Uganda einakinitos aiboisio nuejokuka noi mama ejaasi itiang lukokutwi. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi akwap keda iponesio luegelegela luka itiang.
lgg_prompt: Afa idri nyapi kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi angu ndundu eyi fe anyapa asea 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, kari 'di ovu afusi anyapa esele ndu ndu 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa ebitarikushushana omuri Yuganda, nibiheereza enyamiishwa obutuuro burungi. N'ekyarugiremu,eihanga niryesharinga ahabw'obuhangwa bw'enyamaishwa.

eng_prompt: As the nation prepares to celebrate its achievements, a special event has been organized to recognize outstanding contributions. The president will be the guest of honour at the ceremony.
lug_prompt: Nga eggwanga lyetegekera okujaguza ebituukiddwaako, omukolo ogw'enjawulo gutegekeddwa okusiima emirimu egy'enjawulo. Pulezidenti y'ajja okubeera omugenyi omukulu ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka yubbe me kwero jami mabeco ma gutimo, yub ma pire tek tye me pwoyo jo ma gutimo tic maber tutwal. Ladit lobo aye obi bedo welo madit I kwer ne.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekapakina akwap ainumunum aitodolinikineta ke, etemokinitai epucit lo itegelikina kanu aisiyalamikin aswamisio nuejokuka. Ebeit lokapolon akwap araun epejonon lo angosibib kopucit.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni otuta 'yeria e'yo erini 'yele onyiru 'diyi inzizu, 'ba otu e'yo azi ndu ni 'ba azi ngapi onyiru 'diyi inzizu. Purezidenti ni mu adri omu inzile inzi omu 'da ma alea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Eihanga erikweteekateekyera okujaguza ebirikuba byahikireho,hotebekanisiibwe omukoro gw'omutaano gw'okusiima abakozire eby'omutaano. Purezidenti naija kuba omugyenyi mukuru aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: The local health department is organizing a community wellness event next week. As part of the initiative, there will be free blood screening on that day.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu kitundu kitegese omukolo gw'ebyobulamu mu kitundu wiiki ejja. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda okukolebwa, ku lunaku olwo wajja kubaawo okukebera omusaayi okw'obwereere.
ach_prompt: Dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I tedero tye ka yubu yub me gwoko kwo pa lwak I cabit mabino. Macalo but yub eni, kibi pimo remo me nono I nino enuni.
teo_prompt: Ebeit erionget loka angaleu aitemokin epucit loka angaleu osabiti ngol. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, eponio ainwak aokot atitai aparan kangin.
lgg_prompt: Amuti e'yo rua alanisi angu 'da ma alea ri ni otuta 'ye e'yo rua ala ni ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria wiki drusirisi. Otita 'di ma azi ru, ari ma o'bita pirini ri ni nga ovu o'du 'dasi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara eky'omukyanga nikitebeekanisa omukoro gw'okureeberera amagara g'abantu esande erikwija. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka, nihaza kubaho okukyebera eshagama okwa busha eizooba eryo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing population and increased traffic demands, local authorities prioritized infrastructure improvements. As a result, significant investments were made to enhance transportation networks.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'ebidduka obweyongera, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baakulembeza okulongoosa ebizimbe. N'ekyavaamu, ssente nnyingi zaateekebwa mu kutumbula ebyentambula.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano kacel ki peko me gudu, lutela me tedero gucako yubu jami ma mite pi lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, kiketo lim madit tutwal I tic me yubu yoo me wot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga keda eipud loka amotokan, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena kisingarenit aitojokar aiboisio. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ikapun luipu kanu aitojokar elose.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu mutukari eyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu tualu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba robia angiri geri acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire hamwe n'omuhendo gw'ebiiruka ogweyongyeire, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakataho enteekateeka y'okutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, entaasya y'amaani ekakorwa kutunguura eby'engyenda.

eng_prompt: As the sun set behind the mountains, the once vibrant streets fell silent, casting an eerie shadow over the familiar landscape. Residents began to notice the stark contrast between the town's lively past and its current desolation.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali egwa emabega w'ensozi, enguudo ezaali zijjudde abantu zaasirika, ne zissa ekisiikirize ku bifo bye twali tumanyi. Abatuuze baatandika okwetegereza enjawulo wakati w'ebyafaayo by'ekibuga n'okusaanawo kwaakyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka poto I ngee godi, gudu ma onongo yam obedo ma oywek tutwal-li guling woko, ma oketo tipo me lworo I kom kabedo ma gingeyo maber tutwal. Lutedero gucako neno apoka-poka madit tutwal ikin kabedo me boma man macon ma onongo dano dwong iye ki kabedo ma dano dwong iye tutwal I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kau naka imor, apotu irotin luapol noi kililokinos, kosodete aipikakin aanyunet naepol noi toma aiboisio nuajeniata kesi. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kogeutu aanyun atiaketait naepol noi naejai kiding atutubet kangin kapakio nukokau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni ecaria 'be ma vutia, nzila andra okporu 'diyi e'de ciri, e'de angu 'bani nile 'diyi ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do ndre e'yo tawuni 'da ni aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurabira enyima y'enshozi, enguuto ezaabaire nizihuumura zikasirara, zaata ekisiibo ky'ekitiinisa aha mwanya ogurikwetegyerezibwa. Abatuuragye bakatandika kureeba entaaniso y'amaani ahagati y'orurembo orwabaire rurimu abantu baingi n'oruriho hati.

eng_prompt: As cities seek sustainable solutions to reduce energy costs, many are exploring innovative lighting options. One promising alternative gaining popularity is the use of solar-powered street lights.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byenoonya engeri z'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya y'amasannyalaze, bangi banoonyereza ku ngeri z'okukolamu amataala. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okwettanirwa kwe kukozesa amataala g'oku nguudo agakolera ku masannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma citi tye ka yenyo yoo me dwoko piny wel mac, polgi tye ka yenyo yoo manyen me mac. Yo acel matye ki gen me nongo yweka en aye tic ki mac ma aa ki iceng I teng gudu.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi isitei aimo iwaitin lu itidisiaret kanu aitidisiar itiaisinei luka akim, eutasi luipu aingic aica. Idiopebore yenepedori aswam ejok ngesi aitwasam akimian nu orotin nu esola.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambo eyini geri ndundu eyini ecozu aci ma aje esizu 'diyi ndaria, eyi karakara eyi geri o'diru aci fezu 'diyi onda. E'yo azi 'bani lezu 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ra ri aci nzila eyini aci solar niri si 'diyi ma ayuza.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku endembo zirikuronda oburyo bw'okukyendeeza aha nshohoza y'amashanyarazi, baingi nibaronda oburyo bw'okukoresa amashanyarazi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikureetaho amaani n'okukoresa ebitaara by'ahanguuto ebirikukoresa amashanyarazi ga soora.

eng_prompt: Excitement filled the air as the community gathered to witness the unveiling of the long-awaited transportation hub. Colorful banners fluttered in the breeze, signaling the start of a new era for local commuters.
lug_prompt: Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga ng'abantu bakungaanidde okulaba okutongozebwa kw'ekitundu ky'ebyentambula ekibadde kisuubirwa okumala ebbanga. Ebendera eza langi ez'enjawulo zaabwatuka mu mpewo, nga ziraga entandikwa y'omulembe omupya eri abasaabaze b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gucokke me neno yabo kabedo me wot ma dano obedo kakuru pi kare malac. Benda me rangi mapat-pat obedo ka ngwec I yamo, ma nyutu acaki pa kare manyen pi luwot me tedero.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet kilelebunos noi kanu asesen aitegeario naka aiboisit naedaunitai noi naka alosit. Apotu imederan luegelegela kibiroros kokwam, itodunit ageunet naka apakio nuitetiak kanuka alotok luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea tualu ongulumu eyini trazu angu 'bani te acizu 'da ma ti zizu ri ndrezu. E'deta wura be wura be 'diyi ri aci oli alia, ecezu e'yo ewu o'di ni e'dozu 'ba aci'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okwerundaana okureeba okutongoza omwanya gw'eby'engyenda ogwabaire gurindiriirwe kumara obwire buraingwa. Ebendera z'erangi nyingi zikaba nizitamburira omu muyaga, zirikworeka entandikwa y'omurembe musya ahabw'abarikugyenda.

eng_prompt: As the city continues to grow and evolve, local officials have prioritized green spaces for community enjoyment. One of the most exciting projects underway is a new park designed to enhance the area's natural beauty.
lug_prompt: Nga ekibuga kigenda mu maaso okukula n'okukulaakulana, abakungu b'ebyalo bakulembezza ebifo ebirabika obulungi eby'okunyumirwa abantu. Omu ku pulojekiti ezisinga okusanyusa ezigenda mu maaso ye ppaaka empya ekoleddwa okutumbula obulungi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma city tye kamede ki dongo ki dongo, lutic me tedero guketo cwinygi I kom kabedo matye ki lum wek lwak gubed ki yomcwiny. Yub acel ma pud dong ber loyo ma tye kawot anyim en aye park manyen ma kiyubu me medo leng pa cwec ma ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit eibuga apoloun, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kisingarenitos aiboisio nu ekwam kanu aitelelio naka itunga. Idiopet kotoma opurojektin lu iswamao kes aiboisit naidarere itiang kanu aitojokar aibuses na akwap.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ni mu drile zoria azini zoria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe okpo angu onyi be 'diyi ma tambazu o'bi eyini ayiko esuzu. Otita azi alu ayiko fepi tu angu 'da ma alea ri eri pari anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu o'diru 'bani ede angu 'da ma onyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo ku nirugumizamu nirukura n'okutunguuka, abakuru b'ebyaro batandikire kutaho emyanya y'okushemererwamu abantu. Emwe aha purogyekiti ezirikushemeza munonga eziriyo ni paaka ensya etebekanisiibwe kutunguura oburungi bw'obuhangwa bw'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: The delivery schedule for the day has been finalized, and the drivers are ready to unload the goods. As a result, the lorries will park outside the taxi park.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okutambuza ebintu ku lunaku emaliriziddwa, era abavuzi beetegefu okusitula ebyamaguzi. N'ekinaavaamu, loole zijja kusimba wabweru wa paaka ya takisi.
ach_prompt: Yub me cwalo jami I nino enuni dong otum dok ludwo mutoka tye atera me cwalo jami. Macalo adwogi ne, lorri gubi cung woko ki I taxi park.
teo_prompt: Aponi ongetakinai ainapeta nuka aitodolikin iboro aparan kangin, ido ekapakina iderepan alemun iboro. Kanuka ngun, epote ilorei aibwo kokinga naka aiboisit naidarere itiang.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani afa ojizu o'du 'dasi 'bo, dereva eyi ngonde afa ozizaru 'diyi ofuzu. E'yo 'disi, mutukari lorri ru 'diyi nga pa so pari takisi paki niri ma alia amve.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka y'okutwara ebintu eizooba eryo, eherize kukorwa, kandi abavugi beteekateekire kwihamu ebintu. Ekyarugiremu, za roore niziija kwemerera aheeru ya paaka ya takisi.

eng_prompt: Without timely access to financial resources, project managers struggle to allocate tasks effectively. This uncertainty creates a ripple effect throughout the entire planning process.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutafuna ssente mu budde, abaddukanya pulojekiti bazibuwalirwa okugabanya obulungi emirimu. Obutali bukakafu buno bukosa enteekateeka yonna.
ach_prompt: Labongo nongo cente ikare ki kome, ludor yub nongo tek tutwal me poko tic maber. Bedo ki akala-kala man kelo peko ikare me yubu jami weng.
teo_prompt: Arai mam epedorete adumunun ikapun kotoma apak, etiono eyaitok ipurojektin aikor aswamisinei ejok. Ationis na eyangauni ationis naepol noi kotoma ainapeta kere nuka aitemonokin.
lgg_prompt: Afa robia ni 'diyi ma esuta sa'wa dria kuri kokoru, drice'ba otita 'da ni 'diyi dri ci azi eyi awazu kililiru. E'yo 'bani nile ku 'di ni e'yo eyi 'ye sa'wa dria 'bani otita eyi 'yezu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abarikukurira purogyekiti tibarikubaasa kutunga esente omu bwire, tibarikubaasa kugabana emirimo yaabo kurungi. Obutaine buhame obu, nibureetaho oburemeezi omu nteekateeka yoona.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns raised by community members, the district leader held a press conference to address the situation. During the event, he firmly denied any wrongdoing and emphasized the integrity of the city's operations.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera okwaleetebwa abantu b'ekitundu, omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yatuuza olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okwogera ku mbeera. Mu mukolo, yeegaana n'amaanyi ebikolobero byonna era n'akkaatiriza obwesimbu bw'emirimu gy'ekibuga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye kamede pa lwak, latela me district oloko ki lucoo lok angeya me lok I kom ngo matye katimme. Ikare me yub enoni, en okwero tim marac mo keken dok owaco ni tic pa city tye maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka itunga luka atutubet, abu engarenon lo edisitrikt kitolomu einer keda lu iyemuto kanu aitemitem akiro ngun. Kotoma opucit, abu ngesi konger aswamisio nuarokok ido abu kitogogong ebe ejokuna aswamisio nuka esite.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi 'ba ongulumu'a 'diyi vurisi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi 'ye e'yo nze 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie e'yo nde ma aza kozu. Sawa omu 'da nirisi, ga agata e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria okporu azini 'ba asi e'yo 'yeta aku ambo 'da ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira kw'abantu b'omukyanga,omwebembezi wa disiturikiti akakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru kukora aha nshonga egyo. Omu mukoro, akeehakana kimwe ebikorwa ebitahikire kandi yahamya oburingaaniza bw'emirimo y'orurembo.

eng_prompt: Plans for the new community development have been unveiled, showcasing various amenities to enhance local living. Among these exciting features, the park will have a big shopping mall.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka z'enkulaakulana y'ekitundu empya zitongozeddwa, nga ziraga ebintu eby'enjawulo okutumbula obulamu bw'abantu b'omu kitundu. Mu bintu bino ebisanyusa, ppaaka ejja kubaamu ekizimbe ekinene eky'amaduuka.
ach_prompt: Kiyabo yub me dongo kabedo manyen, ma nyutu jami ma mite me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lutedero. I kin jami ma yomo cwiny magi, park eni obi bedo ki kacat madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuka apol naka itunga luitetiak, itodunitos iboro lu itwasamao kanu aitojokar aijar naka itunga. Kotoma aiboisio nu eyalamasi, epote aiboisit ngin ajaut keda aiboisit naegwelanarere iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do otita o'diru angu ezoma ni ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi, e'dazu afa ndundu eyini aa'zu 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma edri otuzu. Afa ndrizaru 'diyi ma eselea, angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia, angu tujari 'yezu amboru ni nga ovu ci.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka z'entunguuka y'ekyanga ensya zitongozibwa, ezirikworeka ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kutunguura entuura y'abantu. Omu bintu ebirikushemeza ebi, paaka neija kugira ekizimbe ky'amaduuka kihango.

eng_prompt: In recognition of the community's achievements, a special event has been organized to celebrate local contributions. The minister will be the guest of honour for the day.
lug_prompt: Mu kusiima ebituukiddwaako ekitundu, omukolo ogw'enjawulo gutegekeddwa okujaguza obuyambi bw'ekitundu. Minisita y'ajja okuba omugenyi omukulu ku lunaku.
ach_prompt: Macalo pwoc pi jami ma lwak otimo, yub mo ma pire tek dong kiyubu me kwero jami ma lwak omiyo. Minista aye obi bedo welo madit I nino enuni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisiyalamikin aitodolikineta nuka itunga, etemokinitai epucit lo itegelikina kanu ainumunum agangat naka itunga. Ebuni eminisita araun epejonon lo angosibib aparan ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo inzita fezu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria, 'ba otu e'yo azi wura ndusi ni eyini ani afa eyini fe 'diyi inzizu. Minisita ni mu adri omu inzile inzi o'du 'disi ri i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okusiima ebikozirwe abantu,hotebekanisiibwe omukoro gw'omutaano okujaguza obuhwezi bw'abantu. Minisita naija kuba omugyenyi mukuru aha eizooba eryo.

eng_prompt: Many students in our community face financial barriers to higher education. To address this issue, the government has implemented various funding programs.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi mu kitundu kyaffe basanga obuzibu mu by'ensimbi okugenda mu matendekero aga waggulu. Okukola ku nsonga eno, gavumenti etaddewo pulogulaamu z'ensimbi ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol i kabedo wa nongo peko me lim me cito i gang kwan me rwom ma malo. Me tyeko peko man, gamente okatti ki yub mapat-pat me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu kotoma atutubetekosi etereikina keda atiokisio nuka ikapun kanu alomar toma asioman naka okuju. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuegelegela nuka aigang ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi amavile ongulumu ri ma alea karakara eyi e'yo robia ni 'diyi esu eyini ani muzu onita uruleruri ma alea ku. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba otita ndundu robia fezu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi omu kyanga kyaitu, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente omu kwega aha rurengo rwaheiguru. Okukora aha nshonga egi,gavumenti eteire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi z'okushashurira.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the students eagerly awaited the results of their primary leaving examination. Their teachers had high hopes for them, believing they had the potential to excel.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukola ennyo n'obumalirivu, abayizi balindirira n'obwagazi ebyava mu bigezo byabwe eby'akamalirizo. Abasomesa baabwe baabateekamu essuubi ddene, nga balowooza nti balina obusobozi okusukkuluma.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, lutino kwan gubedo kakuru adwogi penygi me cinia. Lupwonye gi gubedo ki gen madit tutwal I komgi, kun gi tamo ni gitye ki kero me kato peny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu esisiak idarakisi akiro nuka aingito nakawasia. Ajaasi isisianakinak kec keda amuno naepol noi kanejaas kesi, aomit kesi ebe epedorete kesi aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, sukulu anzi 'da eyi te asi driasi agata eyivile obeta pramari ondresi 'diyiniri te. Imba'ba eyivile 'diyi ma asi'baza eyi ma dria angiri eyini egazu eyi ma okpo ecozu agazu ra risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukora n'amaani n'obweziriki, abeegi bakategyereza ebyarugire omu bigyezo byabo eby'akamalirizo ga puraimare. Abeegyesa baabo bakaba baine amasiko maingi aharibo, barikwikiriza ngu nibabaasa kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many families in the community struggled financially, making it difficult for children to continue their education. As a result, numerous students faced the harsh reality of having to drop out after primary school.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu kitundu gaabonaabona mu by'ensimbi, ekyakaluubiriza abaana okugenda mu maaso n'okusoma kwabwe. N'ekyavaamu, abayizi bangi baayolekagana n'embeera enzibu ey'okuva mu ssomero nga bamaze pulayimale.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol i kabedo ne gubedo ki peko me lim ma oweko obedo tek tutwal ki lutino me mede ki kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol gunongo peko me weko kwan I nge tyeko kwan me puraimari.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikalia luipu kotoma atutubet ongurianata keda ikapun, ido abu ijaik idwe ationis ainyikokin asioman kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu esisiak luipu odumutu atiokisio nuka aibiror kosomero akaulo naka epuraimare.
lgg_prompt: Familia ongulumu 'da ma alea karakara eyi dri ci e'yo robia nirisi eyini ani fezu anzi eyini muzu onita be drile. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyini sukulu kuzu pramari 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu kyanga gakaba gaine oburemeezi bw'esente, ekyabaire kigumira abaana kugumizamu n'emishomo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi bakashanga oburemeezi bw'okuruga omu mashomero ga puraimare.

eng_prompt: Many families in rural communities struggle with limited resources and infrastructure. As a result, educational opportunities for children in these areas are often severely restricted.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu byalo galwanagana n'ebikozesebwa n'ebizimbe ebitono. N'ekivuddemu, emikisa gy'okusoma eri abaana mu bitundu bino gitera okukugirwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol matye icaro gitye ki peko me lim ki jami ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, gum me kwan pa lutino I kabedo magi ipol kare bedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu lukocaloi etereikina keda iboro lu ikidioko. Kanuka ngun, ikidioko noi arerengesio nuka idwe lu aiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara angu caluru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci afa ayuzaru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe were si. E'yo 'disi, drileba onita ni anzi nyiri angu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu byaro nigarwana n'eby'obugaiga n'ebyombeko bikye. N'ekyarugiremu, emigisha y'okwegyesa abaana omu myanya egi, buriijo neezibirwa munonga.

eng_prompt: Many students face challenges that can significantly impact their academic success. Among these challenges, health issues often play a crucial role in hindering their ability to perform well in school.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okuyinza okukosa ennyo obuwanguzi bwabwe mu byensoma. Mu kusoomoozebwa kuno, ensonga z'ebyobulamu zitera okukola omulimu omukulu mu kulemesa obusobozi bwabwe okukola obulungi mu ssomero.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol ginongo peko ma twero balo kwangi. I kin peko magi, peko me yot kom ipol kare kelo peko madit tutwal I kom kero gi me timo peny maber.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esisiak luipu keda atiokisio nuepedorete aitolitol akerianut kec kotoma asioman. Kotoma atiokisio nu, ejaasi duc angaleu keda epelu loepedori aitikitik eswamae kec loajokan kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyini esu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri ezazu ra 'diyi esu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo alata ni 'diyi tutuni azi okporu nga eyini ecozu agazu muke sukulu'a ri atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubagiraho akabi omu mishomo yaabo. Omu buremeezi obu, oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara nibukira kuremesa abaana kukora kurungi omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: After months of searching for a suitable program, she finally found one that would help her sons develop their skills. The support from the community made a significant difference in their lives.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi ng'anoonya puloogulaamu esaanira, yasobola okufuna eyo eyandisobozesezza batabani be okukulaakulanya obukugu bwabwe. Obuyambi okuva mu kitundu bwaleetawo enjawulo mu bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwee mapol me yenyo pwony ma opore, en dong onongo pwony ma twero konyo lutino awobene me dongo diro gi. Kony ma aa ki bot lwak okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aimo epurojekt loajokan, abu ngesi kodum epurojekt loingarakini isapake aitopol acoasineikec. Agangat naka itunga abu koinak aijulanakineta kotoma aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia otita azi kililiru ni ndazu 'bori ma vutia, esu asizu alu ecopi i vile agupianzi 'diyi ma aza kopi ecozu yi ma ondua ezozuri ra. Atita engazu ongulumu eyivu ri eji ojata okporu eyi ma edri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi arikuronda puroguraamu erikwetengwa, akahendera yashanga erikubaasa kuhwera batabani be kutunguura emyoga yaabo. Obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu bukakora empindahinduka y'amaani omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite their best efforts to save money, the family's financial situation has become increasingly dire. With rising living costs and unexpected medical expenses, they find themselves struggling to make ends meet.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bafubye nnyo okutereka ssente, embeera y'amaka gaabwe ey'eby'enfuna yeeyongedde okuba embi. Olw'ebbeeyi y'obulamu okulinnya n'ensaasaanya y'eddwaliro etasuubirwa, beesanga nga balwana okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek me gwoko cente, peko me lim pa lugang ne tye ka medde ameda. Ki mede pa wel cente ma mite pi kwo ki cente ma mite pi nongo kony me yot kom, ginongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu kanu aimono ikapun, erono noi ejautene loka ikapun loka ekale kangol. Keda aijar naepol noi keda ikapun lu amukian lu mam eomitai, etionikinitos kesi aitodolikin ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo 'ba tro sende ta mbazu ra ti, familia 'da ma e'yo robianiri eca curu'do onzi. Aje idri nyazani tuzu tualu aje arojoni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi pie, yi yi esu dri ciria afa dria esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwabo kurungi kubiika sente, embeera y'eka yaabo omu by'entaasya eyeyongyeire kuba mbi. Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera hamwe n'enshohoza y'eby'amarwariro etarikwetegyerezibwa, nibeshanga nibarwana kwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: Despite their best efforts and a strong start, the village football team faced tough competition. As the match progressed, it became clear that the visitors were a formidable opponent.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka era nga baatandika bulungi, ttiimu y'omupiira ey'oku kyalo yasanga okuvuganya okw'amaanyi. Omupiira bwe gwagenda gugenda mu maaso, kyalabika bulungi nti abagenyi baali ba maanyi nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek dok gucako maber, team odilo me caro onongo pyem matek tutwal. I kare ma tuku tye ka wot anyim, onen atyer kamaleng ni wele gubedo lupyem matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu, apotu etimu loka emopira loka ecaalo odumutu abolobol naepol noi. Neautar abolia ngin alosit, apotu kojenutu ebe eraasi ipejok luitukurianete noi.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo dria ma talasi azini e'deta okporuri ma talasi, amuti mupira tuzani calua 'diyi fu dri abala okporu be. A'bala 'da ni mu drile, eri eca e'da kini 'ba omu ru 'diyi 'ba azi okporu ni eyi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu tiimu y'omupiira y'ekyaro etandikire kurungi, ekatunga okuhayahayana kw'amaani. Omupiira ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu abagyenyi bakaba bari ab'amaani.

eng_prompt: After a series of closely contested matches, the competition has become increasingly intense. As a result, the standings have tightened, leading to an unusual situation in the league.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuvuganya ennyo, okuvuganya kweyongedde. N'ekivuddemu, ensengeka yeyongedde okunywezebwa, ekiviiriddeko embeera etali ya bulijjo mu liigi.
ach_prompt: Inge pyem tuku mapol, pyem odoko tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me pyem odoko tek tutwal, ma okelo peko ma pe obedo tye I pyem tuku eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolobol naepol noi, apol abolobol noi. Kanuka ngun, apolor adoketait, ido ayangau ejautene lomam etapit kotoma abolobol.
lgg_prompt: A'bala okporu 'diyi ma vutia, baka seza 'di eca curu'do okporu. E'yo 'disi, pari avita ni 'diyi ma okpo tu ra, e'yo 'di fepi abala 'di ma alia e'yo onzi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emizaano y'amaani, okuhayahayana kweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora y'emizaano eyeyongyeire, ekireesireho embeera etari ya buriijo omu riigi.

eng_prompt: With a rich history and a passionate fan base, Proline football club has consistently demonstrated excellence on the field. Their commitment to developing local talent has solidified their reputation in Ugandan football.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebyafaayo eby'obugagga n'abawagizi abanyiikivu, Proline kiraabu y'omupiira eyongedde okulaga obusukkulumu mu kisaawe. Okwewaayo kwabwe okukulaakulanya ebitone bya wano kunywezezza erinnya lyabwe mu mupiira gwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: Ki tekwaro ki lucwak mapol, dul tuku odilo me Proline pol kare nyutu rwom ma malo I bar tuku. Cwinygi me pwonyo lutino kwan me lobo man okonyo gi me dongo nying gi I tuku odilo me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Keda akiro nukolo nuipu noi keda egangitok lueminasi noi, etodunit ekilabu loka emopira loka Proline ebe ejokuna noi kotoma oisawe. Alosikinetekec naka aitopoloun atalanta nuka atutubet abu kitogogong ekirorikec kotoma abolia naka emopira koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Adi lonyi be tualu 'ba atita fepi avasi 'diyi pie, amuti mupira avizu Proline niri e'da e'yo onyiru pari avita ni 'diyi ma alia. Asi 'baza yini talanta akua 'diyi ezozu ri otu yi ma ru mupira tuza kari Uganda niri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'omupiira eya Proline, ahabw'ebyafaayo byayo bingi hamwe n'abahagizi baayo abarikukunda munonga omupiira, egumizemu kworeka oburungi bwayo omu kishayi. Okwehayo kwabo omu kutunguura emyoga y'abantu b'omwihanga, kigumire eiziina ryabo omu muzaano gw'omupiira gw'ebigyere.

eng_prompt: Both teams fought hard throughout the game, showcasing impressive skills and determination. As the final whistle blew, the score remained tied, leaving fans on the edge of their seats.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu zombi zaalwana nnyo mu muzannyo gwonna, nga ziraga obukugu obw'ekitalo n'obumalirivu. Nga enfuufu esembayo efuuwa, obubonero busigala nga bukwataganye, ne buleka abawagizi ku mabbali g'ebifo byabwe.
ach_prompt: Tim aryo weng gulwenyo matek tutwal I kare me tuko weng, kun gunyuto diro ki miti matek tutwal. Ikare ma ki goyo whistle me agiki, makci odong marom, ma oweko lucwak obedo iwi komgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itimun ngun kere ojioto kagogong noi kotoma abolia kangin, itodunitos acoa naejok noi keda apodokinit. Neautar ainom epur loka awasia, apotu igolon luka emopira kojalakisi egangitok aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Amuti avitani iri 'diyi 'di a'di avasi abala 'da ma alea dria, eyi e'da ondua onyiru azini asi 'baza e'dazu. O'duko asizuri ni aviria, kalafe awi trotro, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi ku yi vile kiti ma kalatia.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu zombi zikarwana munonga omu muzaano gwona, zikworeka emyoga n'obumazima. Obu efurembe y'ahamuheru yaabaire neefuuhirira, obubonero bukaguma buri bumwe, ekyarekire abahagizi aha rubaju rw'entebe zaabo.

eng_prompt: In a significant move to promote gender equality in sports, a leading organization has announced its commitment to support women's football initiatives. This funding aims to enhance training programs and improve facilities for female athletes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'amaanyi okutumbula omwenkanonkano mu byemizannyo, ekitongole ekikulembedde kirangiridde obweyamo bwakyo okuwagira enteekateeka z'omupiira gw'abakazi. Ensimbi zino zigendereddwamu kutumbula pulogulaamu z'okutendekebwa n'okutereeza ebifo eby'abazannyi abakyala.
ach_prompt: I yoo acel ma pire tek tutwal me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo I tuku, dul mo madit otyeko cwalo lok angeya me cwako yub me tuku odilo pa mon. Cente man ki keto pi tyelo kor yub me pwonye ki yubu jami ma mite pi lutuko ma mon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naepol noi naka aitopolorite eidicane lo angor kotoma aboliasio, abu erionget lo angosibib kolimo ebe ebuni ngesi aigang abolia naka emopira naka angor. Alosikinet naka ikapun ngun erai aitojokar ainapeta nuka aituutoonor ka aitojokar aiboisio nuka akerak nungor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi okporu lezu e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri otuzu avita eyi ma alea, amuti azi okporu ni azi e'yo erini lezu atita fezu e'yo oku eyini mupira avizu 'diyi ma dria ri 'bo. Robia feza 'diri lezu otita imbatani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi otuzu 'ba ongu onzu'ba okuru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'amaani y'okureetaho oburinganiza omu by'emizaano, ekitongore ekikuru kimanyise ngu nikiija kuhwera abakazi omu by'emizaano. Esente ezi nizigyenderera okutunguura enteekateeka y'okutendeka n'okutunguura ebyombeko by'abazaani abakazi.

eng_prompt: The tournament has a rich history and features teams from various levels of the sport. Each year, clubs compete fiercely for the prestigious title.
lug_prompt: Empaka zirina ebyafaayo bingi era zirimu ttiimu okuva ku mitendera egy'enjawulo egy'omuzannyo. Buli mwaka, ttiimu zivuganya nnyo ku ngule ey'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: Pyem tuku eni tye ki tekwaro madit tutwal dok tye ki team ma aa ki I rwom me tuku mapatpat. Mwaka ki mwaka, dul tuku mapat-pat pyem matek tutwal pi tuku odilo me rwom ma malo.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi abolobol ngin keda akiro nukolo noi ido ejaas itimun luka adokena nuegelegela nuka abolia. Kangol ekaru, eboloboloete ikilabun noi kanu adumun apapula ngin.
lgg_prompt: Abala 'da ma adi angiri dika amuti avita ni 'diyi enga angu avita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea. Eli vusi, amuti mupira avizu 'diyi a'bala 'ye okporu kokobi inzile inzi ri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Empaka ziine ebyafaayo bingi kandi zirimu tiimu kuruga omu myanya etari emwe. Buri mwaka, za kiraabu nizihayahayana munonga ahabw'ekikopo ky'ekitiinisa.

eng_prompt: Despite their strong performance throughout the tournament, the team faced a tough opponent in the knockout stage. They fought hard, but ultimately fell short of their goal.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baakola bulungi mu mpaka zonna, ttiimu baayolekaganye n'abavuganya abakambwe mu luzannya olusooka. Baalwana nnyo naye ku nkomerero baalemererwa okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutimo maber tutwal I pyem tuku ne weng, dul tuku ne gurwatte ki lupyem matek tutwal I pyem tuku me agiki. Lweny matek tutwal, ento I agiki ne pe gucobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi iswamata ejok kotoma abolobol, apotu etimu odumutu abolobol naepol noi kotoma abolobol. Apotu kesi ojioto kagogong, konye kawasia mam apotu kopedosi adolokin alosikinetekec.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma agata tro ovuzu onyiru abala 'da ma alea dria ra ti, amuti 'da fu dri 'ba ageti otipi okporu 'diyi be avita mupira avizu 'diyi ma alea. Eyi 'di a'di okporu te eyi awini e'yo eyini lele 'diyi esu ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu tiimu yaabaire ekozire kurungi omu mpaka zoona, ekatunga omuteezi w'amaani omu mpaka z'okubanza. Bakarwana n'amaani, kwonka ahamuheru tibarabaasize kuhika aha kigyendererwa kyabo.

eng_prompt: After a thrilling tournament filled with intense matches, the Ondupakara faced off against the Vipers in the highly anticipated cup finals. Fans from both sides filled the stadium, eager to witness who would claim the championship title.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'empaka ezinyuma ezijjudde emipiira egy'amaanyi, Onduparaka yattunka ne Vipers mu fayinolo z'ekikopo ezaabadde zisuubirwa ennyo. Abawagizi okuva ku njuyi zombi bajjuza ekisaawe nga beesunga okulaba ani anaawangula ekikopo kya bannantammegwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee pyem tuku ma oyomo cwiny tutwal, Ondupakara orwatte ki Vipers I pyem tuku me agiki ma byek tye I komgi tutwal. Lucwak tuku I tenge aryo weng opong ki yomcwiny me neno anga ma obiloyo pyem tuku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abolobol naejaasi keda aboliasio nuelangir, apotu Ondupakara kitijioto keda Vipers kotoma aboliasio nuka awasia nuka eikopo. Apotu egangitok luka atutubena ngun kere kilelebunos kosawe loka abolia, ekotosi aanyun ingai bo ebuni aitelekaar apapula naka etelekarak.
lgg_prompt: A'bala avita ni ndrizaru tu 'diyi ma vutia, Onduparaka fu dri Vipers be avita asizuri ma alia. Ba atita fepi engazu kala iri 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ga pari avita ni 'diyi ma alia avasi ndrezu a'di ni nga avita nde 'ye ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'empaka z'amaani, Onduparaka ekateeraana na Vipers omu mpaka z'akamaririzo z'ekikopo. Abahagizi kuruga omu mbaju zombi, bakajuura ekishaayi, baine ekihika ky'okureeba owaabaire naija kutwara ekikopo ky'empaka z'omupiira.

eng_prompt: After a grueling season filled with intense training and strategic planning, the players were hopeful for a shot at the championship. They poured their hearts into every game, determined to make their mark.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'akaseera akakooya akajjudde okutendekebwa okw'amaanyi n'okuteekerateekera, abazannyi baabadde basuubira essuubi ly'okukuba akalulu mu mpaka za bannantammegwa. Baateeka omutima gwabwe mu buli muzannyo, nga bamalirivu okussaawo ekifaananyi kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge kare me pyem tuku ma obedo ma ol ki pwonye matek tutwal ki yube maber tutwal, lutuku onongo gitye ki gen me cobo miti gi I pyem tuku odilo. Guketo cwinygi I tuku weng, kun gimoko tamgi me timo gin maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naetiono noi naka aituutoonor keda aitemonokin, ajaasi aboliak keda amuno naka aitelekaar abolobol naka emopira. Apotu kesi ibwaikisi etau kec toma aboliasio kere, ekapakina aswam nuepedorete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa avita niri ma vutia, embata okporu azini otuta okporu 'diyisi, 'ba avita avipi 'diyi asi 'baza be drileba avita 'yezu avita nde ma alia. Eyi 'ba eyi ma asi avita dria eyi ma alea eyini ani asi 'bazu eyi ma ru ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bwingi bw'okwetendeka n'okuteekateekyera, abazaani bakaba baine amatsiko g'okwejumba omu mpaka z'empaka z'omupiira. Bakata omutima gwabo omu mizaano yoona, barikumariirira kukora akamanyiso kaabo.

eng_prompt: After a thrilling season in the domestic league, the team secured a spot in the prestigious tournament. Their impressive performance has earned them the opportunity to showcase their talent on a continental stage.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa sizoni ey'essanyu mu liigi y'awaka, ttiimu yafuna ekifo mu mpaka ez'ekitiibwa. Omutindo gwabwe ogw'ekitalo gubawadde omukisa okulaga ebitone byabwe ku mutendera gwa ssemazinga.
ach_prompt: Ingee tuku maber tutwal I pyem tuku me gang, dul tuku ne gunongo kabedo I pyem tuku ma oywek tutwal. Kit ma gutimo kwede ber tutwal oweko gunongo gum me nyuto talanta gi I lobo Afrika.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainumunum noi kotoma abolobol naka ore, abu etimu kodum aiboisit toma abolobol naka angosibib. Eswamae kec loajokan ijaikit kesi arereng naka aitodiar atalanta kec kotoma akwapin ace.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti azi ndrizaru avita akua 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, amuti mupira avizu 'da esu pari avita okporu 'diyi ma alia ra. Yeta eyini onyiru 'diyi fe eyini drileba eyi ma feta Munguni fe eyini ri e'dazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire burungi omu riigi y'omuka, tiimu ekatunga omwanya omu mpaka z'ekitiinisa. Enkora yaabo nungi, ebaheire omugisha gw'okworeka etaraanta yaabo aha rurengo rw'ensi yoona.

eng_prompt: After a series of intense games, the tournament bracket has been finalized. The teams that did not advance will face off in a loser's match tomorrow.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuzannya emizannyo egy'amaanyi, empaka ziwedde. Ttiimu ezitaayitawo zijja kuttunka enkya mu mupiira gw'abawanguddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee tuku matek tutwal, yub me pyem ne dong otum. Team ma pe gukato gubi pyem I tuko ma ki goyo gi diki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aboliasio nuipu noi, aponi kongetakinai ainapeta nuka abolobol. Itimun lu mam apotu kotuboros epote abolobol moi.
lgg_prompt: Avita okporu 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba asi e'yo avita ni 'diyi ma dria 'bo. Amuti mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi mupira avipi
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuzaana emizaano y'amaani, empaka z'omupiira zihwaire. Tiimu ezitaragyendeire omu maisho, niziija kuzaana omuzaano gw'okugwa nyenkyakare.

eng_prompt: In recent years, concerns have been raised about the increasing pressure on land resources in Uganda. Many communities are facing challenges as powerful entities seek to acquire land for various developments.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okweraliikirira kubaddewo ku bikwata ku kunyigirizibwa kw'eby'obugagga by'ettaka mu Uganda. Ebitundu bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa ng'ebitongole eby'amaanyi bigezaako okufuna ettaka ly'enkulaakulana ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom dongo pa ngom I lobo Uganda. Kabedo mapol tye ka nongo peko ikare ma dul mapat-pat matye ki twero tye ka yenyo ngom me dongo lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanu aiyatakin na iboro lu alupok ko Uganda. Etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio naarai ekotosi iriongeta luapolok adumun alupok kanu aitopol.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'bi asi otiza eji e'yo okpo feza nyaku ma dria kari Uganda niri ma alea ri ma dria. Ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru esu amuti okporu 'diyi ni geri nda eyini ani nyaku esuzu angu ezoma ni ndundu 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha bikwatiraine n'eby'eitaka omu Uganda. Ebyanga bingi nibishanga oburemeezi, ahabw'ebitongore by'amaani kuronda eitaka ry'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: The local government is considering various sites for development. One option that has come to their attention is a parcel of land that could be ideal for their plans.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu erowooza ku bifo eby'enjawulo eby'okukulaakulanya. Ekintu ekimu kye batunuulidde ye ttaka eryandibadde eddungi okuteekamu pulaani zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero tye ka neno kabedo mapatpat me dongo lobo. Gin acel ma gunongo obedo ngom ma twero bedo ber tutwal pi yub meggi.
teo_prompt: Euta apugan naka atutubet airereor aiboisio nuegelegela kanu apol. Idiopebore yenepedori kesi aswam ngesi alupok nuepedorete kesi aitemonokin.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ni angu ndundu eyi ma ezota ma dria. E'yo azi alu emu'ba yi ma dria ri nyaku azi ecopi adripi onyiru otita yini 'diyi 'yezu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro eriyo nereeba emyanya mingi y'entunguuka. Omuringo gumwe ogu batungire n'eitaka eririkubaasa kuba rirungi aha nteekateeka zaabo.

eng_prompt: After decades of hard work and dedication to his family farm, the old man was devastated when he learned that the government had seized his property for a new development project. He believes he deserves fair compensation for the loss of his land and the memories tied to it.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu ku faamu y'amaka ge, omusajja omukadde yakwatibwa ensonyi bwe yakimanya nti gavumenti yali ewambye ettaka lye okukola pulojekiti empya ey'enkulaakulana. Alowooza nti agwanidde okuliyirirwa mu bwenkanya olw'okufiirwa ettaka lye n'ebijjukizo ebikwatagana nalyo.
ach_prompt: Inge tic matek pi mwaki mapol ki keto cwiny I poto pa jo me ode, laco ma oti-ni cwinye otur tutwal I kare ma oniang ni gamente omako jamine pi yub me dongo lobo manyen. En tye ki niyee ni omyero ki cul en pi ngom ma orwenyo ki jami ma obedo ka timme I kare ma okato angec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina nuka amisiri naka ekaleke, abu epolon ngol kowolio noi najenunia ngesi ebe abu apugan ikamar alupok ke kanu epurojekt loitetet loka apol. Iyuunit ngesi ebe ibusakinit ngesi aitac ikapun luedolitos kanuka aibiror naka alupok ke keda aiituneta nuikamunitos alupok ngun.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara erini azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza familia erivileri vile amvuari ma alia 'bori ma vutia, agu dezari ovu candisi erini e'yo onizu kini gamete 'du i vile angu 'diyi otita angu ezoma ni o'diruni 'yezu. Eri ai ra kini le 'ba ma ofe eri geri kililiru si erini i vile nyaku avizu azini e'yo dria erini ega 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo aha faamu y'eka ye, omushaija omugurusi akakwatwa enaku ku yaamanyire ngu gavumenti ekwasire eitaka rye kukora purogyekiti y'entunguuka. Naayikiriza ngu ashemereire kurihirirwa omu muringo oguhikire ahabw'okufeerwa eitaka rye hamwe n'ebintu ebirikukwata ahari ryo.

eng_prompt: As we reviewed the property boundaries, we noticed some discrepancies in the land survey. It became clear that there were aspects of our ownership that we had overlooked.
lug_prompt: Bwe twekenneenya ensalo z'ettaka, twalabye obutakkaanya mu kupima ettaka. Kyategeerekeka bulungi nti waaliwo ebintu ebikwata ku bwannannyini bwaffe bye twali tubuusizza amaaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka ngiyo wang ngom, waneno apoka-poka mogo I yub me ngiyo ngom. Onen atyer kamaleng ni tye jami mukene I kom twero wa ma pe waneno.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio airereor ikoruo luka alupok, apotu sio awanyutu amamus acamanar kotoma aingic alupok. Aponi kojenunai ebe ajaasi iponesio luka apedorosiowok lumam sio apodokinit.
lgg_prompt: Amani angu 'da ma boda eyi ma ale andriria, ama ndre e'yo azi eyi ma esele coza angu 'da ma eti ondaza ma alea 'diyi ra. Eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo ama vile 'diyi ma azi amani adile 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Kutwarikushwijuma ensharo z'eitaka, tukareeba obutaikirizana omu kucondooza eitaka. Kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hariho ebintu by'obukama bwaitu ebi twabaire tutaireho amaisho.

eng_prompt: In many urban areas, buildings that are no longer deemed safe or useful often receive a specific designation. This marking serves as a clear signal to the community and contractors about the future of the structure.
lug_prompt: Mu bibuga bingi, ebizimbe ebitakyatwalibwa nga bya bukuumi oba ebyomugaso bitera okuweebwa erinnya. Obubonero buno buweereza ng'akabonero akategeerekeka eri abantu n'abakola kontulakiti ku biseera by'ekizimbe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me boma madongo, odi ma dong pe ki neno gi macalo kama ber onyo ma konye peke pol kare nongo nying mapat-pat. Lanyut man tiyo macalo lanyut maber bot lwak ki lutic I kom anyim pa gedo ne.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu nu otaun, adukena nu mam bobo eyangaritai kwape lu eyuwara arai lu epol ajokis edumunenete apapulai. Iswamai aanyunet ngin kwape aanyunet mama ejaasi itunga keda adukok nuikamunitos ingaren naka aduketait.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea karakara, jo 'bani ega curu'do aa'zu muke ku dika orodriru ku 'diyi sawa driasi 'ba yi ma ru si. E'da 'diri azi nga eceta e'dazaru ongulumu eyini azini 'ba angu si'ba 'diyi dri ewu drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'omu ndembo, ebyombeko ebitarikureebwa nk'ebirikwesigwa nainga ebitarikukoresibwa, buriijo nibihebwa eiziina ry'omutaano. Obubonero obu nibukora nk'akamanyiso akarikworeka abantu n'abapateine emirimo aha biro by'omumaisho by'ekyombeko.

eng_prompt: In light of recent disputes over land claims, officials initiated a review of property documentation. As part of this process, the government asked them to show proof of ownership of the land.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butakkaanya obwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku nsonga z'ettaka, abakungu baatandika okwetegereza ebiwandiiko by'ettaka. Nga ekitundu ku nkola eno, gavumenti yabasabye okulaga obukakafu obw'obwannannyini ku ttaka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye cokcok-ki I kom lok me ngom, lutic gucako ngiyo coc me ngom. Macalo but yub eni, gamente olego gi me nyutu lanyut ma moko ni ngom eni obedo meg gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta lu atuboros kanu alupok, apotu eswamak kitegeasi airereonor apapulai nuka alupok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu apugan kolimok kes aitodun aitogogongoret ebe eraasi kesi ikulepek alupok.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi e'do e'yo kokobi nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, gamete a'i yi afa ecetaru e'dapi kini yi nyaku 'da ma e'ini 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entongane ezabaireho ahabw'eitaka, abakungu batandikire kushwijuma ebihandiiko by'eitaka. Omu nkora egi,gavumenti ekabashaba kworeka obuhame ngu eitaka n'eryaabo.

eng_prompt: Generations of their family have cultivated the fields and nurtured the forests around them. The memories of laughter and hard work echo through the years, binding them to this place.
lug_prompt: Emirembe gy'ab'omu maka gaabwe girimye ennimiro n'okulunda ebibira ebibeetoolodde. Ebijjukizo by'okuseka n'okukola ennyo biwulikika okuyita mu myaka, nga bibakwataganya n'ekifo kino.
ach_prompt: Anywali me ganggi mapol dong gupito poto ki gwoko bunga ma orumugi. Wigi poo I kom nyero ki tic matek ma gutimo I mwaki ma okato angec, ma oweko gubedo I kabedo man.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuka ekale kec ekoriete amisirin keda amagoron nu idunyasi kesi. Akiro nuikamunitos akwena keda aswam agogong epupete kotoma okar lu atuboros, ijaikini kesi aiboisit na.
lgg_prompt: Ti familia yini 'diyi ma alia 'diyi amvu ezo azini oce yi ma ageia 'diyi ma ta mba. E'yo ma e'yo egaza o'duko nyaza ma dria azini azi ngaza okporu ma dria 'diyi ma e'yo ega eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia, yini yi ecizu angu 'di be.
nyn_prompt: Emirembe y'amaka gaabo ehingire emisiri hamwe n'amahamba agabarikwetorwaire. Ebiteekateeko by'okushekyerera hamwe n'okukora n'amaani nibigarukwamu omu myaka yoona, ebirikubareetera kukwatanisa n'omwanya ogu.

eng_prompt: After extensive consultations with local communities and stakeholders, the government has reached a decision regarding the impact of the airport construction. In response to growing concerns about displacement and disruption, officials have outlined a compensation strategy.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ennyo ku bantu b'omu kitundu n'abakwatibwako, gavumenti etuuse ku kusalawo ku bikwata ku ngeri okuzimba ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi gye kinaakwatamu abantu. Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kusengulwa n'okutaataaganyizibwa, abakungu bataddewo enkola y'okuliyirira.
ach_prompt: Ingee lok ki lwak me tedero kacel ki joo ma timo tic mapat-pat, gamente omoko tam I kom adwoki me gedo bar dege. Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom kobo pa dano ki balo tic pa gamente, ludito guyubu yoo me culu dano.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda itunga keda itunga luka atutubet, abu apugan kodolok aseunet naikamunit adukio naka esawe loka idegei. Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit aibwot keda aitolitol, etolomutu eswamak iwaitin lu atacakinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie tualu 'ba ambo eyi pie, gamete 'du e'yo eyi e'yo ndege pari 'da ma sita ni ngazu ri ma dria ra. E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo ni tuzu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ofuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria, azi'ba eyi e'da geri azi eyini ecozu eyi ofezu ra ni eyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwebuuza aha bantu b'omubyaro hamwe n'abu kirikukwataho, gavumenti eshaziremu aha bikwatiraine n'okwombeka ekishaayi ky'endegye. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'okufuruka hamwe n'okuteganisibwa, abakungu batandikireho enkora y'okurihirira.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a politically charged environment, the children often heard stories of their father's involvement in shaping the nation's future. His actions and decisions during a tumultuous time left a lasting impact on their lives and the country.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba baakulira mu mbeera ejjudde ebyobufuzi, abaana baateranga okuwulira emboozi ezikwata ku kitaabwe okwenyigira mu kukola ebiseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso. Ebikolwa bye n'okusalawo kwe mu kaseera ak'akavuyo byalekawo akakwate ak'olubeerera ku bulamu bwabwe n'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gitye ka dongo I kabedo me cungu iwi-bye, lutino ne gubedo ka winyo ododo I kom kit ma wongi obedo kwede I yubu anyim pa lobo man. Tim mege kacel ki moko tam mege I kare me kuku kuku enoni oweko adwogi marac I kom kwo gi ki lobo man.
teo_prompt: Apolor kotoma aiboisit naejaasi keda epolitikis, apotu idwe kopuputu akiro nuikamunitos papakec kotoma aitolomun ingaren naka akwapuwok. Aswamisioke keda aseuneteke kotoma apakio nuarokok apotu kojalakisi aijarakec keda akwap.
lgg_prompt: Eyi zo angu politiki ni 'diyi ma alea, anzi 'da eyi eri e'yo eyi ma ati ni aa'zu kari 'di ma ewu drialeri si ri ma dria. E'yo erini 'ye azini peta erini 'du sawa e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ku yi ma idri ma dria azini kari ma dria onzi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukurira omu myanya y'eby'obutegyeki, abaana bakaba bahurira ebirikukwata ahari ishebo okwejumba omu kukora aha nyensya y'eihanga. Ebikorwa bye n'okucwamu kwe omu bwire bw'akaimukiriro bikasigaho enshonga y'amaani aha magara gaabo hamwe n'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing development project, he expressed his concerns about the impact on local residents. He urged officials to consider a compromise that would allow for some preservation of the community's space.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku pulojekiti y'enkulaakulana egenda mu maaso, yalaze obweraliikirivu bwe ku ngeri abatuuze gye bayinza okukwatibwako. Yakubirizza abakungu okulowooza ku ky'okukkaanya ekisobola okukuuma ekifo ky'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yub me dongo lobo matye kawot anyim, en onyuto lworo ne I kom adwogi ne I kom lutedero. En olego lutic me neno yoo me winye ma weko gi gwoko kabedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo epurojekt lo elosi akonye, abu ngesi kitodu aiyalongongoke kanuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol itunga luka atutubet. Abu ngesi olimok eswamak airereonor nuepedorete aingarakin aidar aiboisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Otita angu ezoma ni mupi drile ri ma e'yo si, ece asi otiza erini e'yo erini eco 'ye 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. Eri ai azi'ba eyi e'yo 'duzu e'yo azi ecopi fepi angu ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ra ni ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enteekateeka y'entunguuka erikugyenda omu maisho, akooreka okwerarikirira kwe aha bikwatiraine n'abatuuragye. Akashaba abakungu ngu bateekateekye aha nkoragana erikubaasa kurinda emyanya y'abantu.

eng_prompt: As we gathered around the flickering fire, the weight of our struggles hung heavy in the air. The shadows of uncertainty loomed over us, and the threat of losing what little we had became all too real.
lug_prompt: Bwe twakungaana okwetooloola omuliro ogwali gukwata omuliro, ebizibu byaffe byali biwanikiddwa mu bbanga. Ebisiikirize by'obutali bukakafu byatutuukako, n'okutiisibwatiisibwa kw'okufiirwa akatono ke twalina kwafuuka kwa ddala.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wacokke I nget mac ma obedo ka lyel, peko ma onongo watye kwede obedo lamal tutwal I yamo. Langi me peko obino i komwa, ki lworo me rwenyo jami manok ma onongo watye kwede odoko gin matye ada tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio atukokin aiboisit naka akim naeutai aicwe, apolor noi aiyalongongokosi kokwam. Apotu aanyuneta nuka amamus ajenanut kibiroros, ido aitukurianeta nuka atwaniar iboro lu ikidioko lu ijaatar sio araun nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: Amani trazu aci ma ageyia, e'yo ewaru amani 'ye 'diyi ovu oli ma alia nzizaru. E'yo amani aa'zu e'yo kokoru 'diyi e'da ama dria, dika ori gbaza afa were amani aa'zu 'diyi avizu ri eca e'yo a'da ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikuteeranira haihi n'omuriro ogwabaire nigwaka, oburemeezi bw'oburemeezi bwaitu bukaba buri ahaiguru omu mwanya. Ebisiikirize by'obutetegyerezibwa bikatugwaho, n'akabi k'okufeerwa akatono akatubaire twine kakagumaho.

eng_prompt: After extensive surveys and evaluations of various sites, officials concluded that certain criteria needed to be met for the new military project. Ultimately, they identified a specific area that met all the necessary requirements for operational efficiency and safety.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera n'okwekenneenya ebifo eby'enjawulo, abakungu baamaliriza nti waliwo ebisaanyizo ebyetagisa okutuukirizibwa ku pulojekiti y'amagye empya. Mu nkomerero, baazuula ekitundu ekimu ekituukana n'ebyetaago byonna ebyetaagibwa okusobola okukola obulungi n'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo ki ngiyo kabedo mapat-pat, lutic gumoko ni cik mukene omyero ki cobo pi yub manyen me mony. I agiki ne, gunongo kabedo ma ocobo miti weng ma mite pi tic maber ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic keda airereonor aiboisio nuegelegela, apotu eswamak kotemasi ebe ibusakinit aitodolikin iponesio ice kanu epurojekt loitetet loka ajore. Kawasia, apotu kesi odumutu aiboisit na itodolikinit iboro kere lu ekotoi kanu aswam ejok ka ayuara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ndundu eyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba eyi 'yo kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo azi eyi otita asikari eyini o'diru 'da ni. Asizu, eyi esu angu azi 'bani lele eyini ani azi ngazu kililiru azini ageitema be 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza n'okushwijuma emyanya etari emwe n'emwe, abakungu bakahendera ngu hariho ebirikwetengwa kukorwa aha purogyekiti y'amahe ensya. Ekyarugiremu,bakatunga omwanya ogurikwikirizana n'ebirikwetengwa, kugira ngu emirimo ekorwe kurungi n'oburinzi.

eng_prompt: As we walked through the sprawling fields, a sense of history enveloped us. Each hill and valley seemed to whisper stories of leadership and legacy.
lug_prompt: Bwe twatambula mu nnimiro ennene ennyo, ebyafaayo byatwetooloola. Buli lusozi n'ekiwonvu byalabika ng'ebiteesa ku bukulembeze n'obusika.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka wot I poto ma dit tutwal, lok me tekwaro omako wa. Got ki lung weng nen calo gitye ka wilo lok I kom tela ki lanyut mabeco.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio alosit kotoma amisirin nuapolok, apotu akiro nukakolo kijaikisi sio. Esubit bala apotu imoru ka aiboisio nuipu kinerata akiro nuikamunitos engarenone ka awanyunet.
lgg_prompt: Amani aciria amvu angiri 'diyi ma alea, e'yo adi ni 'diyi ombe ama kuru. E'yo dria 'be dria azini 'be dria 'diyi e'da kile e'yo driceza ma dria azini e'yo 'bani 'ba ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikutambura omu musiri muhango, ebyafaayo bikatwetorora. Buri mushozi hamwe na buri kicweka nikireebeka nk'ekirikugamba ebirikukwata aha bwebembezi n'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After months of disputes over property rights, the local community gathered to voice their concerns. In a recent press conference, the officials claim the land belongs to the government.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okusika omuguwa ku ddembe ly'obwannannyini, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaana okwogera ebibaluma. Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gyebuvuddeko, abakungu bagamba nti ettaka lya gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me telle I kom twero me bedo ki jami, lutedero gugure kacel me tito peko gi. I kare ma kiloko ki luco lok angeya cokcok-ki, lutic guwaco ni ngom eni obedo pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ingungeta kanu apedorosio nuka iboro, apotu itunga luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitodun aiyalongongokec. Kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto, apotu eswamak kotemasi ebe eraasi alupok ngun nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Mba erita ako ma vutia e'yo drilemgbo lonyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria, o'bi angu ma alia 'diyi tra yi ma asi e'yo nzezu. E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi be o'diru ri ma alea, azi'ba 'da eyi 'yo kini nyaku 'da gamete ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'obutaikirizana ahabw'obugabe bw'ebintu, abantu b'omukyanga baketeeranira hamwe kworeka ebibarikuteekateeka. Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, abakungu bakagira ngu eitaka n'erya gavumenti.

eng_prompt: Despite our repeated inquiries, the police department remained tight-lipped regarding the ongoing investigation. We were hoping for clarity on the situation, but it seemed that information was being withheld.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twabuuza enfunda n'enfunda, ekitongole kya poliisi kyasigala kisirifu ku bikwata ku kunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso. Twali tusuubira okufuna obutangaavu ku mbeera, naye kyalabika ng'amawulire gaali gakwekebwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wapenyo lapeny tyen mapol, dul pa abili pe gutimo gin mo I kom kwed matye kawot anyim. Wabedo ki gen ni wabinongo niango matut I kom ngo matye katimme, ento nen calo kitye ka kano ngec.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipudasi sio aingiseta nuipu, apotu ipolisin kongeroto nuikamunitos aingic na elosi akonye. Imuno sio aitodun akiro nuka abeit, konye esubit bala mam alimonokinitai akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ama ni ta tro e'yo ozizu dika ra ti, arakala polisi eyini ri awi ti opizaru e'yo vuti ondaza ni mupi drile ri ma dria. Ama ndra asi 'baza be e'yo 'da ma dria, te e'da kile 'ba ri o'duko eyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okubuuzibwa kwaitu, ekitongore kya pooriisi kikaguma kihunami ahabikwatiraine n'okucondooza okuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho. Tukaba nituteekateeka ngu nitwija kumanya gye ebirikukwata aha nshonga egyo, kwonka nikireebeka ngu amakuru gakaba gatarikumanywa.

eng_prompt: We were growing increasingly concerned about the situation and decided to contact the officer for assistance. After several attempts to get in touch, we hoped he would respond soon.
lug_prompt: Twali tweyongera okweraliikirira embeera era ne tusalawo okutuukirira omukungu okufuna obuyambi. Oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako enfunda eziwera okutuukirira, twasuubira nti ajja kuddamu mangu.
ach_prompt: Wabedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom ngo matye katimme ci wamoko tamwa me kube ki abili me nongo kony. Ingee temo lok kwede tyen mapol, wabedo ki gen ni en bigamo lokwa oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Apotu sio apodokinit noi nuikamunitos ejautene ngol ido apotu sio adolokisi eswaman kanu aingarakinio. Akaulo naka aitam airiamun keda sio, aomit sio ebe ebuni ngesi abongokin katipet.
lgg_prompt: Ama e'bi adri asi otiza be tu e'yo 'da ma dria azini ama asi 'du e'yo nzezu azi'ba 'da be azakoma esuzu. Erini o'bizu o'bizu 'bori ma vutia, ama asi 'baza be kini eri nga omvi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Tukaba nitweyongyera okwerarikirira ahabw'embeera, reero tusharamu kuhikaana n'omuserukare kutunga obuhwezi. Bwanyima y'okugyezaho emirundi mingi, tukaba twine amatsiko ngu naija kugarukamu juba.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted a concerning trend in children's health. Experts are increasingly alarmed by the growing prevalence of vision-related issues among young populations.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu byobulamu by'abaana. Abakugu beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'obulwadde bw'amaaso obweyongera mu bavubuka.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma yotkom pa lutino tye ka medde kwede. Ludiro tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom peko me wang matye kamede I kin bulu.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit nuikamunitos angaleu naka idwe. Iyalongongosi ipirioitin noi kanu aiyatakin naka atiokisio nuka asesen kanejaas atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza fepi anzi nyiri eyi ma rua ala ma dria ni i. Ba nita be e'yo eyi ma dria angiri 'diyi ovu asi otiza be e'yo ewaru mile be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri si.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'eby'amagara g'abaana. Abakugu beyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amaisho obweyongyeire omu minyeeto.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote children's health and well-being, local health officials organized a series of vision assessments. Parents were informed about the importance of early detection of vision problems for their children.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obulamu bw'abaana n'obulamu obulungi, abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu byalo baategeka okukeberebwa kw'amaaso. Abazadde baategeezebwa ku mugaso gw'okuzuula amangu obuzibu bw'amaaso mu baana baabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor yotkom pa lutino, lutic yoto kom guyubu yub me pimo wang gi. Ki niango lunyodo i kom ber pa niang con peko me wang pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor angaleu naka idwe, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kitemokisi ainwakio na akonye. Aponi olimokinai auriak ajokis naka ajenun atiokisio nuka akonye kanejaas idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu anzi nyiri eyi ma rua ala otuzu azini eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba arojo ni angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo angu ndrezu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'diyi karakara. Ba lu tipika eyini imbata orodri eyini ecozu e'yo mile ni 'diyi esuzu drioru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara g'abaana, abakuru omu by'amagara omu byaro, bakakora enteekateeka y'okukyebera amaisho gaabo. Abazaire bakamanyisibwa omugasho gw'okureeba abaana baabo baine oburemeezi bw'amaisho bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: Many parents often notice their children experiencing various allergic reactions. Understanding the prevalence of these conditions can help in managing their symptoms effectively.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bangi batera okwetegereza abaana baabwe nga bafuna obuzibu obw'enjawulo. Okutegeera obungi bw'embeera zino kiyinza okuyamba mu kukwasaganya obubonero bwazo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo mapol pol kare gineno ni lutino gi tye ka nongo peko mapat-pat. Niang kit ma peko magi tye kwede twero konyo me lweny i kom lanyutgi maber.
teo_prompt: Auriak luipu ejenete duc idwekec ejaas keda iboro luipu luiticanete. Ajenun epone loepolor noi loka adekasinei nu epedori aingarakin aitikitik ijenuneta kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: Tipika karakara eyi e'yo ndundu eyi esu anzi eyivile 'diyini. Eꞌyo ꞌbani eꞌyo ꞌdiyi ma omgbo onizu ꞌdiyi eco ꞌba ma aza ko eceta yini ꞌdiyi ma aza kozu kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire abaingi nibakira kureeba abaana baabo barikutunga oburemeezi bw'omubiri bw'emiringo etari emwe. Okwetegyereza oburemeezi obu nikibaasa kuhwera omu kurwanisa obubonero bwabwo kurungi.

eng_prompt: Regular eye check-ups are essential for children's overall health. Unfortunately, many parents may not realize that their kids could be experiencing vision issues.
lug_prompt: Okukebera amaaso buli kaseera kya mugaso eri obulamu bw'abaana okutwalira awamu. Eky'omukisa omubi, abazadde bangi bayinza obutamanya nti abaana baabwe bayinza okuba nga bafuna obuzibu mu kulaba.
ach_prompt: Pimo wang kare ki kare obedo gin ma pire tek pi yotkom pa lutino. Ki gum marac, lunyodo mapol pe gitwero niang ni lutino gi twero bedo ki peko me neno.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar akonye duc ejok kanu angaleu na idwe. Nukaiturur, mam auriak luipu ejenete ebe epedorete idwekec ajaut keda ationis na asesen.
lgg_prompt: Ba ma andri eyi ma mile sa'wa driasi ri eri orodriru anzi nyiri eyi ma rua ala ni. Drile onziru, tipika karakara eyi nini kini anzi eyivile 'diyi eco e'yo angu ndrezu 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukyeberwa amaisho buri kaire n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abaana. Eky'obusaasi, abazaire baingi nibabaasa kuba batarikumanya ngu abaana baabo nibabaasa kuba baine oburemeezi bw'okureeba.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about community representation, the district leaders held a series of meetings to discuss potential changes. After gathering input from residents, they decided it was time to move forward with a democratic process.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bikwata ku bakiise b'ekitundu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baatuuza enkiiko eziwerako okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkyukakyuka ezisoboka. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya ebirowoozo okuva mu batuuze, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okugenda mu maaso n'enkola ya demokulasiya.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom cung pi lwak, lutela me district gubedo ki kacoke mapol me nywako lok I kom aloka loka matwero time. Inge winyo tam pa lwak, gumoko ni kare dong oromo me medde anyim ki yub me tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka abwoikinitok itunga, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt iriamunos kanu aitemitem aijulanakineta. Akaulo naka atukun aomisio kanejaas itunga, apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai apak na alosit keda ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi o'bi yi ma paria ri ma dria, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi 'ye mitingi karakara eyi agbatara gbazu ojata ecopi ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo yi trazu engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca muzu drile e'yo democracia ni 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakakora enkiiko nyingi kuhanuura aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho. Bwanyima y'okurundaana ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye, bakasharamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okugumizamu n'enkora ya demokurasiya.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote better eye health among children, local health organizations have launched a new initiative. This program aims to raise awareness about common vision problems and preventative measures.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obulamu bw'amaaso mu baana, ebitongole by'ebyobulamu mu kitundu bitongozza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumanyisa abantu ku bizibu by'amaaso n'engeri y'okubyewalamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor yotkom me wang ikin lutino, dul mapat-pat me yot-kom me tedero gucako yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me rweyo lwak i kom peko me wang ki yoo me gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor angaleu na akonye kanejaas idwe, etolomutu iriongeta luka angaleu ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos atiokisio nu akonye ka iponesio lu itikitikere.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu alata mile niri otuzu anzi nyiri eyi ma eselea, amuti alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita azi o'diru ni eyi. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu imbata fezu e'yo ewaru mile ni 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'bani ecozu eyi atrizu ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho amagara marungi g'amaisho omu baana, ebitongore by'ebyamagara bitandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buremeezi bw'amaisho hamwe n'oburikubaasa kuzibirwa.

eng_prompt: Several educators collaborated to design a new interactive learning experience. Their innovative approach aimed to engage students across various subjects.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa ab'enjawulo baakolera wamu okukola enkola empya ey'okusomesa. Enkola yaabwe ey'obuyiiya yabadde egendereddwamu okusikiriza abayizi mu masomo ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol gutiyo kacelo me yubu yoo manyen me pwonyo lutino. Yoo gi manyen obedo ki miti me weko lutino kwan nongo pwony ma pat pat.
