teo_prompt: Apotu isisianakinak luipu kimorikikinos kanu aitolomun epone loitetet loka aisisia. Alosikinetekec naitetet erai kanu aisisianakin esisiak aisisiaeta nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi nga azi tualu e'yo onita ni o'diru 'diyi edezu. Geri eyini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri lezu sukulu anzi eyi 'du e'yo onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi bakakorengana kukora enkora nsya y'okwegyesa abantu. Omuringo gwabo gw'okujumbura gukaba nigugyenderera okureetera abeegi kwega amashomo gatari gamwe na gamwe.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the urgent need for support and advocacy, the organization launched a comprehensive initiative. Their mission focused on raising awareness and providing resources for families affected by children's disabilities.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi n'okulwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka enzijuvu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kumanyisa n'okuwa obuyambi amaka agakoseddwa obulemu bw'abaana.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ni mite tutwal me nongo kony ki cuku cwiny, dul ne ocako yub mapat-pat. Miti gi obedo me rweyo lwak ki miyo kony ki gangi ma lutino gi tye ki goro.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipuda lo engeso lo agangat, abu atukot ngin kogeu ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinetekec arai aisisianakin nuka aisisianakino keda aijanakin iboro nejaas ikalia lu etereikina keda angwal naka idwe.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'bani lezu atita fezu azini e'yo otuzu mbeleru ri isuzu 'boria, amuti 'da e'do otita azi dria ma dria. Asisile yiniri 'ba asi mile o'biyi ma mile oziza ma dria azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu familia anzi aco be 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'obuhwezi n'okurwanirira oburingaaniza, ekitongore kikataho enteekateeka y'amaani. Omurimo gwabo gukaba nigugyenderera okumanyisa abantu n'okuheereza obuhwezi amaka agarikuteganisibwa oburema bw'abaana.

eng_prompt: Many factors can influence a child's experience in the classroom, including physical health and sensory abilities. Unfortunately, those with visual impairments often face challenges that can lead to unfair treatment by peers and educators alike.
lug_prompt: Ebintu bingi bisobola okukosa embeera y'omwana mu kibiina, omuli obulamu bw'omubiri n'obusobozi bw'okwetegereza. Eky'omukisa omubi, abo abalina obuzibu mu kulaba batera okusanga ebisoomooza ebiyinza okuviirako okuyisibwa obubi bannaabwe n'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma twero balo kit ma latin timo kwede jami i gang kwan, ma I kingi obedo yotkom ki kero me winyo lok. Ki gum marac, jo matye ki peko me wang ipol kare ginongo peko ma weko luwotgi ki lupwonye gi tero gi marac.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro luepedorete aitodolikin eswamae lo idwe kotoma atukot, aimoriarit angaleu naka akwan keda apedor naka aijen. Nukaiturur, itunga lu mam epedoritos asesen itereikina keda atiokisio nu eyangauni amumu kama ejaasi ipaupakec keda esisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi eco e'yo anzi eyini esu kilasia ri ma omgbo otu, eyi ma rua ala azini okpo eyini 'diyi pie. Drile onziru, 'ba mile be onzi 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru ecopi fepi eyi ma agyipika eyini azini imba'ba eyini eyi 'yezu geri kililiru ku 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Hariho ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kureetera omwana kukora gye omu kibiina, otwariiremu amagara g'omubiri hamwe n'obushoboorozi bw'okwetegyereza. Eky'omugisha mubi, abaine oburema omu maisho, nibakira kutunga oburemeezi oburikubaasa kureetaho okubonabonesibwa kwa bataahi baabo hamwe n'abashomesa baabo.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown that certain visual impairments can significantly impact a child's learning and social interactions. As a result, educators are being trained to recognize and address these specific needs in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti obuzibu obumu mu kulaba busobola okukosa ennyo okusoma kw'omwana n'okukolagana n'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa batendekebwa okumanya n'okukola ku byetaago bino mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni peko me wang mogo twero balo kwan pa latin ki kit ma en tiyo kwede ki dano. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka pwonyo lupwonye me niang ki cobo miti magi I ot kwan.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuitetiak ebe atiokisio ace nuka asesen epedorete aitolitol esisiae lo idwe keda aiswamanara keda itunga. Kanuka ngun, itutuonoro isisianakinak ajenun ka aitemokin ipudesia lu atukot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da kini e'yo mile ni 'diyi ma azi eyi eco anzi eyi ma onita azini aa'ta eyi ma eselea ri eza ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba imba'ba eyini imbata fe eyini ani ecozu afa lele 'diyi ma aza kozu kilasia ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu oburemeezi bw'amaisho nibubaasa kuteganisa okwega kw'omwana hamwe n'okukorengana kwe n'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abegyesa bariyo nibatendekwa kumanya n'okukora ahabyetaago ebi omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: Many students face various challenges in the classroom, but some issues can be less visible than others. Among these, vision impairments can significantly hinder a child's ability to engage with their learning materials.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo mu kibiina, naye ensonga ezimu ziyinza obutalabibwa nnyo okusinga endala. Mu bino, obuzibu mu kulaba busobola okulemesa ennyo obusobozi bw'omwana okwenyigiramu n'ebikozesebwa bye mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol ginongo peko mapatpat I ot kwan, ento peko mukene pe nen tutwal ka iporo ki mukene. I kin magi, peko me neno twero gengo lutino me tic ki jami kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esisiak luipu keda atiokisio nuegelegela kotoma atukot, konye icie akiro mam esubit adepar icie. Kotoma ngun, ationis na asesen epedori aitikitik apedor naka ikoku aisisia iboro lu isisiaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu kilasi eyi ma alea, te e'yo azi 'diyi ma e'yo eyi e'da kililiru ku aga azi 'diyi. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo angu ndrezu kililiru ku 'diyi eco anzi eyi ma okpo atri afa eyini onita onizu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu kibiina, kwonka obumwe tiburikureebeka nk'obundi. Omuri ebi, oburemeezi bw'okureeba nibubaasa kuremesa omwana kwejumba omu by'okushoma.

eng_prompt: Many families in the community have expressed concerns about the accessibility of local amenities. Unfortunately, the existing infrastructure does not accommodate all children's needs.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu kitundu galaze obweraliikirivu ku bikwata ku kufuna ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. Eky'ennaku, ebintu ebiriwo kati tebisobola kukola ku byetaago by'abaana byonna.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol I kabedo eni gunyutu lworo I kom nongo jami ma mite ikabedo eni. Ki gum marac, jami tic matye kombedi pe tye ki jami weng ma mite pi lutino.
teo_prompt: Apotu ikalia luipu luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu adumun iboro lu itwasamao. Nukaiturur, iboro lu ejaas kwape kwana mam itodolikinete ipudesia lu idwe kere.
lgg_prompt: Familia ongulumu 'da ma alea karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma esuta ma dria. Drile onziru, afa ayuzaru 'diyi econi fe anzi nyiri eyini afa eyini le 'diyi dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu kyanga garetsire okwerarikirira ahabw'okutunga ebintu by'omubyaro. Eky'obusaasi, ebyombeko ebiriho tibirikuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'abaana boona.

eng_prompt: In an effort to accommodate all students, the school implemented new resources for those with visual impairments. As part of this initiative, special materials were prepared for the upcoming exams.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okusenza abayizi bonna, essomero lyassaawo ebintu ebipya eby'abo abatalaba bulungi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ebikozesebwa eby'enjawulo byategekebwa ebigezo ebijja.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko lutino kwan weng, gang kwan oketo jami tic manyen pi lutino matye ki peko me wang. Macalo but yub man, kiyubu jami ma mite pi peny matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aimorikikin esisiak kere, abu esomero kitolomu iboro luitetiak kanuka ngul lumam epedoritos asesen. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi itemokinai iboro luitegelikina kanu aingito na ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu sukulu anzi dria eyi ma ta mbazu, sukulu 'da 'ba afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi 'ba mile kokoru 'diyi dri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba otu afa ndundu eyi obeta emupi 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushemeza abeegi boona,eishomero rikatandikaho ebintu bisya by'abo abaine oburema omu maisho. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ebintu by'omutaano bikatebeekanisibwa kukora ebigyezo ebirikwija.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges, the child remained cheerful and full of life. His unique appearance often sparked curiosity among those who met him.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa kungi, omwana yasigala musanyufu era nga mulamu bulungi. Endabika ye ey'enjawulo yatera okuleetawo obwagazi mu abo abaamusisinkana.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en orwatte ki peko mapol, latin ne pud obedo ki yomcwiny dok opong ki kwo. Kit ma en nen kwede obedo ki miti madit tutwal I kin jo ma gurwate kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu, abu ikoku iboyete iyalama ido kojaasi keda aijar. Abu epone ke loitegelikina koyangau eipud kanejaas ngul luapotu iriamunos keda ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara eyi esuzu ra ti, mva 'da awi ayikosi azini idri be tre. Eri ma wura wura ndusi ri fe 'ba dri fu'ba eri be 'diyi ma ava saaru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi, omwana akaguma ashemereirwe kandi aine amagara marungi. Endabika ye ey'omutaano ekaba ereetaho ekyetengo ky'okumanya omu boona abaabaire bamubugana.

eng_prompt: A local nonprofit has identified a pressing need for safe and accessible housing for children with disabilities in the community. In response, they are rallying volunteers and resources to address this issue.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole ky'obwannakyewa eky'omu kitundu kizuudde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'amayumba agataliiko bulabe era amangu eri abaana abaliko obulemu mu kitundu. Mu kwanukula, bakunga bannakyewa n'ebikozesebwa okukola ku nsonga eno.
ach_prompt: Dul mo ma pe tye ki miti me nongo magoba otyeko niang ni lutino ma lugoro tye ki miti matek me nongo odi maber dok ma yot. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka rweyo dano ma odyere kacel ki jami ma mite me tyeko peko man.
teo_prompt: Abu atukot namam iswamaete ameda kojen ebe ejai eipud loka itunga lu engwalitos adumun itogoi lu eyuara. Kwape abongokinet, eutasi kesi aituk itunga keda iboro kanu aitemokin ationis na.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azi orodri esupi ku angu 'di ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo lezu jo kililiru azini ewakokoru 'diyi ma esuzu anzi aco be 'diyi dri angu 'da ma alea. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, yi 'ba owi'ba azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi tra e'yo 'di ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore ky'aha kyaro ekitarikukora magoba, kyetegyereize ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'amaju marungi g'abaana abaine oburema omu byanga. Nk'eky'okugarukamu, bariyo nibarundaana abarikwehayo n'ebintu by'okukora aha nshonga egi.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, an investigation revealed widespread corruption within the local government. As evidence mounted, authorities moved swiftly to take action against those involved.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, okunoonyereza kwalaga obuli bw'enguzi mu gavumenti z'ebitundu. Obujulizi bwe bwakungaanyizibwa, ab'obuyinza baakola mangu okukwata ku abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma okelo lworo madit tutwal, kwed ma otime onyuto camcana ma onyaa tutwal I gamente me tedero. Ikare ma caden obino, lutela gutimo gin mo oyot-oyot i kom joo ma otimo bal enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka akiro, abu aingic kitodu amidicio naka apiyai kotoma apuganisinei nu okwap. Neadumununa ajenanut, apotu apedorosio kiswamata katipet kanu aitepesen ngul luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eti ondaza azi ece e'yo anyamgbolo ni gavumete ele 'diyi ma eselea ri ra. Afa e'dapi kini e'yo 'ye ra 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu 'boria, drice'ba eyi 'ye e'yo mbeleru 'ba e'yo nde 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza,okucondooza kworeka obushomankuzi omu gavumenti z'ebyanga. Obujurizi ku bwarugireho, ab'obushoborozi bakahonaaho kukora ahari abo abaabaire bejumbiremu.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, an investigation into financial irregularities at the local school revealed serious misconduct. Authorities uncovered evidence of embezzlement, leading to multiple arrests.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, okunoonyereza ku butali bwenkanya mu by'ensimbi ku ssomero ly'omu kitundu kwalaga emize emibi egy'amaanyi. Ab'obuyinza baazuula obujulizi ku kubulankanya ebintu, ekyaviirako abantu bangi okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, kwed I kom tim me camucana I gangi kwan me tedero onyuto tim maraco mapol tutwal. Lutela gunongo caden me kwalo lim ma oweko kimako dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka akiro, abu aingic naka abilibilio naka ikapun kosomero loka atutubet kitodu iponesio luarokok noi. Apotu apedorosio odumutu aitogogongoret naka akoko na ikapun, ido abu koyangau aikamanario naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo vuti ondaza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria sukulu angu 'da ma alea ri ma alea ri e'da adriza onzi onzi onzi 'diyi. Okpo e'ipi eyi esu afa azi ecopi e'dapi kini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu ri ma dria ra, e'yo 'di fe 'bani eyi obizu karakara.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza,okucondooza aha mishango y'esente aha eishomero ry'ekyaro, kukareetaho emicwe mibi y'amaani. Ab'obushoborozi bakareeba obuhame oburikworeka okwiba sente, ekyarugiremu okukwatwa kw'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: During the trial, the atmosphere grew increasingly tense as the cross examiner relentlessly targeted the witness. His aggressive tactics left the courtroom in disbelief, revealing a disturbing disregard for basic decency.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera ky'okuwozesebwa, embeera yeeyongera okuba ey'obunkenke ng'omubuuzi w'ebibuuzo yeeyongera okulumba omujulizi. Obukodyo bwe obw'obukambwe bwaleka kkooti mu butakkiriza, nga bulaga obutassa kitiibwa mu mpisa ezisookerwako.
ach_prompt: Ikare me pido enoni, lworo omede ikare ma lapeny obedo kamedde ki kelo adot i kom caden. Diro me lweny ma en otiyo oweko kot pe obedo ki gen, ma onyuto cayo kit maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka aipup emusago, abu akwap kiyatakin noi naarai apotu engisingis ekotosi aimusung ajenan. Apotu acoasinei ke nuka amumu kojalakisi adieket komam ecamunit, itodunit amengerikit naka iponesio lukajokak luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo lizurisi, e'yo 'da tu uru 'ba 'ba e'yo ozipi 'diyi ni e'dazu 'ba sadini ru 'diyi ma dria. Geri erini e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ku 'ba dwani drilea 'diyi a'ita ako si, erini e'dazu e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omubwiire bw'okuhurira orubanja, embeera ekeyongyera kuba ey'obunkenke ahabw'okubuuza abajurizi ebibuuzo. Obukoryo bwe obw'amaani bukasiga kooti etarikwikiriza, ekirikworeka okuremwa kwetegyereza emicwe mirungi.

eng_prompt: Concerns were raised after a series of unusual transactions were reported within the department's financial records. As a result, authorities have launched an inquiry into the matter.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kwabalukawo oluvannyuma lw'ebintu ebitali bya bulijjo okuloopebwa mu biwandiiko by'ebyenfuna by'ekitongole. N'ekyavaamu, ab'obuyinza batandise okunoonyereza ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye ikare ma kidoto tic mapat-pat I buk lim pa dul enoni. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela gucako kwed I kom lok ne.
teo_prompt: Aponi oyangaunai aiyalongong akaulo na akiro nu mam etapit aitodunitai kotoma aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ageutu apedorosio aingic akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu e'yo 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba eyi e'do e'yo 'da ma eti onda.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kukareetwaho ahanyima y'okukoresa ebintu ebitari bya buriijo omu bihandiiko by'ebyesente by'ekitongore. Ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi batandikireho okucondooza aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and underfunding, the local government finally secured a significant grant. This financial support was crucial for addressing the pressing needs of the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'obutaba na buyambi, gavumenti y'ebitundu yasembye okufuna obuyambi obw'amaanyi. Obuyambi buno obw'ensimbi bwali bukulu nnyo mu kukola ku byetaago by'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo ki cente manok, gamente me tedero dong onongo cente madit tutwal. Kony me lim man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit keda ikapun luikidioko, abu apugan naka atutubet kodum agangat naepol noi. Ajokuna noi agangat na naka ikapun kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani e'dazu azini robia esuzu were 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri esu asizu robia okporu ni. Atita robia niri ndra orodriru e'yo ongulumu eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura n'okutunga esente nkye, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekahendera yaatunga obuhwezi bw'amaani. Obuhwezi obu obw'esente bukaba buri obw'omugasho munonga omu kukora aha byetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: After receiving numerous complaints from concerned citizens, an investigation was launched into the financial practices of the local government. As a result, officials have collected evidence to prove the misuse of funds.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya okungi okuva mu bannansi abakwatibwako, okunoonyereza kwatandikibwawo ku nkola z'ebyensimbi eza gavumenti z'ebitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu bakung'aanyizza obujulizi okulaga nti ensimbi zaakozesebwa bubi.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo koko mapol ma aa ki bot lwak, kicako kwed I kom tic me lim pa gamente me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic gu jogo caden me nyutu ni kitiyo ki lim I yoo marac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu kanejaas itunga, aponi kitegearai aingic naka iponesio luka apugan naka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, atukokisi eswamak ajenanut kanu aitogogong aitolitol ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara isuzu engazu kari anzi asi 'baza be 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'do e'yo vuti ondaza e'yo robia ni gamete ele 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba eyi tra e'yo ecopi e'dapi kini 'ba ayu robia 'da geri onzi si 'bo 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu batuuragye abarikufayo, okucondooza kukatandikwa aha nkora ya gavumenti y'ebyaro omu by'empiiha. N'ekyarugiremu, abakungu batungire obujurizi bw'okukoresa kubi esente.

eng_prompt: Following the completion of the new infrastructure project, a team of inspectors was assigned to evaluate the quality of the work done. Their primary focus was to ensure that the roads met the required safety and construction standards.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza pulojekiti y'ebizimbe empya, abalambuzi baateekebwawo okwekenneenya omutindo gw'emirimu egyakolebwa. Ekigendererwa kyabwe ekikulu kyali kya kulaba ng'enguudo zituukana n'omutindo ogwetaagisa ogw'obukuumi n'okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Ingee tyeko yub me gedo manyen, kimiyo tic ki joo ma ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede. Gin ma guketo cwinygi iye tutwalle obedo me neno ni gudi ne gucobo rwom me gwoko ber bedo ki gedo ma mite.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin epurojekt loitetet loka aduketa, aponi ijaikinai etimu loka engicete airereor adoketait na aswam. Alosikinetekec naepol noi arai aanyun ebe itodolikinete irotin adoketait na eyuara ka aiduk.
lgg_prompt: Otita afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyiniri dezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba fe 'ba andri'baa 'diyi ma azi eyini azi 'bani 'ye 'da ma omgbo onezu. Asisile yini okori ndra nezu ra kini nzila 'da eyi 'ye e'yo eyi ma tambazu kililiru azini 'bani eyi sizu kililiru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhendera purogyekiti y'okwombeka ebintu ebisya, tiimu y'abarikukyebera ebyombeko ekaheebwa omurimo gw'okushwijuma omutindo gw'omurimo ogwakozirwe. Ekigyendererwa kyabo ekikuru kikaba kiri okureeba ngu enguuto zihikaana n'emitindo y'okwombeka n'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Following a thorough investigation into the school's financial practices, authorities uncovered discrepancies in the budget reports. As a result, the school headteacher and bursar were arrested on fraud allegations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku nkola y'essomero ey'ebyensimbi, ab'obuyinza baazuula obutakwatagana mu alipoota z'embalirira. N'ekyavaamu, omukulu w'essomero n'omuwanika baakwatibwa ku bigambibwa nti baali bafere.
ach_prompt: Inge timo kwed matut I kom kit ma gangi kwan tiyo kwede ki lim, lutela gunongo lok mapat-pat I byek me lim. Macalo adwogi ne kimako ladit gang kwan ki lagwok lim pi adot me camcana.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuka ikapun luka esomero, apotu apedorosio odumutu amamut acamanar kotoma oitabo loka ebajet. Kanuka ngun, aponi orocunai apolon esomero keda eyaiton loka ikapun kanuka akoko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza sukuluni 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu e'yo onzi eyi otita ajeni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba obi dricere sukulu niri tualu 'ba robia ta mbapi sukulu'a 'diyi pie e'yo 'bani egazu eyi ma dria e'yo aramu ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza munonga aha nkora y'eby'empiiha y'eishomero, ab'obushoborozi bakareeba ebitahikire omu ripoota z'embaririra. N'ekyarugiremu, mukuru w'eishomero hamwe n'omubazi bakwasirwe ahabw'ebiteekateeko by'obushomankuzi.

eng_prompt: Residents had been voicing their frustrations for weeks, citing the numerous potholes and crumbling pavement. As the rainy season approached, the situation only seemed to worsen, prompting urgent discussions at town hall meetings.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde balaga obwennyamivu bwabwe okumala wiiki nga bagamba nti waliwo ebinnya bingi n'oluguudo olukulukuta. Ekiseera ky'enkuba bwe kyasembera, embeera yeeyongera okwonooneka, ekyaviirako okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amangu mu nkiiko za town hall.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi pi cabit mapol, kun giwaco ni bur tye mapol tutwal ki kabedo ma iteng gudu ma opoto. Ikare ma kot ocako cwe, jami omedde tutwal, ma oweko nywako lok obedo tye oyot-oyot tutwal I kacokke me town hall.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga lu atutubet itodiasi aiyalongongokec adaun isabitin luipu, itodunit ebe ejaasi apanyia nuipu noi keda alupok nuebilibilete. Neyapiete apak naka edou, abu ejautene koraun lo erono noi, ido abu koyangau ipegeta lu engeso kotoma airiamununeta nuka atukot naka itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ri sabiti karakara eyi ma alea, eyini 'yozu kini angu 'da ma alea 'bule karakara 'diyi azini angu 'bani acizu 'diyi e'dezu. Sa'wa ozo vurisi ri ni ecaria, e'yo 'di ni e'da ekile i ezapiri le, e'yo nzeza mbeleru 'diyi fe mitingi town hall ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibereka oburemeezi bwabo kumara esande nyingi, barikugira ngu hariho ebiina bingi hamwe n'omuhanda gw'ahanguuto ogwabaire nigugwa. Obwire bw'enjura ku bwabaire nibuhika haihi, embeera ekaba neeyongyera kuba mbi, ekyaretsireho okuhanuura okw'amaani omu nkiiko za tawuni.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple complaints from staff and residents, the management decided to look into the nighttime operations of the facility. The findings of the inquiry raised serious concerns about the employee's performance and responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya okuva mu bakozi n'abatuuze, abaddukanya ekkolero baasalawo okwetegereza emirimu gy'ekiro. Ebizuuliddwa mu kunoonyereza byaleetawo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku nkola y'omukozi n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo koko mapol kibot lutic ki lutedero, ludito me ot yat gumoko tamgi me neno kit ma ot yat tiyo kwede I dyewor. Adwogi kwed ne okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom tic pa lutic ki tic gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu kanejaas eswamak keda itunga, apotu eyaitene kiswamata akware. Apotu akiro nuka aingic koyangautu aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos eswamae loka eswaman keda aswamisinei ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini onu esuzu karakara engazu azi'ba azini 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da asi e'yo 'du e'yo angu 'da ni azi ngazu inisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo 'bani esu e'yo eti ondaza 'da ma alea ri eji asi otiza okporu azi'ba 'da ma agata ma dria azini azi erini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu bakozi hamwe n'abatuuragye, abarikukurira eirwariro bakasharamu kushwijuma emirimo y'ekiro. Ebyarugire omu kucondooza bikareetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani aha mirimo n'obujunaanizibwa bw'omukozi.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the capital as thousands of protesters gathered to demand political reform. Amidst the growing unrest, the senior opposition leader took to the streets to rally support for their cause.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kibuga ekikulu ng'enkumi n'enkumi z'abantu beekalakaasa nga baagala wabeewo enkyukakyuka mu byobufuzi. Wakati mu butabanguko obweyongera, abakulembeze b'oludda oluvuganya baagenda ku nguudo okukungaanya obuwagizi ku lw'ensonga yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I boma madit I kare ma lujemo mapol gugure me penyo pi aloka loka I lok me cungu iwi bye. I kare ma lweny tye ka mede, lutela madongo me dul ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente gucito I gudu me rweyo dano me cwako tic gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos kotoma aiboisit napolon naarai apotu itunga ilukumin lu ediyak kotukokinos kanu aijulakin epolitikisiakec. Karaida iyata amumu, apotu engarenok luapolok luka etepegak koloto orotin aimo agangat kanuka akeswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tu aku ambu kari niri ma alea 'ba alifu karakara eyi tra eyini lezu ojata politiki ni 'diyi lezu. Ngiringiri ma talasi, drice'ba amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyi ma drilea 'diyi mu nzila tia atita trazu e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu kibuga ekikuru nk'enkumi n'enkumi z'abeshaaringi barikweteerana kwenda empinduka omu by'obutegyeki. Ahagati y'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, omwebembezi mukuru w'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti akaza aha nguuto kuronda obushagiki aha nshonga zaabo.

eng_prompt: Following the recent surge in criminal activity in the region, additional personnel were deployed to enhance security measures. As part of this initiative, several officers were assigned to various police stations across the area.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obumenyi bw'amateeka okweyongera mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, abajaasi abalala baayiiriddwa okunyweza eby'okwerinda. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abasirikale abawerako baateekebwa ku sitenseni za poliisi ez'enjawulo okwetooloola ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma tim aranyi omede I but lobo man, kicwalo lumony mukene me medo rwom me gwoko kuc. Macalo but yub man, kimiyo tic ki abili mapol ikabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aiyatakinio naka abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma aiboisit kangin, aponi ibwaikinai itunga luipu kanu aitogogong ayuwara. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi koinakinai ipolisin luipu aiboisio nuegelegela katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo e'yo onzi ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri ma vutia, 'ba 'ba azi eyi dika e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ba azi'ba karakara eyi polisi eyi ma pari ndundu eyi ma alea angu 'da ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu kyanga, abantu baingi bakaheebwa omurimo gw'okureeberera eby'okwerinda. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekigyendererwa eki, ba ofiisa baingi bakaheebwa emirimo aha sitenseni za poriisi ezitarikushushana okwetoroora ekyanga.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into their misconduct, the board reached a unanimous decision. The consequences of their actions were severe, leading to significant disciplinary measures.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku nneeyisa yaabwe embi, akakiiko kaatuuka ku kusalawo okw'awamu. Ebyava mu bikolwa byabwe byali bya maanyi nnyo, ekyaviirako okubonerezebwa okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom timgi maracu, dul madoro tic omoko tamgi labongo jemo. Adwogi pa timgi obedo rac tutwal, ma oweko kiminigi pwod mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos iponesio kec luarokok, apotu lukapolok odolokisi aomisioitikec. Ationis na aswamisiokec arai naepol noi, ido abu koyangau aitisilario naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'bori ma vutia e'yo yini 'ye onzi 'diyi ma dria, board 'du e'yo aluri ma dria. E'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma vutia ri ndra okporu, fe eyini panga esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga aha micwe yaabo mibi, akakiiko kakahika aha kusharamu. Ebyarugire omu bikorwa byabo bikaba bibi munonga, ekyarugiremu okubonerezibwa kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: During the investigation, several witnesses came forward with alarming accounts of the officer's behavior. As the evidence mounted, it became clear that there were serious concerns about his commitment to public safety.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera ky'okunoonyereza, abajulizi abawerako baavaayo n'ebigambo ebitiisa ku nneeyisa y'omuserikale. Obujulizi bweyongera, kyalabika bulungi nti waaliwo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku kwewaayo kwe eri obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwed, lucaden mapol gubino anyim ki lok ma kelo lworo I kom tim pa abili. I kare ma caden omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni lworo madit obedo tye I kom keto cwinye I gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic, apotu ajenak luipu kolomutu keda akiro nuarokok nuikamunitos iponesio luka epolisit. Neautar ajenanut aiyatakin, apotu kojenutu ebe ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos ainakina ke mama ejai ayuwara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo vuti ondazurisi, sadini karakara efu o'duko asi otiza fepi adriza azi'ba 'da niri ma dria. E'yo ecetaru 'diyi ni tuzu tualurisi, eca e'da kililiru kini asi otiza okporu 'diyi ci e'yo erini owizu o'bi yi ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omubwiire bw'okucondooza, abajurizi baingi bakahayo ebirikwerarikiriza aha mitwarize y'omuserukare. Obujurizi ku bwabaire nibweyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hariho okwerarikirira kw'amaani ahabw'okwehayo kwe ahaby'okwerinda kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the allegations against the police officers, the disciplinary court convened to review the evidence presented. The proceedings were tense, as the fate of several officers hung in the balance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku bigambibwa ku basirikale ba poliisi, kkooti ekwasisa empisa yatuula okwetegereza obujulizi obwanjuddwa. Omusango gwali mu bunkenke, ng'obulamu bw'abasirikale abawerako buli mu kabi.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut I kom adot matye I kom abili, court ma neno lok kom kit ma dano timo kwede ki jami mapat-pat obedo tye me neno caden ma kikelo. Lok ne obedo tek tutwal, macalo agiki pa abili mapol onongo pe tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos aitoroneta nuikamunitos ipolisin, apotu ekooti lo itisilanarete itunga kiswamaunos airereor ajenanut na ijaikitai. Arai emusago ngol loetiono noi, naarai ajai aijar naka ipolisin luipu koipone kaloerono.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'bori ma vutia e'yo 'bani to polisi'a 'diyi ma dria, dwani e'yo adriza onzi 'yepi 'diyi omve e'yo ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu. E'yo liza 'da ndra e'yere, azi'ba karakara eyi ma edri ni aa'zu e'yere.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi ebyabaire nibigambwa aha ba ofiisa ba poriisi, kooti y'emicwe ekakorana kushwijuma obujurizi obwaretsirwe. Emishango ekaba etarikwetegyerezibwa, ahabw'okuba amagara g'abaserukare abaingi gakaba gari omu kabi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, the jury deliberated on the evidence presented during the trial. The prosecution argued that the defendants had failed in their duty to ensure the safety of the nation's leader.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, abalamuzi baateesa ku bujulizi obwaleetebwa mu musango. Oludda oluwaabi lwagamba nti abawawabirwa baalemererwa mu mulimu gwabwe okulaba nga bakuuma omukulembeze w'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lungol kop gumoko tamgi I kom caden ma kikelo I kare me pido. Langol kop owaco ni ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni pe otimo ticce me gwoko ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol noi, apotu ikatubok kitetemoto nuikamunitos aitogogongoret naetolomunitai kapak naka emusago. Abu emusago kotema ebe apotu lu iwosatai ipikosi aswamukec naka ayuarite engarenon lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ega e'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi ma dria. ꞋBa eꞌyo liꞌba ꞌdiyi ꞌyo kini ꞌba ꞌbani to ꞌdiyi oꞌbi azi yini ꞌbazu kililiru kini driceꞌba kari ꞌdi vileri ma agei te.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza obwire buraingwa, abaramuzi bakagamba aha bujurizi obwaretsirwe omu kooti. Orubanja rukagira ngu abarikujunaanwa bakaremwa kukora omurimo gwabo gw'okurinda omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent threats and rising tensions, the security team gathered to discuss their strategies. It was imperative that every measure be taken to ensure the safety of the nation's leader.
lug_prompt: Olw'okutiisibwatiisibwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera, ab'eby'okwerinda baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukodyo bwabwe. Kyali kikulu nnyo okulaba nti buli kimu kikolebwa okukuuma omukulembeze w'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bura ma okato cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamedde, lugwok kuc gugure me nywako tam gi. Obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ni myero kitim jami weng ma twere me gwoko latela me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aitukurianeta nupac keda aiyalongong, apotu itunga luka ayuwara kiriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin kec. Arai ibore yenepol noi aswam iboro kere luibusakinit aswam kanu ayuwar engarenon lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo uri gbaza o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi pie, amuti ageyitema ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Eri ndra e'yo okporu 'bani e'yo dria 'diyi 'yezu nezu ra kini drice'ba kari ni 'diyi ma tambaza ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutiinatiinisa okwabaireho obwahati hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire, ab'eby'okwerinda bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nkora yaabo. Kikaba kiri eky'omugasho kukora kyona ekirikubaasika okurinda omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: After the verdict was announced, the defendants exchanged worried glances, knowing their fate rested in the hands of the court. In a tense atmosphere, the lawyer addressed the group, outlining their options moving forward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulangirira ensala, abawawabirwa baatunuulizagana nga beeraliikirivu, nga bakimanyi nti ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso byali mu mikono gya kkooti. Mu mbeera ey'obunkenke, munnamateeka yayogeddeko eri ekibinja, ng'alaga engeri gye bayinza okugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngolo kop ne, joo ma kimoro adot i komgi gubedo ki lworo tutwal, kun gingeyo ni anyimgi tye I cing kot. I kare me lworo madit tutwal, lapilida ne oloko ki lwak, kun nyuto yoo gi me medde anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na alimor etube, apotu itunga luetepesenitai kosesenata, ejenete ebe ejaasi kesi toma akanin adieket. Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi, abu epulida kinerakin keda egurupu, itetemit nuibusakinit kesi aswam kanu ainyikokinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza 'bani azizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'bani to 'diyi oja yi ma mile asi otiza si, yini nii ra kini yi ma ewu drile ri dwani ma dria. E'yo ewaru ma alea, 'ba azitani 'da nze e'yo ongulumu 'da eyidri geri eyini ecozu muzu drile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okurangirira encwa y'omushango, abahababirwa bakareebana omu muringo gw'okwerarikirira, barikumanya ngu ebiro byabo by'omumaisho biri omu mikono ya kooti. Omu bwire bw'obunkenke, puriida akagambira guruupu, arikubashoboororera ebirikubaasa kukorwa okugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Tensions were running high as the election approached, with supporters and opponents clashing in the streets. Amidst the chaos, the president's car became a target for angry protesters.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde ng'okulonda kusembera, ng'abawagizi n'abavuganya balwanagana mu nguudo. Wakati mu kavuyo, emmotoka ya pulezidenti yafuuse ekiruubirirwa ky'abeekalakaasi abanyiize.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye ikare ma yer tye cok, lucwak ki joo ma kwero cungu I yer gubedo ka lweny I dye gudu. Ikare me kuku kuku enoni, mutoka pa ladit lobo odoko kama lujemo ma cwinygi okeco obedo iye.
teo_prompt: Apol noi aiyalongong neyapiete aseo, keda egangitok keda etepegak lueboloboloete korotin. Kokiding naka amumu kangin, abu emotoka lokapolon akwap koraun ibore yenetapit aidiya.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ri tu uru opeta eyini ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi tualu 'ba ageti oti'baa 'diyi pie a'di 'dizu nzila eyi ma alea. Ngiringiri 'da ma talasi, 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi aokoru 'diyi e'bi purezidenti vile mutukari 'du asi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru obu oburuuru bwabaire nibuhika haihi, abahagizi n'abarikuhakanisa bakaba nibarwanagana aha nguuto. Omu butabanguko, emotoka y'omwebembezi weihanga ekaba eky'okureeberaho ky'abeshaaringi abaine ekiniga.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated as demonstrators clashed with law enforcement during the rally. In an attempt to disperse the crowd, authorities resorted to crowd control measures.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde nga abekalakaasi balwanagana n'abakuumaddembe mu lukungaana. Mu kaweefube w'okusaasaanya abantu, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okukozesa enkola z'okukendeeza ku bungi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde ikare ma lujemo gubedo ka lweny ki abili ikare me gure. I tute me tyeko lwak, lutela gutiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me gengo dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu ediyak ogiroto keda ipolisin kotoma apak naka aisup aseeta. Kanu aitam aisiarakin itunga, apotu apedorosio itosomaete iwaitin lu itikitikere itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu 'ba aoko e'dapi 'diyi ni aco cozu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie sa'wa ti odaza ni ri si. E'yo lezu 'ba ongulumuru 'diyi erezu, drice'ba eyi e'do geri 'bani 'ba ongulumuru 'diyi ma kala okuzu 'diyi ayu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukongyera ahabw'abeshaaringi kurwanagana n'ab'ebiragiro omu ruteerane. Omu kugyezaho kubinga abantu, ab'obushoborozi bakakoresa emiringo y'okurwanisa abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to recent unrest and escalating tensions, city officials decided to enhance security measures. Residents were advised to remain vigilant as law enforcement prepared for potential disturbances.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera, abakungu b'ekibuga baasalawo okwongera amaanyi mu by'okwerinda. Abatuuze baakubiriziddwa okubeera obulindaala ng'abakuumaddembe beetegekera akavuyo akayinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lweny ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamede, lutic me boma madit gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me gwoko kuc. Ki lego lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo pien abili tye ka yubbe pi peko ma twero bino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin nuka amumu keda aiyalongong, apotu eswamak luka eibuga kitogogongoto ayuwara. Aponi icorakinai itunga asalakin acoikina naarai ekapakina ipolisin kanu amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba aku ambu city ni 'diyi 'du e'yo e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ba ai 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi aa'zu mile be eyini ani 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi otuta 'yezu e'yo ngiringiri ni ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obwabaireho obwahati hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire, abakuru b'orurembo bakacwamu kwongyera amaani omu by'okwerinda. Abatuuragye bakahaburwa kuguma beteekateekire ahabw'okugira ngu ab'eby'obutegyeki baketeekateekyera obutabanguko oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: The courtroom was filled with anticipation as the prosecution prepared to present their key witness. However, just moments before taking the stand, the witness experienced a sudden and severe health issue.
lug_prompt: Ekisenge kya kkooti kyajjula okweraliikirira ng'oludda oluwaabi lweetegekera okwanjula abajulizi baabwe abakulu. Newankubadde, ng'ebula akaseera katono ayimirire, omujulizi yafuna ekizibu ky'obulamu eky'amangu era eky'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I ot kot I kare ma adot tye ka yubbe me kelo caden gi ma pigi tego. Kadi bed kumeno, kare manok ma peya ocung, lacaden ne onongo peko me yot kom ma opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu kilelebunos kotoma adieket naarai ekapakina emusago aitodiar ajenakec. Konye, eringa eloto aibwo, abu ajenan kodum ationis naka angaleu naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Dwani jo ale aliza ma alia 'diyi ga dria asi driasi 'ba to'baa 'diyi ni yi oturia yi vile sadini okporu 'diyi e'dazu. Kani si, de nga po'di de nga po'di pa so ku, 'ba sadini 'da esu e'yo rua ala ni okporu ni.
nyn_prompt: Kooti ekaba eijwire amatsiko obu orubanja rwabaire nirweteekateekyera kureeta abajurizi baabo abakuru. Kwonka, obwire bukye atakagiire omu kooti, omujurizi akatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming state visit, a comprehensive security plan was put in place. This plan outlined the roles and responsibilities of various agencies involved in ensuring the safety of the president during transit.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okukyala kw'eggwanga okujja, enteekateeka y'ebyokwerinda ey'awamu yateekebwawo. Enteekateeka eno yalaga emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ebitongole eby'enjawulo ebyenyigira mu kukuuma pulezidenti ng'ali mu nsi endala.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi lim pa gamente matye kabino anyim, ki keto yub me gwoko kuc I tic. Yub man onyuto tic ki tic pa dul mapat-pat makemme ki gwoko ladit lobo I kare me wot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin aipejonokin naka akwap naebunit, aponi ibwaikinai ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Abu akapanakin ngin kitodu aswam keda aswam naka atukona nuegelegela nuikamunitos ayuwara naka lokapolon akwap kotoma apak naka alosit.
lgg_prompt: Otuta e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'ba otuta angu ndundu eyi ma agei tema ni 'diyi ma alea eyini ani muzu omuru kari 'di ma alea ri otuzu. Otita 'di ece azi azini azi amuti ndundu eyi ma dria ageitema fezu purezidenti eyini sa'wa erini acizu kari 'di ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera okurambura kw'eihanga okurikwija, enteekateeka y'eby'okwerinda ey'omutaano ekateebwaho. Enteekateeka egi ekashoboorora emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa bw'ebitongore ebitarikushushana ebyabaire nibiteekateekwaho kurinda omwebembezi w'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, the safety and security of the nation's highest office is paramount. Therefore, it is essential that those in positions of power take their duty seriously.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, obukuumi n'obukuumi bwa woofiisi y'eggwanga esinga obukulu. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abo abali mu bifo eby'obuyinza okutwala omulimu gwabwe ng'ekikulu.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lutic ma rwom gi lamal loyo weng obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni joo matye ki twero omyero gutii tic gi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naka itunga, ayuwara keda ayuwara naka eyapiesi loapolon kakere kotoma akwap erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuapolok ayait aswam kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia ni ma alia, ageitema azini ageyitema azi'ba uru kari ni 'diyi niri eri okporu ndeni. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba pari opi nyaza ni ma alia 'diyi ma 'du azi yiniri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, obusingye n'eby'okwerinda bya ofiisi y'eihanga erikukirayo oburungi n'eby'omugasho munonga. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi kutwara emirimo yaabo nk'ey'amaani.

eng_prompt: As the demand for skilled engineers continues to rise in various industries, educational institutions are adapting their programs to meet this need. Consequently, more universities and colleges are expanding their engineering departments and offerings.
lug_prompt: Nga obwetaavu bwa bayinginiya abakugu bweyongera mu makolero ag'enjawulo, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gakyusa pulogulaamu zaago okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu buno. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero ga yunivasite n'amatendekero amalala gagaziya ebitongole byaago eby'obuyinginiya n'ebyo bye gagaba.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti pa engineers matye ki ngec tye ka mede I tenge me tic mapat-pat, gangi kwan tye ka loko yubgi me kwan me cobo miti eni. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan me rwom ma malo tye ka medo rwom me gang kwan gi me bedo engineers.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipud loka engineers kotoma okampuni luegelegela, eutasi isomeroi aijulakin ainapeta kec kanu aitodolikin eipud lo. Kanuka ngun, eutasi iunibasitin keda ikoosin luipu aitanyanyar atutubena kec nuka eijiniaring.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu inginiya onduaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea risi, angu onita ni 'diyi otu otita eyivile 'diyi lezu e'yo 'di 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, univasiti azini college karakara eyi eyi ma enyati inginiya eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika afa eyini imbata fe 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetengo bya ba ingyiniya abakugu nibigumizamu kweyongyera omu makorero agatari gamwe na gamwe, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gariyo nigakora empindahinduka omu puroguraamu zaago kuhikiiriza ekyetengo eki. N'ekyarugiremu,amatendekyero ga Yunivasite n'amatendekyero agaheiguru nigashanjuura ebitongore byaago eby'eby'obuyinginiya n'ebindi ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Many recent graduates enter the job market with high hopes and expectations. However, they often encounter unexpected obstacles that hinder their job search in the engineering field.
lug_prompt: Bangi abaakatikkirwa bayingira akatale k'emirimu n'essuubi n'ebisuubirwa ebinene. Newankubadde, batera okusanga ebizibu ebitasuubirwa ebibalemesa okunoonya emirimu mu by'obuyinginiya.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol ma otyeko kwangi me univaciti gi donyo I cuk me tic ki gen madit tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, ipol kare ginongo peko ma pe gitye ka byekone ma gengo gi me yenyo tic I tenge me bedo engineer.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu angetakin asioman kesi elomanarete osokoni lo aswam keda amuno naepol noi. Konye, etapit kesi adumunun atiokisio nu mam eomitai ebe epedorete aitikitik aimo aswamisineikec kotoma aswam naka eijiniaring.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara onita univasiti niri depi o'diru 'diyi fi cuu azi ni 'diyi ma alea asi'baza azini asi'baza be angiri. Kani si, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo eyini ega ku 'diyi esu eyini ani ecozu azi ndazu angu inginiya eyini 'diyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi abamazire emishomo yaabo, nibataha omubutare bw'emirimo baine amatsiko maingi. Kwonka, buriijo nibatunga oburemeezi obutarikuteekateekwaho oburikubalemesa kuronda emirimo omu by'obuyinginiya.

eng_prompt: Pursuing a career in engineering requires a solid foundation of education and hands-on experience. Aspiring engineers must engage in rigorous training to develop the necessary skills and knowledge.
lug_prompt: Okufuna omulimu mu by'obuyinginiya kyetaagisa omusingi omunywevu ogw'okusoma n'obumanyirivu. Abagala okufuuka bayinginiya balina okwenyigira mu kutendekebwa okw'amaanyi okufuna obukugu n'amagezi ebyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Cako tic macalo engineer mito pwony ki ngec matut. Dano ma mito doko engineers omyero gunong pwony matek tutwal wek gunong diro ki ngec ma mite.
teo_prompt: Aingarenikin aswam naka eijiniaring ekot aisingarenit naka asioman keda amisiarit. Ekot lu ekotosi araun engineers alomar toma aitutuoro naepol noi kanu adumun acoa ka acoa na ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: Azi inginiya niri ma vuti obizu le 'ba ma esu onita okporu azini nita afa dria 'diyi ma dria ra. Le 'ba lepi engineers ru 'diyi ma esu imbata okporu eyini ani ecozu ondua azini ondua lele 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okukora omurimo gw'obuyinginiya, nikyetenga obwegyese burungi n'obumanyirizi. Abarikwenda kuba ba ingyiniya, bashemereire kutendekwa munonga kugira ngu batungye emyoga n'obwengye.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about pollution and littering, local officials have initiated several community initiatives. These efforts aim to engage residents in maintaining a healthier and more attractive urban environment.

eng_prompt: In a structured organization like the police force, maintaining order and discipline is crucial for effective operations. Therefore, adherence to the chain of command is essential for all personnel.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is crucial for police officers to coordinate their efforts and ensure public safety. Understanding the methods they use can provide insight into their operational efficiency.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso nnyo eri abakungu ba poliisi okukwasaganya emirimu gyabwe n'okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu. Okutegeera enkola ze bakozesa kisobola okukuyamba okumanya engeri gye bakolamu emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kube maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi abili me doro tic gi ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Niang yoo ma gitiyo kwede twero weko waniang kit ma tic gi tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan nes ibore yenepol noi kanu ipolisin aimorikikin aswam kec ka awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga. Ajenun iwaitin lu itwasamaete kesi ijaikini oni acoa na aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru azi'ba polisi ni 'diyini okpo eyini 'diyi otuzu azini o'bi eyi ma tambazu. Geri eyini ayu 'diyi ma vata eco fe e'yo eyini azi ngazu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizagana kurungi n'okw'omugasho aha ba ofiisa ba poriisi okukwatanisa n'okurinda abantu. Okwetegyereza emiringo ei barikukoresa nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya emikorere yaabo.

eng_prompt: In bustling urban areas, it's common to see groups of individuals congregating for various reasons. Whether for a protest, a festival, or simply socializing, these gatherings can often take on a chaotic atmosphere.
lug_prompt: Mu bibuga ebirimu abantu abangi, kya bulijjo okulaba ebibinja by'abantu nga bakungaana olw'ensonga ez'enjawulo. Ka kibeere okwekalakaasa, ekivvulu, oba okusanyukirako awamu, enkungaana zino zitera okuleetawo akavuyo.

teo_prompt: Ko oibuga luejaasi keda itunga luipu, etapit noi asesen igurupun luka itunga lu atukonokin kanuka akiro nuegelegela. Arai erai aidiya, epucit arai bo aineranara, epedorete atukonokin na ajaut keda amumu.
lgg_prompt: Angu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alia 'ba karakara eyi okupi e'yo ndundu eyi si. Ka tro ovu e'yo ngiringiri ni, omu ni, kani lu aa'ta 'ba eyi pie, okuta 'diyi eco sa'wa driasi e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'endembo erimu abantu baingi munonga, nikikira kureebeka guruupu z'abantu abarikuteeranira hamwe ahabw'eshonga nyingi. Yaaba n'okwekarakaasa, omukoro gw'okujaguza, nainga okushemererwa, enteerane ezi nizibaasa kureetaho akavuyo.

eng_prompt: Life often presents us with high hopes and expectations, leading us to invest emotionally in our dreams. When those dreams don't materialize, the resulting letdown can be deeply felt.
lug_prompt: Obulamu butusobozesa okuba n'ebisuubirwa n'ebisuubirwa eby'amaanyi, ekituleetera okwemalira ku birooto byaffe. Ebirooto ebyo bwe bitatuukirira, obwennyamivu obuvaamu buyinza okuwulirwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Kwo ipol kare kelo botwa gen ki gen madit tutwal, ma weko waketo cwiny wa i kom lek wa. Ka lek magi pe ocobbe, cwer cwiny ma bino macalo adwogi ne twero winne tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc aijar aitodolikin oni keda amuno naepol noi, ido ijaikini oni aitodolikin airujasiawok. Arai mam airujasia ngun itodolikinete, epedori itunganan aiyalongong noi.
lgg_prompt: Idri ni sa'wa driasi ama dri asi'baza azini asi'baza angiri 'diyi eji, e'yo 'di fe amani asi 'bazu ama vile orobi 'diyi ma alia. Orobi 'da eyi ka eca e'yo adaru ku, e'yo eyini esu 'da eco fe 'ba eyini candi esu saaru.

eng_prompt: Maintaining public trust is essential for effective law enforcement. Therefore, it is crucial that police officers uphold high standards of conduct in all situations.

lgg_prompt: O'bi eyi ma asi'baza ma tambaza eri orodriru azita eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru. Ka'dini, eri orodriru azi'ba polisi ni 'diyini adriza onyiru 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo dria ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okugumya obwesigye bw'abantu n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okukuratira ebiragiro kurungi. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho ngu abapooriisi bagume baine emicwe mirungi omu mbeera zoona.

eng_prompt: When faced with difficult choices, it's important to trust your instincts and evaluate the situation carefully. Remember that your beliefs and values should guide your actions.
lug_prompt: Bw'oyolekaganye n'okusalawo okukaluba, kyamugaso okwesiga obusobozi bwo n'okwetegereza embeera n'obwegendereza. Jjukira nti enzikiriza zo n'emitindo gyo birina okulungamya ebikolwa byo.
ach_prompt: Kace irwatte ki moko tam matek, pire tek tutwal me geno kit ma inen kwede ki dok ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede. Wii myero opo ni niyee ni omyero odor tici.
teo_prompt: Karai itereikina keda aseununeta nuetioko, ibusakinit jo amunokin aomisiokon kosodi airereor ejautene ngon ejok. Kiituni ebe ibusakinit aiyuun kon keda iponesiokon aingarenikin aswamisiokon.
lgg_prompt: Eka e'yo 'du ewaru 'diyi esu, eri orodriru mini asi 'bazu e'yo mini leleri ma dria azini e'yo nde ma ale andrizu kililiru. Mi ma ega kini e'yo mini a'ita ma dria azini orodri mini 'diyi ma ce mi 'yeta dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ku orikuhikwaho oburemeezi bw'okucwamu, n'eky'omugasho kwesiga ebiteekateeko byawe kandi oketegyereze embeera n'obwegyendesereza. Ijuka ngu enzikiriza yaawe n'emitwarize yaawe, bishemereire kwebembera ebikorwa byawe.

eng_prompt: In a world where everyone is facing their own struggles, it's important to cultivate empathy and understanding. Remember that each person you encounter has their own story and challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga buli omu ayolekedde entalo ze, kya mugaso okukulaakulanya okusaasira n'okutegeera. Jjukira nti buli muntu gw'osanga alina emboozi ye n'okusoomoozebwa kwe.

lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'ba alu alu ni dri fuzu e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi be ri ma alea, eri orodriru aa'zu asi ndriza azini vata be. Mi ma ega kini 'ba dria mini dri fuzu yi be 'diyi ma e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni azini e'yo ewaru yini 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu buri omwe aine oburemeezi bwe, n'eky'omugasho kugira esaasi n'okwetegyereza. Ijuka ngu buri muntu ou orikubugana aine ebyafaayo bye n'oburemeezi bwe.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the crowd as protesters clashed with counter-demonstrators, leading to chaos in the streets. Authorities quickly assessed the situation and decided to intervene.

eng_prompt: Many people are concerned about the advancements in medical science and their impact on diseases like cancer. With so much information circulating, it's hard to discern fact from fiction regarding treatment options.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beeraliikirivu ku nkulaakulana mu ssaayansi w'ebyobujjanjabi n'engeri gye bikwatamu endwadde nga kookolo. Olw'obubaka bungi obusaasaanyizibwa, kizibu okwawula amazima okuva ku bulimba ku bikwata ku bujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ki lworo I kom dongo pa diro me yot kom ki adwogi ne I kom two macalo kanca. Ki ngec mapol tutwal matye kawot anyim, tek tutwal me poko lok ada ki goba I kom yoo me cango two.
teo_prompt: Ipu itunga lu epodokitos nuikamunitos apol naka esayanis keda epone loepedoriata kesi aitikitik adekasinei kwape nat ekansa. Keda akiro nuipu nu ejaas, etiono aitiak akiro nukabeit keda nuka aisab nuikamunitos amukian.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi asi otiza be e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo eyi 'yepi azo ekile cancer le 'diyi ma dria. E'yo kalafe angiri ni acizu 'disi, eri mbazaru e'yo ada 'diyi ma esele cozu geri aro esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi niberarikirira entunguuka omu sayansi y'eby'amagara hamwe n'ebirikukwata aha ndwara nka kokoro. Ahabw'amakuru maingi agarikugyenda omu maisho, kigumire okutaanisa amazima n'ebitahikire ebirikukwata aha bujanjabi.

eng_prompt: Ensuring that all individuals have the opportunity to receive medical care is a fundamental aspect of a just society. Access to health services is a critical component in promoting overall well-being and reducing health disparities.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti abantu bonna bafuna omukisa okufuna obujjanjabi kye kimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kitundu ekirimu obwenkanya. Okufuna obujjanjabi kintu kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula obulamu obulungi n'okukendeeza enjawulo mu byobulamu.
ach_prompt: Neno ni dano weng tye ki gum me nongo kony me yot kom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo ma dano tye iye. Nongo kony me yot kom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano ki dwoko piny rwom me peko me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Aanyun ebe itunga kere ejaas keda arereng naka adumun amukian erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma atutubet. Adumunun amukian erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aijar ka aitidisiar atiakatiaka kotoma angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nezu ra kini 'ba dria eyi ma drileba aro esuzu ri eri e'yo azi okporu ongulumu kililiru 'diyiniri'i. Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta eri e'yo azi okporu ni aa'zu muke ri ma omgbo otuzu azini esele coza e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu boona baine omugisha gw'okutunga obujanjabi n'omuringo gw'oburingaaniza. Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara n'ekintu ky'omugasho omu kutunguura entuura nungi hamwe n'okukyendeeza obutabanguko omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: The patient lay on the treatment table, surrounded by advanced medical equipment. As the oncologist prepared to explain the procedure, curiosity filled the room.
lug_prompt: Omulwadde yali agalamidde ku mmeeza y'obujjanjabi, nga yeetooloddwa ebyuma by'obujjanjabi eby'omulembe. Ng'omusawo wa kkookolo yeetegekera okunnyonnyola enkola, okwagala okumanya kwajjula ekisenge.
ach_prompt: Latwo obedo kabuto iwi meca me ot yat, jami tic me ot yat ma rwom gi lamal orumu kome. I kare ma daktar ma kwedo two cancer tye ka yubbe me tito ngo ma myero kitim, dano mapol gubedo ki miti me ngeyo.

nyn_prompt: Omurwaire akaguma agwejegyeire aha meeza y'eirwariro, ayetorwaire ebyoma by'omurembe. Omushaho w'endwara ya kokoro ku yaabaire nayeteekateekyera kushoborora omuringo, abantu bakaba nibenda kumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Before heading out on our hiking trip, we should make sure we have all the necessary supplies packed. One essential item to check is the first aid kit.
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnatandika lugendo lwaffe olw'okulinnya ensozi, tulina okukakasa nti tutegese ebintu byonna ebyetaagisa. Ekintu ekimu eky'omugaso eky'okukebera kye kibokisi ky'obuyambi obusookerwako.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wacako wot wa, omyero wanen ni watye ki jami weng ma mite. Gin acel ma pire tek ma omyero inen aye buk me kony me ot yat.
teo_prompt: Erongo sio eloto alosit alotok, ekot oni awanyun ebe ijaasi sio keda iboro kere lu ekotoi. Ibore yenibusakinit ijo aanyun ngesi apapula naka amukian nasodit.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama e'doni aci amavile 'diyi ma dria ku, le ama ma ne ra kini ama vile afa dria lele 'diyi 'bo. Afa azi orodriru 'bani ecozu andrizu ri eri bokisi azakoma fele e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu okori'i.
nyn_prompt: Tutakatandikire oruramburo rwaitu, tushemereire kubanza twetegyereza ngu twine ebintu byona ebirikwetengwa. Ekintu kimwe ky'omugasho ekishemereire kukyeberwa n'ebikwato by'obujanjabi bw'okubanza.

eng_prompt: Understanding the complexities of cancer is crucial for effective treatment and prevention. It is a disease characterized by the uncontrolled growth of abnormal cells.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebizibu bya kookolo kya mugaso nnyo mu bujjanjabi obulungi n'okuziyiza. Lwali bulwadde obumanyiddwa olw'okukula kw'obutundutundu bw'omubiri obutatuukiridde.

nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburemeezi bwa kokoro n'eky'omugasho omu kuragurira kurungi n'okuzibira. N'endwara erikureetwa okukura kw'obutafaari obutari bwa buriijo.

eng_prompt: Advancements in medical research have led to a better understanding of the disease. As a result, various treatment options are now available for patients diagnosed with cancer.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza ku by'obujjanjabi eviiriddeko okutegeera obulungi obulwadde. N'ekivuddemu, obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo kati buliwo eri abalwadde abazuulibwa nga balina kookolo.

lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe 'bani azo 'di vazu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, aro ndundu eyi curu'do 'ba azo cancer niri be 'diyini ci.

eng_prompt: Medical engineering is a rapidly evolving field that combines principles of engineering with medical and biological sciences. Many people are curious about the specific roles and responsibilities of professionals in this area.

lgg_prompt: Inginiya e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria ri eri esele azi i ezopi mbeleru ni e'yo inzinia ni 'diyi ecipi sayansi aro ni azini afa idriru 'diyi pie ri'I. Ba karakara eyi le saaru azi azini azi 'ba onita be angiri 'diyini angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In a bustling healthcare environment, medical professionals work tirelessly to provide care. Their primary focus is on diagnosing and treating individuals who require medical attention.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulamu ejjudde abantu, abasawo bakola butaweera okuwa obujjanjabi. Essira baliteeka ku kuzuula n'okujjanjaba abantu abeetaaga obujjanjabi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals facing a cancer diagnosis seek specialized care and support. These patients often turn to cancer centres for comprehensive treatment options and resources.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abazuulibwa nga balina kookolo banoonya obuyambi n'obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo. Abalwadde bano batera okudda mu malwaliro ga kkookolo okufuna obujjanjabi obujjuvu n'ebikozesebwa.
