lgg_prompt: Ba karakara 'bani esu azo cancer niri be 'diyi atita azini atita geri ndu ndu si 'diyi nda. Ba azoru 'diyi eyi oja eyi arojo azo cancer niri be 'diyi ma alea eyini ani aro esuzu e'yo dria eyi ma dria 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikushangwa baine kokoro, nibaronda obuhwezi. Abarwaire aba nibakira kuza omu marwariro g'ekokoro kuronda obujanjabi burungi n'eby'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: Many expectant parents are considering their options for childbirth. One popular choice is private maternity wards, which offer a range of amenities and services.
lug_prompt: Abazadde bangi abali embuto balowooza ku ngeri gye bayinza okuzaaliramu. Ekimu ku bisinga okwagalibwa bye bisenge by'okuzaaliramu eby'obwannannyini, ebirimu ebyetaago n'obuweereza obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo ma oyac mapol gitye ka tamo I kom yoo me nywal gi. Yer acel ma oywek tutwal obedo odi nywal ma pe jenge I kom gamente, ma miyo jami ma mite ki kony mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Auriak luipu lu epotiete eutasi aomoom nu epote kesi aswam kanu aidoun idwe. Adiopet aseunet naejenara noi ngesi aiboisio nu idoere nu mam eraas nuka apugan, nuejaasi keda iboro ka aijanakino nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ayia okporovu karakara eyi geri eyini ecozu anzi eyi osizu 'diyi ma dria ega. Opeta azi alu 'bani lele tu 'diyi wadi oku eyi osizu 'diyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi, afa ayuzaru 'diyi fepi azini azakoma ndundu eyi fepi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire baingi abarikuzaara, bariyo nibateekateeka oku bashemereire kuzaara. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kukoresibwa n'ebishengye by'okuzaariramu eby'abantu buntu, ebirikuheereza ebintu bingi n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: After discussing various strategies and weighing the pros and cons, we need to come to a consensus. It's time to clarify our next steps moving forward.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukodyo obw'enjawulo n'okupima ebirungi n'ebibi, twetaaga okutuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Kye kiseera okulambika emitendera gyaffe egiddako nga tweyongerayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok I kom yoo mapat-pat ki pimo ber ki marac, omyero wa oo I winye. Kare dong oromo me niang ngo ma omyero watim me medde anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem iwaitin luegelegela ka airereonor ajokis keda nuarokok, ekot oni acamanar. Erai kwana apak naka aitetem nu ebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara gbazu geri ndundu eyi ma dria azini e'yo muke azini onzi 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, le ama ma emu ti ecita ma dria. Sa'wa ca di ama ma e'yo otuzu e'yo drile ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura aha mihanda etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'okureeba ebirungi n'ebibi, twine kwikirizana. N'obwire bw'okutereeza engyenderwaho yaitu erikukurataho.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling increase in cancer cases across various regions. This alarming trend has raised concerns among health officials and the general public alike.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga okweyongera kw'abalwadde ba kookolo mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Enkola eno eyeeraliikiriza ereeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu n'abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ki two kanca tye ka medde tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Tim man okelo lworo ikin lutic yoto kom ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe iyata noi enaaba loka adekak ekansa kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Aswamisioit na ayau aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu keda itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo cancer niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ra. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma eselea o'bi eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba kokoro omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Enkora egi erikutangaaza ereesire okwerarikirira omu bakuru b'ebyamagara hamwe n'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Access to quality healthcare is essential for all communities, ensuring that patients receive the specialized care they need. To achieve this, every district should have a referral hospital.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kyetaagisa mu bitundu byonna, okukakasa nti abalwadde bafuna obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo bwe beetaaga. Okutuukiriza kino, buli disitulikiti erina okuba n'eddwaliro ekkulu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo obedo gin ma pire tek pi kabedo weng, neno ni lutwo gunongo kony ma mite pigi. Me cobo man, dicitrwik weng omyero gubed ki ot yat madit.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na abeit ejok kanu itunga kere, aanyun ebe edumunenete adekak amukian na ipudasi kesi. Kanu aitodolikin nu, ekot ngol edisitrikt ajaut keda adekis napolon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata muke ri esuzu ri eri orodriru ongulumu dria eyini ani nezu ra kini 'ba azoru 'diyi atita kililiru eyini le 'diyi esu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le distrikiti dria ma ovu arojo amburi be ci.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'eky'omugasho omu bantu boona, okureeba ngu abarwaire batunga obujanjabi obubarikwetenga. Okuhikiiriza eki,buri disiturikiti eshemereire kugira eirwariro rikuru.

eng_prompt: When undergoing medical evaluations, patients often face a range of diagnostic tests. These tests are crucial for determining the presence or absence of serious conditions, such as cancer.
lug_prompt: Bwe baba bakeberebwa, abalwadde batera okukeberebwa ebintu eby'enjawulo. Okukebera kuno kwa mugaso nnyo okuzuula oba waliwo embeera embi nga kookolo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me pime, lutwo ipol kare gi nongo pim mapat-pat. Pimo man pire tek tutwal me niang kace itye ki two ma rac tutwal calo cancer.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana awanyanar adekak, ejaas duc keda ainwakio nuipu. Ejokuna noi ainwakio kanu ajenun arai ejaasi keda adekasinei nuarokok kwape nat ekansa.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua o'bizu arojoa risi, 'ba azoru 'diyi o'bi eyi ma rua o'bita ndundu eyi 'yezu. O'bita 'diyi orodriru e'yo onzi ekile cancer le 'diyi ma esuta kani yo ri ma e'yo onizu.
nyn_prompt: Abarwaire ku barikukyeberwa, nibakyeberwa emiringo mingi. Okukyeberwa oku n'okw'omugasho omu kumanya oburemeezi bw'amaani nka kokoro.

eng_prompt: Cancer remains one of the leading causes of death worldwide, affecting millions of lives each year. As we seek to understand its complexities, it's crucial to explore effective strategies for prevention and treatment.
lug_prompt: Kkookolo y'emu ku nsonga ezisinga okuviirako abantu okufa mu nsi yonna, era akosa obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu buli mwaka. Nga tugezaako okutegeera ebizibu byayo, kikulu nnyo okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ey'okuziyiza n'okujjanjaba.
ach_prompt: Cancer pud tye acel me kin jami ma kelo too I wilobo lung, ma balo kwo pa dano milion mapol mwaka ki mwaka. Ka watye ka yenyo niang peko ne, pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo maber me gengo ki cango ne.
teo_prompt: Eringa ekansa erai ediopet koboro lu eyangaununei atwanare kotoma akwap kere, itolitolete aijar naka imilionin luka itunga kangolikaru. Kwape sio aimo amisiikin atiokisio ke, ejokuna noi aimo iwaitin lu itikitikere ka aimuke.
lgg_prompt: Azo cancer niri ni nga po'di e'yo azi okporu fepi 'ba eyini odrazu wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi ma azi, dika eri ni 'ba milioni karakara eyi ma edri eyi 'ye eli alu alu vusi. Amani lezu e'yo ewaru erini 'diyi vazu, eri orodriru geri kililiru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di atrizu azini aro esuzu 'diyi ondazu.
nyn_prompt: Kokoro n'emwe aha ndwara ezirikureeta okufa omunsi yoona, erikuteganisa obukaikuru bw'abantu buri mwaka. Ku turikugyezaho kwetegyereza oburemeezi bwakyo, niky'omugasho okuronda oburyo burungi bw'okuzibira n'okuragurira.

eng_prompt: Despite significant advancements in medical research, many cancer patients still face challenges in accessing effective therapies. The current treatment options often fall short of meeting the diverse needs of those battling the disease.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza ku byobujjanjabi, abalwadde ba kookolo bangi bakyasanga okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna obujjanjabi obulungi. Obujjanjabi obuliwo butera okulemererwa okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abo abalwanyisa obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kwed me yot kom tye ka dongo tutwal, lutwo cancer mapol pud gitye ka nongo peko me nongo yat ma tiyo maber. Yub me cango two matye kombedi ipol kare pe romo cobo miti pa dano ma tye ka lweny i kom two eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol noi kotoma aingic adekasinei, eringa adekak luipu luka ekansa etereikina keda atiokisio nuka adumun amukian naejok. Epone loka amukian loakwana mam epedori aitodolikin ipudesia luegelegela luka ngul lu ejie keda adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara azo cancer niri be 'diyi nga po'di dri fu e'yo ewaru eyi be geri aro esuzu kililiru 'diyi esuzu. Geri aro esuzu curu'do 'diyi econi e'yo ndundu 'ba a'di 'dipi azo be 'diyi ma aza ko ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka omu kucondooza ahaby'amagara, abarwaire ba kokoro nibatunga oburemeezi omu kutunga obujanjabi burungi. Obujanjabi oburiho obwahati tiburikubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abo abarikurwanisa oburwaire.

eng_prompt: The rising number of cancer diagnoses in our community is alarming. As a result, it's crucial to expand our healthcare facilities to meet the growing demand for specialized care.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abantu abazuulibwa nga balina kookolo gweyongera mu kitundu kyaffe. N'ekivuddemu, kya mugaso nnyo okugaziya ebifo byaffe eby'obujjanjabi okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Wel dano matye ka nongo two cancer I kabedo wa tye ka kelo lworo tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, pire tek tutwal me medo rwom me odi yadi wa me cobo miti me nongo kony me yot kom matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Iyata enaba lo itunga lu inwakunono ekansa kotoma atutubetekosi. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aitanyanyar aiboisio nuka amukian wok kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo eyatakinet loka amukian naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'bani azo cancer niri esuzu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tutu. E'yo 'disi, eri orodriru arojo amavile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba kokoro ogweyongyeire omu kyanga kyaitu, nigwerarikiriza. N'ekyarugiremu, n'eky'omugasho munonga okugaziya amarwariro gaitu, okubaasa kuhikwaho obuheereza bw'eby'omutaano obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Uganda is known for its diverse geography and cultural richness. To better understand the country's administrative structure, one might inquire about its regional divisions.
lug_prompt: Uganda emanyiddwa olw'ebifo byayo eby'enjawulo n'obugagga bw'ebyobuwangwa. Okutegeera obulungi enkola y'obukulembeze bw'eggwanga, omuntu ayinza okwebuuza ku njawukana zaayo ez'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda ngene pi kabedo ki tekwaro ma pat pat ma en tye kwede. Me niang maber kit ma tela me lobo tye kwede, ngat moni twero penyo pi apoka-poka matye I but lobo enoni.
teo_prompt: Ejenara Uganda kanu aiboisio nuegelegela keda inonosio luegelegela. Kanu amisikin eipone lo eyaitene lo akwap, ekot itunganan aingitingit nuikamunitos aiboisio nuka aiboisio.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri e'yo angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyisi tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi pie. E'yo onizu kililiru geri kari ma dricezuri ma dria, le 'ba azi ma zi e'yo esele coza angu ndundu eyini 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Uganda nemanywa ahabw'emyanya yaayo etari emwe n'emwe hamwe n'obuhangwa bwayo. Okubaasa kwetegyereza kurungi engyenderwaho y'obwebembezi bw'eihanga, omuntu naabaasa kubuuza ebikwatireine n'okwebaganisamu kw'ebyanga.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership goes beyond mere management; it involves inspiring and empowering individuals to reach their full potential. When leaders actively engage with their teams, they can create an environment that fosters growth and development.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi busukka ku nzirukanya yokka; buzingiramu okusikiriza n'okuwa abantu amaanyi okutuuka ku busobozi bwabwe obujjuvu. Abakulembeze bwe bakolera awamu ne ttiimu zaabwe, basobola okutondawo embeera ekuza enkulaakulana n'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pe kwako tela keken ento bene kwako cuku cwiny ki miyo kero ki dano weng me cobo miti gi. Ka lutela gutiyo kacel ki lutic gi, man weko dongo lobo bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan mam erai lo eyait bon; imoriarit aisinyikokit ka aitigogong itunga aitodolikin apedorosiokec kere. Arai iswamaete engarenok keda itimun kec, epedorete kesi aitolomun ejautene lo itopoloorit apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri aga lu e'yo driceza ni ri ra; eri ma alia ava feza azini okpo feza 'ba yi ma ngulupi yi dri ecozu yi ma okpo dria 'diyi esuzu. Drice'ba ka azi nga okporu amuti yini 'diyi pie, eyi eco angu ezoza azini angu ezoma ejipi ra 'diyi ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi, tiburikugyenda omu maisho n'obwebembezi bwonka, burimu okuhiga abantu n'okubaha amaani, kugira ngu bahikiirize obushoboorozi bwabo. Abeebembezi ku barikukorengana na tiimu zaabo, nibabaasa kureetaho entunguuka n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, the importance of strong leadership cannot be overstated. To foster a brighter future, it is essential to empower the next generation with opportunities to lead.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, obukulu bw'obukulembeze obw'amaanyi tebusobola kugambibwa nnyo. Okutumbula ebiseera by'omumaaso ebitangaavu, kya mugaso okuwa omulembe oguddako omukisa okukulembera.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki tela matek. Pi kelo anyim maber, pire tek tutwal me miyo kero ki joo manyen ki gum me tela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, mam epedorio aitogogong ajokis naka eingarenone loegogong. Kanu aitopolor ingaren na ejok, ejok aitigogong ateker na etupakini keda arerengesio nuka aingarenikin.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, 'ba econi orodri driceza okporu niri ma e'yo nze ku. Lezu ewu drialeri ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru okpo fezu 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyini drileba driceza ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, omugasho gw'obwebembezi burungi tigurikubaasa kugambwaho munonga. Okureetaho ebiro by'omumaisho birungi, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza abantu b'omurembe ogurikukurataho emigisha y'okwebembera.

eng_prompt: When traveling, finding a place to stay is one of the most important considerations. Many options are available, but hotels remain a popular choice for their convenience and services.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba otambula, okufuna aw'okusula kye kimu ku bintu ebikulu by'olina okulowoozaako. Ebintu bingi ebisalibwawo, naye wooteeri zisigala nga za ttutumu olw'obwangu bwazo n'obuweereza bwazo.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka wot, nongo kabedo me bedo obedo gin acel ma pire tek tutwal. Yub mapol tye, ento hotel pud tye gin ma oywek tutwal pi ber bedo gi ki tic gi.
teo_prompt: Neautar jo alosit, adumun neperot erai ibore yen epol ajokis. Ipu iboro lu epedorio aswam, konye eringa iwoterin eraas lu ejenara noi kanuka aijaanakinikec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka aci ria, angu esuzu ri eri e'yo azi orodriru 'bani ega 'diyi ma azi. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu 'diyi karakara, te hoteli eyi awi 'ba 'bani lele tu 'diyi ma eselea e'yo eyini aa'zu ewakokoru azini azi eyini 'ye 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootambura, okusherura omwanya gw'okuraaramu nikimwe aha bintu ebikuru. Hariho oburyo bwingi, kwonka hoteeri nizikundwa munonga ahabw'oburungi bwazo n'obuheereza bwazo.

eng_prompt: In response to rising unemployment rates and the challenges faced by young people, officials have recognized the need for targeted initiatives. As a result, government has come up with programs to support the youth.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'emirimu eryeyongera n'okusoomoozebwa abavubuka kwe basanga, abakungu bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'enteekateeka eziteekeddwateekeddwa. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti evuddeyo ne pulogulaamu okuyamba abavubuka.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can tic matye kamede ki peko ma bulu tye ka kato ki iye, lutic guniang ni omyero kimok yoo me tic. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente okatti ki yub me konyo bulu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amamus na aswamisinei keda atiokisio nu ejaas atumunak, ejenete eswamak eipud loka aitolomun iboro lu itutuoritai. Kanuka ngun, etolomu apugan ainapeta kanu aigang atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako ni tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru 'ba ode eyini esu 'diyi pie, azi'ba eyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma e'do e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye ra. E'yo 'disi, gamete efu otita eyi be atita fezu 'ba ode eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'emirimo eryeyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi obu eminyeeto erikushanga, abakuru bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okutandikaho enteekateeka. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti eteireho puroguraamu z'okuhwera eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: Empowering the next generation is crucial for fostering a strong and vibrant community. To achieve this, youth leaders play a pivotal role in guiding and inspiring their peers.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula omulembe oguddako kya mugaso nnyo mu kukuza ekitundu ekinywevu era eky'amaanyi. Okutuukiriza kino, abakulembeze b'abavubuka bakola omulimu omukulu mu kulambika n'okuzzaamu bannaabwe amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Miyo kero ki anywali manyen pire tek tutwal pi dongo kabedo ma tek dok ma kwo tye iye. Me cobo man, lutela pa bulu timo tic mapire tek tutwal me konyo ki cuku cwiny luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong ateker na etupakini erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aiboisit naegogong noi. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, iswamaete engarenok lu atumunak aswam naepol noi kanu aicor ka aisinyikokin ipaupakec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo feza 'ba ewu drile 'diyi dri ri eri orodriru ongulumu okporu azini okporu 'diyi ezozu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, drice'ba 'ba ode eyini 'diyi azi okporu nga imbata fezu azini ava fezu eyi ma agyipika eyini.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura abantu ab'omurembe ogurikukurataho, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho abantu b'amaani. Okuhikiiriza eki, abeebembezi b'eminyeeto nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhabura n'okugaruramu eminyeeto yaabo amaani.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and uncertainties, it's crucial to seize the moment. Embrace the possibilities that come your way.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, kikulu nnyo okukozesa akaseera. Kkiriza obusobozi obujja mu kkubo lyo.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki peko ki peko, pire tek tutwal me tic ki kare ma itye kwede. Ye jami weng ma twero timme I yoo ni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda atiokisio, ejokuna noi aitwasam apakio nu. Kocam nu ipedori ijo aswam.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi pie tre, eri orodriru sa'wa 'di 'duzu. Le mi ai e'yo mini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi, n'eky'omugasho kukoresa oburemeezi obu twine. Yakiira obushoborozi oburikwija omu mihanda yaawe.

eng_prompt: As the community reflects on the recent initiatives implemented by local leaders, many are questioning the impact of these efforts. It's essential to evaluate whether the younger generation has truly gained from the guidance and support provided.
lug_prompt: Nga abantu balowooza ku nteekateeka ezaakateekebwa mu nkola abakulembeze b'ebyalo gyebuvuddeko, bangi babuusabuusa ebinaava mu kaweefube ono. Kya mugaso okwekenneenya oba ddala abavubuka baganyuddwa mu kubudaabudibwa n'obuyambi obubaweebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka tam I kom yub ma lutela me tedero gukati kwede cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom adwoki pa yub magi. Pire tek tutwal me niang kace anyira gunongo kony ki kony ma kimiyo botgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eutasi itunga aomoom nuikamunitos aswamisio nuka engarenok luka atutubet, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka aswamisio nu. Erai ibore yenepol noi aanyun arai imedautu atumunak kotoma aicoreta keda agangat na ijaikitai kes.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'yo egazu e'yo drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ega e'yo okpo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Eri orodriru onizu kani 'ba oderu 'diyi esu orodri engazu imbata azini atita fele 'diyi vu ra yari.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteekateeka aha nteekateeka ezi abakulembeze b'ebyaro batandikire kukora, baingi nibabangaanisa oburemeezi oburikuruga omu nteekateeka ezi. N'eky'omugasho kumanya yaaba abantu bato bagasiirwe omu buhabuzi n'obuhwezi oburikuheebwa.

eng_prompt: As we look towards the future, it's essential to consider the various factors that may impact the growth and opportunities available to young people. Understanding these challenges can help us better support their development and success.
lug_prompt: Nga tutunuulira ebiseera by'omu maaso, kikulu okulowooza ku nsonga ez'enjawulo eziyinza okukosa enkulaakulana n'emikisa egiriwo eri abavubuka. Okutegeera ebisoomooza bino kisobola okutuyamba okuwagira enkulaakulana n'obuwanguzi bwabyo.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka neno anyim, pire tek tutwal me neno jami mapol ma twero kelo dongo lobo ki gum ma bulu tye kwede. Niang peko magi twero weko wacwako dongo gi ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape sio asesen oingaren, ejok aomoom iboro luegelegela luepedorete aitolitol apol keda arerengesio nu ejaas nejaas atumunak. Ajenun atiokisio nu ingarakini oni aigang apol keda akerianut kec.
lgg_prompt: Amani angu ndreria ewu drialeri vu, eri orodriru e'yo ndundu ecopi 'ba oderu 'diyi ma zota azini drileba eyini esu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma vata eco ama aza ko angu ezoza azini drile suza yiniri atizu kililiru.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is essential in any organization, as it ensures that all members are informed and engaged. One key aspect of this process is information dissemination, which involves distributing information.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu kitongole kyonna, kubanga ekakasa nti bammemba bonna bamanyisibwa era ne bakwatibwako. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno kwe kubunyisa amawulire, nga kino kizingiramu okubunyisa amawulire.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the role of government is to serve the needs and interests of its citizens. To achieve this, various initiatives and policies are implemented to address social, economic, and environmental challenges.

eng_prompt: Lake Victoria is one of the largest lakes in Africa, serving as a vital transportation hub for the surrounding countries. Given its significance, I’m curious about the number of ports that facilitate trade and travel on the lake.
lug_prompt: Ennyanja Nalubaale y'emu ku nnyanja ezisinga obunene mu Afirika, ekola ng'ekifo ekikulu eky'entambula eri amawanga agaliraanyeewo. Okusinziira ku bukulu bwayo, njagala okumanya omuwendo gw'emyalo egiyambako mu by'obusuubuzi n'entambula ku nnyanja.
ach_prompt: Lake Victoria obedo acel me kin nam madit loyo I lobo Afrika, ma tiyo macalo kabedo me wot ma pire tek pi lobe ma orumu. Ma lubbe ki ber pa nam man, atye ki miti madit tutwal me ngeyo wel wang-waat ma weko biacara ki wot I nam eni bedo yot.

lgg_prompt: Ma ebi e'yo erizu angu ndrizaru tu 'diyi ma dria tualu anyapa asea 'diyi pie angu 'da ma alea. Eri ena kile angu muke ndeni 'bani ecozu apazu sabitini i deria ri le

eng_prompt: Uganda is known for its diverse ecosystems and abundant natural resources. Among these, water resources play a crucial role in supporting both the environment and the livelihoods of its people.
lug_prompt: Uganda emanyiddwa olw'obutonde bwayo obw'enjawulo n'obugagga bwayo obw'obutonde obungi. Mu bino, eby'obugagga by'amazzi bikola omulimu omukulu mu kuwagira obutonde bw'ensi n'embeera z'abantu baayo.

teo_prompt: Ejenara Uganda kanu aiboisio nuegelegela keda iboro luipu. Kotoma iboro lu, iswamaete akipi aswam naepol noi kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap keda aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri e'yo afa nyakuni 'diyi ma esele cozu 'diyisi azini lonyi nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo si tre. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, afa yi ni 'diyi azi okporu nga angu amani aa'zu alenia ri atizu tualu geri 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: As the event approached, the organizers finalized the schedule and confirmed the attendance of several distinguished guests. Among them, the chief guest was expected to play a pivotal role in the proceedings.
lug_prompt: Omukolo bwe gwasembera, abategesi baamaliriza enteekateeka era ne bakakasa okubeerawo kw'abagenyi ab'ekitiibwa abawerako. Mu byo, omugenyi omukulu yali asuubirwa okuba n'ekifo ekikulu mu mirimu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub ne cok, luyub yub ne gumoko ni wele mapol gubino. I kingi, welo madit onongo byek tye I kome me timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete epucit ngol, apotu luitemonokinak ongetakisi ainapeta kosodete aitogogong ebe epote ipejok luipu. Kanejaas kesi, eomitai ebe ebeit epejonon lo angosibib aitolot aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolot akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ni ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba otuta otupi 'diyi otu otita eyi dika eyi ai omu inzile inzi 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Yi ma eselea, 'ba ega omu inzile inzi ri nga azi okporu 'ye e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma alia.

eng_prompt: Water is essential for all living organisms, playing a crucial role in various biological processes. Its importance in sustaining life has led many cultures to regard it as a fundamental element of existence.
lug_prompt: Amazzi ga mugaso eri ebitonde byonna ebiramu, nga gakola omulimu omukulu mu nkola z'ebiramu ez'enjawulo. Omugaso gwaayo mu kuyimirizaawo obulamu guviiriddeko obuwangwa bungi okugutwala nga ekintu ekikulu mu kubeerawo.
ach_prompt: Pii obedo gin ma pire tek pi jami makwo weng, ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yub mapat-pat me kwo pa dano. Pire tek tutwal I gwoko kwo oweko tekwaro mapol tamo ni obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Ejokuka akipi kanu aijar naka itunga kere, ido iswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka itunga. Ajokis ke kotoma aidar aijar einakini inonosio luipu asesen ngesi kwape ibore yenibusakinit itunga aijar.
lgg_prompt: Yi eri orodriru afa idri be 'diyi dri, eri azi okporu nga e'yo idri ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia. Orodri erini idri ta mbazu ri fe suru karakara eyini eri 'du ekile afa orodriru aa'zu edriru ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Amaizi n'ag'omugasho aha biine amagara, nigakora omurimo gw'amaani omu mirimo y'obuhangwa etari emwe n'emwe. Omugasho gwayo omu kugumyaho amagara, gureesire eby'obuhangwa bingi kugitwara nk'ekintu ky'omugasho omu kubaho.

eng_prompt: Uganda is known for its diverse landscapes and rich natural resources. Among its most notable features are the numerous rivers that flow through the country.
lug_prompt: Uganda emanyiddwa olw'ebifo byayo eby'enjawulo n'obugagga bwayo obw'obutonde. Ebimu ku bintu ebyewuunyisa bye migga emingi egikulukuta mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda oywek pi kabedo ma pat pat ma tye iye ki lonyo ma lubanga aye ocweyo. I kin jami ma pire tek loyo aye kulu mapol matye ka mol I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ejenara Uganda kanu aiboisio nuegelegela keda iboro luibusiak luka Edeke. Adiopet koboro lu itegelikina kes icileta luipu lu elelete kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri angu ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyisi tualu lonyi nyakuni 'diyi pie. E'yo erini 'yele onyiru tu 'diyi ma eselea yi ara karakara yi asipi kari ma aliasi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Uganda nemanywa ahabw'oburungi bw'ensi hamwe n'ebintu byayo eby'obuhangwa. Omu bintu byayo ebirikumanywa munonga harimu emigyera mingi erikuraba omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In a high-pressure situation, it's crucial to understand the chain of command within law enforcement. Many people wonder how police officers receive their instructions during critical incidents.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ey'okunyigirizibwa ennyo, kya mugaso okutegeera enjegere y'obuduumizi mu bakuumaddembe. Abantu bangi beebuuza engeri abasirikale ba poliisi gye bafuna ebiragiro byabwe mu biseera ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I kare me lyeto madit tutwal, pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma dul ma gwoko cik tiyo kwede. Dano mapol gipenye kekengi kit ma abili nongo kwede cik ikare me peko.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi, ejokuna noi amisiikin epone loepedorere itunga aitup ikisila. Ipu itunga lu ejenete epone lo edumunenete ipolisin aicoreta kec kapak kana ejaar akiro nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi vazu. Ba karakara eyi osu polisi eyi azita eyivile 'diyi esu sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea ngoniru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'amaani, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza emirimo y'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Abantu baingi nibeebuuza oku ba ofiisa ba poriisi barikutunga ebiragiro byabo omu bwire bw'ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent threats and rising tensions, it has become increasingly clear that the safety of our nation's leader is paramount. Ensuring the president's security is not just a matter of protocol, but a critical responsibility for the government.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kutiisibwatiisibwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obukuumi bw'omukulembeze w'eggwanga lyaffe bwe businga obukulu. Okukakasa obukuumi bwa pulezidenti si nsonga ya nkola yokka, wabula buvunaanyizibwa bukulu eri gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bura ma okato cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamede, nen atyer kamaleng ni gwoko ber bedo pa latela me lobo man obedo gin ma pire tek loyo weng. Gwoko ber bedo pa ladit lobo pe obedo gin atima keken ento obedo tic ma pire tek tutwal pi gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aitukurianeta nupac keda aiyalongong naepol noi, ecai cut ebe ayuwara naka engarenon lo akwap wok nes ibore yenepol noi. Aitogogong ayuwara naka lokapolon akwap mam erai nuikamunitos ainapeta bon, konye erai aswam naepol noi kama ejai apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo uri gbaza o'diru 'diyi ma e'yo si azini e'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma e'yo si, eca e'da kini ageitema drice'ba kari ama vileri niri eri e'yo okporu ndeni ri'I. Ageitema fezu purezidenti dri ri ovuni lu e'yo azita palaa ku, te eri azi okporu gamete ni.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kutiinisa okuhweireho hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu eby'okwerinda by'omwebembezi w'eihanga ryaitu nibyo by'omugasho munonga. Okureebeka ngu omwebembezi w'eihanga aine eby'okwerinda, tiky'omuringo gwonka, kureka n'obujunaanizibwa bw'amaani ahari gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, individuals have the right to express their political beliefs and seek public support. This freedom is essential for fostering a diverse political landscape.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, abantu balina eddembe okwogera enzikiriza zaabwe ez'ebyobufuzi n'okunoonya obuwagizi bw'abantu. Eddembe lino lya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera y'ebyobufuzi ey'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, dano acel acel tye ki twero me loko tamgi I kom lok me cungu iwi bye ki nongo cwak pa lwak. Bedo agonya man pire tek tutwal pi kelo lok me cungu iwi bye mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ejaasi kesi keda apedor naka einer ka aimo agangat kama ejaasi itunga. Erai ailajara na naepol noi kanu aitopolorite akiro nuka epolitikis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba alu alu ma drilemgbo ci e'yo yini a'ita politiki ni 'diyi ecezu azini atita o'bi eyini ri esuzu. Driwala 'diri orodriru e'yo politiki ni ndundu 'diyi ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, abantu baine obugabe bw'okugamba ebi barikwikiriza omu by'obutegyeki n'okuronda obushagiki bw'abantu. Obugabe obu n'obw'omugasho omu kureetaho entekateeka y'eby'obutegyeki etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: The church has long served as a cornerstone of support and guidance for individuals and families alike. Its role extends beyond spiritual nourishment, influencing social cohesion and community development.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa emaze ebbanga nga ekola ng'ejjinja ery'oku nsonda ery'obuyambi n'obulagirizi eri abantu ssekinnoomu n'amaka. Omulimu gwayo gusukka ku kuliisa mu by'omwoyo, okutumbula okukwatagana mu bantu n'enkulaakulana y'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Kanica dong otiyo pi kare malac macalo guti me miyo kony ki tira bot dano ki gangi. Ticgi pe tye I kom miyo cam me cwiny keken, ento bene kelo ribbe I kin lwak ki dongo lobo I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Ejaanak ekanisa apak naepol noi kwape amoru na agangat keda aicoreta nejaas itunga keda ikalia. Aswam ke erai naepol noi adepar aijanakin itunga akiro nuka Edeke, aitojokar aimorikikina keda apol naka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa nga ca sawa ezu ekile onisi atita azini imbata fezu 'ba yi ma ngulupisi azini familia yi driri le. Azi erini nga ri aga e'yo rua ma ta mbaza ma dria, ti ecita ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu azini ongulumu eyi ma ezota ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in congestion during peak hours. As a result, the traffic department is concerned with the movement of cars on the road.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongerayongera kw'omujjuzo mu ssaawa z'abantu abangi. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ky'ebidduka kyeraliikirivu ku ntambula y'emmotoka ku luguudo.

teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apolor noi eipues loka itunga kotoma apakio nuapolok. Kanuka ngun, epodokinit erionget loka irotin alosit naka amotokan korot.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, omita 'ba eyini ri ma omgbo tu sa'wa 'ba eyini acizu tu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba nzila dria 'diyi asi mutukari yini acizu nzila dria 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: As the leader of the nation, the president has the authority to travel freely across the country and beyond. His schedule is often filled with important engagements and opportunities to connect with citizens.

teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon lo akwap, ejaasi lokapolon akwap keda apedor naka alosit aiboisio kere kotoma akwap keda akwapin ace. Ileleba duc ainapeta ke keda aswamisio nuepolok ka arerengesio nuka arucokina keda itunga.

eng_prompt: The role of oversight in government agencies is crucial for maintaining accountability and transparency. One key figure in this process is the inspector general, who plays a vital role in ensuring compliance and investigating misconduct.
lug_prompt: Omulimu gw'okulondoola mu bitongole bya gavumenti gwa mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma embalirira n'obwerufu. Omuntu omu omukulu mu nkola eno ye ssabaduumizi wa gavumenti, akola omulimu omukulu mu kukakasa okugobererwa n'okunoonyereza ku mpisa embi.
ach_prompt: Tic pa lutic ma doro tic pa gamente pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kor tic ki ada. Ngat acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo inspector general, ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal I neno ni lutela lubu cik ki kwedo tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka aimaniman iriongeta luka apugan erai naepol noi kanu aidar eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun keda aica. Idiopetunganan yen epol ajokis kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi engarenon lokapolon, lo iswamai aswam naepol noi kowai lo aitup ekisil keda aingic iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: Azi ꞌba eꞌyo ꞌyepi ꞌdiyi ma pamvu andripi ꞌdiyi ma azi eri orodriru eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌye ꞌdiyi ma dria azini eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌye ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma tambazu. Ba azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri inspector general ni azi okporu ngapi e'yo azita vuti obiza ni azini e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma eti ondazu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'okureebuuza ebitongore bya gavumenti, n'ogw'omugasho munonga, ahabw'okurinda embaririra n'oburingaaniza. Omwe aha bantu b'omugasho omu nkora egi n'orikukurira eby'obutegyeki, orikukora omurimo gw'amaani, okureeba ngu ebiragiro nibikuratirwa n'okucondooza aha bikorwa ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: In discussions about law enforcement accountability, it's important to understand the various forms of misconduct that can occur. One key area of concern is the concept of neglect of duty, which raises questions about police responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku buvunaanyizibwa bw'abakuumaddembe, kikulu okutegeera engeri ez'enjawulo ez'enneeyisa embi eziyinza okubaawo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebitweraliikiriza kwe kulagajjalira emirimu, ekireetawo okubuusabuusa ku buvunaanyizibwa bwa poliisi.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom kit ma dul ma gwoko cik tiyo kwede, pire tek tutwal me niang kit tim maraco mapat-pat matwero time. Kabedo acel ma pire tek tutwal ma kelo lworo obedo lok me cayo tic pa abili, ma kelo lapeny i kom tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemitem nuikamunitos aitup ikisila, ejokuna noi amisiikin iponesio luegelegela luepedorete atakanun. Aiboisit adiope naepol noi naiyalongongoi ngesi ationis naka apalunit aswam, na eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos aswam naka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza e'yo 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'yeta onzi ndundu ecopi i 'yepi 'diyi vazu. E'yo azi okporu asi otiza ma dria ri eri egata e'yo 'bani azi 'diyi adizu ri ma dria, e'yo azi polisi eyini 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In the fast-paced world of marketing, teams often find themselves juggling multiple tasks and deadlines. As a result, the process of launching a new campaign can quickly spiral into disarray.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'okutunda ey'amangu, ttiimu zitera okwesanga nga zirwanagana n'emirimu egy'enjawulo n'ennaku z'omwezi. N'ekivuddemu, enkola y'okutongoza kakuyege omupya esobola okukyuka mangu mu butabanguko.

teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol noi naka agwelanar, etapit itimun adumun ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam iboro luipu keda apaarasia nuipu. Kanuka ngun, epone loka aitegear ikampeins luitetiak epedori atipet aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru e'yo cuu ndazani okposi 'diyi ma alia, amuti yi yi isu yi ma ngulupi e'yo 'yezu e'yo karakara yi be azini o'du asizuri be. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ti odaza o'diru ni e'dozu ri eco eca ewaru mbeleru.

eng_prompt: In discussions and decision-making, it's important to consider diverse perspectives. Ignoring differing viewpoints can lead to misunderstandings and missed opportunities for growth.

eng_prompt: In an effort to connect with their constituents, many candidates organize events to share their platforms and engage with the public. These gatherings often serve as a crucial part of their campaign strategy.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukwatagana n'abalonzi baabwe, abeesimbyewo bangi bategeka emikolo okugabana enkola zaabwe n'okukwatagana n'abantu. Enkungaana zino zitera okukola ng'ekitundu ekikulu mu kakuyege waabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me kube ki lubol kwir gi, lucungu mapol giyubu yub me nywako tam gi ki lwak. Kacokke magi ipol kare tiyo macalo yoo acel ma pire tek me bito kwi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aimorikikin keda itunga luka atutubenakec, itemonokinete abwaak luipu airiamunet kec keda itunga. Atukona nu iswamaete duc kwape ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitemonokineta kec nuka ikampeins.

eng_prompt: There are various reasons a road might be inaccessible, ranging from construction work to unexpected accidents. Understanding the potential causes can help drivers plan their routes more effectively.
lug_prompt: Waliwo ensonga nnyingi lwaki oluguudo luyinza okuba nga terutuukikako, okuva ku mulimu gw'okuzimba okutuuka ku bubenje obutasuubirwa. Okutegeera ebiyinza okuvaako kiyinza okuyamba abavuzi b'ebidduka okuteekateeka amakubo gaabwe obulungi.
ach_prompt: Tye tyen lok mapol ma oweko yoo pe twero oo, cakke ki I kom tic me gedo me oo I can me gudu ma pe byek tye I komgi. Niang ngo ma twero kelo peko twero konyo ludwo mutoka me yubu yoo gi maber.
teo_prompt: Ipu akiro nu mam epedori aitodolikin erot, anyoun kotoma aswam naka aduko kitoni akangasia numam eomitai. Ajenun iboro luepedorete aingarakin iderepan aitemonokin erot kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara nzila ni ecozu cazu ku 'diyi, e'dozu azi afa sizu 'diyi vu kpere drileonzi 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi pie. E'yo ecopi fepi 'diyi ma vata eco 'ba dereva ru 'diyi ma aza ko geri eyini acizu 'diyi otuzu kililiru.

eng_prompt: The city was shaken by a shocking crime that left residents on edge. As the news spread, the streets became a hive of activity, with law enforcement mobilizing in full force.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga kyakankana olw'obuzzi bw'emisango obw'entiisa obwaleka abatuuze ku bunkenke. Amawulire bwe geeyongera okusaasaana, enguudo zaayitiramu abantu bangi, era ab'eby'okwerinda nabo beeyongera okujja mu bifo ebyo.

lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni fe aku ambo 'da ma alea 'ba eyini aa'zu orisi. O'duko ni i erezurisi, nzila eyi eca 'yeta ru, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi tra eyi okpo dria si.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo rukateerwa akagwe ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obw'omutaano obwarekire abatuuragye batiinisiibwe. Amahurire kuyajanjaire, enguuto zikaba zirimu emirimo mingi, ab'eby'obutegyeki barikukorera hamwe n'amaani gaabo goona.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable increase in public disturbances and unpredictable gatherings. This trend has raised questions about the potential impact on community safety and law enforcement's role in managing such situations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okweyongerayongera mu butabanguko mu bantu n'enkungaana ezitategerekeka. Enkola eno ereeseewo ebibuuzo ku ngeri gye biyinza okukosaamu obukuumi bw'ekitundu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'abakuumaddembe mu kukwasaganya embeera ng'ezo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, tim gero ki gure mapat-pat matye katimme I kin lwak omede tutwal. Tim man okelo lapeny I kom adwoki ma twero bedo tye I kom ber bedo pa lwak ki tic pa lugwok cik I tic I kom jami ma kit meno.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor noi amumu keda atukonokin. Eyangaunit ngin aingiseta nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata itunga ayuwara keda aswam naka ipolisin kotoma aitikitik akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ejipi o'bi eyi ma eselea azini okuta 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'di eji zita eyi e'yo ecopi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma agei tema ma dria azini azi 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyini e'yo 'dile 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko hamwe n'enteerane ezitarikwetegyerezibwa. Enkora egi ereesireho ebibuuzo ebirikukwata ahaby'okwerinda omu bantu hamwe n'omurimo gw'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro omu kukora ahabintu nk'ebyo.

eng_prompt: For security reasons, the president's movements are carefully coordinated. A fleet of vehicles accompanies him wherever he goes.
lug_prompt: Olw'ensonga z'eby'okwerinda, entambula za pulezidenti zikwasaganyizibwa n'obwegendereza. Ebibinja by'emmotoka bimugoberera buli gy'alaga.
ach_prompt: Pi tyen lok me gwoko kuc, wot pa ladit lobo ki yubu maber tutwal. Mutoka mapol giwoto kwede kamo keken ma en cito iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu akiro nuka ayuwara, itemonokino alosit naka lokapolon akwap ejok. Eutasi amotokan nuipu aimorikikin ngesi aiboisio kere nu elosi ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ageyitema ni 'diyisi, 'ba acita purezidenti ni 'diyi otu geri kililiru si. Mutukari karakara eyi eri be pari dria erini muzu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eshonga z'eby'okwerinda, entambura za purezidenti nizikorwa n'obwegyendesereza. Ekibinja ky'ebiiruka nikimuherekeza hoona ahu arikuza.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas, law enforcement resources are limited, leading to a unique way of life for officers. As a result, they often find themselves living and working in close quarters.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi, ebikozesebwa mu kukwasisa amateeka bitono, ekireetera obulamu obw'enjawulo eri abasirikale. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesanga nga babeera era nga bakolera mu bifo ebiriranye.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, lutic ma gwoko cik peke ki jami ma oromo, ma oweko kwo pa abili obedo tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare ginongo ni gibedo dok gitiyo I kabedo ma cok.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, ikidioko iswamasia lu ikisila, ido einakini iponesio luka aijar luitegelikina mama ejaasi ipolisin. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aiboi ka aswam kotoma aiboisio nueyapiete.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru 'diyi ma alia, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma kalafe were, e'yoni fe azi'ba yini ovuzu geri ndu 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni eyi esu aa'ria azini azi nga angu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'ebyaro, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro tibarikwebaasa, ekirikureetera abapooriisi kugira entuura y'omutaano. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kushangwa nibatuura n'okukorera omu myanya eri haihi.

eng_prompt: As the sun dipped below the horizon, casting long shadows across the ground, I realized how quickly the days slipped away. Each moment felt fleeting, a reminder that life moves forward regardless of our plans.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yagenda ekka wansi mu bbanga, n'essa ebisiikirize ebiwanvu ku ttaka, nnakitegeera engeri ennaku gye zaayitiramu mangu. Buli kaseera kaalabika nga ak'akaseera obuseera, okujjukiza nti obulamu bugenda mu maaso awatali kufaayo ku nteekateeka zaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng tye ka ryeny piny, kun keto tipo maboco iwi ngom, aniang kit ma nino okato kwede oyot-oyot tutwal. Kare acel-acel obedo calo kare ma okato, ma poyo wii dano ni kwo mede anyim labongo paro pi yub ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kotoma akwap, abu eong ajenun epone loabu apaarasia kotubor katipet. Apupi ngin apak naedit noi, aitijenikinet ebe elosi aijar ainyikokinit araida ijaasi sio keda ainapeta nuepedori oni aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni e'deria angu ma dria, o'duko ezu 'diyi 'be nyaku dria, ma esu e'yo o'du yini alizu mbeleru ri ra. Sa'wa dria ma alia, ma ega kini idri ni mu drile ama vile otita 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kugwa ahansi y'eiguru, niriteeka ebisiikirize ahaitaka, nketegyereza oku ebiro byabaire nibihweera juba. Buri kaire kakaba nikareebeka nk'ak'akanya kakye, nk'eky'okwijutsya ngu amagara nigagyenda omu maisho, oihiremu enteekateeka zaitu.

eng_prompt: The excitement in the air is palpable as fans eagerly anticipate the upcoming event. Preparations are underway to ensure everything is perfect for the big day.
lug_prompt: Essanyu eriri mu bbanga lirabika ng'abawagizi beesunga omukolo ogujja. Enteekateeka zigenda mu maaso okulaba nga buli kimu kituukiridde ku lunaku olukulu.
ach_prompt: Cwiny dano tye yom tutwal I kare ma lucwak tye ka kuro yub matye kabino ni. Yub tye kawot anyim me neno ni jami weng tye maber pi nino madit.
teo_prompt: Ejai aiyalama kotoma okwam naarai ekotosi egangitok noi aitolot aswamisioit naebunit. Ejaas aitemonokineta kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna iboro kere kanuka apaaran napolon.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko saaru oli ma alea ri eri e'dazaru 'ba atita fepi 'diyini avasi e'yo emupi 'diyi ma e'yosi. Otuta eyi mu drile nezu ra kini e'yo dria otu kililiru o'du amboru 'da ni.
nyn_prompt: Okushemererwa okuri omumwanya nikureebeka ahabwokuba abahagizi nibateekateeka munonga aha mukoro ogurikwija. Entebekanisa ziriyo nizigyenda omu maisho okureeba ngu buri kimwe kihikire ahaizooba rihango.

eng_prompt: After a challenging first half filled with missed opportunities, we regrouped and focused on our strategy. The energy in the stadium was electric as we entered the final minutes of play.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekitundu ekisooka okukaluba nga kijjudde emikisa gye twasubwa, twaddamu okukungaana ne tussa essira ku bukodyo bwaffe. Amasannyalaze mu kisaawe gaali ga masannyalaze nga tuyingira mu ddakiika ezisembayo ez'omuzannyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tuko ma obedo tek tutwal I but tuku me acel ma opong ki gum mapol ma pe wanongo, wacokke dok waketo cwiny wa I kom yub ma watye kwede. Mac ma obedo I bar tuku ne obedo mac I kare ma wadonyo I dakika me agiki me tuku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitelekaar atutubet nasodit naepol keda arerengesio nuapotu kotwakiasi, apotu sio atukokinos kosodete aitemokin iwaitin wok. Arai akim naepol noi kotoma oisawe neadolunia sio idakikan lu awasia luka abolia.
lgg_prompt: Esele okori ma vutia e'yo ewaru 'bani drileba avizaru 'diyi pie, ama tra amani dika ama asi 'ba otuta amani 'diyi ma dria. Okpo pari avitaniri ma alia ri ndra aci ru amani efizu dakika avita ni asizu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ekicweka ky'okubanza ekyabaire kigumire kandi kirimu emigisha mingi, tukagaruka tweteekateekyera enteekateeka yaitu. Amashanyarazi g'omu kishaayi gakaba gari g'amashanyarazi obu twaizire omu dakiika z'ahamuheru z'omuzaano.

eng_prompt: I've always been curious about the craftsmanship involved in creating wooden furniture. What techniques and tools do artisans use in the process?
lug_prompt: Bulijjo mbadde njagala okumanya engeri ebintu by'omu nnyumba eby'embaawo gye bikolebwamu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng abedo ki miti me ngeyo diro me yubu jami me kom ki bao.
teo_prompt: Amina duc eong ajenun nuikamunitos epone loiswamaere iboro luka abawoi.
lgg_prompt: Ma ovu sawa driasi ava be e'yo 'bani afa edeza mbawusiri edezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire nyine ekihika ky'okumanya emirimo y'emikono erikukorwa omu kukora ebintu by'omuti.

eng_prompt: The relationship between law enforcement and the judicial system is often complex, raising questions about accountability and oversight. One area of concern is the role of disciplinary courts in addressing misconduct within the police force.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'abakuumaddembe n'ekitongole ekiramuzi etera okuba enzibu, ekireetawo ebibuuzo ku buvunaanyizibwa n'okulondoola. Ekintu ekimu ekyeraliikiriza gwe mulimu gwa kkooti ezirambika empisa mu kukola ku mpisa embi mu poliisi.
ach_prompt: Wat ikin dul ma gwoko cik ki dul ma ngolo kop ipol kare bedo tek tutwal, ma kelo lapeny i kom kor tic ki kor tic. Gin acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal obedo tic pa kot me miyo pwod i kom tim maraco matye I dul pa abili.
teo_prompt: Eidicane loejai kiding ipolisin keda ikatubok mam ecai, eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos eipone lo itwasamatere ikisila keda aimaniman. Adiopebon lo epodokinit ngesi aswam naka ekooti loka alecorio kanu aitemokin iponesio luarokok luka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba e'yo li'ba 'diyi pie ri ma eselea ri eri sawa driasi kongolokoru, e'yo eyi ejipi e'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo eyi ma pamvu onezu ri ma dria. E'yo azi alu 'bani asi 'bazu drinia ri eri azi koti e'yo adriza onzi 'yepi polisi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Enkoragana ahagati y'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro hamwe n'ekitongore ekirikucwera orubanja, nekira kureetaho ebibuuzo ebikwatiraine n'embaririra hamwe n'okureebuuza. Ekintu kimwe ekirikwerarikiriza n'omurimo gwa kooti z'emicwe omu kurwanisa emicwe mibi omu pooriisi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the incident, the internal review board concluded that there was insufficient evidence to support the allegations. As a result, the police officer's disciplinary charges were dropped.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku byaliwo, akakiiko akanoonyereza mu ggwanga kaamaliriza nti tewaaliwo bujulizi bumala okuwagira ebigambibwa. N'ekyavaamu, emisango gy'okukangavvula omukungu wa poliisi gyaggibwawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme, dul me Internal Review Board omoko ni caden peke ma oromo me cwako adot ne. Macalo adwogi ne, ki kwanyo adot me miyo pwod ki abili ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro ngun, abu erionget loengicete akiro ngun kotema ebe emamei aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aitogogong akiro ngun. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolemunai imusagon luka epolisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma vutia, amuti e'yo 'da ma ale andripi omvele internal review board ru 'diyi 'yo kini afa azi ecopi e'dapi kini e'yo 'da 'ye i ra ada 'diyi cani ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nze e'yo 'bani 'ba azi ngapi polisi'a 'diyi ma dria e'yo adriza onzi 'yezu 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi ebyabaireho, akakiiko k'omunda kakareeba ngu hakaba hatariho bujurizi burikumara. N'ekyarugiremu,emishango y'okukwatisa emicwe omu pooriisi ekarugaho.

eng_prompt: The police department has various specialized units to handle different types of incidents. One of these units is the field force unit, which plays a crucial role in maintaining public order.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kya poliisi kirina ebitongole eby'enjawulo okukola ku misango egy'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bitongole bino kye field force unit, ekikola omulimu omukulu mu kukuuma emirembe mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Dul pa abili tye ki dul mapat-pat ma tiyo i kom jami mapat-pat. Acel me kin dul magi obedo dul me field force unit, ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ipolisin keda atutubena nuegelegela kanu aitemokin akiro nuegelegela. Adiopet kotoma atukona ngun ngesi atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce, loiswamaete aswam naepol noi kotoma aidar ainapakina kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Arakala polisi eyini 'diyi ma esele ndundu eyi e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ongulumu alu 'diyi field force unit ni azi okporu ngapi e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kya pooriisi kiine ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe eby'omutaano kukora aha shonga ezitarikushushana. Kimwe aha bitongore ebi n'ekya field force unit, ekirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda obusingye omu bantu.

eng_prompt: The principles of justice in Uganda are rooted in the belief that every individual deserves a fair trial. This foundational concept is essential to ensuring the protection of human rights within the legal system.
lug_prompt: Emisingi gy'obwenkanya mu Uganda gisinziira ku ndowooza nti buli muntu asaana okuwozesebwa mu bwenkanya. Endowooza eno enkulu ya mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma eddembe ly'obuntu mu nkola y'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Cik ma doro lok me ngolo kop atir I lobo Uganda jenge I kom niyee ni dano weng omyero ki winyo pido gi maber. Tam man pire tek tutwal me gwoko twero pa dano I te cik.
teo_prompt: Aicoreta nuka etube loajokan ko Uganda eraas lu eomitai ebe ibusakinit nginitunganan apupokinio ejok. Erai aomisioit ngin naepol noi kanu ayuarite apedorosio nuka itunga kotoma okisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo liza kililiru kari Uganda niri ma alea ri enga egata kini le 'ba dria ma esu e'yo liza kililiru ri ra. Egata okporu 'diri orodriru drilemgbo 'ba a'da yiniri ma ta mbazu geri azita ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Emisingye y'oburingaaniza omu Uganda neegamira aha kwikiriza ngu buri muntu ashemereire kuhurira orubanja rwe omu buringaaniza. Ekiteekateeko eki n'eky'omugasho omu kurinda obugabe bw'abantu omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: In discussions about law enforcement strategies, many people question the rationale behind certain policing methods. One common concern is the reliance on preconceived notions rather than concrete evidence.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkola z'okukwasisa amateeka, abantu bangi babuusabuusa ensonga eri emabega w'enkola z'okukwasisa amateeka ezimu. Ekimu ku bintu ebitera okweraliikiriza abantu kwe kwesigama ku ndowooza zaabwe mu kifo ky'okwesigama ku bujulizi obwenkukunala.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok I kom yoo mapat-pat me gwoko cik, dano mapol gipenyo tyen lok ma tye I ngee yoo mapat-pat me gwoko cik. Lworo acel ma dano maro obedo jenge I kom tam macon me kaka caden matye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei nuikamunitos iponesio luka ipolisin, mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos iponesio ice luka ipolisin. Ationis adiope erai amunokina aomisio nuka sek itia aitogogongoret na abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza geri 'bani azita ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ega geri azi polisi eyini 'diyi ma dria. Asi otiza alu tuni ri asi'baza e'yo 'bani ega drio 'diyi ma dria aga afa e'dapi ra 'diyi ma dria ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okukuratiriza ebiragiro, abantu baingi nibabangaanisa enshonga eri enyima y'emihanda emwe y'okukuratira ebiragiro. Ekintu kimwe ekirikukyerarikiriza munonga n'okwesiga ebiteekateeko ebitahikire omu mwanya gw'obuhame.

eng_prompt: As tensions rise in the capital, security measures have been heightened for all government officials. In light of recent threats, the president's convoy is heavily guarded.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kibuga ekikulu, eby'okwerinda byongezeddwayo eri abakungu ba gavumenti bonna. Olw'okutiisibwatiisibwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, kabangali ya pulezidenti ekuumibwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma telle tye kamede I boma madit me Uganda, rwom me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo tye malo pi lutic pa gamente weng. Ma lubbe ki bura ma okato cokcok-ki, mutoka pa ladit lobo ki gwoko gi matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit napolon, aponi iyatakinai ayuwara mama ejaasi eswamak kere luka apugan. Katupitos aitukurianeta nupac, eyuaritai amotokan nuka lokapolon akwap noi.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu aku ambu kari niri ma alea risi, 'ba otu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi dria. E'yo uri gbaza o'diru 'diyisi, 'ba mutukari purezidenti ni 'diyi ma ta mba okporu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera omu kibuga ekikuru, ab'eby'okwerinda beyongyeirwemu amaani aha bakuru ba gavumenti boona. Ahabw'okutiinatiinisa okwabaireho obwahati, emotoka z'omwebembezi w'eihanga zikarindwa munonga.

eng_prompt: After months of legal battles and negotiations, the defendant finally decided to accept a plea deal. The evidence against him was overwhelming, leaving little room for a successful defense.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'entalo z'amateeka n'enteeseganya, omuwawaabirwa yasalawo okukkiriza okwewozaako. Obujulizi obwali bumulumiriza bwali bungi nnyo ne kiba nti yali tasobola kwewozaako bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny ki winye pi dwe mapol, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni dong omoko tamme me winye. Caden ma onongo tye I kome obedo mapol tutwal ma oweko kabedo manok tutwal me gwoko kwone maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ijisinei keda ipegeta, abu lo iwosatai kocam acamun acamanar. Apol noi aitogogongoret naitepesenitai ngesi, ido mam abu kojalak aiboisit naepedori ngesi aitepeg.
lgg_prompt: Mba a'di 'diza azini e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma vutia, agu 'bani toleri asizu asizu e'yo a'izu e'yo nde ma dria ra. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌye eri ma dria ꞌdiyi ma omgbo angiri, ꞌba ku pari were ꞌbani eri ma agei tezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okurwana omu biragiro hamwe n'okuteesa, orikujunaanwa akacwamu kwikiriza okwemerererwa. Obujurizi obwamuhakanisa bukaba bwingi munonga, ekyarekireho omwanya mukye gw'okwerinda kurungi.

eng_prompt: Despite extensive planning and resources, law enforcement efforts can sometimes encounter unexpected challenges. Various factors, including miscommunication and unforeseen circumstances, can lead to unsuccessful outcomes in police operations.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde enteekateeka n'ebikozesebwa bingi, abakuumaddembe ebiseera ebimu basanga okusoomoozebwa okuteeberezebwa. Ensonga ez'enjawulo, omuli empuliziganya embi n'embeera etasuubirwa, ziyinza okuviirako obuwanguzi mu bikwekweto bya poliisi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub tye mapol ki jami ma mite, lutic me cik kare mukene nongo peko ma pe byek tye I komgi. Tye jami mapol ma twero weko tic pa abili pe woto maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida itemonokino keda iboro luipu, epedorete acakak ikisila adumun atiokisio numam eomitai. Akiro nuegelegela, aimoriarit amamus einer ejok keda iboro lumam eomitai, epedorete ayangaun akiro nuarokok kotoma aswamisio nuka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita eyi 'yezu angiri tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie ra ti, okpo 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ni sa'wa azi 'diyisi e'yo ewaru 'bani ega ku 'diyi esu. E'yo ndundu eyi, e'yo nzeza kililiru kuri tualu e'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi pie, eyi eco fe e'yo polisi eyini 'ye 'diyi ni ecazu muke ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho enteekateeka n'eby'okukoresa bingi, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro obumwe nibatunga oburemeezi obu batateekateekire. Enshonga nyingi, otwariiremu okuhurizana kubi hamwe n'embeera ezitarikuteekateekwaho, nibibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu mirimo ya pooriisi.

eng_prompt: In any law enforcement situation, clear leadership is essential for maintaining order and ensuring safety. Effective communication from those in charge is crucial for guiding officers and managing the public.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera yonna ekwasisa amateeka, obukulembeze obulambulukufu bwa mugaso mu kukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu. Empuliziganya ennungi okuva mu abo abavunaanyizibwa ya mugaso nnyo mu kulambika abakungu n'okuddukanya abantu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken ma ki keto cik itic, tela maber pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Lok maber ma aa ki bot ludito obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi doro tic pa abili ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene ediokere loka ikisila, epolokit engarenone lo ecai kanu aidar ainapakina keda ayuwara. Einer loajokan kama ejaasi ngul luapolok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aingarenikin eswamak keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma alea, driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo otuza ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo nzeza kililiru engazu 'ba e'yo drice'ba 'diyi vu ri eri orodriru azi'ba eyi ma dri cezu azini o'bi eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera yoona erikukuratiriza ebiragiro,obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'obutebekana. Okuhurizagana kurungi kuruga omu bakuru, n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuhabura abakuru n'okureeberera abantu.

eng_prompt: In today's complex environment, law enforcement faces numerous challenges that require heightened awareness and quick decision-making. To effectively protect the community, it is essential that officers develop the skills necessary to identify potential threats.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero enzibu, abakwasisa amateeka basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi okwetaagisa okumanyisa ennyo n'okukola okusalawo okw'amangu. Okusobola okukuuma obulungi ekitundu, kya mugaso nnyo abakungu okukulaakulanya obukugu obwetaagisa okuzuula ebitiisa ebiyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma kwo tek tutwal, lutic ki cik tye ka nongo peko mapol ma mite ni omyero gunge dok gumok tam oyot-oyot. Pi gwoko lwak maber, pire tek tutwal ni abili omyero gunong diro ma mite me niang jami ma kelo lworo i kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono ilolo, ejaas ipolisin keda atiokisio nuipu nu ekotosi aijen keda aitolomun aseununeta katipet. Kanu ayuarite itunga ejok, ibusakinit ipolisin adumun acoa na ajenun iboro luepedorete aitukurian itunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu mbeleru. Lezu ongulumu eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru, eri orodriru azi'ba eyi ma esu ondua eyini ani ecozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi esuzu.

eng_prompt: It's important to focus on the present and the choices we can make moving forward. Holding onto past mistakes only hinders our growth and happiness.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okussa essira ku biriwo kati n'okusalawo kwe tuyinza okukola okugenda mu maaso. Okwemalira ku nsobi ze twakola emabega kiremesa enkulaakulana yaffe n'essanyu.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom jami matye katimme kombedi ki tam ma omyero wamok me medde anyim. Bedo ka tamo I kom bal ma watimo I kare macon gengo dongo ki yomcwiny wa.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, law enforcement officials gathered enough evidence to charge several individuals. As the legal proceedings commenced, the atmosphere in the courtroom grew tense with anticipation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu, abakuumaddembe baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi obumala okuvunaana abantu abawerako. Omusango bwe gwatandika, embeera mu kkooti yeeyongera okusika omuguwa olw'okusuubira.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu ipolisin odumutu aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aitepesen itunga luipu. Neageuna emusago, abu ejautene loka adieket koraun loetiono noi.

eng_prompt: I can hardly concentrate on my work with all the commotion. It sounds like a parade is happening right outside my window.

eng_prompt: In many sports, teams are typically composed of a specific number of players to ensure fair competition. For example, in football, the standard roster includes a set number of active participants on the field.
lug_prompt: Mu mizannyo mingi, ttiimu zitera okubaamu omuwendo gw'abazannyi ogutegekeddwa okulaba nga waliwo okuvuganya okulungi. Okugeza, mu mupiira gw'ebigere, olukalala lw'abazannyi lulimu omuwendo gw'abazannyi mu kisaawe.

lug_prompt: Nga tetunnaba kunyonyola nkola za bizinensi zaffe, kikulu nnyo okutegeera embeera enkulu mwe tukolera. Okusobola okwenyweza obulungi, twetaaga okwekenneenya embeera eriwo n'okuzuula abantu be tugenderera.

eng_prompt: Many people struggle with the consequences of substance use, often leading to serious health and social issues. Understanding the impact of drug abuse is crucial for making informed choices about one's well-being.

ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo maber, onen atyer kamaleng ni motoka ne pe tye ka tic maber. Ladwoo mutoka owaco dwon mapat-pat matye ka aa ki I injin I kare ma en tye I ngwec ma okato.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka awanyanar ejok, aponi kojenunai ebe mam emotoka iswamai ejok. Abu ederepa kotema ebe eutasi iporotoi luitegelikina kotoma einjin kotoma orot loatubor.
lgg_prompt: Bani mutukari andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'da kililiru kini mutukari 'da azi nga kililiru ku. Dereva 'da olu o'duko onzi engazu inzini vu aci asizu ri ma alea.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by law, it is crucial to uphold justice through proper legal channels. Taking matters into one's own hands can lead to chaos and further harm.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abafugibwa amateeka, kikulu nnyo okukuuma obwenkanya okuyita mu makubo amatuufu ag'amateeka. Okukwata ensonga mu ngalo kyongera okuleetawo obuvuyo n'obulabe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma cik aye doro, pire tek tutwal me gwoko ngol matir I yoo me cik. Tero lok icing ngat moni keken twero kelo kuku kuku ki peko mukene mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naeyait ikisila, ejokuna noi aitodolikin etube loajokan kowai lo ikisila. Ayangar akiro akanin itunganan epedori ayangaun amumu keda atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azita palaa 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo liza kililiru ri ma tambazu geri kililiru azita palaa 'diyisi. E'yo eyi 'duzu eyi ma dria ma dria ri eco fe ngiringiri azini e'yo onzi drile ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikutegyekwa ebiragiro, n'eky'omugasho kurinda oburingaaniza kurabira omu mihanda mirungi y'ebiragiro. Okutwarira enshonga omu ngaro, nikibaasa kureetaho akavuyo n'oburemeezi obundi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent increase in thefts and vandalism, the management decided to take action. They recognized the need for enhanced safety measures to protect the premises and its occupants.
lug_prompt: Olw'obubbi n'okwonoona ebintu okweyongera gye buvuddeko awo, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baazuula obwetaavu bw'okunyweza eby'okwerinda okukuuma ekifo n'abakibeeramu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa kwo ki bal me balo jami, ludito tic gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Gu niang ni omyero kimed rwom me gwoko ber bedo I kabedo eni ki joo ma bedo I iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin naka akoko keda amumu, abu eyaitene kiswama nu ebeit. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka aiyatakin ayuwara kanu ayuarite aiboisit keda itunga.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the dimly lit parking lot grew eerily quiet. Suddenly, a shadowy figure emerged from the darkness, eyeing the unsuspecting security guard.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, ekifo we basimbye emmotoka ekyalimu ekitangaala ekitono kyafuuka kisirifu mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa. Amangu ago, ekisiikirize kyava mu nzikiza ne kitunuulira omukuumi eyali tategedde.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, kabedo me gwoko mutoka ma onongo pe tye ki mac ma ryeny tutwal-li oling mot tutwal. Cutcut, dano mo obino ki I col piny, kun tye ka neno lagwok kuc ma onongo pe ngeyo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, abu aiboisit naemamei aica kilililing noi. Apotu icetunga kolomutu kotoma amuton, kosodete asesen edaran loka ayuwara lomam ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, angu 'bani mutukari eyi 'bazu aci kokoru 'da ma alea ri eca ciri. Kpere, 'ba azi efu engazu angu ini ma aliarisi, agu ageitema ni ega kokoru 'diyi ndreria.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain a safe and orderly environment, it's essential that we adhere to established guidelines. By doing so, we can ensure that everyone is treated fairly and that our community functions smoothly.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obukuumi n'obutebenkevu, kikulu nnyo okugoberera ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo. Mu kukola ekyo, tusobola okukakasa nti buli omu ayisibwa mu bwenkanya era nti ekitundu kyaffe kitambula bulungi.

teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aiboisit na eyuara ka ainapakina, ibusakinit oni aitup aicoreta nu itolomunitai. Kowai lo aswam ngun, ipedori oni awanyun ebe eyaitai nginitunganan ejok ido iswamai aiboisit wok ejok.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere in the courthouse was tense as everyone awaited the judge's arrival. Lawyers and clients shuffled papers nervously, preparing for the proceedings ahead.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu kkooti yali ya bunkenke nga buli omu alindirira okutuuka kw'omulamuzi. Bannamateeka ne bakasitoma baabulankanya empapula nga beetegekera emisango egyali gigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I ot kot I kare ma dano weng tye kakuru bino pa langolkop. Lupirida kacel ki luwil gubedo ka leyo karatac ki lworo, kun giyube pi pido matye anyim.

lug_prompt: Omulamuzi asazeewo okwongezaayo okuwulira omusango olw'obuzito bw'omusango. N'ekyavaamu, kkooti ejja kuddamu okutuula enkya.

lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo lipiri asi 'du e'yo eriza ma o'du idrizu e'yo ewaru kesi 'da niri ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga e'yo eriza koti'a ri 'ye drusi.

eng_prompt: After hours of intense questioning, the detectives presented the evidence they had gathered. Despite the mounting proof against them, the suspects denied everything.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okubuuzibwa ebibuuzo okumala essaawa eziwera, bambega baayanjudde obujulizi bwe baali bakung'aanyizza. Wadde nga waliwo obujulizi bungi, abateeberezebwa beegaana buli kimu.
ach_prompt: Ingee penyo lapeny matek tutwal pi cawa malac, lutim kwed gumiyo caden ma gunongo. Kadi bed ni caden tye mapol i komgi, jo ma kimako gi gukwero jami weng.

eng_prompt: Access to essential resources is a fundamental right that benefits society as a whole. Ensuring that everyone can utilize these services fosters community well-being and equality.
lug_prompt: Okufuna ebintu ebikulu ddembe lya musingi erigasa ekitundu kyonna okutwaliza awamu. Okukakasa nti buli omu asobola okukozesa obuweereza buno kikulaakulanya obulungi n'obwenkanya mu kitundu.

teo_prompt: Adumunun iboro lu itwasamao erai apedor na itunga kere aimedaun. Aanyun ebe epedori nginitunganan aitwasam ejanakine lo itopolori aijar naka itunga keda eirianu.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the supervisor emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability within our organization. As part of our investigation, we were instructed to compile a comprehensive report.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, an investigative report revealed widespread corruption within the government. As a result, authorities decided to take action by releasing the names of those implicated.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, alipoota y'okunoonyereza yalaga obuli bw'enguzi mu gavumenti. N'ekyavaamu, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo nga bafulumya amannya g'abo abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma okelo lworo madit tutwal, adwoki me kwed onyuto ni camcana tye mapol tutwal I gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo kun gimiyo nying jo ma otimo bal eni.

eng_prompt: The city council has approved plans for urban development in the downtown area. As part of this initiative, a new market is being constructed.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga kakkirizza enteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya ekibuga mu kitundu ky'ekibuga wakati. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, akatale akapya kazimbibwa.

lgg_prompt: Kanisulu aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ai otita angu tawuni eyini zozu angu tawuni eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba cu o'dini si ria.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rw'orurembo rwikiriize enteekateeka y'okutunguura orurembo ahagati y'orurembo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,akatare akasya kariyo nikombekwa.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and securing permits, the project finally received the green light. Excitement filled the air as workers arrived on site, ready to break ground.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okufuna olukusa, pulojekiti yasembayo okufuna ekitangaala. Obwenyumiriza bwajjula empewo ng'abakozi batuuse mu kifo, nga beetegefu okutandika.

lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini kokobi eyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, otita 'da esu asizu aci kililiru ni. Ayiko fu angu 'da ma alea 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ni ecazu angu 'da ma alea ngonde e'dozu.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication from the entire team, the final touches were made. With the last beam in place and the paint drying, everyone gathered to celebrate the achievement.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukola ennyo n'obumalirivu okuva mu ttiimu yonna, ebyasembayo byakolebwa. Nga bbaamu esembayo eteekeddwawo era langi ng'ekalira, buli omu yakungaanidde okujaguza ebituukiddwaako.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I kom tim ne weng, lok me agiki otum. I kare ma ot yat otum ki rangi otwo, dano ducu gugure me kwero gin ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina kanejai etimu kere, aponi kitolomunai akiro nuka awasia. Keda aibwo nawasia kotoma aiboisitikec keda aikwenyar eriagi, apotu itunga kere kotukokinos ainumunum aitodolikinet.

eng_prompt: The community has been facing a growing demand for healthcare services. To address this need, local officials have announced plans for a new facility.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kifuna obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, abakungu b'ebyalo balangiridde enteekateeka z'ekifo ekipya.

lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi ebi e'yo lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri esu tualu. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi otita eyi arojo o'diru ni sizu 'bo.

eng_prompt: The bustling marketplace was filled with vibrant colors and enticing aromas. Vendors called out to passersby, showcasing their fresh produce and delicious treats.
lug_prompt: Akatale akajjudde abantu kaali kajjudde langi ezimasamasa n'obuwoowo obusikiriza. Abatembeeyi baayita abayitawo, nga balaga ebibala byabwe ebipya n'eby'okulya ebiwooma.

teo_prompt: Apotu iriagin luka esokoni kilelebunos keda iriagin luitegelikina keda icucuruc luitegelikina. Apotu agwelanarak konyarautu itunga lu atuboros, aitodiar iboro kec luitetiak ka iboro luibusakinit kesi ainyam.
lgg_prompt: Angu cu ni 'ba eyini aa'zu tu 'da ma alea ri ga tre wura ndundu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie. Ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi omve 'ba aci'ba 'diyi yi ma eselea afa yini ofule o'diru 'diyi e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Akatare akarimu abantu baingi, kakaba kaijwire erangi nungi n'obwoki burikushemeza. Abashuubuzi bakeeta abarikurabaho, barikworeka eby'okurya byabo ebisya hamwe n'ebindi birungi.

eng_prompt: The storm rolled in unexpectedly, bringing strong winds and heavy rain. As the weather worsened, we braced ourselves for potential outages.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga gwajja nga tegusuubirwa, ne guleeta empewo ey'amaanyi n'enkuba ey'amaanyi. Embeera y'obudde bwe yeeyongera okwonooneka, twetegekera okugwa kw'amasannyalaze okuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Yamo ne obino atura, okelo yamo ki kot ma ocwe matek adada. Ikare ma piny odoko rac, wayubbe pi peko ma twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Abu ekwam kolom katipet, abu koyangau ekwam loepol noi keda edou loepol noi. Neapolor ekuse loka ikwamin, apotu sio akapakina kanuka amamus na iboro.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da emu 'bani ega kokoru, eji oli okporu azini ozo okporu 'diyi pie. Angu mile ni ecazu onzirurisi, ama otu ama ma ngulupi e'yo ewaru ecopi e'depi ra 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga gukareetwa kitaraariirwe, gukareeta omuyaga gw'amaani hamwe n'enjura nyingi. Embeera y'obwire kuyabiire neyeyongyera, tuketeekateekyera oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to reduce their carbon footprint and embrace renewable energy, the community decided to invest in sustainable solutions. After extensive research and planning, they installed solar systems.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukendeeza ku kaboni n'okwaniriza amasannyalaze agaggya obuggya, abantu baasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu bintu ebiwangaala. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okuteekateeka, baateekawo amasannyalaze g'enjuba.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me dwoko piny rwom me mac ma aa ki icing dano ki me cako tic ki mac ma aa ki icing dano, lwak gumoko tamgi me keto cente I yub mapat-pat matye I kare-ni. Ingee kwed ki yube matek, guketo mac ma aa ki iceng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitidisiar ekwam loiswamatai kosodete aitwasam akim na itwasamao, apotu itunga koseutu aipikakin ikapunukec toma aitemonokin iboro lu iswamaete ejok. Akaulo naka aingic ka aitemonokin, apotu kesi ibwaikisi esola.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu yi ma esele omvele carbon footprint ruri ma omgbo esizu azini yi ma okpo 'duzu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma dria, ongulumu 'da 'du e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ayuzu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ewu drialeri ma alea. E'yo vuti ondaza angiri azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, eyi osu afa solar ru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukyendeeza aha nkoresa y'amashanyarazi, abantu bakasharamu kutamu sente omu bintu ebirikugumizamu. Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga n'okuteekateekyera, bakataho enkora ya soora.

eng_prompt: The community has been eagerly anticipating the new marketplace for months. Despite some delays, workers are making progress on the site.
lug_prompt: Abantu babadde beesunga akatale akapya okumala emyezi. Wadde nga waliwo okulwawo, abakozi bagenda mu maaso ku mulimu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo kakuru cuk manyen ne pi dwe mapol. Kadi bed ni kare tye ka galle, lutic tye ka dongo ticgi.
teo_prompt: Auta itunga aidar esokoni lo loitetet adaun ilapio. Karaida iyapit aswam, eutasi eswamak aswam ejok kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi angu cuu ni o'diru 'da niri te avasi mba eyi ma alea. E'yo sawa ezaza ni 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba eyi mu drile angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibategyereza akatare akasya kumara ameezi maingi. N'obu haraabe hariho okukyerererwa, abakozi bariyo nibatunguuka aha mwanya.

eng_prompt: Due to the increasing number of patients and the growing demand for medical services, the current staff is overwhelmed. As a result, the hospital needs more doctors.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, abakozi abaliwo kati bazitowa. N'ekivuddemu, eddwaliro lyeetaaga abasawo abalala.
ach_prompt: Pi wel lutwoo matye kamede ki miti me nongo kony me yot kom, lutic tye mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat mito daktari mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanuka enaaba loepol noi loka adekak keda eipuda loepol noi loka amukian, epol eswamak noi. Kanuka ngun, ekoto adekis imurok luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyi ni tuzu tualu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri be, azi'ba curu'do 'diyi ma ongmbo ga tre. E'yo 'disi, arojo 'da le dakitari eyi dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, abakozi abariho obwahati baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro niryetenga abashaho abandi.

eng_prompt: In the complex landscape of healthcare, the role of professionals extends beyond mere treatment. It is essential for those in the medical field to prioritize the well-being of their patients.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera enzibu ey'ebyobulamu, omulimu gw'abakugu gusukka ku kujjanjaba kwokka. Kikulu nnyo abasawo okukulembeza obulungi bw'abalwadde baabwe.
ach_prompt: I tenge me yot kom matye ki peko mapol tutwal, tic pa ludiro pe obedo me miyo kony me yot kom keken. Pire tek tutwal ki lutic yoto kom me keto ber bedo pa lutwoo gi obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuetioko nuka amukian, aswam naka ipirioitin adepar amukian bon. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ngul lu adekis aisingarenit aijar naka adekak kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alia, azi 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri aga lu aro feza ra. Eri orodriru 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyini asi 'bazu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu okori ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera y'eby'amagara egumire, omurimo gw'abakugu nigukira aha kuragurira kwonka. N'eky'omugasho ab'eby'amagara kwebembeza amagara g'abarwaire baabo.
