eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising for weeks as employees voiced their concerns about inadequate pay. After numerous failed negotiations with management, the workers decided to take a stand.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera okumala wiiki ng'abakozi balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe olw'omusaala omutono. Oluvannyuma lw'enteeseganya eziwerako okulemererwa n'abaddukanya emirimu, abakozi baasalawo okwesimbawo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde pi cabit mapol I kare ma lutic gunyutu lworo gi I kom cul ma pe oromo. Ingee winye mapol ma pe olare ki ludito tic, lutic gumoko tamgi me cung.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu naarai apotu eswamak itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ikapun luikidioko. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu lu abu komen keda eyaitene, apotu eswamak koseutu aibwo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ebi tu sabiti eyi ma alea azi'ba eyini asi otiza e'dazu e'yo musara ni cazu ku ri ma dria. E'yo erita ako driceza be 'diyi ma vutia, azi'ba 'da eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande, abakozi ku barikworeka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'emishaara etarikumara. Bwanyima y'okuteesa n'abebembezi, abakozi bakasharamu kwemerera.

eng_prompt: After a thorough performance review, the management recognized his hard work and dedication. As a result, they decided to reward him for his contributions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi enkola ye, abaddukanya emirimu baasiima omulimu gwe yakola n'obumalirivu bwe. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okumuwa empeera olw'obuyambi bwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma en otimo kwede tic, ludito me gang kwan opwoyo tic matek ma en otimo. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko tamgi me miye mic pi jami ma en omiyo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor aswamuke, apotu eyaitene isiyalamikisi aswamuke keda ainakina ke. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi koseutu ainakin ngesi eropit kanu agangat ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'yeta ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da fe erini awa'difo azi okporu erini nga ri si. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai eri feta fezu afa erini fe 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye emikorere ye, abarikukurira ekitongore bakamusiima ahabw'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo kwe. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu kumusiima ahabw'obuhwezi bwe.

eng_prompt: Achieving academic success requires dedication and effort. It's important for students to understand the value of perseverance in their studies.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma kyetaagisa okwewaayo n'okufuba. Kya mugaso abayizi okutegeera omugaso gw'okugumiikiriza mu kusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Nongo loc i gang kwan mito keto cwiny ki tute matek. Pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me niang ber pa diyo cwiny ikare me kwangi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akerianut kotoma asioman ekot ainakina keda agogongu. Erai ibore yenepol noi esisiak amisiikin ajokis naka atitingikinit kotoma asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza onita ma alia ri le ava feza azini okpo 'bazu drinia. Eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu asi driasi ri ma orodri onita eyivile ri ma alea ri vazu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obusinguzi omu by'obwegyese nikyetenga okwehayo n'amaani. N'eky'omugasho abeegi kwetegyereza omugasho gw'okugumisiriza omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: As the audience settled into their seats, anticipation filled the air. Everyone was eager to hear the insights of the esteemed guest of honour.
lug_prompt: Nga abalabi batuula mu bifo byabwe, okusuubira kwajjula empewo. Buli omu yali yeesunga okuwulira amagezi g'omugenyi omukulu ow'ekitiibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano gubedo I kabedogi, cwinygi obedo yom adada. Dano weng obedo ki miti me winyo tam pa welo madit.
teo_prompt: Neabwounaata itunga toma aiboisio kec, apotu itunga luipu kopuputu aiyalama noi. Akoto nginitunganan apupun aomisio nuka epejonon lo angosibib.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba 'diyi ni riria yi vile kiti ma alia, asi 'baza ga angu ma alia tre. Ba dria ndra ava be egata omu inzile inzi inzi inzi 'da ni 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku baashutamiire omu ntebe zaabo, haabaho okushemererwa kw'amaani. Buri omwe akaba aine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebiteekateeko by'omugyenyi mukuru.

eng_prompt: A thriving community relies on the active participation of its members. Each individual brings unique skills and perspectives that enrich the collective experience.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu ekikulaakulana kisinziira ku kwetaba kwa bammemba baakyo. Buli muntu aleeta obukugu obw'enjawulo n'endowooza ezigaggawaza obumanyirivu bw'ekibiina.
ach_prompt: Kabedo ma dongo dongo jenge I kom miti pa lumemba ne. Ngat acel-acel kelo diro ki tam ma pat pat ma weko wan weng wabedo ki ngec mapol.
teo_prompt: Aiboisit na itojokaritai ejok ejai toma aswam na itunga ke. Nginitunganan eyangaununei acoa na itegelikina ka aomisio nu eyangaunete aijar na itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu drile suzaru ri ni asi'ba 'ba eri ma alea 'diyi ma 'yeta okporu ri ma dria. Ba alu alu ni ondua azini egata ndundu eyi eji eyini ani e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga ekirikukurakurana, nikyesigama aha bantu baakyo kwejumbiramu. Buri omwe naareeta emyoga y'omutaano n'ebiteekateeko by'omutaano ebirikugaita abantu boona.

eng_prompt: As society evolves and technology advances, it becomes increasingly clear that our current methods of teaching and learning are outdated. To better prepare students for the future, we must reevaluate and enhance our educational approaches.
lug_prompt: Nga abantu bakulaakulana ne tekinologiya akulaakulana, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola zaffe ez'okusomesa n'okuyiga eziriwo kati ziweddewo. Okusobola okuteekerateekera obulungi abayizi ebiseera by'omu maaso, tulina okuddamu okwekenneenya n'okutumbula enkola zaffe ez'okusomesa.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak tye ka dongo ki diro me tet manyen tye ka dongo, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo me pwonyo ki pwonyo ma watye kwede kombedi dong otii tutwal. Me yubu lutino kwan pi anyim, omyero wanen ki medo rwom me kwan wa.
teo_prompt: Kwape itopoloor itunga keda etatai loakwana, ejenuna noi ebe mam bobo iwaitin lu isisianakinete keda lu isisiaete oni kwana eraas lu emojongitos. Kanu aitemonokin esisiak ejok kanukoingaren, ekot oni airereonor ka aitojokar iwaitin wok luka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini zoria azini e'yo tekenologiani tuzu drile, eri eca e'da kini geri amani curu'do imbazu azini onita onizu 'diyi aga 'bo. Lezu sukulu anzi eyi otuzu ewu drialeri ni, le ama ma one azini ama ma otu geri amavile onita ni 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugyenda nibatunguuka hamwe na tekinorogye, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu emiringo y'okwegyesa n'okwega eriho obwahati ehweireho. Okutebeekanisa kurungi abeegi ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya, twine kushwijuma n'okutunguura enkora yaitu y'okwegyesa.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, educators and parents gathered to share their insights on the current state of education. The conversation quickly shifted to the various obstacles that school children encounter in their daily lives.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, abasomesa n'abazadde baakuŋŋaanye okugabana ebirowoozo byabwe ku mbeera y'ebyenjigiriza eriwo. Emboozi yakyuka mangu n'etuuka ku bizibu eby'enjawulo abaana b'essomero bye basanga mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, lupwonye ki lunyodo gugure me nywako tam gi I kom kit ma kwan tye kwede kombedi. Lok ne olokke oyot totwal I kom peko mapat-pat ma lutino kwan nongo I kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, apotu isisianakinak keda auriak kiriamunos kanu aimor aomisiokec nuikamunitos ejautene loka asioman. Abu einer kijulakin katipet toma atiokisio nuegelegela nuetereikina keda idwe lu esomero kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, imba'ba eyi tualu tipika eyi pie eyi tra eyi ma egata eyi awazu e'yo onita ni sa'wa 'disi ri ma dria. E'yo nzeza 'da oja i mbeleru e'yo ewaru sukulu anzi eyini esu eyi ma edri eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, abegyesa n'abazaire baketeerana okubagana ebiteekateeko byabo aha ntwaza y'eby'obwegyese eriho obwahati. Okuganiira kukahinduka ahonaaho kuhika aha buremeezi obu abaana b'amashomero barikubugana omu magara gaabo aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: In order to overcome the challenges we are facing, collaboration is essential. Our individual efforts alone won't be enough to achieve our goals.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuvvuunuka ebisoomooza bye twolekaganye nabyo, okukolera awamu kya mugaso. Kaweefube waffe ku lwaffe yekka tajja kumala kutuukiriza biruubirirwa byaffe.
ach_prompt: Pi loyo peko ma watye ka kato ki iye, ribe obedo gin ma pire tek. Tute wa acel acel keken pe romo cobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aipikor atiokisio nu itereikina oni, epolok noi aimorikikina. Aswam wok bon mam epedori aitodolikin alosikinetekosi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amani esu 'diyi ndezu, ti ecita eri orodriru. Okpo amani 'ba alu alu ri ma dria ri ngani ca e'yo amani lele 'diyi 'yezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kusingura oburemeezi obu turikushanga, okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho. Amaani gaitu twenka tigarikumara kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu.

eng_prompt: In these challenging times, it is essential for our community to come together and support one another. The minister emphasized the importance of solidarity and understanding among all members of society.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera bino eby'okusoomoozebwa, kya mugaso nnyo eri ekitundu kyaffe okujja awamu n'okuwagiragana. Minisita yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwegatta n'okutegeeragana mu bantu bonna mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko eni, pire tek tutwal pi lwak wa me ribbe kacel me konyo luwot gi. Minista oketo cwiny I kom ber pa ribe ki niang ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuetioko, ejokuna noi itunga luka atutubetekosi aimorikikin ka aigangit luce. Abu eminista kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikina keda apuponoro kanejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru ongulumu amavile 'diyini emuzu tualu azini atizu eyi ma eselea. Minisita 'da fe okpo orodri ti ecita ni azini vata ni 'ba dria ongulumu ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi, n'eky'omugasho abantu baitu kukorera hamwe n'okuhagana. Minisita akahamya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: Efforts are underway to educate communities about the importance of health and wellness. Various organizations are implementing programs to promote better understanding of public health issues.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube agenda mu maaso okusomesa abantu ku bukulu bw'ebyobulamu n'obulamu obulungi. Ebitongole eby'enjawulo biteeka mu nkola pulogulaamu okutumbula okutegeera okulungi ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Yub tye me pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa yot kom. Dule mapat-pat tye katic ki yub me niang maber I kom lok makwako yot-kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Ejaas aswam na aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka angaleu keda aijar najokan. Ejaas iriongeta luipu aitegear ainapeta kanu aitopolor amisiikin nuikamunitos angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba o'bi yi dri imbata fezu orodri rua ala ni azini aa'zu muke ri ma dria. Amuti ndundu eyi otita eyi 'ye eyini ani e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma vata ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Hariho amaani agarikugyenda omu maisho omukwegyesa abantu omugasho gw'eby'amagara n'amagara marungi. Ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe biriyo nibiteeka omu nkora enteekateeka y'okureetaho okwetegyereza aha nshonga z'eby'amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Society has a responsibility to protect individuals from harm and ensure justice for victims. As such, laws have been established to address and penalize acts of violence rooted in gender discrimination.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kirina obuvunaanyizibwa okukuuma abantu okuva ku bulabe n'okukakasa obwenkanya eri abo abaakosebwa. N'olw'ekyo, amateeka gateereddwawo okulwanyisa n'okukangavvula ebikolwa eby'obutabanguko ebiva ku kusosola mu kikula ky'abantu.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ki tic me gwoko dano ki i kom awano ki neno ni ki ngolo kop atir pi jo ma onongo peko. Macalo adwogi ne, kiketo cik me miyo pwod pi tim gero ma aa ki I kom apoka-poka ikin mon ki coo.
teo_prompt: Ejaas itunga keda aswam na ayuarite itunga kama ejaasi aimusungeta ka awanyun ebe ejai etube loajokan kanuka ngul luiticanitai. Kwape kwape kangun, etolomun ikisila kanu aitemokin ka alecor amumu naelomunit kotoma atiakatiaka naka ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: Azi ongulumu eyini ri eri 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu e'yo onzi eyi ma dria dika eyi ma esu e'yo liza kililiru ri ra. Ekile 'dile, 'ba o'ba azita e'yo 'yezu azini panga fezu e'yo ngiringiri ni oku eyi ma eselea agupi eyi pie 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baine obujunanizibwa bw'okurinda abantu obutahikwaho kabi n'okureeba ngu habaho oburingaaniza. N'ahabw'ekyo, ebiragiro bitandikirweho kukora aha bikorwa by'obutabanguko ebirikuruga omu kushoroora abantu kurugirira ahakikura kyabo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, many young people face challenges that can be overwhelming. As a result, it is essential to provide them with the support and guidance they require.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, abavubuka bangi boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okuyinza okuba okw'amaanyi ennyo. N'ekivuddemu, kya mugaso okubawa obuyambi n'obulagirizi bwe beetaaga.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami time oyot-oyot tutwal, bulu mapol nongo peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, pire tek tutwal me minigi kony ki tira ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejai atipet, ejaas atumunak luipu keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi aijaikin kes agangat ka aicoreta nu ekotos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, 'ba ode karakara yi dri fu e'yo ewaru 'diyi be. E'yo 'disi, eri orodriru atita azini imbata yini leleri fezu yi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amaani maingi, eminyeeto neetunga oburemeezi oburikubaasa kuba oburengyesereize. N'ekyarugiremu, n'eky'omugasho kubaheereza obuhwezi n'obuhabuzi obubarikwetenga.

eng_prompt: Every child deserves a safe and nurturing environment to grow up in. It's crucial for parents to foster love and support in their homes.
lug_prompt: Buli mwana yeetaaga ekifo ekirungi era ekirungi okukuliramu. Kya mugaso nnyo abazadde okukuza okwagala n'obuwagizi mu maka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutino weng omyero gunong kabedo maber me dongo iye. Pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo me nyutu mar ki kony i gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Ekot ngol ikoku aiboisit na eyuara ka najokan kanu apoloun. Erai ibore yenepol noi auriak aitopolorite amin keda agangat koreriakec.
lgg_prompt: Le mva dria ma zo angu kililiru azini kililiru ni ma alea. Eri orodriru tipika eyini leta azini atita ejizu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Buri mwana nayetenga obusingye n'oburungi bw'okukurira omuri. N'eky'omugasho munonga abazaire okureeta rukundo n'obuhwezi omu maka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Exploring the diversity of human experience reveals a rich tapestry of traditions and beliefs. Each region of the globe contributes unique customs and practices that shape its identity.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza ku bintu eby'enjawulo abantu bye bayitamu kulaga obugagga bw'ennono n'enzikiriza. Buli kitundu ky'ensi kirina obuwangwa n'enkola yaakyo ey'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kwed I kom jami mapat-pat ma dano okato ki iye nyutu tekwaro ki niyee ma dwong tutwal. Kabedo acel-acel me wilobo tye ki tekwaro gi mapat-pat ma giyubu lanyut gi.
teo_prompt: Aingic akiro nuegelegela nuka itunga itoduni iponesio luegelegela luka inonosio keda aiyuunikec. Kangin aiboisit naka akwap ejaasi keda inonosio keda iponesio luitegelikina luitolomete ajenunetekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndundu 'bani esu 'ba ada eyi ma dria 'diyi ma eti ondazu ri ni e'da e'yo ndundu eyi ma a'ita eyi pie. Angu dria wudrikuru ma alia 'diyi ma a'bi azini e'yo yi 'yepi yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe ebi abantu barikurabamu nikyoreka engyenderwaho n'enyikiriza nyingi. Buri kicweka ky'ensi kiine emigyenzo n'emitwarize yaakyo etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In today's society, it is crucial to educate children about various social issues. One important topic that often arises is the understanding of different sexual orientations and their implications.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, kya mugaso nnyo okusomesa abaana ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu ez'enjawulo. Omulamwa ogumu omukulu ogutera okujja kwe kutegeera eby'okwegatta eby'enjawulo n'ebikosa.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo lutino i kom lok mapat-pat makwako kwo pa lwak. Lok acel ma pire tek ma pol kare ki kelo obedo niang I kom lok me butu imit mapat-pat ki adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar naka lolo, ejokuna noi aisisianakin idwe nuka akiro nuegelegela nuka itunga. Akirot adiope naepol noi naepol noi nes amisiikin nuikamunitos aelo keda atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, eri orodriru anzi nyiri eyini imbata fezu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'bani efu sawa driasi ri eri vata e'yo ali o'baza ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, n'eky'omugasho kwegyesa abaana ebikwatiraine n'embeera z'abantu. Omutwe gumwe ogw'omugasho ogurikukira kubaho, n'okwetegyereza ebirikukwata aha kuteerana hamwe n'ebirikurugwamu.

eng_prompt: The project deadline was approaching, and the team needed to provide an update. Management emphasized the importance of having all findings documented.
lug_prompt: Nsalesale wa pulojekiti yali esembera, era ttiimu yali yeetaaga okuwa ebipya. Abakulembeze bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okubeera n'ebizuuliddwa byonna ebiwandiikiddwa.
ach_prompt: Nino me agiki me tic ne onongo dong cok, dok tim ne onongo omyero omi ngec manyen. Lutela guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me coyo jami weng ma kinongo.
teo_prompt: Ajai apak naedolit na epurojekt, ido ekot etimu aijaikin akiro nuitetiak. Abu eyaitene kitogogong ajokis naka aiwadika akiro kere nuedumunitai.
lgg_prompt: O'du asizu otita 'da ni ri ni eca ogogo, dika le amuti 'da ma fe o'dukoti o'diru ni. Driceza 'da fe okpo orodri 'bani e'yo dria 'bani esu 'diyi osizu kokobi eyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ebiro by'ahamuheru bya purogyekiti bikaba biri haihi, kandi tiimu ekaba neeyetenga okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha purogyekiti. Abarikukurira ekitongore bakahamya omugasho gw'okugira ebijumbwirwe omu bihandiiko.

eng_prompt: Local authorities have expressed concerns over rising criminal activities in the area. In response to recent incidents, community leaders are calling for increased police presence and intervention.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo balaze obweraliikirivu olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera mu kitundu. Mu kwanukula ebyabaddewo gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ekitundu basaba okwongera ku kubeerawo kwa poliisi n'okuyingira mu nsonga.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gunyutu lworo gi pi tim aranyi matye kamede i kabedo eni. Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutela me kabedo gi tye ka lego abili me medde ki tic gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aiyatakin naka aswamisio nuka abilibilio naka ikisila katutubet. Kanu aitemokin akiro nuiswamasi pac, ekotosi engarenok luka atutubet aiyatakin ajaut naka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo 'yeta onzi eyini tupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyisi. E'yo yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi a'i polisi eyi ma kalafe ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu kyanga. Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati, abebembezi b'ebyanga nibashaba ngu poriisi eyongyere kubaho.

eng_prompt: Teaching children the importance of respect is crucial for their development. One key aspect of this education is instilling the value of honoring those who are older and wiser.
lug_prompt: Okuyigiriza abaana obukulu bw'okussa ekitiibwa kikulu nnyo mu nkulaakulana yaabwe. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kusoma kuno kwe kuyigiriza omugaso gw'okussa ekitiibwa mu abo abakulu era abagezi.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo lutino ber pa woro obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo gi. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I kwan man obedo pwonyo ber pa woro joo ma dongo dok ryek.
teo_prompt: Aisisianakin idwe ajokis naka ayongit erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol kec. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka asioman kana ngesi aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka ayongite ngul luapolok ido luejenete.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri eyini inzita ma orodri imbazu ri eri orodriru eyini zozu. E'yo azi okporu onita 'di ma alea ri eri orodri inzita fezu 'ba 'wara azini onduaru 'diyi dri ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa abaana omugasho gw'ekitiinisa n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka yaabo. Ekintu kimwe kikuru omu kwegyesa oku n'okwegyesa omugasho gw'okuheereza ekitinisa abo abakuru kandi abanyabwengye.

eng_prompt: Bringing a new life into the world is a profound commitment that requires careful consideration. Many people dream of becoming parents, but few fully grasp the challenges that come with raising a child.
lug_prompt: Okuleeta obulamu obupya mu nsi kwe kwewaayo okw'amaanyi okwetaaga okulowoozebwako ennyo. Abantu bangi baloota okufuuka abazadde naye batono abategeera bulungi okusoomoozebwa okujja n'okukuza omwana.
ach_prompt: Kelo kwo manyen I lobo obedo tic matek ma mito tam matut. Dano mapol tye ki lek me doko lunyodo, ento jo manok keken aye giniang peko ma bino ka itye ka gwoko latin.
teo_prompt: Ayangar aijar naitetet toma akwap erai ainakina naepol na ekot aomoom ejok. Itunga luipu ejaas keda airujasia nuka araun auriak, konye ikidioko lu ejenete atiokisio nu eyaunete keda aitopoloun ikoku.
lgg_prompt: Idri o'di ejizu wudrikuru ma alia ri eri e'yo azi okporu lepi 'ba ma ega e'yo drinia kililiru. Ba karakara eyi orobi eyi ma dria ecazu tipika eyi ru, te 'ba were eyi ni e'yo ewaru emupi anzi eyi ma ezota be 'diyi ma dria sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeta amagara masya omu nsi n'ekikorwa ky'amaani ekirikwetenga okuteekateekwaho n'obwegyendesereza. Abantu baingi nibaroota okuhinduka abazaire, kwonka bakye nibo barikumanya oburemeezi oburikwija n'okworora omwana.

eng_prompt: The exploitation and vulnerability of individuals involved in the sex trade raise significant ethical concerns. Additionally, the societal impacts of legalizing such practices often lead to increased crime and human trafficking.
lug_prompt: Okukozesa n'obunafu bw'abantu abeenyigira mu busuubuzi bw'ebisiyaga kireetawo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu mpisa. Okugatta ku ekyo, ebiva mu kukkiriza ebikolwa ng'ebyo mu mateeka bitera okuviirako obumenyi bw'amateeka n'okukukusa abantu okweyongera.
ach_prompt: Tim me nywaro tic ki lutim biacara me butu imit kelo lworo madit tutwal. Medo i kom meno, adwogi ma bedo tye ikin lwak macalo adwogi me keto tim ma kit meno I te cik ipol kare kelo medde pa timo bal ki cato dano.
teo_prompt: Amumu na itunga lu egwelanarete aelo eyangauni aiyalongong naepol noi. Iyatakina bobo, atiokisio nuka itunga kanu aitigogong aswamisio ngun eyangauni aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila keda aikamanario naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba ali o'bazu 'diyi ayuzu azini e'yo ewaru 'ba ali o'bazu 'diyi ma dria ri ni e'yo onzi 'diyi eji. Azi dika, e'yo ongulumu eyini 'bani e'yo 'dile 'diyi 'bazu azita palaa ri ni fe e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu ri pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutuntuzibwa n'okutuntuzibwa kw'abantu abarikwejumba omu by'obushambani, nikireetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, ebikwatiraine n'okwikiriza ebikorwa ebyo omu biragiro, nikireetaho okweyongyera kw'ebihagaro n'okubuzaho abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, tensions have been rising among relatives over inheritance issues and differing opinions on family matters. As a result, there are many family disputes.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu b'enganda ku nsonga z'obusika n'endowooza ez'enjawulo ku nsonga z'amaka. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo enkaayana nnyingi mu maka.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, telle obedo ka mede ikin wadi pi lok me leyo jami ki tam mapat-pat I kom jami me gang. Macalo adwogi ne, tele me kin jo me odi tye mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta kiding ipajan kanuka akiro nuka aburokin keda aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos akiro nuka ekale. Kanuka ngun, ipu ingungeta luka ikalia.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, erita ako eyi e'bi tu 'ba ori'ba ru 'diyi ma eselea e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria tualu egata ndundu familia eyi ma dria 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, ngiringiri familia eyi ma eselea 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu banyabuzaare ahabw'eshonga z'obusika hamwe n'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana aha nshonga z'amaka. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho entongane nyingi omu maka.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicated a rise in traffic incidents across the region. Local authorities were concerned about the increasing number of vehicles on the roads.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezaakaggwa ziraga okweyongera kw'obubenje bw'ebidduka mu kitundu kyonna. Ab'obuyinza ku byalo baali beeraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'emmotoka ogweyongera ku nguudo.
ach_prompt: Lok ma okati cokcok-ki nyutu ni peko me gudu tye ka medde tutwal I but lobo man. Lutela me tedero gubedo ki lworo I kom wel mutoka matye ka mede I gudu.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan itodutu ebe iyata akangasia nuka amotokan katutubet. Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kopodokisi kanu aiyatakin na amotokan orotin.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini drileonzi nzila dria 'diyi ma ongmbo tu angu 'di ma alea dria. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ovu asi otiza be e'yo mutukari eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu nzila eyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'oburaaro bw'ebiiruka omu kicweka. Ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakaba beerarikirire ahabw'omuhendo gw'ebiiruka ogweyongyeire aha nguuto.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent changes to the project, the team gathered to discuss their concerns. Voices were raised as they shared their frustrations about the lack of communication from management.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa mu pulojekiti gye buvuddeko, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye baali beetaaga. Amaloboozi gaayogeddwa nga bwe bagabana obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'obutaba na mpuliziganya okuva mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo aloka-loka ma otime I yub eni cokcok-ki, joo ne gugure me nywako tam gi. Dano mapol guwaco ni cwiny gi pe yom pi lok ma aa ki bot ludito tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor aijulanakineta nuka epurojekt, apotu etimu kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aiyalongongokec. Aponi kitolomunai iporotoi lu apotu kolimokisi aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na einer kama ejaasi eyaitene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojataa otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria. Ba o'duki o'duko eyini e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo nzeza ako driceza niri ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma empindahinduka ezabaireho omu purogyekiti, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaayo. Amahuriire g'abantu gakahababirwa ahabw'obutahurizagana kuruga omu bakuru.

eng_prompt: Road accidents continue to be a leading cause of injury and death worldwide. Increasing awareness and education on safe driving practices is essential for reducing these tragic incidents.
lug_prompt: Obubenje ku nguudo bukyagenda mu maaso n'okuviirako abantu okufuna obuvune n'okufa mu nsi yonna. Okwongera okumanyisa n'okusomesa ku ngeri z'okuvuga obulungi kya mugaso mu kukendeeza ku bubenje buno obw'entiisa.
ach_prompt: Peko me gudu pud tye macalo gin ma kelo awano ki too I wilobo lung. Medo rwom me rweyo lwak ki pwonyo dano i kom kit me dwoyo mutoka maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dwoko piny rwom me peko me gudu.
teo_prompt: Eringa akangasia nu orotin eraas nu eyangaununete amusungut keda atwanare kotoma akwap kere. Aiyatakin aijen keda aisisianakin nuka airenge ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitidisiar akangasia nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi nzila dria 'diyi nga kiri e'yo 'ba eyini nya'biliko eyi ejizu tualu 'ba eyini odrazu 'diyi pie wudrikuru ma alea. Imbata ma omgbo otuza azini imbata geri mutukari ti ojizu kililiru 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo drileonzi onzi 'dile 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Butandu z'ahanguuto nizikizayo kureetaho obuhuta n'okufa omunsi yoona. Okwongyera okumanyisa abantu n'okubeegyesa emihanda mirungi y'okuvuga, n'eky'omugasho omu kukyendeeza butandu.

eng_prompt: With advancements in safety regulations and technology, the number of incidents on the water has significantly decreased. Many people now enjoy recreational activities with a greater sense of security.
lug_prompt: N'enkulaakulana mu mateeka g'obukuumi ne tekinologiya, omuwendo gw'obubenje ku mazzi gukendedde nnyo. Abantu bangi kati banyumirwa eby'okwesanyusaamu n'obukuumi obw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ki dongo pa cik me gwoko kwo ki tet manyen, wel can me pii odok piny tutwal. Dano mapol kombedi gimaro galo wang gi labongo lworo mo.
teo_prompt: Keda apol naka ikisila luka ayuwara keda etatai loakwana, ekidiokoto noi akangasia nuka akipi. Itunga luipu kwana eminasi aswamisinei nu aiyalama keda ayuwara naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni azini afa ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si, e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. Ba karakara eyi curu'do ayiko esu e'yo ayiko esuzu 'diyi ma alea ageitema be angiri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka omu biragiro by'okwerinda hamwe na tekinorogye, omuhendo gw'obutabanguko aha maizi gukyendiire munonga. Abantu baingi obwahati nibashemererwa omu by'okweshemeza bateine kabi.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and negotiations, the transportation company finalized the deal. The team gathered to celebrate the arrival of their latest asset.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okuteesa, kampuni y'ebyentambula yamaliriza ddiiru. Ttiimu yakungaanidde okujaguza okutuuka kw'omukozi waabwe omupya.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki winye, dul me wot ne otyeko winye ne. Dul tuku ne gugure me kwero oo pa laticgi manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin ka ipegeta, abu ekampuni loka elose kongetak acamanar. Apotu etimu kimorikikinos ainumunum adolonokin naka iborokec luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta 'yezu azini e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti acipa ni 'da de otuta 'da asizu. Amuti 'da tra eyi ayiko zu eyini eyi ma orodri o'diru 'diyi esuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteesa, kampuni y'eby'engyenda ekahendera endagaano. Tiimu eketeerana kujaguza okuhika kw'omukozi waabo omusya.

eng_prompt: The coastal town relies heavily on its maritime transport system. As a result, the ferry service has become a vital link for both residents and tourists.
lug_prompt: Ekibuga ekiri ku lubalama lw'ennyanja kyesigama nnyo ku ntambula yaakyo ey'oku nnyanja. N'ekyavaamu, empeereza y'ekidyeri efuuse ey'omugaso eri abatuuze n'abalambuzi.
ach_prompt: Boma matye I dog nam ne jenge tutwalle I kom yoo me wot ma aa ki I nam. Macalo adwogi ne, tic ki ferry dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lutedero ki lulim piny.
teo_prompt: Erai etaun lo ejai oicore lo emunokina noi keda elose loka akipi. Kanuka ngun, araun aiboisit na eyapiesi naepol noi na arucokinit itunga keda elatok.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni angu yi tia ri ma alea ri ni asi 'ba e'yo acizu yi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, aci feri niri eca curu'do e'yo orodriru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini tualu 'ba mile otizani 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Orurembo oruri aha rubaju rw'enyanja nirwesigama munonga ahaby'engyenda by'aha nyanja. N'ekyarugiremu, entambura y'ekidyeri ehindukire enkoragana y'omugasho aha batuura gye n'abarambuzi.

eng_prompt: Due to the overwhelming number of passengers waiting at the dock, the local residents expressed their concerns to the ferry service. In light of the long lines and delays, they requested the ferry to make more trips.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abasaabaze ogusukkiridde okulinda ku mwalo, abatuuze baalaze okweraliikirira kwabwe eri ekitongole ky'ekidyeri. Olw'ennyiriri empanvu n'okulwawo, baasaba ekidyeri okukola entambula endala.
ach_prompt: Pi wel luwot mapol tutwal matye kakuru I wang-waat, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi bot lutic me ferry. Ma lubbe ki kama lain tye iye ki galle, gulego ferry ni omedde ki wot.
teo_prompt: Kanuka enaba loepol noi loka itunga lueutasi aidar kotoma odoket, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec mama ejaasi eswamak luka apotipot. Kanuka aiboisio nuewojak keda aiyap, apotu kesi ilipata apotipot alosit irotin luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba aci'ba te'baa angu yi tia 'diyi niri si, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini ri geri feri eyini acizu ri vu. E'yo olia ezuru azini sawa ezaza ma e'yosi, eyi ai feri 'da acizu pari ndundu eyi ma alea drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo muhango gw'abagyenzi abari kutegyereza aha mwaro, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahari ferry services. Ahabw'emiringo miringwa hamwe n'okukyerererwa, bakashaba ekidyeri kukora engyendo ezindi.

eng_prompt: As summer approaches and more people flock to pools and beaches, the importance of understanding water safety becomes increasingly evident. Drowning incidents and water-related accidents highlight the need for awareness and education in this area.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'omusana bwe kigenda kisembera era abantu bangi ne beeyiwa mu biyiriro ne ku bbiici, obukulu bw'okutegeera obukuumi bw'amazzi bweyongera okweyoleka. Okubbira mu mazzi n'obubenje obukwatagana n'amazzi biraga obwetaavu bw'okumanyisa n'okusomesa mu kitundu kino.
ach_prompt: I kare ma oro tye ka bino dok dano mapol tye kabino i pool ki dog nam, ber pa niang ber bedo pa pii tye ka nen tutwal. Poto pa dano I pii kacel ki can me gudu ma time I pii nyutu miti me miyo ngec ki pwony I kabedo man.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete akwap keda itunga luipu lueutasi alosit aiboisio nuidarere akipi, epol ajokis naka amisiikin nuka ayuwara naka akipi. Akangasia nu akipi keda akangasia nu akipi itodunitos eipud loka aisisianakin ka aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos akipi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa driasiri ni ecaria azini 'ba karakara eyi mu yi ti alia azini angu yi tia 'diyi ma alea, orodri 'bani e'yo yi ma tambaza ma dria 'diyi vazu ri ni eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'bani yi amvuzu azini drileonzi yi ma dria 'diyi e'da kini le 'ba ma fe imbata azini imbata angu 'di ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwiire bw'obutiti ku burikuhika kandi abantu baingi nibaza omu bidiba hamwe n'ahamayanja, omugasho gw'okwetegyereza eby'okwerinda aha maizi nigweyongyera kureebeka. Okugwa omu maizi hamwe n'obutabanguko oburikukwata aha maizi, nibyoreka ekyetengo ky'okumanyisa n'okwegyesa abantu omu kicweka eki.

eng_prompt: During the emergency meeting, the board members discussed the recent incidents affecting the community. In light of these events, the chairman addressed the room with an update.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olw'amangu, bammemba b'olukiiko baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko mu kitundu. Okusinziira ku bino ebyabaddewo, ssentebe yayogeddeko eri olukiiko n'ebintu ebipya.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke ma opoto atura, lumemba me dul enoni guloko i kom jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma tye ka yelo lwak. Ma lubbe ki jami magi ma otimme, won kom oloko ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamun na engeso, apotu imeeban luka atukot ngin kitetemoto akiro nuiswamasi pac kotoma atutubet. Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu, abu apolon eicolong kolimok itunga akiro nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi mbeleru 'da ma alea, memba board ni 'diyi agbatara gba e'yo ebipi o'bi eyi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma e'yo si, ogua e'i nze e'yo o'diru 'ba yi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ahonaaho, ba memba b'akakiiko bakahanuura aha bintu ebirikuteganisa abantu. Ahabw'ebyo byona ebyabaireho, mukuru w'entebe akagambira abantu ebirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As the passengers hurried to board, the crew struggled to manage the growing crowd. Despite the warning signs, people continued to pile onto the vessel, eager to set sail.
lug_prompt: Nga abasaabaze bafubutuka okulinnya, abakozi baafuba okugumira omujjuzo gw'abantu ogweyongera. Newankubadde waaliwo obubonero obulabula, abantu beeyongera okukungaana ku mmeeri nga baagala nnyo okusimbula.
ach_prompt: I kare ma luwot gubedo ka ngwec me donyo I dege, lutic ne onongo tek tutwal me lweny i kom dano mapol matye kabino. Kadi bed ni lanyut me ciko dano obedo tye, dano omede ki bedo I yeya ne, ki miti matek me cako wot.
teo_prompt: Neapotu itunga kisinyikokisi alomar toma, apotu eswamak kongetakisi aitikitik itunga luipu. Karaida ejaasi aanyuneta nuka aikwenyar, apotu itunga inyikokisi aibwo toma ataker, ekotosi alosit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba aci'ba ru 'diyi ni yi arizu tujara 'yeria, 'ba aci'ba ru 'diyi dri ci e'yo 'ba kalafe ni tupi tutu ri ma aza kozu. E'yo bile ndu liza ni 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba eyi mu drile yi trazu o'bo 'da ma dria eyini ava be muzu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abasaabaze ku baarahukize kuza omu meeri, abakozi bakarwana kurwanisa abantu abaabaire beeyongyeire. Oihireho obubonero oburikuhabura, abantu bakagumizamu nibateerana aha meeri, baine ekihika ky'okutambura.

eng_prompt: Given the increasing number of accidents on water transport, it is crucial to enhance safety measures. One effective way to ensure passenger safety is by increasing the availability of life jackets.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku muwendo gw'obubenje obweyongera ku ntambula y'oku mazzi, kikulu nnyo okutumbula enkola z'obukuumi. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okukakasa obukuumi bw'abasaabaze kwe kwongera ku bungi bw'obukooti obutaasa obulamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel can me gudu matye ka time iwi pii, pire tek tutwal me medo rwom me gwoko kuc. Yo acel maber tutwal me gwoko luwot en aye me medo wel jaket me laro kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor akangasia nuka alosit toma akipi, ejokuna noi aitogogong iwaitin lu ayuara. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga erai aiyatakin ejaket loka aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileonzi yi ma dria 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Geri azi kililiru 'bani ecozu nezu ra kini 'ba aci'ba 'diyi ma ta mbazuri eri geri ecozu jaketi idri paza ni 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu by'engyenda y'aha maizi, ni kikuru okwongyera amaani omu by'okwerinda. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureebeka ngu abagyenzi nibatereera, n'okwongyera aha bukwakurizo bw'obukooti oburikubaasa kurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent natural disaster that devastated the community, local organizations rallied together to provide support. Among them, the church took a significant step to help those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula akatyabaga k'obutonde akaaliwo gyebuvuddeko akaayonoona ekitundu, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byakungaana wamu okuwa obuyambi. Mu bo, ekkanisa yakola eky'amaanyi okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko ma poto atura obalo kabedo wa cokcok-ki, dul mapat-pat me tedero guribbe kacel me miyo kony. I kingi, kanica otimo jami mapol me konyo lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka isuban nuapotu omunasi itunga luka atutubet, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aigang. Kanejaas kesi, abu ekanisa kiswama nuepolok noi kanu aingarakin ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo nyaku ni 'diyi ni o'diru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi tualu atita fezu. Eyi ma eselea, kanisa 'du e'yo okporu 'ba afa koko 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa ebyagwire abantu omu kyanga kyabo, ebitongore by'omubyaro bikakorengana okuheereza obuhwezi. Omuri bo, ekanisa ekakora omurimo gw'amaani kuhwera abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: When engaging in water activities, safety should always be a top priority. Ensuring that young ones are properly equipped is essential for their protection.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba okola emirimu ku mazzi, obukuumi bulina okukulembezebwa. Okukakasa nti abavubuka baweebwa ebintu ebituufu kya mugaso mu kubakuuma.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka timo tic mapat-pat iwi pii, gwoko kuc omyero obed gin ma pire tek loyo weng. Neno ni lutino tye ki jami weng ma mite pire tek tutwal pi gwokogi.
teo_prompt: Neiswamaere aswamisinei nuka akipi, ekot duc aidar ayuwara kwape nuepolok noi. Aanyun ebe ijanakino atumunak iboro lu itwasamao ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayuwara kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ma dria 'diyi 'yeria, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo ageitema niri oko. Ba ma ne ra kini 'ba oderu 'diyi ma afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi ci ri eri orodriru ageitema eyini.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nookora emirimo y'aha maizi, eby'okwerinda bishemereire kwebembera. Okureeba ngu abaana baine eby'okukoresa ebihikire, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburinzi bwabo.

eng_prompt: After hearing the stories of shipwrecks and accidents at sea, the group exchanged worried glances. Despite the allure of the ocean, their fears loomed larger than their desire for adventure.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira emboozi ezikwata ku kusaanawo kw'emmeeri n'obubenje ku nnyanja, ekibinja kyatabula amaaso nga beeraliikirivu. Newankubadde enyanja yali nnungi, okutya kwabwe kwali kwa maanyi okusinga okwagala kwabwe okugenda mu bifo eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo ododo me poto pa yeya ki can me gudu I nam, gurup ne gubedo ki lworo I wanggi. Kadi bed ni nam ne obedo ber tutwal, lworo meggi obedo lamal loyo miti meggi me cito ka limo piny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup akiro nuikamunitos aibiror naka imaten keda akangasia nuka atutubet, apotu egurupu kinerata. Karaida ejokuna noi eicor, apolor akuriau kec adepar eipudakec loka alosit aipejokin akwapin ace.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erizu 'bori ma vutia o'duko e'yo meli ni asuzu azini drileonzi yi ma dria 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da eyi ma mile oja asi otiza si. E'yo yi miriruri ni tro ovuzu ndrizaru ra ti, ori yini 'diyi ndra angiri ndeni aga ava yini lezu e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhurira ebirikukwata aha kucwekyereera kw'emeeri hamwe n'obutabanguko aha nyanja, guruupu ekataana amaisho. Oihireho oburungi bw'enyanja, okutiina kwabo kukaba nikukira ekyetengo kyabo ky'okutambura.

eng_prompt: Following an extensive investigation into misconduct, the department took decisive action. As a result, several individuals were found to have violated ethical standards.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku mpisa embi, ekitongole kyakola eky'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, abantu bangi baasangibwa nga bamenya emitindo gy'empisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut I kom tim maraco, dul ne otimo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, kinongo ni dano mapol guturu cik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos iponesio luarokok, abu edipatiment kiswama nuepedori kere. Kanuka ngun, aponi kodumunai ebe apotu itunga luipu kibiroros.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza okporu 'yeta onzi ma dria ri ma vutia, arakala 'da 'du e'yo okporu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba isu 'ba karakara eyi e'yo azita ni 'diyi nyo ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza munonga aha micwe mibi,ekitongore kikakora eky'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi bakashangwa nibahenda ebiragiro by'emitwarize.

eng_prompt: After reviewing our financial records, it became clear that there were no transactions linked to his name. Despite our repeated requests for support, he failed to contribute anything.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko byaffe eby'ebyensimbi, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti tewaaliwo kusuubulagana kukwatagana na linnya lye. Wadde nga twasaba obuyambi enfunda n'enfunda, yalemererwa okubaako ky'awaayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim wa, onen atyer kamaleng ni pe tye tic mo ma kubbe ki nyinge. Kadi bed ni walego pi kony tyen mapol, en pe omiyo gin mo keken.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaetawok nuka ikapun, aponi kojenunai ebe emamei ibore yenerucokinit ekirorike. Karaida ilipit sio agangat irwan ipu, abu komen ngesi aijaikin idiobore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ama vile e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca kililiru kini e'yo azi 'bani 'ye eri ma ru si ni yo. Ama ni tro a'i atita esuzu ra ti, eri awini afa azini fe kuye.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko byaitu eby'esente, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hatariho eby'obushubuzi ebirikukwatagana n'eiziina rye. Oihireho okushaba kwaitu kw'obuhwezi, akaremwa kugira eki yaahayo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into their actions during the event, the committee reached a decision. The severity of their misconduct warranted a significant disciplinary measure.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku bikolwa byabwe ku mukolo, akakiiko kaatuuka ku kusalawo. Ebikolwa byabwe ebibi byali byetaagisa okukangavvulwa okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut I kom timgi I kare me yub enoni, dul ne gumoko tamgi. Timgi marac tutwal oweko omyero ki mi itgi pwod.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos aswamisiokec kotoma opucit, abu ekomiti kodolok aseunet. Apolou na iponesiokec luarokok abu koinak kesi alecor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia e'yo yini 'yele omu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria, komiti 'da esu e'yo azi ra. E'yo onzi eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo angiri ri le ndra 'ba ma fe eyini imbata ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga ebikorwa byabo aha mukoro, akakiiko kakahika aha kusharamu. Emitwarize yaabo mibi ekaba neeyetenga okubonerezibwa kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In the wake of numerous scandals and public outcry, the government faced immense pressure to address the issue. As citizens demanded accountability, leaders recognized the urgent need to take a stand against unethical practices.
lug_prompt: Olw'emivuyo mingi n'okwekalakaasa kw'abantu, gavumenti yasanga akazito ak'amaanyi okukola ku nsonga. Nga bannansi baagala embalirira, abakulembeze baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okuyimirira ku bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano gubedo ka koko, gamente onongo lyeto madit tutwal me cobo peko man. I kare ma anywali tye ka penyo pi kor tic gi, lutela oniang ni mitte tutwal me lweny i kom tim ma pe ber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu naepol noi keda aimony naka itunga, abu apugan kodum aiyalongong naepol noi kanu aitemokin akirot ngin. Kwape ekotosi itunga aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, apotu engarenok kojenutu ebe ibusakinit kesi aitikitik iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi karakara eyi ma e'yosi azini o'bi eyini owuzu 'bori ma vutia, gamete esu okpo okporu e'yo nde ma aza kozu. Kari anzi yini a'izu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba eyi esu e'yo okporu eyini lezu pa sozu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emishango mingi hamwe n'okwetomboita kw'abantu, gavumenti ekatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani kukora aha nshonga egyo. Obu abatuuragye baabaire nibashaba embaririra, abebembezi bakareeba ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okurwanisa ebikorwa ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the auditors discovered discrepancies in the financial records. It became clear that a significant amount of money was missing from the accounts.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, ababalirizi b'ebitabo baazudde obutakkaanya mu biwandiiko by'ebyensimbi. Kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ssente nnyingi zaali zibuze ku akawunta.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, joo ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gunongo lok mapat-pat I buk lim ne. Onen atyer kamaleng ni wel cente madit tutwal orweny ki I account.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu ewadikan luka ikapun odumutu iboro lumam iswamauna kotoma aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun. Aponi kojenunai ebe emamiatatar ikapun luipu kotoma aingadis naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, 'ba e'yo robia ma ale andri'baa 'diyi esu e'yo onzi eyi kokobi robia ni 'diyi ma alea. Eca e'da kililiru kini robia ongmbo angiri ni avi akawunti 'da eyi ma alea ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, ababazi b'ebitabo bakashanga ebitahikire omu bihandiiko by'esente. Kikarebeka butunu ngu esente nyingi zikabura aha akawunti.

eng_prompt: As news of escalating tensions spread, local residents began to voice their concerns. The recent increase in violence had left many feeling uneasy and uncertain about the future.
lug_prompt: Amawulire g'obunkenke bwe gaasaasaana, abatuuze b'omu kitundu baatandika okwogera ebibaluma. Okweyongera kw'obutabanguko gye buvuddeko kwaletera bangi okuwulira nga tebalina mirembe era nga tebalina bukakafu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea me telle omedde, lutedero gucako tito lworo gi. Medde pa tim gero I kare ma okato ni oweko dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana akiro nuikamunitos aiyatakin naka ingungeta, apotu itunga luka atutubet kogeutu einer nuikamunitos aiyalongongokec. Aiyatakinio naka amumu nes ajalakinit itunga luipu aiyalongong ido mam ejenete nuikamunitos oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efuza e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma dria ri ni i erezurisi, 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi e'do asi e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi o'diru 'diyi fe 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu asi otiza kokoru ewu drialeri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amahurire g'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, gatandikire kworeka okwerarikirira kwabo. Okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko okwabaireho omu bwire butari bwa hare, kikareka abantu baingi bateine busingye kandi bateine buringaaniza aha by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In response to recent incidents and community concerns, local officials have gathered a team of experts. Their goal is to address the pressing safety issues that have been affecting residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira kw'abantu, abakungu b'ebyalo bakuŋŋaanyizza ttiimu y'abakugu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukola ku nsonga z'ebyokwerinda ezibadde zikosa abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki peko ma lwak tye kwede, lutic me tedero guyubu dul pa ludiro. Miti gi obedo me tyeko peko me gwoko kuc ma obedo ka yelo lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuiswamasi pac keda atiokisio nuka itunga, atukokisi eswamak luka atutubet ipirioitin. Alosikinetekec erai aitemokin atiokisio nuka ayuwara nuetapit aimusung itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra amuti 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi ni. Asisile yiniri lezu e'yo ewaru e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo ebipi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi bipi ra 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'eby'okwerarikirira by'abantu, abakungu b'ebyaro bateireho tiimu y'abakugu. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okukora aha nshonga z'eby'okwerinda ezirikuteganisa abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: After a series of troubling incidents in the community, many residents gathered at the town hall meeting to voice their concerns. They expressed frustration over the lack of transparency from local officials regarding recent decisions.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'ebizibu eby'omuddiring'anwa mu kitundu, abatuuze bangi baakuŋŋaanira mu lukiiko lwa town hall okwogera ebibaluma. Baalaga obwennyamivu olw'obutaba na bwerufu okuva mu bakungu b'ebyalo ku bikwata ku kusalawo okwakakolebwa.
ach_prompt: Inge peko mapol ma otimme I kabedo enuni, lutedero mapol gugure I kacokke me town hall me tito peko gi. Gin gunyutu cwer cwiny gi pi bedo pe pa ada ma aa ki bot lutic me tedero malube ki tam ma kimoko cokcok-ki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubet kangin, apotu itunga luipu kotukokinos toma airiamunet naka atutubet kanu alimun aiyalongongokec. Apotu kesi itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus aica kanejaas eswamak luka atutubet kanuikamunitos aseununeta nupac.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba karakara eyi tra eyi mitingi town hall niri ma alea e'yo eyi ma dria. Eyi ece candi eyini e'yo azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini e'yo ada kokoru e'yo 'dule o'diru 'diyi ma dria risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebintu bingi ebirikuteganisa abantu omu kyanga, abatuuragye baingi baketeeranira omu rukiiko rw'orukiiko rw'orurembo kworeka enshonga zaabo. Bakooreka okwetomboitwa ahabw'abakozi b'ebyaro obutaba abeerufu omu by'okucwamu ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: Despite the team's enthusiasm and dedication, there was a lack of oversight throughout the entire process. As a result, many crucial steps were overlooked.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde ttiimu yabadde n'obwagazi n'obumalirivu, waaliwo ebbula ly'obulagirizi mu nkola yonna. N'ekyavaamu, emitendera emikulu mingi gyabuusibwa amaaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dul tuku ne gubedo ki miti madit tutwal, pe gubedo ki wang mabit I kare weng me yub eni. Macalo adwogi ne, ki cayo yoo mapigi tego mapol.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi etimu keda aiyalama keda ainakina, amamei aanyunet kotoma ainapeta ngun kere. Kanuka ngun, aponi ipalunitai ainapeta nuipu nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ni ta tro aa'zu ava be azini asi feza be ra ti, e'yo driceza niri ma ako ndra sa'wa 'di ma alea dria ci. E'yo 'disi, 'ba adi e'yo okporu 'diyi ma azi eyi te.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushemererwa kwa tiimu hamwe n'okwehayo kwayo, hakaba hatariho kureebuuza omu nkora yoona. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo mingi y'omugasho ekaba etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the financial audit, the organizers emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability. Consequently, all participants were requested to account for the money they received.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okubalirirwa kw'ensimbi, abategesi bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'obwerufu n'embalirira. N'olw'ekyo, bonna abeetabamu baasabibwa okuwa embalirira y'ensimbi ze baafuna.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi ngiyo kor tic ki lim, luyub ne guwaco ni ber me bedo ki ada ki kor tic ki lim. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego dano weng me miyo kor tic ki cente ma gunongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin nuka aingic ikapun, apotu luitemonokinak kitogogongoto ajokis naka aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolimokinai itunga kere aitodun eipone lo itwasamatotor kesi ikapun lu apotu kesi kodumutu.
lgg_prompt: Otuta e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu ri ma alia, 'ba otupi 'diyi 'ba asi orodri e'yo ada ni azini geri 'bani robia ayuzu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai 'ba dria fi'ba 'diyi e'yo nzezu robia eyini esu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera okushwijumwa kw'esente, abatebekanisa bakahamya omugasho gw'oburingaaniza n'embaririra. N'ahabw'ekyo, boona abeejumbiremu bakashabwa kuheereza embaririra y'esente ezibatungire.

eng_prompt: The safety of our communities depends on holding criminals accountable for their actions. Allowing thieves to roam free only increases the risk of further crimes and undermines public trust in the justice system.
lug_prompt: Obukuumi bw'ebitundu byaffe bwesigamye ku kuvunaanibwa kw'abamenyi b'amateeka olw'ebikolwa byabwe. Okuleka ababbi okutambulatambula mu ddembe kyongera ku bulabe bw'emisango emirala n'okutyoboola obwesige bw'abantu mu nkola y'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa kabedo wa jenge I kom miyo pwod ki lubal pi timgi. Wek lukwo gubed agonya medo gum me timo bal mukene dok balo gen pa lwak i kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Ayuwara naka itunga wok ejai kotoma aitodunit ebe ibusakinit itunga lukarokok aitodun nuiswamaete. Aicamakin ikokolak alosit ailajara iyatakini arereng naka abilibilio naka ikisila ka aitidisiar amuno naka itunga mama ejaasi ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Ageitema ongulumu amavile 'diyiniri ati e'yo 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi 'duzu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyisi. Lezu ogua eyini acizu e'yo kokoru ri ma omgbo otu e'yo onzi eyini 'ye dika eri fe 'ba eyini asi 'bazu geri e'yo liza kililiru ri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Eby'okwerinda by'abantu b'omubyanga byaitu, nibigyendera aha kujunaana abakozi b'ebihagaro ahabw'ebikorwa byabo. Okwikiriza abashuma kutambura, nikyongyera akabi k'okwongyera kukora ebihagaro kandi kikamaraho obwesigye bw'abantu omu kitongore ky'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve collaboration and communication among their departments, the leaders decided to invest in a team-building initiative. They believed that strengthening relationships within the team would enhance overall productivity and morale.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkolagana n'empuliziganya mu bitongole byabwe, abakulembeze baasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu kaweefube w'okuzimba ttiimu. Baalowooza nti okunyweza enkolagana mu ttiimu kyandiyongedde ku buwanguzi n'empisa okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me yubu ribe ki lok ikin dul tic gi, lutela ne gumoko tam gi me keto lim I yub me tic kacel. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni jingo wat ikin lutic obi weko tic gi woto maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar aiswamanara keda einer kiding iriongeta kec, apotu engarenok koseutu aipikakin ikapunukec toma adukio naka etimu. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aitogogong eidicane kotoma otimu itojokari aswam keda eswamae loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo nzezu esele yini 'diyi ma eselea, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo robia ayuzu otita azi ngazu tualu 'diyi ma alea. Yi a'i ra kini aa'ta amuti 'da ma alea ri ma okpo otuzuri ni nga fe 'ba eyini azi ngazu muke dika eyi ma aa'ta muke.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura okukwatanisa n'empurizagana omu bitongore byabo, abebembezi bakasharamu kuta esente omu nteekateeka y'okwombeka tiimu. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okwongyera omukago omu tiimu nikiija kutunguura emikorere hamwe n'emitwarize.

eng_prompt: Despite our careful budgeting and planning, we encountered unexpected expenses along the way. As a result, we realized that the funding was not enough for us to complete the project.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twateekateeka n'obwegendereza embalirira yaffe, twasangawo ensaasaanya gye tutasuubira mu kkubo. N'ekyavaamu, twakizuula nti ensimbi zaali tezimala kumaliriza pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wabedo ki byek me lim ki yub maber tutwal, warwatte ki cente ma pe wageno I yoo. Macalo adwogi ne, waniang ni lim ma kimiyo pe romo tyeko yub eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ibusakinit sio aitemonokin ka aitemonokin nuka ebajet, apotu sio adumutu iboro lumam sio aomit kotoma orot. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio awanyutu ebe mam ikapun edolitos kanu sio angetakin epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Ama ni ta tro otita aje robia niri 'bazu kililiru azini otuta 'yezu ra ti, ama esu afa ayuzaru 'bani egale ku 'diyi geri 'da ma alea ra. E'yo 'disi, ama esu ra kini robia fele ri cani ama dri otita 'da dezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho embaririra n'okuteekateekyera kurungi, tukashanga enshohoza etarikuteekateekwaho omu muhanda. N'ekyarugiremu, tuketegyereza ngu esente zikaba zitarikumara kumara purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of their financial records, the organization discovered discrepancies in their funding allocation. Realizing the gravity of the situation, they convened an emergency meeting to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko byabwe eby'ensimbi, ekitongole kyazudde obutakwatagana mu ngeri gye baagabanyamu ensimbi. Olw'okukimanya nti embeera yali mbi nnyo, baayita olukiiko olw'amangu okukola ku nsonga eyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor ticgi me lim, dul ne onongo ni cente ma kimiyo botgi pe obedo marom. Pien guniang kit ma peko ne rac kwede, gulwongo kacoke me atura me tyeko lok ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro kec nuka ikapun, abu erionget kodum amamut acamanar kotoma aikor ikapun. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka ejautene, apotu kesi onyarautu airiamunet na engeso kanu aitemokin akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo yi ma robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu e'yo yi ma robia awazu 'diyi ma esele coza ra. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma esuta si, eyi omve mitingi mbeleru e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi ebihandiiko byabo eby'esente, ekitongore kikashanga obutaikirizana omu nkora yaabo y'okugaba esente. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, bakeeta orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the committee found discrepancies in the financial records. As a result, they were requested to return the money they had received.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, akakiiko kaasanze obutakwatagana mu biwandiiko by'ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, baasabibwa okuzzaayo ssente ze baali bafunye.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut, dul enoni onongo ni coc me lim ne pe tye kakare. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego gi me dwoko cen cente ma gunongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, abu ekomiti kodum aibucaret kotoma aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolimokinai kesi ainyakar ikapun lu adumunitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, komiti 'da esu e'yo onzi eyi kokobi robia ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai eyi robia eyini esu 'da ogozu vile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga,akakiiko kakashanga ebitahikire omu bihandiiko by'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, bakashabwa kugarura sente ezibatungire.

eng_prompt: Despite multiple reminders and follow-ups, our records indicate a lack of financial transactions. This has raised concerns about the status of our ongoing agreement.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga tujjukizibwa emirundi mingi era ne tugoberera, ebiwandiiko byaffe biraga obutaba na nkolagana mu by'ensimbi. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku mbeera y'endagaano yaffe egenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki poyo wigi tyen mapol, lok ma kicoyo nyutu ni tic me lim pe otime. Man okelo lworo I kom winye matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida aponi isiitikokinai ngun irwan ipu, itodunit aiwadikaetawok ebe emamei ikapun lu itwasamao. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong kanuikamunitos acamanar wok na elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani egazu dika 'bani e'yo vuti obizu 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo ama vile 'diyi ece kini e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ayuta yo. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo otuta amani muzu drile ri ma driari ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuijutsya n'okukuratiriza emirundi mingi, ebihandiiko byaitu nibyoreka ngu tihaine eby'empiiha ebikozirwe. Eki kireesire okwerarikirira aha nkora y'endagaano yaitu erikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain a clear financial overview, the team implemented a strict budgeting process. They ensured that all transactions were meticulously tracked and documented.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuba n'endowooza ennuŋŋamu ku by'ensimbi, ttiimu yakozesa enkola ya mbalirira enkakali. Baakakasizza nti byonna ebikolebwa birondoolwa n'obwegendereza era ne biwandiikibwa.
ach_prompt: Me neno kit ma tic ki lim tye kwede, dul ne guketo yub me byek lim matek tutwal itic. Gu neno ni kitimo tic weng maber dok kicoyo ne I bukke.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajaut keda akiro nuka ikapun nu ecaete, abu etimu kitutub ainapeta nuka ebajet. Apotu kesi koanyutu ebe ewanyanaritai iboro kere kosodete aiwadika.
lgg_prompt: Bani ecozu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru, amuti 'da 'ba otita bajeti ni okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Eyi ndre ra kini 'ba e'yo dria 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma pamvu andri kililiru dika 'ba si eyi kokobi eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuguma baine enteekateeka nungi y'esente, tiimu ekataho enkora nungi y'embaririra. Bakareeba ngu eby'obushubuzi byona bikakuratirwa n'obwegyendesereza kandi bikahandiikwa.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation into his suspicious activities, law enforcement finally gathered enough evidence to take action. The authorities had been monitoring him for weeks, and the time had come to make an arrest.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene ku bikolwa bye ebiteeberezebwa, abakuumaddembe kyaddaaki baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi obumala okubaako kye bakolawo. Ab'obuyinza baali bamulondoola okumala wiiki eziwera, era ekiseera kyali kituuse okumukwata.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac I kom tim ne ma byek tye I komgi, dul ma gwoko cik i agiki ne guyubu caden ma oromo me timo gin mo. Lutela gubedo ka nene pi cabit mapol, kare dong oromo me make.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuikamunitos aswamisio ke nu eomitai ebe ejai, apotu ipolisin odumutu ajenanut naedolit kanu aswam ngun. Auta apedorosio aanyanar ngesi adaun isabitin luipu, ido adolu kwana apak naka aikamanar ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'yeta erini 'diyi ma dria 'bo ri ma vutia, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi oku asizu afa ecetaru 'diyi e'yo 'yezu. Okpo e'ipi 'diyi ebi eri ma pamvu one sabiti eyi ma alea, dika sa'wa ca 'bo 'bani eri obizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa aha bikorwa bye ebirikuteekwateekwaho, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakahendera kurundaana obujurizi oburikumara kugira ngu bakozireho. Ab'obushoborozi babaire bamureberera kumara esande, kandi obwire bukaba buhikire kumukwata.

eng_prompt: The exploitation of children in the workforce has long been a serious issue worldwide. Governments and organizations are working to enforce laws that protect minors from such practices.
lug_prompt: Okukozesa abaana mu mirimu kibadde kizibu kya maanyi mu nsi yonna. Gavumenti n'ebitongole bikola okussa mu nkola amateeka agakuuma abaana abato okuva ku bikolwa ng'ebyo.
ach_prompt: Nywaro tic pa lutino obedo peko madit tutwal I wilobo lung. Gamente kacel ki dule mapat-pat tye katic matek me keto cik ma gwoko lutino ma mwaka gi pe oromo ki i kom tim ma kit meno.
teo_prompt: Aitwasamao na idwe aswam erai ationis naepol noi kotoma akwap kere. Iswamaete apuganisinei keda iriongeta aitodolikin ikisila lu eyuwarete idwe kanejaas iboro kalu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anzi nyiri eyini ayuzu azi ngazu ri ebi ovu e'yo azi okporu ni wudrikuru ma alea sa'wa ezu. Gamete eyi tualu amuti ndundu eyi pie azi nga azita tambaza fepi anzi eli capiku 'diyi dri e'yo 'dile 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Okukoresa abaana omu mirimo, kitwire kiri ekizibu ky'amaani omunsi yoona. Gavumenti hamwe n'ebitongore biriyo nibikora munonga kutaho ebiragiro ebirikuzibira abaana bato okukora ebikorwa nk'ebyo.

eng_prompt: Engaging in fun activities is essential for a child's development. One of the most enjoyable ways for them to learn and socialize is through play.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu by'amasanyu kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'omwana. Engeri emu gye basinga okunyumirwa okuyiga n'okukolagana n'abalala kwe kuzannya.
ach_prompt: Timo jami ma yomo cwiny lutino pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa lutino. Yo acel ma mit tutwal pi lutino me pwonyo ki bedo kacel ki lutino mukene obedo tuku.
teo_prompt: Aswam iboro lu eyalamasi erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka apol naka ikoku. Ediopet kotoma iwaitin lueminasi kesi noi aisisia keda aimorikikin keda luce erai kowai lo abolia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ayiko fezani 'diyi 'yezu ri eri orodriru mva ma zota ni. Geri azi alu eyini ayiko esuzu onizu azini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri avita eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okwejumba omu mirimo erikushemeza n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kw'omwana. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kubashemeza kwega n'okukorengana n'okuzaana.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the students eagerly anticipated the culmination of their academic journey. Families gathered in the auditorium, filled with excitement and pride for their graduates.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, abayizi baali beesunga okutuuka ku ntikko y'olugendo lwabwe olw'okusoma. Amaka gakungaanidde mu kisenge, nga gajjudde essanyu n'okwenyumiriza mu bayizi baabwe abaatikiddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, lutino kwan gubedo ki miti madit tutwal me tyeko kwan gi. Gangi gucokke I ot lega, cwiny gi opong ki yomcwiny ki awaka pi lutino kwan gi ma gutyeko kwangi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu esisiak komuno aitodolikin alosikinet naka asioman kec. Apotu ikalia kotukokinos kotoma aiboisit naipu aiyalama keda aiyalama kanuka alomunak kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, sukulu anzi 'da eyi te asi driasi asizu aci eyini sukulu'a ri ma alea. Familia eyi tra eyi pari imbatani 'diyi ma alea ayikosi tualu afusi 'ba eyini onita univasiti niri depi 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abeegi bakaba beeteekateekire aha muheru gw'orugyendo rwabo rw'eby'obwegyese. Amaka gaketeeranira omu kishengye, gaijwire okushemererwa n'okwehimbisa ahabw'abeegi baabo abamazire emishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve the financial stability of local schools, the district held a meeting to discuss the importance of timely payments. During the discussion, officials highlighted the impact of delayed fees on educational resources and programs.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula embeera y'ebyensimbi mu masomero g'omu kitundu, disitulikiti yatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okusasula mu budde. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo, abakungu baayogedde ku ngeri okulwawo kw'ebisale by'essomero gye kikosaamu ebikozesebwa n'enteekateeka z'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me lim pa gangi kwan me tedero, district obedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom ber pa culu lutino ikare ki kome. Ikare me nywako lok, lutic guwaco adwoki pa gale pa culu kwan I kom yub me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar ejautene loka ikapun loka isomeroi luka atutubet, abu edisitrikt iriamunos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aitac ikapun kotoma apak. Kotoma opeget, apotu eswamak kitetemoto ationis naka aiyap aitac ikapun luka esomero keda ainapeta nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo robia niri ma omgbo otuzu, distrikiti 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu orodri 'bani sukulu eyi ofezu sa'wa dria ri ma dria. Sawa agbatara nirisi, azi'ba eyi ece e'yo sukulu fizi ma sa'wa ezaza ni 'diyi ma e'yo geri onita ni 'diyi ma dria tualu otita onita ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura entatsya y'amashomero g'omubyaro, disiturikiti ekakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okushashura abaana omubwiire. Omu kuhanuura, abakuru bakashoborora oburemeezi bw'okukyerererwa kw'ebishare by'eishomero aha by'obwegyese hamwe na puroguraamu.

eng_prompt: As the assembly began, the students eagerly awaited the headteacher's words of encouragement. However, a palpable tension filled the room when it became clear that something was amiss.
lug_prompt: Olukungaana bwe lwatandika, abayizi baali balindirira ebigambo by'omukulu w'essomero ebizzaamu amaanyi. Newankubadde, obunkenke obw'amaanyi bwajjula ekisenge bwe kyalabika nti waliwo ekikyamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gure ocake, lutino kwan gubedo kakuru lok me cuku cwiny pa ladit gangkwan. Kadi bed kumeno, lworo madit omako ot ikare ma onen atyer kamaleng ni gin mo pe tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Neageunia airiamunet, apotu esisiak idaritoto akiro nuisinyikokinit esisianakinan. Konye, apotu aiyalongongo kilelebunos agola ngin nawanyunia ngesi ebe ejai ibore yenimam ejokuna.
lgg_prompt: Okutaa ni e'doria, sukulu anzi eyi te asi driasi dricere eyi ma e'yo ava engapi 'diyi te. Kani si, asi omizaniri ga jo ale aliza ma alia 'bani e'dazu kililiru kini e'yo azini onzi.
nyn_prompt: Oruteerane ku rwatandikire, abeegi bakategyereza n'ekihika ebigambo by'omukuru w'eishomero eby'okugaruramu amaani. Kwonka, obunkenke bukaija omu kishengye bwanyima y'okureebeka ngu hariho ekitahikire.

eng_prompt: After implementing new teaching strategies and providing additional resources, the educators closely monitored the progress of their students. As a result of these efforts, the students' performance has improved.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okussa mu nkola obukodyo bw'okusomesa obupya n'okuwa ebyetaago ebirala, abasomesa beetegereza nnyo enkulaakulana y'abayizi baabwe. Olw'okufuba kuno, ensoma y'abayizi yeeyongedde.
ach_prompt: Ingee keto yoo me pwonyo manyen I tic ki medo jami mukene, lupwonye gubedo ka neno kit ma lutino gi tye ka wot kwede. Macalo adwogi me tute magi, lutino kwan gutimo maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitegear iponesio luitetiak luka aisisianakin ka aijaikin iboro icie, apotu isisianakinak owanyutu eipone lo elosiotor esisiak kec. Kanuka aswamisio nu, ajokunar eswamae loka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani o'diru 'diyi 'bazu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu 'bori ma vutia, imba'ba eyi one sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma zota geri kililiru si. Okpo 'diyi ma e'yosi, sukulu anzi eyi ma agata otu i ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuta omu nkora oburyo busya bw'okwegyesa n'okuheereza eby'okukozesa ebindi, abegyesa bakarebera kurungi entunguuka y'abeegi baabo. Ahabw'amaani aga, emikorere y'abeegi eyeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In today's society, access to knowledge and skills is essential for personal and professional growth. However, the rising costs of tuition and fees are creating barriers for many aspiring students.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, okufuna amagezi n'obukugu kyetaagisa nnyo mu kukulaakulana kw'omuntu n'okw'ekikugu. Newankubadde, okulinnya kw'ebisale by'essomero n'ebisale by'essomero bireetawo obuzibu eri abayizi bangi abagala okusoma.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, nongo ngec ki diro obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa ngat moni. Kadi bed kumeno, wel cul kwan matye kamede tye ka gengo lutino kwan mapol matye ki miti me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, adumunun acoa ka acoa erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka itunganan keda aswam. Konye, aiyatakin etiai loka ikapun luka esomero keda isirigin luka esomero erai ibore yenepedori aitikitik esisiak luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, onita esuzu azini ondua esuzu ri eri orodriru zota 'ba ma ngulupi ni azini onita ma dria ri ni. Kani si, aje sukulu fizi ni tupi tu ri ni e'yo eyi eji sukulu anzi karakara lepi sukulu lapi ra 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, okutunga obwengye n'emyoga n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka. Kwonka, okweyongyera kw'ebishare by'eishomero n'ebishare by'eishomero, nikireetaho oburemeezi aha beegi baingi abarikwenda kwega.

eng_prompt: Consistent attendance is crucial for a child's academic success and social development. By being present in every lesson, children can fully engage with the material and their peers.
lug_prompt: Okugendanga mu ssomero buli kiseera kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'omwana mu kusoma n'okukulaakulana mu mbeera z'abantu. Mu kubeerawo mu buli ssomo, abaana basobola okwenyigira mu bujjuvu n'ebisomesebwa ne bannaabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye I gang kwan kare ki kare pire tek tutwal pi latin me kato maber I gang kwan ki dongo ikin lwak. Ki bedo tye I gang kwan weng, lutino twero bedo ki kare me pwonyo lutino luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Alosenen idwe osomero erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka idwe kosomero keda apol naka itunga. Kowai lo ajaut kangin aisisiaet, epedorete idwe aisisia keda ipaupakec.
lgg_prompt: Anzi eyi ma mu sukulu'a sa'wa driasi ri eri orodriru agata sukulu niri ni azini zota o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ni. E'yo aa'zu embata dria ma alea risi, anzi eyi eco e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alea tualu eyi ma agyipika eyi pie ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugyenda omu mashomero obutoosha n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'obusinguzi bw'abaana omu mashomero hamwe n'entunguuka omu bantu. Abaana ku barikuba bari omuri buri mwegyeso, nibabaasa kwejumba omu by'okwega hamwe na bataahi baabo.

eng_prompt: As young individuals begin to explore their interests and talents, they often face overwhelming options for their future. It is essential for parents and educators to provide support and direction during this critical decision-making process.
lug_prompt: Abavubuka bwebatandika okunoonyereza ku byebagala n'ebitone byabwe,batera okusanga okusalawo okuzibu ku biseera byabwe ebyomumaaso. Kya mugaso nnyo abazadde n'abasomesa okuwa obuyambi n'obulagirizi mu kaseera kano akakulu ak'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: Ka bulu gucako yenyo jami ma gimaro ki mic ma gitye kwede, pol kare ginongo yoo mapol tutwal pi anyimgi. Pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo ki lupwonye me miyo kony ki tira ikare me moko tam ma pire tek eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape egeunete atumunak aingic ipudesiakec keda atalantanakec, etereikina kesi keda aseununeta nuepolok nuikamunitos ingarenikec. Erai ibore yenepol noi auriak keda esisianakinak aijaikin agangat keda aicoreta kotoma apak kana naka aitolomun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: Ba oderu 'diyi ni e'doria e'yo eyini le azini feta Munguni fe eyidri 'diyi ma eti ondazu, eyi e'yo eyi 'ye ewu drialeri ma alea karakara. Eri orodriru tipika eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie atita fezu azini imbata fezu eyi ma dria sa'wa 'bani e'yo 'duzu okporu 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eminyeeto ku erikutandika kushwijuma ebi erikukunda n'ebitone byayo, buriijo neetunga oburyo bwingi bw'okukora omu biro byayo eby'omumaisho. N'eky'omugasho abazaire n'abeegyesa okuheereza obuhwezi n'obuhabuzi omu bwire obu obw'okukora encwamu.

eng_prompt: Due to the severe weather conditions and safety concerns, the administration made the difficult decision to cancel classes for the day. Parents were notified early in the morning to ensure everyone was informed.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'obudde embi n'obukuumi, abaddukanya baakola okusalawo okukaluba okusazaamu emisomo ku lunaku. Abazadde baategeezebwa ku makya ennyo okulaba nga buli omu ategeezebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me piny marac tutwal ki lworo me gwoko kuc, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tam matek tutwal me ngolo kwan pi nino enuni. Ki niango lunyodo odiko con me neno ni dano weng guniang.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ekuse ka etepe loaronon keda aiyalongong naka ayuwara, abu eyaitene kiswamau aseunet naetiono noi naka aikisar asioman aparan ngin. Aponi olimokinai auriak tupuruc tupuruc kanu awanyun ebe elimokinitai itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni onzi 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo ageitema ni 'diyisi, driceza 'da 'du e'yo ewaru kilasi eyi atrizu o'du 'dasi. Ba lu tipika eyini e'yo 'da o'bitisi drioru nezu ra kini 'ba dria ni e'yo 'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'obwire embi hamwe n'eby'okwerinda, abarikukurira eishomero bakakora encwamu egumire y'okushazamu emishomo y'eizooba eryo. Abazaire bakamanyisibwa kare omu kasheeshe kureeba ngu buri omwe yamanyisibwa.

eng_prompt: The company has been expanding its operations significantly over the past few months. As a result, they are looking to hire more staff to meet the growing demand.
lug_prompt: Kampuni ebadde egaziya nnyo emirimu gyayo mu myezi egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya okupangisa abakozi abalala okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo ka medo rwom me ticgi I dwe ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yenyo lutic mukene me cobo miti matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Etapit ekampuni aitanyanyar aswamisio ke noi kotoma ilapio idis luatuboros. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aimo eswamak luipu kanu aitodolikin eipuda lo iyatakinete.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi azi erini 'diyi ma omgbo otu mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea saaru. E'yo 'disi, eyi le azi'ba azi eyi si dika eyini ani ecozu e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni etwire neeyongyera aha mirimo yaayo omu myezi mikye ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibenda kwongyera aha bakozi baabo okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo ebirikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of a strong foundation for their future, many families prioritize their children's education. As a result, they allocate significant resources towards various learning opportunities.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'omusingi omunywevu ogw'ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso, amaka mangi gakulembeza okusoma kw'abaana baago. N'ekivuddemu, bawaayo eby'obugagga bingi eri emikisa gy'okusoma egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I nge niang ber pa bedo ki guti matek pi anyim gi, gangi mapol keto kwan pa lutino gi bedo gin ma pire tek. Macalo adwogi ne, gi keto cente madit tutwal I yub me kwan mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aduketait naegogong kanu oingaren kec, isingarenitos ikalia luipu asioman naka idwekec. Kanuka ngun, einakinitos kesi ikapun luipu kanu asioman naegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri 'bani e'yo okporu ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma e'yo egazu risi, familia karakara eyi anzi eyivile 'diyi ma onita 'du okporu. E'yo 'disi, yi lonyi angiri 'diyi 'ba drileba onita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia.
