nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'okuba n'omusingye murungi gw'ebiro byabo by'omumaisho, amaka maingi nigakuza omu maisho eby'obwegyese bw'abaana baabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibaheereza obuhwezi bwingi aha migisha y'eby'obwegyese etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Concerned about the recent report cards, the parents gathered in the school auditorium. They wanted to address the declining grades and find ways to support their children better.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira ebyava mu bigezo ebiwedde, abazadde baakuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge ky'essomero. Baayagala okukola ku bikendedde mu bubonero n'okunoonya engeri y'okuyambamu obulungi abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo gucokke I ot lega pi lworo ma gubedo kwede I kom adwoki me kwed ma okato cokcok-ki. Gubedo ki miti me cobo peko me poto pa rwom me kwan ki nongo yoo me konyo lutino gi maber.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongokec kanu aikam iyemuto, apotu auriak kotukokinos osomero. Akotosi kesi aitemokin ationis naka aibiror naka iguredin kosodete adumun iwaitin lu igangakitos kesi idwe kec.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza ma e'yosi, tipika eyi tra eyi pari imbatani sukulu niri ma alea. Eyi le ndra e'yo 'bani sukulu anzi eyivile 'diyi ma agata esizu ri ma aza ko eyini ani geri eyini ecozu eyi ma anzi eyi atizu kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira ebirikukwata ahari kaadi za ripooti eziherize kukorwa, abazaire baketeeranira omu kishengye ky'okushomeramu. Bakaba nibenda kukora aha bikwatiraine n'okugwa kw'amashomero n'okutunga oburyo bw'okureeberera abaana baabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: Education is often seen as the key to a better future, driving many families to make difficult choices. In pursuit of academic success, parents often find themselves making significant personal and financial sacrifices.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bitera okutunuulirwa ng'ekisumuluzo ky'ebiseera by'omumaaso ebirungi, ekiviirako amaka mangi okusalawo mu ngeri enzibu. Mu kunoonya obuwanguzi mu by'ensoma, abazadde batera okwesanga nga beerekereza ebintu bingi eby'obuntu n'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Kwan ipol kare kineno calo lagony me bedo ki kwo maber I kare me anyim, ma weko gangi mapol moko tam matek. I yenyo loc I gang kwan, lunyodo ipol kare gi nongo gi tye ka jalo jami mapol tutwal I komgi ki cente gi.
teo_prompt: Isisiaet etapit awanyun kwape elacet loka aijar naka koingaren najokan, ido ijaikini ikalia luipu aswam aseununeta nuetioko. Kanu aimo akerianut kotoma asioman, etapit auriak aswam agangat naepol noi kotoma aijar keda ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba tutuni onita ndre ekile fungua ewu drialeri ni muke ri niri ru, eri familia karakara eyi ma ti oji e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo drile suza onitaniri ma vuti obiza ma alia, tipika yi yi esu yi yi ma ngulupi ni azini robia ni 'diyi owizu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese buriijo nibureebwa nk'ekishumuruzo ky'ebiro bya nyensya birungi, ekirikureetera amaka maingi kukora okucwamu kugumire. Omu kuronda obusinguzi omu by'obwegyese, abazaire nibakira kwejumba omu by'obuhangwa hamwe n'eby'esente.

eng_prompt: Spending time with family can strengthen bonds and create lasting memories. It's important for children to connect with their relatives and learn about their family history.
lug_prompt: Okumala obudde n'ab'omu maka kiyinza okunyweza enkolagana n'okuleetawo ebijjukizo eby'olubeerera. Kya mugaso abaana okukwatagana n'abooluganda lwabwe n'okuyiga ku byafaayo by'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo kacel ki jo me odi jingo wat ikin dano dok weko wigi po I kom jami ma gutimo con. Pire tek tutwal pi lutino me kube ki wadigi ki pwonyo jami ma otimme I gang gi.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda apak keda ekale epedori aitogogong eidicane ka aitodolikin aiituneta nuka apak naepol. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu idwe arucokina keda ipajanakec kosodete aisisia nuikamunitos akiro nukokalekec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa aa'zu familia eyi pie ri ni aa'ta eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otu dika eyi ma e'yo eyi ega sa'wa ezu. Eri orodriru anzi nyiri eyini eyi ecizu eyi ma ori'ba eyi pie dika eyi ma oni e'yo eyi ma familia ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okumara obwire n'ab'eka yaawe nikibaasa kuhamya enkwatanisa yaawe kandi kikureetaho ebiijusyo ebirikugumaho. N'eky'omugasho abaana okukwatanisa n'abanyabuzaare baabo n'okwega ebyafaayo by'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: It is essential for families to foster a nurturing environment. Every child deserves attention and care to thrive emotionally and physically.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo amaka okukuza embeera ennungi. Buli mwana yeetaaga okufaayo n'okulabirirwa okukulaakulana mu nneewulira ne mu mubiri.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki gangi me yubu kabedo maber me gwoko lutino gi. Lutino weng omyero ki par pigi wek gudong i komgi ki kit ma giwinyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ikalia aitopolor aiboisit na idwe. Ekot ngol ikoku apodokinit ka aidar kanu apoloun kotoma aomisio keda akwan.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru familia eyini angu 'bani eyi ezozu kililiru ri ezozu. Le anzi nyiri dria eyi ma esu ava dika eyi ma ta mba eyini ani zozu e'yo eyi ma eselea azini rua si beni.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho amaka kureetaho emituurire mirungi. Buri mwana nayetenga okutaho omutima n'okureebererwa kugira ngu akuzire omu nyehurira hamwe n'omubiri.

eng_prompt: Despite various efforts to improve the energy infrastructure, many regions in Uganda continue to face challenges with electricity distribution. As a result, residents often experience frequent outages and unreliable service.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo kaweefube ow'enjawulo okutumbula eby'amasannyalaze, ebitundu bingi mu Uganda bikyasanga okusoomoozebwa mu kubunyisa amasannyalaze. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze batera okufuna okulemererwa kw'emirimu n'empeereza etesigika.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitye katemo matek me yubu yub me mac, but lobo Uganda mapol pud gitye ki peko me mac. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero ipol kare gi nongo peko me tic ki kony ma pe gene.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar eswamae lo akim, eringa aiboisio nuipu ko Uganda ejaas keda ainingosia nuikamunitos akorio na akim. Kanuka ngun, etapit itunga ajaut keda amamus na iponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, angu karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi nga po'di e'yo aci awaza ni 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi e'yo aci ako ni 'diyi esu dika e'yo azakoma feza ni 'diyi ma wura ovuni muke ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani maingi g'okutunguura ebyombeko by'amashanyarazi, ebicweka bingi omu Uganda nibigyenda omu maisho n'oburemeezi bw'okugaba amashanyarazi. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye tibarikukira kutunga obuheereza burungi.

eng_prompt: Reliable infrastructure is essential for economic growth and development. One of the key factors that businesses consider when deciding where to invest is the availability of consistent energy resources.
lug_prompt: Emizimbo egyesigika gya mugaso mu nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna n'enkulaakulana. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bizineesi bye zirowoozaako nga zisalawo wa we zirina okusiga ensimbi kwe kubeerawo kw'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Jami ma mite pi dongo lobo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo. Gin acel ma lutim biacara tamo I kome ka gitye ka moko kama omyero guket iye lim I biacara en aye bedo tye pa mac matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Ingarakinete iboro lu ejokuka noi kanu apol keda apol. Adiopet koboro luepolok lu eomitai ebe ibusakinit ibiasaran aseun aiboisit na ibusakinit kesi aipikakin ikapunukec toma akim.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru kililiru 'diyi orodriru zota e'yo robiani azini angu ezoma ni. E'yo azi okporu tujari eyini ega eyini e'yo 'duzu angu eyini ecozu lonyi vuti alezu 'diyi ma dria ri eri geri eyini ecozu aci ayuzu 'diyi ma aa'ta sa'wa driasi ri i.
nyn_prompt: Ebyombeko ebirikwesigwa n'eby'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'entunguuka. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebi bizinesi zirikureeba zaaba nizisharamu ahu zikwatsire sente n'okuba hariho amashanyarazi agarikugumaho.

eng_prompt: As Uganda continues to develop its energy sector, understanding the various governmental bodies involved is crucial. One key entity in this landscape is the ministry responsible for overseeing energy policies and initiatives.
lug_prompt: Nga Uganda egenda mu maaso okukulaakulanya ekitongole kyayo eky'amasannyalaze, okutegeera ebitongole bya gavumenti eby'enjawulo ebikwatibwako kya mugaso. Ekitongole ekimu ekikulu mu mbeera eno ye minisitule evunaanyizibwa ku kulondoola enkola n'enteekateeka z'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: I kare ma Uganda tye kamede ki dongo tenge me mac, niang dul pa gamente mapat-pat matye iye pire tek tutwal. Dul acel ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo man obedo jang gamente ma doro cik me mac ki yub mapat-pat makwako mac.
teo_prompt: Neinyikokini Uganda aitopolor erionget loka akim, ejokuna noi amisiikin iriongeta luegelegela luka apugan. Atukot adiope naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kana ngesi erionget lo ikamunitos nuka ainapeta keda ainapeta nuka akim.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni mu drile esele aci ni ri ezozu, vata amuti gamete ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru. Amuti azi okporu angu 'di ma alea ni eri okalamvu e'yo okpo feza ni 'diyi ondrepi okalamvu e'yo okpo feza ni 'diyi ondrepi okalamvu e'yo okpo feza ni 'diyi ondrepi okalamvu e'yo okpo feza ni 'diyi ondrepi okalamvu e'yo okpo feza ni 'diyi ondrepi okalamvu e'yo
nyn_prompt: Obu Uganda erikugumizamu n'okutunguura eby'amashanyarazi, okwetegyereza ebitongore bya gavumenti ebitarikushushana, n'eky'omugasho munonga. Ekitongore kimwe ekikuru omu nshonga egi n'ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa ahaby'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Gathering insights from users is crucial for continuous improvement. By understanding their experiences, we can make informed decisions about our strategies.
lug_prompt: Okukung'aanya amagezi okuva mu bakozesa kya mugaso nnyo mu kugenda mu maaso n'enkulaakulana. Bwe tutegeera bye bayitamu, tusobola okusalawo obulungi ku nteekateeka zaffe.
ach_prompt: Coko ngec ma aa ki bot lutic pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo. Ka waniang jami ma gukato iye, ci watwero moko tam mabeco I kom yub ma watye kwede.
teo_prompt: Aituk aomisio kanejaas itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitojokaar. Kowai lo amisikin akirokec, ipedori oni aitolomun aseununeta nuikamunitos iwaitin wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyi trazu engazu 'ba ayupi 'diyi vu ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi otuzu drile. E'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma vata si, ama eco peta kililiru 'du geri amani ecozu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okurundaana ebiteekateeko kuruga omu bakozesa n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka. Twayetegyereza ebyabaireho, nitubaasa kucwamu kurungi.

eng_prompt: As Uganda continues to experience rapid economic growth and urbanization, the demand for electricity is increasing significantly. Addressing the challenges in the energy sector has become crucial for sustaining development and improving the quality of life for its citizens.
lug_prompt: Nga Uganda yeeyongera okukulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okukulaakulana mu bibuga, obwetaavu bw'amasannyalaze bweyongera nnyo. Okukola ku kusoomoozebwa mu kitongole ky'amasannyalaze kifuuse kikulu nnyo mu kuyimirizaawo enkulaakulana n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bw'abatuuze baayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma Uganda tye ka dongo I rwom me lim ki dongo I boma madongo, miti pa mac tye ka medde tutwal. Cobo peko matye I tenge me mac odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I dongo lobo ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa anywali me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit Uganda apolo naepol noi kotoma akwap keda aiboisio nuapolok, ejai eipuda lo akim aiyatakin noi. Aitemokin atiokisio nuka erionget loka akim erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar apol ka aitojokar adoketait naka aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni zozu okposi e'yo robiani azini tawuni eyi ma omgbo ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani lezu aci esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tutu. E'yo ewaru esele aci niri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eca curu'do orodriru tu angu ezoma ma ta mbazu azini aa'ta kari anzi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obu Uganda erikugumizamu n'okutunguuka omu by'entaasya n'omu ndembo, ekyetengo ky'amashanyarazi nikyeyongyera munonga. Okukora aha buremeezi oburi omu kitongore ky'amashanyarazi n'eby'amashanyarazi kihindukire eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'entunguuka n'okwongyera aha mutindo gw'entuura y'abantu.

eng_prompt: Before making any financial commitments, investors carefully evaluate various elements that could impact their returns. Understanding the market landscape and potential risks is crucial in their decision-making process.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannakola kweyama kwonna mu by'ensimbi, bamusigansimbi beetegereza n'obwegendereza ebintu eby'enjawulo ebiyinza okukosa amagoba gaabwe. Okutegeera embeera y'akatale n'obulabe obuyinza okubaawo kikulu nnyo mu kukola okusalawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe guketo cente mo keken I tic, luket lim I biyacara gi kwedo ki diro jami mapol ma twero balo magoba gi. Niang kit ma cuk tye kwede ki peko ma twero bedo tye pire tek tutwal ikare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Erongo itolomun ikapun, ejenete agwelanarak iboro luegelegela luepedorete aitolitol ameda kec. Amisiikin ejautene loka esokoni keda atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta kec.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi e'doni e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'ye ku, eyi e'yo ndundu ecopi orodri eyini esu 'diyi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru. E'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma vata azini e'yo onzi ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Abashubuuzi batakakozire kihango kyona omu by'empiiha, nibateekateeka n'obwegyendesereza aha bintu bingi ebirikubaasa kuteganisa amagoba gaabo. Okwetegyereza entatsya y'akatare hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho, n'eky'omugasho omu kukora okusharamu kwabo.

eng_prompt: Many trees possess the strength and durability required for various construction purposes. As a result, certain tree species have become essential in the production of utility infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Emiti mingi girina amaanyi n'obuwangaazi obwetaagisa mu kuzimba okw'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, ebika by'emiti ebimu bifuuse bikulu mu kukola ebintu ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Yadi mapol tye ki teko ki kare malac ma mite pi tic mapat-pat me gedo. Macalo adwogi ne, kwai yadi mukene dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I yubu jami ma konyo dano.
teo_prompt: Ikito luipu ejaas keda agogongu na ekotoi kanu aduko. Kanuka ngun, eraas iponesio ice luka ikito luepolok noi kanu aitolomun iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Pati karakara eyi ma okpo azini aa'ta sa'wa ezu 'bani le afa ndundu eyi sizu 'diyi ci. E'yo 'disi, pati esele azi 'diyi eca curu'do orodriru afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma edeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Emiti mingi eine amaani g'okwombeka n'okugumaho kumara obwire buraingwa. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'emiti emwe ehindukire ey'omugasho omu kukora ebintu by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: When selecting materials for construction, it's crucial to prioritize durability and strength. Many builders overlook the importance of high-quality poles, leading to potential hazards.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olonda ebikozesebwa mu kuzimba, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obuwangaazi n'amaanyi. Abazimbi bangi babuusa amaaso omugaso gw'ebikondo eby'omutindo ogwa waggulu, ekiviirako obuzibu obuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka yero jami ma mite me gedo, pire tek tutwal me keto cwiny I kom jami ma rii ki ma tek. Lugedo mapol cayo ber pa pol ma rwom gi malo, ma man kelo peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Arai eseun iboro lu aiduk, ibusakinit aisingarenit aiting keda agogongu. Mam adukok luipu ejenete ajokis na ipirin lu ejokuka, ido eyangauni atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka afa jo sizu 'diyi pe ria, eri orodriru e'yo aa'pi sa'wa ezu azini okpo be 'diyi 'duzu okporu. Ba angu sipi karakara 'diyi e'yo orodri pati wura muke 'diyiniri ma dria ku, e'yo ecopi e'yo onzi ejipi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nootoorana ebintu by'okwombekyesa, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'obuhangazi n'amaani. Abombeki abaingi tibarikufayo aha mugasho gw'ebikondo by'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, ekirikubaasa kureetaho akabi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, elected officials are responsible for representing the interests of their constituents. Understanding their functions is crucial for grasping how government operates.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, abakungu abalondebwa bavunaanibwa okukiikirira ebyetaago by'abalonzi baabwe. Okutegeera emirimu gyabwe kikulu nnyo mu kutegeera engeri gavumenti gy'ekola.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, lutic ma kiyero gi ki twero me cung pi miti pa lubol kwir gi. Niang ticgi pire tek tutwal pi niang kit ma gamente tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan naka itunga, eswamak lu eseunitai kes ikamunitos nu ekotos itunga luka atutubenakec. Amisiikin aswamisinei kec ejok kanu amisiikin epone loiswamata apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo democracia ni ma alia, azi'ba 'bani ope 'diyi ma azi pa tuzu e'yo 'ba yini opi nyaza ni 'diyi ma dria. Azi yini 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru geri gamete ni azi ngazuri vazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'oburingaaniza, abakuru abaronzirwe baine obujunaanizibwa bw'okujwekyera ebyetengo by'abantu abu barikujwekyera. Okwetegyereza emirimo yaabo n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kwetegyereza oku gavumenti erikukora.

eng_prompt: When discussing the fundamentals of electrical systems, it's important to understand how we quantify electrical energy. Can you explain the different measurements used in electricity?
lug_prompt: Nga tukubaganya ebirowoozo ku misingi gy'amasannyalaze, kikulu okutegeera engeri gye tupimaamu amaanyi g'amasannyalaze.

lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okweyawulayawula n'obukuubagano, kya mugaso okussaawo enzikiriziganya. Okukkiriza okukolera awamu kitusobozesa okukozesa amaanyi gaffe olw'ekigendererwa ekinene.

teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda atiakatiaka keda ingungeta, ejokuna noi aimorikikin. Aimorikikin aiswamanara ingarakini oni aitwasam agogongu wok kanu aswam iboro luapolok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru esele coza azini ngiringiri be tre 'di ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi esuzu. Ti ecita ai'zu ri ni fe amani okpo amani 'diyi ayuzu e'yo azi okporu ni 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire okwebaganisamu n'obutaikirizana, n'eky'omugasho okusherura enshonga ezirikukwatanisa. Okukwatanisa nikutuhwera kukoresa amaani gaitu ahabw'ekigyendererwa ky'amaani.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and struggle, we often seek solace and guidance. Remember, no request is too small or too great; simply reach out with an open heart.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okulwana, tutera okunoonya okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi. Jjukira, tewali kusaba kutono nnyo oba kunene nnyo; yogera n'omutima oguggule.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, wamaro yenyo kwe cwiny ki tira. Wii opo ni, pe tye lega mo matidi tutwal onyo madit tutwal; nongo kony ki cwinyi ducu.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka amamus ajenanut ka atiokisio, etapit oni aimo aisinyikokinio ka aicoreta. Kiituni ebe emamei ailipasinei naedit arai naepol noi; itodolikin keda etau loepukora.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia, ama tutuni asi omiza azini driceza nda. E'yo egazu, e'yo azi mini a'izu ri eri werearu tu kaniku amboru tu; mi ma ca lu asi ngmboru si.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'oburemeezi, nitukira kuronda okuhuumurizibwa n'obuhabuzi. Ijuka, tihaine ekishabe kikye munonga nainga kihango munonga.

eng_prompt: The role of public officers is crucial in maintaining the trust and welfare of the community. Their responsibilities extend beyond individual interests, focusing on the needs and rights of all citizens.
lug_prompt: Omulimu gw'abakungu ba gavumenti mukulu nnyo mu kukuuma obwesige n'obulungi bw'ekitundu. Obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe busukka ku byetaago by'omuntu, okussa essira ku byetaago n'eddembe lya bannansi bonna.
ach_prompt: Tic pa lutic pa gamente pire tek tutwal I gwoko gen ki ber bedo pa lwak. Ticgi pe tye I kom miti pa ngat acel acel ento I kom miti ki twero pa anywali weng.
teo_prompt: Aswam naka eswamak luka apugan erai naepol noi kanu aidar amuno keda ajokis naka itunga. Aswamisinei kec mam itodolikinete ipudesia luka itunga, konye isingarenitos ipudesia keda apedorosio nuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Azi azi'ba gameteni 'diyiniri orodriru asi'baza azini aa'ta onyiru ongulumu eyini ri ma tambazu. Azi yini 'diyi aga e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi ma dria ra, asi 'bazu e'yo lepi azini driwala kari anzi dria yini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'abakozi ba gavumenti n'ogw'omugasho munonga omukureeberera obwesigye n'oburungi bw'abantu. Obujunanizibwa bwabo nibukira ahabyetengo by'omuntu, nibureetaho ebyetengo hamwe n'obugabe bwa buri muntu.

eng_prompt: Many regions struggle to achieve progress and prosperity, often hindered by systemic issues. In particular, the influence of poor governance can stifle growth and innovation.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi birwana okutuuka ku nkulaakulana n'okukulaakulana, ebitera okulemesebwa ensonga z'enkola. Okusingira ddala, obufuzi obubi busobola okulemesa enkulaakulana n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: But lobo mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo dongo lobo ki lonyo, pol kare peko me yub mapat-pat aye gengo ne. Ki lok ada, tela marac twero gengo dongo lobo ki dongo lobo manyen.
teo_prompt: Etereikina aiboisio nuipu kanu adumun apol keda abar, konye mam duc epedoritos aswam ngun. Kacut, apugan na mam ejok epedori aitikitik apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi dri ci angu ezoma esuzu tualu lonyi esuzu 'diyi pie, e'yo eyi atripi sa'wa driasi 'diyi ma e'yosi. Tutunisi, e'yo driceza onzi niri eco zota azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi nibiteganisibwa okutunguuka n'okutunguuka ahabw'eshonga z'eby'obutegyeki. Okukira munonga, obwebembezi bubi nibubaasa kuremesa entunguuka n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: The issue of theft has puzzled society for centuries, prompting many to question the underlying motivations behind such behavior. Understanding the reasons behind stealing can shed light on broader social and economic issues.
lug_prompt: Ensonga y'obubbi ebunye abantu okumala ebyasa bingi, ekiviiriddeko bangi okubuusabuusa ebigendererwa ebiri emabega w'enneeyisa ng'eyo. Okutegeera ensonga eziviirako okubba kusobola okuwa ekitangaala ku nsonga z'embeera z'abantu n'ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Lok me kwo obedo ka yelo lwak pi cencwari mapol, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom tyen lok ma okelo tim enoni. Niang tyen lok ma oweko dano kwalo kwo twero konyo me niang jami mapol ma mako kwo pa dano ki lok me lim.
teo_prompt: Ationis naka akoko nes etirorit itunga adaun ikar luipu, ido ijaikini itunga aingitun aomisio nuepedorete aingarakin kes aswam ngun. Ajenun akiro nu eyangaununete akoko epedori aitodun akiro nuikamunitos ikapun keda ejautene loka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ogu niri ebi ongulumu eyi ma aza ko ewu karakara eyi ma alea, erini fezu 'ba karakara eyini e'yo eyi 'yepi 'dile 'diyi ma dria egazu ku. E'yo oguni 'diyi vazu ri eco e'yo ongulumu eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Enshonga y'obushuma eteganisize abantu okumara ebyasha bingi, ekirikureetera abantu baingi kubuuza ebirikubareetera kukora ebintu nk'ebyo. Okwetegyereza enshonga ezirikureeta okwiba, nikibaasa kutuhwera kumanya enshonga z'abantu hamwe n'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing concerns about corruption and mismanagement, the Ugandan government has strengthened its oversight mechanisms. As part of this effort, a dedicated body was established to ensure accountability in the use of public funds.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku buli bw'enguzi n'enzirukanya embi, gavumenti ya Uganda enywezezza enkola yaayo ey'okulondoola. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ekitongole ekyesudde kyatandikibwawo okukakasa embalirira mu nkozesa y'ensimbi za gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom camcana ki tela marac, gamente me Uganda omedo rwom me doro ticgi. Macalo but tic man, kicako dul mo me neno ni kitiyo ki lim pa lwak i yo maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naikamunit amidicio naka apiyai keda eyaitene loaronon, abu apugan nako Uganda kitogogong iwaitin lu engicete. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, aponi itolomunai atukot naebeit aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo anyamgbolo ni azini driceza onzi ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete Uganda niri otu geri erini azi pamvu onezu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do amuti azi e'dapi kini 'ba ayu robia o'bi eyini ri geri kililiru si.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda eyongyeire amaani omu by'okurambura ahabw'okwerarikirira okurikweyongyera ahabw'obushomankuzi n'oburemeezi. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa kikateebwaho okureeba ngu esente za gavumenti zikozesibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: When initiating a money transfer, it's important to understand the potential risks involved. Customers often wonder about the circumstances that could lead to the cancellation of their transactions.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba otandika okutambuza ensimbi, kikulu okutegeera akabi akazingirwamu. Bakasitoma batera okwebuuza ku mbeera eziyinza okuviirako okusazaamu ebyamaguzi byabwe.
ach_prompt: Kace itye ka cako kobo cente, pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma twero bedo tye. Luwil ipol kare gipenye I kom ngo ma twero weko gi ngolo wilo gi.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aitegear aijukario naka ikapun, ejokuna amisiikin atiokisio nuejaas. Etapit duc agwelak aomoom nuikamunitos ejautene loepedori ayangaun aikisario naka agwelanar kec.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'dozu robia ma ti pezu, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru ecopi i 'yepi 'diyi vazu. Aje'ba eyi sa'wa driasi eyi osu e'yo ecopi fepi eyi ma tujari eyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooza kuhindura esente, ni kikuru kumanya akabi akarikubaasa kubaho. Bakasitoma nibakira kwebuuza aha nshonga ezirikubaasa kureetaho okushazamu emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Before proceeding with the transaction, it's important to consider any potential issues that might arise. For instance, are there any discrepancies in the recipient's information or concerns about the transaction's security?
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kugenda mu maaso n'okutunda, kikulu okulowooza ku nsonga zonna eziyinza okuvaayo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icito anyim ki timo biacara, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom peko mo keken ma twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Erongo iyatakina keda agwelanar, ejokuna aomoom akiro kere nuepedorete atakanun.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi mu drile tujari 'di be ku, eri orodriru e'yo ci ecopi e'dopi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Otakagyenzire omu maisho n'obushubuzi, ni kikuru kuteekateeka aha nshonga zoona ezirikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure efficient governance and resource allocation, the government has implemented a policy regarding the mobility of its personnel. This allows for flexibility in staffing and addressing regional needs effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa enfuga ennungi n'okugaba eby'obugagga, gavumenti etaddewo enkola ekwata ku ntambula y'abakozi baayo. Kino kisobozesa okukyusakyusa mu bakozi n'okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni gamente tye ki tela maber ki jami ma mite, gamente oketo cik me wot pa luticgi itic. Man weko dano bedo ki kare me timo tic gi ki cobo miti me but piny eni maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai epugae loajokan keda aikor iboro, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuikamunitos alosit naka eswamakake. Ingarakini ngin aijulakin eswamak ka aitemokin ipudesia luka atutubet ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo driceza kililiru ni azini lonyi awazu kililiru ri nezu, gamete 'ba azita azi'ba erini 'diyi ma acita ma dria. E'yo 'di ni fe 'ba eyini azi ngazu sa'wa driasi dika eyi ma aza ko e'yo angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho obwebembezi burungi hamwe n'okuheereza abantu ebintu, gavumenti eteireho engyenderwaho y'okutambura kw'abakozi baayo. Eki nikibaasisa okukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe omu kukora ahabyetaago by'ekyanga omu muringo murungi.

eng_prompt: In any organization, understanding the hierarchy and responsibilities of key positions is crucial for effective management. One such position that often raises questions is that of the deputy chief administrative officer.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okutegeera obukulembeze n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ebifo ebikulu bya mugaso nnyo eri enzirukanya ennungi. Ekimu ku bifo ng'ebyo ebitera okuleetawo ebibuuzo kye ky'omumyuka w'akulira emirimu.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, niang rwom ki tic pa lutic mapigi tego obedo gin ma pire tek pi tela maber. Kabedo acel ma pol kare kelo lapeny obedo macalo lalub kor lador dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, amisikin adoketait keda aswamisinei nuka aiboisio nuapolok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu eyaitene loajokan. Adiopet kotoma aiboisit kangin na eyangauni aingiseta ngesi naka atupiton eswaman loapolon loka eyaitene.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo vata ma dria azini azi pari okporu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru e'yo driceza kililiru niri ni. Pari azi alu 'dile 'bani sawa driasi zita ejipi ri eri endru drice'ba e'yo driceza ni 'diyiniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, okwetegyereza obwebembezi n'obujunaanizibwa bw'emyanya mikuru n'eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'obwebembezi burungi. Omwanya gumwe ogurikukira kureetaho ebibuuzo, n'ogw'omumyoka w'orikukurira eby'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges we've faced, it's crucial to evaluate our current processes. What strategies can we implement to enhance our investigative procedures?
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kwe twolekaganye nakwo gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okwekenneenya enkola zaffe eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma wanongo cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda oni pac, ejokuna aanyanar eipone lo iswamai oni kopana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amani esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru geri amani azi ngazu sawa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu tutungire, ni kikuru kushwijuma enkora yaitu eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: In a bid to maintain public safety, law enforcement actively patrols the streets. Their primary goal is to ensure that justice is served and that those who break the law are held accountable.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obukuumi bw'abantu, abakuumaddembe balawuna enguudo. Ekiruubirirwa kyabwe ekikulu kwe kukakasa nti obwenkanya buweebwa era nti abo abamenya amateeka bavunaanibwa.
ach_prompt: I yub me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak, abili tye ka wot I gudu. Miti gi madit tye me neno ni ngol matir otime dok bene ki ngolo kop iwi joo ma turu cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ayuara na itunga, ewanyunitos ipolisin irotin. Alosikinetekec naepol ngesi awanyun ebe itodolikinitai etube loajokan keda ngul lu ebilibilete ikisila.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma ageitema ma ta mbazu, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi acita nzila dria 'diyi 'ye avasi. Asisile yini okori lezu ndrezu kini 'ba ma esu e'yo liza kililiru azini kini 'ba azita nyo'baa 'diyi nga e'yo 'ye ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obusingye bw'abantu, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro nibarambura enguuto. Ekigyendererwa kyabo ekikuru n'okureeba ngu oburingaaniza bubaho kandi abo abarikuhenda ebiragiro bakajunanwa.

eng_prompt: In a society grappling with rising crime rates, many are questioning the effectiveness of traditional law enforcement methods. Some argue that simply apprehending offenders may not address the root causes of criminal behavior.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekirwanagana n'obuzzi bw'emisango obweyongera, bangi babuusabuusa obulungi bw'enkola ez'edda ez'okukwasisa amateeka. Abamu bagamba nti okukwata abamenyi b'amateeka kyokka tekiyinza kumalawo nsibuko y'ebikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano tye ka lweny ki rwom me timo bal matye kamede, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom yoo me gwoko cik macon. Jo mukene giwaco ni mako lutim bal keken pe romo cobo peko ma kelo tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejaasi keda abilibilio naka ikisila, mam itunga luipu ejenete ajokis naka iponesio luka apugan. Ebakasi ice ebe aikamanario naka itunga lumam iswamaete ejok mam epedori aitemokin atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi ngapi e'yo onzi ma omgbo tupi 'diyi be 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ega geri 'bani azita eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma orodri ma dria. Ba azi 'diyi 'yo kini lu 'ba e'yo onzi 'ye'baa 'diyi obizu ri econi e'yo e'yo onzi 'ye'baa 'diyi ma e'yo otu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikurwana n'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire, baingi nibabangaanisa omugasho gw'enkora eya ira y'okukuratira ebiragiro. Abamwe nibagira ngu okukwata abakozi b'ebihagaro tikirikubaasa kumaraho oburemeezi oburikubareetera kukora ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the villagers gathered to discuss their plans for the evening. They needed to decide on the best time for him to leave before darkness fell.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abantu b'oku kyalo baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka zaabwe ez'akawungeezi. Baali beetaaga okusalawo ku kiseera ekituufu eky'okugendamu ng'obudde tebunnaziba.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, lwak gugure me nywako lok I kom yubgi pi otyeno. Onongo omyero gumok tamgi I kom kare maber me aa ne ma piny peya odoko col.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu itunga luka ecalo kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit kesi aswam atibong. Akoto kes aseun apak najokan kanu ngesi anyoun eringa akwap emutono.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, 'ba calua 'diyi tra eyi e'yo onzezu otita eyini 'diyi ma dria ondresi. Le eyi ma 'du e'yo sa'wa muke ndeni eyini muzu ri ma dria de nga po'di angu ecani ku.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurenga, abantu b'omukyaro baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nteekateeka zaabo ez'omwebazyo. Bakaba beine kusharaho obwire burungi bw'okurugaho omwirima gutakakwatsire.

eng_prompt: Many organizations struggle with employee engagement and attendance issues. As a result, absenteeism could be a leading factor for poor performance.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole bingi birwanagana n'ensonga z'okwenyigiramu kw'abakozi n'okubaawo kwabwe. N'ekyavaamu, okusubwa ku ssomero kuyinza okuba nga kye kisinga okuviirako okukola obubi.
ach_prompt: Dule mapol gitye ki peko me neno ni lutic gi timo tic gi maber. Macalo adwogi ne, keng kwan twero bedo tyen lok acel ma oweko lutino pe timo maber.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu ejaas keda ationis na eswamae keda eswamak. Kanuka ngun, amamus aswam erai ibore yenepedori ayangaun eswamae loaronon.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi dri ci e'yo azi'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri pie. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi apazu sukulu'a ku ri eco adri e'yo azi ngazu muke ku ni i.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebingi nibirwana n'eshonga z'abakozi kwejumba omu mirimo n'okugyenda. N'ekyarugiremu, okuruga omu mashomero nikibaasa kuba enshonga nkuru erikureetera abeegi kukora kubi.

eng_prompt: Financial disagreements often stem from misunderstandings or differing expectations. When emotions run high, resolving these conflicts can become particularly challenging.
lug_prompt: Obutakkaanya mu by'ensimbi butera kuva ku butategeeragana oba ebisuubirwa eby'enjawulo. Enneewulira bwe ziba waggulu, okugonjoola obukuubagano buno kiyinza okuba ekizibu ennyo.
ach_prompt: Telo tol ikit me lim ipol kare aa ki I kom niang ma goro onyo bedo ki gen mapat-pat. Kace cwer cwiny tye malo, tyeko telle magi twero doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Atiakatiaka nuka ikapun etapit duc alomun kama ejaasi amamut acamanara arai aomisio nuegelegela. Arai ejai epone loepol noi, etiono aitemokin atiokisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako robia ma dria 'diyi tutuni enga e'yo vata ako si kani ku e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma eselea 'diyisi. E'yo ewaru ka ovu uru, e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu eca ewaru tu.
nyn_prompt: Obutaikirizana omu by'empiiha buriijo nibubaho ahabw'obutetegyerezana nainga ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana. Ebiteekateeko byaaba biri ahaiguru, okukora aha nshonga ezi nikibaasa kugumira munonga.

eng_prompt: After decades of dedicated service, he felt a mix of nostalgia and excitement as he prepared for the next chapter of his life. The day had finally come for him to pass the torch to the new manager.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza n'obunyiikivu, yawulira ekiwuubaalo n'essanyu nga yeetegekera essuula eddako mu bulamu bwe. Olunaku lwali lutuuse okuwaayo omumuli eri maneja omupya.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek, en obedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma en tye ka yubbe pi dul me kwone manyen. Nino onongo dong oromo pi en me cwalo mac bot ladit tic manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin, abu ngesi kopup aiyalongong keda aiyalama naarai akapakina ngesi kanuka atutubet naetupakini kotoma aijarake. Adolu kwana apaaran kanu ngesi aijukar akiro mama ejai eyaitonikec loitetet.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara erini azi ngazu asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, eri etumu asi otiza azini ayiko erini i otuzu e'yo idri erini vileri ma drilia. O'du 'di eca asizu erini aci nderi fezu 'ba ocepiri dri.

eng_prompt: As we embark on this journey, it's essential that we unite our efforts and resources. Collaboration will be key to our success in reaching the objectives we've outlined.
lug_prompt: Nga tutandika olugendo luno, kikulu nnyo okwegatta. Okukwatagana kujja kuba kisumuluzo ky'obuwanguzi bwaffe mu kutuukiriza ebigendererwa bye tutaddewo.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka cako wot man, pire tek tutwal ni warib kero wa ki jami ma watye kwede. Winye obi bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me cobo miti ma watye kwede.

eng_prompt: As the year comes to a close, communities around the world begin to light up with joy and anticipation. Families gather, traditions are honored, and a sense of togetherness fills the air.

eng_prompt: In times of hardship and uncertainty, many find solace in the belief that a higher power watches over them. This understanding often leads to the realization that God is very gracious.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obuzibu n'obutali bukakafu, bangi bafuna okubudaabudibwa mu kukkiriza nti amaanyi aga waggulu gabatunuulira. Okutegeera kuno kutera okutuleetera okukitegeera nti Katonda wa kisa nnyo.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with judgment and expectations, it's important to remember that each person is unique and deserving of love. Embracing our differences allows us to see the beauty in humanity.

ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki ngolo kop ki gen, pire tek me poo ni dano acel-acel pat dok opore me mar. Jolo apoka-poka ma watye kwede weko waneno ber pa dano.

eng_prompt: Every year, families gather to honor a special occasion filled with joy and love. This day holds significant meaning for many around the world.
lug_prompt: Buli mwaka, amaka gakungaana okussa ekitiibwa mu mukolo ogw'enjawulo ogujjudde essanyu n'omukwano. Olunaku luno lukulu nnyo eri abantu bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna.

eng_prompt: In a time of great turmoil and despair, humanity longed for a savior to bring hope and redemption. Prophecies foretold the arrival of a miraculous child who would change the course of history.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'obutabanguko n'okuggwaamu essuubi, abantu beegomba omulokozi okuleeta essuubi n'obununuzi. Obunabbi bwalagula okujja kw'omwana ow'ekyamagero eyali agenda okukyusa ebyafaayo.

eng_prompt: As the holiday season approaches, many families begin to budget for the various celebrations and traditions they cherish. This time of year often brings a surge in expenses as people prepare to gather and celebrate with loved ones.

eng_prompt: As the holiday season approaches, many families begin to plan their celebrations and gift-giving. This often leads to increased budgeting and spending in various areas.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'ennaku enkulu bwe kisembera, amaka mangi gatandika okutegeka ebikujjuko n'okugaba ebirabo. Kino kitera okuvaako okwongera ku mbalirira n'ensaasaanya mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: In today's society, the spread of misinformation can have serious consequences for individuals and communities alike. Many are beginning to question the ethical implications of sharing unverified information.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino, okusaasaana kw'amawulire amakyamu kusobola okuba n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu byombi. Bangi batandise okubuusabuusa ebiva mu kugabana amawulire agatannaba kukakasibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, nyayo lok goba twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal I kom dano ki kabedo mapat-pat. Dano mapol tye ka cako bedo ki akala-kala I kom ber bedo pa poko ngec ma pe kimoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, awea naka akiro nuarokok epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok mama ejaasi itunga keda atutubena. Egeunete itunga luipu abuonokin nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aimor akiro numam itigogongoritai.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, o'duko enzoru 'diyi ma ereta eco e'yo onzi eji 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni azini ongulumu yi dria indi. Ba karakara eyi e'do e'yo ega e'yo adriza muke 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi awazu ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Exploring the teachings of various religious texts can deepen our understanding of faith. One of the most profound ways to connect with spirituality is by studying the life and messages of Jesus Christ.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza ku njigiriza z'ebitabo by'enzikiriza eby'enjawulo kisobola okwongera ku kutegeera kwaffe ku nzikiriza. Emu ku ngeri ezisinga okukwatagana n'eby'omwoyo kwe kusoma obulamu n'obubaka bwa Yesu Kristo.
ach_prompt: Kwed I kom pwony me bukke me dini ma padi padi twero medo niango wa I kom niye. Yo acel maber loyo me kube ki jami me cwiny obedo kwano kwo ki kwena pa Yecu Kricito.
teo_prompt: Aingic aisisianakino naka iitabon lu ediini luegelegela epedori aitogogong amisiikin wok naikamunit aiyuunikec. Ediopet koboro luepolok noi luepedorete aimorikikin keda akiro nukajokak ngesi aisisia aijar keda akiro nuka Yesu Kristo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita dini ni ndundu 'diyi ma ale andrizu ri eco ama ma vata aita ma dria ri ma omgbo otu ra. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu eyi ecizu e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma alea ri eri geri 'bani e'yo eyi onizu idri azini o'dukoti Yesu kristo ni 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: In times of desperation, some individuals may contemplate unethical actions to solve their financial problems. One might wonder about the lengths to which people will go when faced with overwhelming debt.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okuggwaamu essuubi, abantu abamu bayinza okulowooza ku bikolwa ebitali bya mpisa okugonjoola ebizibu byabwe eby'ensimbi. Omuntu ayinza okwebuuza wa abantu we banaatuukira nga boolekaganye n'amabanja agasukkiridde.
ach_prompt: Ikare me can cente, dano mukene tamo I kom tim ma pe ber me tyeko peko me limgi. Ngat moni twero bedo ki ngeng I kom jami ma dano twero timo kace gitye ki banya mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka amamus aijar, epedorete itunga ice aswam iboro lumam iswamaete ejok kanu aitemokin atiokisio kec nuka ikapun. Ipedori itunganan aomoom aiboisio nuepedorete itunga alosit arai ejaas keda apesenin nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia, 'ba azi 'diyi eco e'yo onzi 'ye e'yo robia ni yini 'diyi ma aza kozu ra. Ba azi eco nga osu e'yo 'ba eyini nga mu kpere ngopi 'diyi ma dria eyini e'yo mari ni 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwerarikirira, abantu abamwe nibabaasa kuteekateeka aha bikorwa ebitahikire kumaraho oburemeezi bwabo bw'esente. Omuntu naabaasa kwebuuza oku abantu barikuza kuhika baaba baine amabanja maingi munonga.

eng_prompt: When evaluating different methods of achieving a goal, it's important to consider the ethical implications involved. Some approaches may raise questions about their legitimacy or morality, leading to a discussion on dubious ways.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okutuuka ku kiruubirirwa, kya mugaso okulowooza ku bikwatagana nabyo mu mpisa. Enkola ezimu ziyinza okuleetawo ebibuuzo ku bukyamu bwazo oba empisa, ekiviirako okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu ngeri ezibuusibwabuusibwa.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka ngiyo yoo mapat-pat me cobo miti, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom cik ma kwako tic. Yoo mukene twero kelo lapeny I kom twero gi onyo kitgi, ma kelo nywako lok I yoo mapat-pat matye ki akala-kala.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aanyanar iwaitin luegelegela luka aitodolikin apeleikinata, ejokuna aomoom nuikamunitos iponesio lukajokak. Icie iwaitin epedorete aitolomun aingiseta nuikamunitos abeit kec keda iponesiokec, eyangauni aineranara koiponesio lumam ecamunitai.
lgg_prompt: Geri ndu ndu 'bani ecozu e'yo azi esuzu 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri orodriru egazu e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria. Geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma azi eyi nga e'yo eji e'yo eyini aa'zu kililiru ri ma dria, dika eyi eco e'yo nze geri 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma dria ra.

Enkora ezimwe nizibaasa kureetaho ebibuuzo ebirikukwata aha buhikire bwazo n'emitwarize yaazo, ekirikureetaho okuhanuura omu miringo etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In any organization, ensuring financial integrity and compliance is crucial. To achieve this, specialized professionals are tasked with overseeing the evaluation of financial records.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okukakasa obutuufu bw'ensimbi n'okugoberera amateeka kikulu nnyo. Okutuukiriza kino, abakugu baweebwa omulimu gw'okulondoola okwetegereza ebiwandiiko by'ensimbi.

teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, aanyun ebe ejokuna ikapun ka aitup ikisila erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ijaikitai ipirioitin aingic aanyanario naka aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini azita vuti obiza ma dria ri eri orodriru. E'yo 'di 'yezu, 'ba 'ba nita be e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, okureeba ngu eby'empiiha nibigyendera aha biragiro n'eky'omugasho munonga. Okuhikiiriza eki, abakugu nibaheebwa omurimo gw'okureeberera okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'esente.

eng_prompt: In today's complex financial landscape, businesses face numerous challenges that require expert guidance. To navigate these difficulties effectively, professional expertise is essential.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyensimbi enzibu ey'ennaku zino, bizinensi zisanga okusoomoozebwa kungi okwetaaga okulambikibwa abakugu. Okusobola okwaŋŋanga ebizibu bino obulungi, obumanyirivu bw'abakugu bwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: I kare me can lim ma ite kare ni, biacara nongo peko mapol ma mito kony pa ludiro. Pi lweny i kom peko magi maber, diro pa ludiro obedo gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loka ikapun, ejaas ibiasaran keda atiokisio nuipu nu ekotosi aingarenikinio naka ipirioitin. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejok, epolok noi aijen naka ipirioitin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, tujari eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eyini ani lezu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi ma fe eyidri imbata ra. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, ondua 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera y'eby'empiiha ey'erizooba, bizinesi nizitunga oburemeezi bwingi oburikwetenga obuhabuzi bw'abakugu. Okumaraho oburemeezi obu kurungi, obukugu bw'abakugu n'obw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent financial challenges and declining donations, the church leadership is reevaluating its budget. They have concluded that prudent financial management is essential for future sustainability.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyensimbi gye buvuddeko n'okukendeera kw'obuyambi, obukulembeze bw'ekkanisa buli mu kwekenneenya embalirira yaayo. Baamalirizza nti enkwata y'ensimbi ey'obwegendereza ya mugaso mu biseera eby'omu maaso eby'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim matye cokcok-ki kacel ki wel lim matye kadok piny, lutela me kanica tye ka ngiyo kor byek limgi. Guwaco ni gwoko lim maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun keda aitidisiario naka agangat, eutasi engarenok luka ekanisa airereor ebajet ke. Apotu kesi kongetakisi ebe eyaitene loajokan lo ikapun erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini afa feza ma omgbo esizu 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza kanisa niri ni otita aje robia niri ma ale andri dika. Eyi esu egata kini geri robia ayuzuri ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru ewu drialeri ni aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obwahwireho hamwe n'okutuubya kw'obuhwezi, abebembezi b'ekanisa bariyo nibagaruka bashwijume embaririra yaabo. Bakahendera ngu okukoresa kurungi esente n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obuhangwa bw'ensi omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In any financial system, transparency is crucial for maintaining trust and integrity. Therefore, it is essential to ensure that all transactions are properly documented.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yonna ey'ebyensimbi, obwerufu kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obwesige n'obwesimbu. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okukakasa nti byonna ebikolebwa biwandiikibwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: I yub mo keken me lim, bedo ki ada pire tek tutwal pi gwoko gen ki ber bedo. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me neno ni kitiko coyo jami weng ma mite me cato wil.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ainapeta nuka ikapun, iswamae lo ecai nes ejok kanu aidar amunokina keda abeit. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna awanyun ebe iwadikatai iboro kere lu iswamao.
lgg_prompt: Geri dria robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ada eri orodriru asi'baza azini e'yo ada ma tambazu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo dria 'bani 'ye 'diyi osi kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'eby'empiiha yoona, oburingaaniza n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigye n'obwesigwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu eby'obushubuzi byona bihandiikwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In today's uncertain economic climate, it's crucial to be mindful of your financial security. Consider implementing strategies that will help you protect your assets.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'eby'enfuna etali nnungi leero, kikulu nnyo okufaayo ku by'ensimbi byo. Lowooza ku ky'okussa mu nkola obukodyo obujja okukuyamba okukuuma eby'obugagga byo.
ach_prompt: I kare man me can lim, pire tek tutwal me gwoko cente ni. Tam kong I kom keto yoo me tic ma bikonyi me gwoko lonyo ni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loaronon loka ikapun, ejokuna noi apodokinit aijar kon naka ikapun. Koomoom nu aitegear iwaitin lu ingarakinete ijo ayuarite iborokon.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru aa'zu mile be e'yo mini robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Le mi ma ega e'yo geri mini ecozu mi ma lonyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma 'yeta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'eby'entaasya butarikwetegyerezibwa, n'eky'omugasho okwerinda esente zaawe. Teekateeka aha kukoresa oburyo oburikwija kukuhwera kurinda ebintu byawe.

eng_prompt: It's important to keep track of your finances, especially when handling physical currency. Many people underestimate how quickly cash can disappear if not properly managed.
lug_prompt: Kikulu okulondoola ensimbi zo naddala ng'okozesa ssente eza bulijjo. Abantu bangi banyooma engeri ssente enkalu gye ziyinza okubula amangu singa tezikozesebwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me lubu kor tic ki cente mamegi, tutwalle ka itye ka tic ki cente. Dano mapol pe gingeyo kit ma cente rweny kwede oyot ka pe kitiyo kwede maber.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aingic ikapun kon kacut neipedoria jo aitosom ikapun. Mam itunga luipu ejenete epone loepedoriata ikapun aibiror atipet arai mam eyaitai ejok.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru mi ma robia ma pamvu ma ta mbazuri ma ta mbazuri ma ta mbazuri ma ta mbazuri ma ta mbazuri ma ta mbazuri ma ta mbazuri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi 'du e'yo robia ni avizu mbeleru ri ma omgbo va 'ba ka eri ayu kililiru ku ria.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okukuratira esente zaawe, namunonga waaba nookora n'esente ez'omubiri. Abantu baingi nibamanya ngu esente nizibaasa kuhwaho ahonaaho zaaba zitarikukoresibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: When someone has wronged another person, it's often important to express remorse and seek forgiveness. One common way to do this is by writing an apology letter.
lug_prompt: Omuntu bw'ayisa obubi omuntu omulala, kya mugaso okwejjusa n'okusaba okusonyiyibwa. Engeri emu ey'okukola kino kwe kuwandiika ebbaluwa y'okwetonda.
ach_prompt: Kace ngat moni otimo gin marac i kom ngat mukene, pire tek tutwal me nyutu cwer cwiny ki kwayo kica. Yo acel me timo man en aye me coyo waraga me kwayo kica.
teo_prompt: Arai itisilanari itunganan icie itunganan, ejokuna duc aitoronikin ka ailip aitimio. Epone ediope loka aswam ngun ngesi aiwadik ebaluwa lo aitironikin.
lgg_prompt: Ba azi ka e'yo onzi 'ye 'ba azini ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo ecezu azini truta ai'zu. Geri alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri si waraga truta aizu ri si.

eng_prompt: Corruption has become a pervasive issue within many religious institutions, undermining their integrity and mission. As communities seek to restore trust and accountability, it's crucial to explore effective strategies for reform.
lug_prompt: Obuli bw'enguzi bufuuse ensonga ejjudde mu bitongole by'eddiini bingi, ekityoboola obwesimbu bwaabyo n'ekigendererwa kyabyo. Nga abantu bagezaako okuzzaawo obwesige n'obuvunaanyizibwa, kikulu nnyo okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ez'okukyusaamu.
ach_prompt: Camucana odoko peko madit tutwal I dul me dini mapol, ma balo ber bedo gi ki tic gi. I kare ma lwak tye ka yenyo yoo me dwoko gen ki kor tic gi, pire tek tutwal me yenyo yoo maber me kelo aloka loka.
teo_prompt: Amidicio naka apiyai erai ationis naepol noi kotoma iriongeta lu idiinin luipu, ido itolitoli aiyuwara kec keda aswamukec. Kwape ekotosi itunga ainyakakin amunokina keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere iboro, epolok noi aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aijulakin akiro.

eng_prompt: In many societies, various institutions operate under distinct systems of leadership and decision-making. One such institution is the Church, which has a different form of governance.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bikola wansi w'enkola ez'enjawulo ez'obukulembeze n'okusalawo. Ekimu ku bitongole ng'ebyo ye kkanisa, erina enfuga ya njawulo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, dul mapat-pat tiyo ite tela mapat-pat ki yoo me moko tam mapat-pat. Dul acel ma kit meno obedo kanica, ma tye ki tela mapat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, iswamaete iriongeta luegelegela kotoma epone loka aingarenikin keda aitolomunun aseununeta. Adiopet kotoma oriongeta ngun ngesi ekanisa, loejaatar keda epone loegelegela loka aipuga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, amuti ndundu eyi azi nga geri ndundu driceza ni azini peta pezu 'diyi ma alea. Amuti alu 'dile 'diyi kanisa ni, eri ma driceza nduni ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, ebitongore ebitarikushushana nibikora omu mitendera etarikushushana y'obwebembezi n'okusharamu. Eitendekyero rimwe nk'eryo n'ekanisa, erikwebemberwa omu muringo gw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there have been alarming reports of increased violence and armed confrontations in various regions of Uganda. This has raised concerns about the security of military equipment and the potential for civilians to access weapons meant for the Uganda People's Defence Force.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo alipoota ezitiisa ez'obutabanguko n'okulwanagana mu bitundu bya Uganda eby'enjawulo. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku bukuumi bw'ebikozesebwa mu magye n'obusobozi bw'abantu ba bulijjo okufuna ebyokulwanyisa ebigendereddwamu Uganda People's Defence Force.

teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, ejaasi iripotan luitukurianete nuikamunitos amumu keda ingungeta luipu noi kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela koUganda. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos ayuwara naka iswamasia luka ajore keda apedor naka itunga adumunun imudun luka ajore nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, o'duko asi otiza fepi e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo a'di 'diza nyafe be 'diyi ma omgbo kari Uganda niri ma woko ndundu 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria 'diyi ebi ovu ci. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo ageitema nyafe marani ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'ba asikari ru ku 'diyi ni nyafe amuti ageyitema ni Uganda People's Defence Forces ni 'diyi esuzu ri ma dria.

Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda by'ebikwato by'amahe hamwe n'okubaasa kw'abantu ba buriijo kutunga ebikwato by'amahe ga Uganda People's Defence Forces.

lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko bw'ebyokwerinda obwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, abakungu bagezaako okuzuula ebyaliwo ebyaviirako emmundu eziwerako okubula.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bal me gwoko kuc ma otime cokcok-ki, lutic tye ka yele me niang ngo ma otimme ma oweko muduku mapol orweny.

eng_prompt: Recent spikes in violent crime have left residents feeling vulnerable and anxious. As fear grows, many are questioning their safety and the effectiveness of local law enforcement.

eng_prompt: In today's world, the role of security agencies has become increasingly vital. They are tasked with protecting not only property and assets but also the safety of individuals in various situations.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, omulimu gw'ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda gweyongedde okuba ogw'omugaso. Baweereddwa omulimu gw'okukuuma si bintu byokka wabula n'obukuumi bw'abantu mu mbeera ez'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: Community engagement plays a crucial role in maintaining safety and order. By fostering strong relationships between law enforcement and citizens, we can create a collaborative environment for crime prevention.

ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona omede, lutic me tedero gulwongo kacoke me laro lok i kom ngo ma omyero kitim. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi ni cik matek omyero ki ket pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak.

ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lwak tye ki lworo I kom medde pa timo bal, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me bedo ki kacoke me gwoko kuc me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko ne. Lutedero mapol cwinygi pe obedo yom I kare ma guniang ni abili pe gubedo tye I kacoke me gwoko kuc.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous attempts to reach him, the media team struggled to get in touch with the spokesman. They had hoped to clarify the situation before the press conference began.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in COVID-19 cases, health officials are urging citizens to take necessary precautions. To ensure the safety of all, it is crucial to stay informed about the latest recommendations from government leaders.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza bannansi okwegendereza. Okukakasa obukuumi bwa buli omu, kya mugaso nnyo okubeera omumanyifu ku biteeso ebipya okuva mu bakulembeze ba gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In response to rising insecurity and wildlife threats in rural areas, local communities have organized night patrols. These dedicated volunteers have adopted traditional methods to protect their villages and livestock.

lgg_prompt: Erita ako 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da be 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ari polisi nya'biliko esupi 'da arojoa. Drilebaru, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi nga azi mbeleru eri ma idri otuzu.

eng_prompt: After the accident occurred, emergency services quickly arrived at the scene. The injured officer was in need of immediate medical attention.
lug_prompt: Akabenje bwe kaagwawo, abasawo b'amangu baatuuka mangu mu kifo awaagudde akabenje. Omuserikale eyalumizibwa yali yeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'amangu.

ach_prompt: Ingee wot mabor dok marac tutwal, luwot ma onongo guol dong guo I wang lobo, kun giyenyo gwok ki acaki manyen. Dul mapat-pat me tedero guribbe oyot-oyot me miyo kony bot lupeko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka alosit naelwana noi, apotu alotok lu apasit kodolokisi oikoru, aimo ayuwara keda ageunet naitetet. Apotu iriongeta luka atutubet kiswamata katipet kanu aijaikin agangat nejaas lu ican.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing crisis, local organizations organized a fundraising event. Many residents felt compelled to help those in need and came together to support the displaced families.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ekigenda kyeyongera, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byategese omukolo gw'okusonda ssente. Abatuuze bangi baawulira nga bawalirizibwa okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu era ne bakolera wamu okuyamba amaka agaasengulwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, dule me tedero guyubu yub me jogo cente. Lutedero mapol guwinyo ni omyero gukony joo ma peko tye i komgi dok gu ribe kacel me konyo lugangi ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the crisis, humanitarian organizations mobilized to address the urgent needs of those displaced by conflict. Among the various forms of assistance, ensuring access to sustenance became a top priority.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu buzibu, ebitongole ebiyamba abantu byekungaana okukola ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'abo abaasengulwa entalo. Mu ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'obuyambi, okukakasa okufuna eby'okweyimirizaawo kyafuuka ekintu ekikulu.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by underfunded organizations, the group decided to take action. After careful consideration, they identified those in greatest need of support.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing challenges faced by local agriculture, several organizations have come together to raise funds. These contributions will be directed towards supporting various initiatives aimed at enhancing farming practices.

eng_prompt: After months of uncertainty and struggle, the refugee finally received assistance from a local charity. With the support they provided, he expressed his relief and gratitude for the opportunity to provide for his family.

eng_prompt: After days of uncertainty and hunger, the refugee stood in line, anxiously waiting for assistance. When the aid workers finally handed him a package, hope flickered in his eyes.

ach_prompt: Ingee nino mapol me peko ki kec, luring ayela ne gucung I lain kun kuro kony ki mit kom. I kare ma lutic me miyo kony gumiye gin mo, gen ocako ryeny I wange.

lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'abantu obugenda mu maaso, ekitongole kyaffe kitongoza enteekateeka empya okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu. Okukola enkyukakyuka ey'omugaso, tutuukirira abantu mu kitundu kyaffe okufuna obuyambi.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho, ekitongore kyaitu kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi. Okukora empindahinduka y'omugasho, turiyo nituhika aha bantu b'omubyaro byaitu kutunga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Many vulnerable communities around the world are facing unprecedented challenges. Among them, the refugees are struggling to cope with the additional hardships brought on by the pandemic.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abateesobola okwetooloola ensi yonna boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo. Mu bano, abanoonyiboobubudamu balwana okugumira ebizibu ebirala ebyaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi.

nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abatarikwebaasa omu nsi yoona, nibatunga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo. Omuri bo, empungi nizirwana kurwanisa oburemeezi oburikureetwaho oburwaire.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to spread, the conditions in the refugee camp have become increasingly dire. With limited resources and overcrowding, the situation poses a significant risk to the health and safety of the inhabitants.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okusaasaana, embeera mu nkambi y'abanoonyiboobubudamu yeeyongedde okuba embi. Olw'ebikozesebwa ebitono n'omujjuzo, embeera eteeka obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abatuuze mu matigga.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a successful integration process, it is essential to address the broader challenges faced by the refugee population. This includes not only immediate assistance but also long-term support and resources.

lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru emunyale eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Di ma alia lu azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ku te vini azakoma sawa ezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi indi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support women's health and hygiene, we are launching a new initiative. As part of this program, selected women will receive sanitary towels.

teo_prompt: Kanu aigang angaleu naka angor keda aila, iuta sio aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, epote angor nu eseunitai adumun ataulon.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu atita fezu e'yo rua ala ni oku eyini 'diyi ma dria, ama otuta azi o'diru ni e'do. Otita 'di ma azi ru, oku 'bani pele 'diyi nga afa sizu 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika eby'amagara n'obuyonjo bw'abakazi, turiyo nitutongoza enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha puroguraamu egi, abakazi abatoorainwe nibaija kutunga zaatawuli z'okweyonja.

eng_prompt: As the tension in the air thickened, shadows danced under the flickering lights of the abandoned warehouse. Suddenly, a figure emerged from the darkness, prompting the night guard to react instinctively.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation and several eyewitness accounts, the authorities located the scene of the crime. They carefully searched the area for any evidence that could lead them to the suspect.

ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut ki lok pa lucaden mapol, lutela gunongo kabedo ma bal otime iye. Gukwedo kabedo ne maber tutwal me nongo caden mo keken ma twero terogi I kom ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the residents came together to improve their neighborhood. Their efforts did not go unnoticed, as the local council recognized their commitment to making a positive impact.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, abatuuze baakolera wamu okutumbula ekitundu kyabwe. Kaweefube waabwe teyabulawo, nga akakiiko k'ekyalo bwe kaategeera obumalirivu bwabwe mu kukola enkyukakyuka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek, lutedero guribe kacel me yubu kabedo gi. Tute gi pe okato labongo ngec, pien lutela me tedero guneno miti gi me kelo adwogi maber.

lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi emu tualu angu eyivile 'diyi otuzu. Okpo eyini 'ba 'diyi awini mu e'yo kokoru ku, kanisulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu asi 'baza eyini e'yo 'yezu muke ri ra.

eng_prompt: After hours of intense fighting, the medics finally reached the injured man on the battlefield. They worked tirelessly to stabilize his condition and transport him to safety.

ach_prompt: Ingee lweny matek tutwal pi cawa malac, lutic yoto kom i agiki ne guo bot ngat ma onongo awano I bar lweny. Gutiyo matek tutwal me yubu kit ma en tye kwede ki me tere I kabedo maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka ejie, apotu imurok odolokisi itunganan yenemusunguna kotoma ojie. Apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu kanu aitapatan ejauteneke kosodete ayangar ngesi aiboisit naeyuwara.
lgg_prompt: Sawa a'di 'diza okporu ma vutia, 'ba arojo ni 'diyi ca asizu agu nya'biliko esupi 'da vu pari a'di niri ma alia ra. Eyi nga azi okpo kokoru eri ma wura otuzu eyini ani eri ojizu angu kililiru ni ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurwana kumara eshaaha nyingi, abashaho bakahika aha musheija owahutaziibwe. Bakakora n'amaani okutereeza embeera ye n'okumutwara omu mwanya ogutaine kabi.

eng_prompt: After the intense battle, the medics rushed to assess the injuries of the soldiers. Among them, one particular soldier showed signs of a severe head injury.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose in the neighborhood, the local authorities increased their presence to maintain order. During one of these late-night shifts, he was shot while on curfew patrol.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo beeyongedde okubeerawo okukuuma emirembe. Mu kimu ku biseera bino eby'ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero, yakubwa amasasi ng'ali ku patrol ya kafyu.

eng_prompt: The chaotic scene unfolded quickly, with witnesses scattering in all directions. Amid the confusion, the sound of gunfire echoed, leaving everyone in shock.
lug_prompt: Akavuyo kabaddewo mangu, nga abajulizi basaasaanidde mu buli ludda. Wakati mu butabanguko, amaloboozi g'amasasi gaavuddeyo ne galeka buli omu mu kutya.

teo_prompt: Neautar imurok alosit aiboisit na ejie, apotu kesi owanyutu aimusunget naka isirikaalei luapotu kotwaka. Kokidingikec, ajai ediopesirikale loejaasi toma alupok, mam epedori aiyeng karaida ejai amumu.
lgg_prompt: Dakitari yini arizu pari a'di niri ma alia, yi andri nya'biliko asikari e'depi 'diyi ni 'diyi ra. Yi ma eselea, asikari alu ri o'be nyaku dria, ava 'yaza erini ri okpo kokoru e'yo ngiringiri ni eri ma ageia 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Obu abashaho baabaire nibairukira omu mwanya gw'orutaro, bakashwijuma obuhuta bw'abaserukare abagwire. Omuri bo, omuserukare omwe akaba agwejegyeire ahansi, arikwitsya n'obu haraabe haabaire hariho akavuyo kamwetooroire.

eng_prompt: After assessing the situation, they noticed he was in considerable pain, even though he tried to downplay it. Concerned for his well-being, they gathered around him to discuss their next steps.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera, baakizuula nti yali mu bulumi obw'amaanyi, wadde nga yagezaako okubukendeeza. Olw'okufaayo ku mbeera ye ennungi, baakuŋŋaana okumwetooloola okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiddako.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede, guneno ni en tye ki arem mapol, kadi bed ni en oteme me cayo ne. Pi lworo ma gubedo kwede i kom kwo ne, gucokke me lok I kom ngo ma omyero gutim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ejautene, apotu kesi kowanyutu ebe ajai ngesi toma ariebo naepol, karaida etamit ngesi aitidisiar ngun. Kanu apodokinit aijarake, apotu kesi kimorikikinos keda ngesi kanu aitemitem nu ebeit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo nderi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ndre kini eri suta ma alea saaru, erini tro o'bizu e'yo nde 'yezu ku ra ti. Asi 'baza eri ma ta mbaza ma e'yosi, eyi tra eyi eri ma ageyia agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye drile ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera, bakareeba ngu akaba aine obusaasi bwingi, n'obu yaakubaire agyezaho kubufukiiriza. Ahabw'okufayo aha magara gye, baketeerana kumwetooroora kuhanuura aha ky'okukora ekindi.

eng_prompt: Gunshots rang out in the quiet neighborhood, sending residents into a panic. Emergency services quickly arrived at the scene to assess the situation.
lug_prompt: Amasasi gaaleekaana mu kitundu ekyali kisirifu, ekyasindika abatuuze mu bunkenke. Abakola ku by'amangu baatuuka mangu mu kifo okukebera embeera.
ach_prompt: Dwan muduku owinye I kabedo ma opye mot, ma oweko lutedero gubedo ki lworo. Lutic me ot yat oo oyot oyot I kabedo ne me niang ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Apotu imudun kilelebunos kotoma aiboisit naililingi, ido apotu itunga kikuriaka noi. Apotu lu engeso kodolokisi atipet aiboisit aanyun ejautene.
lgg_prompt: O'duko osu ni 'diyi o'duki angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea, erini fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri orisi. Ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi eca angu 'da ma alea mbeleru e'yo 'da ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Amasasi g'embundu gakahurirwa omu kicweka ekirikwetoroora, ekyareteire abatuuragye kutiina. Ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakahika ahonaaho kureeba ekyabaireho.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in local crime, the mayor held a meeting to discuss safety measures. During the gathering, he emphasized the importance of adhering to the newly implemented curfew.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obuzzi bw'emisango mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, meeya yatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukuumamu obulamu. Mu lukungaana, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okugoberera kafiyu eyaakateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa timo bal ma otime cokcok-ki, meya obedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom kit me gwoko kuc. Ikare me kacoke en owaco ni pire tek tutwal me lubu cik manyen me curfew.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma atutubet, abu emeya kitolomu airiamun kanu aitemitem nuka ayuwara. Kotoma airiamunet, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aitup nuka ekalitini loitetet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo e'yo onzi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru risi, meya 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma dria. Sawa okuta 'da nirisi, eri fe okpo orodri 'bani lezu 'ba ma obi sa'wa 'bani lezu 'ba ma aciku ri ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire omu kyaro, meeya akakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura ahaby'okwerinda. Omu rukiiko, akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro bya kafyu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent disturbances in the area, authorities have implemented new safety measures. As a precaution, the locals are advised to respect the curfew.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku butabanguko obwaliwo mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, ab'obuyinza bataddewo enkola empya ez'obukuumi. Ng'obwegendereza, abantu b'omu kitundu bakubirizibwa okussa ekitiibwa mu kafyu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kuku-kuku ma otimme cokcok-ki I kabedo eni, lutela gukati ki yoo manyen me gwoko kuc. Me gwoke, ki lego lwak me woro cik me curfew.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amumu na ajai atutubet kangin, apotu apedorosio itolomutu iwaitin lu ayuara luitetiak. Kanu ayuwara, icorakitai itunga luka atutubet ayongite ainapeta nuka ekalitini.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni angu 'da ma alea o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi 'ba azita o'diru ageitema ni 'diyi. Ekile ageitema ru, 'ba ai 'ba angu ma alea 'diyi inzita fezu sa'wa 'bani lezu 'ba ma aciku ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obwahwireho omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi bateireho oburyo busya bw'okwerinda. Nk'eky'okwerinda, abatuuragye nibahaburwa kuheereza ekitiinisa ebiragiro bya kafyu.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple complaints about suspicious activity in the park, officers decided to investigate the area. They soon discovered a vendor operating a stand filled with various types of bows and arrows.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya okungi ku bikolwa ebiteeberezebwa mu ppaaka, abasirikale baasalawo okunoonyereza mu kitundu. Waayita akaseera katono ne bakizuula nti waaliwo omusuubuzi eyalina omudaala ogwali gujjudde obusaale n'obusaale obw'engeri ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo koko mapol I kom jami ma byek tye I komgi I park, abili gumoko tamgi me kwedo kabedo ne. I ngee kare manok gunongo lacat wil matye ka cato jami ma opong ki atero mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu nuikamunitos aswamisinei nu eomitai ebe iswamao kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang, apotu ipolisin ongicata aiboisit ngin. Apotu kesi kodumutu agwelanaran naejaasi keda aiboisit naejaasi keda atekerin nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani onuzu pari anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba 'diyi asi e'yo 'du angu 'da ma eti ondazu. Eyi esu mbeleru 'ba afa ozipi ni pari afa ozizaru 'diyi ozizuri ma alea o'bo azini osu esele ndu ndu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga okwetomboitwa kwingi aha bikwatiraine n'emirimo etarikwetegyerezibwa omu paaka, ba ofiisa bakasharamu kucondooza omwanya. Bakashangaho omushuubuzi arikukoresa omwanya ogujwire obwoya n'emyambi y'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: Before proceeding with the investigation, the security team needed to ensure that all personnel were fit for duty. They decided to assess the health of the policeman involved in the incident.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannagenda mu maaso na kunoonyereza, ab'eby'okwerinda baali beetaaga okukakasa nti bonna basobola okukola. Baasazeewo okukebera embeera y'obulamu bw'omupoliisi eyayingidde mu kabenje.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gumede ki kwed, lugwok kuc omyero gunen ni dano weng tye maber me tic. Gumoko tam gi me neno kit ma kwo pa abili ma otimo bal enoni tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Eringa elosi keda aingic, ekot etimu loka ayuwara awanyun ebe epedoritos itunga kere aswam. Apotu kesi ocamutu airereor angaleu naka epolisit loajaikina toma akangas kangin.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di e'doni e'yo vuti ondaza be ku, le amuti ageyitema ni 'diyi ma ne ra kini 'ba dria eco azi nga ra. Eyi ai e'yo azi'ba polisi ni e'yo 'da ma alea ri ma rua ala ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'okwerinda batakagiire omu maisho n'okucondooza, bakaba nibenda kureeba ngu boona nibabaasa kukora emirimo yaabo. Bakasharamu kushwijuma amagara g'omuporiisi owabaire ari omu butandu egyo.

eng_prompt: After a brief chase through the crowded streets, the officers finally apprehended the individual. Witnesses reported seeing the suspect acting suspiciously before the police arrived.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumugoba okumala akaseera katono mu nguudo ezaali zijjudde abantu, abasirikale baasembye okukwata omuntu. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baalaba omutemu nga yeeyisa mu ngeri eyeekengera nga poliisi tennatuuka.
ach_prompt: Inge ryemo dano pi kare manok I dye gudu ma dano dwong iye, abili gumako ngat ne. Lucaden guwaco ni guneno ngat ma byek me timo bal tye I kome ni obedo ki lworo mapud abili pe oo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka arukio kotoma orotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu, apotu ipolisin kikamasi itunganan. Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu loitepesenitai iswamaete koipone kaloetiono eringa edolutu ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba odrozu nzila o'bi eyini tre 'diyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia, polisi eyi obi 'ba 'da asizu ra. Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi ndre agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ni e'yo 'ye asi otiza si de nga po'di polisi eyi ecani ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumubinga kurabira omu nguuto ezabaire zirimu abantu baingi, abapooriisi bakahendera bamukwata. Abajurizi bakagira ngu bakareeba orikuteekateekwaho kukora ebitarikwetegyerezibwa poriisi etakahikire.

eng_prompt: In light of recent wildlife encounters, local authorities held a meeting to discuss safe and sustainable hunting practices. They emphasized the importance of using traditional methods to maintain harmony with nature.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nsisinkano z'ebisolo by'omu nsiko ezaakaggwa, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkola z'okuyigga ez'obukuumi n'ez'obutebenkevu. Baakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukozesa enkola z'obuwangwa okukuuma obumu n'obutonde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok me rwatte pa lee lum ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom yoo me dwaro lee ma peke ki peko. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me tic ki yoo me tekwaro me gwoko kuc ki cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos airiamunet naka itiang lukokutwi, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu eyuwara lu ameja. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitwasam iwaitin lu atekerin kanu aidar aimorikikina keda isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani anyapa asea 'diyi 'dizu geri kililiru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri geri a'bini 'diyi ayuzu aa'zu tualu e'yo nyakuni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutunga enyamaishwa z'omumarindiro, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okuhiiga etarimu kabi kandi erikugumaho. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukoresa emiringo y'obuhangwa, okurinda obusingye n'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of intensive care and treatment, the hospital staff celebrated a significant milestone. The latest reports indicated a decrease in severe cases, allowing for some patients to finally go home.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bajjanjabirwa mu kasenge k'abalwadde abayi, abakozi b'eddwaliro baajaguza ekintu ekikulu ennyo. Alipoota ezisembyeyo zaalaze okukendeera kw'abalwadde ab'amaanyi, ekisobozesezza abalwadde abamu okuddayo ewaka.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me nongo kony ki kony me ot yat, lutic me ot yat gikwero nino madit tutwal. Adwogi tic manyen nyutu ni wel lutwo ma komgi lit tutwal ojwik, ma oweko lutwo mukene gudok gang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aidar adekak luka adekis keda amukian, apotu eswamak luka adekis inumunumata apolou naepol noi. Apotu iripotan luitetiak itodutu ebe ekidiokoto adekak nuarokok noi, ido abu koinak adekak ice abongor ore.
