lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia aro esuzu azini aro esuzu arojo eyi ma alea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi inzi e'yo azi okporu ni. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo onzi be 'diyi ma kalafe esi ra, erini fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma azi yi dri muzu akua ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okuragurirwa n'okureeberera abarwaire abakye, abakozi b'eirwariro bakajaguza ekigyendererwa ky'amaani. Ripoota ezihererukireyo kworeka okukyendeera kw'abarwaire b'amaani, ekirikwikiriza abarwaire abamwe kugaruka omuka.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation and successful treatment, the medical team determined that the patients were ready to continue their recovery at home. Families were notified, and discharge instructions were provided to ensure a smooth transition.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera n'obujjanjabi obulungi, abasawo baakizuula nti abalwadde baali beetegefu okugenda mu maaso n'okuwona ewaka. Famire zaategeezebwa, era ebiragiro by'okusiibulwa byaweebwa okulaba ng'enkyukakyuka egenda bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee pimo ki nongo yat maber, lutic yoto kom gumoko ni lutwo ne tye atera me mede ki cang ki gang. Ki niango gangi pa lutwo, ki miyo yoo me kwanyo lutwo ki I ot yat wek alokaloka obed maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok ka amukian najokan, apotu imurok kotemasi ebe ekapakina adekak ainyikokin angaleukec kore. Aponi olimokinai ikalia, ido aponi ijaikinai aicoreta nuka alacakinio kanu awanyun ebe ejai aijulakinio najokan.
lgg_prompt: Bani eyi ma rua andrizu kililiru azini aro esuzu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti dakitari eyini 'diyi esu kini 'ba azoru 'diyi ngonde eyi ma atita muzu drile akuasi. Ba lu familia eyini e'yo ra, dika 'ba fe azita 'bani eyi ofuzu arojoa 'diyi eyini ani aa'zu alenia kililiru beni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukyebera kurungi n'okuragurirwa kurungi, tiimu y'abashaho ekashanga ngu abarwaire beeteekateekire kugumizamu nibatereera omuka. Amaka gakamanyisibwa, kandi ebiragiro by'okusibuurwa bikahebwa, okureeba ngu habaho empindahinduka nungi.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent international health crisis, we have seen an influx of individuals seeking treatment here. Many of these individuals are facing challenges accessing care in their home countries.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu mu nsi gye buvuddeko, tulabye abantu bangi nga bajja kunoonya obujjanjabi. Bangi ku bantu bano basanga okusoomoozebwa okufuna obujjanjabi mu nsi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye ikin lobe mapol, dano mapol tye kabino kany ka nongo kony me yot kom. Pol pa dano magi gitye ka nongo peko me nongo kony me yot kom I lobogi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis naka angaleu naka akwap kere, iwanyunit sio alomar naka itunga luekotosi adumun amukian kane. Itunga luipu ejaas keda atiokisio nuka adumun amukian kotoma akwapin kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi wudrikurusiri ma e'yosi, ama ndre curu'do 'ba eyi ma eselea aro ndapi 'dia 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba karakara 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru eyi be aro esuzu kari eyivile akua 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara omu nsi yoona, twareeba abantu baingi barikuronda obujanjabi aha. Baingi aha bantu aba, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okutunga obujanjabi omu mahanga gaabo.

eng_prompt: As the number of cases continues to rise, healthcare facilities are working tirelessly to provide adequate care. The hospital is implementing strict protocols to ensure the safety of both patients and staff.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde gweyongera okulinnya, amalwaliro gakola butaweera okuwa obujjanjabi obumala. Eddwaliro liri mu kuteeka mu nkola amateeka amakakali okukakasa obukuumi bw'abalwadde n'abakozi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel lutwoo tye kamede kwede, odi yadi tye ka tic matek me miyo kony ma mite. Ot yat tye ka keto cik matek me gwoko lutwo ki lutic.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekak, eutasi adekisia aswam agogongu kanu aijanakin amukian naedolit. Ejai adekis aitodolikin ainapeta nuka ayuarit adekak keda eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyiniri ni mu drile turia, pari arojo ni 'diyi azi nga okpo kokoru azakoma kililiru ri fezu. Arojo 'da ni azita okporu 'diyi 'ba nezu ra kini 'ba azoru 'diyi azini azi'ba eyi ma agei tema kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku omuhendo gw'abarwaire gurikugumizamu nigweyongyera, amarwariro nigakora n'amaani okuheereza obujanjabi burikumara. Eirwariro nirita omu nkora ebiragiro by'amaani, okureeba ngu abarwaire n'abakozi boona baine obukuumi.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation of their recovery progress, the medical team decided it was safe for certain individuals to leave. The patients had shown significant improvement and met the necessary criteria for discharge.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkulaakulana y'okuwona kwabwe, abasawo baasalawo nti tekirina bulabe eri abantu abamu okuvaawo. Abalwadde baalaze okutereera okw'amaanyi era baatuukiriza ebisaanyizo ebyetaagisa okusiibulwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma yot kom gi tye ka wot kwede, lutic yoto kom gumoko ni dano mukene twero weko tic. Lutwoo ne gunyuto dongo pa kwogi dok gucobo cik ma mite pi gonyo gi ki I ot yat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor eipone lo angaleukec, apotu imurok kotuboto ebe ejokuna noi itunga ice anyoun. Apotu adekak itodutu ebe ejokuna kesi noi ido apotu itodolikisi nutupitono kanu alacakin kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eyi ma atita ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti arojo ni 'diyi 'du e'yo kini 'ba azi 'diyi eco mu ra. Ba azoru 'da eyi e'da e'yo eyi ma aza ko ra dika eyi 'ye e'yo 'bani lele 'bani eyi ofuzu arojoa 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye entunguuka yaabo, tiimu y'abashaho ekasharamu ngu kikaba kitari ky'akabi ahabantu abamwe kugyenda. Abarwaire boorekire okutereera kw'amaani kandi baahikiiriza ebirikwetengwa kugira ngu basiiburwe omu eirwariro.

eng_prompt: During the study, we gathered data from a diverse group of individuals to analyze the impact of long hours on health. Among the participants, we found that five of the patients were truck drivers.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza, twakungaanya obubaka okuva mu bibiina by'abantu eby'enjawulo okwekenneenya engeri obudde obuwanvu gye bukosaamu obulamu. Mu beetabamu, twakizuula nti bataano ku balwadde baali bavuzi ba biroole.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwed, wacoko ngec kibot dano mapol me niang adwoki pa tic pi cawa malac I kom yotkom. I kin joo ma obedo tye, wanongo ni lutwo abic ikin gi gubedo ludwo motoka madongo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic kangin, apotu sio atukutu akiro kanejaas itunga luegelegela kanu aingic epone loepedoria jo aswam isawan luipu kanu angaleu. Kotoma otunga luapotu kojaikinos, apotu sio adumutu ebe ikany kotoma adekak ngun araasi iderepan luka amotokan nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'di ma alea, ama tra e'yo engazu 'ba karakara eyi vu ecozu e'yo 'bani sa'wa ezu 'diyi 'yezu rua ala ma dria ri ma ale andrizu. Ba fi'ba 'diyi ma eselea, ama esu kini 'ba azoru 'diyi ma towi yi dereva lorini 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza, tukarundaana ebihandiiko kuruga omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe, okushwijuma oburemeezi bw'eshaaha nyingi aha magara. Omu beejumbiremu, tukashanga ngu bataano ahabarwaire bakaba bari abavugi ba roore.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant increase in COVID-19 cases, prompting health officials to investigate the sources of transmission. As a result, it has become clear that a large number of infections are linked to local gatherings and interactions.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe beeyongedde nnyo, ekireetedde ab'ebyobulamu okunoonyereza ku nsibuko y'okusiigibwa. N'ekivuddemu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti omuwendo omunene ogw'abakwatibwa obulwadde gukwatagana n'enkungaana z'abantu n'okukolagana.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, ma oweko lutic me yot kom ocako kwedo kit ma two korona kobo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, nen atyer kamaleng ni wel dano mapol matye ka nongo two tye ki kubbe I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, ido abu isinyikok eswamak luka angaleu aingic aiboisio nu ekorete adeka. Kanuka ngun, ecai cut ebe enaaba loepol loka adekasinei elomunitos kotoma atukonokin keda aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra, e'yo 'di fe azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini geri azo 'da ni i erezu 'diyi ma eti ondazu. E'yo 'disi, eca e'da kililiru kini azo eyi ma kalafe angiri 'diyi eci i okuta eyi ma eselea tualu 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19, ekirikureetera abakuru omu by'amagara kucondooza oburugo bw'okujanjaara. N'ekyarugiremu, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu oburwaire oburikukira obwingi nibukwatagana n'enteerane n'okukorengana kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Effective management of patient care is crucial to maintaining a healthy system. If issues are not addressed promptly, the consequences could be significant.
lug_prompt: Okukwasaganya obulungi obujjanjabi bw'abalwadde kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu. Singa ensonga tezikolebwako mangu, ebivaamu biyinza okuba eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Tic maber me gwoko lutwo pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom. Ka pe ki cobo peko ne oyot, adwogi ne twero bedo rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aidar adekak ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar angaleu. Arai mam itemokino atipet akiro ngun, epedorete nuelomunete araun nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri eri orodriru geri alata ni 'diyi ma tambazu. Ba ka e'yo eyi ma aza ko mbeleru ku, e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi eco ovu onzi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'okureeberera abarwaire n'ey'omugasho omu kurinda amagara marungi. Enshonga zaaba zitakozirweho ahonaaho, ebirikurugamu nibibaasa kuba eby'amaani.

eng_prompt: The hospital staff worked diligently to ensure all necessary treatments were completed. After a thorough evaluation, the doctor approved the patient's release.
lug_prompt: Abakozi b'eddwaliro baakola n'obunyiikivu okulaba ng'obujjanjabi bwonna obwetaagisa buwedde. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera obulungi, omusawo yakkiriza omulwadde okuteebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic me ot yat gutiyo matek tutwal me neno ni yat weng ma mite otum. Ingee ngiyo kome maber, daktar oyee ni kigony latwo ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis iswamata kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe angetakin amukian kere. Akaulo naka aingic ejok, abu emuron kocamak alacakin adekan.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi nga azi okporu nezu ra kini aro dria lele 'diyi de 'bo. E'yo eti ondaza dria ma vutia, dakitari ai 'ba azoru 'da ofuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abakozi b'eirwariro bakakora n'amaani kureeba ngu obujanjabi burikumara. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye, dokita akaikiriza okurekura omurwaire.

eng_prompt: As the healthcare system faces increasing demands, many practitioners are feeling overwhelmed. The rising complexity of cases and limited resources are contributing to a growing sense of frustration among medical professionals.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, abasawo bangi bawulira nga bazitoowereddwa. Okweyongera kw'obuzito bw'emisango n'ebikozesebwa ebitono biviiriddeko obwennyamivu mu basawo.
ach_prompt: Kit ma tic me yot kom tye kamede kwede, ludaktari mapol gitye ka winyo ni tic gi odoko tek tutwal. Peko mapol matye ka time ki jami ma nok tye ka weko lutic yoto kom tye ki cwer cwiny madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape itereikina ewai lo amukian keda eipuda lo iyatakin, epupete imurok luipu epol noi. Apolou na imusagon keda ikapun lu ikidioko eyangaunitos amamut aiyalama kanejaas eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma ongmbo tuzu tualu afa ꞌbani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma ongmbo tuzu tualu afa ꞌbani ꞌba azoru ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma ongmbo tuzu tualu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'amagara nibyetengwa munonga, abashaho baingi nibahurira baine oburemeezi bwingi. Okweyongyera kw'oburemeezi bw'emishango hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'obugaiga, nibyo bireesireho oburemeezi omu bashaho.

eng_prompt: The hospital has seen a significant increase in patient admissions over the past few weeks. As a result, the current facilities are overwhelmed and struggling to keep up with the demand.
lug_prompt: Eddwaliro lirabye okweyongera mu balwadde abali mu malwaliro mu wiiki eziyise. N'ekivuddemu, ebifo ebiriwo kati biyitiridde era birwana okukwatagana n'obwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Ot yat tye kaneno medde pa wel lutwo matye kadonyo I ot yat I cabit ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, odi tic matye kombedi opong tutwal dok tye ka tute matek me lubu miti ne.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunit adekis na eyatakinor noi enaaba loka adekak lu eperete adekis kotoma isabitin lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, epuakata aiboisio nu ejaas kwape kwana ido etiono aitodolikin eipuda.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da ndre e'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi 'duzu arojoa ri ma omgbo ni tu sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea ra. E'yo 'disi, angu 'bani ayule 'diyi ma ongmbo ga tre dika eyi dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro ryorekyeire okweyongyera kw'abarwaire abarikutwarwa omu irwariro omu wiiki nkye ezihweire. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyombeko ebiriho obwahati biijwire munonga kandi nibirwana kugumizamu n'ebyetaago.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases surged in the community, the hospital faced a critical shortage of supplies. Despite repeated requests for assistance, the nurses do not have coronavirus protective equipment.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe bwe gweyongera mu kitundu, eddwaliro lyafuna ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa. Wadde nga basaba obuyambi enfunda n'enfunda, abasawo tebalina bikozesebwa mu kwekuuma akawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona omedde, ot yat onongo peko me nok pa jami tic. Kadi bed ni kilego pi kony tyen mapol, lu nurse pe gitye ki jami me gwokke ki two corona.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, abu adekis kodum ekadakada loka iboro. Karaida ilipitos kesi aingarakinio, emamete anasin keda iboro lu eyuaritos kesi kanuka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, arojo 'da esu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako saaru. E'yo 'bani azakoma aizu 'diyi ma talasi, nasi eyivu afa tambaza fepi azo korona nirisi 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 kweyongyera omu bantu, eirwariro rikatunga eibura ry'ebintu. Oihireho okushaba obuhwezi emirundi mingi, abashaho tibaine byoma by'okwerinda akakooko ka korona.

eng_prompt: After weeks of treatment and care, the medical team conducted thorough evaluations of the patients' health. Following their assessments, the hospital confirmed that the released patients were now well.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bajjanjabiddwa n'okulabirirwa, abasawo baakola okwekenneenya okujjuvu ku bulamu bw'abalwadde. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera, eddwaliro lyakakasizza nti abalwadde abaasiibuddwa kati baali bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me nongo kony me yot kom, lutic yoto kom gutimo kwed matut I kom yotkom pa lutwo. I ngee pimo gi, ot yat omoko ni lutwo ma ki kwanyo gi ni komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu amukian keda aidar, apotu imurok ongicata angaleu naka adekak. Akaulo naka aingic kec, abu adekis itigogong ebe adekak lu aponi kolacakinai angaleutu.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti aro esuzuri ma vutia, 'ba arojo ni 'diyi andri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua ala kililiru. Eyi ma eti ondazu 'bori ma vutia, arojo 'da ai ra kini 'ba 'bani ofu arojoa 'diyi ma rua ri curu'do muke.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuragurirwa n'okureeberera, tiimu y'abashaho ekakora okukyebera gye amagara g'abarwaire. Ahanyima y'okukyebera, eirwariro rikakhamya ngu abarwaire abaasibwirwe bakaba bari gye.

eng_prompt: After their treatment, the medical team will ensure that all discharged patients receive appropriate care. Regular check-ins will be scheduled to monitor their recovery progress.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okujjanjabibwa, abasawo bajja kukakasa nti abalwadde bonna abasiibuddwa bafuna obujjanjabi obusaanidde. Okukeberebwa kwa buli kaseera kujja kuteekebwawo okulondoola enkulaakulana y'okuwona kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo kony me yot kom, lutic yoto kom bineno ni lutwo weng ma ki kwanyo gi ki I ot yat gunongo kony ma mite. Kibi bedo ki yub me pime kare ki kare me neno kit ma yot kom gi tye ka wot kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amukian kec, epote imurok awanyun ebe adekak kere lu aponi otwarai adumutu amukian najokan. Eponio ainwakio duc kanu awanyun eipone lo angaleukec.
lgg_prompt: Eyi ma aro esuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti arojo ni 'diyi nga ne ra kini 'ba dria 'bani ofu arojoa 'diyi aro esu kililiru. ꞋBa nga ꞌba yi andri arojoa sawa driasi yini yi ma rua alata ma ongmbo onezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuragurirwa, tiimu y'abashaho neija kureeba ngu abarwaire boona abarikusibuurwa batunga obujanjabi oburikwetengwa. Nibaija kuguma nibakyeberwa kureeba oku barikutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent complaints about patient care, the mayor held a meeting with local health officials. He emphasized the importance of compassion and understanding in the treatment of all individuals seeking medical assistance.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kwemulugunya okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku kulabirira abalwadde, meeya yatuuza olukiiko n'abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu kitundu. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okusaasira n'okutegeera mu kujjanjaba abantu bonna abanoonya obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki koko ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom gwoko lutwo, meya obedo ki kacoke ki lutic yoto kom me tedero. En oketo cwiny I kom ber pa bedo ki cwiny me kica ki niang I kom dano weng ma mito kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Katupitos angurian nuikamunitos aidar adekak, abu emeya iriamunos keda eswamak lu adekis. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aitim keda amisiikin kotoma amukian itunga kere luekotosi amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini onuzu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria risi, meya 'da 'ye mitingi azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Eri 'ba okpo orodri asi ndriza azini vata ma dria 'ba dria azakoma lepi arojoa 'diyi ma atita ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetomboitwa okwabaireho ebiro ebi ahabw'okureeberera abarwaire, meeya akakora orukiiko n'abakuru b'ebyamagara. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okusaasira n'okwetegyereza omu kuragurira abantu boona abarikwenda obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak of the virus spread rapidly, health officials implemented strict measures to contain its transmission. To protect the public and prevent further infections, those diagnosed with the virus were placed in quarantine.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubalukawo kw'akawuka kusaasaana mangu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baateekawo enkola enkakali okukakkanya okusaasaana kwalwo. Okukuuma abantu n'okutangira okukwatibwa kw'akawuka, abo abazuuliddwamu akawuka baateekebwa mu kalantiini.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma poto pa two eni omede ki nya oyot, lutic me yot kom guketo yoo matek me gengo nya pa two eni. Me gwoko lwak ki gengo nyaa pa two, dano ma kinongo ni gitye ki two eni ki keto gioo I bedo kengi.
teo_prompt: Neautar abwangun naka ekorona aisiarakin katipet, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itolomutu ikisila luitikitikete awea na ekorona. Kanu ayuarite itunga ka aitikitik adekasinei acie, aponi kipikakinai ngul lu inwakunitai ekorona okalitini.
lgg_prompt: E'dota azo 'da niri ni i erezu mbeleru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'du e'yo okporu eyini ecozu azo 'da ma ereta atrizu. O'bi eyi ma tambazu azini azo eyi ma ereta atrizu, 'ba 'bani esu azo nde be 'diyi 'ba karantinia.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'akakooko kurikweyongyera, ab'eby'amagara bakataho oburyo bw'okukyebera okujanjaara kwako. Okurinda abantu n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'oburwaire, abo abaabaire baine akakooko bakabatwara omu karantiini.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and dedication, the health team successfully implemented the new community wellness program. Their efforts resulted in significant improvements in public health metrics, earning them recognition from the local government.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, abasawo baasobola okussa mu nkola enteekateeka empya ey'ebyobulamu mu kitundu. Kaweefube waabwe yavuddeko okulongoosa okw'amaanyi mu bipimo by'ebyobulamu by'olukale, ekyabaleetera okusiimibwa okuva mu gavumenti z'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I tic, dul pa lutic yoto kom guketo yub manyen me yot kom I tic. Tute gi okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I lok kom yoto kom pa lwak, ma oweko gamente me tedero opwoyo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, abu etimu loka angaleu kopedo aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka angaleu naka itunga. Apotu aswamisiokec koyangautu aitojokaario naepol noi naka angaleu naka itunga, ido abu apugan naka atutubet koinak kesi aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, amuti alatani 'diyi o'ba otita alata o'diru ongulumu eyini ri 'yeta ma alea ra. Okpo eyini 'ba ri fe otuta angiri e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea, eyini ani eyi esuzu rukusa engazu gamete ele 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, tiimu y'eby'amagara ekakora kurungi enteekateeka y'eby'amagara omu bantu. Amaani gaabo gakareetaho entunguuka y'amaani omu by'amagara g'abantu, ekyabaheire okumanywa kuruga omu gavumenti z'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing healthcare crisis, officials held a press conference to address the concerns of frontline workers. They acknowledged the challenges faced by medical professionals and outlined their commitment to providing necessary resources.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda mu maaso, abakungu baatuuza olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okwogera ku kweraliikirira kw'abakozi abali ku mwanjo. Bakkirizza okusoomoozebwa abakugu mu byobulamu kwe basanga era ne balaga obumalirivu bwabwe mu kuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, lutic guyubu kacoke ki lucoo lok angeya me lok I kom peko pa lutic me yot kom. Guwaco peko ma lutic yoto kom tye ka kato ki iye dok bene guwaco ni gitye ki miti me miyo kony ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kiswamata keda lu iyemuto kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuka eswamak luka angaleu. Apotu kesi kocamutu atiokisio nuetereikina keda eswamak lu adekis kosodete aitodun ainakina kec naka aijanakin iboro lu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi 'ye e'yo nze 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie e'yo 'ba azi ngapi arojoa okori ma dria. Eyi ai e'yo ewaru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini esu 'diyi dika eyi ece ava eyini 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru bakakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru kugamba aha nshonga z'abakozi b'omumaisho. Bakaikiriza oburemeezi obu abakugu omu by'amarwariro barikurabamu kandi bakashoboorora okwehayo kwabo omu kuheereza eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: After a thorough evaluation and a comprehensive treatment plan, the medical team monitored the patients' progress closely. Once their conditions stabilized and they met all recovery criteria, they were ready for discharge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera obulungi n'okuteekawo enteekateeka y'obujjanjabi, abasawo beetegereza enkulaakulana y'abalwadde. Embeera yaabwe bwe yatereera era ne batuukiriza ebisaanyizo byonna eby'okuwona, baali beetegefu okusiibulwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma lutwo tye ka wot kwede ki yub me cango two, lutic yoto kom obedo ka lubu kor lutwo. Ikare ma komgi odoko ber dok gucobo jami weng ma mite me cang, ki kwanyo gioo ki I ot yat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok ka aitemonokin nuka amukian, apotu imurok owanyutu eipone lo elosiotor adekak. Akaulo na ajokunar ejautenekec kosodete aitodolikin nutupitono, apotu kesi okapakina alacakin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza kililiru ma vutia azini otuta aro esuzu dria si ri ma vutia, amuti arojo ni 'diyi ri 'ba azoru 'diyi ma zota ma pamvu one. E'yo eyini aa'zu ri ka eca kililiru azini eyini e'yo dria 'bani eyi atizu 'diyi 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ndra ngonde 'bani eyi ofuzu arojoa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi n'okukora enteekateeka y'okuragurira, tiimu y'abashaho ekarebera kurungi entunguuka y'omurwaire. Embeera yaabo ku yaaherize kutereera kandi baahikiiriza ebirikwetengwa, bakaba beeteekateekire kusibuurwa.

eng_prompt: As the economic crisis deepened, many local businesses struggled to stay afloat. In light of the mounting financial pressures, community leaders gathered to discuss potential solutions.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'ebyenfuna yeeyongera okwonooneka, bizinensi z'omu kitundu nnyingi zaalwana okusigala. Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ensimbi obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko me can lim omedde, biacara mapol me tedero gubedo ki peko me cung matek. Pi peko me lim matye kamede, lutela me kabedo gucokke me nywako tam i kom yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Neapolor atiokisio nuka ikapun, apotu ibiasaran luipu luka atutubet kongeroto asalakinio. Kanu aiyatakin atiokisio nuka ikapun, apotu engarenok lu atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itemokinet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyiniri ni tu uru, tujari karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci eyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo ewaru robia ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya ku bwayeyongyeire, abashuubuzi b'omubyaro baingi bakarwana kugumaho. Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ebyanga baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kukorwa.

eng_prompt: Facing unprecedented challenges and a sudden drop in revenue, the small business owners struggled to keep their operations afloat. As expenses mounted and sales dwindled, they were forced to make difficult financial decisions.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo n'okukendeera kw'omusolo mu bwangu, bannannyini bizinensi entono baalwana okukuuma emirimu gyabwe nga gitambula. Ensaasaanya bwe yagenda yeeyongera ate n'okutunda ne kukendeera, bawalirizibwa okusalawo mu by'ensimbi mu ngeri enzibu.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara matino-tino gubedo ki peko madit tutwal me medde ki ticgi pien wel lim ma onongo gitye ka nongo ojwik tutwal. I kare ma wel cente omedde dok cat odok piny, ki diyo gi me moko tam matek tutwal I lok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Atereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok noi keda aibiror naka ikapun, apotu agwelanarak lu ikidioko kongicata ainyikokin aswam kec. Kwape iyata etiai loka ikapun kosodete agwelanar aitidisiar, aponi kobuikinai kesi aitolomun aseununeta nuetioko nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esuzu tualu robia esuza ma omgbo esizu mbeleru ri be, tujari nyiri eyi ma eipika eyi esu ewaru tujari eyivile 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Aje ma ongmbo ni tuzu azini afa ozizaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni esizu, yi omi e'yo ewaru robia ma dria 'diyi 'duzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushanga oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo hamwe n'okukyendeera kw'esente, abaine bizinesi nkye bakarwana kurinda emirimo yaabo. Okweyongyera kw'enshohoza hamwe n'okuguza kukakyendeera, bakagyemeserezibwa kukora encwamu egumire omu by'esente.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic downturn, many local enterprises are struggling to stay afloat. As a result, business owners are requesting for tax waivers.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusereba kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, amakolero mangi mu ggwanga galwana okusigala. N'ekivuddemu, bannannyini bizinensi basaba okusonyiyibwa emisolo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can lim ma otimme cokcok-ki, biacara mapol tye ka tute matek me medde anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, lutim biacara tye ka lego ni myero kiwek gi pe gucul mucoro.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aibiror naka edumune loka ikapun pac, eutasi ibiasaran luka akwapuwok ainingosit asalakin epol. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikulepek ibiasaran ailip aitidisiar isolosinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, tujari karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci eyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi tujari ipika eyi a'i 'bani eyi ma musoro lizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'eby'entaasya eyeyongyeire, amakorero maingi g'omwihanga gariyo nigateganisibwa kuguma nigakora. N'ekyarugiremu, bakama ba bizinesi nibashaba okurekyerwa emishoro.

eng_prompt: The ongoing pandemic has led to widespread disruptions across various sectors. As a result, many companies are struggling to adapt to the new economic landscape.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso kiviiriddeko okutaataaganyizibwa mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, amakampuni mangi galwana okumanyiira embeera y'ebyenfuna empya.
ach_prompt: Two ma opoto ni okelo peko madit tutwal I tenge mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, kampuni mapol tye ka tute matek me ngiyo ki lok me lim matye.
teo_prompt: Adeka na elosi akonye ayangau ationis naepol noi kotoma iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikampunin luipu ainingosit acamanar keda ejautene loitetet loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri fe e'yo eyi ma aza ko esele ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi dri ci eyi ojazu e'yo robia esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho, ereesireho obutabanguko omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, kampuni nyingi ziriyo niziteganisibwa kukorengana n'embeera nsya y'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: The global economy has faced unprecedented challenges in recent months. Many companies have struggled to adapt to the sudden changes brought on by lockdowns and restrictions.
lug_prompt: Ebyenfuna by'ensi yonna bisanga okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo mu myezi egiyise. Kampuni nnyingi zifubye okutuukana n'enkyukakyuka ez'amangu ezaaleetebwa omuggalo n'obukwakkulizo.
ach_prompt: Tenge me lim I wilobo lung okato ki peko mapol tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Kampuni mapol gunongo tek tutwal me ngiyo ki aloka-loka ma obedo tye macalo adwogi me loro piny.
teo_prompt: Etereikina edumune loka ikapun loka akwap kere keda atiokisio nuipu noi kotoma ilapio lu atuboros. Etionikinit ikampunin luipu acamanar keda aijulanakineta nuaponi koyangaunai kanuka agolokinio naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia esuzu wudrikurusi ndulu ri esu e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. Amuti karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru ojata mbeleru e'yo angu ti opiza ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ebyentatsya y'ensi yoona etungire oburemeezi obutari bwa buriijo omu myezi ehwaire. Kampuni nyingi zirwanire okumanyiira empindahinduka eyabaireho ahabw'okukumiirirwa.

eng_prompt: As the economic impact of the coronavirus pandemic continues to escalate, many businesses are struggling to adapt to the rapidly changing landscape. It is crucial for authorities to step in and support these enterprises during this challenging time.
lug_prompt: Nga ebyenfuna byongera okukosebwa ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe, bizinensi nnyingi zifuba okutuukana n'enkyukakyuka ez'amangu. Kya mugaso nnyo ab'obuyinza okuyingirawo okuyamba amakolero gano mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma peko me can lim ma two korona okelo tye kamede kwede, biacara mapol tye ka tute matek me ngiyo ki alokaloka matye ka time. Pire tek tutwal ki lutela me konyo biacara magi ikare me peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor atiokisio nuka ikapun kanuka adeka naka ekorona, eutasi ibiasaran luipu ainingosit aitodolikin aijulakineta nuka akwap. Erai ibore yenepol noi apedorosio aingarakin ikampunin lu kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo ewaru e'yo ewaru azo korona niri ni 'diyi ma e'yo robia esuzu ri ni mu drile tu, tujari karakara eyi dri ci e'yo oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi 'yezu. Eri orodriru 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyini fizu azini atita fezu amuti 'diyi dri sawa e'yo ewaru 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku oburwaire bwa korona burikweyongyera kuteganisa eby'entaasya, bizinesi nyingi niziteganisibwa kukorengana n'embeera eziriyo nizihinduka juba. N'eky'omugasho ab'obushoborozi okutaahamu n'okuhwera amakorero aga omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, many entrepreneurs have expressed growing concerns about their financial burdens. As a result, they have been closely monitoring the economic climate and its impact on their operations.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, abasuubuzi bangi balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku buzito bwabwe obw'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, babadde balondoola embeera y'ebyenfuna n'engeri gye kikwata ku mirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, lutim biacara mapol gunyutu lworo pi peko me lim ma gitye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma lok me lim tye kwede ki adwoki ne I kom tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, itunga luipu luitolosete ibiasaran itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanu ikapunukec. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aanyanar ejok ejautene loka ikapun keda epone loepedoriata kesi aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba tujari 'yepi karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo eyini robia esu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi ebi e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma pamvu andri azini e'yo eyini eco 'ye azi eyini 'diyi ma dria ri pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abashuubuzi baingi boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'emihendo yaabo y'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, batwire nibareebuuza embeera y'ebyentatsya hamwe n'ebirikukwata aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Many small businesses are struggling to stay afloat due to rising operational costs and decreased consumer spending. As a result, business owners are finding it increasingly difficult to set aside funds for their tax obligations.
lug_prompt: Bizineesi entonotono nnyingi zirwana okusigala nga zitambula olw'ebbeeyi y'emirimu okulinnya n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okukendeera. N'ekivuddemu, bannannyini bizinensi basanga obuzibu obweyongera okuteekawo ensimbi ez'okusasula emisolo gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Biacara matino-tino mapol tye ka tute matek me medde anyim pi wel cente ma mite me tic kacel ki wel cente ma dano tiyo kwede matye kadok piny. Macalo adwogi ne, wegi biacara tye kanongo tek tutwal me gwoko cente pi culu mucoro gi.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ibiasaran luipu aijar naarai iyata etiai loka ikapun keda ikapun luitosomaete itunga. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit agwelanarak aipikakin ikapun kanu aitac isolosinei kec.
lgg_prompt: Tujura werea karakara eyi dri ci aa'zu muke e'yo aje eyini azi ngazu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu azini aje 'ba eyini ayu ri ma omgbo esizu ri si. E'yo 'disi, tujari ipika eyi e'yo esu ewaru 'bani robia 'bazu kalaa musoro ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Bizinesi nyingi niziteganisibwa kugumaho ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire hamwe n'okutuubya aha nshohoza y'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, bakama ba bizinesi nibagumirwa okurundaana esente z'okushashura emishoro yaabo.

eng_prompt: The decline in local businesses has led to increased unemployment and reduced services. As a result, residents are feeling the impact of a shrinking economy.
lug_prompt: Okukendeera kw'ebyobusuubuzi mu ggwanga kuleetedde ebbula ly'emirimu okweyongera n'okukendeera kw'obuweereza. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bawulira obuzibu bw'ebyenfuna okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa biacara me tedero okelo rweny pa tic ki rweny pa rwom me miyo kony. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ka winyo adwogi me poto pa lim.
teo_prompt: Adisiar naka ibiasaran luka atutubet ayangau amamus na aswamisinei ka aitidisiar ejanakine. Kanuka ngun, epupete itunga ationis naka aikidiokor na edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Tujara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri fe azi ako ma omgbo tualu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru e'yo robia esuzu ri ma omgbo esizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukyerererwa kw'eby'obushubuzi omwihanga, kireesireho okweyongyera kw'eibura ry'emirimo hamwe n'okukyendera kw'obuheereza. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye nibahurira oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya kukyerererwa.

eng_prompt: In recent months, residents have expressed growing concerns about their rising energy costs. Many families are struggling to keep up with their monthly expenses, prompting a call for action.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bbeeyi y'amasannyalaze. Amaka mangi galwana okutuukiriza ensaasaanya yaago eya buli mwezi, ekireetawo omulanga gw'okukola.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lutedero gunyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom wel mac ma tye ka ito malo. Gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me cobo cente ma gitiyo kwede dwe ki dwe, ma oweko kilwongo gi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aiyatakin etiai loka akim. Eutasi ikalia luipu ainingosit aitodolikin ikapunukec lu itwasamao kangol elap, itodunit ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo aje aci ni tupi 'diyi ma dria. Familia karakara eyi dri ci eyi ma robia ayuzu imba alu alu vusi, e'yo 'di fe 'ba eyi ai e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'emihendo y'amashanyarazi erikweyongyera. Amaka maingi nigarwana kurwanisa enshohoza yaabo eya buri kwezi, ekirikureetaho okushaba okukorwaho.

eng_prompt: In order to effectively address the issue of poverty, it is crucial to consider the insights and experiences of those directly involved in the economy. Business owners possess valuable perspectives on job creation and economic growth that can inform policy decisions.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukola obulungi ku nsonga y'obwavu, kikulu nnyo okulowooza ku magezi n'obumanyirivu bw'abo abeenyigira obutereevu mu by'enfuna. Bannannyini bizinensi balina endowooza ez'omugaso ku kutondawo emirimu n'okukulaakulana kw'ebyenfuna ebiyinza okulambika okusalawo kw'enkola.
ach_prompt: Me tyeko lok me can maber, pire tek tutwal me neno tam ki ngec pa joo matye I tenge me lim. Lutim biacara gitye ki tam mabeco tutwal I kom cako tic ki dongo lobo ma twero konyo I moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka ican ejok, ejokuna noi airereonor acoa keda amisiarit naka ngul luejaasi toma akwap. Ejaasi ikulepek ibiasaran keda aomisio nuepolok nuikamunitos aitolomun aswamisinei keda apol naka ikapun nuepedorete aingarakin kes aitolomun ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo alio niri ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma egazu. Tujari ipika eyi ma egata orodriru azi eyi ma edeta ma dria azini zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria ecopi e'yo eyi 'yepi ra 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Okukora aha nshonga y'obworo n'eky'omugasho munonga, n'eky'omugasho okwetegyereza n'okumanya kw'abo abarikwejumba omu by'entaasya. Bakama ba bizinesi baine ebiteekateeko by'omugasho aha kutandikaho emirimo hamwe n'entunguuka omu by'entaasya ebirikubaasa kuhwera omu kusharamu.

eng_prompt: Recent feedback from employees has highlighted several inefficiencies in the current administrative processes. To enhance overall productivity and employee satisfaction, it is crucial to address these concerns promptly.
lug_prompt: Ebyayogerwa abakozi gyebuvuddeko biraga obutali bwenkanya bungi mu nkola y'okuddukanya emirimu eriwo. Okutumbula omutindo gw'emirimu n'obumativu bw'abakozi, kikulu nnyo okukola ku nsonga zino amangu ddala.
ach_prompt: Tam ma aa ki bot lutic nyutu peko mapol matye I tela matye kombedi. Me medo rwom me tic ki yom cwiny pa lutic, pire tek tutwal me tyeko peko magi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos eswamak nuitodunitos iboro lumam iswamaete ejok kotoma ainapeta nuka eyaitene. Kanu aikeun eswamae loajokan ka aiyalama naka eswamak, ejokuna aitemokin atiokisio nu katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi'ba eyini 'diyi ece e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi e'da e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma alea ku 'diyi. Azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu azini azi'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugiremu kuruga omu bakozi nibyoreka oburemeezi bwingi omu nkora y'eby'obwebembezi eriho obwahati. Okutunguura omutindo gw'emirimo hamwe n'okumarwa kw'abakozi, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha nshonga ezi bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: The local community has relied on the facility for healthcare services for many years. Recently, there has been a discussion about the hospital's management and its connection to religious organizations.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu beesigamye ku ddwaliro lino okumala emyaka mingi. Gye buvuddeko, wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nzirukanya y'eddwaliro n'enkolagana yaalyo n'ebitongole by'eddiini.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka jenge I kom ot yat eni pi mwaki mapol. Cocoki, nywako lok obedo tye I kom tela pa ot yat man ki kubbe ne ki dule me dini.
teo_prompt: Emunokina itunga luka atutubet aiboisit ngin kanu amukian adaun ikar luipu. Apakio nu, ejai epeget loikamunit eyaitene lo adekis keda arucokina keda iriongeta lu idiinin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi asi 'ba arojo 'da ma dria eli karakara eyi ma alea. O'du 'diyi ma alia, e'yo nzeza ebi ovu arojo 'di ma driceza ma dria azini e'yo erini ecizu amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyi pie ri ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro batwire nibegamira aha irwariro eri kumara emyaka mingi. Obwahati, habaireho okuhanuura aha bwebembezi bw'eirwariro hamwe n'okukwatanisa kwaryo n'ebitongore by'ediini.

eng_prompt: The church leadership is currently reviewing the proposed changes to the doctrine. To ensure a unified approach, decisions will be made after consulting the bishops.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'ekkanisa mu kiseera kino beekenneenya enkyukakyuka eziteeseddwa mu njigiriza. Okukakasa enkola ey'awamu, okusalawo kujja kukolebwa oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ku balabirizi.
ach_prompt: Lutela me kanica kombedi gitye ka neno aloka-loka matye I pwony. Me neno ni winye obedo tye, bimoko tam inge lok ki bicop.
teo_prompt: Eutasi kwana engarenok lu ekanisa airereor aijulanakineta nu ekotoi kotoma aisisiaeta. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aimorikikina, eponio aitolomun aseununeta akaulo na airiamun keda ibisopun.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kanisa niri ni curu'do ojata 'bani lele 'diyi ma ale andri. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu tualu ri nezu, 'ba nga e'yo 'du 'bani e'yo nzezu bishopi eyi be 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'ekanisa obwahati bariyo nibashwijuma empindahinduka omu nyegyesa. Okureeba ngu hariho engyenderwaho erikukwatanisa, okusharamu nikwija kukorwa ahanyima y'okwebuuza aha ba biishopu.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations with management over financial issues, the employees felt they had no choice but to take a stand. Frustration grew as paychecks continued to be delayed, leaving many struggling to make ends meet.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga bateesa n'abakulira emirimu ku nsonga z'ensimbi, abakozi baawulira nga tebalina kya kukola okuggyako okuyimirira. Obwennyamivu bweyongera ng'omusaala gweyongera okulwawo, ekyaleka bangi nga balwana okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me winye ki ludito tic I kom lok me lim, lutic guwinyo ni pe gitye ki gin mo me atima mapat ki cung matek. Cwer cwiny omede ikare ma cente me culu dano omede ki galle, ma oweko dano mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu ipegeta keda eyaitene kanu ikapun, apotu eswamak kowomitos ebe emamete kesi keda aseunet bon. Apotu itunga luipu ongurianata noi naarai aponi isiyapai aiyap aitac ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo otuzu driceza be e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba 'da eyi ega kini eyi vu e'yo azi 'yezu yo. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi ri ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma musara ma sa'wa ezazu risi, erini fezu 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteesa n'abebembezi aha nshonga z'esente, abakozi bakareeba ngu tibaine ky'okukora okwihaho okwemerera. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabwokuba emishaara ekagumizamu neekyerererwa, ekyarekire baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: In a diverse society, it's essential to recognize that each individual's perspective contributes to the collective well-being. Therefore, decisions should reflect the voices and needs of the entire community rather than just a single viewpoint.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu ab'enjawulo, kya mugaso okutegeera nti endowooza ya buli muntu eyamba ku bulungi bw'ekibinja. N'olwekyo, okusalawo kulina okulaga amaloboozi n'ebyetaago by'abantu bonna mu kifo ky'endowooza y'omuntu omu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano dwong iye, pire tek tutwal me niang ni tam pa ngat acel acel kelo ber bedo pa lwak. Pi meno, moko tam omyero onyut dwon ki miti pa lwak weng me kaka tam pa ngat acel keken.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, ejokuna noi ajenun ebe aomisioit naka nginitunganan eyangauni ajokis naka itunga kere. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit aseununeta aitodun iporotoi keda ipudesia luka itunga kere itia aomisio adiope bon.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ndundu eyi ma alea, eri orodriru egazu kini egata 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ma dria ri ni fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu muke ri ni. Ka'dini, le e'yo 'duza ma e'da o'duko azini e'yo lepi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi aga egata 'ba alu ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe, nikikuru kumanya ngu enteekateeka ya buri omwe neekora aha magara g'abantu boona. N'ahabw'ekyo, okusharamu kushemereire kworeka eiraka n'ebyetengo by'abantu boona, kutari enteekateeka y'omuntu omwe.

eng_prompt: After a thorough assessment of patient care and operational efficiency, the administration decided it was time for a change. As a result, the hospital structure has been revised.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi obujjanjabi bw'abalwadde n'obwangu bw'emirimu, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo nti kye kiseera wabeewo enkyukakyuka. N'ekyavaamu, enzimba y'eddwaliro erongooseddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma lutwo tye ka gwokke kwede ki kit ma tic tye kawot kwede, ludito tic gumoko ni kare dong oromo me kelo aloka loka. Macalo adwogi ne, kiloko kit ma ot yat tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok epone loka aidar adekak keda eswamae loajokan, apotu eyaitene ocamutu ebe erai apak naka aijulakin. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijulakinai adoketait na adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini geri 'bani azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da 'du e'yo kini sa'wa 'di ojata ni. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oja arojo 'da ma sita ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi omuringo gw'okureebereramu abarwaire hamwe n'oburungi bw'emirimo, abarikukurira ekitongore bakasharamu ngu obwire buhikire bw'empinduka. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora y'eirwariro ehindwirwemu.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions, several members expressed their concerns about the quality of care they received. However, some of their claims seemed to lack supporting evidence.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakaggwa, bammemba bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku mutindo gw'obujjanjabi bwe baafuna. Kyokka, ebimu ku ebyo bye baayogera byalabika ng'ebitaliimu bujulizi bukakasa.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki, lumemba mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom rwom me kony ma gunongo. Kadi bed kumeno, jami mukene ma giwaco ni nen calo gi peke ki caden ma cwako.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei pac, apotu imeban luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos adoketait na amukian na edumunitos kesi. Konye, icie kotoma akiro kec esubit bala emamiatatar keda aitogogongoret.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyi ma dria geri eyini atita eyini esu 'diyi ma wura ma dria. Kani si, e'yo yini 'yo 'diyi ma azi e'da kile afa ecetaru atipi ra 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho, abantu baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'omutindo gw'obujanjabi obubatungire. Kwonka, ebimwe aharibyo ebyabaire nibigamba bikaba nibireebeka nk'ebibura obuhame.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising within the congregation as differing interpretations of doctrine emerge. As a result, there are disagreements amongst the church leaders.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kkanisa ng'enkyusa ez'enjawulo ez'enjigiriza zivaayo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo obutakkaanya mu bakulembeze b'ekkanisa.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I kin lukricto pien niang I kom pwony mapat-pat tye kabino. Macalo adwogi ne, telle tye ikin lutela me kanica.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma okanisa naarai ejaas itunga keda aomisio nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ejai amamut acamanara kiding engarenok lu ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu kanisa ma alia e'yo 'bani e'yo onitani 'diyi ma ale andrizu ndu ndu 'diyi ni efuzurisi. E'yo 'disi, erita ako eyi drice'ba kanisa ni 'diyi ma eselea ci.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kanisa, ahabw'okuhindura engyesa omu miringo etari emwe. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho obutaikirizana omu beebembezi b'ekanisa.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple complaints from the community, the local authorities recognized the need for a thorough review of the situation. Concerned about the escalating tensions, they decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya okungi okuva mu bantu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baalaba obwetaavu bw'okwekenneenya obulungi embeera. Olw'okweraliikirira olw'obunkenke obweyongera, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo koko mapol kibot lwak, lutela me tedero gunongo ni omyero ki nen ngo matye katimme. Pi lworo pi telle matye kamedde, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu kanejaas itunga, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kojenutu ebe ibusakinit airereor ejautene ngol. Apotu kesi kopodokisi nuikamunitos aiyatakin naka ingungeta, apotu kesi koseutu aswam nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: Erini onu esuzu engazu ongulumu eyivu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma one e'yo 'da geri kililiru si. Asi otiza e'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma dria, eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu bantu, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okushwijuma gye embeera. Ahabw'okwerarikirira aha bwimukiriro obweyongyeire, bakasharamu kukoraho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous attempts to collaborate, misunderstandings continue to arise. This has led to a significant disconnect in their discussions.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bagezezzaako okukolagana, obutategeeragana bukyagenda mu maaso. Kino kiviiriddeko okweyawula mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol oteme me ribe, telle tye kamedde anyim. Man okelo apoka-poka madit tutwal I lok meggi.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamitai duc aiswamanar, inyikokinitos amamus acamanar. Eyangau na ationis naepol noi kotoma oineresinei kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu ti ecita ejizu 'diyi ma talasi, erita ako eyi mu drile. E'yo 'di fe yi ma esele cozu e'yo nzeza yi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okugyezaho kwingi kukwatanisa, obutetegyerezana nibugyenda omu maisho. Eki kireesireho okwebaganisamu kw'amaani omu kuhanuura kwabo.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the recent crisis, local healthcare facilities have been overwhelmed with patients. As a result, foreign nations and organizations have stepped in to provide much-needed assistance.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, amalwaliro g'omu kitundu gajjudde abalwadde. N'ekivuddemu, amawanga amalala n'ebitongole biyingiddewo okuwa obuyambi obwetaagibwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma otimme cokcok-ki, odi yadi me tedero opong ki lutwo. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe ma woko kacel ki dule mukene gudonyo me miyo kony ma mite tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na pac, apol adekisia nu ocaalo keda adekak luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, alomutu akwapin nukokinga keda iriongeta luka akwapin ace kanu aijaikin agangat na ekotoi noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'di ma e'yosi, arojo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ga tre 'ba azoru 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, kari azini amuti engapi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi fi azakoma 'bani le saaru 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiho obwahati, amarwariro g'omubyaro gaijwire abarwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, amahanga g'aheeru hamwe n'ebitongore biretsire obuhwezi oburikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: To meet the growing demands of our customers, we need to evaluate our current staffing levels. By addressing this issue, we can enhance our overall operational performance.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza obwetaavu bwa bakasitoma baffe obweyongera, twetaaga okwekenneenya omuwendo gw'abakozi be tulina kati. Nga tukola ku nsonga eno, tusobola okutumbula enkola yaffe okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti pa luwil, omyero wanen rwom pa lutic ma watye kwede kombedi. I yoo me tyeko lok man, watwero medo rwom me tic wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin ipudesia luka agwelak wok, ekot oni airereor adoketait na eswamak wok. Kowai lo aitemokin ationis na, ipedori oni aitojokar eswamaekosi.
lgg_prompt: Le ama ma one azi'ba amani 'diyi ma ongmbo sawa 'disi ri ra lezu afa aje'ba amavile 'diyini lele tu 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu risi, ama eco azi ngaza amani 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abaguzi baitu, twine kushwijuma omutindo gw'abakozi baitu obwahati. Twakora aha nshonga egi, nitubaasa kwongyera aha mirimo yaitu.

eng_prompt: Due to ongoing political instability, many international organizations have pulled back their support. As a result, the hospital has not received foreign aid for a while now.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko bw'ebyobufuzi obugenda mu maaso, ebitongole by'ensi yonna bingi biggyewo obuyambi bwabyo. N'ekyavaamu, eddwaliro limaze ebbanga nga terifuna buyambi okuva ebweru w'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me cungu iwi bye matye kawot anyim, dul mapat-pat ma aa ki ilobo mapat-pat okwanyo konygi. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat pe onongo kony ma aa ki lobo mawoko pi kare malac dong.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amamus na ainapakina kotoma politikis, alemasi iriongeta luka akwapin ace agangat kec. Kanuka ngun, mam adekis edumununei agangat nakokinga adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru politiki ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti karakara kari eselia 'diyi enze atita yini ra. E'yo 'disi, arojo 'da esuni curu'do azakoma engazu kari amve 'diyi ma alea kuye.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki oburikugyenda omu maisho, ebitongore by'amahanga goona bikarugaho obuhwezi bwabyo. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro tirikatungire buyambi kuruga aheeru y'eihanga kumara obwire.

eng_prompt: The management implemented a series of efficient protocols and streamlined processes. As a result, the hospital has been able to maintain high-quality care even with limited personnel.
lug_prompt: Abaddukanya baateekawo enkola ez'enjawulo era ne balongoosa enkola. N'ekivuddemu, eddwaliro lisobodde okukuuma obujjanjabi obw'omutindo newankubadde n'abakozi abatono.
ach_prompt: Lutela gu kati ki yoo mapat-pat me tic maber dok bene guyubu yoo me tic maber. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat tye ki kero me miyo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo kadi bed ni lutic tye manok.
teo_prompt: Apotu eyaitene itolomutu ainapeta nuipu nu iswamaete ejok kosodete aitojokar ainapeta. Kanuka ngun, epedorit adekis aidar amukian na adoketait naepol araida ikidioko eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Driceza 'da 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu kililiru dika eyi otu e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, arojo 'da ebi aro fe wura muke si 'ba were eyi pie ra ti.
nyn_prompt: Abarikukurira ekitongore bakataho engyenderwaho nungi. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro ryabaasa kurinda obujanjabi bw'omutindo gw'ahaiguru n'obu ryaba riine abakozi bakye.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent performance evaluations and market trends, it has become evident that our current compensation structure is no longer competitive. To retain top talent and ensure employee satisfaction, we must consider adjustments to our pay scales.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko n'enkulaakulana eriwo mu katale, kyeyoleka lwatu nti engeri gye tubaliyirwamu kati tekyavuganya. Okusigaza ebitone eby'oku ntikko n'okulaba ng'abakozi bamativu, tulina okulowooza ku nkyukakyuka mu misaala gyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otimme cokcok-ki ki kit ma jami tye ka wot kwede icuk, nen atyer kamaleng ni yub me cul ma watye kwede kombedi pe tye maber. Me weko lutic ma rwom gi malo gubed ki yomcwiny, omyero watam I kom loko mucara wa.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuka aanyanario naka eswamae loka itunga keda epone loejai osokoni, ecai cut ebe mam bobo ikapun luka itunga luka akwapuwok epedorete abolobol. Kanu aidar aswamisinei nuejokuka ka aanyun ebe iyalamasi eswamak, ekot oni aitemokin aijulanakineta kotoma aitac.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo 'ye o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma dria, eca e'da kini geri amani 'ba ofezu sawa 'disi ri ovuni curu'do muke ku. Ba talanta onyiru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini azi'ba eyini aa'zu ayikosi, le ama ma ega e'yo 'bani ama ma musara otuzu ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira ahabyarugire omu kushwijuma emikorere hamwe n'emikorere y'obushuubuzi, nikyoreka butunu ngu omuringo ogu turikushashurwamu tiguriho. Okugumizamu n'abakozi b'omutaano n'okureeba ngu abakozi batunga okumarwa, twine kukora empindahinduka omushara gwaitu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by the project team, management held a meeting to discuss strategies for improving collaboration. They emphasized the importance of understanding the pressures the team was under during this critical period.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kwa ttiimu ya pulojekiti gye buvuddeko, abaddukanya pulojekiti baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula enkolagana. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okutegeera okunyigirizibwa ttiimu kwe yabaddemu mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma dul pa lutic me project gunongo cokcok-ki, ludito tic gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo me medo rwom me tic kacel. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma dul tuku ne obedo I iye I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda etimu loka epurojekt, abu eyaitene kitolomu airiamun kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokaret aiswamanara. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka amisiikin atiokisio nuejaatar etimu kotoma apakio kanu nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru amuti otita 'da niri ni esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza 'da 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu geri 'bani ecozu ti icita ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo orodri amuti 'da ni aa'zu e'yo ewaru eyi ma dria sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu tiimu ya purogyekiti etungire, abarikukurira purogyekiti bakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha mihanda y'okutunguura okukwatanisa. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okwetegyereza oburemeezi obu tiimu yaabaire eri omubwiire bukuru obu.

eng_prompt: After months of increased workloads and staff shortages, the hospital employees gathered to discuss their concerns. They felt that their dedication and hard work deserved recognition in the form of better compensation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'emirimu emingi n'ebbula ly'abakozi, abakozi b'eddwaliro baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga zaabwe. Baalowooza nti okwewaayo kwabwe n'okukola ennyo byetaaga okusiimibwa mu ngeri y'okuliyirirwa obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic mapol ki nok pa lutic, lutic me ot yat gugure me nywako lok I kom peko gi. Guwinyo ni omyero ki mi pwoc ki culgi pi tic matek ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aswam keda ekadakada loka eswamak, apotu eswamak luka adekis kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aiyalongongokec. Apotu kesi opuputu ebe ibusakinit aisiyalamikin kesi kanu aswam kec keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ma omgbo tuzu azini azi'ba eyi ma ako ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ega kini le 'ba ma fe eyini awa'difo e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini azi okporu eyini 'ye 'diyisi geri 'bani eyi ofezu muke ndeni risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'emirimo hamwe n'eibura ry'abakozi, abakozi b'eirwariro baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo. Bakahurira ngu okwehayo kwabo n'okukora n'amaani, bikaba bishemereire kusiimwa nk'omushara murungi.

eng_prompt: The facility was established to provide essential healthcare services to the community. Its primary goal is to prioritize patient care over financial gain.
lug_prompt: Ekifo kyatandikibwawo okuwa abantu obujjanjabi obwetaagisa. Ekiruubirirwa kyayo ekikulu kwe kukulembeza okulabirira abalwadde okusinga okufuna ssente.
ach_prompt: Ot yat eni ki yubu me miyo kony me yot kom ma pire tek bot lwak. Miti ne madit tutwalle obedo me keto gwoko lutwo obed gin ma pire tek loyo nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Aponi odukoi adekis ngin kanu aijanakin itunga amukian na epol ajokis. Alosikineteke erai aisingarenit aidar adekak adepar adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba si arojo 'da azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi fezu o'bi eyidri. Asisile erini okori lezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu okporu aga orodri robia ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro rikatandikwaho kuheereza abantu obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Ekigyendererwa kyakyo ekikuru n'okwebembeza okureeberera abarwaire okukira okutunga esente.

eng_prompt: In a society where physical perfection was highly valued, any visible imperfection was met with disdain. As a result, those suffering from eye ailments faced severe social stigma and isolation.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abaali batwala okuba n'omubiri ogutuukiridde ng'ekintu eky'omuwendo ennyo, obutali butuukirivu bwonna obwali bulabika bwali busuuliddwa wansi. N'ekyavaamu, abo abaalina obulwadde bw'amaaso baavumirirwa nnyo era ne beeyawula ku balala.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma dano onongo gimaro bedo ki kom ma pe ki roc tutwal, dano onongo gicayo roc mo keken ma nen. Macalo adwogi ne, jo ma onongo gitye ki peko me wang gubedo ki cac madit tutwal ki bedo kengi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naeyangaritai aitodolikinio naka akuan kwape ibore yen epol ajokis, aponi itoroniarai amamus aitodolikinio. Kanuka ngun, ngul luedekasi adekasinei nuka akonye apotu odumutu aibucaret naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'bani e'yo rua ni 'diyi 'dule orodriru tu 'diyi ma alea, e'yo azini e'dapi ra 'diyi 'du e'yo onzi si. E'yo 'disi, 'ba dri cipi azo mile ni be 'diyi esu candi amboru tu 'ba esele cozu yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abaabaire nibatwara obuhikiriire nk'ekintu ky'omugasho munonga, obutakahikiirira bwona oburikworekwa bukaba nibujumwa munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abo abaabaire baine oburwaire bw'amaisho, bakaba nibajumwa munonga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for healthcare services, the hospital administration has implemented several expansion initiatives. As a result of these efforts, the bed capacity of the hospital has increased.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, abaddukanya eddwaliro batadde mu nkola enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ez'okugaziya. Olw'okufuba kuno, ebitanda by'eddwaliro byeyongedde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me kony me yot kom, ludito me ot yat gukati ki yub mapat-pat me dongo odi yadi. Macalo adwogi me tute magi, kabutu pa lutwo I ot yat omede.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo amukian, etolomu eyaitene lo adekis iwaitin luipu luka aitanyanyar. Kanuka aswamisio nu, eyatakinos itadan kadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma aza kozu, driceza arojo niri 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi otuzu. Okpo 'diyi ma e'yosi, kitanda arojo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, abarikukurira eirwariro bateire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi z'okushanjuura. Ahabw'amaani aga, ebitanda by'eirwariro byeyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve healthcare services across the nation, the administration has implemented various funding programs. One key initiative focuses on ensuring that medical facilities receive the necessary resources to operate effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu okwetooloola eggwanga, gavumenti etaddewo pulogulaamu z'ensimbi ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa kwe kukakasa nti amalwaliro gafuna ebyetaago okusobola okukola obulungi.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom I lobo man, gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me lim I tic. Yub acel ma pire tek tye me neno ni odi yadi gunongo jami ma mite me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar amukian kotoma akwap kere, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuegelegela nuka aigang ikapun. Alosikinet adiope naepol noi nes awanyun ebe edumunenete adekisia iboro lu ekotoi kanu aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu, driceza 'da 'ba otita ndundu robia fezu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo azi okporu 'diyi ma azi lezu nezu ra kini pari arojo ni 'diyi afa lele 'diyi esu azi ngazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu eihanga ryona, abarikureeberera eihanga bateire omu nkora enteekateeka z'esente nyingi. Ekigyendererwa kimwe ekikuru n'okureeba ngu amarwariro gatunga eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising concerns about safety in the neighborhood, local authorities have implemented several measures. One of the key strategies involves enhancing surveillance throughout the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku by'okwerinda mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bataddewo enkola ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebirina okukolebwa kwe kwongera okulondoola mu kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc I kabedo wa, lutela me tedero gukati ki yoo mapat-pat. Yo acel ma pire tek en aye me medo rwom me bedo ki wang mabit I kabedo weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ayuwara kotoma atutubet, etolomutu apedorosio nuka atutubet iwaitin luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin luapolok imoriarit aitogogong aingic kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi angu ama agei 'diyi ma alea ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu. Otita okporu 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo eti ondaza angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda omu byaro, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bateire omu nkora emiringo mingi. Omwe aha mihanda mikuru n'okutunguura eby'okurondoora omu kyanga kyona.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about public safety and crime rates, government officials have announced a new surveillance initiative. This program aims to enhance security measures in urban areas.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi bw'abantu n'obuzzi bw'emisango, abakungu ba gavumenti balangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okulondoola. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula eby'okwerinda mu bibuga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom ber bedo pa lwak ki rwom me timo bal, lutic pa gamente gucwalo lok angeya manyen me bedo ki wang mabit I tic. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom me gwoko kuc I boma madongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ayuwara naka itunga keda abilibilio naka ikisila, alimosi eswamak luka apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aingic. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitojokar ayuwara naka itaunin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi o'bi eyi ma tambazu azini ongmbo e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ma dria, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi azi e'yo o'diru e'yo eti ondazu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo agei temani aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira okweyongyeire ahaby'okwerinda hamwe n'obukozi bw'ebibi, abakuru omu gavumenti barangirire enteekateeka nsya y'okucondooza. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okwongyera eby'okwerinda omu myanya y'endembo.

eng_prompt: As the security concerns in the area escalated, the team convened to reassess their surveillance strategy. After reviewing the latest crime statistics, they decided to enhance their monitoring efforts significantly.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bw'ebyokwerinda bweyongera mu kitundu, ttiimu yatuula okuddamu okwetegereza enkola yaabwe ey'okulondoola. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebibalo by'obuzzi bw'emisango, baasalawo okwongera amaanyi mu kulondoola kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo me gwoko kuc I kabedo ne omedde, dul ne gubedo kacoke me ngiyo kit me bedo ki wang mabit. Ingee ngiyo lok kom bal ma otimme cokcok-ki, gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me tic gi me bedo ki wang mabit I kom bal.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongongo naka ayuwara kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu etimu iriamunos airereor iwaitin kec luka aingic. Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaeta nuka abilibilio naka ikisila, apotu kesi kitogogongoto aswamukec naka aanyanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ageyitema ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, amuti 'da tra eyi e'yo eyi ma ageyitema ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo kalafe e'yo onzi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo eyini e'yo eti ondazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kw'eby'okwerinda omu kyanga kukweyongyera, tiimu ekashutama kugaruka kushwijuma enkora yaabo y'okurondooza. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko ebirikukwata aha bihagaro, bakasharamu kwongyera amaani omu kukyebera.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and preparation, the team gathered all the necessary equipment. They were eager to begin the project that had been in the works for months.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okwetegekera, ttiimu yakuŋŋaanyizza ebintu byonna ebyetaagisa. Baali beesunga okutandika pulojekiti eyali emaze emyezi nga ekolebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki yubbe, dul ne guyubu jami weng ma mite. Gubedo ki miti matek me cako tic ma obedo I tic pi dwe mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, abu etimu kituk iboro kere lu ekotoi. Akapakina kesi ageun epurojekt lo ajai toma aswam adaun ilapio.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra afa dria lele 'diyi dria. Eyi ndra avaru otita 'da e'dozu aa'pi 'yeta alea imba karakara 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okweteekateekyera, tiimu ekarundaana ebikwato byona ebirikwetengwa. Bakaba baine ekihika ky'okutandika purogyekiti eyabaire etwireho kumara ameezi maingi.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough inspection of the security system, we discovered several issues. It appears that the installation was not completed properly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera obulungi eby'okwerinda, twazuula ebizibu ebiwerako. Kirabika okuteekamu tekwakolebwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma tic me gwoko kuc tye kwede, wanongo peko mapol. Nen calo keto ne pe otum maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok nuka ayuwara, apotu sio adumutu akiro nuipu. Esubit bala mam awenio angetakin ejok.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo angu agei temani 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, ama esu e'yo karakara. Eri ena kile 'ba awini afa 'da osu kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma gye eby'okwerinda, tukashanga oburemeezi bwingi. Nikireebeka ngu okutaho tikuhwaire kurungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance public safety and deter criminal activity, the city has decided to implement a comprehensive surveillance system. This initiative aims to provide real-time data to law enforcement agencies.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu n'okutangira ebikolwa by'obumenyi bw'amateeka, ekibuga kisazeewo okussaawo enkola y'okulondoola enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa ebitongole ebikuumaddembe obubaka mu budde obutuufu.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak ki gengo tim aranyi, citi omoko tamme me keto yub me bedo ki wang mabit I tic. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo ngec ma ite kare kikome bot dul ma gwoko cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara naka itunga ka aitikitik aswamisio nuka abilibilio naka ikisila, aseunit esite aitegear ainapeta nuka aingic. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aijaikin akiro kotoma apak naedolit nejaas iriongeta lu ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi yi ma ageitema otuzu azini e'yo onzi atrizu, aku ambu city niri 'du e'yo 'bani e'yo eti ondazu 'diyi 'bazu pari dria. E'yo 'di ma asisile ri lezu o'dukoti sa'wa dria si 'diyi fezu amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura ebyokwerinda omu bantu n'okuzibira abakozi b'ebibi, orurembo rushazireho kutaho enkora y'okurondooza. Ekigyendererwa n'okuheereza ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro ebihandiiko omu bwire obuhikire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance security and monitor activities, the company decided to implement a new surveillance system. This initiative aimed to ensure a safer environment for both employees and customers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'okwerinda n'okulondoola emirimu, kampuni yasalawo okussaawo enkola empya ey'okulondoola. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuteekawo embeera ey'obukuumi eri abakozi ne bakasitoma.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me gwoko kuc ki bedo ki wang mabit I tic, dul ne omoko tamgi me keto yub manyen me bedo ki wang mabit I tic. Yub man obedo me neno ni kwo tye maber pi lutic ki luwil.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuwara keda aingic aswamisinei, abu ekampuni kitolomu epone loitetet loka aingic. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aanyun ebe ejai aiboisit na eyuwara kanuka eswamak keda agwelak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ageitema ni azini e'yo angu onezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da 'du e'yo geri o'diru angu onezu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu angu azi'ba eyini tualu aje'ba eyi pie aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera eby'okwerinda n'okukyebera emirimo, kampuni ekasharamu kutaho enkora ensya y'okukyebera. Enteekateeka egi ekaba negyenderera okureeba ngu abakozi n'abaguzi boona batunga obusingye.

eng_prompt: As technology continues to advance, the reliance on human testimony in legal proceedings is being challenged. With the introduction of high-resolution surveillance systems, the accuracy of recorded evidence is becoming increasingly favored over personal accounts.
lug_prompt: Nga tekinologiya agenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana, okwesigama ku bujulizi bw'abantu mu misango gy'amateeka kusoomoozebwa. Olw'okuteekawo enkola y'okulondoola eya waggulu, obutuufu bw'obukakafu obuwandiikiddwa bweyongedde okusingira ddala eby'obuntu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tet manyen tye ka medde anyim, jenge I kom caden pa dano I lok makwako cik tye ka doko tek tutwal. Ki kelo yub me bedo ki wang mabit tutwal me bedo ki wang mabit tutwal, ada pa caden ma kicoyo tye ka doko ber loyo lok kom ngat acel acel.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit etatai loakwana apolor, eutai ainingosit ajenanut naka itunga kotoma okisila. Keda aitolomunio naka acuman nu engicete, ejai aitogogonget na abeit adepar akiro nu itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia niri ni mu drile muzu drile, asi'baza 'ba ada eyi ma dria e'yo dwani ni 'diyi ma alea ri ni eca ewaru. Afa omvele high-resolution surveillance systems ru 'diyi ma e'dota si, e'yo ada e'yo 'bani si 'diyi ma dria ri eca curu'do orodriru ndeni aga e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku tekinorogye erikugumizamu neetunguuka, okwesiga obujurizi bw'abantu omu mishango y'ebiragiro nikugumizamu. Ahabw'okutandikaho ebyoma by'okurambura eby'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru, oburingaaniza bw'obujurizi oburikuhandiikwa nibweyongyera kukundwa kukira eby'abantu buntu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance public safety and improve traffic management, the city has decided to implement a new surveillance system. This system will include advanced technology to monitor and record vehicle movements throughout key areas.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu n'okutumbula enzirukanya y'ebidduka, ekibuga kisazeewo okussaawo enkola empya ey'okulondoola. Enkola eno ejja kubaamu tekinologiya ow'omulembe okulondoola n'okukwata entambula y'emmotoka mu bitundu ebikulu byonna.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak ki doro tic pa motoka I gudu, city omoko tamgi me keto yub manyen me bedo ki wang mabit I kom motoka. Yub eni obi bedo ki diro manyen me ngiyo ki coyo kit ma mutoka woto kwede I kabedo mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuara naka itunga ka aitojokar eyaitene loka amotokan, aseunit esite aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aingic. Ebuni ainapeta ngun aimoriarit etatai loakwana kanu aanyanar ka aiwadika alosit naka amotokan kaiboisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi yi ma agei tema otuzu azini e'yo nzila dria 'diyi ma aza kozu, aku ambu city niri 'du e'yo geri o'diru 'bani e'yo eti ondazu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia. Otita 'di ma alea afa ndundu eyi ecozu mutukari eyi ma acita onezu azini eyi ma o'duko sizu angu okporu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura ebyokwerinda hamwe n'okureeberera ebiiruka, orurembo rushazireho kutaho enkora ensya y'okurondooza. Enkora egi neija kutwariramu tekinorogye y'omutindo gw'ahaiguru y'okureebuuza n'okuhandiika entambura y'ebiiruka omu myanya mikuru.

eng_prompt: Local officials have approved a new security initiative aimed at enhancing public safety. As part of this plan, the installation of cameras will start in towns.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyalo bakkirizza enteekateeka y'ebyokwerinda empya egendereddwamu okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu. Ng'ekimu ku nteekateeka eno, okuteeka kkamera kujja kutandika mu bibuga.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero guyee yub manyen me gwoko kuc ma tye ki miti me medo ber bedo pa lwak. Macalo but yub man, kibiketo camera I boma mapat-pat.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local farmers and address food security issues, the member of parliament organized a community event. During the gathering, he announced his commitment to help those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu n'okukola ku nsonga z'ebbula ly'emmere, omubaka wa paalamenti yategeka omukolo gw'ekitundu. Mu lukungaana, yalangiridde obweyamo bwe okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me miyo kony ki lupur me tedero ki cobo peko me nok pa cam, lamemba me parliament oyubu yub pi lwak. Ikare me kacokke en owaco ni ebikonyo lupeko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang akoriok luka atutubet ka aitemokin akiro nuka amamus na inyamat, abu emeeba loka airabet kitemok epucit loka itunga. Kotoma airiamunet kangin, abu ngesi kolimo ainakina ke aingarakin ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi atizu azini e'yo nyaka ako ni 'diyi ma aza kozu, memba koloseni ni 'da otu omu ongulumu eyini ni. Okuta 'da ma alea, eri azi i ma ava 'ba afa koko 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abahingi n'abariisa b'omubyaro n'okukora aha nshonga z'eby'okurya, omunyeishengyero akatebekanisa omukoro gw'ekyanga. Omu rukiiko, akarangirira okwehayo kwe kuhwera abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local farmers and improve agricultural productivity, the community organized a fundraising event. The proceeds were used to purchase essential farming tools and supplies.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abalimi b'omu kitundu n'okutumbula ebyobulimi, ekitundu kyategese omukolo gw'okusonda ssente. Ensimbi ezaavaamu zaakozesebwa okugula ebikozesebwa mu kulima n'ebintu ebirala ebikulu.
