teo_prompt: Kanu aigang akoriok luka atutubet ka aitojokar iboro lu akoru, apotu itunga itemonokinos aituk ikapun. Aponi itwasamai ikapun ngun agwel iboro lu akoru ka iboro icie.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba ogogo 'diyi atizu dika afa ofule agirikica si 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, ongulumu 'da otu omu robia trazu ni. Ba ayu robia 'da afa orodriru agirikica ni 'diyi jezu tualu afa ayuzaru amvu 'yaza ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abahingi b'omubyaro n'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, abantu bakatebekanisa omukoro gw'okushorooza esente. Esente zikakoresibwa kugura ebikwato n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa omu buhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: After a successful harvest, the agricultural cooperative decided to distribute new seeds to enhance crop yields. The farmers eagerly gathered at the community center for the much-anticipated event.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'amakungula amalungi, ekibiina ky'obwegassi kyasalawo okugaba ensigo empya okwongera ku makungula. Abalimi n'abalunzi baakuŋŋaanidde mu kitundu ku mukolo ogubadde gusuubirwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Inge kac maber, dul pa lupur omoko tamgi me poko kodi manyen me medo kac pa cam. Lupur gugure ki miti madit tutwal I kabedo me tedero pi yub ma kibyeko ni obi bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aisak ikorion ejok, abu atukot naka akoriok kitutub aikor ikinyom luitetiak kanu aiyatakin esake. Apotu akoriok kimorikikinos kotoma aiboisit naka itunga kanuka epucit loewomitai ebe ebeit ajaikin.
lgg_prompt: Ori okuza onyiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni 'diyi asi 'du ori o'diru 'diyi awazu ori ofuza ma omgbo otuzu. Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tra eyi avasi angu o'bi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea omu 'bani ega saaru ri 'yezu.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing pandemic, our organization has launched a fundraising campaign. We are reaching out to our supporters to help us gather resources for critical health initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, ekitongole kyaffe kitandise kaweefube w'okusonda ssente. Tukwatagana n'abawagizi baffe okutuyamba okukung'aanya ensimbi z'okukozesa mu mirimu gy'ebyobulamu egy'omugaso.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing pandemic, many organizations are stepping up to support those affected. As a result, recent donations will be towards coronavirus.
lug_prompt: Olw'ekirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso, ebitongole bingi bifulumye okuyamba abo abakoseddwa. N'ekivuddemu, obuyambi obusembyeyo bujja kukozesebwa mu kulwanyisa akawuka ka kolona.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me two korona matye kawot anyim, dule mapol tye ka konyo jo ma peko eni opoto i komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ma gimiyo cokcok-ki kibi tiyo kwedgi me lweny i kom two corona.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye, eutasi iriongeta luipu aingarakin ngul luetirorit. Kanuka ngun, agangat na ijaikitai pac nes ebeit aitwasam kanuka adeka naka ekorona.

eng_prompt: In an effort to modernize its operations, the hospital sought new technology solutions. After careful consideration, the administration decided to invest in a computer system specifically designed for managing patient information.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza emirimu gyayo, eddwaliro lyanoonya tekinologiya omupya. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, abakulembeze baasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu nkola ya kompyuta eyakolebwa okukwata ebikwata ku balwadde.

teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aisiteteun eswamae ke, abu adekis komo iwaitin luitetiak luka etatai loakwana. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, apotu eyaitene koseutu aipikakin ikapunukec toma akompiuta kanu aidar akiro nuikamunitos adekak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo erini azi ngazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, arojo nderi nda geri afa ndundu eyi edezu o'diru 'diyi. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da 'du e'yo lonyi vuti aleza 'bazu afa computer ru 'diyi ma alea e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma tambazu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent fundraising efforts, the local council held a meeting to discuss the allocation of resources. They emphasized the importance of transparency and accountability in managing the donations received.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kaweefube w'okusonda ssente eyaliwo gye buvuddeko, akakiiko k'ekyalo kaatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugabanyizaamu ensimbi. Baakkaatiriza obukulu bw'obwerufu n'embalirira mu kuddukanya obuyambi obwafunibwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki yub me jogo cente ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom yub me poko lim. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki ada ki kor tic ki lim ma gunongo.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in violence, the government has decided to allocate additional funds for public safety. This funding will be crucial in enhancing the capabilities of law enforcement agencies.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obweyongedde gye buvuddeko, gavumenti esazeewo okwongera ensimbi mu bukuumi bw'abantu. Ensimbi zino zijja kuba za mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obusobozi bw'ebitongole ebikuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa tim gero ma otime cokcok-ki, gamente omedo cente me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Lim man bikonyo tutwal I ilo malo rwom me tic pa dul ma gwoko cik.

teo_prompt: Angaleu keda ayuwara naka esisiak keda eswamak nes ibusakinit araut nuepolok noi kapakio nu engeso. Aitwasam aiboisio nu asioman kanu agitar itunga epedori aitolitol aisisia ka aitolitol aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba ma 'ba e'yo sukulu anzi eyini azini azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma rua ala azini ageitema ma dria okporu sa'wa e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma alea. Pari onita ni 'diyi ayuzu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa
nyn_prompt: Amagara n'oburinzi bw'abeegi n'abakozi, bishemereire kuguma nibikuru munonga omu bwire bw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara. Okukoresa amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese ahabw'eshonga za karantiini, nikibaasa kuremesa okwega kandi kikashiisha n'embeera y'abantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health crisis, it is crucial to implement effective measures to control the spread of infectious diseases. One viable solution is to establish dedicated facilities for isolation and treatment.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo okuteekawo engeri ennungi ez'okuziyiza okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa. Ekimu ku biyinza okugonjoolwa kwe kuteekawo ebifo eby'enjawulo eby'okwawula n'okujjanjaba.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, pire tek tutwal me keto yoo maber me gengo nya pa two ma kobo oyot-oyot. Yo acel maber me tyeko peko en aye me yubu odi yadi pa lutwo ma kipoko gioo ki lutwo mukene.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, ejokuna noi aitolomun iwaitin lu itikitikere awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas. Idiopebore yenepedori aitemokin ngun ngesi aitolomun aiboisio nuetiakarere adekak.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, n'eky'omugasho okutaho oburyo burungi bw'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira. Ekintu kimwe ekirikubaasika n'okutandikaho emyanya y'okushorooramu abantu n'okuraguriramu.

eng_prompt: The number of COVID-19 cases has surged in the area, prompting local health officials to take immediate action. As a result, additional resources have been allocated to the regional hospital to accommodate the influx of patients.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongedde mu kitundu, ekireetedde ab'ebyobulamu mu kitundu okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. N'ekivuddemu, eby'obugagga ebirala biweereddwa eddwaliro ly'ekitundu okusobola okukola ku balwadde abayingira.
ach_prompt: Wel dano matye ki two korona omede tutwal I kabedo eni, ma oweko lutic me yot kom me tedero omyero gutim gin mo oyot oyot. Macalo adwogi ne, kimedo lim I ot yat me tedero me konyo lutwo mapol matye kabino.
teo_prompt: Apolor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona kaiboisit kangin, ido abu ijaik eswamak luka angaleu aswam katipet. Kanuka ngun, ejaikitai iboro luipu adekis na aiboisit kanu aitodolikin adekak luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi tu angu 'da ma alea ra, e'yo 'di fe azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyini e'yo 'yezu indikindi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe arojo angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini afa ayuzaru dika eyini ani ecozu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma omgbo ma omgbo otuzu.

eng_prompt: Amidst escalating conflicts and dire living conditions, many individuals are forced to flee their homes. As they embark on their perilous journeys, refugees are seeking safe havens and opportunities for a better life.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu butabanguko obweyongera n'embeera y'obulamu embi, abantu bangi bawalirizibwa okudduka mu maka gaabwe. Nga batandika olugendo lwabwe olw'obulabe, abanoonyiboobubudamu banoonya ebifo eby'obukuumi n'emikisa gy'obulamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kare me lweny matye kamede ki kwo marac tutwal, dano mapol tye ka ngweco ki I gangi gi. I kare ma gitye ka cako wotgi marac, luring ayela gitye ka yenyo kabedo maber ki gum me kwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apol naka ingungeta keda aijar naronon, aponi kobuikinai itunga luipu akerit oreriakec. Neautatar kesi alosit orot loaronon, emoete ikerai aiboisio nu eyuwara keda arerengesio nu aijar najokan.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ma omgbo tupi tupi azini geri aa'zu muke ku 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi apa aku eyivile 'diyi ra. Yi e'doria aci yini onzi 'diyi ma alia, emunyale yi angu ta mbazuri nda azini drileba idri ala ni isuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire hamwe n'emituurire mibi, abantu baingi nibagyemeserezibwa okuruga omu maka gaabo. Obu empungi zirikutandika orugyendo rwazo orw'akabi, nizironda obusingye n'emigisha y'okutunga amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In search of sustainable livelihoods, many displaced individuals seek opportunities in agriculture. As a result, they often engage in activities such as animal grazing and cross-border farming.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya engeri z'okweyimirizaawo, abantu bangi ababundabunda banoonya emikisa mu bulimi n'obulunzi. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwenyigira mu mirimu nga okulunda ebisolo n'okulima okusala ensalo.
ach_prompt: Pi yenyo yoo me kwo maber, dano mapol ma oryemogi ki I gangi giyenyo gum me pur. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gi timo jami macalo gwoko lee ki pur I wang lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aimo iponesio luajokak luka aijar, ekotosi itunga luipu akoru. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aswam aswamisinei kwape aipit ibaren keda akoru koikoru.
lgg_prompt: Geri aa'zu edriru ewu drile ri ma alea, 'ba karakara 'bani ofu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi drileba agirikica ni 'diyi nda. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni 'yeta eyi 'ye ekile anyapa eyi ma tambazu azini amvu 'yazu kari eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikuruga omu maka gaabo, nibaronda emirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwejumba omu mirimo nk'okuriisa amatungo n'okuhinga aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: During a heated debate in the assembly, the representative voiced his concerns about the recent policies. He believes that the current direction taken by the government is detrimental to the nation's future.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu lukiiko, omukiise yalaze obweraliikirivu bwe ku mateeka agaakakolebwa. Alowooza nti enkola gavumenti gy'ekozesa kati ya bulabe eri ebiseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso.

teo_prompt: Kotoma opeget loepol noi kotoma airiamunet, abu abwoikiniton itodunit aiyalongongoke kanuikamunitos ainapeta nupac. Iyuunit ngesi ebe ainapeta nuiswamauna apugan kwana emunarete ingaren naka akwap.

nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura kw'amaani omu ishengyero, omujwekyerwa akashoborora okwerarikirira kwe aha biragiro ebyabaireho. Naayikiriza ngu engyenderwaho eriho obwahati erikukorwa gavumenti, n'ey'akabi aha nyensya y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the responsibilities involved, he has decided to decline the offer. His concerns about accountability and transparency weigh heavily on his mind.

lgg_prompt: E'yo erini ega e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'da gazu si. Asi otiza erini e'yo 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo ada ma dria ri ma dria ri eri ma omi ma dria nzizaru.

eng_prompt: The government has implemented strict guidelines to ensure that all allocated funds are directed towards pandemic relief efforts. Transparency and accountability are essential in managing these resources effectively.

teo_prompt: Etolomu apugan aicoreta nuepolok kanu awanyun ebe ikapun kere lu ijaikitai kes itwasamao kanu aingarakin itunga luedekasi adeka. Acamanara ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere iboro lu ejok.

eng_prompt: After much deliberation and discussion with his advisors, he realized the importance of maintaining integrity in his actions. Understanding the consequences of his decisions, he made a commitment to uphold the standards set forth by the governing authorities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okuteesa n'abawabuzi be, yakitegeera obukulu bw'okukuuma obwesimbu mu bikolwa bye. Ng'ategeera ebyandivudde mu kusalawo kwe, yeewaddeyo okunywerera ku mutindo oguteekebwawo ab'obuyinza abafuga.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu ka aineranara keda ecorak ke, abu ngesi koany ajokis naka aidar abeit kotoma aswamisioke. Kanu amisiikin nuepedorete alomun kotoma aseuneteke, abu ngesi kisumun aitup adoketait naetolomunitos apedorosio nuka apugan.

Erini e'yo ewaru e'yo erini pe 'diyi ma dria 'diyi vazu 'bori ma vutia, eri owi i e'yo azita driceza ni 'diyi ni 'bale 'diyi ma ta mbazu.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial discrepancies, the committee decided that the funds needed to be reimbursed. Following their recommendation, he prepared to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obutakkaanya mu by'ensimbi, akakiiko kaasazeewo nti ssente zaali zeetaaga okuddizibwa. Ng'agoberera amagezi gaabwe, yeetegese okubaako ky'akolawo.

eng_prompt: As a public servant, my duty is to uphold the law and protect the rights of the citizens. I must prioritize my ethical obligations over any orders that compromise justice.

eng_prompt: After discovering the missing funds, he took immediate action to ensure they were returned. His integrity and promptness did not go unnoticed by the officials.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku mbalirira n'endowooza z'abantu, yakomekkereza nti ekisinga obulungi kye ky'okukola kwe kukola ku nsonga ezaaleetebwa bannansi. Mu kwogera kwe, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'embalirira n'obwerufu mu nsaasaanya ya gavumenti.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuka ebajet keda aomisio nuka itunga, abu ngesi kotema ebe ibusakinit ngesi aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga. Kotoma oinerike, abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aitodunit eswamae loajokan loka ikapun luka apugan.

E'yo erini nze ri ma alea, eri 'ba asi orodri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria azini e'yo ada be e'yo gamete ni robia ayuzu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the organization faced a financial shortfall. As a result, the team was requested to return the money as soon as possible.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy discussion about the importance of honesty, the group decided to collect contributions for the charity. However, when it came time to settle the accounts, only five people returned the money.

ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok pi kare malac I kom ber pa bedo ki ada, gurup ne gumoko tamgi me jogo cente pi dul ma miyo kony bot lucan. Kadi bed kumeno, ikare ma kare me culu cente oo, dano abic keken aye gudwoko cen cente.

eng_prompt: To support local farmers and enhance food security in our community, we are launching a fundraising campaign. Your generous contributions will make a significant impact on our efforts.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of their community, the local charity organized a food drive. Volunteers gathered supplies from various sources to ensure that no one went hungry.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ekitundu kyabwe obweyongera, ekitongole ky'obwannakyewa eky'omu kitundu kyategese okugaba emmere. Bannakyewa baakung'aanyizza ebintu okuva mu nsibuko ez'enjawulo okulaba nga tewali n'omu afa enjala.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo pa miti pa lwak, dul ma miyo kony ki lupeko me tedero guyubu yub me poko cam bot lwak. Dano ma odyere gujogo jami ki I kabedo mapatpat me neno ni pe tye ngat mo ma kec omako.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubetekec, abu atukot naka agangat kitemok aikor inyamat. Apotu ngul luengarakinete kesi kotukokinos iboro kama ejaasi aiboisio nuegelegela kanu awanyun ebe emamei idiotunganan yenetapit etenge.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago by'ekitundu n'omuwendo gw'amaka ogweyongera okulwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo, abakiise b'akakiiko akakubirizi baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the project's needs and the potential impact on the community, it has become clear that additional funding is necessary. To ensure the success of our initiatives, the money should be given to the task force.

eng_prompt: In response to the global pandemic, governments and organizations mobilized resources to address the urgent health crisis. As part of this initiative, significant financial support was allocated to various healthcare programs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi, gavumenti n'ebitongole byakungaanya eby'obugagga okukola ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obw'amangu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, obuyambi bw'ensimbi bungi bwateekebwa mu pulogulaamu z'ebyobulamu ez'enjawulo.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateesa n'okuteekateeka, okukkaanya okusembayo kwatuukiddwaako. Olw'okukkiriza okwali kwetaagibwa, ssente kati zaali zeetegefu okugabibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me winye ki yube, winye me agiki oo. Ki nongo twero ma mite, lim ne dong tye atera me tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luka ipegeta keda aitemonokin, aponi odolokinai acamanar. Keda acamanar na ekotoi, ekapakina kwana aikor ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani e'yo otuzu azini otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba ca ti ecita asizuri ma dria ra. E'yo 'bani lezu driwala fezu 'bori ma vutia, robia 'da sa'wa 'disi ngonde 'bani eri awazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteesa n'okuteekateekyera, endagaano y'ahamuheru ekahikiirira. Ahabw'okwikiriza ebirikwetengwa, esente zikaba ziteekateekire kuheebwa abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the global pandemic, governments around the world allocated significant funds to support public health initiatives. These resources were essential for developing vaccines and implementing safety measures.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekirwadde bbunansi, gavumenti okwetooloola ensi yonna zaawaayo ensimbi nnyingi okuwagira enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu. Ebikozesebwa bino byali bikulu nnyo mu kukola eddagala erigema n'okussa mu nkola eby'okwerinda.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two korona, gamente mapat-pat me wilobo oketo lim madit tutwal me konyo yub me yot-kom. Jami magi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi yubu yat agwera ki keto yub me gwoko kuc itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin adeka naka ekorona, apotu apuganisinei kotoma akwap kere ijaikisi ikapun luipu kanu aigang nuka angaleu naka itunga. Ajokuka noi iboro lu kanu aitolomun ikee luikisere ekato ka aitegear ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, gamete wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi 'ba robia angiri atita fezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi dri. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ndra orodriru aro soza ni 'diyi edezu azini e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu aha burwaire bw'ensi yoona,gavumenti okwetorora ensi yoona zikataho esente nyingi z'okushagika enteekateeka y'eby'amagara. Ebikwato ebi bikaba biri eby'omugasho omu kukora emibazi y'okugyema n'okuta omu nkora eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the evidence presented during the trial, the judge expressed concerns about the legitimacy of the financial transactions. As a result, the court decided to take back the money.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obujulizi obwanjuddwa mu musango, omulamuzi yalaze obweraliikirivu ku bwenkanya bw'emirimu gy'ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, kkooti yasalawo okuzzaayo ssente.
ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo caden ma kimiyo ikare me pido, langol kop onyuto lworo I kom lok me cente ma otime. Macalo adwogi ne, court omoko tamme me dwoko cen cente ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aitogogongoret na ijaikitai kapak naka emusago, abu atubon kitodu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos acamanar naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, abu ekooti koseu ainyakar ikapun ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri ece asi otiza e'yo 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi 'yezuri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, dwani 'du e'yo sende 'da 'duzu vile.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma obujurizi obwaretsirwe omu kooti,omuramuzi akooreka okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu,kooti ekasharamu kugarura sente.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the budget allocations, the government has decided to prioritize funding for essential services. As a result, the health sector will use the money.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza obulungi embalirira, gavumenti esazeewo okukulembeza obuweereza obwetaagisa. N'ekinaavaamu, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kijja kukozesa ssente.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom byek me lim ma kimiyo, gamente omoko tamme me keto lim I tic ma pire tek loyo weng. Macalo adwogi ne, tenge me yot kom obitiyo ki cente ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuka ebajet, abu apugan koseu aisingarenit ainanakin ikapun mama ejaasi ijanakino lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, ebuni erionget loka angaleu aitwasam ikapun ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita ajeni 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, gamete asi e'yo 'du robia fezu azi orodriru 'diyi dri oko. E'yo 'disi, arakala alata niri ni mu robia 'da ayu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza embaririra, gavumenti eshaziremu kwebembeza obuheereza bw'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara nikiija kukoresa sente.

eng_prompt: With the recent allocation of funds aimed at improving public health infrastructure, experts anticipate significant advancements in medical services. As a result, the health sector will make great use of the money.
lug_prompt: Olw'ensimbi ezaateekebwawo gyebuvuddeko okutumbula ebyobulamu, abakugu basuubira enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu byobulamu. N'ekinaavaamu, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu kijja kukozesa bulungi ssente.
ach_prompt: Ki cente ma kiketo cokcok-ki me medo rwom me tic me yot kom, ludiro tye ki byek me dongo rwom me kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, tenge me yot kom obi tiyo ki cente ne maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Keda ikapun lu ijaikitai pac kanu aitojokar amukian naka itunga, eomitos ipiriotin ebe epote aiyatakin noi nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, ebuni erionget loka angaleu aitwasam ikapun ngun ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani robia 'ba o'diru e'yo alata ni 'diyi otuzu risi, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi ega kini e'yo alata ni 'diyi nga zo ra. E'yo 'disi, esele alataniri nga robia 'da ayu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutunga esente z'okutunguura eby'amagara, abakugu nibateekateeka ngu nihaija kubaho entunguuka omu by'amagara. Ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'eby'amagara nikiija kukoresa gye esente.

eng_prompt: As the number of infectious diseases continues to rise, it is crucial for healthcare facilities to implement strict safety protocols. One of the most effective measures to protect both patients and staff is the use of personal protective equipment.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'endwadde ezisiigibwa gugenda mu maaso n'okulinnya, kya mugaso nnyo eri amalwaliro okussa mu nkola emitendera egy'obukuumi egy'amaanyi. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okukuuma abalwadde n'abakozi kwe kukozesa eby'okwekuumisa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two ma kobo medde ameda, pire tek tutwal pi odi yadi me keto cik me gwokke i tic. Yo acel maber loyo me gwoko lutwo ki lutic obedo tic ki jami ma gwoko kom dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi adekisia aitegear ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Adiopet koboro lu iswamaete ejok kanu ayuarite adekak keda eswamak erai aitwasam iboro lu ayuara.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe azo 'ba eyi obipi eyi pie ri ni tutu, eri orodriru arojo eyini azita okporu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Geri azi alu muke ndeni 'bani ecozu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma ta mbazu tualu azi'ba eyi pie ri afa tambaza fepi 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'endwara ezirikuturira nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, n'eky'omugasho omu marwariro okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kurinda abarwaire n'abakozi n'okukoresa ebyoma by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Given the recent surge in infectious diseases, it is crucial for the district to prioritize public health measures. Establishing dedicated facilities will help manage outbreaks effectively and protect the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo disitulikiti okukulembeza ebyobulamu by'abantu. Okuteekawo ebifo eby'enjawulo kijja kuyamba okukwasaganya obulungi okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde n'okukuuma ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa two ma kobo i kare-ni, pire tek tutwal ni district omyero oket yub me yot kom obed gin ma pire tek. Gedo odi yadi ma ki keto pi gengo poto pa two I yoo maber dok gwoko lwak.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo eyatakinor adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi edisitrikt aisingarenit nuka angaleu naka itunga. Aitolomun aiboisio nuegelegela ingarakini aitikitik adekasinei ejok ka ayuarite itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru distrikiti ni e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'duzu okporu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma sita ni nga azakoma fe e'yo azo efupi 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru dika eri nga ongulumu eyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kweyongyera kw'endwara ezirikuturira, disiturikiti eshemereire kwebembeza eby'amagara g'abantu. Okwombeka emyanya y'okukoreramu, nikiija kuhwera omu kurwanisa okubarukaho kw'endwara n'okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing healthcare crisis, local authorities have reached out for assistance. As a result, development partners are providing fuel to the ambulances.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda mu maaso, ab'obuyinza mu byalo batuuse okuyamba. N'ekivuddemu, abakolagana nabo mu nkulaakulana bawa ambyulensi amafuta.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, lutela me tedero gucwalo kony bot lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me dongo lobo tye ka miyo moo bot ambulance.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena odolokisi aingarakinio. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ipaupa luka apol aijaikin akinyet mama ejaasi amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu azakoma ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti angu ezoma ni 'diyi odu fe ambulansi eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bahereize obuhwezi. N'ekyarugiremu, abarikukwatanisa omu by'entunguuka nibaheereza emotoka za ambyurensi amajuuta.

eng_prompt: To ensure a rapid response in emergencies, all essential services must be adequately prepared. One critical aspect of this preparation is maintaining a sufficient fuel supply for the ambulances.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okuddamu amangu mu mbeera ez'amangu, obuweereza bwonna obw'omugaso bulina okwetegekebwa obulungi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kwetegeka kuno kwe kukuuma amafuta g'emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde nga gamala.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kitimo jami oyot oyot ikare me peko ma opoto atura, lutic weng omyero guyubbe maber. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub eni obedo neno ni moo tye ma oromo pi ambulance.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorio aitemokin atipet atiokisio nu engeso, ekot aijaanakinio kere akapakina ejok. Adiopebore naepol noi naka aitemonokin ngun ngesi ayangaun akinyet naedolit kanu amotokan nuadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru, le 'ba ma otu e'yo dria orodriru 'diyi kililiru. E'yo azi okporu otuta 'di ma alia ri odu ambulansi eyini ri ma omgbo ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu habaho okugarukamu ahonaaho omu bwire bw'ebihikiirizi, obuheereza bwona oburikwetengwa bwine kutebeekanisibwa kurungi. Ekikuru omu kweteekateekyera oku n'okureeba ngu emotoka za ambyurensi zitunga amajuuta agarikumara.

eng_prompt: After months of dedicated effort and collaboration, the team successfully completed the project ahead of schedule. Their commitment and perseverance did not go unnoticed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okufuba n'okukwatagana, ttiimu yamaliriza pulojekiti nga bukyali. Okwewaayo kwabwe n'okugumiikiriza kwalabwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek kacel ki winye, dul pa lutic ne gutyeko tic ne con. Keto cwinygi kacel ki diyo cwinygi pe okato ma pe kineno.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aswam kagogong keda aiswamanara, apotu etimu kongetakisi epurojekt sek. Aponi kowanyunai ainakina kec keda atitingikec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani azi ngazu asi driasi tualu ti icita be 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da de otita 'da drioru. E'yo yini asi 'bazu azini asi teza yini 'diyi awini mu e'yo kokoru ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'amaani n'okukwatanisa, tiimu ekabaasa kumaririza purogyekiti bukiri kare. Okwehayo kwabo n'okugumisiriza kwabo bikareebwa.

eng_prompt: After a long day of negotiations, he finally secured the funds they desperately needed. With a sense of relief, he made his way back home, eager to share the good news.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa okumala olunaku oluwanvu, yasobola okufuna ssente ze baali beetaaga ennyo. Ng'awummudde, yaddayo eka ng'ayagala nnyo okubuulirako abalala amawulire amalungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye pi nino mapol, lacen en onongo cente ma onongo gimito tutwal. Ki kwe cwiny madit, en odok cen gang, ki miti matek me nywako kwena maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aparan naepol noi naka ipegeta, abu ngesi kodum ikapun lu ekotos kesi noi. Keda aiyengun, abu ngesi kobongok ore, ekapakina aimor akiro nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: O'du ezu 'bani e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu robia yini le saaru 'diyi ra. Aa'zu ava be, eri mu drile akua ava be o'dukoti onyiru 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteesa eizooba riringwa, ahamuheru akatunga esente ezi baabaire nibenda munonga. Arikuhurira oburuhuuko, akagaruka omuka, aine ekihika ky'okugabana amakuru marungi.

eng_prompt: In a recent meeting, community members expressed their concerns about the lack of positive role models. To address this issue, the council emphasized the importance of leadership in fostering a supportive environment.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abantu b'omu kitundu baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'obutaba na bantu balungi be bayinza okukoppa. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, akakiiko kaggumiza obukulu bw'obukulembeze mu kutumbula embeera ewagira.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lwak me kabedo man gunyutu lworo gi i kom bedo peke pa jo ma gitye lanen maber. Me tyeko lok man, kancil oketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa tela ikelo kabedo maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na aanyunet najokan. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, abu ekansulo kitogogong ajokis naka eingarenone kanu aitopolor aiboisit naigangit.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi azi o'diru ni ma alia, 'ba ongulumu ma alia 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo 'ba ecopi ecetaru 'diyi ma ako ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, kanisulu 'da fe okpo orodri driceza ni angu atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abantu b'omukyanga bakooreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'eibura ry'eky'okureeberaho kirungi. Okukora aha nshonga egi,akakiiko kakashoboorora omugasho gw'obwebembezi omu kureetaho embeera nungi.

eng_prompt: The government has allocated additional funding to address the ongoing pandemic. This financial support aims to tackle various challenges arising from the health crisis.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etaddewo ensimbi endala okukola ku kirwadde bbunansi ekigenda mu maaso. Obuyambi buno obw'ensimbi bugendererwamu okukola ku bizibu eby'enjawulo ebiva mu buzibu bw'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Gamente omiyo cente mukene me lweny i kom two korona matye kawot anyim. Kony me lim man tye pi tyeko peko mapat-pat matye macalo adwogi me peko me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan ibwaik ikapun icie kanu aitemokin adeka naka ekorona na elosi akonye. Alosikinet naka agangat na ikapun erai aitemokin atiokisio nuipu nuelomunitos kanuka ationis naka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Gamete 'ba robia azi dika e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma aza kozu. Atita robia ni 'diri lezu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eyongyeireyo esente z'okukora aha burwaire oburiho obwahati. Obuhwezi obu obw'esente, nibugyenderera okurwanisa oburemeezi oburikuruga omu buremeezi bw'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In a dramatic turn of events, several high-ranking officials found themselves at odds with the administration. Their refusal to comply with directives issued from the Oval Office sparked a fierce backlash.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'ekitalo ey'ebintu, abakungu ab'oku ntikko bangi beesanga nga tebakkiriziganya na bukulembeze. Okugaana kwabwe okugoberera ebiragiro ebyafulumizibwa okuva mu woofiisi ya Oval kyaleetawo okuvuganya okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I alokaloka madit tutwal ma otimme, lutic madongo mapol gunongo gipe ki winye I kom gamente. Kwero lubu cik ma aa ki gang tic pa gamente okelo jemo madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakineta nuapotu kotakanutu, apotu eswamak luapolok kodumutu kesi epeget keda eyaitene. Apotu kesi kongeroto aitup aicoreta nuka eyapiesi loka apolon akwap koyangautu aitepeg naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu okposiri ma alia, azi'ba uruleru karakara yi isu yi ma ngulupi erita ako be driceza be. E'yo yini lezu azita 'bani fele engazu pari oval office niri ma alia 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku ri fe e'yo 'ba eyini gazu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'omutaano y'ebintu, abakuru baingi bakeeshangira batarikukwatanisa n'obwebembezi. Okuremwa kukuratira ebiragiro kuruga omu ofiisi y'omwebembezi w'eihanga, kikareetaho okwetomboita kw'amaani.
